T13TD4312.3E:17b-3: drag shul rlung ni bkag pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-4: rlung dang bad kan gcig gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-5: mkhris pa phyir 'byin de yi tshe //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-6: mig dang pags pa ser ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-7: phyi sa skya bar gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-9: snying ga lci ba nyid gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-10: mkhris pa yan lag la brten na //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-11: rid cing drod chung rtsib logs gzer //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-12: skyigs bu lud pa yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-15: gang gi tshe rtsub pa la sogs pa'i rgyus rlung dang bad kan 'dres shing gcig tu gyur pa de'i tshe mkhris pa khong pa nas phyir 'byin par byed la de'i tshe mig dang pags pa ser por 'gyur zhing phyi sa shin tu skya rbab shing dkar bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:17b-16: bshang ba 'gags shing rgyu ma krug krug zer zhing lbo ba dang bcas te /
T13TD4312.3E:17b-17: snying ga shin tu lci zhing na bar gyur na mkhris pa'i rims kyis yan lag byer zhing brten par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:17b-19: rid cing drod chung ba la sogs pa'i bla brnan gyi nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-20: de la rma bya'am khyim bya dang //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-21: sreg pa'i sha khu'am la phug ni //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-22: skam po'i khu ba'am rgya sran khu //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-23: rtsub kha skyur bar sbyar ba sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-25: yan lag la brten pa'i mig ser gyi nad de la rma bya la sogs pa'i sha khu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:17b-26: la phug skam po'i khu ba la sogs pa'i khu ba de dag rtsub pa dang kha ba dang skyur ba dang sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-27: rab tsha skyur dang rno ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-28: lan tshva shin tu dro ba bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-30: yang nad de la zas skom dang sman la sogs pa rab tu tsha ba dang skyur ba la sogs pa phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-31: kha lung khu ba tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-32: sbyar ba'i lde gu'ang sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-34: mig ser gyi nad dang ldan pas kha lung la sogs pa'i lde gu zos na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-35: des ni mkhris pa rang gnas su //
T13TD4312.3E:17b-37: rgyu ma 'khrug sogs bla brnan bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-3: bshad ma thag pa ltar byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-4: des nang gi rlung dang bad kan bsal bas yan lag byer ba'i mkhris pa rang gi gnas gang yin pa der 'jug cing 'ong bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-5: des na bshang ba yang snga ma las mdog 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-6: til btags pa lta bu las ser por 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-7: de bzhin du rlung bla brnan dang bcas pa yang zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-8: 'di yis bla brnan zhi nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-9: mig ser gso ba'i cho ga bya //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-11: skyes bu de'i bla brnan zhi bar gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-12: mig ser la phan pa'i gso ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-13: mig ser khong du zhen pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-14: brag zhun ba gcin dang sbyar ba //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-15: gser gyi dri ma'am ta bya ni //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-16: ba gcin sbyar ba zla gcig blud //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-18: mig ser khong pa'i nang du zhen pa la ni brag zhun dang ba gcin dang sbyar ba zla ba gcig gi bar du blud pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-19: gser bzhus pa'i dri ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-21: ta bya dang ba gcin sbyar ba zla ba gcig gi bar du blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-22: ha li sak sle tres khu //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-23: 'o ma ma he'i mar bskol ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-24: skyu ru ra yi khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-25: dur byid sbyar ba'i bkru sman blud //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-26: 'khrus nas kha zas mngar bag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-29: ha li sa ka zhes bya ba 'di'i nad yod pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-30: sle tres kyi khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-31: 'o ma mar gyi nyis 'gyur dang ma he'i mar bskol bas lus snum par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-32: skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-33: dur byid sbyar ba'i bkru sman blud nas 'khrus par gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-34: mkhris pa la phan pa'i kha zas mngar bag sbyin par bya'i gzhan sbyin par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-35: sngar bshad rgun 'bru'i lde gu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-36: mngar ba'i sman mar zhun mar sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-37: 'o ma mas gtong sman dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-38: 'jam rtsir byas pa bsten par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-40: sngar le'u 'di nyid las bshad pa'i rgun 'bru'i lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-41: mngar ba'i sman dang sbyar ba'i mar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-42: 'o ma'i mas gtong ba 'og nas bshad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:18a-43: snum gyi 'jam rtsi dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-44: me drod bskyed par bya ba'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:18a-45: rgun chang chang rnying sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-0: de bzhin du @18b rgun chang dang chang rnying dag kyang khong pa'i me drod bskyed pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-1: lud pa'i skabs bshad aa ru ra'i //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-2: shing mngar ba la pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-3: 'o ma sbyar ba nad dmigs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-4: me drod ji bzhin sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-6: ha li sa ka'i nad de la lud pa gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i aa ru ra'i lde gu ri shis bshad pa sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-7: yang na pi pi ling la sogs pa nad kyi tshul ji lta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:18b-8: me drod kyi stobs ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-9: mkhas pas 'or nad skabs bshad pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-10: gso ba skya rbab la yang sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-12: sman pa mkhas pas 'or nad kyi gso bar bshad pa dag kyang nad dmigs ji lta ba bzhin du skya rbab kyi nad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-13: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:18b-14: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:18b-16: // / de nas 'or nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-18: go rims kyis na 'or nad gso ba bshad pa'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-19: 'or nad yan lag kun zhugs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-20: nad skyes ma smin la dang por //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-21: smyung byas kha zas yang ba bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-22: bong nga thang shing byi dang ga / dug mo yungs dang na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-23: bskol ba'i chu dron blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-25: 'or nad kyi rnam pa lus kyi yan lag thams cad la zhugs shing nad gzhi so so dang /
T13TD4312.3E:18b-26: gnyis dang kun 'dus pa las skyes pa ma yin pa la dang po kho nar sbyang ba byas pas de'i rjes thug pa la sogs pa'i kha zas mang po sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-27: de'i 'og tu bong nga la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i chu 'jam blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-28: yang na aa ru ra bcas dang //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-29: thang shing ba spru bskol ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-30: lcags phye dgu par bcas pa blud //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-32: yang na aa ru ra rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i khu ba smyung bar byas shing /
T13TD4312.3E:18b-33: kha zas yang bzos pa'i 'og tu blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-34: yang na lcags phye dgu pa skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:18b-35: chu dron du sbyar te blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-36: 'or nad shas cher aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:18b-37: ba gcin bcas pa sbyang phyir blud //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-1: nad shas cher bdo ba la ni aa ru ra dang ba gcin sbyar ba blud cing sbyangs nas dag par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-2: 'bras bu gsum bskol pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-3: dur byid lcags phye tsha gsum bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-5: yang na 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i nang du bu tse shel nas tsha ba gsum gyi sman yan btab pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-6: yang na de bzhin gu gul lam //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-7: brag zhun dang ni sbyar ba blud //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-9: yang na 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba gu gul la brag zhun gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-10: me drod chung zhing ma smin la //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-12: tsha ba gsum dang rtsal ru tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-13: sbrang rtsi dar bar sbyar ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-14: aa ru ra dang bu ram bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-15: bu ram bca' sgar bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-16: zos rjes dar ba blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-18: 'or nad can gyi nad pa me drod chung ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa la tsha ba gsum dang ldan pa'i dar ba blud pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:19a-19: yang na aa ru ra dang bu ram zos pa'i rjes la dar ba blud par bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:19a-20: yang na bu ram dang sgar sbyar ba zos nas /
T13TD4312.3E:19a-21: de'i rjes la dar ba blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-22: sge'u gsher bu ram cha snyoms pa //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-23: srang phyed tshad kyis bskyed nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-24: che tshad srang lnga'i bar du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-25: zla gcig za zhing yu sha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-26: 'o ma sha khu bcas zos na //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-28: gcin nad dbugs mi bde cham pa //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-29: sgyid snyom ma zhu mig ser dang //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-30: lus skem gdon gyi nad rnams dang //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-31: lud pa bad kan sbyor 'dis sel //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-33: yang na sge'u gsher bu ram dang cha mnyam pa srang phyed phyed kyis bskyed nas che tshad srang lngar phyin gyi bar du zla ba gcig gi bar du bza' zhing bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-35: sge'u gsher dang bu ram cha mnyam ste bsres pa nyi ma dang po la srang phyed bza'/
T13TD4312.3E:19a-36: nyi ma gnyis pa la srang gcig bza'/
T13TD4312.3E:19a-37: gsum pa la srang phyed dang gnyis /
T13TD4312.3E:19a-39: lnga pa la srang phyed dang gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:19a-41: bdun pa la srang phyed dang bzhi /
T13TD4312.3E:19a-43: dgu pa la srang phyed dang lnga /
T13TD4312.3E:19a-44: zhag bcu pa la srang lnga /
T13TD4312.3E:19b-0: zhag bcu gcig pa nas zla ba gcig gi bar gyi zhag nyi shu la sge'u gsher dang bu ram yod na @19b srang lnga lnga bza' bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-1: sman de zhu bar gyur nas bad kan gyi shas che ba'i 'or nad la ni yu sha sran khu blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-2: mkhris pa shas che ba la ni 'o ma blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-3: rlung shas che ba la ni sha khu dang bcas par zas sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-4: 'dis ni 'or nad la sogs pa nas bad kan gyi mtha'i nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-5: gdon gyi nad ni smyo byed dang /
T13TD4312.3E:19b-7: sge'u gsher dong gra'i lde gu'i khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-8: 'o ma dag dang mar ni bskol blud na //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-9: 'or nad sbrid pa dmu rdzing me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-10: nad kyis zil mnan na yang nad med 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-12: sge'u gsher de nyid dong gra yin pas na /
T13TD4312.3E:19b-14: yang na gsar zhing rang gi khu ba dang bcas pa bzang zhing khyad par du gyur pa'i sge'u gsher nyid la sge'u gsher dong gra zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:19b-15: de'i lde gu'i khu ba dang 'o ma gnyis dang mar bskol te blud na 'or nad la sogs pas nyam thag cing zil gyis mnan na yang nad med par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-16: ma zhu med cing phyi sa 'gags //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-17: 'or nad kyis gzer tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-18: dur byid dan da kru trug tres //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-19: bskol ba'i 'o ma blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-21: ma zhu ba med cing ma zhu ba'i nad de byang bar gyur nas kyang phyis 'gags pa dang ldan pa'i 'or nad kyis gzir bar gyur pa la tsha ba gsum la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i 'o ma blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-22: ma he'i gcin nam ba gcin nam //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-23: 'o ma btung zhing de dang bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-25: yang na 'o ma dang bcas par zas bza' zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:19b-27: ba'i gcin zhes bya ba gang yang rung ba 'o ma dang bcas pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-28: zhag bdun yang na zla gcig bar //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-29: rnga mo'i 'o ma blud pas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-32: zla ba gcig gi bar du zas gzhan mi sbyin par rnga mo'i 'o ma blud pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-33: ti mu sa dang nas tshig thal //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-34: la la phud dang tsha ba lnga ;
T13TD4312.3E:19b-35: / na le sham dang se'u 'bru dang //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-36: ba ta 'u su star bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-37: bil ba gzhon nu zho gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-38: chu bre bzhi bskol mar bre gang //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-39: bskol ba blud na 'or nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:19b-42: yang 'or nad la ti mu sa zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-0: yang ba na ka la sogs pa'i @20a * //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-1: sman sna re zhing zho gnyis gnyis chu bre bzhi'i nang du bskol /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-2: de'i khu ba bzhi cha lus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-3: sman gyi khu ba btsags pa bre gang /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-4: mar bre gang bskol ba blud na 'or nad la sogs pa 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-5: zho dang tsi tra kar bsres las //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-6: byung ba'i mar ni dar bar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-7: tsi tra ka btab bskol ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-8: yon tan gong ma mtshungs pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-10: tsi tra ka dang bsres pa'i zho bsrubs pa las mar sar gang zhig byung bar gyur pa de dar ba nyid dang bcas la tsi tra ka'i lde gu btab ste bskol ba'i sman mar blud na yang yon tan snga ma dang 'dra ste /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-11: 'or nad gzhang 'brum la sogs pa 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-12: thang la 'bar dang tig ta che //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-13: dge ba'am aa ru ra'i sman mar //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-14: dus shes pa yis sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-16: dus shes pa'i sman pa mkhas pas nad dmigs kyi shas gang che ba las dpags [?] te /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-17: thang la 'bar gyis bshad pa'i sman mar gcin nad za gu'i skabs su bshad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-18: tig ta chen po'i sman mar mdze nad kyi skabs su bshad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-19: dge ba chen po'i sman mar smyo byed gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-20: aa ru ra'i sman mar dmu rdzing gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa de dag las ci rigs par sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-21: rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-22: bre bzhir aa ru ra brgya bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-23: der ni bu ram srang brgya gzhug / tsha ba gsum dang dri sna gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-24: nas tshig 'khus thal cung zad btab /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-25: la sogs pa la rang rtsi bre phyed gzhug / de byin na ni 'or nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-26: rims skran gcin nad lus skems pa //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-27: ma zhu mkhris pa rlung dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-28: sgregs skyur kha dog mi sdug dang //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-29: gcin nad rlung gi khu chu'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-30: dbugs mi bde dang yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-31: mcher pa'i nad dang sbyar ba'i dug / dmu rdzing gi ni nad rnams sel //
T13TD4312.3E:20a-33: rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i khu ba bre bzhi'i nang du aa ru ra rdog ma brgya bskol la der bu ram srang brgya gzhug par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-34: de tshul bzhin du bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-35: gzar bur chags pa'i tshad kyi lde gur gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-36: de'i nang du tsha ba gsum pi pi ling dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-38: bca' sga zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20a-39: dri sna gsum po sug smel dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20b-1: gandha bha dra zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20b-2: nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba las cung zad cig ci rigs par btab ste btags pa'i phye ma dang bsres la bsgrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20b-3: sbrang rtsi bre phyed de srang bcu drug gzhug go //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-6: ya baksha ra'i tshad 'dir slob dpon gyis ma bshad mod kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:20b-7: de gzhung gzhan las shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:20b-9: tsha ba gsum las srang bzhi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-10: dri sna gsum las srang gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-11: ya baksha la sogs zho gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-12: bsgrangs pa'i sbrang rtsi bre phyed gzhug / ces bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-13: sman de byin nas 'or nad nas dmu rdzing gi nad kyi bar du sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-14: nas dang s'a lu 'bras rnying zas //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-15: rtsa ba bcu yi chu dang bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-16: lan tshva nyung snum shas chung ba //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-17: byin na 'or nad sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-18: rgya sran mungga'i khu ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-19: thal sman tsha ba gsum ldan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-20: de bzhin skam sa'i sha rus sbal //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-21: skyin gor byi dur sha khu sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-23: 'or nad la ni nas dang s'a lu la sogs pa'i 'bras rnying pa rtsa ba bcu'i chu dang bskol ba'i lan tshva dang snum cung zad cig byin na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-24: rgya sran mungga'i khu ba dang nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20b-25: tsha ba gsum dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20b-26: de bzhin du skam sa'i srog chags rus sbal la sogs pa'i sha khu la thal sman dang tsha ba gsum dang byin na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-27: btung bar dar ba sar pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-28: chang ni sman dang bcas pa blud //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-30: 'or nad can la btung ba ni dar ba sar pa bsrubs ma thag gam /
T13TD4312.3E:20b-31: chang sman dang ldan pa mnan pa'i chang aa sa pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:20b-33: rgun chang la sogs pa blud na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-34: zi ra zur pa dzi ban ti //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-35: ma nu tsi tra ka ra b'i //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-36: ya baksha ra bil ba'i rkang //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-37: da trig zho re'i tshad du byas //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-38: mar dang til mar nang du brngos //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-40: tshad 'khru dang ni snying gi nad //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-41: me drod chung dang gcin nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-42: tsha ba lnga dang sbyar ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-43: thug pa'ang yon tan de dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:20b-45: zi ra la sogs pa'i sman mar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:21a-0: til mar gyi nang du brngos nas thug par byas te blud na yang 'or nad la sogs pa la @21a * //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-2: de bzhin du tsha ba lnga dang sbyar ba'i thug pa yang 'or nad la sogs pa la mchog tu phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-3: rdo dreg ru rta ston [?] ye [?] //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-4: ha re nu ka aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-5: shi be ta ka shu pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-6: chu srin sder mo pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-7: spri ka thang shing spang spos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-8: pi pi ling dang dbyi mo dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-9: kun tan ta na bya ma ka / ba la ka dang dri sna bzhi //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-10: bal bu'i lo ma gla sgang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-11: gandha pa la sha la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-12: bskus pa'i til mar dag dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-13: khrus kyi chu dang lde gu bya //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-15: rdo dreg la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:21a-16: til mar du bcas pas bsku bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:21a-17: yang sman de dag zhib tu btags pa'i lde gus bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:21a-18: yang sman de dag nyid dang bskol ba'i chus lus khrus bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-19: rdo dreg ni shil pus ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-20: ston ya ni ta la bid ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-21: shi be ta ka ni thang shing phra mo'i thang chu'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-22: pri ka ni de bi la ta'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-23: kun tan ta ni pa ri bi la'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-24: nim pa aarga ba spru dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-25: nag ta ma li'i chus khrus bya //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-29: ba spru ba dang nag ta ma la bskol ba'i chus khrus bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-30: yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-31: ka ra b'i ra ba spru ba //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-32: king shu ka dang bi sha la //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-33: 'bras bu gsum dang seng phrom dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-34: na li ka dang thang shing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-35: spang spos ko sha ta ki dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-36: bong nga ta la'i lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-37: dza yan ti dang 'ol [?] ma se //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-38: ka ka ta ni sa li shing //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-39: pri sha karni dbyi mo dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-40: rid ti bri ti glang po'i sna //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-41: lde gu dro 'jom bskus pa phan //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-43: yan lag gi phyogs gcig skrangs pa'i nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:21a-44: ka ra b'i ra la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu dro 'jam tsam gyis bskus pa phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-46: king shu ka ni ba la sha'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-47: na li ka ni ba dru ma la ta'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-48: ko sha ta ka ni kri ta tsi tra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-49: bong [?] nga ni aa ti bi sha'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-50: ta li'i lo ma ni mo sa li'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-51: dza yan ti ni aag ni man ta'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-53: pri sha karni ni mu sha kar ni'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-55: bri ti tra ba ni shir sha'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-56: hasti ka ra na ni glang po che'i rna ba ste bar da [?] da'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21a-57: de nas 'or nad rlung gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-0: zla phyed bar du dur byid @21b dam //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-1: yang na ae randa'i mar blud //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-3: de nas rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad la dur byid dang bskol ba'i mar ram /
T13TD4312.3E:21b-4: ae randa las byung ba'i mar zla ba phyed kyi bar du blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-5: rlung gis rtug 'gags la de nyid //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-7: sha khu blud cing rlung 'joms pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-8: sman gyi dugs dang bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-10: 'or nad la rlung gis rtug ba 'gags pa dang ldan pa la ni ae randa'i til mar de nyid zas ma zos pa'i sngon du 'o ma 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:21b-11: sha khu dang sbyang te blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-12: yang na rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad la rlung 'joms pa'i sman gang dag yin pa dugs dang bsku ba'i rnam pa dag bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-13: phyogs gcig skrangs la kha lung dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-14: aag ni man tha sdang spos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-15: bca' sga thang shing lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-17: lus kyi phyogs gcig skrangs par gyur pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:21b-18: kha lung la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-19: mkhris gyur tig ta'i sman mar ram //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-20: n+ya gro dha sogs bskol ba blud //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-22: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad la tig ta'i sman mar ram /
T13TD4312.3E:21b-23: n+ya gro dha la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i mar blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-24: skom dad che dang rmongs bag tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-25: 'o ma bsku byug bsil ba bya //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-27: mkhris pa'i 'or nad skom dad che ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:21b-28: rmongs bag dang khong tsha bar gyur pa la ni 'o ma blud pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:21b-29: de bzhin du bsku ba dang byug pa dang reg pa dang nus pa'i sman gyis byas pa phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-30: pa to la rtsa kyi lce ba //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-31: shing mngar thang shing pu tse she la //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-32: skyer pa tsandan aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-33: da na lcang ma bi sha la //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-34: pi pi ling dang mar bskol blud //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-35: khong tsha mgo 'khor skom dad che //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-36: 'dus pa'i nad dang me dpal skrang //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-37: lus tsha rims dang bcas pa sel //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-39: pa to la la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang bcas pa blud na khong tsha ba la sogs pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-40: bad kan las gyur dong ga sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-41: til mar dang ni bskol ba blud //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-43: bad kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad la ni dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang bskol ba'i til mar blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:21b-44: rgyun srang 'gags shing me drod nyams //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-0: @22a * // rmongs bag yi ga 'chus pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-1: thal sman chang snying mnan chang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-2: ba gcin dar bar bcas pa blud //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-4: bad kan las gyur pa'i skran nad rgyun srang 'gags pa la sogs pa la ni thal sman la sogs pa blud cing bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-5: pi pi ling dang 'ba' cha rnying //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-6: shi kru'i shun pa zangs ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-7: ba gcin lde gu dro 'jam sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-8: bsku dang dril ba'i las la sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-10: pi pi ling la sogs pa ba gcin dang lde gur byas pa dro 'jam tsam gyis lus la bsku ba dang dril phyis bya ba la sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-11: ru rta aag ni man tha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-12: rgya sran dong ga tsi tra ka / ba gcin chu bskol bas khrus bya //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-13: tsa rong aa ka ru yis byug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:22a-14: ru rta la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang chu'i nang du bskol la des khrus byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:22a-15: tsa rong dang aa ka ru'i lde gur byas pas ni byug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-16: n'a ga ba la sa ra la //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-17: aa za sring gi aam ba ta //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-18: aa za gandha zhes bya dang //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-19: aa shva gandha'i lde gu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-20: yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-22: yang yan lag gi phyogs gcig skrangs pa'i 'or nad la ni n'a ga la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-23: sa ra la ni tsi tra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-24: aam ba ta ni ae'i sha shi ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-25: aa za gandha ni ba da gandha'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-26: nad gzhi ji bzhin yan lag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-27: nye ba'i phyogs nas gtar ga bya //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-29: yan lag gi phyogs gcig la brten pa'i skran nad la nad gzhi so so ji lta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:22a-30: yan lag gi phyogs gang dang nye ba'i phyogs nas gtar ga bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:22a-31: slon sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-32: 'dres pa'i nad la nad gzhi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-33: shas che'i dbang du gso ba bya //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-35: 'dres pa'i nad dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:22a-36: 'dus pa zhes bya ba la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:22a-37: nad gzhi gang shas che ba'i dbang du byas nas ji skad smos pa'i gso ba nyid ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-38: go snyod pa tha gla sgang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-39: kanda ka ri tsha ba lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-40: skyer ba chu dron sbyar blud pa //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-41: rtsa mkhris bca' sga chu dron blud //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-42: nad gzhi gsum gyi 'or nad ni //
T13TD4312.3E:22a-43: yun rings lon zhing tshabs chen sel //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-0: go snyod la sogs pa'i lde gu chu dron dang sbyar te @22b blud na /
T13TD4312.3E:22b-1: nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur ba'i 'or nad yun ring bo lon cing tshabs shin tu che ba dag kyang sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-2: de bzhin du rtsa mkhris zhes bya ba bu nim pa dang bca' sga bskol ba'i chu dron blud na yang yon tan de dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-3: sle tres dang ni aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-4: thang shing gu gul ba spru ba //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-5: ba gcin sbyar blud dmu rdzing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-6: mdze dang skya rbab srin bu'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-7: gcin nad za khu bad kan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-8: rlung ni stod du 'joms pa sel //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-10: sle tres la sogs pa'i sman pa gcin dang sbyar te blud na dmu rdzing la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-11: de ltar rang rang nad kyi dbang byas bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-12: snad pa las byung ba la khrag dbyung zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-13: bsil sman mar khus byugs shing blugs par bya /
T13TD4312.3E:22b-14: dug skyes skrangs la dug sel sbyor ba bya //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-16: tshul de ltar rang rang gi nad gzhi'i dbang du byas nas 'or nad kyi gso ba bshad pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:22b-17: mtshon la sogs pas snad pa las byung ba la gtar ga bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:22b-18: bsil ba'i sman dang mar la sogs pas bsku ba la sogs pa byas la dug gis phog pa las gyur pa'i skrangs nad la ni dug sel ba'i sbyor ba gang dag yin pa byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-19: grong dang rlan can chur gnas sha rid rlon //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-20: tshod skam til gyi zas dang bu ram can //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-21: phye btags zas dang zho dang lan tshva dang //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-22: kha zas rul bag chang skyur yos sha skam //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-23: 'dres pa'i zas dang lci dang ma goms za //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-24: tsha ba bskyed dang nyin par gnyid log dang //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-25: mtshan mo gnyid ma log dang nyal po rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-26: 'or nad can gyis de dag thams cad spang //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-28: skrang nad dang ldan pa thams cad kyis kyang grong gi phyogs kyi sha la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:22b-29: tshod ma skom po la sogs pa spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-30: chur gnas ni chu na spyod pa'i srog chags kyi sha'o //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-31: chur gnas pa zhes smos pa rlan can gyi sha'i sgras kyang spang ba nyid yin mod kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:22b-32: 'dir gtso bor bya ba'i phyir logs shig tu smos pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-33: yang na rlan can nyid chur gnas pa yin par sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.3E:22b-34: sha rid ni srog chags sbeg pa'i sha'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-0: / tshod ma skam po ni pa to la la sogs pa tshod @23a * //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-1: ma'i sde tshan las bshad pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-2: til gyi kha zas ni til las byas pa'i la du la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-3: bu ram ni bu ram las byas pa'i zas sam btung ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-4: phye zan ni 'bras la sogs pa btags pa las zan du byas pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-5: de bzhin du zho 'ba' zhig kyang skrang bar byed pa yin pas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-6: de bzhin du lan tshva dang kha zas rul cing spyi bag tu gyur pa yang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-7: chang 'ba' zhig kyang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-8: de bzhin du skyur ba'i rnam par rang skyur la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:23a-9: nas brngos pa'i yos dang sha skam dang 'dres pa'i zas de phan dang mi phan zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:23a-10: de bzhin du gzhan yang lci ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyang spang bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:23a-11: de bzhin du nyin par gnyid log cing nyal la mtshan mo gnyid ma log pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:23a-12: bud med la 'khrig pa spyod cing nyal po byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad 'or nad can gyis spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-13: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:23a-14: gso ba'i gnas las le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:23a-16: // / de nas me dbal gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-18: go rims kyis na 'di nyid kyi gso ba bshad dgos pas 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-19: me dbal nad la thog ma nyid //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-20: smyung ba [?] dang ni rtsub chos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-21: khrag dbyung skyug sman bkru sman phan //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-22: snum chos spyad par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-24: me dbal gyi nad la ni nad kyi sngon byung ba'i tshul skyes pa'i thog ma nyid la smyung ba bya zhing nyams smad pa dang rtsub par 'gyur ba'i cho ga bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:23a-25: gtar ga btab cing khrag dbyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:23a-26: bkru sman dang skyug sman blud pas sbyang ba byas na phan gyi me dbal gyi nad gang la yang thog ma kho nar snum chos bya ba ni phan pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-27: po son cha dang dug mo yungs //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-28: shing mngar bcas pa pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-29: nim pa'i lo ma pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-30: skyug sman btang na me dbal 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:23a-32: de la po son cha la sogs pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:23b-0: yang na po son @23b cha dang pa to la las skyug sman btang na yang me dbal gyi nad 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-1: kyi lce ba yi khu ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-3: dur byid phye ma btab pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-4: 'o ma mar sbyar bkru sman ni //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-5: khong na zhen pa'i nad la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-6: khyad bar du ni sbyang ba btang //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-8: kyi lce bskol ba'i khu ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:23b-10: 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:23b-11: gang yang rung ba'i nang du dur byid kyi phye ma btab pa'i bkru sman btang ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:23b-13: 'o ma dang mar du sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-14: de las kyang khyad par du ni khong pa'i nang du zhen pa'i nad la skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-15: sbyang min nad tshabs chung ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-18: me dbal gyi nad dang ldan pa las sbrum ma la sogs pa sbyang bar mi rung la nad tshabs chung ba yin na zhi bar bya ba'i sman tsandan dang autpal la sogs pa gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-19: gla sgang nim pa pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-20: pa to la sogs nyid dag gam //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-22: yang na sbyar ba byar mi rung zhing nad tshabs chung ba la zhi bar bya ba'i sman gla sgang la sogs pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-23: pa to la la sogs pa ni pa to la dang pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-24: zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-25: thal tres gla sgang skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-26: pu tse shel gyi chu bskol blud //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-28: yang na de la zhi bar bya ba'i sman thal tres la sogs pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-29: me dbal skam dad can la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-30: byi tsher ba dang par pa ta //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-31: sle tres bca' sga bskol ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-32: khu ba bsgrangs pa blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-34: me dbal gyi nad skom dad can gyis btab pa la ni byi tsher ba la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:23b-35: bskol te bsgrangs pa blud par bya /
T13TD4312.3E:23b-36: skyer pa sran chung pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-37: pa to la dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-38: nim pa shing mngar gyi lce ba //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-39: bskol ba mar dang bcas pa blud //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-41: yang me dbal skom dad can la skyer pa la sogs pa'i sman gyi khu ba nyid blud pa'i sbyor bar bskol la de'i nang du mar bcug ste blud na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:23b-42: yan lag nad zhugs nad khrag nyid //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-1: ma nyid du khrag dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-3: lag ngar dang byin pa la sogs pa yan lag rnams la nad khrag yod pa las gyur pa'i me dbal ni thog ma nyid du khrag de phyung bas bsal bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:24a-4: nad gzhi ji lta ba las rngabs [?] ru dang /
T13TD4312.3E:24a-6: srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:24a-7: gtar ga btab ste khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-8: pags pa sha dang rgyus pa 'drul //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-9: khrag rul pa las byung ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-11: gang gi phyir khrag rul pa las pags pa la sogs pa 'drul zhing rnags par 'gyur bas de'i phyir khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-12: smin zhing bad kan zad pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-13: rlung dang mkhris pa shas che la //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-14: tig ta tig ta chen po'i mar //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-15: kyi lce ba bskol mar phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-17: smin cing bad kan zad par gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:24a-18: rlung dang mkhris pa shas che zhing rgyas par gyur pa la ni tig ta dang tig ta chen po'i sman mar mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze nad kyi skabs su bshad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:24a-19: kyi lce ba'i sman mar khong 'bras kyi skabs su bshad pa phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-20: khrag phyung khong pa dag gyur nas //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-21: nad ni sha lpags la gnas la //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-22: phyi rol nas ni byugs sogs kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-25: khrag phyung zhing bsal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:24a-26: sbyang ba byas pas khong pa dag par gyur nas nang gi skyon med par rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang med par sha dang pags pa la gnas par gyur pa la /
T13TD4312.3E:24a-27: phyi rol nas sman gyi byugs pa la sogs pa byas na 'phral du de'i mod la me dbal zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-28: rlung gyur shu ti gla sgang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-30: aar ta ka la pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-31: thang shing shi kru ru rta yi //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-32: lde gus byugs pa byas na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-34: rlung las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni shu ti zhes bya ba'i sha ta pus pa la sogs pa'i sman btags pa'i lde gus bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-35: ba ra ha ni ba na ma li ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-36: aar ta ka la ni ru dza ga ra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-38: shi kru ni so ban dza na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:24a-39: mkhris par n+ya gro dha sogs te //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-0: de @24b bzhin padma auta pal sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-2: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni n+ya gro dha la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyis bsku ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:24b-3: yang na padma dang autpal la sogs pa bsdus pa las bshad pas bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-4: de las mkhris pa la ni padma dang autpal dang nya lcibs dang /
T13TD4312.3E:24b-15: pra du na da r'i ka dang /
T13TD4312.3E:24b-19: 'o ma'i lde gu bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-21: n+ya gro dha'i rtsa gzhon nu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-22: chu shing nang gi lo mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-23: padma'i rtsa ba'i lde gu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-24: lan brgyar bkrus pa'i mar gyis byug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:24b-25: n+ya gro dha'i rtsa ba gzhon nu sar pa dang chu shing gi nang gi lo ma dang bcas shing bsres pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:24b-26: padma'i rtsa ba'i lde gur sbyar ba lan brgya phrag mang du bkrus shing btsir ba'i mar dang sbyar bas byug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-28: mu tig btags par gyur pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-29: dung ngam byi ru nya phyis sam //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-30: yug snam mar dang bcas pas byug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:24b-31: gang na padma skyes pa'i 'og gi 'dam bsil bas byug pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:24b-32: mu tig zhib tu btags pa nyid kyis byug ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:24b-33: dung la sogs pa gang yang rung ba btags nas mar dang bcas pas byugs na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-34: bad kan las gyur 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-35: shug pa btsod dang pu shel tse //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-36: ka ra b'i ra 'dam bu'i rtsa //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-37: aa nan da yi lde gus bskus //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-39: bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-40: da ba lo ma bdun pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-41: seng ldeng thang shing bkru sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-42: gla sgang dong gar bcas pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-43: ba ra na sogs lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-45: da ba la sogs pa'i lde gur sbyar ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:24b-46: ba ra na la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi lde gu bskus na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal sel to //
T13TD4312.3E:24b-47: dong ga yi ni lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-0: sle sman ta ka'i shun lpags @25a * //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-2: / aindra ba ru na'i lo ma //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-3: shr'i sha 'ol ma se'i me tog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:25a-5: sle sman ta ka las skyes pa'i shun lpags dang /
T13TD4312.3E:25a-6: aindra ba ru na'i lo ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:25a-8: 'ol ma se'i me tog lde gur byas pa bskus na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-9: chu blugs mar bsku sman mar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-10: lde gu phye ma ji bzhin du //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-11: sman ni 'di dag nyid kyis bya //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-13: bkru ba'i don du bshad pa'i sman shu ti la sogs pa 'di dag nyid kyis chu blugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:25a-14: rma'i phyi rol nas bsku ba'i mar dang lde gu dang phye ma'i sbyor ba yang ji lta ba bzhin du byas te gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-15: rlung rgyas mar ni shas cher bya //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-17: yang lde gu'i sman la sogs pa 'di dag rlung shas che ba'i me dbal la ni mar shas che bas bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-18: bad kan gnas zhen ma smin la //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-19: dro dang rtsub shas che ba sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-20: de bzhin mkhris pa'i gnas zhugs la //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-21: khrag mkhris la ni mar ldan bya //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-23: bad kan gyi gnas la gnas shing rten pa'i me dbal ma smin par gyur pa la ni dro ba dang rtsub pa'i lde gus bsku ba phan la /
T13TD4312.3E:25a-24: de bzhin du mkhris pa'i gnas su zhugs pa'i me dbal dang khrag dang /
T13TD4312.3E:25a-25: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni mar sar dang ldan pa'i sman de dag gi lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-26: shin tu bsil zhing srab pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-27: gos srab nang du bzhag pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-28: nus pa chung las yang dang yang //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-29: gzhan dang gzhan ni sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-31: shin tu bsil zhing grang la srab cing chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:25a-32: gos srab mo'i nang du gtums shing bzhag pa'i lde gu ni skad cig ma re re zhing yang dang yang du gzhan dang gzhan spos la sbyar bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:25a-33: gang gi phyi lde gu de de ltar bskus pa ni nus pa chung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-35: 'dren mar bya ba bsngags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-37: nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan pa las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:25a-38: gong du bshad pa'i gso ba'i las de 'dren ma byas na bsngags shing phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:25a-39: me ltar tsha la lan brgyar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-0: bkrus pa'i mar sar 'ba' zhig @25b phan ;
T13TD4312.3E:25b-2: me lta bur tsha ba'i me dbal ni /
T13TD4312.3E:25b-3: mar sar chu grang mo'i nang du lan mang du mnyes pa 'ba' zhig gis bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-4: mar gyi nying khu blugs pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-5: shing mngar bskol ba'i chu grang ngam //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-7: 'o ma bu ram shing khu blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-9: yang me ltar tsha ba'i me dbal la mar gyi nying khu dangs ma blugs pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:25b-10: yang na chu grang bskol ba'i chu bsgrangs he blugs pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:25b-14: bu ram shing khu'i khu ba grang mo blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-15: btung ba bsku dang blugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-16: tig ta chen po'i sman mar phan //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-18: me lta bu'i me dbal la tig ta chen po'i sman mar mdze nad kyi skabs nas bshad pa blud pa la sogs pa sbyar na mchog tu phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-19: rmen bu khrag mkhris sel ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-20: gso ba ci rigs legs byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-21: rlung dang bad kan 'joms byed la //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-22: glan dang dkri ba la sogs phan //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-24: rmen bu'i me dbal la ni sngar bshad pa'i mkhris pa dang 'dres pa las byung ba nas /
T13TD4312.3E:25b-25: bkru sman gyi bar khrag dang mkhris pa sel ba'i gso ba legs par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:25b-26: de'i rjes la rlung dang bad kan la phan pa'i gso ba glan pa'i dugs dang /
T13TD4312.3E:25b-27: dkri ba'i dugs la sogs pa byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-28: rmen bu'i me dbal gzer bcas la //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-29: til mar rtsa ba bcu dang bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-30: ba gcin dron mo chu dron blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-32: rmen du'i me dbal gzer dang bcas pa 'byung ba la ni rtsa ba bcu dang bskol ba'i til mar blugs pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:25b-33: de bzhin du ba gcin dron mo'am chu dron mo blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-34: yang na shi kru'i lde gu'am //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-36: la phug skam po ba ru ra'i //
T13TD4312.3E:25b-39: yang na shi kru'i shun pa lde gur btags pa dro 'jam tsam gyis bsku ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:25b-40: yang nan tam la zhes bya ba ka ranydza'i shun lpags btags pa'i lde gu chu dro 'jam tsam mam /
T13TD4312.3E:25b-41: la phug skam po btags pa'i lde gu dro 'jam tsam bsku ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-0: ba ru ra'i lde gu dro 'jam tsam bskus na yang rmen bu'i me dbal @26a * //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-1: gzer dang bcas pa la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-2: dan da shing tsha tsi tra ka / aarka snu ha'i 'o ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-3: bu ram go bye'i rus nag tshur //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-4: lde gus rdo yang 'bigs byed na //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-5: bad kan las gyur rmen bu'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-6: phyi rol gnas pa smos ci dgos //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-9: tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba'i shun lpags dang /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-13: go bye'i nang gi rus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-14: nag tshur gyi lde gur byas pas bskus na rdo yang 'bigs par byed na bad kan las gyur pa'i rman bu lus kyi phyi rol na gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te nges par 'bigs par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-15: yun rings gnas pa'i rmen bu la //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-16: la phug rgya sran ku lad tha'i //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-17: khu ba thal sman se'u 'brur bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-18: gro yi zan dang nas kyi zan //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-19: rgun chang sbrang rtsi bu ram dang //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-20: kha ra chang gi dangs mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-21: kha lung khu bar bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-22: 'bras bu gsum gyi sbyor lde gu //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-23: pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-24: thang shing dang ni sle tres dang //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-25: brag zhun gyi ni sbyor ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-26: gla sgang go bye'i sbyor ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-27: sbrang rtsi yi ni sbyor ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-28: mgo bkru sman dud rngub ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-29: sngar bshad skran ni gzhig ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-30: lcags gser lan tshva bsregs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-31: rdo bas btsir bar bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-34: rmen bu'i nad yun ring du gnas shing rgyun du chags par gyur pa la 'og nas bshad ba'i sman 'di dag gis bshig par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:26a-35: la phug gi khu ba thal sman rnam gnyis gang yang rung ba dang bcas pa se'u 'bru dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-36: de bzhin du rgya sran ku lad tha'i yu sha'i khu ba dang thal sman bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-37: de bzhin du gro'i zan dang nas kyi zan rtag tu sbyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-38: rgun chang la sogs pa blud pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-39: de bzhin du 'bras bu gsum mam /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-40: pi pi ling gi sbyor ba lde gu'am /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-42: de bzhin du thang shing la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-43: ci rigs par sbyor ba de dang des bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-44: nam tshong yan chad kyi nad du gtogs pa'i rmen bu la /
T13TD4312.3E:26a-46: dud pa rngub pa'i rnon lo dang /
T13TD4312.3E:26b-0: sngar bshad pa'i skran @26b gzhig pa'i sbyor ba gang yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:26b-1: lcags la sogs pa bsregs pas btsir zhing mnan pas yun ring du gnas pa'i rmen bu 'jig par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-2: zhes thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-3: sbyor ba sna tshogs de dag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-4: byas kyang zhi bar ma gyur cing //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-5: shin tu sra bar gnas gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-6: nad stobs che bar gyur na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-8: lde gu'am gser gyis bsregs pa phan //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-10: sbyor ba gong du smos pa sna tshogs pa de dag gis gso ba byas kyang de zhi bar ma gyur cing /
T13TD4312.3E:26b-11: rdo ltar shin tu sra bar gnas par gyur la nad kyi stobs shin tu che zhing zhig par ma gyur na sman gyi sbyor ba de dag gi 'og tu rmen bu'i nad 'di la thal sman gyis bsreg pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:26b-12: lde gu mes bsregs pas bsreg pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:26b-13: gser mer bsregs pas bsregs na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-14: smin par byed pas rnags byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-15: dbral nas de nas dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-17: yang rmen bu de smin par byed pa'i sman gyis smin cing bsrubs la /
T13TD4312.3E:26b-18: de'i 'og tu gtsags spyad kyis bsal te //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-19: rmen bu gang yod pa dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-21: yang dang yang du gdon par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-23: rmen bu'i me dbal zhes bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:26b-24: khrag rnags par 'dod cing gnas pa las g-yos shing phyed tsam smin par gyur pa la yang dang yang du khrag gdon cing dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-25: khrag bsal 'og tu slar yang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-26: rlung dang bad kan sel sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-28: khrag bsal zhing bton nas de yi 'og tu rlung dang bad kan sel ba'i sman gang dag yin pa gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-29: tsha zhing smin pas rnags gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-30: phyi nang rma ltar gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-32: rmen bu'i me dbal de dang tsha ba dang smin pas rnags par gyur pa la ni phyi dang nang gi rma'i gso ba ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-33: skyer pa srin sman kam bi lyee //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-34: bskol ba'i til mar rma la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-36: skyer pa la sogs pa'i sman dang til mar bskol ba rma la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-37: bad kan mkhris pa shas che la //
T13TD4312.3E:26b-38: d'ur ba'i khu ba mar bskol phan //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-0: bad kan dang mkhris pa shas @27a * //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-1: cher gyur ba'i me dbal la ni d'ur ba bskol ba'i khu ba dang mar bskol ba phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-2: gso ba'i las kun phyogs dang steng //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-3: khrag dbyung ba ni phyogs gcig yin //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-4: me dbal de ni khrag mkhris dang //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-6: 'di yi rten ni khrag nyid yin //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-7: de bas khrag ni mang du dbri //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-9: me dbal gyi nad la skyug sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:27a-10: bkru sman btang ba la sogs pa'i gso ba'i las kun nad sel ba'i las byed pa'i phyogs gcig tu bzhag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:27a-11: khrag dbyung ba gcig tu gso ba'i phyogs gcig ste phyed yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-12: de yang gang gi phyir me dbal de ni khrag dang mkhris pa dang ma 'dres shing de la mi brten pa las 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:27a-13: de bas na rgyu de'i phyir me dbal 'di'i rten nam /
T13TD4312.3E:27a-14: gnas ni khrag nyid yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:27a-15: de bas na khrag mang du dbri zhing dbyung ba kho na 'di'i dpyad kyi mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-16: nad gzhi mang po me dbal la //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-17: bkru sman ma gyur mar mi sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-18: de yis nad ni su gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-19: pags pa khrag dang sha 'tshed byed //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-21: gang nad gzhi mang po las gyur pa'i me dbal de la ni bkru sman du ma gyur cing gang zhig blud na 'khru ba'i bya ba mi byed pa'i mar de sbyin par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-23: 'khru bar mi byed pa'i mar des slar zhing sral rengs shing 'thas par 'gyur bas pags pa dang khrag dang sha 'tshed cing sreg par byed pa'i skyon yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-24: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:27a-25: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las gso ba'i gnas le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:27a-27: // / de nas mdze nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-29: go rims kyis na mdze nad kyi gso ba brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-30: mdze can kun la thog ma nyid //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-31: snum blud bas ni gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-33: mdze'i nad kyis btab pa thams cad la ni dang po kho nar sman mar blud cing snum sbyin pas gso zhing bcos par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-34: de la rlung shas che ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-35: rtsa ba bcu pa sle tres dang //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-36: sha rang ka ta ae randa //
T13TD4312.3E:27a-37: me sha sring gi mar ram ni //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-0: @27b til mar bskol te blud pa phan //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-2: de la mdze nad de rnams kyi nang na rlung las gyur pa de'i shas che ba'i mdze nad la ni rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs pa'i mar ram /
T13TD4312.3E:27b-3: til mar bskol te blud na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-4: nim pa pa to bu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-5: skyer pa pa ta byi tsher ba //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-6: par pa ta dang kyi lce ba //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-7: srang re chu bre brgyad kyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-8: nang bskol brgyad cha lus pa ru //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-9: gla sgang rtsa mkhris kyi lce ba //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-10: dug mo yungs dang pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-11: tsandan zho ni gnyis gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-12: zhun mar srang ni bcu gnyis bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-13: tig ta'i sman mar de 'thungs na //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-14: mkhris pa'i mdze dang me dbal dang //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-15: 'brum phran lus tsha skom dad che //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-18: thor bu khong 'bras skran dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-19: zad byed smyo byed myos pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-20: snying nad rab rib ngo khabs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-21: sha bkra mig ser pho ba'i nad ;
T13TD4312.3E:27b-22: / mtshan par rdol dang brjed byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-23: dmu rdzing zla mtshan mi chod dang //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-24: sbyar dug gzhang 'brum khrag mkhris sel //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-25: gzhan yang mkhris pa las gyur nad //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-26: shin tu gso dka' rnams la'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-28: nim pa la sogs pa'i sman sna re srang re chu bre brgyad kyi nang du bskol la bskol ba de brgyad cha lus pa dang zhun mar srang bcu gnyis dang gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman sna re zho gnyis gnyis lde gur byas pa dang bskol ba'i sman mar te tig ta'i sman mar zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:27b-29: de blud na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze dang me dbal la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-30: de bzhin du 'dir ma smos pa'i mkhris pa dag las gyur pa'i nad gzhan dag sel bar byed cing de la phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-31: lo ma bdun pa par pa ta //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-32: dong ga shu dag pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-33: shug pa ba ta 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-34: ser pho gnyis dang thal tre sa gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-35: nim pa tsandan pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-36: shing mngar sle tres bi sha la //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-37: dug mo yungs dang pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-38: rtsa mkhris mur ba ba sha ka / nye'u shing bu ga pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-39: gla sgang byi tsher kyi lce ba //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-40: skyu ru'i khu ba nyis 'gyur dang //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-41: de rnams mar gyi brgyad 'gyur chur //
T13TD4312.3E:27b-42: bskol ba'i tig ta chen po ste //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-1: yang ni sngar bas lhag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-2: lo ma bdun pa la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-3: skyu ru ra'i khu ba nyis 'gyur dang /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-4: mar gyi brgyad 'gyur gyi chu'i nang du bskol ba'i sman mar ni tig ta chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-5: de'i yon tan yang sngar smos pa'i tig ta'i sman mar bas yon tan che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-6: lo ma bdun pa ni sab ta la'o //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-7: par pa ta ni ldum bu skra bzangs so //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-8: ser po rnam gnyis ni yung ba dang skyer pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-9: thal tres gnyis ni sha ri ba dkar nag gnyis so //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-10: pi pi ling gnyis ni pi pi ling dang /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-11: ha ti pi pi ling ngo ;
T13TD4312.3E:28a-12: / bad kan las gyur nim pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-13: lo ma bdun pa tsi tra ka / ru rta dong gra tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-14: bi la ya yi mar blud phan //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-16: bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad la ni nim pa la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-17: mar tshul bzhin du bskol ba blud na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-18: kun la go bye'i mar ram ni //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-19: yungs kar du ba ra'i mar blud //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-21: mdze nad thams cad la go bye zhes pa bse shing gi 'bras bu btsir ba'i mar ram /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-23: du bar btsir ba'i mar blud na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-24: byi dang ga dang aa ka ru //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-25: go bye'i lde gu mar bskol blud //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-27: yang na mdze nad thams cad la srin sman byi dang ga dang /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-29: go bye btags pa'i lde gu dang bskol ba'i sman mar blud do //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-30: dong ga'i rtsa ba dag dang mar ;
T13TD4312.3E:28a-31: / lan brgya'i bar bskol mar yang blud //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-32: seng ldeng bskol ba'i chu bsten na //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-33: mdze nad myur du sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-35: dong ga'i rtsa ba lde gur byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-36: mar gnyis lan du ma'i bar du bskol ba blud la /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-37: seng ldeng bskol ba'i chu 'thungs na mdze nad thams cad myur du sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-38: 'di dag nyid kyis ci rigs par //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-39: snum chos bsku ba byas pa'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-41: bshad ma thag pa'i snum de dag gis nad gzhi ji lta ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-42: ci rigs bas snum gyi cho ga byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:28a-43: bsku ba byas na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-44: snum gyis zhen la me dbal gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:28a-45: skabs su bshad pa'i sbyar sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-0: mdze nad kyis thebs pa @28b de lus snum gyis khebs par byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:28b-1: me dbal gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i bkru sman dang skyug sman btang bas sbyang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-2: dbral ba lag pa rkang pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-3: 'di la gtar ga gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-5: yang nad pa de la nyams stobs kyi tshul nas dpags te dpral ba la sogs par gtang ga gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-6: mdze nad tshabs chung zhal zhal gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-7: rva sogs kyis kyang khrag dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-9: mdze nad cung zad kyis btab pa la ni gtsags bus zhal zhal gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-10: nad dmigs kyi tshul las dpags te /
T13TD4312.3E:28b-11: gtar ga gdab pa'i le'u las 'byung ba'i tshul du rngabs ru dang bsku ba la sogs pas khrag phyung na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-12: mdze nad 'joms pa'i snum gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-13: 'di la bar bar brta bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-14: khrag byung bkru sman gyis sbyang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-15: lto stong gyur pa'i mdze can la //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-16: ci nas rlung gis 'di yi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-17: lus ni 'jig pa de ltar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-19: yang mdze can de la mdze nad 'joms shing sel bar byed pa'i snum go bye dang /
T13TD4312.3E:28b-20: yung kar gyi mar la sogs pas bar du nyams brta zhing tshim par byas na /
T13TD4312.3E:28b-22: bkru sman gyis sbyang bar gyur pas rlung brta bar byed pa'i rgyus lus la gnod cing 'jig par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-23: nim pa sle tres ba sha ka /'bras bu gsum dang pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-25: lde gu chu dang mar bskol ba //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-26: sman mar rdo rje can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-27: des ni me dbal mig ser rims //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-28: khrag nad lud pa mdze nad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-30: nim pa la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa bskol ba'i chu dang mar du bskol ba'i sman mar de ni slob dpon gyis rdo rje can zhes bya'o zhes bshad de /
T13TD4312.3E:28b-31: de blud pas na me dbal la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-32: 'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-33: dur byid kanda ka ri gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-34: dan da dong ga pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-35: shu dag bong nga tsi tra ka / pa thar bcas pa zho gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-36: snu ha'i 'o ma srang gcig dang //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-37: bre gang mar bskol lto sra ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:28b-38: snum bcos bkru sman dag tu sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-3: 'di ni rdo rje chen por bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-5: 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i sman sna re re zhing zho gnyis gnyis kyi tshad du byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:29a-6: snu ha zhes bya ba su dhakshi ra'i 'o ma sar pa srang gcig dang btags te lde gur byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:29a-7: lde gu de dang mar bre gang bskol ba'i sman mar de ni lto sra ba dag la snum chos bya zhing btang ba dang bkru sman gnyi ga ci rigs par sbyar zhing gtang bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:29a-8: des mdze nad la sogs pa'i nad shin tu gso dka' ba dag kyang sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-9: sman mar de ni rdo rje chen po zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-10: kanda ka ri gnyis ni kanda ka ri dang bri ha ti'o //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-11: dan da bre bzhi chu bre ni //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-12: bcu drug bskol ba de mar bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-13: ko sha ka ti srang gcig btab //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-14: de blud steng 'og sbyong byed yin //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-16: dan dbre bzhi chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol ba de'i brgyad cha lus par mar bre gang bskol ba mar dang ko sha ta ki srang gcig lde gur byas te bsres la de las ci rigs par blud na steng dang 'og tu sbyong zhing slon pa dang khrus byas pas dag par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-17: aa par ta ki srang brgyad chu //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-18: bre bcu drug bskol brgyad cha lus //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-19: khu ba der ni de'i rtsa ba //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-20: mar ni bre gang bskol bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-21: blud pa de ni zhag gcig gis //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-22: bar du chod de legs zhu nas //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-23: khre rgod rang skyur mar bskol blud //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-24: mdze nad sha bkra 'bras kyi phreng //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-27: aa par ta ki ni rakta bushpe dang /
T13TD4312.3E:29a-29: ro hi ni zhes bya ba me tog dmar po can sag ti tshod pa zhig yod pa la bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-30: la la ni sab ta la la aar pa ta ki zhes bya ba'o zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.3E:29a-31: de srang brgyad chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol ba de las chu bre do lus pa dang khu ba de'i nang du aar ga ta ki de'i rtsa ba lde gur byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:29a-32: mar bre gang bskol la mar de zhag gcig gis bar du chod pa'i tshul gyis blud la de legs par zhu bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:29b-0: khre rgod dam ci tshe'i chan dang rang skyur kan dzi zhes bya ba bskol ba blud na mdze nad la sogs pa sel zhing 'joms par byed pa dang de bzhin du bu tsha mang du 'phel ba dang dran pa @29b 'dzin cing mi brjed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-1: ni li ta ka'i tshil sbrang rtsi //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-2: dz'a ti'i khu ba mar bcas pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-3: seng ldeng aa sa na'i chur bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-4: dbang po bsdams brtan mdze nad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-6: dbang po bsdams shing yul thub pa dang ni li ka'i tshil sbrang rtsi dang me tog dz'a ti'i khu ba dang bcas pa zos na mdze nad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-7: yang na ni li ta ka'i tshil mar dang cha snyoms pa zos na yang mdze nad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-8: yang na ni li ta ka'i tshil dang seng ldeng dang aa san bskol ba'i chu dang bcas pa blud na yang mdze nad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-9: s'a lu nas dang gro dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-10: ci tshe khre dang mungga dang //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-11: sran chung dang ni tu ka ra'i //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-12: tshod ma kha bo skam sa'i sha //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-13: 'bras bu gsum dang pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-14: seng ldeng nim pa go bye sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-15: chang ni sman dang sbyar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-16: dar ba sar pa ra dar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-17: bza' dang btung ba mdze la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-18: skyur tsha lan tshva can rnams gnod //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-20: s'a lu ni s'a lu rtsa snar la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:29b-21: de dang nas dang skam sa'i sha'i bar gyi kha zas 'bras bu la sogs pa dang sbyar ba bza' bar bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-22: de bzhin du btung bar ni chab kyi nang du sman bcug pa la sogs pa blud na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-23: skyur ba dang tsha ba dang lan tshva'i bag dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:29b-24: btung ba ni de gnod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-25: zho dang 'o ma rlan can sha //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-26: bu ram ma sha til mar spang //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-28: zho la sogs pa ni mdze can gyis shin tu spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-29: pa to la'i rtsa 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-30: pi sha la ni re re ni //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-31: cha gsum gyis dbri zho phyed gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-32: kyi lce ba dang pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-33: zho phyed dong gra bzhi char bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-34: de ltar srang gcig brdungs pa dag / bskol ba'i chu ni 'thungs gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-35: nad kyi tshogs ni sbyong bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-36: sman de zhu nas skam sa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-37: ri dags bya yi sha khu dag /'bras rnying chan dang sbyar ba bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-38: sbyor 'di zhag drug bsten na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-39: mdze nad kun dang skrangs pa'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-40: pho ba'i nad dang gcin sri dang //
T13TD4312.3E:29b-41: gzugs 'khums gso dka'i nad rnams dang //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-0: snying nad chu sor gzer rims @30a * //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-3: pa to la'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i sman sna re zhing sum cha sum cha dbri ba'i zho phyed sum cha /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-4: des na sman lnga po de dag sna re zhing cha gsum pas phri ba'i zho phyed dang gnyis te /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-5: de la da na drug la zho byed yod pas de la pa to la zho phyed dang gnyis /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-6: de las zho phyed kyi sum cha da na gnyis kyis dbri /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-7: des na pa to la da na bco brgyad las bcu drug tu bya /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-8: de bzhin du aa ru ra dang /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-10: ba ru ra dang bi sha la yang dan zho gnyis gnyis phri ste /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-11: da na bcu drug bcu drug bya /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-12: de ltar bcu drug phrag lnga pa da na brgyad cu yod la /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-13: kyi lce ba dang pu tse shel gnyis cha gcig gis bskyed pa dang dong gra bzhi cha dang bcas pa de ltar sbyar na kyi lce ba zho phyed de /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-14: dan drug pu tse shel yang zho phyed de /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-15: da na drug dang gra bzhi cha ste /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-16: da na bzhi ste spyir da na dgu bcu rtsa drug la spyir srang drug yod de /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-17: sman gcig pa de brdungs la phye mar byas te bskol ba'i chu 'thungs na nad kyi tshogs sbyong zhing dag par byed la sman de zhu nas skam sa ri dags dang bya'i sha khu dang 'bras rnying pa'i chan zos shing spyod la sbyor ba 'di zhag drug gi bar bsten zhing longs spyad par gyur na mdze nad la sogs pa sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-18: de bzhin du rtag pa'i rims la sogs pa'i rims thams cad kyang sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-19: byi dang ga yi snying po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-20: aa ru ra dang skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-21: srang re dan da srang gsum dang //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-22: bur ma srang ni bcu gnyis dag / ri lur byas 'di byin gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-23: mdze dang sha bkra dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-24: lud pa dmu rdzing gzhang 'brum dang //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-25: gcin nad mtsher pa'i rmen bu'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-26: thor bu srin nad skran rnams 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-27: grub pa'i sbyor 'di gnod sbyin ni //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-28: nor bu bzang pos dge slong zhig / srog 'dor nyid la bshad ces grags //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-30: byi dang ga'i snying po la sogs spyir srang re re srang gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-31: dan da gcig pu srang gsum /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-32: bu ram srang bcu gnyis te /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-33: de dag spyir ri lu byas pa dbang po thul zhing bsdams pa'i nad la byin na /
T13TD4312.3E:30a-34: mdze nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:30a-35: sbyor ba 'di ni rab tu grub par grags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-0: gnod sbyin @30b nor bu bzang pos dge slong zhig srog 'dor du nye ba'i tshe sbyor ba 'di bshad cing bstan to zhes grags te /
T13TD4312.3E:30b-1: grags zhes bya ba ni de skad zer ro //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-2: zhes lung las 'byung ba ston pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-3: thor bu ni tshigs dag tu rtsa ba cher 'chos pa'i 'bras nad la bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-4: tig ta nim pa 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-5: shug pa bong nga pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-6: mur ba dang ni pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-7: ser po rnam gnyis pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-8: shu dag aindra ba ru ni //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-9: dug mo yungs bcas cha snyoms pa //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-10: dan da dur byid bram sha mi //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-11: phyi ma bzhin du nyis 'gyur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-12: phye ma sbrang rtsi mar bcas zos //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-13: mdze dang za gu tshor ba chung //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-14: sel ba'i sman gyi mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-16: tig ta la sogs pa'i sman cha mnyam por byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:30b-17: dan da dang dur byid dang bram sha mi zhes bya ba phyi ma bzhin nyis 'gyur du byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:30b-18: des na gal te tig ta zho gcig byed na dan da zho gnyis dur byid zho bzhi bram sha mi zho brgyad dang sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-19: sman de dag phye mar zhib tu btags pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba rtag tu zos na mdze nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-20: 'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-21: byi dang ga dang sbrang rtsi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-22: til mar mar sbyar lde gu'am //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-24: 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i lde gu sbyar ba zos na yang mdze nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-25: ka ka au dumb'a ra dang //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-26: nim pa gla sgang byi dang ga / tsha ba gsum gyi lde gu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-27: dug mo yungs kyi khu bar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-28: blud na lpags nad thams cad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-30: ka ka au dumb'a ra la sogs pa'i lde gu dug mo yungs bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te /
T13TD4312.3E:30b-31: blud na mdze nad du gtogs pa'i pags pa'i skyon thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-32: ka ka au dumb'a ra ni phal gu ste /
T13TD4312.3E:30b-34: dug mo yungs dang tsi tra ka / nim pa thang shing seng ldeng dang //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-35: lo ma bdun pa aa sa na //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-36: khu bskol mar dang aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-37: sbrang rtsi ldan zos mdze nad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-39: drug ma yungs la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du aa ru ra dang sbrang rtsi dang mar btab ste zos na mdze nad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:30b-40: seng ldeng nim ba sle tres dang //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-2: seng ldeng la sogs lnga pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-3: khyab 'jug gis ni lha min bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-6: seng ldeng nas byi tsher bar sman lnga po bskol ba'i khu ba ni seng ldeng lnga pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:31a-7: des ni mdze nad kyi rnam pa 'phral du 'joms shing sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-8: dper na lha chen po khyab 'jug gis lha ma yin rmeg med par byed pa dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-9: skyer pa ni ma pa seng ldeng gi / shun lpags bskol bas mdze nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-11: skyer ba la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba blud pas kyang mdze nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-12: skyer pa ni ma pa 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-13: pa to la'i rtsa pu rtse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-14: shu dag btsod ni bskol ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-15: dam chos la brten 'khor ba ltar //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-16: khrag mkhris las gyur mdze nad gcod //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-17: sman 'di nyid dang ba yi mar //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-18: bskol bas rlung gyur mdze nad rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-19: mchog tu sel bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-21: skyer ba la sogs pa sman bskol ba'i khu ba blud na yang khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-22: dper na dam pa'i chos la legs par brten cing bsgoms pas 'khor ba'i 'ching ba gcod pa dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-23: yang skyer pa la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag nyid dang ba'i mar bskol ba'i sman mar blud na rlung las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-24: seng ldeng ni ma pa skyer pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-25: sle tres thang shing sna re re bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-27: de bzhin du seng ldeng la sogs pa'i sman sna re re bskol ba'i khu ba'am sman de dag mar du bskol ba blud na yang mdze nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-28: pa tha skyer pa tsi tra ka / dan da dug yungs pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-29: ba gcin yang na chu dron bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-30: zla ba gcig blud mdze nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-31: gzhang 'brum za khu skran nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-32: skya rbab ma zhu srin nad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-34: pa to la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu ba gcin dang sbyar ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:31a-35: chu dron dang sbyar ba ste zla ba gcig gi bar du blud na mdze'i nad la sogs pa 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-36: rgya skyegs dan da'i 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:31a-37: mur ba pa ta tsi tra ka / aa ba mar ga byi dang ka / lo ma bdun pa tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-0: btsod @31b dang skyer pa ba sha ka / nim pa thang sheng [?] rtsa ba lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-1: gnyis po phye ma ba gcin sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-2: zla ba gcig 'thungs phan zas bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-3: mdze yi nad kun 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-5: rgya skyegs la sogs pa nas rtsa ba chen po lnga dang /
T13TD4312.3E:31b-7: gnyis po'i bar phye mar byas pa dang ba gcin du sbyar te zla ba gcig gi bar du blud cing phan zhing 'phrod pa'i zas zos nas mdze'i nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-8: skyer pa pi pi ling dong gra //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-9: byi dang ga dang do ba ri //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-10: tsi tra ka dang ta bya rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-11: go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-12: ba gcin sbyar ba'am ri lu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-13: byin na mi bzad mdze yang 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-15: skyer pa la sogs pa go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed pa'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar te blud pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:31b-16: yang na bskol te ri lur byas pa byin na mdze nad gso dka' ba'am mi bzad pa yang 'joms shing sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-17: tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-18: til dang go bye'i phye ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-19: mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-20: ri lur byas pa cha bdun pas //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-21: mdze yi nad rnams 'joms byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-22: bcud kyis lan dang ro tsar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-24: tsha ba gsum cha gcig /'bras bu gsum cha gnyis pa /
T13TD4312.3E:31b-30: de lta bu'i cha bdun po mnyam por byas pa'i sman 'dis ni mdze'i nad thams cad 'joms par byed cing bcud kyis len du 'gyur zhing ro tsa ba dang stobs skyed bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-31: so ma ra dza tsi tra ka / skyer pa du ba ra'i rus pa //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-32: go bye srin sman 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-33: bsten na mdze nad ma lus 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-35: so ma ra dza la sogs pa'i sman bu ram dang ri lur byas pa bsten zhing zos na mdze nad ma lus par 'joms shing sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-36: so ma ra dza byi dang ga / go bye tsi tra ba ra hi //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-37: aa ru ra dang lang ga li //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-38: til nag bo dang pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-39: bu ram dang ni ri lur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:31b-40: mdze yi nad rnams 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-0: so ma ra dza la sogs pa'i phye ma gcig tu bsdus te bu ram dang ri lur byas pa gang yin pa dag gis @32a * //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-1: kyang mdze'i nad rnams 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-2: 'dis so ma ra dza la sogs pa'i phye ma ji snyed yod pa'i bu ram nyis 'gyur dang ri lur byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:32a-4: tshad ni rnam par ma bshad par //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-5: phye ma bu ram nyis 'gyur gzhug / ces smos pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-6: lang ga li ni bi sha la'o //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-7: so ma ra dza pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-8: de yi rtsa ba byi dang ga / snying po lcags rkyag skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-9: til mar lde gus mdze nad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-11: so ma ra dza la sogs pa dang til mar dang bu ram ri lu byas pa byin na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-12: aa ru ra dang go bye til //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-13: bu ram ri lus mdze nad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-15: yang na aa ru ra la sogs pa'i ri lu byin na yang mdze nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-16: so ma ra dza byi dang ga / bu ram ri lur byas pa'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-18: so ma ra dza dang bu ram ri lur byas na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-19: seng ldeng brag zhun byi dang ga / sbrang rtsi mar dang ldan za zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-20: phan dang ran bar zos na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-21: 'brum phran sha bkra sha bkra shub 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-23: seng ldeng gi phye ma dang brag zhun dang byi dang ga mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba za zhing mdze la phan ba'i kha zas 'brum phran la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa zos na yang mdze nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-24: kha ra lcags phye byi dang ga / tsi tra ka dang skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-25: pi pi ling gi lde gu yis //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-26: mdze nad shin tu gso dka' 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-28: kha ra la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu byin na yang shin tu gso dka' zhing lci ba'i mtshan nyid 'joms so //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-29: gla sgang tsha gsum 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-30: rtsa ba lnga nyid thang shing btsod //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-31: nim pa shing tsha lo ma bdun //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-32: shing tsha tsi tra ga dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-33: mur ba bi sha la'i phye ma //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-34: nas phye dgu cha sbrang rtsi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-35: cha gcig sbyar ba 'di rtag tu //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-37: 'or nad skya rbab sha bkrar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-38: pho nad gzhang 'brum rgyu rlugs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-39: mtshan bar rdol dang 'brum phran dang //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-40: g-yan pa shu ba nad rnams 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:32a-42: gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman phye mar btags pa nas phye dgu cha dang /
T13TD4312.3E:32b-0: sbrang rtsi cha gcig tu sbyar te skyo mar byas pa 'thungs na @32b mdze nad 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-1: tu pa ra yi rus pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-2: go bye so ma ra dza dang //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-3: tsi tra ka dang drag zhun rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-4: bcud len cho ga ltar bsten phan //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-6: tu pa ra'i nang gi rus pa bcud len gyi cho ga las bshad pa'i tshul ltar bsten na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-7: de bzhin du go bye dang /
T13TD4312.3E:32b-10: brag zhun rnams re re zhing bcud kyis len gyi cho ga ltar bsten na yang mdze'i nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-11: de ltar nad bsal nang gi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-12: nad sbyangs nas ni phyi rol gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-13: pags par gnas la sman byugs phan //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-14: nad kyi dri ma ma dag la //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-15: sman rnon byugs na mdze nad ni //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-18: tshul de ltar mdze'i nad nang du sbyangs shing bsal nas pags par gnas pa'i nad la ni sman gyi phyi rol nas bsku ba la sogs pa phan te /
T13TD4312.3E:32b-19: gang gi phyir dri ma can gyi lus ma dag par gyur pa las sman rnon pos byugs shing bskus na nad de bslangs pas slar zhig 'phel bar 'gyur bas na dang por nang gi sbyangs nas gzod bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-20: gting zug sra zhing kor kor po'i //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-21: mdze la dugs bya snyi ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-22: 'bur bar gyur nas mtshon gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-23: zhal zhal gdab cing byug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-25: mdze'i nad gting zug cing zhen pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:32b-27: zlum po kor kor po'am til til du chags pa la ni sman rno ba la sogs pas dugs bya zhing dkris la 'bur zhing mtho bar gyur pa dang mtshon gyis dril zhing zhal zhal byas la sman gyis byug cing bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-28: gang zhig pags pa kun nyams shing //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-29: mtshon gyis gdab tu mi rung ba //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-30: de la khrag ni phyung nas su //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-31: thal sman rnon pos bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-33: mdze nad gang pags pa kun nyams shing zhig ste /
T13TD4312.3E:32b-34: mtshon gyis gdab tu mi rung ba de la ni nad kyi khrag phyung zhing bsal la thal sman rnon pos bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-35: mdze nad rab sra rtsub pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-36: tshor ba med brtan yun ring lon //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-37: sngags bcas dug khu blud pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-38: dug gi sman ni rjes su bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:32b-40: mdze'i nad sra zhing rtsub par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-1: cing bem bem por gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-2: brtan zhing 'gyur ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-3: yun ring zhing lo mang zhig lon pa la dug gis byug cing blud bar bya ba de yang sngags kyis btab pas byug cing bsku bar bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-4: de'i 'og tu dug gi sman rjes su sbyar zhing blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-5: mdze nad rengs shing tshor ba med //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-6: rdul mi 'byung zhing g-ya' ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-7: lci skam rgya mtsho'i dbu ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-8: mtshon gyis bdar la lde gus byug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-9: mdze nad gang lus rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-10: shin tu tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-12: g-ya' ba dang ldan pa'i mdze nad la ni lci ba skam po'am /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-13: rgya mtsho dbu ba'am mtshon gyis bdar zhing drud la de'i 'og tu lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-14: gla sgang dong gra 'bras bu gsum /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-15: po son cha dang ka ranydza //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-16: lo ma bdun pa dug mo yungs //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-17: ru rta skyer pa pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-18: yungs kar sbyor bas lus bkru zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-19: lde gus slon sman bkru sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-20: bzhar zhing lus ni bskus gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-21: pags pa'i nad dang mdze nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-22: skrangs nad skya rbab mdze nad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-24: gla sgang la sogs pa'i lde gus ni don thams cad grub pa'i lde gu ste /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-25: de la lus khrus byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-27: bkru sman gyi sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:33a-28: bzhar ba'i rjes la bskus na pags pa'i nad la sogs pa sel ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-29: ka ra b'i ra nim pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-30: dug mo yungs dang dong ga dang //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-31: tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba gcin bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-32: bskus nas mdze nad 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-34: ka ra b'i ra la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang bskol ba gzar bu la chags pa tsam zhig blud na yang mdze nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-35: ka ra b'i ra kar rtsa ba //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-36: dug mo yungs dang ka ranydza'i //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-37: 'bras bu skyer ba'i shun lpags ni ;
T13TD4312.3E:33a-38: / so ma na yi myu gur bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:33a-39: bskus na mdze 'joms grub pa yin //
