T13TD4312.3E:97a-27: lus na yan lag rkyong ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:97a-29: sna mig khar ni shu ba sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:97a-30: nad ni gzhan dag de las 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:97a-31: 'o ma'i be'u snabs zhes bshad de //
T13TD4312.3E:97a-32: gnod ba'i nad ni mi bzad yin //
T13TD4312.3E:97a-34: bud med kyi nu zho nyes pa gsum char gyis gnod par gyur cing dri ma can du gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:97a-35: byis pa shin tu dri ma mnam par 'khrun /
T13TD4312.3E:97a-36: 'khru ba de yang chu 'dra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:97a-37: bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs shing na bar gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:97a-38: gcin yang kha dog dkar ba 'am ser por gyur ba la ska ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:97a-39: de bzhin du byis pa'i rims la sogs pa'i nad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:97a-40: 'dir ma smos pa'i nad gzhan dag kyang 'di la 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:97b-0: de lta bu'i nad de ni 'o ma'i nad be'u snabs @97b she 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:97b-1: 'o ma ma zhu ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-2: zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad de /
T13TD4312.3E:97b-3: de ni byis pa rnams la shin tu gnod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:97b-4: mi bzod cing gso bar dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-5: de la ma ma byis pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-6: slon sman btang bas myur du gso //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-8: de lta bu'i nad de la nu ma lhung pa'i ma ma 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:97b-9: ma dang bu gnyis ka slon sman btang bas myur ba kho nar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-10: thug sogs rim par bshad pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-11: shu dag la sogs sde tshan nam //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-12: skyer pa sogs pa 'am bong nga dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-13: pa ta dang ni pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-14: gla sgang pu tse shel bskol blud ;
T13TD4312.3E:97b-16: sngar thug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa bshad pa dag tu shu dag la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan dang sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:97b-17: de'i khu ba blud par bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:97b-18: skyer pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan nam /
T13TD4312.3E:97b-19: yang na bong nga dkar po nas pu tse shel gyi bar gyi sman bskol ba blud par bya'o ;
T13TD4312.3E:97b-20: / pa tha bca' sga pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-21: sle tres rtsa mkhris sha ri ba //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-22: thang shing gla sgang mur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-23: dug mo yungs bcas bskol ba blud //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-24: nu zho'i nyes pa sel ba'i mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:97b-25: yang na pa ta la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba blud na yang nu zho'i nyes pa sel ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-26: rjes 'brel nad la ji bzhin du //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-27: dus shes pa yis gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-29: 'o ma'i be'u snabs kyi nad de dang rjes su 'brel cing rjes su 'brang ba'i bla brnan gyi nad rnams la yang nad kyi dmigs ji lta ba bzhin du /
T13TD4312.3E:97b-30: dus shes pa'i sman pas gso ba brtsam par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-31: so 'byung ba dag nad rnams ni //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-32: thams cad kyi yang rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-33: mchog tu rims dang 'khru ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-34: lud pa slon dang mgo nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-35: bad mig 'dzag pa'i nad dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-36: shu ba rnams ni skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-38: byis pa'i so 'byung ba ni byis pa'i nad thams cad kyi rgyu dang gnas yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-39: de las kyang khyad par du rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-40: byi la'i sgal tshigs bye ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-41: rma bya'i gtsug ni 'byung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-42: byis pa'i so ni skye ba na //
T13TD4312.3E:97b-43: min pa ni cung zad med //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-1: byi la'i sgal tshigs bye zhing 'bur ba'i dus dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-2: rma bya'i gtsug gi cod pan 'byung ba'i dus su yan lag thams cad brdung zhing na bar mi byed pa cung zad kyang med do //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-3: de bzhin du byis pa'i so skye ba na yang yan lag min ba cung zad kyang med kyi thams cad na bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-4: de la nad ni ji bzhin dang //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-5: nad stobs ji bzhin 'jigs ji bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-6: yul dang dus sogs rnam phye ste //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-7: sman gyi sbyor bas gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-9: so skye ba las byung ba'i nad de la nad kyi tshul ji lta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-10: nad gang dang gang stobs che ba'i shas ji lta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-11: 'jigs pa gang dang gang las byung ba ji lta ba de bzhin du yul dang dus la sogs pa'i tshul shes par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-12: sman gyi sbyor bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-13: gnod dang gnod bya de nyid dang //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-14: rims sogs nad kyang de nyid 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-15: de bas sman ni de nyid de //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-16: gzhon sha can dang lus chung phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-17: zas kun bsten par mi byed pas //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-18: 'di yi tshad ni chung du sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-20: byis pa'i gnod pa de nyid de rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan de nyid dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-21: dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs bdun po'i gnod bya de nyid dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-22: rims la sogs pa'i nad kyang sngar lus spyi'i gso bar bstan pa de nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-23: de bas na sman yang rims la sogs pa'i skabs de dag tu smos pa de nyid kyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-24: 'on kyang byis pa'i skabs su khyad par 'di yod de /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-25: byis pa ni gzhon sha can khul zho ba yin pa'i phyir dang lus chung ba'i phyir dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-26: zas thams cad la rten par mi byed pa'i phyir 'di la sman gyi tshad chung du sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-27: mar dang 'o ma la brten pas //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-28: byis pa rtag par khong snum yin //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-29: de bas 'phral du skyug sman ni //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-30: 'jam po blo dang ldan pas blud //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-32: byis pa ni dus rtag tu mar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-33: 'o ma la brten cing des 'tsho ba yin pas /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-34: rtag par khong snum pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:98a-35: de bas na byis pa de la ni 'phral du de'i mod la skyug sman 'jam po sman pa blo dang ldan pas blud bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:98a-37: nu zho ngoms par byas pas slon //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-1: byis pa 'o ma la brten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98b-2: 'o ma dang zas gnyis ka la brten pa dag la ni nu zho ngoms par byas nas slon du gzhug go //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-3: zas za ba la mar bcas pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-4: thug pa sla ba blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-6: zas 'ba' zhig gis gso ba'i byis pa ni thug pa sla ba rkyang rkyang po blud pas slon par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-7: bkru sman gyis gso mas gtong dang //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-8: tshad chung tshad phran dag gis bya //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-10: byis pa bkru sman gyis gso bar bya ba'i nad yod pa la ni bkru sman mas gtong bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-11: sna sman tshad chung du btang ba'i nad yod pa la ni chad phran dag gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-12: bkru sman la sogs ji skad bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-13: ma ma nyid la gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-15: ma ma 'am ma la ni bkru sman la sogs pa ji skad du smos pa'i sbyor ba thams cad sbyar bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:98b-16: de la byis pa la ni bkru sman rnam pa thams cad du btang du mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-17: mur ba rgya shug tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-19: thang shing pa ta yungs kar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-20: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-21: nu zho'i nyes pa sel mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-23: mur ba la sogs pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang btags pa'i lde gu ni nu zho'i /
T13TD4312.3E:98b-24: nyes pa sel ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-25: pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-26: da ta ka yi me tog gi / phye ma sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-27: lde gus rnyil ni byug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-29: pi pi ling gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus rnyil bsku bar bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:98b-30: yang na skyu ru ra dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98b-31: da ta ka'i me tog gi phye ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98b-32: sbrang rtsir sbar bas rnyil bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-33: 'ur bya sreg pa'i sha skam gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-34: phye ma sbrang rtsis sbrus pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-35: byis pa'i so yi myu gu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-36: myur du skyed par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-38: 'ur bya zhes bya ba bya la ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:98b-39: sreg pa'i sha skam gyi phye ma sbrang rtsis sbrus pa bskus na byis pa'i so'i myu gu myur du skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-40: shu dag bri ha ti gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-41: pa ta gla sgang pu ce [?] shel //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-42: bong nga mngar ba'i sman sde dag / bskol ba'i sman gyis so skyed grub //
T13TD4312.3E:98b-44: shu dag la sogs pa'i sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:99a-0: de bzhin du rgun 'bru la sogs pa @99a * //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-1: mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan dang bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na /
T13TD4312.3E:99a-2: so myur du skyed pa de mngon du grub pas yid ches pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-3: skyer pa thang shing sa ra la //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-4: bri ha ti gnyis nye shing pa //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-6: sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-7: pho ba'i drod skyed pa'i mchog / rlung ni bde bar rgyu bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-8: 'khru ba rims dang dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-9: mig ser skya rbab lud pa 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-10: byis pa'i nad ni thams cad la //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-11: phan zhing mdog dang nyams stobs skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-13: sa ra ni tsi zhes bya ba'i shing ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-14: bri ha ti gnyis ni bri ha ti dang kanda k'a ri'o //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-15: shri ya se ni ha ti pi pi ling ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-16: gzhan dag ni grags par zad do //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-17: sman de dag btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu ni pho ba'i drod bskyed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas nad thams cad la phan zhing lus kyi mdog dang nyams stobs skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-18: btsod dang sing phrom da ta ki / ku tan na ta ba la gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-19: sa ha che chung gnyis dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-20: mud ga bil ba gzhon nu rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-21: ras bal sa bon bcas pa dag / chu bskol ba dang mar dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-22: thal sman zho ga chur bskol bas //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-23: so skyes las byung sna tshogs nad //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-25: 'od srungs rgan pos bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-27: btsod la sogs pa'i sman chu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:99a-28: bskol ba'i sman gyi khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:99a-31: zhog chur sbyar te bskol bas ni so skyes pa las byung ba'i nad sna tshogs 'dis sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-32: sbyor ba 'di ni 'od srungs rgan po zhes bya ba'i drang srong gis bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-33: byis pa so skye'i nad la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-34: sngags kyis mngon bar gdab mi bya //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-35: so skyes pa yi nad gang yin //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-36: gso bas rang nyid nyer zhing 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-38: byis pa so skye ba'i nad la sngags kyis gdab par mi bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:99a-39: so skyes pa'i nad gang yin pa de ni gso ba de dag byas pas rang nyid nye bar zhi bar 'gyur bas sngags gdab mi dgos so //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-40: nyin par gnyid drags chu grang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:99a-41: nu zho bad kan can brten pas //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-0: byis pa'i dangs ma rgyu @99b ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-1: rtsa rgyun bad kan gyis bkag pas //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-4: de nas byis pa lus bskams shing //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-5: gdong snum mig ni dkar bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-7: nyin par gnyid log drags pa la brten pas dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sbubs 'gags pa la sogs pa'i phyir yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa'i nad byung la /
T13TD4312.3E:99b-8: des na byis pa lus skams par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-9: rgyam tsha tsha gsum sha rang ga / pa tha gi ri ka dam pa //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-10: mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar skams dang //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-13: byis pa lus skams shing yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa la rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-14: pu tse shel dang aa sho ka / tsha ba lngar bcas phye ma phan //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-16: yang na pu tse shel dang aa sho ka dang tshab lnga'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang /
T13TD4312.3E:99b-17: mar dang sbyar ba yang byis pa'i yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa'i nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-18: da ta ki dang skyu rur //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-19: rgya shug phye ma mar bcas phan //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-21: yang na da ta ki la sogs pa'i phye ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:99b-22: mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba yang byis pa skem zhing yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-23: sa la parni shu dag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-24: bri ha ti gnyis ram nye ba //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-25: pi pi ling dang rgya spos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-26: lcang ma autpa la pa sbru ba //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-27: ga bra'i rtsa ba gla sgang rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-28: srang re yi ni tshad byas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-29: mar ni bre gang bcas bskol ba //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-30: rtsa rgyun sbyong ba'i dam pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-32: sa la parni la sogs pa'i sman sna re re srang re mar bre gang gi nang du bskol ba blud na yang rtsa rgyun bad kan gyis 'gags pa sbyong bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-33: aa shva gandha bye'u rug pa //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-34: bri ha ti dang pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-35: bskol ba'ang yon tan de dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-37: aa shva gandha la sogs pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i mar blud na yang yon tan snga ma dang 'dra ste /
T13TD4312.3E:99b-38: rtsa rgyud sbyong bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-39: shing mngar seng phrom pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-41: bal bu'i lo ma sha ri ba //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-42: bskol ba'i mar gyis skem pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-43: nad ni 'joms par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:99b-45: shing mngar la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100a-1: byis pa'i skem pa'i nad sel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-2: shring gi ma tu lung ga dang //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-3: ga bra'i rtsab pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-4: thang shing aa shva gandha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-5: ram nye ba gnyis ra sna dang //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-6: zangs rtsi ba dang dzi ba ka / ma sha mud ga parni dang //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-7: byi dang ga yi lde gur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-8: ri bong mgo bskol khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-9: bskol ba'i mar ni blud gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-10: lus skem rgyas par byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:100a-11: kar ka ta shring gi dang ma du lung ga la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100a-12: ri bong gi mgo bo bskol ba'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100a-13: lhan cig bskol ba'i mar gyis ni byis pa'i lus skem par gyur pa mchog tu brtas par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-14: shu dag sle tres ka yastha //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-15: rgya spos tsa rong ra thug gcin //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-16: chang bskol til mar 'thungs pa phan //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-18: shu dag la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100a-19: til mar bskol ba yang lus skem pa la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-20: rgya skyegs khu ba cha mnyam dang //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-21: til mar bre gang zhog chu //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-23: skyer ba thang shing ru rta dang //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-24: ha re nu ka ba ta la //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-25: tsandan mur ba pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-26: ra sna nye'u shing shing mngar mnyam //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-27: bskol ba'i til mar rgya skyegs sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-28: zhes bya bskus na phan par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-29: stobs skyed rims dang zad byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-30: smyo byed brjed byed dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-31: rlung gi nad rnams sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-33: sbrum ma la yang bsngags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-35: rgya skyegs kyi khu ba bre gang dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:100a-36: zho ga chu bre bzhi dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100a-37: aa shva gandha la sogs pa sman cha mnyam par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100a-38: bskol ba'i til mar ni rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i til mar zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:100a-39: de bskus na yang lus skems pa la phan zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100a-40: stobs skyed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-41: bong dkar ka ta sring gi / pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-42: lde gu byis pa la sbyin pa //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-44: bong nga dang kar ka ta shring gi la sogs pa sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:100a-45: bong nga dkar po gcig pu yi //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-0: lde gus lud pa rims @100b slon bro //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-1: bla brnan gyi nad sel byed //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-3: yang na bong nga dkar po gcig pu sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus kyang lud pa dang rims la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-4: nu zho 'thung zhing slon pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-5: de la zhun mar sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-6: kanda k'a ri bri ha ti //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-7: 'bras bu'i khu ba tsha ba lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-8: sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-10: byis pa gang ma'i nu zho 'thungs shing slon par gyur pa de la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:100b-13: bri ha ti'i 'bras bu'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100b-14: tsha ba lnga'i phye ma dang sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-15: pi pi ling dang lan tshva lnga ;
T13TD4312.3E:100b-16: / ba rib tra byi dang ga / de bzhin lde gur bcas pa sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-21: byi dang ga'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin na yang slon pa'i nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-22: de bzhin tsha ba gsum reg 'jam //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-23: sha ri da ta rma bya sram /
T13TD4312.3E:100b-24: ji snyed pags pa spu bsregs la //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-25: snag tsha sbrang rtsi mar sbyar phan //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-27: yang de bzhin du tsha ba gsum dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100b-28: bya reg 'jam la sogs pa ji snyed pa'i pags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100b-29: spu bsregs te snag tshar bcas pa mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu byis pa la byin na yang nad de la phan no ;
T13TD4312.3E:100b-30: ; seng ldeng bal bu aa rdzun //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-31: ru rta tva ta na'i khu ba //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-32: 'o ma mar dang bcas bskol bas //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-33: slon bro nye bar sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-35: seng ldeng la sogs pa 'o ma dang mar bcas pa bskol ba blud na yang slon bro ba sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-36: gang zhig so dang bcas skyes dang //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-37: gang gi dang por ya so skyes //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-38: bkra mi shis pa de la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-39: zhi ba bya zhing bram ze la //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-40: yon dang bcas pa sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-41: de bzhin skem byed mchod par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-43: byis pa gang ma'i khong nas so dang bcas par skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100b-44: yang byis pa gang ya so dang por skyes pa'i bkra mi shis pa'i gnod pa can de la ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100b-45: dge sbyong dang bram ze la byis pa de yon dang bcas pa sbyin par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:100b-46: de bzhin du gzhon nu skem byed mchod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-47: bad kan 'khrugs pas rkan gyi shar //
T13TD4312.3E:100b-48: rkan gyi mdzer pa zhes bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-0: @101a * // des na rkan gyi phyogs kyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-2: rkan lhung nu zho 'gras pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-3: ska ba 'thungs shing bshang ba sla //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-4: skom dad kha g-ya' mig na zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-7: bad kan 'khrugs pas rkan gyi shar rkan gyi mdzer pa zhes bya ba'i nad skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-8: rkan gyi mdzer pa des rkan kyi phyogs kyi spyi bor dma' zhing lcong bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-9: de bzhin du rkan lhung zhing babs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-10: nu zho dang 'gras shing 'thung bar mi dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-11: dka' zhing sdug bsngal bas 'jigs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-12: de la rkan bteg nas tshig 'khus //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-13: thal ba sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-14: yang na bca' sga pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-15: ba glang lci khu lan tshva bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-17: rkan du mdzer ba byung ba de la bteg nas /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-18: nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-19: sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-20: yang na bca' sga la sogs pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-21: dong gra skyer pa shing tsha yi //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-22: lde gu n+ya gro dha'i lo mar //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-23: gtums la ba lang lcibs byugs //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-24: de rjes me ma mur la bsregs //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-25: khu bas rkan dang kha bsku zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-26: mig tu yang ni blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-28: dong gra dang skyer pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-29: shing tsha lde gur byas pa n+ya gro dha'i lo mar gtums la /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-30: de'i 'og tu ba lang gi lci bas phyi rol nas bskus la /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-31: de'i 'og tu me ma mur gyi mdag mer bsregs la /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-32: tshos pa dang khu ba btsir te byis pa de'i rkan dang /
T13TD4312.3E:101a-34: mig tu sman gyi thigs pa blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-35: ru rta shu dag aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-36: sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-37: nu zhor sbyar bas byis ba blud //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-38: rkan gyi mdzer pa las thar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-40: ru rta la sogs pa'i lde gu dang nu zho dang lhan cig blud na yang rkan gyi mdzer pa'i nad las thar par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-41: dri mas gos sam rdul ba las //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-42: gzhang khar bad kan khrag las byung //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-43: rma ni nang dmar g-ya' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-45: la las ma mo'i nyes par bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:101a-46: gzhan dag lus srul pos byas zer //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-0: rgyab kyi thor bu gzhang [?] @101b bsdebs zer //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-1: la las de ming med ces bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-3: bshang ba zhes bya ba'i dri mas gos pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-4: lan 'ga' rdul bar gyur pa las bad kan khrag las gyur pa'i rman ngan dmar zhing g-ya' ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-5: bla brnan mang po dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-6: rma de la ni la las ni ma mo'i gdon gyis nyen pa las byung ba yin par bshad la /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-7: de bzhin du gzhan dag ni lus srul po'i gdon gyis nyen pa byas zer /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-8: la las ni rgyab kyi thor bu zhes bya ba yin zer la /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-9: gzhan dag ni gzhang bsdebs pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-11: la las ni nad de ming med ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-13: de lam ma bad mkhris dag / sel ba'i sman gyis nu zho sbyang //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-15: ming du ma dang ldan pa'i nad de la ni ma ma'i mkhris pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-16: bad kan sel bar byed pa'i sman gyis de'i nu zho sbyang zhing nyes pa med par bya'o ;
T13TD4312.3E:101b-17: ; tsandan dkar chu bsil ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-18: ldan pa'i skom ni nang nas blud //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-20: ma ma de la tsandan dkar po chu bsil ba dang sbyar ba'i skom mam [?] dang byis pa la blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-21: de dang skyer ba'i khanda ni //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-22: sbrang rtsir bcas pas rma bsku bya //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-24: tsandan dkar po dang skyer pa'i khanda sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa'i lde gus rma bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-25: rgya shug 'bras bu gsum plag sha'i //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-26: shun pa bskol ba'i chu blugs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-27: nag tshur gi wam spangs ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-28: dngul rdo ba bla ldong ros ni //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-29: skyur dang btags pas bsku bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-31: rgya shug la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu bas rma de la blugs par bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-32: nag tshur la sogs pa'i sman khu ba skyur po dang /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-33: sbyar ba'i lde gus rma bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-34: yang na shing mngar skyer khanda //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-35: dung ni zhib tu btags pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-36: dung gi lte ba sha ri ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-37: aa sa na yi shun pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-38: phye mar btags pas gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:101b-40: yang na rma de shing mngar la sogs pa zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma gdab par bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-41: yang na dung gi lte ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:101b-42: sha ri ba zhes bya ba thal tres kyi phye mas gdab par bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:102a-0: yang na aa sa na'i shun pa phye mar zhib tu btags @102a * //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-2: dmar zhing g-ya' ba'i shas che la //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-3: srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-5: gzhang bsdebs pa'i nad de mdog dmar zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:102a-6: g-ya' ba'i shas che bar gyur pa ni srin bu bad pas khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-7: gzhang bsdebs nad la mkhris pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-8: rma la phan pa thams cad bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-10: gzhang bsdebs pa zhes bya ba'i nad la mkhris pa'i rma la phan pa'i zas dang /
T13TD4312.3E:102a-13: pa tha gla sgang ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-14: ga bra'i rtsa ba byi dang ga / purna rna bar bil bar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-15: brishtsi ka li tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-16: mar bcas bskol ba tshad tsam bldag / sa zos nad las thar bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-18: pa tha la sogs pa sman bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang bskol ba tshad tsam byis pas bldags shing zos na sa zos pa la sogs pa'i nad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-19: nad ni gang gi sman gang yin //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-20: de yis nu ma bskus nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-21: yud tsam 'dug la de rjes bkru //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-22: blud na nad ni de des sel //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-24: rims la sogs pa'i sman gang dag yin bar bshad pa'i sman des nad gzhi ji lta ba dang sbyar te bskus nas yud tsam ste /
T13TD4312.3E:102a-25: chu tshod gnyis 'das kyi bar du bsdad la /
T13TD4312.3E:102a-26: de'i rjes la nu ma bkrus te /
T13TD4312.3E:102a-27: byis pa la nu zho blud na rims la sogs pa'i nad de sman des 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-28: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa /
T13TD4312.3E:102a-29: tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:102a-30: gnas phyi ma'i le'u gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:102a-32: // / de nas byis pa'i gdon gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-35: tshul min skrag par mi bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-37: zhes bshad pa'i rim pas byis pa'i gdon gso ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-38: sngon gyi skem byed bsrung ba'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-39: gdon ni skyes pa'i gzugs can lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-40: bud med kyi ni gzugs can bdun //
T13TD4312.3E:102a-41: lha chen po yi sprul pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-0: sngon gyi dus @102b su lha chen po'i bu skem byed ces bya ba gzhon nu gdong drug pa rims las bsrung ba'i phyir /
T13TD4312.3E:102b-1: gdon skyes pa'i gzugs can lnga dang bud med kyi gzugs can bdun lha chen po nyid kyis bskyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-2: skem byed sa ga lug thug gdong //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-3: khyi gdong yi dags zhes bya dang //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-5: skem byed kyi gdon la sogs pa lnga ni skyes pa'i gzugs can yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-6: bya gdon srul mo grang ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-7: srul mo long ma lus srul mo //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-8: de bzhin bzhin gyi rgyan can ma //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-9: nam gru nam gru skem mo yin //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-11: bya'i gdon la sogs pa'i gdon bdun po ni ;
T13TD4312.3E:102b-12: bud med kyi gzugs can yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-13: de rnams kyis ni gzung ba'i tshul //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-14: rtag tu du dang rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-16: gdon de rnams kyis dang po gzud zhing 'jug pa'i tshul lam rtags ni rtag par rgyun du du ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:102b-17: rims kyis 'debs par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-18: spyi'i tshul skrag dang glal ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-19: smin ma 'degs shing rmya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-20: dbu ba slon zhing gyen du blta //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-21: ma mchu sos 'debs gnyid yar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-22: du zhing mkhun la nu zho la //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-23: mi dga' skad ni 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-24: glo bur du ni sen mo yis //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-25: rang gi ma ma'i yan lag 'brad //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-27: gdon de rnams kyi spyi'i rtags ni /
T13TD4312.3E:102b-28: skrag cing 'jigs pa dang glal ba la sogs pa nas rang gi ma ma 'am ma la rgyu med par yan lag thams cad sen mos 'brad cing gnod par byed pa'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-29: de la skem byed kyis zan rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-30: mig gcig mchi ma 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-31: yang dang yang du mgo bo rdeb //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-32: phyogs gcig nyams shing lus rengs la //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-33: rdul bcas skye ba rengs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-34: so 'cha' nu zho la mi dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-35: sdangs shing ngu la skad gsang nyams //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-36: kha yo kha chu skyug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-37: mi bzad par ni gyen du blta //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-38: tshil khrag dri bro yid mi dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-39: bshang ba khu tshur la bcangs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-40: mkhur tshos mig dang smin ma gcig / g-yo zhing mig ni gnyis ka dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:102b-41: des ni yan lag nyes nyams sam //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-1: gdon de rnams kyi nang nas skem byed ces bya ba'i gdon gyis zin cing nyen ba'i rtags ni byis pa'i mig gcig nas mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-2: skad cig ma re re zhing yang dang yang du mgo po brdegs shing bskyod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-3: lus kyi gzhogs phyed nyams shing ma rungs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-4: lus shing ltar rengs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-6: ske ba gnye'u rengs kyis btab pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-7: tshil dang khrag dri mi zhim pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-8: yid mi dga' zhing lto ba ltar gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-9: bshad ba khu tshur gyi nang du bcangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-10: mkhur tshos dang kha yo bar gnas pa la sogs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-11: des ni yan lag nyams shing mi tshang bar 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-13: skem byed brjed byed mtshan ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-14: dran pa nyams shing yang dang yang //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-16: rnam par 'dud cing glal bzhin du //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-17: bshang dang gci ba 'byin par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-18: lbu bar skyug cing gyen du blta //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-19: rkang lag smin mas gar yang byed //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-20: nu ma rang lce so yis 'debs //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-21: kun tu g-yo zhing gnyid yar rims //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-22: khrag ni rnag gi dri bro'o //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-24: skem byed brjed byed ces bya ba gdon sa gas bzung ba'i mtshan ma ni byis pa'i dran pa nyams shing brgyal ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-25: lus rnam par 'gugs shing btud nas glal bzhin du bshang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-26: gci ba 'byin par byed pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-27: lug thug gdong gis rtags kyi nad //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-28: sbo zhing rkang pa lag pa dag /'dar zhing lbu bar skyug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-29: skom dad che 'khru chang pa sdom //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-30: skad gsang dma' zhing mdog mi sdug / mkhun zhing slon par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-31: lud pa skyigs bus 'debs gnyid yar //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-32: so yis mchu gnon yan lag sdud //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-33: rengs shing lug thug dri bro la //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-34: gyen du lta zhing dgod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-36: brgyal zhing mig gcig skrangs pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:103a-38: lug thug gi gdong zhes bya bas zin pa'i rtags ni byis pa lto sbo ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103a-39: lus kyi bar du gugs shing sgur por byed pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-0: @103b khyi yi gdong gi rtags gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-1: 'dar zhing ba spu ldang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-2: rdul zhing mig ni 'dzums pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-3: rgyab tu gug cing lce dang so //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-4: mchu dang rkan sgra 'byin zhing skyug / bshad ba'i dri 'byung khyi skad 'don //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-6: khyi'i gdong gi rtags ni byis pa lus 'dar ba la sogs pa nas khyi'i skad 'byin pa'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-7: yi dags kyi ni gdon gyi rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-8: ba sbu ldang zhing yang yang sdang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-9: glo bur du zhing rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-10: 'khru zhing slon byed lud pa lu //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-11: glal skom mi ro'i dri dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-12: lus ni bskyod cing g-yo ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-13: skem zhing rengs la mdog mi sdug / khu tshur bsdam zhing mchi ma 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:103b-14: byis pa yi dags kyi gdon mtshun lha zhes bya bas gzung ba'i rtags ni ba spu ldang zhing yang dang yang du sdang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-15: bya gdon lus lhod 'khru bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-16: lce rkan lkog mar rma byung zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-17: thor bu na zhing tsha la rnags //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-18: tshigs dag tu ni yang yang 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-19: mtshan mo skye la nyin mo 'bri //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-21: 'jigs shing bya yi dri dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-22: rims kyis 'debs par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-24: byis pa bya'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni /
T13TD4312.3E:103b-25: lus lhod cing yan lag shig shig por gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103b-26: 'khru bar byed pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103b-27: lus dang yan lag la rma 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103b-28: mtshan mo skye zhing mched la nyi na mo ni bri ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-29: srul mos slon zhing 'dar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-30: lus snyom mtshan mo gnyid yang [?] dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-31: skyigs bu lto sbo 'khru ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-32: skom zhing gcin ni sri ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-33: lus lhod ba spu gshor ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-34: kha ltar dri ni mnam pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-36: srul mo zhes bya ba'i gdon bud med kyi gzugs can gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni byis pa slon zhing skyug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:103b-38: skom zhing gnyid kyis log pa ltar /
T13TD4312.3E:103b-40: mtshan mo gnyid yar ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-41: grang ba'i srul mos 'dar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-42: du zhing zur gyis lta ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:103b-44: zhag ltar dri ni mnam pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-2: cig shos dro ba nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-4: grang ba'i lus srul mo zhes bya ba'i bud med kyi gzugs can gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni byis pa lus 'dar ba la sogs pa nas lus kyi gzhogs gcig ni dro bar gyur pa la sogs /
T13TD4312.3E:104a-6: srul mo long mas slon pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-7: rims dang lud pa gnyid chung dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-8: bshang ba sla zhing mdog mi sdug / dri nga bskus pas myur du skam //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-9: mthong ba nyams shing mig na g-ya' //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-10: mig skrang glo bar gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-11: skyigs bu mi dgod nu zho 'gras //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-12: mdog mi sdug cing nga ro rtsu ba //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-13: mdog nyams nya yi dri dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-14: yang na dri ni skyur bcas yin //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-16: srul mo long ma'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni /
T13TD4312.3E:104a-17: byis pa slon zhing skyugs pa la sogs pa dang lus dring ba dang lus kyi lde gu myur du bskams pa la sogs pa'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-18: bzhin rgyan can gyis rkang pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-19: lag pa gdong ni mdzes pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-20: rtsa ni nag por snang ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-21: lto ba khyab cing rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-22: yi ga 'chu zhing yan lag na //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-25: bud med kyi gzugs can gyi gdon bzhin rgyan can gyis zin pa'i rtags ni byis pa'i rkang pa la sogs pa sdug cing mdzes par gyur pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-26: nam grus gnag cing sngo ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-27: mig dang rna ba sna med cid [?] //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-28: mig 'gul skyigs bu lud pa lu //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-29: kha ni yo zhing dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-30: lug thug drir ldan rims 'debs skem //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-31: bshang ba sngo zhing sla ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-33: nam gru'i bya'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni /
T13TD4312.3E:104a-34: byis pa'i mdog gnag cing sngo ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-35: nam gru skem mos lus kun ni //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-37: skra 'byi zas la mi dga' dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-38: skad gsang zhum zhing mdog mi sdug / bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-39: lto bar rtsa yi mdud pa chags //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-40: du zhing bya rgod dri ldan la //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-41: yun rings na bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:104a-43: nam gru skem mo zhes bya ba'i gdon gyi rtags ni //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-0: lus kyi yan lag thams cad skam zhing rengs pa la @104b sogs pa nas nad yun ring du na zhing rjes su 'brel pa la sogs pa'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-1: lto bar rmen bu zlum por 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-2: bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-3: lce yi dbus ni dma' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-4: rkan ni gnag 'gyur de spang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-6: byis pa gang lto bar rmen bu 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:104b-7: thor bu zlum po byung ba dang bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs su 'byung ba la sogs pa'i byis pa de ni gso bar mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-8: kha zas mang po zos kyang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-9: byis pa gang zhig lus skem byed //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-10: skem pas nyen cing mig nyams pa //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-11: de ni nam gru skem mos gsod //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-13: byis pa kha zas mang zhing sna chogs zos su zin kyang lus skem zhing sbegs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de nyid nam gru'i gdon gyis nges par gsod par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-15: gdon rnams 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-17: gdon 'jug par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni 'tshe bar byed cing srog gcod pa la dga' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-18: mchod cing brjod par 'dod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-19: de la 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-20: byin tshe sna nas 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-21: lce nyams mig ni gting du 'bros //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-22: bde med mig ni mchi mar bcas /
T13TD4312.3E:104b-23: nyam chung tshig ni dman pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-25: skem zhing rang gi bshad dang gci //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-26: lag bas nyed kyi smod mi byed //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-27: lag pas bteg ste 'bad pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-28: bdag dang de bzhin gzhan la brdeg / mtshon dang shing sogs kyis brdegs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-30: chu nang 'bying zhing khron par ltung //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-32: skom dad che zhing tsha bas gnag / slon par byed par 'gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-33: bu ga kun nas khrag 'dzag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-34: 'chi ltas byung ba de spang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-36: de la gdon de rnams kyi nang nas gdon 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can zhes bya bas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:104b-38: yang na 'tshe ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dag la 'dzin cing de sna nas 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-0: lce nyams pa la sogs pa nas mtshon dang shing la sogs pa'i par gyis kyang bdag dang @105a * //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-1: gzhan la rdeg par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-3: chu'i nang du lus bying ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-4: khron par mchong zhing ltung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-5: gzhan yang 'tshe ba'i las de lta bu gzhan yang byed par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-6: skom dad che ba la sogs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-7: de lta bu'i 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can gyis zin pa gang yin pa de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-8: dga' ba 'dod pas gzir gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-9: dpen par bud med 'dod smra dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-10: dri dang me tog phreng rgyan dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-11: mgu zhing zhi ba gso bar dka' //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-13: dga' ba 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis mi chen po 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-14: byis pa zin par gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-15: dben pa'i gnas su bud med dang lhan cig 'dod pa spyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-16: smra ba la dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-17: dri dang me tog la sogs pa la dga' bar 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-18: sems mgu zhing dga' ba la brtags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-20: gdon de gso bar dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-21: lces ni kha la nyug ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-22: mchu rkan gre ba skams pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-23: dogs pas lta zhing du ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-24: sems khong chud cing zhum pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-25: zas 'dod ltogs par gyur kyang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-26: byin na za bar mi 'dod pa //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-27: gtor ma 'dod pas zin pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-28: de ni gso sla yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-30: gtor ma 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i gdon yod de //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-32: mi chen po gang dag zin par gyur pa de ni lces kha la 'byug cing 'byug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-33: mchu la sogs pa bskam par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-34: dogs pa dang bcas pas kun la lta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-35: du zhing nga ro 'byin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-36: sems khong du chud pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-38: zas 'dod cing shin tu bkres par gyur kyang zas byin na zas mi 'dod par 'gyur ba ni gtor ma 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa yin par shes par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-39: de ni gso sla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-40: gsod 'dod pa las grub pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-41: sngags bzlas sbyin sreg bya bas gzhom //
T13TD4312.3E:105a-43: gdon srog 'dod pa zhes bya ba gsod par 'dod pa yod de /
T13TD4312.3E:105a-44: de la ni grub cing 'bras bu mngon du snang ba'i mthu dang ldan pas sngags bzlas shing sbyin sreg bya bas /
T13TD4312.3E:105b-1: cig shos la ni ci 'dod par //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-2: dga' dang gtor ma sogs sbyin pas //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-4: gsod par 'dod pas cig shos su gyur pa'i gdon dga' par 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105b-5: gtor ma 'dod pa zhes bya ba la ni dga' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-6: gtor ma sbyin pas gso bar bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-7: dga' bar 'dod pa la ni rtse dga'i bya ba sbyin pas gso la /
T13TD4312.3E:105b-8: gtor ma 'dod pa la ni gtor ma sbyin pas gso bar bya'o /
T13TD4312.3E:105b-9: sogs pa smos pas ni 'og nas bshad pa'i cho ga gzhan dag kyang sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-10: de nas gsor rung gdon la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-11: byis pa khang pa dben par gzhag / zhag gsum chag chag phyag dar byas //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-12: rtag tu me ni bzhag pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-13: pu ti'i me tog sil ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-14: 'dab ma sa bon yungs kar gtor //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-15: gdon 'joms til mar spar ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-16: mar mes gdon ni 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-17: nad g-yog nyal po chang dang sha //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-18: yongs su spangs par gyur pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-19: mar ni rnying pas bskus nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-20: ba la nim pa tar ka ri //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-21: dong gra thang shing ka tang ga /'dzam bu dang ni tam la //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-22: ka tri na dang lcam pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-23: aa pa marga pa ta li //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-24: ma du shi kru zhes bya dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-25: ka ka dza ka shve ta che //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-26: bil rkang 'o ma can gyi shing //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-27: ka dam pa bcas ka ranydza //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-28: chu ni dro 'jam dag gis bkru [?] //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-30: de nas gsor rung ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i byis pa khang pa dben zhing yangs bar zhag gsum gyi bar du chag chag dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105b-31: phyag dar lan gsum byas la rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par me gzhag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-32: pu ti la sogs pa'i me tog gi sil ma gtor bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105b-33: de bzhin du gdon 'joms pa'i rdzas yungs mar la sogs pa spar ba'i mar me gzhag par gyur pa der nad pa de gzhag la /
T13TD4312.3E:105b-34: nad g-yog 'khrig ba la sogs pa spangs par gyur pa dag gis mar rnying pas nad pa'i lus bskus la ba la dang nim pa la sogs pa'i sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:105b-35: bskol ba'i chu dro 'jam tsam gyis blugs shing nad pa bkru bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-36: tar ka ri ni aag ni man ta'o //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-37: ka tang ga ni aa ru la ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-38: ta ma la ni ba ra na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-39: ka tri na ni bu tri na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:105b-40: lcam pa ni su par tsa la'o //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-1: shi kru [?] ni so ban dza na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-2: shve ta che ni ma h'a kashpe ta ste gi ri kar ni'o //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-3: 'o ma can gyi shing ni n+ya grodha'i shing la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-4: ka dam pa ni aa ma ba dan pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-5: stag dang gzig dang seng ge sbrul //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-6: dom gyi pags pa mar dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-7: bdug pas khrus byas 'og tu bdug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:106a-8: byis pa khrus byas pa'i 'og tu stag la sogs pa'i pags pa bsregs pa'i dud pas lus la bdug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-9: pu ti yungs kar sha rang ga / shu dag go bye la la phud //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-10: ru rta mar bcas bdug pas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-11: gdon kun las ni thar byed yin //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-14: sha rang ga'i rtsa ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:106a-19: shing gi nang gi snying po dang /
T13TD4312.3E:106a-22: shu dag la sogs pa'i sman gyi bdugs pas kyang byis pa'i gdon thams cad las thar bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-23: yungs kar nim pa'i lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-24: shu dag ka ra b'i ra'i rtsa //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-25: gro ba mar sbyar bdugs pas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-26: gdon ni thams cad sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-28: yungs kar la sogs pa'i sman mar dang sbyar pa'i dud pa byis pa la bdugs na yang gdon thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-29: ba lang rva dang rus pa spu //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-30: pags pa byi la'i rtug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-31: nim pa'i lo ma pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-32: mar dang bri ha ti gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-33: ras bal sa bon po son cha //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-34: nas dang ra sbu thang shing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-35: yungs kar rma bya'i sgro dang pog / skra dang phub ma pha bang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-36: rdza mar ra thug gcin dang spangs //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-37: zhib btags pa yi bdugs pas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-38: 'byung po'i gdon ni thams cad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-39: mi bzad rims ni 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-41: ba lang gi rva la sogs pa'i sman rdza snod sar pa'i nang du ra thug gi gcin dang spangs te /
T13TD4312.3E:106a-42: gcin de nyid btags pa'i reng bu skam po'i dud bas ni gdon thams cad dang rims nad thams cad 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-43: byi tsher aa mra'i tshi gu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-44: rgya spos mngar sde na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-46: lde gur bcas pa mar dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:106a-47: 'o ma rtsa ba bcu bskol khur //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-0: bcas bskol de ni gdon 'joms mchog / ces @106b bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:106b-1: aa mra'i tshi gu ni aa mra'i 'bras bu'i nang na yod pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-2: mngar ba'i sde tshan ni 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan no //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-3: gzhan ni go bar zad de rdzas de dag lde gur byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:106b-4: mar la sogs pa bskol te /
T13TD4312.3E:106b-5: mar de blud na gdon thams cad 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-6: ra sna aam shu ma ti gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-7: ba la rtsa ba chen po lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-8: gla sgang btags te mar dang bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-9: tsha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka'i //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-10: thal tes ba tra byi dang ga / shing mngar shing kun pa ya sya //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-11: thang shing pi pi ling rtsa ba //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-12: dug mo yungs dang bcas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-13: lde gu mar dang bskol ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-14: rtag tu byis pal phan zhing ;
T13TD4312.3E:106b-15: ; nad dang gdon ni thams cad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-16: me drod stobs dang kha dog skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-18: ra sna dang aam shu ma ti gnyis kyi lo ma la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu dang bskol ba'i mar ni byis pa la rtag tu phan zhing rims la sogs pa'i nad dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad 'joms par byed cing me drod skyed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-20: kha dog skyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-21: sha ri ba dang mu ra dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-22: brahmi shu dag shang khi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-23: yungs kar aa shva gandha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-24: bye rug pa bcas mar dang bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-25: de ni btung ba 'am bsku ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-26: gdon rnams thams cad 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-28: sha ri ba la sogs pa lde gu dang mar du bskol ba'i mar de btung ba 'am bsku ba byas na gdon thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-29: mar gang 'byung po'i rig pa ru //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-30: 'og nas bshad pa dag dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-31: de bzhin gtor ma sbyin sreg dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-32: khrus ni sngags rgyud shes pas sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-34: sman mar gang 'byung po'i rig pa zhes bya ba //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-35: 'byung po'i nad gso ba'i skabs nas 'byung ba gang yin pa yang byis pa la sbyar bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:106b-36: de bzhin du 'og nas bshad pa'i gtor ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:106b-37: gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi las dang /
T13TD4312.3E:106b-38: khrus kyi cho ga gang yin pa dag kyang sngags kyi rgyud shes pa'i sngags pas sngags las bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-39: pu ti ka ranydza'i shun pa //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-40: bar bar yi rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-41: ku ba kha bo bi sha la //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-42: ka tra ka dang bil ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:106b-43: ka pid tha bskol des mtshan mo //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-3: pu ti ka ranydza'i shun pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-5: shing mngar bar ba re'i rtsa ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:107a-6: ku ba kha bo nas bil ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:107a-7: ka bid tha'i bar cha mnyam par byas pa bskol ba'i chu des mtshan mo byis pa bkrus na shis shing dpal bskyed pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.3E:107a-8: ; gdon dang bral yang bla brnan nad //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-9: rjes su 'brel pa thams cad la //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-10: byis pa'i nad gsor bshad pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-11: sman gyis ji bzhin gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-13: gnod pa bsal zhing de dang bral bar gyur kyang bla brnan gyi nad dang rjes su 'brel par gyur cing yun ring du gnas par gyur pa de thams cad la nad dmigs ji lta ba bzhin du byis pa'i nad gso bar bshad pa'i sman gyis gso zhing bcos par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-14: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:107a-15: gnas phyi ma'i le'u gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-16: byis pa gso ba'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T13TD4312.3E:107a-18: // / de nas 'byung po'i gdon gyi nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-20: byis pa'i gdon gyi rjes la 'byung po'i gdon gyi dmigs shes bar bya ba'i le'u bzhi pa ni de nyid du brtsam par 'os pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-21: gdon phal cher phan tshun gcig la gcig gso ba'i tshul gcig ste khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-22: shes dang rnam shes tshig dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-23: spyod pa snying stobs rang bzhin dag / gang gi rang bzhin 'gyur bar snang //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-24: de la 'byung bo'i gdon yod bshad /
T13TD4312.3E:107a-26: skyes bu gang shes pa la sogs pa rang bzhin 'gyur zhing phyin ci log tu snang na //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-27: mi de la 'byung po'i gdon yod ces nges par bshad par bya'o /
T13TD4312.3E:107a-28: de la shes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i sgra shes pas brtsam mo //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-29: rnam par shes pa ni skabs 'dir khyad par shes pas de kho na nyid rtogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-30: 'byung po'i gzugs dang rang bzhin dang //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-31: smra dang 'gro sogs spyod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-32: gang zhig 'dre bar byed pa dag / de la de ni zhugs par bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:107a-34: 'byung po ni lha dang lha ma yin dang dri za la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i sems can rnams te /
T13TD4312.3E:107b-0: @107b de'i gzugs dang rang bzhin la sogs pa'i tshul mthun par byed pa gang yin pa de ni mi de la gdon de zhugs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-1: de ni lha dang lha min sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-2: dbye ba rnam pa bco brgyad bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-4: 'byung po'i gdon lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri za la sogs pa'i dbye bas mdor bsdus na grangs bco brgyad yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-6: sngon chad shes rab 'chal ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-7: blo yis nyes pa byas gyur nas //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-8: de yi chags pa sogs bskyed pas //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-9: brtul zhugs spyod dang chos lugs nyams //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-10: mchod 'os rnams ni brnyas pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:107b-11: ; gzhung lugs nyams pa de dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-12: sdig dang bdag nyid gsod byed na //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-13: gdon ni glags skabs tshol byed pas //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-14: lha la sogs pa 'ang rjes gnod byed //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-16: gdon de rnams 'dzin cing 'jug pa'i rgyu ni shes rab 'chal ba'i dbang gis nyes pa'i las tshe 'dir 'phral du byas pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:107b-17: yang na sngon chad byas par gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-18: rgyu de'i dbang gis chags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:107b-19: khro ba dang nga rgyal la sogs pa skyes par gyur pas skyes bu brtul zhugs dang spyod pa dang rang gi chos lugs nyams par gyur cing mchod par 'os pa bla ma la sogs pa la brnyas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:107b-20: de bzhin du rang gi chos lugs sam //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-21: 'jig rten pa'i khrims kyi gzhung las nyams par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:107b-22: sdig pa'i tshul la sogs pa byed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:107b-23: de lta bu'i glags rnyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:107b-24: glags skabs tshol par byed pa'i gdon gyi rigs lha la sogs pa rnams kyis de la gnod cing 'tshe bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-25: glags ni sdig la sogs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-26: mi dge'i las ni smin pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-27: gcig pur khang stong gnas pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-28: dur khrod sogs par mtshan mo gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-29: gcer bur rgyu ba 'am bla ma smod //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-30: 'khrig pa tshul min spyod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-31: gtsang sbra med par lha mchod dang //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-32: mi gtsang gzhan dang 'dres pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-33: sbyin sreg sngags gtor mchod sbyin rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-34: phyin ci log tu byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-35: mdor na nyin re spyod sogs pas //
T13TD4312.3E:107b-36: spyod ba brtan pa las 'das pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-0: gdon de rnams 'dzin cing glags skabs tshol ba'i rgyu ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa la brtson @108a * //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-2: sngon chad mi dge ba'i las byas par gyur pa smin cing nyams su myong ba'i dus la bab pa dag ni gdon de la 'jug pa'i glags skabs yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-3: de bzhin du gcig pu grogs med par khang stong la sogs par gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108a-6: bas mtha' la sogs par mtshan mo gnas shing nyal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108a-7: de bzhin du dus su phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing gos spang pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108a-8: de bzhin du mchod par 'os pa'i bla ma rnams la smod cing brnyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108a-9: dus tshigs dag tu spyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108a-10: bud med zla mtshan dang ldan pa la 'khrig pa spyod par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108a-11: gtsang sbra'i spyod pa med par lha la mchod par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108a-12: gzhan bu btsas shing mi gtsang ba dag dang 'dres shing reg pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108a-13: sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i las phyin ci log tu byed cing de'i brtul zhugs nyams pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:108a-14: mdor na nyin re zhing rtag tu spyad pa'i le'u las smos pa'i spyod pa dag las 'das par gyur pa de thams cad ni gdon 'jug pa'i glags skabs kyi rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-15: lha yi gdon gyi yar ngo yi //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-16: tshes gcig bcu gsum dag la 'dzin //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-18: gdon de dag las lha'i gdon 'dzin ba'i dus ni yar ngo'i tshes gcig dang bcu gsum pa la 'dzin par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-19: lha min gdon ni yar ngo yi //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-20: bcu gsum mar ngo'i bcu gnyis la //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-22: lha ma yin gyi gdon yar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum dang mar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis la 'dzin par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-23: dri za'i gdon ni bcu bzhi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-24: bcu gnyis dag la 'ang 'dzin par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-26: dri za'i gdon gyis ni mar ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi dang bcu gnyis la 'dzin par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-27: klu gdon tshes lnga la 'dzin byed //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-29: klu'i gdon ni zla ba yar ngo'i tshes lnga la 'dzin to //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-30: gnod sbyin gdon ni yar ngo yi //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-31: tshes bdun bcu gcig dag la 'dzin //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-33: gnod sbyin gyi gdon zhes bya ba nor gyi bdag po'i gdon ni zla ba yar ngo'i tshes bdun dang bcu gcig dag la 'dzin no //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-34: tshangs pa srin po yar ngo yi //
T13TD4312.3E:108a-35: tshes brgyad bco lnga dag la 'dzin //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-0: tshangs pa srin po zhes bya ba'i gdon ni tshes brgyad dang @108b zla ba la mi la 'dzin par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-1: srin po sha za sogs mar ngo'i //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-2: tshes gcig tshes dgu bcu gcig la /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-4: srin po la sogs pa'i gdon ni mar ngo'i tshes gcig dang tshes dgu dang bcu gcig la 'dzin to //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-5: mtshun lha gnam stong tshes bcu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-6: brgyad dang dgu pa dag la 'dzin //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-8: mtshun lhar gtogs pa'i gdon ni gnam stong la sogs pa la 'dzin no //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-9: rgan po la sogs gzhan dag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-10: phal cher dus de'i thun mtshams la'o //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-13: pha ma la sogs pa las gdon du gyur pa gzhan dag la ni phal cher tshes brgyad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-14: tshes dgu dag la nyin mtshan gyi thun mtshams la 'dzin par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-15: lha yi gdon gyis dbang byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-17: lta stangs zhi zhing khro ba med //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-18: tshig nyung rdul dang bshang gci nyung /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-19: kha zas la ni gnod pa med //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-20: lha dang bram ze la rab dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-21: gtsang zhing sam skri ta'i skad smra //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-22: yun ring nas ni mig 'dzums shing //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-23: lus dri zhim zhing mchog ster byed //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-24: gos phreng dkar po chu bo dang //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-25: ri mtho khang pa mtho la dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-26: gnyid med tshugs pa med pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-28: gdon de dag las lha'i gdon gyis zin cing dbang du byas pa'i rtags ni gdong padma kha phye ba 'dra ba ltar mdangs dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-29: lta stangs zhi zhing mi sdug pa med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-30: khro zhing 'khrug pa med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-31: tshig nyung zhing rdul dang bshang gci nyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-32: kha zas la mi gdu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-33: lha dang bram ze la dga' zhing mchod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-34: gtsang zhing khrus la sogs pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-35: sam skri ta'i skad du smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-36: mig yun ring zhig nas 'dzums par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-37: lus la dri zhim po'i ngad dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-40: gos dkar po la sogs pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-41: mtshan mo gnyid yar zhing chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-42: gzhan gyis tshugs pa med cing zil gyis mi non te /
T13TD4312.3E:108b-43: de lta bu'i mi de ni lha'i gdon gyis dbang du byas pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-44: lha min gdon gyis zin pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-45: yon bor blta zhing rang bzhin ngan //
T13TD4312.3E:108b-46: lha dang bla ma bram ze dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-2: khro zhing rtsol ba che ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-3: nga ni drag po khyab 'jug dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-4: skem byed brgya byin yin zhes bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-5: sha dang chang la dga' zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-6: dri za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-7: rang spyod la dga' lus dri zhim //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-8: snying dga' glu dang gar yang byed //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-9: khrus dang skyed mos tshal la dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-10: gos phreng byug pa dmar la sred //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-11: sgeg dang rtsed mo la mngon dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-12: klu yi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-13: mig dmar khro zhing mig 'gyur lta //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-14: yon por 'gro zhing blta ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-15: nyin mtshan dbugs rgod lce las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-16: kha chu 'dzag cing kha 'gram lhag / bu ram 'o ma khrus la dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-17: kha bub tu ni nyal bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-18: gdugs mthong na yang 'jigs pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-20: de la klu'i gdon gyis zin pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rtags ni mig dmar zhing khrag gis khyab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109a-21: khro zhing zhe sdang ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109a-22: 'gyur ba med cing mig mi 'gyur bar lta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109a-23: sbrul ltar yon por 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109a-24: g-yo zhing mi brtan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109a-25: nyin dang mtshan du rgyun du dbugs rgod cing 'byin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109a-28: mchu gnyis kyi mtshams kyi kha 'gram lhag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109a-29: bu ram la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109a-31: khrus dang gtsang sbra la dga' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-32: kha bub tu gdong phab ste nyal bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109a-33: gdugs mthong na 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-34: gnod sbyin gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-35: mig dmar bgrang cing skrag la 'gul //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-36: lus dri zhim zhing gzi mdangs ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-37: gtam dang glu dang khrus dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-38: phreng ba byug pa la dga' zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-39: nya yi sha sred dga' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-40: dga' mgu stobs che nad med la //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-41: lag rtse bskyod cing su zhig la //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-42: ci zhig sbyin zhes smra bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-43: gsang tshig smra zhing sman pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-44: bram ze la ni brnyas par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-45: khro ba chung zhing mgyogs 'gro ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:109a-47: de la gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni mig dmar ba bgrad cing skrag pa'i tshul du 'gul ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109a-48: lus la bsod nams kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-0: gzi mdangs bzang po @109b dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-1: gtam la sogs pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-2: nya'i sha la sred cing mngon par 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-3: dga' ba dang mgu ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-4: lus kyi stobs che ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-5: nad med par bad bar gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-6: lag pa'i rtse mo bskyod cing 'gul ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-7: srog chags gang zhig la nor la sogs pa ci zhig sbyin par bya zhes smra bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-8: gsang zhing spa bar bya ba'i dngos po smra bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-9: sman pa dang bram ze la sogs pa la brnyas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-10: khro ba chung zhing cung zad tsam khro bar byed pa dang mgyogs par 'gro ba ste //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-11: mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-12: tshangs pa srin pos zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-13: dgod cing gar la dga' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-14: spyod pa gtum zhing glags skabs tshol //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-15: gshe zhing myur du 'gro ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-16: sman pa bram ze lha la sdang //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-17: rang la shing dang mtshon sogs rdeg / kye zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-18: bstan bcos rig byed 'don pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-20: tshangs pa srin po zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni dgod pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-21: gar byed pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-22: lus ngag gi spyod pa gtum zhing 'jigs su rung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-23: glags skabs tshol zhing dor thabs byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-24: gshe zhing tshig ngan pa smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-26: sman pa la sogs pa la sdang pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-27: rang gi lus la shing la sogs pas brdeg pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-28: kye kye zhes 'bod par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:109b-30: rig byed kyi tshig 'don cing smra bar byed pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-31: srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-32: khro gnyer bcas shing khro bar lta //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-33: stobs bag tu ni byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-34: rdeg cing rab tu rgyug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-35: du zhing gdong ni 'jigs rung ston //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-36: zas ma zos kyang stobs dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-37: gnyid med mtshan mo rgyu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-38: ngo tsha gtsang sbra med cing dpa' //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-39: gdug cing tshig rtsub smra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-40: khro zhing phreng ba dmar po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-41: bud med sha chang khrag la dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-42: sha 'am khrag ni mthong ba na //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-43: mchu ni ldag par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:109b-44: zas za'i tshe na dgod pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-0: srin po'i gdon gyis zin par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni dpral bar khro gnyer @110a * //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-1: dang bcas pa'i khro bas lta bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-2: brtags shing g-yo ba dang bcas pas rdeg par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-3: rab tu rgyug cing 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-4: skad kyi nga ro chen pos du ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-5: gdong 'jigs su rung ba ston pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-6: kha zas ma zos kyang lus stobs dang ldan pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:110a-8: mtshan mo rgyu zhing 'gro ba la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-10: gtsang sbra med cing khrus la sogs pa la mi dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-12: gdug cing las ngan pa byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-13: tshig rtsub cing rno bar smra ba dang khro zhing 'khrug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-14: phreng ba dmar po la sogs pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-15: sha 'am khrag mthong na mchu ldag cing 'jib par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-16: zas za ba'i tshe dgod par gyur pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-17: de lta bu'i mi ni srin po zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa yin par brjod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-18: sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-19: sems ni bde bar mi gnas shing //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-20: yongs su rgyug par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-21: mi gtsang la dga' glu gar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-22: dgod dang chang dang sha rlon dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-23: spyos na gdod ni zhum ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-24: rgyu med par ni du ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-25: bdag nyid sen mos 'brung pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-26: khong rtsub lus nyams skad gsang dma' //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-27: sdug bsngal ba ni brda sprod cing //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-29: dran pa nyams zhing gnas stong dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-30: mi brtan gcer bu dri ma can //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-31: srang bar 'khyams pa'i gos gyon zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-32: rtsva yi phreng ba rgyan du thogs //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-33: shing 'dzeg rta la zhon par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-34: de bzhin phyag dar phung por 'dzeg /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-35: mang du za bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-37: sha za'i gdon gyis zin cing dbang du byas pa'i mtshan ma ni sems mal na mi gnas shing sdug bsngal la blo kun du phyogs pas yul thams cad rgyug par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110a-38: mi gtsang pa dang spags pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-39: glu la sogs pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-40: spyos shid brgyab na gdong zhum zhum por gyur cing spa bkod ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-41: gdung ba'i rgyu med par du ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110a-42: rang nyid kyi lus la sen mos 'brud pa dang khong rtsub cing mdangs nyams la skad 'gag par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-0: sdug bsngal brda @110b sprod cing smre bar byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-1: rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i tshig 'brel pa dang mi 'brel pa mang du smra ba dang dran pa nyams shing brgyal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-2: skye bo med pa'i gnas stong pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-3: mi brtan zhing g-yo ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-4: gcer bur 'dug cing gos med par gnas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-6: srang bar na 'khyam zhing ltung pa'i gos ngan ngon gon pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-7: rtsva phreng bar lhas rgyan du thogs pa dang shing la 'dzeg pa la sogs pa la dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-8: kha zas mang du za bar byed pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-9: mi de lta bu ni sha za'i gdon gyis brlabs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-10: yi dags gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-11: spyod tshul dri ni yi dags 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-12: sngar zhing zas la mi dga' dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-13: rtsa gcod byed pa zhes kyang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-15: mi yi dags kyi gdon gyis brlabs pa'i rtags sam mtshan ma ni spyod pa dang dbyibs dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-16: dri yi dags dang 'dra ba dang sngar zhing 'jigs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-17: kha zas mi dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-18: rtsa gcod par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-19: grul bum gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-20: tshig mang smra zhing kha gdong gnag / dal gyis 'gro bar byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-21: rlig pa skrang zhing 'phyang ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-23: mi grul bum gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni tshig 'brel pa dang mi 'brel pa dang mang du smra ba dang kha gdong gi mdog gnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-24: rang gi gnas na dal gyis 'gro zhing la byams pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-25: rlig pa skrangs pa dang bcas shing shas cher 'phyang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-26: mi ni byad stems zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-27: shing dang bong ba sogs thogs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-28: tshal ba gyon te 'gro ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-29: gcer bur rgyug cing 'jigs bag tu //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-30: lta la rtsva yi rgyan du byed //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-31: dur khrod gnas ni stong pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-32: srang bar shing gcig brten pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-33: til zas sha dang chang la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-34: rtag tu mig ni tshag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-35: tshig rtsub de ni smra ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:110b-37: mi byad stems zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni shing la sogs pa thogs shing /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-38: gos kyi tshal pa dum bur gyon te /
T13TD4312.3E:110b-41: 'jigs shing rtabs bag tu lta ba dang rtsva'i rgyan thogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:111a-1: la sogs par brten cing 'dug par dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:111a-2: til la sogs pa la dga' zhing rtag tu de la lta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:111a-3: tshig rtsub par smra ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:111a-4: de lta bu ni byad stems kyi gdon gyis zin pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-6: g-yengs byed kyis ni zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-7: chu 'dod zas ni mi slong dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-8: dngangs shing mig ni dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-9: tshig rtsub smra ba shes par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-11: mi g-yengs byed ces bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni rtag tu chu 'dod cing slong gi zas slong bar mi byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:111a-12: dngang bag dang bcas pa'i mig dmar pos lta ba dang tshig rtsub cing gzhan la gnod par smra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-13: ro langs gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-14: dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-15: tshig bden smra la yongs su 'dar //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-16: gnyid che bar ni shes par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-18: mi ro langs zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni /
T13TD4312.3E:111a-19: dri dang phreng ba bsten par dga' ba dang dam bcas pa la brten cing tshig bden par smra ba dang lus 'dar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-20: yi dags mtshun lha'i gdon gyi rtags //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-21: mig mi gsal zhing bzhin ras zhum //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-22: rkan ni skam par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-23: mig dang rdzi ma skyod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-24: gnyid che me drod chung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-25: g-yon phyogs nas ni gos gon zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-26: sha dang bu ram til la dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-27: tshig 'khrul pa ni yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-29: yi dags mtshun lha zhes bya ba nye du shi ba las gdon du gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni mig mi gsal zhing rab rib tu 'gyur ba dang bzhin ras zhum zhing gsang dma' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:111a-30: rkan gyi phyogs skam pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-31: mig gi rdzi ma g-yo ba dang gnyid che ba nas tshig 'khrul zhing cal col du smra ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-32: bla ma drang srong rgan dang drug / dmod pa sems kyi rjes mthun pa //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-33: spyod lam kha zas rang bzhin la //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-34: ci 'dra gdon ni de yin bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:111a-36: bla ma dang rgan po la sogs pa bzhi po dag gi gdon gyis zin pa ni dmod pa btab pa dang sems kyis bsam pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:111b-0: de bzhin du de'i spyod lam dang kha zas kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra ba las gdon @111b yang de 'dra ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-1: gzhon nu'i tshogs kyi rjes 'brang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-2: gcer bu skra ni gyen du brdzes //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-3: yid mi bde zhing dus yun ring //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-4: gyur pa'i gdon de 'ang spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-6: byis pa gzhon nu'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rgyu ba dang gcer bur gnas shing skra gyen du brdzes pa dang yid mi bde zhing sems gnod par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:111b-7: gdon gyis zin nas dus yun ring por lon pa'i gdon dang bcas pa de ni gsor mi rung bas yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-8: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying bo'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-9: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-10: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi ba'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:111b-12: // / de nas gdon nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-14: gang du gdon gyis zin pa'i nad gso ba ston pa'i le'u gang yin pa de bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-17: bzlas dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-18: brtul zhugs tshul khrims mnyam 'jog dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-19: sbyin zhes brtse ba sogs pas bsal //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-21: 'byung po'i gdon ni gzhan la 'tshe zhing srog gcod pa mi 'dod pa dang gtor ma 'dod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:111b-22: 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'dod pa'i gdon gsor mi rung ba dag ni bzlas pa la sogs pa dang brtul zhugs kyi dka' thub dang /
T13TD4312.3E:111b-23: tshul khrims la sogs pa bsten pas de bsal zhing gzhom par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-24: shing kun ba la tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-25: gla rtsi sgog skya aa rga'i rtsa //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-26: spang spos aa za lo mi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-27: la ba 'bam po ku ku ti ;
T13TD4312.3E:111b-28: / shu dag gandha bri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-29: sar pa gan da til dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-30: ka ka aan da ram nye ba //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-31: snu ha kar ka ta shring gi / sle tres ma h'a na ba li //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-32: yungs kar dang ni lig bu mig / gdon 'joms sman ni gzhan dag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-33: bong bu rta dang khyi dang lug / rnga mo khva dang dred dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-34: sre mo reg 'jom byi la gung //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-35: ba glang seng ge stag dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-36: rgya mtsho yi ni srog chags kyi //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-37: pags pa mkhris pa sen mo so //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-38: sde tshan 'di dang mar rnying dam //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-39: til mar dag ni bskol ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-40: btung dang snar ni blugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-41: bsku ba'i don du sbyar bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:111b-42: 'di dag phye mas bdug pa bya //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-2: shing kun la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan 'di dang mar rnying pa 'am til mar bskol te mar ram til mar te btung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:112a-3: sna nas btang pa dang lus la bsku ba'i don du sbyar bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:112a-4: de bzhin du sman 'di dag gi phye ma'i dud pas bdug pa yang sbyar bar bya'o ;
T13TD4312.3E:112a-5: / cha ba gsum ni pi pi ling la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-6: gla rtsi ni ne ba li ste la la ni ni ba li zhes bya ba gla rtsi ma yin gyi skabs 'dir ldong ros la bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-8: aarka'i rtsa ba ni shing aarka'i rtsa ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-9: aa za lo mi ni mi sha byi lo tsan zhes bya ba'i sman no //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-10: la ba ni go ro mi'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-12: ku ku ti ni lag mna'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-13: gandha pri yang ku ni la t'a zhes bya ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-14: sar pa gan da ni gan da na gu li'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-15: ka kan da ni ka na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-16: snu ha ni shr'i khanda'i shing ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-18: gdon 'joms sman ni gdon sel ba'i sman la sogs pa ji snyed ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-19: bong bu la sogs pa'i pags pa la sogs pa ji snyed pa gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-20: 'di yi ri lu byas nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-21: mig sman sna sman bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-22: 'di yi lde gus byug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-23: bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-25: shing kun la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan 'di dag ri lur byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:112a-26: mig sman du bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:112a-28: yang shing kun la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag gi lde gus lus la byug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:112a-29: yang sman de dag bskol ba'i khu bas lus la blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-30: sbyor ba 'dis ni smyo byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-31: brjed byed bcas pa'i gdon zhi byed //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-33: shing kun la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'dis ni smyo byed dang brjed byed kyi gdon gang dag yin pa de zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-34: yungs kar ha ti pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-35: pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-36: skyu ru ra dang go da dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-37: sre mo byi la dza sha yi //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-38: mkhris pa dang btags sna sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-39: bsku byug byugs sogs byas gdon 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-41: yungs kar la sogs pa'i sman srog chags go da la sogs pa'i mkhris pa dang btags te /
T13TD4312.3E:112a-42: sna sman la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na yang smyo byed la sogs pa'i gdon 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:112a-43: yungs kar shing kun shu dag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-0: pri yang ku dang @112b ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-1: gi ri ka ra ni dkar nag gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-2: 'bras bu gsum dang shve ta dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-3: nim pa'i lo ma ka ranydza //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-4: shri sha gnyis dang sa bon dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-5: thang shing dang ni tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-6: mar dang ba gcin de'i bzhi 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-7: bskol ba don grub ces bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-8: btung dang snar blugs pa sbyar na //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-9: gdon ni thams cad myur 'joms byed //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-10: mchog tu lha min gdon sel byed //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-11: brjed byed dug dang bkra mi shis //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-12: smyo byed gshed byed rims rnams 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-14: yungs kar dang shu dag la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:112b-15: mar dang mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi ba gcin dang /
T13TD4312.3E:112b-16: bskol ba'i sman mar ni ming don grub ces bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:112b-17: de btung ba la sogs par sbyar na gdon thams cad myur du 'joms par byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:112b-18: mchog gam khyad par du lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams 'joms par byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:112b-19: de bzhin du brjed byed nas rims kyi bar yang 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-20: sman de nyid ni ra thug gi / gcin dang sbyar te blud pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-21: snar blugs mig sman byug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-22: khrus dang dril ba las sbyar ba //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-23: sngar bshad yon tan dang 'dra zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-24: rgyal po'i sgor yang don grub byed //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-26: yungs kar la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag nyid ra thug gi gcin dang sbyar te lde gur byas la blud pa la sogs par sbyar na gdon thams cad 'joms pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan zhing de bzhin du rgyal po'i sgor yang don grub par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-27: yungs kar shu dag tshab gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-28: aa shvo gandha ser po gnyis //
