T13TD4312.3E:112b-29: shing kun kun dong rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-30: ka ranydza yi sa bon dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-31: shi ri sha yi me tog dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-32: ka pid tha yi 'bras bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-33: rgya mtsha [?] ru rta rgya spos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-34: gi ri kar ni dkar po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-35: son ka yi rtsa bar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-36: ra gcin dag dang legs bsgos shing //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-37: ba glang mkhris pa bu ram dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-38: ri lur byas pa'i sbyor ba de //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-39: mig bskus snar blugs bsku byas na //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-40: smyo byed rma ni red pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-41: mtshan mo mi mthong mun thibs byed //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-42: bgegs dang lus chur nub pas brgyal //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-43: dug bskus mda' yis phog pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:112b-44: gdug pa'i sbrul gyis zin pa sel //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-3: kun dong rtsa ba ni sgog pa kun dong zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-4: gzhan dag ni go bar zad de /
T13TD4312.3E:113a-5: sman de dag thams cad ra gcin dang legs par spangs shing bsrel la de'i 'og tu ba glang gi mkhris pa dang bu ram dang sbyar te ri lur byas pa'i sbyor ba de mig tu bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:113a-7: lus la bskus na smyo byed la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-8: ras bal sa bon rma bya'i sgro //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-9: me tog sman ma bri ha ti //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-10: shing tsha spang spos po son cha //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-11: byi la'i rtug pa phub ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-12: shu dag mi skra sbrul lpags dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-13: glang po'i so dang glang gi rva //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-14: shing kun dang ni na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-15: cha mnyam bdugs par byas pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-16: skem byed smyo byed sha za'i rigs //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-17: srin po lha yi gdon 'joms mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:113a-18: ras bal gyi sa bon la sogs pa'i sman 'di rnams cha snyoms te sbyar ba'i dud pas bdugs na skem byed la sogs pa'i gdon sel bar byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-19: skem byed ni gzhon nu'i gdon yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-20: gandha bha dra tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-21: gur gum pi pi ling rtsa ba //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-22: kanda ka ri skyer pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-23: thang shing dang ni yungs kar gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-24: pa la dkar dang dug mo yungs //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-25: tsandan dkar po rgyam tsha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-26: 'bras bu gsum dang pu shel tse //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-27: shu dag spangs ma pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-28: tsandan dmar po ba la dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-29: shing mngar sug smel ldong ros dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-30: shug pa rgya spos shri pas //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-31: ma du ka yi snying po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-32: bong nga gnyis po bri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-33: dbyi mo ru rta skyer khanda //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-34: cha snyoms zhib btags lde gu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-35: mar rnying gcin kun cha snyoms bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-36: gdon khus 'debs zhes bya bar brjod //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-37: de blud gdon 'joms mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-39: yungs kar gnyis ni yungs kar ser po dang dmar po'i mdog gis phye ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-40: ba la ka ni aam pu'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-41: tsandan dmar po ni lo hi ta ste /
T13TD4312.3E:113a-42: la la dag tsandan dmar po ma yin gyi btsod la bya'o zhes kyang zer ro //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-43: shri be ta ni shri pa sa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-44: ma du ka'i snying po ni ma du ka'i me tog gam /
T13TD4312.3E:113a-45: shing ma du ka'i dbus kyi cha na yod pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-46: pri yang ku ni gandha pri yang ku'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-47: bong nga gnyis ni bong nga dkar po dang nag po'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113a-48: gzhan dag ni go bar zad de /
T13TD4312.3E:113b-0: sman de dag thams cad @113b cha snyoms te /
T13TD4312.3E:113b-1: zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu dang mar rnying pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:113b-2: gcin brgyad po kun cha snyoms te mar ji tsam yod pa gcin re re yang de tsam du byas pa dang bsres te bskol pa'i sman mar ni gdon khus 'debs zhes slob dpon gyis bshad de blud cing bsku ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na gdon thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-3: rgya spos shing mngar ka ranydza //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-4: rgya skyegs da ta pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-5: shu dag shing kun pa ta la //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-6: yungs kar kanda ka ri dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-7: ser po gnyis dang pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-8: rgya shug gandha pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-9: tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-10: thang shing sle tres byi dang ga ;
T13TD4312.3E:113b-11: / ko sha ta ki ka kan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-12: shi kru nim pa dug mo yungs //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-13: shir sha'i me tog sa bon dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-14: gla sgang ru rta dan da dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-15: gi ri kar ni tsi tra ka / bil ba cha mnyam lde gur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-16: mar rnying can gyi sde tshan bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-17: bskol te yun ring gzhag pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-18: khus 'debs chen po zhes bshad de //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-19: rim pa kun gyis sbyar na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-20: gdon rnams kun dang smyo byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-21: mdze dang rims ni myur du 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-23: rgya spos ni ta ka ru'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-24: ser po gnyis ni yung ba dang skyer pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-25: rgya shug ni rgya shug skyur po'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-26: ka kan da ni ma ha ka'i 'bras bu'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-27: shi kru ni so ban dza na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-28: gzhan dag ni go bar zad de sman de dag thams cad cha snyoms te lde gur byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:113b-29: mar rnying pa dang gcin gyi sde tshan chang gi sde tshan gyi nang nas bshad pa'i gcin brgyad po dang bcas par bskol te dus yun ring por gzhag pa'i rnying pa de ni khus 'debs chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:113b-30: de rim pa kun gyis zhes pa btung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:113b-32: bsku ba dang sbyar na gdon gyi nad thams cad dang smyo byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-33: mdze'i nad rims la sogs pa myur du 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-34: gdon ni nyi ma gang gang la //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-35: 'dzin pa'i nyi ma de dang der //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-36: mchog tu sbyin sreg gtor ma sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-37: sman pas rab tu 'bad de bya //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-39: gdon gang zhig nyin zhag gang la 'dzin par byed pa'i nyin zhag de la sbyin sreg dang gtor ma la sogs pa gdon bzlog pa'i thabs sman pas 'bad de sbyar te bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-40: khrus dang gos dang sha dang tshil //
T13TD4312.3E:113b-41: chang dang mar dang bu ram sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-2: de'i tshe de ni de la sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-4: gdon gang zhig khrus la sogs pa gang zhig la sred cing 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe gdon de la khrus la sogs pa dag sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-5: rin chen dri dang phreng ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-6: sa bon mar dang sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-7: zas kun kun la sbyin bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-10: gdon thams cad la rin chen te rdo rje dang bee d'urya dang /
T13TD4312.3E:114a-13: dri zhim pa sbyar ba'i dri dang /
T13TD4312.3E:114a-14: sna ma'i me tog la sogs pa'i me tog dri zhim pa'i phreng ba dang sa bon de'i sran mud ga dang /
T13TD4312.3E:114a-15: mon sran gre'u la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:114a-16: mar dang sbrang rtsi dang la du la sogs pa'i zas kun gdon thams cad la sbyin par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:114a-17: cho ga 'di ni spyi'i thun mong gi cho ga yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-19: lha dang drang srong bla ma rgan //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-20: grub la lha yi gnas su sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-21: der yang lha yi gdon la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-22: byang gi phyogs su gtor ma sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-24: lha la sogs pa'i gdon lnga po dag la ni lha'i gnas te /
T13TD4312.3E:114a-25: lha gnas pa'i khang par gtor ma sbyin par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:114a-26: der yang lha'i gdon la ni byang gi phyogs su gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-27: lha min gdon la ci 'dod par //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-28: mtshams kyi gnas su nub tu sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-30: lha ma yin gyi gdon la ni ci ltar 'dod par grong gi mtshams zhes bya bar grong ngam yul gyi phyi rol du nub phyogs su sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-31: dri za'i gdon ni ba glang ngam //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-32: gos dang rgyan bcas gtor ma sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-34: dri za'i gdon la ni ba glang rgyu ba'i lam du gos dang rgyan dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-36: klu la shar lho'i mtshams su sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-39: klu'i gdon la ni 'bab chu'i 'gram du gtor ma sbyin par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:114a-40: de las kyang klu'i gdon la ni shar lho'i mtshams su gnas te gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-41: gnod sbyin rang gi gnas sam ni //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-42: chu gnyis 'dus pa'i gnas su sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-44: gnod sbyin gyi gdon la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:114a-45: gnod sbyin gyi gnas su byas pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:114a-46: yang na chu bo gnyis 'dus pa'i gnas su gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:114a-47: srin po lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-0: tshang tshing @114b 'jigs su rung bar sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-1: srin po'i lho'i phyogs su sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-2: tshangs pa'i srin po shar du sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-4: srin po dang tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon gnyis la ni lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:114b-5: nags kyi tshang tshing 'jigs su rung bar gtor ma sbyin par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:114b-6: de las kyang srin po'i gdon la ni lho phyogs su sbyin par bya la //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-7: tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon la ni shar phyogs su gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-8: sha za la ni khang stong du //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-9: nub phyogs su ni gnas te sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-11: sha za'i gdon la ni khang stong du nub phyogs su gnas te gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-12: phreng ba gtsang zhing dkar po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-13: dri dang 'o thug 'bras cha na dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-14: zho dang gdugs ni dkar po yi //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-15: lha rnams kyi ni gtor mar 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-17: lha'i gdon la ni phreng ba gtsang zhing dkar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:114b-18: aa ka ru la sogs pa'i dri dang /
T13TD4312.3E:114b-19: 'o thug dang 'bras chan dang zho dang gdugs dkar po'i gtor ma bshams shing 'dod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-20: shing kun yungs kar shu dag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-21: tsha ba gsum ni srang phyed phyed //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-22: mar bre gang dang ba yi gcin //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-23: bzhi 'gyur dang ni lhan cig bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-24: der btung snar blugs bskus pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-25: lha'i gdon las thar bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-27: de ltar gtor ma byin yang ma zhin sman gyi sbyor ba bya ba ni shing kun la sogs pa'i sman srang phyed phyed dang /
T13TD4312.3E:114b-29: ba'i gcin bre bzhi dang lhan cig bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:114b-30: mar de btung pa la sogs par sbyar na lha'i gdon las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-31: shu dag shing kun sgog skya rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-32: ra gcin sbyar ba snar blugs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-33: mig bskus lha yi gdon las thar //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-35: gzhan yang shu dag la sogs pa'i sman ra gcin dang sbyar te sna sman la sogs pa byas na yang lha'i gdon las thar par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-36: lha min gtor ma 'bras bu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-37: mang po dag dang pu shel tse //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-39: lha ma yin gyi gdon la ni gtor ma 'bras bu shing thog la sogs pa mang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:114b-40: de bzhin du pu shel tse dang padma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:114b-41: autpal dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-42: klu yi gdon la dz'a ti dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-43: 'bras yos bu ram snum khur dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-44: 'bras chan bu ram bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-45: zas mchog sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-46: sa nag n'a ga ge sar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-47: shu dag padma pu shel tse //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-48: autpa la padma dmar po yi //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-49: 'dab mar bcas pa'i gtor ma byin //
T13TD4312.3E:114b-52: dz'a ti zhes bya ba'i sna ma'i me tog dang /
T13TD4312.3E:114b-53: 'bras yos la sogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:115a-0: @115a * // snum khur dang 'bras chan gnyis ka yang bu ram dang bcas par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:115a-1: zas mchog ces bya ba'o thug dang sa nag ni sor shi ta zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-2: seng phrom 'o ma dkar po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-3: rgya spos n'a ga ge sar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-4: yungs kar chu grang la btags bas //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-5: snar blugs mig la bskus pa'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-7: seng phrom 'o ma dkar po yod pa dang rgya spos la sogs pa dang yungs kar dkar po'i chu grang la btags te snar blugs pa dang mig sman du byas na yang klu'i gdon gyis zin pa la phan zhing thar bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-8: gnod sbyin gdon la 'o ma zho //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-9: mar dang 'bras chan bsres pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-10: gu gul padma thang shing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-11: pu shel tse dang gos dang gser //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-12: dbyig ni gtor ma sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-14: gnod sbyin gyi gdon la ni 'o ma la sogs ba'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-15: gser dang dbyig ni bzor byas pa dang ma byas pa'i dbye bas tha dad bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-16: rgyan la sogs pa byas pa ni dbyig ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-17: mar dang 'o ma ba gcin ni //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-18: cha snyoms bskol ba btung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-19: snar blugs lus la bskus na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-21: mar la sogs pa gsum po cha snyoms te bskol la blud pa la sogs pa byas na yang gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa la phan no /
T13TD4312.3E:115a-22: aa ru ra dang ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-23: sgog skya shu dag na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-24: nim pa'i lo mar gcin btags //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-25: lde gus sna sman mig sman bya //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-27: aa ru ra la sogs pa'i sman ra gcin dang btags pa'i lde gu btsir ba sna sman la sogs pa byas na yang gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-28: tshangs pa srin po'i gtor ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-29: nas bre bzhi ni btsos pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-30: chu bre bcu drug til btags bsres //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-31: gdugs dang gos dang byug pa sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-33: tshangs pa srin po'i gdon la ni nas bre bzhi btsos pa'i chan gyi gtor ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:115a-34: de bzhin du chu bre bcu drug dang til mar btags pa bsres pa'i dang gdugs dang gos kyi rnam pa'i dang /
T13TD4312.3E:115a-35: gur kum la sogs pa'i byug pa sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-36: seng ldeng srang ni nyi shu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-37: tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-38: shing kun shu dag shu ti dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115a-39: yungs kar nim pa'i lo mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-0: @115b sgog skya srang ni phyed phyed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-1: zhun mar phul ni bdun dag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-2: ba gcin sum 'gyur bskol ba de //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-3: btung dang snar blugs bskus na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-5: seng ldeng srang nyi shu bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du tsha ba gsum la sogs ba srang phyed phyed lde gur byas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-6: zhun mar phul bdun dang ba gcin mar gyi sum 'gyur lhan cig bsres te bskol la sman mar de btung ba la sogs par btang yang tshangs pa srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-7: srin po'i gdon la til phye dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-9: sha btsos rjen pa nim pa pa //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-10: khrag dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-12: srin po'i gdon la ni til gyi phye ma dang me tog dkar po dang 'bras chan 'dres ma ste /
T13TD4312.3E:115b-13: 'bras chan dang mud ga la sogs pa'i chan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-14: sha btsos pa dang rjen pa dang nim pa zhes bya ba rtsa 'bru'i rnam pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:115b-15: khrag gi gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-16: nag ta ma la shi ri sha //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-17: shun lpags me tog 'bras bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-18: de bzhin pa ta la nag po //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-19: pil ba'i rtsa ba tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-20: shing kun yungs kar dug mo nyung //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-21: sgog skya skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-22: ra gcin dang ni sbyar ba'i sman //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-23: snar blugs mig tu byugs na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-25: nag ta ma la sogs pa'i sman ra gcin dang sbyar ba'i sna sman dang mig sman btang na srin po'i gdon gyis btab pa las thar par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-26: 'di dag nyid dang mar gyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-27: bzhi 'gyur ba gcin bskol ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-28: btung dang snar blugs bskus pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-29: srin po'i gdon ni zlog par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-31: nag ta ma la dang shri sha'i shun lpags dang me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag nyid dang mar dang mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi ba gcin dang bskol ba'i sman mar btung ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na yang srin po'i gdon sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-32: sha za la ni bu ram chang //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-33: til tshigs til gyi phye ma zho //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-34: la phug lan tshva phye zan mar //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-37: sha za'i gdon la ni bu ram chang la sogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:115b-38: til gyi tshigs ma ni 'ba' cha'o //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-1: la la ni 'byung po'i 'bras chan zhes mi bya'i /
T13TD4312.3E:116a-2: 'byung po'i kha zas zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:116a-4: phye zan ni nas kyi chan no //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-5: ser po rnam gnyis lan tshva btsod //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-6: shu ti dong gra bri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-7: shing kun sgog skya tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-8: 'bras bu gsum dang pa ta li //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-9: shu dag gi ri kar ni dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-10: shi ri sha yi me tog mar //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-11: ba gcin bzhi cha bcas par bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-12: btung dang bsku ba byas na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-14: ser po rnam gnyis la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:116a-15: mar dang ba gcin gyi bzhi cha dang bcas par bsre /
T13TD4312.3E:116a-16: ba gcin mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang bskol ba'i mar btung ba la sogs par byas na sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa la yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-17: yang na de nyid ra gcin btags //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-18: mig bskus snar ni blugs na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-20: yang na ser po rnam gnyis la sogs pa'i sman de nyid dang ra gcin dang lhan cig btags te lde gur byas pa mig tu bskus shing snar blugs na yang sha za'i gdon gyis zin ba la yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-21: lha dang drang srong mtshun lha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-22: dri za'i gdon la sna sman sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-23: rnon po gtang bar mi bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-24: 'di la zhun mar btung la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-25: sman ni 'jam por spyad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-27: lha la sogs pa'i gdon bzhi po la ni sna sman la sogs pa rno zhing drag pa gtang bar mi bya'i /
T13TD4312.3E:116a-28: lha la sogs pa'i gdon 'di la zhun mar dang btung ba la sogs pa'i sman 'jam po gang yin pa de spyad cing gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-29: sha za ma gtogs thams cad la //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-30: mi mthun sbyin par mi bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-31: mthu stobs che ba de khros na //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-32: nad pa sman bar bcas gsod byed //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-34: sha za'i gdon ma gtogs pa gdon thams cad la mi mthun zhing de la gnod par 'gyur ba ci yang sbyin zhing spyad bar mi bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:116a-36: de rnams ni mthu stobs che zhing nus pa dang ldan pa yin bas lha la sogs pa'i gdon de dag la mi mthun pas spyad na khros zhing 'khrugs nas nad pa sman pa dang bcas pa gsod par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug / mgon @116b po phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-1: nad kun gso bar mdzad pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-2: sngags bzlas na ni nad kun sel //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-3: de bzhin smyo byed brjed byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-6: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pa ;
T13TD4312.3E:116b-7: lha'i yang lha phyag bcu gnyis pa nad thams cad gso bar mdzad pa'i sngags ji skad bshad pa dag bzlas na yang gdon thams cad dang brjed byed la sogs pa 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-8: rig sngags rgyal mo rma bya che //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-9: gtsang byas de la rtag tu bsgrags //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-11: yang na nad pa de khrus dang gtsang sbra byas la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i sngags dus thams cad du de'i rna bar bsgrags shing bzlas na yang gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-12: 'byung po'i bdag po lha chen dang //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-13: de yi 'khor gyi tshogs mchod cing //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-14: de yi sngags grub bzlas na yang //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-15: gdon ni thams cad 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-17: 'byung po'i gdon rnams kyi legs ldan lha chen po mchod par bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-18: de bzhin du de'i 'khor gyi tshogs 'joms byed rnams mchod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:116b-19: de'i sngags grub zin pa bzlas par gyur na yang gdon thams cad 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-20: gang yang 'og nas bshad pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-21: le'u gnyis las smos pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-22: gang 'dir bshad pa de dag kun //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-23: phan tshun sbyor ba byas na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-25: gang 'di'i 'og nas bshad pa'i le'u gnyis po smyo byed dang brjed byed ces bya ba'i nad gso ba la smos pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-26: gang le'u 'di las bshad pa de dag thams cad ni phan tshun 'dres mar sbyar zhing sbyor ba byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-27: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:116b-28: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar pa las /
T13TD4312.3E:116b-29: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:116b-31: // / de nas smyo byed gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-33: gdon gyi gso ba las smyo byed dang brjed byed kyi gso ba logs shig tu byas pa ni brjod pa mang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:116b-34: smyo byed nad gzhi re re dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-1: gyur pa drug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:117a-2: smyo byed ni rnam pa drug ste //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-3: rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi re re las gyur pa gsum dang 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:117a-4: sogs pa smos pas sems kyi gdung ba las gyur pa gcig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:117a-5: dug las gyur pa ste drug go //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-6: smyo byed ces bya lus dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-7: sems kyi nad lam log pa ru //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-8: zhugs pas smyos par gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-10: smyo byed ces bya ba ni gang lus dang sems kyi nad lam log par gyur pas yid myos shing ma brtags pa nyid du myos par gyur pa de la ni myos shing brgyal ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-11: bza' btung gnod pa dag dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-12: snying dang ma goms dri mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-13: ma snyoms pa ni bsten pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-14: yid zhum snying stobs chung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-15: nad kyi shugs ni dkrugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-16: rid cing spyod pa ma snyoms dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-17: mchod 'os mchod par mi byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-18: sems las kyis ni sems nyams dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-19: dug dang nye ba'i dug las gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-21: bza' ba dang btung ba gnod bar gyur pa dag gis lus dang sems kyi nad skyed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-22: de bzhin du zas skom rnying pa lo lon pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-24: dri ma can du gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:117a-25: zas skom ma snyoms pa bsten pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-26: de bzhin du yid zhum zhing mi dga' ba dang snying stobs chung zhing nad kyi khyad par gyis 'khrugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:117a-27: lus rid cing nyam chung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-28: spyod pa drag dal ma snyoms pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-29: mchod par 'os pa lha dang bla ma la sogs pa mchod par mi byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-30: sems las kyis yid la gnod par byed pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:117a-31: sems nyams shing ma rungs par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-32: de bzhin du dug dang nye ba'i dug sbyar ba'i dug la sogs pa las smyo byed kyi nad du gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-33: 'di yis snying stobs zhan pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-34: snying gi nad la gnod byas te //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-35: blo ni dri ma can byas te //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-36: yid rgyu ba yi lam bkag nas //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-37: smyo byed dag ni skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-38: de yis blo dang rnam shes dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-39: dran pa 'khrul zhing lus kyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-40: bde dang sdug bsngal las nyams te //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-41: shing rta kha lo sgyur ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-42: med pa lta bur rtsom pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:117a-43: kun kyang bsam pa med par spyod //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-0: sngar bshad pa'i bza' pa dang @117b btung ba gnod pa la sogs pa'i nad kyis snying la gnod par byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-1: blo dri ma'i rnyog ma can du byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-2: yid rgyu pa'i [?] rtsa sbubs kyi lam bkag nas smyo byed kyi nad skyed par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-3: smyo byed des blo la sogs pa 'khrug cing 'khrugs pa dang lus kyi bde ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-5: tshor ba med de thams cad du bsam pa med pa kho nar spyod pa ni dper na ji ltar shing rta kha lo sgyur ba'i skyes bu med pa dang phyogs med par 'khyams ba lta bur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-6: de la rlung gyur lus sbegs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-7: rgyu med du zhing tshig rtsub smra //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-8: dgod dang 'dzum dang gar byed dang /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-9: glu len rol mo byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-10: lus skyod pheg ni rdob pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-11: gling bu pi wang la sogs kyi //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-12: sgra yi lad mo yang yang zlo //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-13: rgyun du kha nas sbu ba 'dzag / phan tshun rgyug cing mang du smra //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-14: rgyan min pas ni rgyan du byed //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-15: bzhon pa min pas 'gro bar rtsom //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-16: kha zas la ni gdu bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-17: de rnyed na ni mi 'dod byed //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-18: mig zlum mig ni dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-19: kha zas zhu nas nad ldang 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-21: de la rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni lus sbegs shing rid ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-22: rgyu med bar du ba nas pheg rdob pa'i bar du byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-23: rgyu med pa ni gnas skabs ma yin pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-24: gang du ngu ba la sogs pa'i bya ba rigs pa dag la ni mi byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-25: mi byed par rigs pa dag la ni byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-26: 'dzum pa ni chung zad dgod pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-27: gling bu la sogs pa'i lad mo byed pa ni de dang rjes su mthun par byed pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-28: rgyan ma yin pa ni rtsa shing la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-30: bzhon pa ma yin pa ni shing las byas pa'i rta la sogs pas 'gro bar rtsom pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-31: kha zas la gdu ba ni zas skom la sogs pa la chags pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-32: rnyed na mi 'dod pa ni de la mngon par mi dga' ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-33: kha zas zhu nas nad ldang ba ni /
T13TD4312.3E:117b-34: nad de stobs can du 'gyur ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-35: gzhan dag ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-36: mkhris las spyo zhing khro ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-37: khu tshur bong bas rdeg cing rgyug / grib mchu ni grang mo 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-38: gcig pu 'dug cing lus mdog ser //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-39: med par me ni 'bar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:117b-40: skar ma mar me mthong ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-0: @118a * // mkhris pa las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni gzhan dag la tshig ngan pas spyo ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:118a-2: khu tshur la sogs pas rdeg cing 'gro ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:118a-4: sa phyogs gang na me 'bar ba la sogs pa med bzhin du me'i phung po la sogs pa mthong ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-5: bad kan slon zhing yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-6: kha zas rtsol dang smra ba nyung //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-7: bud med 'dod cing dben la dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-8: kha chu snabs ni 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-9: 'jigs rung gtsang sbra la mi dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-10: gnyid che gdong ni skrang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-11: nub mo shas cher smyo ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-12: zos ma thag tu ldang ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-14: bad kan las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni slon bro ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-15: yi ga 'chus ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:118a-16: dben par gcig pu 'dug par dga' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-17: 'jigs su rung zhing smad par bya ba la gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:118a-18: gtsang sbra chung ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:118a-19: kha zas zos ma thag tu smyo byed kyi nad shas cher ldang ba'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-20: 'dus pa'i rgyu dang mtshan ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-21: kun ldan de yi bdag nyid can //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-22: smyo byed mi bzang par shes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-23: de ni sman pas yongs su spang //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-25: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni nad gzhi rgyu thams cad dang mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:118a-26: de lta bu ni 'dus pa'i nad de'i bdag nyid can yin la //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-27: smyo byed de ni shin tu mi bzad cing /
T13TD4312.3E:118a-29: gsor mi rung ba'i phyir sman pas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-30: nor dang chung ma sogs bral bas //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-31: brnag dka' ba las sems gdung bas //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-32: smyo zhing zhum la yang yang brgyal //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-33: kyi hud kyi hud smre sngags 'don //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-34: glo bur du ni ngu zhing brgyal //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-35: de yi yon tan mang du sems //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-36: mya ngan gyis gdungs sems khong chud //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-37: gnyid yang rnam par 'khyams pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:118a-39: sems kyi gdung pa na smyo byed ni nor dang chung ma la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba dang bral bas /
T13TD4312.3E:118a-40: brnag dka' ba la sems kyi gdung ba skye la /
T13TD4312.3E:118a-41: de'i dbang gis mdog skya bo 'od 'od por gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:118a-42: sems zhum pa la sogs par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:118b-0: nor ram chung ma dang bral ba de'i yon tan yang dang yang du sems @118b shing mya ngan gyis gdungs pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-1: dug gis gdong ni sngo ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-2: gzi nyams dbang po stobs chung ba //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-3: shugs kyi bar du'ang 'khrul bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-4: mig dmar de ni spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-6: dug las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni mi'i gdong sngo ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-7: gzi mdangs nyams pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:118b-8: bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byin zhing bar du yang 'khrul zhing myos par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:118b-9: mig dmar por 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:118b-10: de yang gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-11: de nas rlung gyur smyo byed la //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-12: dang por snum gyi btung ba blud ;
T13TD4312.3E:118b-14: de nas de dag gi gso ba ni rlung las gyur ba'i smyo byed la ni dang po thog ma kho nar sman mar blud nas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-15: lam 'gags gyur la dang por ni //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-16: snum bcas sbyang ba 'jam po bya //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-18: rtsa sbubs kyi lam 'gags pa las smyo byed du gyur pa la ni dang po kho nar snum dang bcas pa'i skyug sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:118b-19: bkru sman dang 'jam po'i sbyor bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-20: bad kan mkhris gyur dang po ni //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-21: snum dang dugs byas skyug sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-22: bkru sman mas gtong bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-23: mgo bo'i bkru sman dag kyang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-25: bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i smyo byed la ni dang po kho nar snum dang dugs kyi cho ga byas la skyug sman la sogs pa btang bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-26: de ltar lus ni dag byas na //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-27: yid ni dran pa rnyed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-29: tshul de ltar byas pas smyo byed kyis btab ba'i nad pa de'i lus sbyang ba byas pa'i rgyus sems gsal zhing yid dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-30: de lta na yang rjes 'brangs na //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-31: sna sman mig sman rnon po btang //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-32: sems dga' dbugs 'byung skrag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-33: 'jigs dang rdeg dang sdigs mo byed //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-34: lus dril byug dang bsku ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-35: dud brngub sman mar blud pa dag //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-36: sbyar te de ni dag gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-37: yid ni tha mal ba la sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:118b-39: tshul de lta bu'i gso ba byas su zin kyang nad de rjes su 'brang zhing 'brel pa yin na sna sman rnon po la sogs pa btang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:118b-40: sems dga' ba la sogs pa byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:119a-1: yid tha mal par bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-2: shing kun dang ni rtsa bas ru tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-3: tsha ba gsum ni srang gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-4: mar bre bzhi ni ba gcin bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-5: bskol bas smyo byed 'byung po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-6: brjed byed gdon ni sel mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-8: shing kun la sogs pa'i sman srang gnyis gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.3E:119a-9: mar bre bzhi ba gcin dang bcas par bskol ba btung ba la sogs par sbyar na smyo byed la sogs pa sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-10: bra mhi'i khu ba bre do dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-11: mar bre gang dang tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-12: sha ma dur byid bim pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-13: shang ka pushpa dong ga dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:119a-14: / sabta dang byi dang ga / zho ni gnyis gnyis lde gur bskol /
T13TD4312.3E:119a-15: bramhi'i rtsa ba zhes bshad de //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-16: mar ni srang res bskyed de gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-17: che tshad srang bzhi'i bar zos na //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-18: smyo byed brjed byed mdze yi nad //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-19: sel zhing mo gsham bu skyed byed //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-20: skad snyan tshig gsal dran pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-21: yid gzhungs dpal ni skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-23: sman bra mhi bskol ba'i khu ba bre do dang mar bre gang dang /
T13TD4312.3E:119a-24: tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i sman sna re re zho gnyis gnyis kyi lde gu bskol ba ni bra mha'i sman mar zhes bya bar bshad de /
T13TD4312.3E:119a-25: mar de srang gcig nas srang re bskyed de srang bzhi bar du zos na /
T13TD4312.3E:119a-26: mar des smyo byed la sogs pa'i nad sel zhing dpal skyed pa'i bar du byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-27: 'bras bu gsum dang bi sha la //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-28: pa tra ae la thang shing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-29: ae la ba lu ka dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-30: thal tres rnam gnyis ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-31: sthi ra rnam gnyis pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-32: rgya spos ru rta bri ha ti //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-33: n'a ga ge sar dong ga btsod //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-34: se'u 'bru bal bu'i lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-35: dz'a ti kha 'bus byi dang ga / dan da shug pa autpa la //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-36: tsandan dkar po zho gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-37: zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol ba //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-38: dge ba'i sman mar zhes bshad 'dis //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-39: 'byung po'i gdon sogs smyo byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-40: brjed byed lud pa sdig can 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-41: skya rbab g-yan pa skem dang dug / rmongs bag gcin snyi dbyig dug rims //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-42: khu ba med pa'am bu med pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-43: dran pa gdon gyis brlams pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-44: yid gzhungs med cing tshig 'khrul dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-45: dran nyams me drod chung la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:119a-46: stobs skyed bkra shis tshe ring zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-0: mdangs skyed skal ldan @119b lus rgyas byed //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-1: bu skyed byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-3: pa tra ae la ni ha re nu ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-4: ae la ba lu ka ni ma lung ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-5: thal tres rnam gnyis ni sha ri ba dkar bo dang /
T13TD4312.3E:119b-7: ser po gnyis ni yung ba dang skyer ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-8: sthir rnam gnyis ni sa la pa rni dang krishna parni'o //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-9: pri yang ku ni gan dha pri yang ku'o //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-10: dz'a ti ni sna ma'i me tog ste /
T13TD4312.3E:119b-12: autpa la ni autpa la sngon po'o //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-13: gzhan ni grags par zad de sman de dag zho gnyis gnyis kyi tshad du byas pa'i lde gu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-14: zhun mar bre gang bskol ba'i sman mar ni dge ba'i sman mar zhes drang srong dag gis bshad de /
T13TD4312.3E:119b-15: sman mar 'dis ni 'byung po'i dgon la sogs pa 'joms pa nas bu skyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i bar gyi yon tan dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-16: 'di las thal tres rnam gnyis sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-17: nyi shu rtsa gcig chu nang bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-18: de yi khu ba mar dang ba//
T13TD4312.3E:119b-20: me da rnam gnyis ram nye ba //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-21: bum gtsang stong dang kha sral phre'u// bu ram shing dang parni gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-22: bskol ba yin sman mar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-23: dge ba chen po zhes bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-25: snga ma bas kyang yon tan lhag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:119b-26: bshad ma thag pa'i sman 'di dag las dang po'i bdun ma gtogs pa thal tres rnam gnyis la sogs pa sman sna nyi shu rtsa gcig khu ba bskol ba'i cho gas chur bskol te /
T13TD4312.3E:119b-27: sha ri ba rnam gnyis la sogs pa sman sbyir bre gang chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol la sman gyi khu ba bzhi cha lus pa mar bre gang dang ba be'u lan cig skyes pa'i 'o ma bre bzhi dang /
T13TD4312.3E:119b-28: me da rnam gnyis la sogs pa spyir srang brgyad bskol ba'i sman mar ni dge ba chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:119b-29: des lus brtas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:119b-30: 'dus pa'i nad sel bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:119b-31: dge ba'i sman mar yon tan cher lhag pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-32: spang spos bu ta ke shi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-33: chu rtsa shu dag kha sral phre'u //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-34: kyi lce ba dang ram nye ba //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-35: tsa rong dza ya pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-36: sle tres tsa tra ba ra ha //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-38: ma h'a pu ru sha dan da //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-39: na ku li gnyis skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-40: bri shtsi ka la ka dam pa //
T13TD4312.3E:119b-41: sa la parni bcas bskol mar //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-2: des ni nyin bzhi pa rims dang //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-3: smyo byed brjed byed gdon 'joms shing //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-4: blo dang yid gzhungs dran pa skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-5: byis pa rnams kyi lus 'phel byed //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-6: bdud rtsi dang ni 'dra ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-8: spang spos la sogs pa'i sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-9: mar tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i sman mar ni ming sha za chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:120a-10: des ni nyin bzhi pa'i rims la sogs pa sel ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-11: bramhi ain dri byi dang ga / shing kan spang spos mur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-12: ra sna sgog skya bong nga dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-13: shu dag bye'u rug bi sha la //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-14: n'a ga dan ti byi tsher ba //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-15: dzo ti sma ti tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-16: aa ru ra dang sa nag rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-17: glang po'i gcin btags ri lu byas //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-18: grib bskams snar blugs mig bsku zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-19: lus bskus spos bdugs smyo byed sel //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-21: bra mhi ni bram man ya sti ka zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-22: ain dri ni ain dra ba ru na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-23: la la ni sug smel la bya'o zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-24: mo ra ni gandha mo ra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-25: bi sha la ni lang ga li'o //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-26: dzo ti sma ti ni mar ma ta zhes bya ba phug ron gyi rkang pa 'dra ba ming gi rnam grangs ku ni zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-27: n'a ga dan da ni n'a ga byi na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-28: sa nag ni so ra shi zhes bya ba ste //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-29: sman de rnams glang po che'i gcin dang btags te ri lur byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:120a-30: gri ba ma la bskams la snar blugs pa la sogs pa byas na smyo byed kyi gdon sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-31: yungs kar dang ni sbyar ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-32: sna sman rnam pa sna tshogs phan //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-34: gzhan yang smyo byed kyi gdon la ni yungs kar gyi mar dang sbyar ba'i sna sman rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-35: yungs mar gyis ni lus bsku dang //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-36: yungs kar phye ma snar bud bya //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-38: yang smyo byed kyi nad 'di la yungs kar gyi mar gyis lus bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:120a-39: yungs kar gyi phye ma sna nas 'bud pa dag byas na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-40: mdo gnas bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-41: dud rnon shing kun bcas pa phan //
T13TD4312.3E:120a-43: smyo byed kyi nad la mdo'i gnas las bshad pa'i dud pa rnon po shing kun dang bcas pa bdugs na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-0: byi ba ra thug @120b dza tu ka'i //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-1: gcin dang rtug pa spu dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-2: pags ba mkhris pa sen mo dang //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-3: spos bdugs mig sman lus bskus dang //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-4: byugs dang blugs pa sbyar par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-6: wa la sogs pa'i gcin la sogs ba dang sbyar ba'i spos kyis bdugs pa la sogs pa byas na yang smyo byed kyi nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-7: bad kan rlung gyur la phal cher //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-8: khyi dang ba glang nya sha ni //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-9: rul ba'i dud pas bdug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-11: bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed phal cher la ni khyi dang ba glang dang nya'i sha rul zhing dri mnam pa'i dud pas nad pa de la bdugs na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-12: mkhris gyur la ni tig ta'i mar //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-13: 'tsho byed snum ni gnyis kyi mar //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-14: bza' dang btung ba bsil ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-15: mngar ba dang ni yang ba bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-17: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i smyo byed la ni tig ta'i sman mar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:120b-19: til mar gnyis kyi sman mar blud na phan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:120b-20: de bzhin du bza' ba dang btung ba sil ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:120b-21: mngar ba dang yang ba'i bag bsten pa bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-22: ji skad bshad pa'i gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-23: yang na sha tshon gyis 'grangs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-24: de 'og rlung med gnas bsnyal nas //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-25: sems myos ba las thar bar 'gyur /
T13TD4312.3E:120b-27: sngar mdo'i gnas su smyo byed la ni snying ga dang /
T13TD4312.3E:120b-29: dpral bar gtar ga gdab par bshad pa'i cho gas gtar ga gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-30: yang na sha tshon gyis 'grangs par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:120b-31: de'i 'og khang ba rlung med pa'i gnas su bsnyal na /
T13TD4312.3E:120b-32: sems myos shing 'khrul ba'i nad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-33: khron pa'i chu ni nyung bar gzhug / ltogs pa nyid du byas te bskam //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-35: yang na smyo byed kyis zin pa'i nad pa de khron pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:120b-36: rdzing bu chu nyung bar bcug la ltogs pa nyid du byas nas lus bskams na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-37: de la chos dang nor ldan pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-38: gtam dang mdza' bos dga' bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-40: yang na smyo byed dang ldan pa'i nad pa de la de'i snying du sdug pa'i mdza' bos chos dang nor dang ldan pa'i gtam snyan pas de'i sems dga' bar bya zhing spro ba sring bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:120b-41: yang na sdug pa dang bral ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-0: @121a * // rmad du byung ba bstan par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-2: yang nad pa de la yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dang bral ba'i gtam sems dngangs par 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-3: yang na ngo mtshar skye zhing rmad du gyur pa'i dngos po bstan par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-4: bcings la yungs mar gyis bskus te /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-5: nyi tshan la ni gan rkyal bzhag / kha sral phre'u'am lcags tsha ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-6: til mar chu tshan gyis reg bya //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-8: yang na smyo byed can de bcings la /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-9: yungs mar gyis lus bskus te /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-10: nyi tshan la lus gan rkyal du bzhag ste /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-11: kha sral phre'u lus la reg par byas pa 'am ;
T13TD4312.3E:121a-12: yang na lcags dang til mar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-13: chu tsha bas lus la bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-14: yang na lcag gis gzhus nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-15: bcings te g-yang sar skyur bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-17: yang nad pa de lcag gis gzhus la bcings te nyam nga ba'i g-yang sar skyur bas sdang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-18: yang na rdo dang mtshon med pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-19: mun khang mi ni med par bzhag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-20: yang na rdo dang mtshon cha med pa'i khang pa mun nag du gyur pa mi med pa dag tu gzhag par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-21: mche ba bton pa'i sbrul dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-22: glang dang seng ge glang po ches //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-23: de ni skrag tu gzhug pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-24: yang na rgyal po'i skyes bu yis //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-25: dam du bcings te phyir phyung na //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-26: rgyal po'i bka' yis bsdigs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-27: 'di gsad bya zhes skrag tu gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-28: yang na smyo byed can gyi nad pa de mche ba bton zhing med par byas pa'i sbrul lam glang khyu mchog gam /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-29: seng ge la sogs pas skrag tu gzhug par bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-30: yang na nad pa de rgyal po'i mngag gzhug gi skye bos dam du bcings te /
T13TD4312.3E:121a-31: rgyal po'i bkas bsdigs pa dang gsad pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis skrag tu gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-32: lus kyi sdug bsngal 'jigs pa bas //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-34: de phyir kun tu 'khrul pa'i yid //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-35: nye bar zhi ba nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:121a-37: gang gi phyir lus kyi sdug bsngal bsreg pa dang brdeg pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:121b-0: gzir ba la sogs pa las srog gi 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa yin pas rgyu de'i phyir srog dang @121b bral ba'i 'jigs pas smyo byed kyis kun tu 'khrul par byed pa'i yid nye bar zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-1: grub pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-2: nad dmigs dus sogs ltos te bya //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-4: de ltar sngar bshad pa'i gso ba'i sbyor ba grub par gyur pa 'di dag ni nad dmigs dang dus la sogs pa la ltos nas spyad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-5: sdug dang nor dang bral ba las //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-6: gang gi yid la gnod gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-7: de la de 'dra rnyed gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-8: spro bsrings dbugs dbyung pa yis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-10: skyes bu gang sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-11: nor dang bral ba las yid la gnod cing gdung bar gyur pa'i mi de la ni de dang 'dra ba'i nor dang sdug pa dang phrad cing rnyed par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis spro bsring zhing dbugs dbyung ba'i tshul gyis de'i yid gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-13: khro dang 'jigs pa chang las gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-14: gnyis gnyis dag gis gcig la gcig / de dag nyid kyis zhi bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-16: 'dod chags la sogs pa las byung ba'i smyo byed ni 'dod chags la sogs pa de dag nyid kyis gcig la gcig gnyen por byas te zhi bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-17: de yang 'dod chags las byung ba'i smyo byed ni mya ngan gyis zhi bar bya la ;
T13TD4312.3E:121b-18: mya ngan las byung ba ni 'dod chags kyis zhi bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-19: de bzhin du khro ba las byung ba ni 'jigs pas zhi bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:121b-20: 'jigs pas ni khro ba zhi bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:121b-21: de ltar gcig la gcig gnyen por gyur pas bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-22: bshad pa'i mtshan ma las lhag pa //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-23: gdon dang rjes 'brel yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-24: gal te smyo byed gdon las gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-25: gdon gsor bshad pa'i sman sbyar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-27: sngar bshad pa'i smyo byed drug po las mtshan nyid lhag par gyur pa sman pas gang dang gang mthong ba de ni gdon dang rjes su 'brel pa yin pas na de ltar gdon las gyur pa'i smyo byed la ni gdon gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i sman gang dag yin pa dag gis btang zhing gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-28: til btags phye ma nas zan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-29: snum zhing mngar ba'i kha zas dang //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-30: 'bras ni khrag dang sbrus pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-31: sha ni btsos pa rjen pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:121b-32: 'bru chang sbyar chang mnan pa'i chang /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-0: @122a * // aa ti mu ti'i me tog dang //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-1: dz'a ti sa ha ra dza yi //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-2: me tog bcas pa'i gtor ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-3: lam gyi bzhi mdo ba lang lhas //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-4: chu bo 'dus pa dag tu sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-6: de bzhin du gdon las gyur pa'i smyo byed la til btags pa'i phye ma skyo ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-7: de bzhin du nas chan nam zan dang de bzhin du snum zhing mngar ba'i shas che ba'i kha zas dang 'bras khrag gi gtor ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-8: sha btsos pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-9: sa ha ra dza'i me tog gi bar dang bcas pa'i gtor ma lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-11: chu bo gnyis 'dus pa'i lam du sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-12: gang zhig sha dang chang spangs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-13: phan la brtson zhing gtsang sbra che //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-14: snying stobs can la lhan cig skyes //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-17: skyes bu gang sha dang chang spangs shing bor ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-18: phan zhing 'phrod pa'i kha zas zos pa dang brtson pa che zhing dge ba'i las la 'bad pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-19: gtsang zhing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dri mas ma gos pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-20: snying stobs dang ldan zhing rang bzhin gyis sran thub pa'i skyes bu la ni lhan cig skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-21: glo bur ba'i smyo byed rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-22: dbang po'i don ni gsal ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-23: de bzhin blo dang yid gsal pa //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-24: lus zungs tha mal par gnas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-25: smyo byed dang bral mtshan ma yin //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-27: gzugs la sogs pa'i dbang po'i don gsal bar rtogs shing ma 'khrul ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-29: yid kyi 'dzin pa dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams tha mal par gnas shing /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-30: ma 'khrul pa dag ni smyo byed kyi gdon las thar zhing bral bar gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-31: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-32: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-33: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:122a-35: // / de nas brjed byed gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:122a-37: smyo byed gso ba'i 'og tu brjed byed gso ba bshad pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-0: phal cher rgyu dang mtshan nyid dang gso ba mthun pa yin @122b pa'i phyir smos pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-1: brjed byed dran pa nyams pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-2: de ni snying stobs blo 'khrul dang //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-3: sems las mya ngan 'jigs sogs kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-4: gnod gyur sems las byung ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-6: brjed byed ces bya ba ni dran ba nyams shing 'du shes dang bral ba la bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-7: 'di ni brjed byed kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-9: brjed byed de ni snying stobs dang blo la sogs pa 'khrul pa las byung ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-10: de la blo ni shes rab dang shes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-11: blo gros zhes bya ba'i ming gi rnam grangs yin te de 'khrul pas sems las dang mya ngan dang 'jigs pa la sogs pas gnod cing nyen par gyur pa'i sems las brjed byed byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-12: lus sems gtogs pa'i nad kyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-13: smyo byed bzhin du 'khrugs gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-14: snying stobs nyams shing snying dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-15: 'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa sbubs khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-16: mun par zhugs snyam sems shing rmongs //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-17: 'jigs su rung ba'i bya ba byed //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-18: so 'cha' lbu ba skyug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-19: lag pa rkang pa g-yob pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-20: gzugs med pa yang mthong ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-22: smin ma mi g-yo nad shugs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-23: bral nas sad par 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-24: de ni dus gzhan dag tu yang //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-25: de bzhin du ni spyod pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:122b-27: lus dang sems kyi char gtogs pa'i nad kyis smyo byed kyi tshul du 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur pas snying stobs brtan pa yod pa gang yin pa de nyams shing med par gyur nas gnod pa de snying la khyab par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-28: 'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa sbubs rnams su yang nad kyis khyab par gyur la des na skyes bu mun pa'i nang du zhugs pa snyam du sems shing blo rmongs par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-29: las su bya ba 'jigs su rung zhing smad par bya ba byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-30: so 'cha' ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-31: gzugs med cing 'dra ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de mthong ba dang 'khrul zhing 'du shes nyams pas sa la 'gyel ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-32: smin ma dang mig yon por snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:122b-33: nad kyi shugs de dang bral zhing zhi nas sad cing 'du shes rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-0: yang mi de dus phyis nas gnas skabs gzhan dag tu yang @123a * //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-1: spyod par 'gyur ba de bzhin du byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-2: rlung la sogs pa dang 'dus ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-3: dbye bas brjed byed rnam pa bzhi //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-5: brjed byed ni rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi re re las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-6: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi yod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-7: de ni skye bar gyur pa'i tshul //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-9: mun par mthong zhing sems khong chud //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-10: smin ma mi sdug mi 'gyur dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-11: sgra mi thos shing rdul 'byung la //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-12: kha chu snabs ni 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-14: lto sbos nyams stobs zad pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-15: gnyid med skom zhing yan lag na //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-16: rmi lam glu len gar byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-17: til mar chang ni 'thung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-18: de gnyis gcin du 'byung ba rmi //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-20: brjed byed kyi nad de 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ba na /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-21: sngar 'byung ba'i tshul lam mtshan ma ni snying 'dar zhing g-yo ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-22: khong pa stong zhing lto sbo ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-23: 'khor lo la bskyon pa ltar mgo 'khor ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-24: mun par mthong zhing mun 'thibs zhes byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-25: sems khong du chud pa la sogs pa nas til mar dang chang 'thung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-26: de gnyis gcin du 'byung pa'i rmi lam rmi ba'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-27: de la rlung gyur brla 'gul zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-28: yang dang yang du 'gyel ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-29: yang dang yang du dran pa stor //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-30: 'du shes rnyed nas mi gsal du //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-32: lbu bar skyug cing 'dar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-33: so 'cha' mgo ni rdebs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-34: rlung gis gre ba rgyas par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-35: yan lag kun du rdebs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-36: sor mo mi snyoms 'gugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-37: mig dang pags pa sen mo ni //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-38: gnag cing rtsub por snang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-39: gzugs ni mi brtan rtsub pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-40: mi sdug bzhin ras ngan pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:123a-42: de la rlung las gyur pa'i brjed byed ni nad pa de'i brla 'gul ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-43: mig gyen du 'bur zhing 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-44: yang dang yang du dbugs 'byin par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-45: lbu pa skyug ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123a-46: rlung gis gre brgyas par byed cing 'gengs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123b-0: yan lag kun @123b du brdeb cing bskyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123b-1: sor mo mthon dman mi snyoms par byas nas 'gugs pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-2: mkhris pa las gyur brjed byed ni //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-3: dran pa yang yang nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-4: mig gdong pags ba dbu ba ser //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-5: sa la rdeb par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-7: / gzugs mthong skom dad che ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-9: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i brjed byed kyi mtshan ma ni dran pa yang dang yang du nyams shing yang dang yang du rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123b-10: mig ser ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-11: bad kan las gyur ring nas 'dzin //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-12: yun ring nyid nas sad par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-13: g-yo 'gul nyung zhing kha chu mang //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-14: kha mig sen mo pags pa dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-15: gzugs rnams dkar por mthong ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-17: bad kan las gyur pa'i brjed byed kyi mtshan ma ni /
T13TD4312.3E:123b-18: yun ring zhig nas 'dzin cing 'jug la /
T13TD4312.3E:123b-19: ring zhig nas sad cing dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-20: mtshan nyid kun dang ldan pa spangs //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-22: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i brjed byed ni mtshan nyid kun dang ldan pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:123b-23: de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-24: de nas blo sems dran pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-25: snying ga'i sbubs ni sad byed pa'i ;
T13TD4312.3E:123b-26: / slon sman la sogs las rnams ni //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-27: rnon po yis ni sbyang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-29: blo dang sems dang dran pa rgyu ba'i snying ga'i rtsa sbubs 'gags par gyur pa la ni de sad cing dag par byed pa'i slon sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:123b-30: skyug sman la sogs pa rnon po dag gis de dang por sbyang zhing dag par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-31: rlung gyur 'jam rtsi mang du bya //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-32: mkhris gyur phal cher bkru sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-34: rlung las gyur pa'i brjed byed ni /
T13TD4312.3E:123b-35: gso ba rnams kyi nang nas phal cher 'jam rtsi mang bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-36: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i brjed byed la ni phal cher bkru sman btang bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-37: bad kan phal cher skyug sman ni //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-38: btang bas brjed byed gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-40: bad kan las gyur pa'i brjed byed ni phal cher skyug sman la sogs pa btang bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:123b-41: rnam pa kun du legs dag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-2: brjed byed las ni thar bya'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-3: zhi bar bya ba'i sbyor ba nyon //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-5: brjed byed kyi nad kyis btab pa de rnam pa thams cad du steng dang 'og nas sbyang ba byas shing legs par dag par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:124a-6: legs par spro ba sring zhing dbugs dbyung bar byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:124a-7: brjed byed las thar zhing zhi bar bya ba'i sbyor ba gang dag yin pa mnyan par gyis shig pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-8: ba lci'i khu ba 'o ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-9: zho dang gcin dang mar bskol ba //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-10: brjed byed rims dang smyo byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-11: mig ser sel bar byed pa blud //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-13: ba'i lci ba btsags pa'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:124a-14: 'o ma dang zho dang gcin re re zhing ba'i mar dang cha mnyam par byas pa'i rnam lnga'i sman mar ni brjed byed la sogs pa sel bar byed pa yin pas de blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-15: rtsa ba bcu pa 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-16: dug mo yungs shun ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-17: aa pa marga lo ma bdun //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-18: ni li ni dang pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-19: dong ga pushkar m'u la dang //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-20: phal gu'i rtsa ba byi tsher srang //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-21: gnyis gnyis chu bre bcu drug nang //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-22: bskol ba las ni bzhi cha lus //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-23: ga bra'i rtsa ba du ba ri //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-24: pa tha dan da dur byid dang //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-25: tsha ba gsum dang ro hi shee /
T13TD4312.3E:124a-26: mur ba rtsa mkhris bu ti ka / ha ti pi pi ling dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-27: ma du yan ti thal tres gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-28: lcang ma dang na tsi tri ka / zho ni gnyis gnyis mar bre gang //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-29: de bzhin snga ma'i gsher rdzas bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-30: 'di ni ba yi rnam lnga che //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-31: brjed byed rims dang dmu rdzing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-32: mtshan bar rdol ba sel mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-34: skya rbab skran dang lud pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-35: gdon rnams 'joms par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:124a-37: rtsa ba lnga pa rnam gnyis dang 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i sman sna re re zhing srang gnyis gnyis chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol ba de las chu bre bzhi lus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:124a-38: de'i nang dug [?] bra la sogs pa'i rtsa ba zho gnyis gnyis lde gur byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:124a-39: de bzhin du snga ma'i gsher rdzas pa'i lci ba'i khu ba la sogs pa ba'i rnam lnga chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-0: 'dis ni brjed byed la sogs pa sel bar byed @124b pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:124b-1: 'or nad la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-2: ro hi sha ni bu sri na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-3: rtsa mkhris ni bu nim pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:124b-4: ki ra ta ti ga ta'o //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-5: ha ti pi pi ling ni shi ba se'o //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-6: thal tres rnam gnyis ni sha ri ba dkar po dang nag po'o //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-7: bramhi shu dag ru rta dang //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-8: shang ka pu shpa mar rnying bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-9: bskol ba'i mar ni yid gzhungs byed //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-10: smyo byed bkra mi shis pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-11: brjed byed sdig pa 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-13: bra mhi'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang /
T13TD4312.3E:124b-14: shu dag la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu dang mar rnying pa bskol ba'i sman mar ni yid gzhungs par byed cing sdig pa dang bkra mi shis pa'i bar 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-15: 'tsho byed sde tshan srang re dang //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-16: til mar zhun mar bre re bsres //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-17: 'o ma bre ni bcu drug bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-18: 'thungs na brjed byed las thar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-20: 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan sman bcu po srang re re dang /
T13TD4312.3E:124b-22: mar bre gang bsres te 'o ma bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol la mar dang til mar 'ba' zhig lus pa las ran par 'thungs na brjed byed kyi nad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-23: 'o ma bu ram shing khu ba //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-24: bre bzhi dang ni tang pal gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-25: khu ba brgyad 'gyur dag dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-26: 'tsho byed sde tshan zho gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-27: zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol blud //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-28: des ni rlung mkhris las gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-29: brjed byed myur du sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-31: 'o ma dang bu ram shing gi khu ba bre bzhi dang /
T13TD4312.3E:124b-32: tang pal gyi khu ba de'i brgyad 'gyur dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:124b-33: 'tsho byed sna bcu zho gnyis gnyis dang zhun mar bre gang bskol ba'i sman mar byin na rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i brjed byed myur du sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-34: de bzhin 'jag ma byi da ri //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-35: ku sha bu ram shing 'o ma //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-38: 'jag ma la sogs pa dang 'o ma bskol ba la sogs pa 'thungs na yang de dang 'dra bar rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur ba'i brjed byed sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-39: ku sman ta yi khu ba mar //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-40: bco brgyad 'gyur dang shing mngar gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:124b-41: lde gur bcas ba bskol ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-2: blo dang tshig gsal skad snyan byed //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-4: ku sman ta zhes bya ba bum sha'i khu ba mar gyi bco brgyad 'gyur dang /
T13TD4312.3E:125a-5: shing mngar gyi lde gu dang bcas par bskol ba'i sman mar gyis ni brjed byed sel ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-6: ba ni ser skya'i mkhris pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-7: sna sman btang yang mchog tu phan //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-9: kha dog ser skyar 'dug pa'i mkhris pa'i sna sman btang na yang brjed byed kyi nad la mchog tu phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-10: khyi dang wa dang byi la dang //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-11: seng ge sogs kyi mkhris pa bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-13: khyi la sogs pa'i mkhris pa'i sna sman btang na yang brjed byed kyi nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-14: go nga [?] sre mo glang po che //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-15: ba glang dred dang pri sha ta'i //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-16: mkhris pa til mar bskol ba dag / lus bsku snar ni blugs na'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-18: go nga la sogs pa'i mkhris pa dang til mar bskol la de lus la bskus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:125a-19: snar blugs na yang phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-20: 'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-21: nas tshig 'khus thal ko nyon tshe //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-22: pha ni dza ka sra rtsi pog / aa pa marga karanydza'i //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-23: sa bon til mar ra gcin dang //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-24: bcas pa bskol ba snar blugs pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-25: phye ma sna nas bus na'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-27: 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i lde gu dang til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi ra gcin la sogs pa dang bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:125a-28: til mar nyi tshe lus pa snar blugs pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-29: 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i sman gyi phye ma sna nas bus na yang brjed byed kyi nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-31: bya rgod khyi rta bya rog sbrul //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-32: mchu dang sgro dang rtug pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-33: dud pas 'di la bdug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-35: sre mo la sogs pa'i mchu la sogs pa gang rnyed pa'i dud pas nad pa de la bdugs na yang brjed byed kyi nad la phan ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-36: til mar sgog skya bcas pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-37: 'o ma nye'u shing bsten yang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:125a-39: yang na brjed byed kyi nad kyis btab ba des til mar dang sgog skya bza' ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:125b-0: 'o ma @125b dang nye'u shing bsten cing goms par byas na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-2: shu dag sbrang rtsir ldan pa 'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-5: ru rta'i khu ba shu dag dang sbrang rtsir ldan pa dag kyang bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-6: nad gzhi mnyam du 'khrugs pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-7: lus dang sems la brten gyur nad //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-8: skyes par gyur pa gang yin de //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-9: brjed byed gnad ni chen por gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-10: de bas gso dka' 'di la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-11: bcud kyis len gyis gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-14: bad kan cha mnyam du 'khrugs shing ldang ba las lus dang sems la brten pa'i brjed byed kyi nang skyes par gyur pa 'di ni brjed byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:125b-15: lus kyi gnad chen po la gnas shing /
T13TD4312.3E:125b-16: snying la brten pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:125b-17: de bas na shin tu gso bar dka' ba'i brjed byed kyi nad 'di la ni bcud kyis len de dang 'phrod par gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-18: des nyen me dang chu la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-19: yang ba las rtag tu bsrung //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-21: brjed byed ces bya ba'i nad des nyen zhing gdungs pa'i mi de mi dang chu la sogs pa yang zhing 'chi ba'i rgyur gyur pa la rtag par dus thams cad du bsrung par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-22: thar pa na ni yid 'khrul pas //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-23: khyed kyis 'di ltar byas so zhes //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-24: mi brjod yul ni yid 'ong bas //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-25: nyams pa'i sems ni brta bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-27: brjed byed ces bya bas yid 'khrul zhing dran pa nyams pas tshul 'di ltar byas so zhes de thar zhing dran pa rnyed pa'i skabs su skyes bu gzhan dag gis brjod par mi bya zhing yid la gdung ba bskyed par mi bya'i /
T13TD4312.3E:125b-28: de la sgra la sogs pa'i yul yid du 'ong zhing dbang po tshim par byed pas /
T13TD4312.3E:125b-29: nyams nyes pa'i sems de brta bar bya zhing stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:125b-30: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:125b-31: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:125b-32: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:125b-34: // /'byung po'i gdon gso ba'i rgyud rdzogs so /
T13TD4312.3E:126a-1: mig mchu'i nad dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-3: 'byung po'i nad gso ba'i rgyud bshad pa'i rjes la mig sman gyi rgyud brtsams pa ni sngar mdor bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par bshad pa yang de ltar bya dgos pa'i tshul gyis brtsams pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:126a-4: ji ltar brjed byed kyi nad gnad chen po zhes bya ba snying la gnas te skye bar byed pa de bzhin du gnad chen po mgo bo zhes bya ba la brten cing gnas nas nam tshong yan chad du gtogs pa'i nad skye bar 'gyur ba yin la de las kyang mig ni las su bya ba thams cad la 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin pas gtso bo yin pa'i phyir de'i gso ba dang por brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-5: de la mig mchu ni mig sbubs dang mig 'bras 'gebs par gyur pa'i bags pa la bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:126a-6: mig mchu der mig dbye dka' ba la sogs pa'i nad 'byung la de'i dmigs shes par bya ba ni nad gzhi nang kyi sngar byung ba'i tshul la sogs pa ji lta bu yin pa de bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-8: nad kun nad gzhi las bshad pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-9: gnod pas nad ni 'khrugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-10: mchog tu mig la gnod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-11: phal cher mkhris pa skyed pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-12: rtsa las gyen du rgyus nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-13: mig gi yan lag mig mchu grva //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-14: dkar nag mthong byed rgyal mo 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-15: mig kun la gnas nad skyed byed //
T13TD4312.3E:126a-17: nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi las bshad pa'i nad kyi rgyu kha ba dang tsha ba dang nyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:126a-18: kha zas ngan don la sogs pa zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:126a-19: gnod cing mi 'phrod par gyur pa dag gis rang gi nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:126a-20: mchog gam khyad par du kha zas dang spyod lam dang /
T13TD4312.3E:126a-21: sman mig la gnod par gyur pa dag gis mig nad ldang bar byas pa dag phal cher ram /
T13TD4312.3E:126a-22: mang du mkhris pa skyed par byed pa dag gis nad ldang la des na rtsa las gyen du rgyus par gyur nas mig gi yan lag tu gyur pa mig mchu'am mig gi gra mtshams mig 'bras dkar po 'am mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi rgyal mo'am /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-0: mig thams cad la brten cing gnas nas rang @126b rang gi mig gi nad skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-1: de la rlung ni mig mchu yi //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-2: rtsa la zhugs par gyur pa dag / nyal nas lang tshe mig mchu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-3: har bag na dang bcas par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-4: mig ni rdul gyis gang snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-5: 'dzums par dka' zhing mchi ma 'dzag / mnyes na bde ba snyam du byed //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-6: de ni 'dzums dka' yin zhes bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-8: de la mig mchu'i nad de rnams kyi nang nas rlung gi nad dmigs mchu la gnas pa rtsar zhugs te /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-9: mi nyal nas ldang bar gyur pa la /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-10: na ba dang bcas pa'i mig mchu bsdur mi 'dod cing rengs te /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-11: har bag tu 'dug pa skyed par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-12: mig rdul gyi tshogs sam bye mas gang ba snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-13: de bzhin du dka' zhing sdug bsngal bas 'dzums par byed cing /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-14: sdud par byed par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-15: mchi ma mang du 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-16: nad de mnyes na bde ba snyam du sems shing /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-17: zhi bar byed de nad kyi khyad par de lta bu de ni mig 'dzums par dka' ba zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-18: zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-19: rlung gis mig mchu bskyod nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-23: rlung gis mig mchu bskyod cing 'gul nas //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-24: yang dang yang du 'byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-25: 'dzums par byed pa de yang nad med par 'gyur ba'i mig mchu'i nad 'di ni 'dzums ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-27: grva mtshams lhod cing tshor ba med //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-28: rtag tu 'dzums shing mig nyams pa //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-29: gang yin de ni rlung gnod yin //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-31: mig mchu gang mig gi grva mtshams lhod par gyur cing tshor ba med pas rtag tu 'dzums par byed kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-32: nam yang 'dzums par mi byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:126b-33: nyams pa'i nad de ni rlung gis gnod par byas pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-35: mkhris pas mig mchu'i mtha' mar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-36: 'brum bu ku mu da yi ni [?] //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-37: sa bon 'dra slar gang gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:126b-38: 'brum phran ku mu da zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-0: mkhris pas mig mchu'i mtha' ma thog thag tu 'brum bu phra mo ku mu da'i sa bon 'dra ba @127a * //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-1: mang pos gang zhig khyab par gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:127a-2: bsal zhing brtol yang slar gang bar 'gyur ba'i 'brum phran gyi mig mchu'i nad de ni ku mu da zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-3: tsha zhing 'drul la nad dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-4: dmar zhing reg na mi bzod pa //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-5: mkhris pas mig mchur skyes pa de //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-6: mkhris pas skyes pa yin zhes bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-8: mkhris pas mig gi mchur tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:127a-10: na ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:127a-11: mig dmar por snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:127a-12: reg na mi bzod pa skyes bar gyur na nad de ni mkhris pas skyed cing dkrugs pa yin no zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-13: mkhris pa rdzi ma'i nad gnas shing //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-14: g-ya' zhing tsha bar byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-15: de rjes rdzi ma 'byi ba ste //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-16: rdzi ma 'byi ba zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-18: mkhris pa rdzi ma'i nang na gnas shing brten nas g-ya' ba dang tsha bar byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:127a-19: de'i rjes la rdzi ma 'byi zhing 'drul bar byed pa'i nad de ni rdzi ma 'byi ba zhes bya bar drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-20: bad kan las gyur mig mchu'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-22: mthug skrangs g-ya' na mig rdul khebs //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-23: spyi bag can 'dzag po dag kya //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-25: bad kan las gyur pa'i mig mchu'i nad 'brum phran yungs kar lta bu la mthug cing skrangs pa la sogs ba dang ldan pa de ni ming po dag kya zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-26: har bag 'drul ba rdu mas khebs //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-27: bad kan gyis bslangs mig mchu'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-31: mig rdu mas khebs shing gos pa'i mig mchu'i nad ni ming bad kan gyis bslangs pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-32: bad kan las gyur rmen bu dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-33: na zhing smin ma med g-ya' sra //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-34: rgya shug tsam mam de las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-35: cung zad chung ba chags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:127a-37: bad kan las gyur pa'i mig mchu'i nad rmen bu dkar po re 'byung zhing re re zhing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:127a-38: smin ma gnyis ka med pa shas cher g-ya' ba rdo ltar srab rgya shug tsam gyi tshad dam /
T13TD4312.3E:127b-0: yang na rgya shug gi 'bras bu de las cung zad tsam chung ba'i mig @127b mchu'i nang de ni 'byar zhing chags te gnas pa yin pas ming chags pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-1: khrag las 'brum phran dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-2: de mtshungs 'brum phran gyis khyab pa //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-5: khrag 'khrugs pa las 'brum phran kha dog dmar ba zhig 'byung la /
T13TD4312.3E:127b-6: gzhan yang de dang mtshungs pa'i 'brum bu phra mos khyab pa de ni brtsegs pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-8: reg mi bzod pa mig mchu slongs //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-10: yang khrag de nyid kyis de bzhin du mig mchu dmar po bskyed par 'gyur la de yang ri mo dmar po shar shar po'i ri mo dang ldan zhing reg par mi bzod pa ni mig mchu slongs pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-11: mig mchu'i nang du sha lhag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-12: sra zhing snum la tsha zhing na //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-13: mdog dmar de ni khrag 'dzag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-16: mig mchu'i nang du sha lhag lhag khrag las gyur pa sra ba dang snum pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bcad bzhin du 'phel bar byed pa ni mig nad mig 'brum zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-17: mig mchu'i mtha' 'am dbus su ni //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-18: g-ya' zhing tsha la na bcas brtan //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-22: mig mchu'i mtha' ma'i cha 'am dbus kyi gnas su 'brum phran mungga zhes bya ba mon sran sde'u tsam g-ya' ba la sogs pa dang ldan la brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba mdog dmar por gnas pa de ni 'brum phran gyi mig nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-23: nad kyis mig mchu'i phyi rol skrangs //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-24: nang du bu ga phra mos khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-25: 'dzag bcas nang na chu yod de //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-28: nad dmigs gsum po dag gis mig mchu'i phyi rol gyi cha skrangs par gyur cing nang na bu ga phra mes kun du khyab par gyur la chu ser 'dzag pa dang bcas shing nang na chu yod pa'i mig mchu'i nang de ni padma'i rtsa ba'i dbyibs 'dra bar 'dug pa de'i ming ni mig mchu'i nad padma lta bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-29: nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs pas //
T13TD4312.3E:127b-30: mig mchu'i nad ni ldang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-0: @128a * // rgyu med par ni rnyid 'gyur gang //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-1: de ni mig mchu 'khrugs zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-3: nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs par gyur pas gang mig mchu'i nad yang dang yang du ldang bar gyur cing rgyu med par glo bur du rnyid cing cung zad skams te /
T13TD4312.3E:128a-4: zhum par gyur pa'i mig nad gang yin pa de ni ming mig mchu 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming du btags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-5: nad kyis mig mchu dri ma khrag / skrangs rnags na bcas mig mchu sngo //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-7: rlung la sogs pa'i nad gsum gyis mig mchu gang dri ma dang bcas shing khrag yod la skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:128a-9: na ba dang bcas pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:128a-10: mig mchu'i nad sngon po zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-11: g-ya' zhing skrangs la dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-14: dri ma dang khrag la sogs pa'i nad kyis g-ya' ba la sogs pa dang ldan zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:128a-15: mig mchu gnyis phan tshun 'byar zhing dbye bar dka' ba de ni mig mchu'i nad 'byar ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-16: mig mchu'i nad ni sra zhing rtsub //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-19: mig mchu'i nang gi char 'brum phran sra zhing rtsub par bye ma 'dra ba yod pa ni bye ma 'dra ba'i mig mchu'i nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-22: mig mchu gang kha dog nag cing 'dam ltar rnyog pa can du gnas pa gang yin ba de ni 'dam bu lta bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-23: mdog 'dra sha ni mang pos rgyas ;
T13TD4312.3E:128a-24: / na shas che ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-26: mig mchu gang sha mdog 'dra ba'i sha mang pos cha mnyam du rgyas shing khyab par gyur pa ni ming shas che ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-27: byis ba so skyes tshe na 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-28: des ni byis pa'i mig skrang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-29: mig dmar lta bar mi nus la //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-30: mig mchu gzer zhing spyi bag 'dzag / rna ba sna dang mig nyed byed //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-31: gang yin de ni sgra ngan yin //
T13TD4312.3E:128a-33: sgra ngan zhes bya ba'i mig mchu'i nad ni byis pa so skye ba nyid kyi tshe na 'byung zhing de rgyur gyur pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:128b-0: nad des byis pa'i mig skrangs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid @128b dang ldan zhing rna ba dang sna dang mig lag pas nyed par byed de //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-1: de'i ming ni sgra ngan pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-3: mig mchu 'ang de 'drar gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-4: rtsub cing nang du kha bltas la //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-5: spu gzhan yang ni tsher ma ltar //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-6: rtse mo rnon po skyes gyur cing /
T13TD4312.3E:128b-7: des bdar mig ni skrangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-8: tsha zhing rlung la sogs mi bzod //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-9: bton na cung zad bde bar byed //
