T13TD4312.3E:128b-11: rdzi ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba'i mig mchu'i nad ni rdzi ma nang du 'dus shing mig rnyid cing zhum pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-12: mig gi mchu yang nang du 'dus shing rnyid par 'gyur ba dang rtsub cing kha nang du bltas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:128b-13: rdzi ma'i spu gzhan dag kyang tsher ma ltar rno zhing rtsub pa skyes pas des mig bdar zhing reg pas skrang par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:128b-15: mig des rlung dang tsha ba la sogs pa mi bzod cing bsten mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:128b-16: spu rtsub cing rno ba skyes pa de bton cing bsal na gnyis ka cung [?] zad cig bde zhing zhi bar gyur nas slar yang de bzhin du 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:128b-17: de ni rdzi ma 'gags pa'i mig nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-18: mig phugs grva mtshams phyi rol du //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-19: thor bu sra zhing mtho ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-20: dmar zhing mchi ma rnag khrag 'dzag / yang yang rgyas pa slon pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-22: mig phugs zhes bya ba sna gong gi mig gi grva mtshams kyi phyi rol gyi char thor bu srab la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yang dang yang du rgyas par 'gyur ba de ni mig slon pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-23: nad gzhi gsum dang khrag las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-24: mig mchu'i nang na sha'i du ma bu //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-25: rmen bu sral nad med pa //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-26: phyi rol mi mnyam g-yo mdzer pa //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-28: rlung la sogs pa'i nang gzhi gsum khrag dang bcas pa las mig mchu'i nang na sha'i dum bu rmen bu chags shing de sra ba dang zug gzer gyi nad med pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-29: phyi rol mi mnyam zhing g-yo bar gyur pa'i mig mchu'i nad de ni mig gi mdzer pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-30: de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi po //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-31: mig mchu la gnas nad yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:128b-33: de ltar 'dzums par dka' ba la sogs pa grangs nyi shu rtsa bzhis bshad pa de dag ni mig mchu la gnas pa'i nad yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-1: de la dang por sman gyis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-4: 'dir de dag gi nang nas dang por 'dzums par dka' ba zhes bya ba'i mig mchu'i nad ni sman gyi sbyor bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-5: de'i 'og ma ste btsums pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:129a-6: rlung gis gnod pa gnyis dang mig 'brum zhes bya ba'i mig mchu'i nad ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-7: rdzi ma 'gags pa gsor rung tsam //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-8: lhag ma mtshon gyis gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-10: mig mchu'i nad rdzi ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba ni re zhig mi spang ba tsam du gsor rung ba yin la lhag ma ni mtshon gyis gdab cing gtsags bus gsor rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-11: de dag las kyang rdzi ma 'byi //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-12: gtsags par bya la mig mdzer gcad //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-13: chags dang pad rtsa ku mu da //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-16: mtshon gyis gso bar bya ba de dag las kyang rdzi ma 'byi ba zhes bya ba'i nad ni 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul gyis gtsags shing gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-17: de dag las kyang mig mdzer zhes bya ba ni gcad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-18: chags pa nas slon pa'i bar ni mtshon gyis 'dral zhing dbug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-19: mig mchu'i sha sngo bye ma 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-20: 'byar dang bskyed bya zhes ba bzhi //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-21: 'dam bcas shas cher byas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-22: sgra ngan bcas pa mtshon gyis bzhar //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-24: mig mchu'i sha'i nad la sogs pa bcu gsum ni mtshon gyis phyi zhing bzhar te gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-25: yan lag brgyad ba'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel ba tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:129a-26: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:129a-28: // / de nas mig mchu'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-30: 'dzums par dka' la mar rnying ni //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-31: rgun 'bru'i lde gu chur bskol bar //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-32: kha ra btab dang sna sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:129a-33: dud pa mig sman snum can gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-0: 'dzums par dka' ba zhes bya ba'i mig nad la ni mar rnying pa dang rgun 'bru'i lde gu bskol ba'i khu @129b ba dang bcas par btsos pa'i sman mar la kha ra btab pa btang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:129b-1: de bzhin du sna nas gtang ba'i sman dang dud pas bdugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:129b-2: mig sman snum can gang yin pa gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-3: ku mu da la zhal zhal gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-4: de steng rgyam tsha gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-5: shing mngar dang ni skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-6: pa to la bskol chu blugs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-8: ku mu da zhes bya ba'i mig mchu'i nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:129b-9: gtsags bus zhal zhal btab la de'i steng du rgyam tshva'i phye ma btab ste /
T13TD4312.3E:129b-10: shing mngar la sogs pa bskol ba'i chu dro 'jam tsam blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-11: rlung med gnas la g-yog mkhas pas //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-12: sbyang byas gan rkyal nyal ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-13: mig mchu bzlog ste dro 'jam chur //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-14: bsros pa'i gos kyis dugs byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-15: gos kyis legs par dkris nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-16: g-yon pa'i mthe ba mdzub kyis bzung zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-18: de nas mig mchu kun du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-19: dkyil 'khor lta bu'i mtshon gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-20: 'phred du gdab cing mtshan ma byas //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-21: de nyid kyis sam lo rtsub bam //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-22: she pa li yi lo ma 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-23: yang na rgya mtsho'i lbubs brud //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-25: nad pa rlung med pa'i gnas su bzhag la //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-26: nad g-yog mkhas shing byang bas sngar sbyang ba byas pa'i nad pa la gan rkyal du nyal bar gyur pa la ni mig mchu'i phyi rol du bzlog la /
T13TD4312.3E:129b-27: chu dro 'jam tsam gyis bsros pa'i gos kyis dugs byas /
T13TD4312.3E:129b-28: gos 'jam pos dkris te nang du bcug la lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mos bzung ste de ltar byas pas mig 'gul zhing 'gyur ba med par gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:129b-29: de'i 'og tu mig mchu de dkyil 'khor lta bu'i mtshon gyi gtsags bus 'phred du gdab par bya zhing gtsags bus mtshan ma byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:129b-30: dkyil 'khor lta bu'i gtsags bu de nyid kyis 'brud cing zhal zhal gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-31: yang na lo ma rtsub po 'am shing she la'i lo ma la sogs pa lo ma rtsub pas rma de brud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-32: yang na rgya mtsho'i lbu bas [?] brud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-33: de nas khrag byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:129b-34: ras bal gyi ye 'us legs par phyi bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:129b-35: khrag ni ras bal ye 'us phyi //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-0: khrag bcad legs par brud shes @130a * //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-2: rang rang sman ni sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-3: bcas pa de la bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-5: khrag chod cing 'gags par gyur nas legs par brud par gyur par shes nas rang rang gi sman sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa'i lde gus rma de la bsku zhing gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-6: de'i 'og chu dron gyis bkrus la //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-7: mar gyis blugs par bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-8: rna ba'i steng dang 'og gi bar //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-9: nas kyi zan dang sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-10: mar dang bcas pas dkri bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-12: mig mchu legs par brud pa de'i rjes la chu dro 'jam tsam gyis mig mchu de bkrus la mar blugs nas rna ba'i steng dang 'og gi bar du nas kyi zan mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pas bsnan la dkri zhing bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-13: zhag ni gnyis pa la dgrol te //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-14: ji lta bar ni sman blugs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-15: bzhi bar sna sman la sogs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-16: zhag ni lnga pa dag la dgrol //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-18: de ltar glan zhing bcing ba'i mig mchu de zhag gnyis pa la bkrol te rang gi sman gang dag yin pa'i sman gyi khu ba ji bzhin du blugs shing snga ma bzhin du bcing bar byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:130a-19: zhag bzhi ba la ni sna sman la sogs pa byas te dkri bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-20: zhag lnga pa la ni slar dgrol bar bya'i bcing bar mi bya'o ;
T13TD4312.3E:130a-21: / mnyam zhing sen mo ltar dmar la //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-22: skrang g-ya' drud sogs nad med pa //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-23: mig mchu sbyar legs yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-24: de las bzlog pa slar bzhar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-26: bzhar zhing brud legs pa'i mig mchu ni mnyam por gnas kyi mthon dman du mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:130a-27: sen mo'i mdog ltar dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:130a-28: skrangs pa la sogs pa'i nad med pa ni brud legs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-29: mtshan nyid de las go bzlog pa ni bzhar ma legs pa yin pas slar zhing bzlas te bzhar zhing brud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-30: bzhar drags pas ni na ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-33: bzhar drags pas ni na ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-34: de la snum dang dugs la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:130a-35: rlung la phan pa'i sbyor ba bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-0: bzhar drags pa'i mig mchu de la snum chos dang dugs la sogs pa rlung sel ba'i sbyor ba bya bar @130b slob dpon gyis bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-1: mar sar gyis ni bsku bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-2: seng phrom dkar po mar sar gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-3: legs par bsku bar byas nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-4: ae randa yi rtsa ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-5: lde gus byugs te phur mas btso //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-6: tshos pa bkrus te skams nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-7: btags pa thum por byas nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-9: mnyes la mig tu blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-11: seng phrom zhes bya ba ro tra dkar po mar sar gyis bskus la /
T13TD4312.3E:130b-12: de'i 'og tu ae randa'i rtsa ba'i lde gus byugs la /
T13TD4312.3E:130b-13: de'i rjes la sman gyi phur mas btso pa'i tshul gyis btsos la tshos par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:130b-14: chus bkrus te de'i 'og tu skams pa de zhib tu btags la ras gtsang mas thum bur gtums nas ra 'am bud med kyi 'o ma'i nang du thum bu spangs la mnyes pa de'i thigs pa mig tu blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-15: de nyid s'a lu thug po che'i //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-16: lde gus bskus te de ltar byas //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-17: zho dang zho ga chus spangs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-18: mig ni bzhar drags gyur la blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-20: yang na seng phrom dkar po de nyid 'bras s'a lu thug po che'i lde gus bskul /
T13TD4312.3E:130b-21: snga ma bzhin du mar sar gyis bsku zhing phur mas btso ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:130b-22: zho dang zho ga chu'i nang du spangs pa de mig bzhar drags pa la sman gyi thigs pa blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-23: yang na zho ga chu nyi tshe //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-24: blugs shing skam sa'i sha khu sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-26: yang na mig bzhar drags pa las zho ga chu nyi tshe blugs shing skam sa'i sha khu sbyin par bya'o ;
T13TD4312.3E:130b-27: /'brum phran sra zhing mtho ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-28: 'bras kyi rtse mos brtol bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-29: de rjes btsir te cho ga ni //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-30: lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bya //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-32: 'brum bu phra mo zhes bya ba'i mig mchu'i nad sra zhing mtho bar gnas pa ni 'bras kyi rtse mo 'dra ba'i gtsags bus brtol zhing phug pa de'i rjes la cho ga lhag ma bkru ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:130b-33: sman bsku ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-34: zhal zhal gdab dang 'dral ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-35: rim 'dis mig mchu'i nad kun sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:130b-37: mig mchu'i nad la zhal zhal gdab cing brud pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:131a-1: kun la yang bshad ma thag pa'i rim pa 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-2: khrag mkhris las gyur mngar ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-3: sde tshan dang bskol mar gyis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-4: snum gyur nas ni gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-5: dur byid bkru sman gtang ba mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:131a-6: khrag dang mkhris pas skyed pa'i mig mchu'i nad la ni mngar ba'i sde tshan dang bskol ba'i mar gyis gsos la /
T13TD4312.3E:131a-7: snum par gyur pa dang gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:131a-8: dur byid kyi bkru sman gtong ba nyid mchog tu gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-9: bzhar zhing khrag ni phyung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-10: shing mngar bskol ba'i chus bkru zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-12: mig mchu la ni blugs na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-14: mig mchu bzhar zhing brud pa dang khrag gzags nas shing mngar bskol ba'i chus bkrus na phan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:131a-15: tsandan dkar po dang 'o ma bskol ba blugs na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-16: rdzi ma 'byi la khab kyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-17: ba spu'i bu ga gtsags pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-18: srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-20: rdzi ma 'byi ba la ni khab kyis ba spu'i bu ga gtsags pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:131a-21: srin bu bad pas de la khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-22: yang na 'o ma 'am bu ram shing //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-23: khu bas slon bya mngar bsil sman //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-24: bskol ba'i mar ni gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-26: rdzi ma 'byi ba'i mig mchu'i nad de la 'o ma'am bu ram shing gi khu ba'i slon sman bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:131a-27: rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i sman mngar ba dang bsil ba dang bskol ba'i mar gyis rdzi ma 'byi ba la sna nas btang ba'i sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-28: nag tshur dkar po'i phye ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-29: bye'u rug pa'i khu bar bsres //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-30: zangs kyi snod du bcug pa de //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-31: rdzi ma 'byi ba'i mig sman mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:131a-32: nag tshur dkar po phye mar byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:131a-33: bye'u rug pa'i khu ba bsres la zangs ma'i snod kyi nang du zhag bcu'i bar du spangs pa'i mig sman de ni rdzi ma 'byi ba'i mig sman gyi dam par gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-34: mig mchu'i sha brud bca' sga dang //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-35: rgyam tsha'i phye ma gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-36: chu dron gyis bkrus seng ldeng dang //
T13TD4312.3E:131a-37: na le sham dkar tu ba ri //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-0: chu bskol ba 'am ser po @131b gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-1: shing mngar dang ni 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-2: khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-4: mig mchu'i sha la 'brum phran byung ba la ni dkyil 'khor lta bu'i gtsags bus zhal zhal gdab cing brud la bca' sga dang rgyam tsha gnyis kyi phye ma gdab par bya zhing chu dron gyis bkrus la seng ldeng la sogs pa'i chur bskol ba'i sman gyi khu ba blugs par bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:131b-5: yang na ser po gnyis dang shing mngar dang 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-6: bad kan las gyur zhal zhal byas //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-7: nag tshur rgyam tsha pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-8: ldong ros stang zil zhib btags pa //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-9: sbrang rtsir bcas pa bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-11: bad kan gyis bskyed pa'i mig mchu'i nad la ni gtsags bus zhal zhal byas shing brud la nag tshur la sogs pa'i sman zhib tu btags nas sbrang rtsi dang bcas pas bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-12: skyug sman mig sman sna sman ni //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-13: bad kan sel pa thams cad phan //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-15: yang na bad kan las gyur pa'i mig mchu'i nad la skyug sman dang mig sman la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:131b-16: bad kan sel zhing 'joms par byed pa gang yin pa de thams cad phan no ;
T13TD4312.3E:131b-17: / chags pa la yang 'di dag bya //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-18: ma zhi me btsa' gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-20: bad kan las gyur ba'i mig mchu'i nad gso ba 'di ni chags pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad la yang sbyar bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:131b-21: des zhi zhing med par gyur na chags pa zhes bya ba'i mig mchu'i nad de la me btsa' gdab pas bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-22: sgra ngan la ni seng ldeng dang //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-23: nim pa'i lo ma 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-24: mar dang sbyar ba'am pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-25: shing mngar rgyam tsha bskol ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-26: ma mar blud de slon du gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:131b-27: sgra ngan zhes bya ba'i byis pa'i mig mchu'i nad la ni seng ldeng la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba blung la ma ma slon du gzhug la /
T13TD4312.3E:131b-28: de'i 'og tu pi pi ling la sogs pa bskol bas slon du gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-29: rgun 'bru dang ni aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:131b-30: pi pi ling bskol bkru sman sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-0: de'i 'og tu ma ma de la rgun 'bru la sogs pa @132a * //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-1: bskol ba'i skyug sman sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-2: ser po rnam gnyis pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-3: gla sgang lde gus nu ma bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-5: yang ma ma de'i nu ma ser po gnyis la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-6: yungs kar mar bcas dud pas bdugs //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-7: sbyang pa byas nas pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-8: gla sgang dang ni rgun 'bru dang //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-9: sle tres 'bras bu gsum bskol blud //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-11: ma ma de la yungs kar mar dang bcas pa'i dud pas nu ma la bdug par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:132a-12: yang ma ma de bkru sman dang skyug sman gyi sbyang ba byas nas pa to la la sogs pa bskol ba'i sman gyi khu ba blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-13: byis pa'i mig mchu brud pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-14: srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-15: aa sman da ka skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-16: 'dzam bu'i lo ma bskol ba blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-18: byis pa'i mig mchu de gtsags bus brud pa'am srin bu pad pas khrag phyung zhing bton la aa sman ta ka la sogs pa'i lo ma bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-19: byis pa 'o ma mar brten pas //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-20: phal cher bad kan nad 'byung pas //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-21: de bas dang por skyug sman nyid //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-22: nad kun la ni bsngags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-24: byis pa ni 'o ma dang mar la brten cing spyod pa'i rgyus na phal cher te mang du bad kan gyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
T13TD4312.3E:132a-25: dre'i phyir byis pa'i nad thams cad la dang po kho nar skyug sman btang na nad kun la bsngags shing phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-26: lce myang tsha dang pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-28: 'o ma shu dag sbrang rtsir bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-29: po son cha ni shing mngar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-31: zas la brten pa'i byis pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-32: rim bzhin blud pas nad kun ni //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-33: sbyang bar bya phyir slon sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-34: mchog du sgra ngan nad la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-36: byis pa'i nad thams cad la ni lce myang tsha la sogs pa'i sman dang mar dang 'o ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:132a-37: sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i skyug sman btang ba ni /
T13TD4312.3E:132a-38: 'o ma la brten pa bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:132a-39: kha zas dang 'o ma gnyis la brten pa la ni shu dag gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa'i skyug sman nad thams cad la bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-0: zas 'ba' zhig la brten pa'i @132b shing mngar sbyar ba'i skyug sman nad thams cad la ni bsngags pa yin te //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-1: de ltar na 'o ma 'thung ba dang 'o ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:132b-2: kha zas gnyis ka la brten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:132b-3: zas 'ba' zhig la brten pa dag la rim bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:132b-4: de las kyang khyad par du ni sgra ngan zhes bya ba'i mig [?] mchu'i nad la phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-5: sab ta la yi khu ba mar //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-6: bskol ba gnyis ka sbyong byed sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-8: yang na sab ta la bskol ba'i khu ba dang mar lhan cig bskol ba'i sman mar ni bad kan dang sgra ngan gnyi ga sbyong bar byed pa de sbyin par bya'o ;
T13TD4312.3E:132b-9: / seng phrom shing mngar ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-10: nim pa'i lo ma pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-11: zangs kyi phye mar bcas reng bu //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-12: sgra ngan gyi ni nad la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-14: yang na seng phrom la sogs pa'i phye ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:132b-15: zangs kyi phye ma dang bcas pa'i ri lu ni sgra ngan gyi nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-16: yang na lcags kyi phye ma bsregs //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-17: 'o ma sbrang rtsi mar bcas phan //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-19: yang na lcags kyi phye ma bsregs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:132b-20: 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i ri lu yang sgra ngan gyi nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-21: sug smel sgog skya ka ta ka / pha ni da dza kan le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-22: dung bcas chu dang bdar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-23: kad pa la bcas ri lu'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-25: yang na sug smel la sogs pa'i ri lu yang mig mchu'i sha'i nang dang sgra ngan gyi nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-26: ka ta ka pa la ni ki tsha'o //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-27: pha nid dza ka ni ma du ba ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-29: / sbyang ba byas par gyur pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-30: smin ma'i 'og gi cha gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-31: rdzi ma'i cha gcig par bar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-32: nas kyi tshad tsam nas kyi dbyibs //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-33: 'phred du dpral la ras rlon pas //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-34: de yi khrag ni bsal nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-35: khrag ni chung bar gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-36: bar mtshams mungga tsam bzhag la //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-37: kha ba ni yon pos btsem par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:132b-39: rdzi ma 'gags pa'i nad bu 'phel bar gyur pa la nad pa sbyang ba byas shing dag par byas pa'i smin ma'i 'og cha gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.3E:133a-0: rdzi ma'i cha gcig por ba'i gnas su nas kyi tshad tsam la dbyibs nas 'dra par @133a * //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-1: 'phred du dbral la ras chu dron mo'i nang du sbangs pas de'i khrag bsal zhing phyis nas khrag de bri zhing chung bar gyur pa dang bar mtshams su sran mud ga zhes bya ba mon sran sde'u tsam bzhag la /
T13TD4312.3E:133a-2: khab yon pos legs par 'drub par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-3: dpral ba ras kyis bcings nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-4: de bzhin skud pas btsem par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-5: shin tu dam dang lhod min bar //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-6: der ni legs par btsem par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-8: de'i 'og tu dpral ba ras kyi tshal bas bcing la /
T13TD4312.3E:133a-9: der skud pas shin tu dam pa yang ma yin shin tu lhod pa yang ma yin par btsem par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-10: de nas sbrang rtsi mar gyis byug /'di la bcing bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-12: de'i 'og tu sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis byug cing de bskus nas ras kyis dkris la btsem par bya'i 'di la bcing bar ni mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-13: na na n+ya gro dha sogs pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-14: khu ba 'o mar bcas pa blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-16: gal te rma de nad dang bcas par gyur na n+ya gro dha la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi khu ba 'o ma dang bcas pa blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-17: zhag lnga pa la skud pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-18: bsal te yug snam phye ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-19: rma la legs par gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-20: sna sman mig sman rnon po gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-22: zhag lnga pa la mtshon gyis dbral la de 'drubs par gyur pa dang skud pa bsal zhing bcad de btsag yug snam zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma rma la gdab par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:133a-23: de la sna sman dang mig sman rnon po gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-24: zhag bcu'i mthar yang ma sos na //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-25: mig mchur brten gnyer bzlog ste bsreg //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-27: sbyor ba des zhi bar ma gyur na mig mchur brten pa'i gnyer ma bzlog ste thal sman nam thur ma tsha bas bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-28: rdzi ma'i lhag ma tsher zungs kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-29: phyung la de yi gnas dag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-30: me'i mdog 'dra'i khab rtses bsreg / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:133a-31: rdzi ma'i lhag ma tsher [?] zungs kyis phyung la rdzi ma de'i gnas me'i mdog 'dra ba'i khab kyi rtse mos bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-32: phyi rol rlon pa bsregs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-33: thor bu bcad par gyur pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:133a-34: me 'am thal sman rnon pos bsreg / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-0: phyi rol gyi rlon zhing gsher ba me 'am thal sman kyis bsreg par @133b bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-1: thor bu yang rtsa ba nas dang po bcad la me 'am thal sman rnon pos bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-2: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-3: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-4: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-6: // / de nas mig zur dang mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag gi nad kyi dmigs brtag par bya ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-8: mig mchu'i nad kyi rjes la mig zur dang mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag gi nad kyi dmigs brtag pa bstan pa ni gnas kyi go rims kyis bshad pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-9: mig zur gnyis dang mig gi 'bras bu dkar po dang nag po dag gi nad kyi dmigs shes shing brtag par bya ba'i le'u gang yin pa de bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-11: rlung 'khrugs pas ni chu rgyu ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-12: rtsar song nas ni chu 'dra ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-13: mchi ma mig mchu'i mig phugs kyi //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-15: des ni nad med rtsa dmar la //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-18: rlung gi nad rang rang gi skye ba'i rgyus 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-19: chu rgyu ba'i rtsar song nas mig phugs kyi mtshams te /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-20: mig 'bras dkar po'i mtha' sna gong gi phugs nas chu 'dra ba'i mchi ma 'dzag bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-21: nad des mig na ba lhang lhang po med par rtsa dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-22: skrang par 'gyur te mig nad de ni mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-23: bad kan las gyur spyi bag mang //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-24: dkar ba bad kan 'dzag pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-26: bad kan 'dzag pa'i mig zur gyi nad ni bad kan las gyur cing mchi ma spyi bag nal nal por mang du 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:133b-27: mig dkar pa ni ming bad kan 'dzag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-28: bad kan gyis skrang rtse mo rno //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-30: rtsa ba che zhing g-yo la snum //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-32: che zhing smin dka' g-ya' dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:133b-33: gzer med bcings pa lta bu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-0: bad kan gyis mig skrang par 'gyur zhing skrang pa de'i rtse mo rnon por 'dug la skrang pa de lan tshva'i chu bur 'byung ba 'dra @134a * //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-1: zhing rtsa ba che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni bcings pa lta bu'i mig nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-2: khrag las mchi ma khrag 'dzag dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-3: shas cher dro ba khrag 'dzag yin //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-5: khrag 'khrugs pa las mchi ma dmar zhing shas cher dro ba 'dzag pa ni mig zur gyi nad khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-6: mig mchu grva mtshams dkar po ru //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-7: 'brum phran tsha zhing gzer dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-9: khrag 'dzag de ni tshigs can yin //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-11: mig mchu'i grva mtshams dkar po'i cha ru 'brum phran tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa sran mungga tsam dang 'dra ba kha gyes shing gas pa las khrag 'dzag pa de ni ming tshigs can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-12: rnag 'dzag dri ma khrag dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-13: mig phugs kyi ni grva mtshams nas //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-14: yang dang yang du rnag 'dzag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-15: sha lpags 'drul bas mchi mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-17: rnag 'dzag pa zhes bya ba'i mig zur gyi nad ni dri ma zhes bya ba nad gzhi gsum po khrag dang bcas pa'i mig phugs kyi mig mchu'i mtshams nas yang dang yang du rnag 'dzag cing mchi ma 'byung ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:134a-18: sha dang pags pa 'drul ba'i rgyu las 'byung ba'i rnag 'dzag pa'i mig nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-19: rnag sla 'dzag pa rma phra zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-20: skrang zhing g-yo ba che ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-21: mig phugs mtshams skrang rnag 'dzag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-22: nad bcas rnag gi chu ser 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:134a-23: rnag sla ba chu ser 'dra ba 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:134a-24: rma'i dbyibs phra zhing skrangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-26: rtsom pa che ba la mig phugs kyi grva mtshams sna gong gi mtshams su skrangs ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:134a-27: rnag gi tshogs 'dzag cing 'bab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:134a-28: nad dang bcas pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:134a-29: nad de ni rnag gi chu ser 'dzag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-30: mig phugs kyi ni mtshams nang na //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-31: skrang zug tsha bcas chu seng nad //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-33: mig phugs kyi mtshams ni nad na ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:134a-34: zug pa dang tsha ba dang bcas pa ni chu ser gyi mig zur gyi nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-35: mig zur ram ni mig phugs [?] su //
T13TD4312.3E:134a-36: g-yo' [?] zhing rdzi ma'i bug nas //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-0: na bcas @134b srin gyi rmen bu can //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-2: mig 'gram gyi mig zur gyi phyogs sam mig phugs sna gong gi phyogs su g-ya' ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i srin gyi rmen bu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing na ba dang bcas pa ni srin bu'i rmen bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-3: bcings pa lta bu'i srin rmen bu //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-4: rnag gi chu ser tshigs can dag / mtshon gyis gso bya lhag ma lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-5: 'dzag pa chu ser bcas pa spang //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-7: bcings pa lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhi ni mtshon gyi gtsags bus gso bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:134b-8: mig mchu 'dzag pa la sogs pa bzhi dang chu ser can te lnga po de dag spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-9: de yang 'dzag pa bzhi ni chu 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:134b-13: mkhris pas dkar po'i thig le ni //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-14: gnag pa 'am sngo ba 'am ser po skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-15: gur kum me long dri mas gos //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-16: ltar snang na ba tsha ba med //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-17: 'khru zhing skom dang rims dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-18: nad ni nya phyis can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-20: mkhris pa'i nad kyis mig 'bras dkar po'i steng du thig le nag po 'am sngon po 'am ser po 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:134b-21: yang na dkar po thams cad me long brims gos ba ltar snang zhing tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:134b-22: lhang lhang por na ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:134b-23: 'khru ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i nad de ni ming nya phyis can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-24: bad kan las dkar sha lhag dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-25: ring nas 'phel ba mig mdzer dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-27: bad kan gyi rgyu las mig 'bras dkar po'i char sha lhag dkar zhing yun ring zhig na ngal gyis 'phel ba gang yin pa de ni mig mdzer dkar po zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-28: nad med pa la skrang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-29: mdog dkar lhun che 'jam pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-30: lci snum chu yi thigs pa 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-31: bad kan mdud pa zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-33: yang mig 'bras dkar po lan tshabs chung zhing skrang pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:134b-34: mdog dkar zhing dkar por snang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-37: lci ba la sogs pa'i rmen bu byung ba gang yin pa de ni bad kan gyi mdud pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-38: zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:134b-39: thig le 'bras phye ltar dkar ba //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-1: po'i steng du thig le 'bras phye ltar dkar la dpangs mtho zhing pags pas khyab pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras phye 'dra ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-2: dkar po'i ri mo dmar pos khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-3: tsha zhing na dang bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-4: skrang zhing mchi mas gos pa med //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-5: khrag gyur rtsa yi nyes par bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-7: mig 'bras dkar po'i steng du ri mo dmar po shar shar bor khyab cing tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:135a-8: lhang lhang por na ba dang bcas pa la /
T13TD4312.3E:135a-10: mchi ma dang ljan ljin gyis gos pa med par gyur pa de ni khrag las gyur pa'i rtsa'i nad yin pas na rtsa'i nyes pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-11: rtsa nyes yal bar por na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-13: khrag bcas rtsa ni brtse bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-14: de yis [?] mig gis blta mi nus //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-16: rtsa'i nyes pa de yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na rtsa ris dmar po shar shar bor gnas pa de la 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur pas rtsa khrag dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:135a-17: rtsa brtse zhing tsha ba tsag tsag por khyab par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-18: rtsa brtse ba des mig gis blta mi nus par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-19: rtsa yi dra bas g-yogs shing stug / mtho ba rtsa yi dra ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-21: rtsa'i dra ba zhes bya ba'i mig nad ni dkar po rtsa'i pa'i nad na khrag gis gang zhing che ba stug cing mtho bar gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-22: khrag gi mig mdzer 'jam zhing mnyam //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-25: khrag gi mig mdzer dang mnyam pa ste mig zur gyi nad dang tshul 'dra ba 'jam zhing mnyam pa /
T13TD4312.3E:135a-26: mdog padma 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni sha lhag can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-27: nad med ri bong khrag ltar dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-28: thig le ling thog dmar po yin //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-30: mig 'bras dkar po'i steng du ling thog nad kyi shas chung zhing ri bong gi khrag ltar dmar ba'i thig le 'byung ba de ni ming ling thog dmar po zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-32: dkar por khyab byed dmar nag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-33: khyab pa'i mdzer pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135a-35: 'jam zhing sra ba ma yin pa zug gzer gyi shas chung ba myur du mched cing 'phel bar byed pa dkar por khyab cing rgyas par byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:135a-36: mdog dmar nag tu gnas pa de'i ming ni khyab pa'i mdzer pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-0: @135b dri ma khrag bcas rtsa'i mdzer pa //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-1: rtsa rgyus dang 'dra rtsa mdzer yin //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-3: nad gzhi gsum gyi dri ma khrag tu bcas pa las byung ba'i rtsa'i mdzer pa rtsa rgyus dang 'dra bar gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rtsa'i mdzer pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-4: khrag skam gong bu ltar gnag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-5: sha ni che zhing rgyas pa gang ;
T13TD4312.3E:135b-6: / de ni sha lhag mdzer pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-8: sha gang khrag skam po'i gong bu ltar kha dog gnag cing shas che ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:135b-9: mdzer pa rgyas shing gtos che ba gang yin pa de ni sha lhag gi mdzer pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-10: tsha zhing reg na rtsub pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-11: rtsas g-yogs mig 'bras nag dang nye //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-12: 'brum phran yungs kar lta bus rtsa //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-14: mig 'bras nag po dang thag nye bar 'brum bu phra mo yungs kar lta bus khyab cing tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:135b-15: reg na rtsub pa dang ldan la rtsas g-yogs pa gang yin pa de ni ming rtsa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-16: nya phyis rtsa brtse rtsa'i nyes pa //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-17: 'bras phye mdud pa'i ling thog dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-18: drug po sman gyis gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-19: lhag ma bdun po mtshon gyis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-21: nya phyis la sogs pa'i mig nad drug po ni sman gyis gso zhing bcos par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-22: mig nad lhag ma bdun ni mtshon gyis dpyad du bya zhing gso'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-23: de yang sar ba sman gyis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-24: mdzer par bshad pa lnga po gang //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-25: rgyus pa dang ni rtsas g-yogs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-26: nag por phyin cing lpags gas 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-27: mthon po gcad par bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-29: mtshon gyis gso bar bya ba de dag kyang sar pa yin zhing nad byung nas ring po ma lon pa ni sman nyid kyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-30: mdzer par bshad pa lnga po rgyus pa dang rtsas g-yogs pa mig 'bras nag por phyin pa pags pa gas pa lta bur snang ba mthon po gang yin pa de ni mtshon gyis gcad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-31: de la mdzer pa lnga po ni /
T13TD4312.3E:135b-34: sha lhag gi mdzer pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:135b-36: rtsa rgyus kyi mdzer pa ste lnga'o //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-37: mthong byed steng du phyin pa spang //
T13TD4312.3E:135b-39: mdzer pa de mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i mig gi rgyal mo'i steng du mdzer pa de dag byung na ni spang zhing dor bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-0: de ltar na de yan chad mig @136a * //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-1: 'bras dkar po'i nad bcu gsum du bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-2: nag po 'am mthong byed la mkhris pas //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-3: pags pa brtol te ling tog ni //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-4: zug dmar mchi mar bcas pa skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-5: de yis mig 'bras dkyil 'khor nag /'dzam bu smin pa 'drar snang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-6: dma' ba rma yi ling thog ste //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-9: nag po zhes bya ba mig 'bras nag po'i sha'i steng ngam /
T13TD4312.3E:136a-10: mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi rgyal mo'i steng du mkhris pas 'khrugs par gyur nas pags pa brtol te ling tog zug cing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:136a-12: mchi ma dang bcas pa skyed par byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:136a-13: nad des mig gi 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor nag po 'dzam bu smin pa dang mdog 'dra bar snang bar gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:136a-14: ling thog de ni cung zad dma' ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:136a-15: de la ni ming rma'i ling thog ces bya la de ni shin tu gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-16: rim gnyis dag / brtol ba gso ba tsam yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-18: ling thog de rim pa gnyis brtol ba yin na ni de re zhig gsor rung ba tsam yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-19: der ni zug pa la sogs mang //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-20: nag po khab kyis phug snyam byed //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-22: rim pa gnyis brtol nas byung ba'i ling thog ni zug pa la sogs pa'i nad mang bar gyur pa dang mig 'bras nag po khab kyis phug pa snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-23: rim pa gsum ni brtol ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-24: rma yis khyab pa gser mi rung //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-26: ling tog de mig lpags kyi rim pa gsum po brtol te byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:136a-27: rmas khyab cing khebs pa gang yin pa de ni gsor mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-28: bad kan las gyur dung ltar dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-29: shas cher min gso sla dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-31: bad kan las gyur pa'i ling thog dung ltar shas cher dkar zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:136a-32: ha cang shas cher min pa gang yin pa de gso sla ba yin pas de ni ling thog dkar po zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-33: dmar zhing mchi ma spyi bag 'dzag /'brum phran dmar zhing shin tu na //
T13TD4312.3E:136a-35: khrag skyes ra ril 'dra ba spang //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-0: khrag 'khrugs par gyur pa las mig gi 'bras bu nag po'i lteng du 'brum bu phra mo kun las dmar zhing mchi ma spyi bag nal nal po 'dzag @136b la 'brum phran de zangs ltar dmar ba shin tu na la dbyibs ra'i ril ma 'dra bar 'jong zhing 'bur la nag pa de ni ra'i ril ma lta bu zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:136b-1: de gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-2: nad khrag bcas pas rtsa'i ling tog / de yis mig 'bras nag po khebs //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-3: tsha zhing na la dmar ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-4: rtsa yis kun du rgyas gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-5: rgyu med mchi ma grang dro dang //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-6: ska sla 'dzag pa de spang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-8: rlung la sogs pa'i nad khrag dang bcas pas /
T13TD4312.3E:136b-9: rtsa'i ling tog ces bya ba'i nad du 'gyur te nad des mig 'bras nag po khebs par gyur cing tsha ba la sogs pa kun du rgyas par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:136b-10: rgyu med par mchi ma grang ba dang dro ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:136b-11: ska ba dang sla ba 'dzag pa'i rtsa'i ling thog de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-12: nad gzhi khrag las mthong bcas gnag /'bras bu dkar por sgyur byed de //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-13: sprin dkar gyis ni g-yogs 'dra zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-14: nim pa ba ni bkas pa 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-15: shin tu mi bzad na zhing dmar ;
T13TD4312.3E:136b-16: / tsha zhing skrangs pas gzir ba dag / smin pas nyen pa'i ling tog de //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-17: mi bzad na ba spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-19: nad gzhi gsum po dang khrag 'khrugs pa las mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi rgyal mo dang bcas pa'i mig 'bras nag po dkar po'i gzugs su sgyur bar byed cing sprin dkar pos g-yogs pa lta bu la nim pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa 'bru'i phyed du bkas pa'i dbyibs dang 'dra bar gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:136b-20: shin tu mi bzad par na ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de smin pas nyen ba'i rgyus ling thog de shas cher mi bzad par gyur pa ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-21: gang gis mtshan ma nyams pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-22: nang sngo ba 'am dmar bcas pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-23: shin tu 'bur ba 'am gting ring ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-24: mchi mar bcas shing rtsa'i rmas khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-25: rnying pa 'am mtho dman can dag gam //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-26: dbus chad ling thog spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:136b-28: ling thog gang zhig skyes par gyur phan mthong bar byed pa'i mtshan ma zar ma'i me tog lta bur nyams par gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:136b-30: yang dmar ba dang bcas pa'i ling thog gam /
T13TD4312.3E:136b-31: gang shin tu 'bur zhing mtho ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:136b-32: gang ga ting ring zhing khong du bros pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:136b-33: gang mchi ma dang bcas shing rtsa'i rmas khyab ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:137a-2: gang mthon dman mi mnyam par gnas pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:137a-3: dbus su chad pa'i ling thog gang yin pa de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-4: nag po'i nad ni gsor rung dang //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-5: mi rung dbye ba rnam lnga yin //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-7: mig 'bras nag po'i nad ni gsor rung ba'i dbye ba dang de bzhin du gsor mi rung ba'i dbye bas rnam pa lngar bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-8: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:137a-9: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:137a-10: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:137a-13: // / de nas mig zur dang mig gi 'bras bu dkar po dang nag po'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-14: mig nad bcings pa sman pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-15: dugs byas rtse mo 'bras 'dras dbug / rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra bas bzhar //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-17: mig zur gyi nad bcings pa zhes bya ba la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:137a-18: sman pas dang po kho nar dugs byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-19: de'i 'og tu rtse mo 'bras 'dra ba'i gtsags bus phug cing brtol la de nas rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gtsags bus bzhar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-20: de'i 'og rgyam tsha pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-21: sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-22: de nas snga ma bzhin du bcing //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-23: pa to la'i lo skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-24: bskol pa'i sman khu thigs pa blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-26: de ltar bzhar ba'i 'og tu rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i sman sbyar bas bsku zhing byug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-27: de'i 'og tu sngar mig mchu'i nad gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa bzhin du bcing bar bya zhing de ltar bcings nas pa to la'i lo ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:137a-28: skyu ru ra bskol ba'i sman gyi thigs pa blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-29: tshigs can lcags kyu'i cha spyad kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-30: phyi ma'i mtshams kyi cha gsum gzung //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-31: 'phel gtsags kyis ni phyed gcad bya //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-32: gzhan du mchi ma rgyu la gnod //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-33: sbrang rtsi rgyam tshas bskus nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-34: mig mdzer lta bur gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-36: tshigs can zhes bya ba'i mig gi grva mtshams kyi nad la ni lcags kyu lta bu'i cha spyad kyis phyi'i mtshams kyi cha gsum nas gzung zhing blangs te de nas 'phel gtsags kyis phyed tsam du gcad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137a-37: de las gzhan du byas na mchi ma rgyu ba'i rtsa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-0: de ltar bcad nas kyang de la sbrang rtsi dang rgyam tshar @137b sbyar bas bskus te mig mdzer gso ba'i tshul du gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-1: chu ser rnag 'dzag gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-2: de nas de ni bcing bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-3: mig rnags cho gar bshad pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-4: las kun cho ga bzhin du bya //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-6: rnag gi chu ser 'dzag pa zhes bya ba'i mig gi grva mtshams kyi nad la ni dang por gtar ga gdab la khrag gzags nas de'i 'og tu rnag gi chu ser 'dzag pa'i nad de bcing par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:137b-7: de bzhin du mig rnags pa'i gso ba'i cho gar bshad pa'i las kun cho ga ji lta ba bzhin spyad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-8: rgyam tsha sge'u gsher nag tshur dang //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-9: lcags dang zangs ni zhib btags pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-10: phye ma'i mig sman gtang ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-11: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i khu ba blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-13: rnag gi chu ser 'dzag pa de la rgyam tsha la sogs pa zhib tu legs par btags pa'i phye ma'i mig sman gtang bar bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:137b-14: yang na rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar pa'i khu ba mig tu blugs shing gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-15: srin gyi rmen bu lci ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-16: dugs byas brtol te phyi bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-17: nag tshur rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-18: sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-20: srin gyi rmen bu ni lci ba 'am ril ma la sogs pas dugs byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:137b-21: gtsags bus brtol te de'i 'og tu gtsags bu nyid kyis phyi zhing bzhar la de nas nag tshur la sogs pa'i sman bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-22: nya phyis mkhris mchi 'dzag ltar gso //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-24: nya phyis zhes bya ba grva mtshams kyi mig nan ni mkhris ba las gyur ba'i mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mig nad ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-25: bad kan mdud pa 'bras phye gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-26: gtar ga ma gtogs bad kan gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-27: mchi ma 'dzag pa bzhin du gso //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-29: bad kan gyi mdud pa dang 'bras phye lta bu'i mig zur gyi nad gnyis ni gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba'i sbyor ba ma gtogs par bad kan las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa bzhin du gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-30: tsha ba gsum dang kad phal //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-31: ba lung khu ba'i mig sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-33: bad kan gyi mdud pa dang 'bras kyi phye ma'i mig nad gnyis la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:137b-34: tsha ba gsum dang kad pa la dang pa lung zhes bya ba pi dza pu ra'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i mig sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:137b-35: rgyam tsha dz'a ti kha 'bus pa //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-0: @138a * // thang shing bca' sga btags pa'i phye //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-1: chang gi dangs ma ri lung byas //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-2: mig sman skrang dang g-ya' ba sel //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-4: rgyam tshal sogs par sman btags pa'i phye ma chang gi dangs ma dang ri lu byas pa'i mig sman ni skrang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:138a-5: g-ya' ba sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-6: rtsa nyes rtsa brtse ling thog dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-7: rtsa dra khrag 'dzag lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-9: rtsa'i nyes pa dang rtsa brtse ba dang ling thog dmar po dang rtsa'i dra ba ni /
T13TD4312.3E:138a-10: khrag 'dzag pa'i mig nad dang 'dra bar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-11: rtsa yi nyes la khyad par du //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-12: mar dang sbrang rtsi'i mig sman bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-14: rtsa'i nyes pa la ni khyad par du mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-15: rtsa brtse ba la sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-16: skyer pa'i khanda zhib btags bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-18: rtsa brtse ba zhes bya ba la ni khyad par du sbrang rtsi dang skyer pa'i khanda zhib tu btags pa'i mig sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-19: ling thog dmar po zho ga chu //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-20: sbrang rtsi kha ra'i thigs pa blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-22: ling thog dmar po la ni khyad par du zho ga chu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:138a-23: sbrang rtsi dang kha ra sbyar ba'i thigs pa blugs na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-24: shel dang gur kum shing mngar dung //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-25: sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-27: yang ling thog dmar po la ni shel la sogs pa'i mig sman btang na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-28: yang na sbrang rtsi dung sbyar ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:138a-29: kha ra rgya mtsho'i lbu ba phan //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-31: yang na ling thog dmar po la sbrang rtsi dang dung sbyar ba'i mig sman phan pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:138a-32: yang na kha ra dkar po dang rgya mtsho'i lbu ba sbyar ba'i mig sman ling thog dmar bo la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-33: mdzer par bshad pa rnam lnga las //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-34: dud pa lta bu'i rnyog can dang //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-35: gang yang dmar zhing zho 'dra ba //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-36: de sman ling thog bzhin du bya //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-38: khyab pa'i mdzer pa la sogs pa'i mdzer pa rnam pa lngar bshad pa gang yin pa de dag las dud pa lta bu'i rnyog ma'i rdul tsam dmar zhing zho 'dra ba gang yin pa de la ni ling thog bzhin du lus dang mgo bo'i bkru sman btang pa dang bzhar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:138a-39: mig sman bsku ba la sogs pa byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-40: cig shos gan rkyal bzhag dugs byas //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-41: kha lung dang ni rgyam tsha dag / sbyar ba'i mig sman bskus nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:138a-42: mig btsums nas ni mnye bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-0: cig shos @138b te sngar bshad pa'i mig mdzer gyi nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:138b-1: gan rkyal du bzhag cing dugs byas la kha lung dang rgyam tshar sbyar ba'i mig sman bskus la mig btsums te mnye bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-2: de ltar mig ni 'khrugs bcas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-3: sha lhag skyes pa bskyod nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-4: mgo po mi 'gyur dam du bzung //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-5: mig mchu mchog tu mi 'gul dang //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-6: mig zur du ni lta bzhin du //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-7: mig phugs mtshams nas mdzer pa mtho //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-8: gang du gnyer ma 'dus gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-9: der ni lcags kyus dam bzung pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-10: ha cang mi che mu tsi tra 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:138b-11: khab bam skud pas blangs nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-14: de ltar rnam pa 'dis 'khrugs shing nad dang bcas pa'i mig 'di'i sha lhag skyes pa bskyod cing mnyes pas g-yo bar byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:138b-15: nad g-yog gis mgo bo gzhan du mi 'gyur bar dam du bzung la mig mchu yang mi 'gul ba nyid du brtan par byas shing bzung la khyad par du mig zur de mig 'gram logs su lta bzhin du /
T13TD4312.3E:138b-16: mig phugs kyi mtshams nas mdzer pa mtho zhing 'phags par 'gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-17: de ltar byas pa na gang dang gang du gnyer ma 'dus par gyur pa de dang der lcags kyus dam du bzung zhing blangs la /
T13TD4312.3E:138b-18: ha cang rgya che ba ma yin par byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:138b-19: mu tsi tra zhes bya ba'i cha spyad dam khab bam skud pas blangs la de'i 'og tu kun nas te thams cad nas dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gtsags bus dbral bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-20: de nas bton te dral nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-21: mig phugs mtshams su bsnyen nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-22: cha bzhi lus par gcad bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-23: mig phugs rtsa dang mchi ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-24: 'dzag pa'i rtsa la mi gnod bsrung //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-26: de nas mig mdzer de dpral zhing phug nas mig phugs kyi phyogs su bsnyen cing drangs nas cha bzhi lus pa tsam du de gcad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-27: mig phugs kyi rtsa dang mchi ma 'dzag pa'i rtsa la ni mi gnod cing mtshon gyis mi phog par bsrung ste /
T13TD4312.3E:138b-28: mtshon gyis gcad par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-29: mig phugs zur bcad mchi ma 'dzag / mig gi rtsa sbubs rma can 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:138b-31: gal te mig phugs sna gong gi mig zur de bcad cing gnod par gyur na rtag tu mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:138b-32: mig gi rtsa sbubs la rma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-2: mig phugs zur du bltas te bya //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-4: mig 'gram nas mig mdzer cher skyes shing 'phags par gyur pa la ni mig phugs kyi zur du nad pa bltar bcug la de la bzhi cha lus bar spyad par bya zhing mig zur dang rtsa la mi gnod par bsrung par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-5: legs par bcad de tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-6: rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-7: zhun mar dron po blugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-8: sbrang rtsi mar sbyar bskus te bcings //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-10: mdzer pa legs par bcad cing pags pa la gnod par ma gyur par byas nas rma de la tsha ba gsum la sogs pa bsku bar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:139a-11: zhun mar dro 'jam tsam blugs bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:139a-12: sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar bas bskus te sngar bshad pa'i tshul du bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-13: de nas zhag gsum la sogs nas //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-14: bkrol nas ka ranydza'i sa bon //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-15: 'o ma bskol ba de bzhin blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-17: de nas rma de zhag gsum la sogs pa'i nyin par bkrol la /
T13TD4312.3E:139a-19: 'o ma bskol ba dro 'jam tsam gyi thigs pa blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-20: ser po rnam gnyis pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-21: shing mngar dang ni rgya skyegs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-22: ka ranydza yi me tog ni //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-23: kha 'bus sbrang rtsir bcas bskol blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-25: gsum po la sogs pa'i nyin zhag la mig gi chings ma bkrol te /
T13TD4312.3E:139a-26: ser po rnam gnyis la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:139a-27: ka ranydza'i me tog kha 'bus pa bskol ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa mig tu blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-28: zhag bdun nas ni de dgrol bya //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-30: zhag bdun pa la ni de dgrol bar bya'i bcing par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-31: legs par bcad na nad med 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-33: mig gi mdzer pa de legs par bcad par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:139a-34: mig de nad med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-36: sman khu blugs dang mig sman sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-37: phyi ba dang ni brta bas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-40: mchod cing bcad ma legs pa las nad du gyur pa la ni sman gyi khu ba la sogs pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-41: kha ra ldong ros ae li ya //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-42: rgyam tsha bca' sga zho re dang //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-43: skyer pa'i khanda srang phyed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-44: sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-45: bad kan las gyur rab rib dang //
T13TD4312.3E:139a-46: chu ser gyis gang ling tog dang //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-0: mig mdzer bcas pa'i sha lhag @139b sel //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-2: kha ra dkar po la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag sna re zhing [?] zho re dang /
T13TD4312.3E:139b-3: skyer pa'i khanda srang phyed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-4: sbrang rtsi sbyar zhing sbrus pa'i mig sman gyis ni bad kan las gyur pa'i rab rib la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-6: ae la ba lu ka dang ma lung ka dang ha ri ba lu ka zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-7: 'bras bu gsum ni gang rung ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-8: shun pa chur btags lde gur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-9: kham phor sbyar ba'i nang du bsreg / de nas tshig nas phye mar btags //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-10: sman ni lhag ma'i khu ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-11: so sor legs par bsgos nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-12: snag tsha de bskams slar yang btags //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-13: rgyam tsha nyis 'gyur bcas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-14: mig sman gsum po de dag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-15: phyi ba'i mchog tu mu khyud 'chad //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-17: 'bras bu gsum gang yang rung pa'i shun pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:139b-19: ba ru ra'i shun pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-20: skyu ru ra'i shun pa gang yang rung ba chur btags te lde gur byas la kham phor sbyar ba'i nang du du ba ma shor bar bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-21: de nas tshig par gyur pa dang phye mar btags te de nas sman gyi lhag ma 'bras bu gsum las bzhag pa'i gnyis po'i khu ba dang so sor legs par bsgos shing bsregs nas snag tsha 'dra ba de yang bskams pa btags te rgyam tsha nyis 'gyur dang bcas pa'i mig sman gsum pa de dag ni phyi zhing bsal ba'i mig sman gyi mchog yin par drang srong mu khyud ces bya bas bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-22: rtsa yi dras g-yogs rtsa gang zhig / sra bas phyi ba'i sman dag gis //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-23: ma zhi 'brum phran de la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-24: mig mdzer cho ga bzhin du gso //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-26: rtsa'i dra bas g-yogs pa'i rtsa gang zhig sra zhing mkhrang bas phyi zhing bsal pa'i sman bskus su zin kyang nad de zhi zhing med par ma gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:139b-27: 'brum phran de la mig mdzer gyi gso ba ltar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-28: ling tog nad gzhi'i dbang las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-29: snum rtsub 'bras bu gsum sbyin zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-30: tig ta chen po'i sman mar sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-31: gtar ga bkru sman sman khu yi //
T13TD4312.3E:139b-32: thigs pa blugs pa la sogs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-0: ling thog gsor rung ba dag la ni nad gzhi rang rang gi gang dag yin pa'i dbang du byas nas snum pa'am rtsub pa dag 'bras bu gsum sbyin par bya zhing tig ta @140a * //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-1: chen po'i sman mar sbyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140a-2: de bzhin du gtar ga gdab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140a-3: bkru sman du gtang bar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140a-4: sman khu'i thigs pa mig tu blugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140a-8: mig sman gyi phur ma btso ba'i sbyor ba dag byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-9: snad pa'i ling thog dur byid chu //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-10: lan gsum bskol pa'i mar blud bya //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-12: snad cing rma byung ba las ling thog tu gyur pa la ni dur byid bskol ba'i khu ba dang ldan gsum gyi bar du bskol ba'i sman mar blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-13: de 'og gtar ga 'am pad pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-14: mig las khrag ni dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-16: de'i 'og tu snad pa'i ling thog de la gtar ga gdab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140a-17: srin bu pad pas 'jib tu gzhug pas khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-19: shing mngar bi da ri bskol ba //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-21: chu bskol thigs pa blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-23: yang na snad pa'i ling thog la ra'i 'o ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140a-24: autpal la sogs pa sman bskol ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du khar btab pa blugs pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:140a-25: yang na autpal la sogs pa'i sman chu'i nang du bskol pa'i thigs pa blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-26: mig dmar mchi ma nad zhi nas //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-27: de rjes phyi ba'i mig sman phan //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-29: mig dmar ba la sogs pa zhi bar gyur nas de'i 'og tu phyi ba'i mig sman btang na ling thog la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-30: dz'a ti kha 'bus rgya skyegs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-31: yug snam tsandan ri lur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-32: khrag dang mkhris pa dang byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-33: snad pa las gyur ling thog sel //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-35: dz'a ti'i me tog kha 'bus ba la sogs pa'i ri lur byas pa'i mig sman gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-36: khrag dang mkhris pa dang zhing spyod par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140a-37: snad par gyur pa'i ling thog sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-38: phag dang rnga mo glang po che //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-39: ba lang ra rta bong bu'i so //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-40: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba mu tig dang //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-41: na le sham ni bzhi bar sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-42: so yi ri lus snad pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-43: ling thog gis khyab sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:140a-45: phag la sogs pa'i so dang rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140b-0: mu tig dang na le sham bzhi por sbyar ba'i mig @140b sman so'i ri lu zhes bya bas snad pa'i ling thog gis shin tu khyab pa dag kyang sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-1: ta ma'i lo ma ba lang so //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-2: rgya mtsho lbu ba bong bu'i rus //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-3: zangs ma dung gcin ri lur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-4: ling tog thams cad sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-6: tam la'i lo ma la sogs pa gcin dang ri lur byas pas ni ling thog thams cad 'jig cing sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-7: rin chen so dang rva dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-8: khams dang sug smel tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-9: sgog skya ka ranydza'i sa bon //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-10: rma la phan pa'i sman rnams ni //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-11: rma bcas rma med gting zug dang //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-12: lpags gnas ling thog 'joms sman yin //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-14: mar gad la sogs pa rin po che rnams dang //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-15: glang po che la sogs pa'i so dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140b-16: gser la sogs pa'i khams te 'byung khungs las byung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-17: sug smel la sogs pa'i sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140b-18: rma la phan pa'i sman rma'i dbang du byas nas 'og nas bshad pa de thams cad mig sman du byas pa'i rma dang bcas pa'i ling tog dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140b-19: rma med pa'i ling tog dang gting du zug pa'i ling thog dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140b-20: pags pa la gnas pa'i ling thog 'joms shing sel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-21: sna sman snum blud sha khu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-22: blud pas dma' ba bstod par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-23: nad med ling tog dma' ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-24: phur ma btsos dang brta bas bstod //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-26: dma' zhing gting na yod pa'i ling tog ni snum blud pa dang sna sman btang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140b-27: sha khu blud pas bstod par bya ba la nad med pa'i ling tog gis dma' ba ni sman gyi phur ma btsos pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:140b-28: brta ba'i sbyor bas bstod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-29: ling tog dkar po skyer pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-30: shing mngar thal tres seng phrom chu //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-31: blugs pas seng phrom gtums pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-32: chu dron la spangs thigs pa blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-34: ling thog dkar po la ni skyer pa la sogs pa bskol pa'i chu'i thigs pa blugs par bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:140b-35: yang na seng phrom btags te thum por gtums pa chu dron po la spangs pa'i thigs pa blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:140b-36: shing mngar bri ha ti'i rtsa ba //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-2: skyu ru ra'i 'bras chu dang btags //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-3: lde gu zangs ma'i snod la bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-4: nas mar skyu ru ra'i lo ma //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-5: dud pas de 'og mang du bdug / de las ri lur bya ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-6: de ni chu dang sbrang rtsir btags //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-7: mthon ka chen po zhes bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-8: ling thog dkar po sel mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-10: shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bskol ba'i chu dang btags pa'i lde gus zangs ma'i snod bskus la nas dang mar la sogs pa'i dud pas zangs ma'i snod bskus la nas dang mar la sogs pa'i dud pas zangs ma'i snod de bskus pa'i 'og tu mang du bdug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-11: de nas zangs ma'i snod de chu dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar zhing btags te ri lur byas pa'i mig sman de'i ming mthon ka chen po zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:141a-12: ling thog dkar po sel zhing 'joms par byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-13: ling thog brtan zhing mthug pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-14: khrag ni lan mang dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-15: mgo dang lus kyi bkru sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-16: phur ma btsos pa 'ang lan mang gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-18: ling thog brtan pa la sogs pa la ni gtar ga la sogs pas khrag mang du dbyung bar bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-19: mgo bo'i bkru sman la sogs pa lan mang du gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-20: pi pi ling dang na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-22: 'bras bu gsum bskol rgyam tshar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-23: blud pas gnas las bstod par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-25: ling thog dkar po de gnas nas bskyod cing bstod par bya ba'i phyir pi pi ling nas shri sha'i 'bras bu'i bar gyis sam /
T13TD4312.3E:141a-26: yang na rgyam tsha dang 'bras bu gsum bskol te zhag gsum gyi bar du blud pas bstod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-27: dung dang rgya shug ka ta ka / rgun 'bru shing mngar sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-28: mu ra so yi dri ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-29: shi ri sha yi me tog bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-30: tshigs bcad phyed kyis bshad pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-31: mig sman sbyor ba gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-33: yang na ling thog dkar po de bskyod cing bstod par bya ba'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:141a-34: dud la sogs pa dang mur la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad phyed phyed kyis bshad pa'i mig sman gyi sbyor ba 'di gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-0: skyu ru pha nid @141b dza'i khu bar //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-1: lang ka li yi thal ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-2: nub gcig spangs te skams pa'i phye //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-3: ling tog bskyod pa'i mig sman yin //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-5: skyu ru ra dang pha nid dza ka bskol ba'i khu bar lang ga li'i thal ba nub gcig spangs pa de skams la phye mar byas pa'i mig sman de ni ling thog bskyed pa stod par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-6: mungga sbun [?] pa med btags pa //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-7: dung dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-9: yang na sran mungga spun pa med par btags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:141b-10: dung dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i mig sman ni ling thog sel ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-11: sbrang rtsi ma du ka'i snying po 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-12: ba ru ra rkang sbrang rtsir bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-14: ma du ka'i snying po sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:141b-15: ba ru ra'i rkang gi tshi gu sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba yang ling thog sel to //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-16: ba glang rta bong rnga mo'i so //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-17: dud [?] dang rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-18: aa rdzu na'i chus ri lu byas //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-19: bskyod pa'i ling thog 'jig par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-21: ba glang la sogs pa'i so dang dung la sogs pa aa rdzu na'i chu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:141b-22: ri lur byas pas kyang bskyod cing bstod pa'i ling thog 'jig par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-23: bstod pa 'am zug rngur bcas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-24: ling thog spu la sogs pas phyi //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-26: ling tog bstod pa 'am zug rdu dang bcas pa ni spu la sogs pas phyi bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-27: rtsa yi ling thog mthong gnod med //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-28: snad pa'i ling thog sta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-30: rtsa'i ling thog mthong bar byed ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:141b-31: gnod pa med pa'i rma'i ling thog ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-32: shing mngar stag tsher ram nye ba //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-33: bri ha ti dang aa ka ru //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-34: skyer pa'i mig sman ra'i 'o ma //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-35: btags pa'i lde gu nas dang mar //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-36: bcas pa'i dud pas bdug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-37: skyu ru ra yi lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:141b-38: ri lur byas pa mig sman mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:141b-39: shing mngar dang stag tsher pa zhes bya ba pra punda r'i ka la sogs pa ra'i 'o ma dang btags te lde gur byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:141b-40: nas dang mar dang bcas pa'i dud bas bdugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:142a-0: skyu ru ra'i lo mas rim gyis dud @142a * //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-1: pas bdugs pa'i ri lur byas pa ni rtsa'i ling thog sel ba'i sman gyi mchog dam pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-2: me so sar yi ril ma 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-3: mdzer ba lta bur mtshon gyis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-5: nad de gal te zhi zhing sos [?] bar [?] ma gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-6: rtsa'i ling thog la mig mdzer gyi dpyad ltar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:142a-7: de bzhin du ra'i ril ma lta bu zhes bya ba'i mig nad la yang mdzer pa ltar mtshon gyis gcad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-8: ra ril gsor ni mi rung dang //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-9: ling thog de 'dra de bzhin gzhan //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-10: nad ma zhin snum blud cing //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-11: gtar ga gdab pa la sogs bya ;
T13TD4312.3E:142a-12: / smad byas de ni bsal bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-13: dkar zhing mtho ba gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-15: ra'i ril ma lta bu'i mig nad gsor mi rung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:142a-16: de bzhin du ling thog kyang de dang 'dra bar gsor mi rung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:142a-17: mig nad gzhan dag rtag tu nad ma zhi bar gyur pa la snum blud pa la sogs pas gso bar bya zhing de bzhin du smad par bya zhing mig nad 'jigs pa de thabs de dag gis bsal bar bya zhing dkar ba dang mtho zhing 'bur ba'i nad bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-18: rgya star go bye lung tang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-19: ta la smyig ma ka ri ra //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-20: bsregs pa'i thal chu btsags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-21: rnga mo'i rus pa'i phye ma bsre //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-22: mig sman ling thog gso dka' dang //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-23: mdog mi sdug pa 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-25: rgya star la sogs pa bsregs pa'i thal ba chu la spangs [?] te /
T13TD4312.3E:142a-26: btsags pa thal chu de dang rnga mo'i rus pa'i phye ma bsres la /
T13TD4312.3E:142a-27: mig sman des ni ling tog gso dka' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:142a-28: mdog mi sdug pa rnams 'joms shing sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-29: gso sla la yang 'di nyid ni //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-30: bsten pas sel bar nus pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-32: ling tog gso zhing bcos par sla ba la yang bshad ma thag pa'i phye ma'i mig sman 'di nyid bsten zhing bskus na nad de sel bar nus pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-33: ra yi ril ma ngos gnyis nas //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-34: khab kyis phug ste chu gzags nas //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-35: mthe bos mnyam du btsir nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-36: rma yi nang ni sha phye dang //
T13TD4312.3E:142a-37: tshil ni rlon pas bkang nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-0: dkri zhing dkri zhing dgang @142b par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-2: ra'i ril ma lta bu zhes bya ba'i mig nad la ngos gnyis nas khab phra mos phug la chu gzags nas mthe bos cha mnyam du legs par btsir ba de'i rjes la rma'i nang na ba lang gi sha'i phye mas legs par bkang nas de bzhin du dkris shing phyis yang bkrol la de'i rjes la ba lang gi sha'i phye ma dang tshil rlon pas rma dgang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-3: gzhan bdun nas ni rma 'byor nas //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-4: mig 'bras nag po mnyam brtan la //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-5: mig sman snum can gtang bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-6: mar dang 'o ma'i sna sman blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-9: rma 'byor cing 'tsho bas pa'i rjes la mig 'bras nag po mnyam zhing brtan par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:142b-10: mig sman snum can mar dang sbyar ba gtang bar bya zhing mar dang 'o ma bskol ba'i sna sman blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-11: de ltar na yang rgyas gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-12: dbug dang gcad sogs bya ba byas //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-13: bcad drags pa yis mig nang du //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-14: zhugs par mi 'gyur ci rigs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-16: de ltar sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis gso ba byas su zin kyang slar gang zhing rgyas par gyur na ra'i ril ma lta bu'i mig nad de la dbug pa dang bcad pa la sogs pa'i gso ba ci rigs par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:142b-17: rnam pa gang gis bcad drags pa'i rgyus mig nang du zhugs par mi 'gyur bar legs pa kho nar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-18: ling thog la ni rtag par rang gi sman //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-19: bskol ba'i mar blud sna sman bsten pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-20: ci nas mthong ba nyams par mi 'gyur bar //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-21: mig sman rnon po rtag tu bsten par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-23: ling thog gi mig nad la ni dus rtag par rang gi mig nad dang rjes su mthun pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i mar blud pa dang sna sman tshad phran bsten bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:142b-24: de ltar byas bas ci nas kyang mig gi mthong ba nyams par mi 'gyur bar mig sman rnon po rtag tu bsten zhing goms par byas na nang du zhugs shing stobs nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:142b-25: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying bo'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:142b-26: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:142b-27: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig ba'i rnam bar 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:143a-0: // / @143a * // de nas mthong bar byed pa'i mig nad kyi nad dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-2: go rims su bab pa'i mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi rgyal mor nad zhugs pa'i tshul du shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad cing brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-3: nad ni rtsa yi nang zhugs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-4: rim pa dang por gnas nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-5: gzugs ni mi gsal mthong 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-6: rgyu med par yang gsal bar mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-8: rlung la sogs pa'i nang gang yang rung ba rtsa'i nang du zhugs shing 'gro bar gyur pa'i nad des rim pa dang po ste phyi rim du gnas shing brten par gyur pa na /
T13TD4312.3E:143a-9: mig gis gzugs mi gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:143a-10: lan 'ga' zhig ni de ltar 'gyur ba'i rgyu med par gsal ba nyid du yang mthong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-11: rim pa gnyis par phyin pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-12: med pa dag kyang mthong 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-13: yod cing nye bar bsgribs na mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-14: ring nas phra ba mthong bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-15: nye dang ring bar gnas pa'i gzugs //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-16: phyin ci log tu shes par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-18: nad de mig gi rim pa gnyis par phyin par gyur ba na med par gyur ba'i gzugs dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:143a-19: gzugs can du yod cing gan na gnas te nye ba dag la bsgribs te bltas na mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:143a-20: thag ring po nas mthong bar 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:143a-21: nye ba dang ring bar gnas pa'i gzugs la phyin ci log tu shes pa skye ste /
T13TD4312.3E:143a-22: ring po na yod pa'i gzugs ni nye zhing gnan yod pa lta bur snang bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:143a-23: nye ba na yod pa'i gzugs ni ring po na gnas par shes par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-24: nad kyis zlum po'i dbyibs 'dra bar //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-25: zlum po nyid du mthong bar 'gyur /
T13TD4312.3E:143a-27: rim pa gnyis pa na gnas par gyur pa na skyes bus gzugs nas kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs 'dra bar zlum po kho nar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-28: mthong byed dbus gnas gcig gnyis mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:143a-29: mang du gnas na du ma mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-0: nad mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi rgyal mo'i dbus na gnas na dngos po gcig la gnyis su @143b mthong bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:143b-1: mthong bar byed pa der nad mang du gnas na gzugs du ma ste /
T13TD4312.3E:143b-2: sna tshogs par mthong bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-3: mthong byed nang du zhugs pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-4: che chung go ni bzlog pa mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-6: nad mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi rgyal mo'i nang du zhugs na gzugs che ba yang chung bar mthong la chung ngu ni che bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-7: 'og tu gnas pas nye mi mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-8: steng du gnas pas ring mi mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-10: mthong bar byed pa'i 'og na nad gnas par gyur na gzugs nye bar gnas pa mthong bar mi 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:143b-11: mthong bar byed pa'i steng na nad gnas na gzugs ring po na gnas pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-12: ngos la gnas pas g-yas g-yon min //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-13: nad 'dir ba rib ces byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-15: nang mthong bar byed pa'i ngos gnyis la gnas par gyur na g-yas g-yon gyi logs na gnas pa'i gzugs mthong bar mi 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:143b-16: nad 'di dag ni rab rib kyi nad ces bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-17: nad ni rim pa gsum par brten //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-18: sngon po nyid du 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-19: de yis steng mthong 'og mi mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-20: gos srab kyis g-yogs ltar mthong zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-21: kha dog ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-22: rim gyis mthong ba nyams par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-24: rlung la sogs pa'i nad mig sprin gyi rim pa gsum pa la brten cing gnas par gyur na mig mching bu ltar sngon por 'gyur ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:143b-25: sngon por gyur pa des steng na gnas pa'i gzugs mthong bar byed kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:143b-26: 'og na gnas pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:143b-27: gang mthong ba de gos srab mos g-yogs pa ltar mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:143b-28: kha dog ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de la de bzhin du me long ltar rnam par mthong bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:143b-29: mthong ba de rim gyis nyams shing nus pa chung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-30: de ltan yang yal bar dor //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-31: rim pa bzhi par phyin nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-32: mthong byed mtshan mo nyams byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:143b-33: mig gi rgyal mo khebs par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-0: de ltar mig mching bu ltar sngon por gyur na yang yal bar dor te ma bcos @144a * //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-1: na nad de mig gi rim pa bzhi par phyin nas mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi mchan ma'i dang po nyams par byed cing mig gi rgyal mo khebs pas long bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-2: de lta na de yan chad ni rab rib la sogs pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.3E:144a-3: / de la rlung gyur rab rib ni //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-4: long long por ni mthong ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-5: g-yo zhing rnyog can rtsa dmar snang //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-6: ched 'ga' gsal bar mthong ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-7: dra ba skra shad sbrang bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-10: rab rib kyi nad de la rlung las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs 'khrugs shing long long por mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144a-11: g-yo zhing mi brtan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144a-12: rnyog pa can de mi gsal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144a-13: phal cher rtsa dmar bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144a-14: ched 'ga' ni gzugs gsal bar mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144a-15: de bzhin du dra bas g-yogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144a-18: 'od 'bar ba lta bur yang ched 'ga' mthong ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-20: sngon bor gyur pa mig dmar la //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-21: bzhin la sna ni med par mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-22: zla ba med sogs du mar mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-23: yon po 'ang drang por mthong bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-25: de la rlung las gyur pa'i rab rib de yal bar bor zhing ma bcos na sngon por gyur pa las thal te /
T13TD4312.3E:144a-26: mig dmar bar gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144a-27: mig nad spris g-yogs pas nyen ba'i mi des rang gi bzhin de gdong la sna med par mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144a-28: yang zla ba la sogs pa la gzugs du ma mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144a-29: gzugs yon po yang drang por shes shing mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-30: sngon bo 'phel na mthong byed ni //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-31: rdul gyis khebs pa lta bur mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-32: gsal zhing dmar ba 'am rgya che ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-33: phra mo 'am mthong ba nyams par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:144a-34: de ni mthong ba nyams pa yin ;
T13TD4312.3E:144a-36: mig nad mching bu lta bur sngo ba de nyid 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur na mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rdul gyi tshogs kyis khebs shing g-yogs pa lta bur 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144b-0: gsal ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba mthong zhing mthong ba nyams @144b par byed par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:144b-1: de lta bu'i mig nad de ni mthong ba nyams pa'am mtshan ma nyams pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-3: de la long ba dang spris g-yogs pa dang mtshan ma nyams pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang 'thob bo //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-5: mthong byed gting du zhugs pa dag /'di ni gting ring zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-7: rlung gi nad las gyur pa'i mthong ba nyams pa'i nad la ni mig gi rtsa 'khums par 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144b-8: de bzhin du mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi rgyal mo'i gting du zhugs shing nang du zhen pa yin te ;
T13TD4312.3E:144b-9: mig nad 'di ni mig gting ring ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-10: zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-11: mkhris gyur rab rib glog dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-12: srin bu me khyer me sgron 'od //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-13: rma bya sreg pa'i sgro dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-14: phal cher sngon por mthong bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-16: mkhris pa las gyur ba'i mig nad rab rib ni glog dang srin bu me khyer la sogs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa lta bur gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144b-17: de bzhin du rma bya'i mjug sgro dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144b-18: sreg ba'i sgro 'dra bar gzugs kha dog sna tshogs su mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144b-19: phal cher de mang du gzugs sngon por mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-21: de lta bu ni mthong ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-22: nyi zla 'khyims dang me dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-25: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig sngon por gyur pa'i nad la ni mig 'khar ba'i g-ya' ltar sngo ba dang gzugs kyang 'khar ba'i sngon po ltar mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144b-26: de bzhin du nyi ma dang zla ba 'khyims shing zlum pos bskor ba lta bur mthong ba dang /
