T13TD4312.3E:144b-27: de bzhin du me dang smig rgyu dang 'ja' tshon lta bur gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-28: bung ba ltar sngo mthong ba med //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-29: 'bras bu snum pa mthong nyams yin //
T13TD4312.3E:144b-31: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad bung ba ltar sngo ba'i bung ba'i mdog ltar sngo nag tu snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:144b-32: de bzhin du mthong ba med cing gzugs mthong ba las nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145a-1: gzugs mthong ba nyams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-2: mkhris bas mig ni chung zhes bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-3: chung mthong de ni thung du yin //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-5: mkhris pa 'khrugs par gyur pa las mig gang chung ngur mthong ba de ni ming chung du mthong ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-6: ser zhing dngos po ser bor mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-7: mkhris pas tshig par gyur ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-9: mkhris ba las gyur pa'i mig nad mig ser zhing dngos po ser por mthong ba de ni ming mkhris pas tshig pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-10: bad kan rab rib phal cher ni //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-11: snum zhing dkar bar mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145a-12: dud dang zla ba kun dang //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-13: kun da'i me tog lta bus khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-15: bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad rab rib can phal cher de mang du ni gzugs snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145a-17: de bzhin du gzugs dud [?] dang zla ba la sogs pa lta bus khyab cing g-yogs pa lta bur mthong ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:145a-18: de ni mig nad dkar po zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-19: sngon bo 'od med nyi zla dang //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-20: sgron mes khyab ba lta bur mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-23: de nyid yal bar bor zhing ma gsos na mching bu lta bur sngon por gyur cing 'od med pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145a-24: sgron ma la sogs pa lta bur khyab cing gzugs mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145a-25: de ni mig 'bras dkar po nyid du snang zhing mngon par gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-26: bad kan mthong nyams des mngon khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-27: snum zhing mthong ba nyams 'gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-28: chu yi thigs pa padma yi //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-29: 'dab ma'i steng na gnas ltar g-yo //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-30: dron zhum par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-31: grang bas yongs su khyab par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-32: zla ba me tog kun da dung //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-33: shel ltar snang zhing dkar ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:145a-35: bad kan las gyur ba'i spris g-yogs shing mthong ba nyams pa'i mig nad ni bad kan gyis mngon sum du khyab pa lta bur snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145a-36: mig snum par snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145a-37: mthong ba nyams shing long bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145a-38: de bzhin du chu'i thigs pa padma'i 'dab ma'i steng du gnas pa lta bur g-yogs par snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-0: thigs pa de dro ba'i gnas su @145b ni zhum zhing 'dus par gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-1: grib ma dang grang ba'i gnas su yongs su khyab cing rgyas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-2: yang de zla ba la sogs pa 'ga' yang rung babs kyang dkar bar 'gyur par snang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-3: khrag gi rab rib dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-4: mun par gyur ba mthong ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-6: khrag las gyur pa'i rab rib ni spris g-yogs pa dmar bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-7: gzugs mun par zhugs ba lta bur mthong ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-8: sngon po dmar ba'am gnag par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-9: mig gis de ltar mthong ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-11: khrag las mig nad mching bu ltar sngon por gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-12: mig dmar po 'am nag por gyur cing mig gis kyang dmar po 'am nag por mthong bar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-13: mtshan ma nyams pa'ang de ltar mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-14: 'od med mthong ba nyams pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-16: de yal bar bor bas mtshan ma nyams shing spris g-yogs pa khrag las gyur pa'ang mig de dang 'dra ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-17: dmar po 'am nag por gyur zhing gzugs de gnyis ltar mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-18: de bzhin du mig gi rgyal mo 'od med cing mthong ba nyams shing long bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-20: rab rib la sogs mtshan ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-21: 'dren ma yin par shes par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-23: nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan pa'am gsum 'dus bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-24: rab rib dang sngon po [?] dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-25: spris g-yogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dren mar snang ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-26: glo bur du ni rab rib dag / gsal dang mi gsal 'khrugs par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-28: ldan pa dang 'dus pa las rab rib tu 'gyur ba ni glo bur du gsal bar 'khrugs par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-30: lan 'ga' ni mi gsal bar gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-31: lhag ma dag gis mthong byed ni //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-32: dmar zhing sna tshogs dag tu snang //
T13TD4312.3E:145b-34: sngon po dang mthong ba nyams ba ltag ma 'dus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:145b-35: ldan pa las gyur ba ni mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dmar zhing sna tshogs su snang ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-1: pa dang 'dus pa'i rab rib gcig tu bshad pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-2: ldan pa las gyur pa'i rab rib gcig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-3: ldan pa las gyur pa'i mig sngon por gyur pa gcig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-4: ldan pa las gyur pa'i mthong ba nyams pa gcig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-5: de bzhin du ldan pa las gyur pa'i rab rib gcig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-6: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mig sngon por gyur pa gcig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-7: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mthong ba nyams pa gcig yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-8: gang gis mthong byed nad kyis khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-10: de ni nyin mthong mtshan mo min //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-11: ne'u le long ba zhes de bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-13: mig gang gis mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis khyab cing sre mo'i mig dang 'dra bar 'tsher bar snang bar 'gyur ba'i nad de ni ming ne'u le long ba zhes bya bar bshad de /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-14: ne'u le long ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de'i mtshan nyid de ni nyin mor dngos po sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-15: mtshan mo mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-16: nyi ma nub par gyur pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-18: mthong byed nyams par byed pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-19: nad kyis long ba gnyis pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-20: nyi ma'i zer gyis phog pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-21: mthong ba'i lam nas dri ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-22: zhu zhing med par gyur nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-23: nyin mo gsal bar mthong bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-25: nyi ma ri'i rtse las nub par gyur cing nyin mo'i mtha' mar 'od mi snang bar gyur pa na /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-26: mig gi nad de rengs shing sra bar gyur nas mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi rgyal mo bsgribs shing khebs par gyur pas mthong bar byed pa nyams par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-27: de ni nad kyis mtshan mo long ba snga ma las gnyis par gyur pa nyid yin te mtshan mo long ba 'di la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mthong bar byed pa na yod pa'i nad mthong bar byed pa'i lam gyi mig nas dri ma de zhu zhing med par gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:146a-28: nyin mo dngos po gsal ba kho nar mthong bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-29: tsha bas gdungs te mod la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-30: chu grang nang du zhugs gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:146a-31: nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs te //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-0: drod ni gyen 'gro de nas mig @146b tsha zhing na dkar dri ma can //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-1: nyin mo long long por mthong zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-2: mtshan mo long bar gyur ba dag / de ni dro bas tshig ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-4: mig gang nyi ma la sogs pa'i tshabs gdungs shing nyen par gyur pa de /
T13TD4312.3E:146b-5: mod la de 'phral du chu grang mo'i nang du zhugs shing lus nub par byed pa'i rgyus //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-6: lus kyi nang na yod pa'i me drod kyi tshogs rlung la sogs pa'i nang gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs par gyur cing drod de nad de dang 'dres par gyur pas gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur la de nas de'i 'og tu rgyu des mig tsha zhing na bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:146b-7: mig 'bras dkar po dri ma can du 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:146b-8: des ni nyin mo ni mthong ba mi gsal zhing rnyog pa can long long bor mthong la mtshan mo'i dus su ni long zhing ci yang mi mthong bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:146b-9: mig nad de ni dro bas tshig ba zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-10: shas cher skyur zos nad dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-11: khrag dang bcas pas mig khyab 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-12: 'drul zhing g-yo ba dri ma can //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-13: de ni skyur gyis tshig ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-15: shas cher de ni mi zad pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:146b-16: yang dang yang du kha zas skyur bag zos pa las rlung la sogs pa'i nad khrag dang bcas pas mig gi nang khyab par 'gyur zhing khebs par gyur pas mig 'drul zhing rnags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:146b-17: shas cher g-ya' ba dang dri ma can du gyur pa'i mig nad de ni ming skyur gyis tshig pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-18: zhes slob dpon dag gis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-19: mya ngan rims dang mgo nad kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-20: rlung sogs gdungs par gyur ba las //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-22: de ni dud ba can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-24: skyes bu mya ngan la sogs pas gdungs par gyur pa las mig gis dud blta bur mthong zhing nang na dud pa bsku ba ltar 'khrugs pa'i mig nad de ni dud pa can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-25: snying stobs chung bas glo bur du //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-26: ngo mtshar can gyi gzugs mthong ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-27: nyi ma 'od can sogs mthong nas //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-28: mig la brten ba'i rlung la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:146b-29: gzi byin nyams pas mig gi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:147a-2: / bee d'urya mdog mkhrang bag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:147a-3: rang bzhin gnas ltar nad med 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:147a-5: mtshan ma nyams bzhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:147a-7: skyes bu snying stobs chung zhing blo zhen pas glo bur te 'phral du ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad dang ldan pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-8: yang na nyi ma la sogs pa 'od dang ldan zhing 'tsher ba'i gzugs mthong ba las mig la rten cing gnas pa'i nad kyis mig gi gzi byin gyi mdangs nyams par byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-9: mig gi mthong ba nyams par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-10: bee d'u rya'i mdog ltar sngo ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-11: mkhrang zhing gtar bag tu 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-12: rang bzhin du gnas shing tha mal par 'dug pa ltar na nad med par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-13: nad 'di ni 'phrad pa las byung ba'i mtshan ma nyams pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:147a-14: 'di las bad kan ma gtogs mtshan //
T13TD4312.3E:147a-15: nyams dang thung du gting zhen spang //
T13TD4312.3E:147a-17: mig nad 'di dag gi nang nas bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan ma'am /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-18: mthong ba nyams pa ma gtogs pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang khrag dang ldan pa dang 'dus pa dang 'phrad pa las gyur ba'i mthong ba nyams pa drug po spang bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-19: de bzhin du thung du zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-20: gting du zhen pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad kyang gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:147a-21: mig sngon drug dang ne'u le yi //
T13TD4312.3E:147a-24: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-26: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mig sngon po mching bu ltar gyur pa drug po dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-27: ne'u le long ba ste bdun po de dag ni re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du byar rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:147a-29: bcu gnyis po ni gso bar bya /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-31: lhag ma mig nad bcu gnyis po rlung dang mkhris pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-32: bad kan dang khrag dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-33: 'dus pa las gyur ba'i rab rib drug dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-35: bad kan gyis mtshan ma nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147a-36: mtshan mo long ba dang dro bas tshig pa dang skyur bas tshig pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:147b-0: dud pa @147b can te bcu gnyis po ni bcos su rung ba yin bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-1: de ltar mig nad nyi shu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-2: rtsa bdun dag tu bstan pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-4: tshul de ltar na mthong bar byed pa'i mtshan ma la gnod pa'i mig nad nyi shu rtsa bdun dag kyang bstan cing bshad pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.3E:147b-5: / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:147b-6: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:147b-7: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:147b-9: // / de nas rab rib gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-11: go rims kyis na le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-12: rab rib sngon po nyid 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-13: sngon po ma bcos long bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-14: de bas mig nad la rab rib //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-15: mi bzad myur du gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-17: dang por mig nad rab rib tu gyur pa de ma bcos shing gso ba ma byas na /
T13TD4312.3E:147b-18: rgyu des sngon po zhes bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:147b-19: spris g-yogs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:147b-20: de bzhin du sngon por 'gyur zhing spris g-yogs pa ma bcos na yang long ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-21: rgyu de bas ni mig nad thams cad kyi nang nas rab rib ni mi bzad cing 'jigs pa yin pas de myur ba kho nar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-22: 'tsho byed srang brgya chu bre ni //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-23: bcu drug nang bskol bzhi cha lus //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-24: khu ba 'o ma bre do dang //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-25: mar ni bre gang lhan cig btso //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-26: stag tsher ba dang ram nye ba //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-27: seng phrom rgyam tsha pi pi ling ;
T13TD4312.3E:147b-28: / shu ti shing mngar rgun 'bru dang //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-29: thang shing kha ra 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-30: zho ni gnyis gnyis btab bskol te //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-31: mtshan 'thungs rab rib sel mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:147b-33: sman 'tsho byed dzi ban ti zhes bya ba srang brgya chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol la de las bzhi cha ste bre bzhi lus pa'i khu ba dang mar bre gang dang /
T13TD4312.3E:148a-0: 'o ma bre do dang stag tsher ba zhes bya ba pra punda r'i ka dang ram nye ba la sogs pa'i sman zho gnyis btags pa'i lde gu bcug ste bskol la sman mar de mtshan mo nyal khar 'thungs na rab rib sel zhing 'joms par @148a * //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-3: ram nye ba gnyis dzi ba ka / kha ra nye'u shing med dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-5: zho ni gnyis gnyis mar rnying ni //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-6: bre gang 'o ma de mnyam bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-7: de yis mig sngon rab rib dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-8: mar gyis mgo bo'i nad rnams 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-10: rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i sman sna re re zhing zho gnyis gnyis dang mar rnying pa bre gang dang 'o ma de dang mnyam pa ste bre gang bskol ba'i sman mar des ni mig sngon po la sogs pa'i nad rnams 'joms par byed do ;
T13TD4312.3E:148a-11: / nim pa skyer ba pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-12: pu tse shel dang pu shel tse //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-13: 'bras bu gsum dang ba sha ka / byi tshe rang dang kyi lce ba //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-14: par pa ta ni srang re yin //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-15: skyu ru ra ni bre gang dag / chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-16: bre bzhi lus par gla sgang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-17: rtsa mkhris shing mngar dug mo yungs //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-18: ba lu ka dang tsandan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-19: pi pi ling srang phyed phyed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-20: mar bre gang dang bcas bskol ba //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-21: des ni rna mig sna nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-22: khong 'bras rims dang mdzer ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-23: 'brum phran shu ba mdze nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-24: mchog tu ling tog rab rib dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-25: mtshan long dro bas tshig pa 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-27: nim pa nas par ba ta'i bar srang re re dang /
T13TD4312.3E:148a-28: skyu ru ra bre gang dang /
T13TD4312.3E:148a-29: chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol ba de las bre bzhi lus pa'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:148a-30: gla sgang la sogs pa'i mig sman srang phyed phyed btags pa'i lde gu dang mar bre gang dang bcas par bskol la sman mar de blud na /
T13TD4312.3E:148a-31: rna ba dang mig dang sna la sogs pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:148a-32: mchog tu yang ling tog la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-33: 'bras bu gsum ni srang brgyad dag / chu bre bzhi bskol bzhi cha lus //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-34: 'o ma de dang cha mnyam dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-35: 'bras bu gsum gyi lde gu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-36: srang gcig zhun mar bre phyed bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-37: kha ra'am sbrang rtsi bcas pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:148a-38: 'bras bu gsum gyi khu bar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-0: chu bre bzhi'i nang du bskol la de las @148b khu ba bre gang lus pa'i nang du 'o ma sman gyi khu ba de dang cha mnyam pa bre gang bcug la 'bras bu gsum srang gcig lde gu dang zhun mar bre phyed bskol te mar gyi nang khar 'am sbrang rtsi btab la rab rib can la blud par bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:148b-1: yang na mar de dang 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang bcas pa blud na rab rib kyi nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-2: shing mngar ram nye ba gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-3: kanda ka ri pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-4: aa ru ra dang autpa la //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-5: kha ra rgun 'bru srang re bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-6: ra yi 'o ma mar bre re //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-7: 'bras bu gsum dang ba sha ka / bring gar dza'i khu bar bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-9: mar de mig nad kun sel mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:148b-10: shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman srang re dang /
T13TD4312.3E:148b-11: mar dang 'o ma cha snyoms pa'i bre re re byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:148b-12: 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i khu ba bre gang dang bskol ba'i sman mar 'di ni 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i sman mar zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:148b-13: mig nad thams cad sel ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-14: 'bras bu gsum dang mar ram ni //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-15: 'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-16: sbrang rtsi yis ni sprus gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-17: mtshan mo zos par gyur nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-18: zla gcig phan pa'i zas bsten zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-19: skyu ru ra yi chu 'thungs na //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-20: mkha' lding lta bu'i mig thob ces //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-21: drang srong mu khyud kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-23: 'bras bu gsum dang bskol ba'i sman mar ram /
T13TD4312.3E:148b-24: 'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar du bcas par sbrang rtsis sbrus shing mnyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:148b-25: 'bras bu gsum gyi sman mar dang bcas par mtshan mo nyal ka'i dus su zos par gyur cing phan zhing 'phrod pa'i zas bsten par byed cing skyu ru ra'i chu de'i rjes la 'thungs na /
T13TD4312.3E:148b-26: de'i mig nam mkha' lding gi mig lta bur shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-27: zhes drang srong chen po mu khyud ces bya bas bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-28: ta bya shing mngar lcags dang gser //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-29: kha ra sbrang rtsi mar rnying dang //
T13TD4312.3E:148b-31: bsten pas rab rib 'joms mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-0: ta bya zhes bya ba drub mar cang zhes grags pa rdo gser mdog can dang shing mngar @149a * //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-1: la sogs pa'i sman ci 'dod pa sbyar ba ste sman 'di dag re re 'am gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi 'am ma lus par sbyar zhing zos na /
T13TD4312.3E:149a-2: rab rib 'joms par byed pa'i mchog gtso bo yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-3: yang na 'bras bu gsum bsgol [?] mar //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-4: rab rib can gyis bsten bya 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-6: yang na 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang bcas pa rab rib can gyi nad pas bsten cing goms par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-7: snum khur phye 'am sran tshod ni //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-8: 'bras bu gsum gyi phye bcas pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-10: yang snum khur la sogs pa 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma dang bcas pa de rab rib can gyis bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-12: bsgrangs te khar sbrang rtsi gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-14: yang na 'bras chan dang 'o ma bskol ba'i 'o thug 'bras bu gsum dang bcas pa de bskangs pa de'i nang du kha ra dang sbrang rtsi btab pa rab rib can gyi nad pas bsten na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-15: zas ma zos pa'am na nga par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-16: rgun 'bru kha ra sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-17: aa ru ra ni so sor bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-18: rtag tu rab rib can gyis bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-20: yang na zas ma zos pa'i sngon du 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:149a-21: nang par tho rangs kyi dus su rgun 'bru la sogs pa rtag tu so sor bza' bar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:149a-22: bsten na yang rab rib can thams cad kyi nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-23: lig bu mig cha drug cu bzhi //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-24: zangs dang dngul dang gser gyi cha //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-25: re re gcig tu sbyar ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-26: kong bu kha sbyar nang du gzhug /'dres par gyur pa'i bar du bud //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-27: de nas de yi ro drug gi / tshogs kyi khu bar lan bdun du //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-28: so sor de la blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-30: tsha ba gsum dang de nas bsre //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-31: phye ma'i mig sman de btang na //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-32: rab rib thams cad sel byed yin //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-34: lig bu mig ces bya ba stro [?] ta aan dzan cha drug cu rtsa bzhi zangs dang dngul dang gser sna re zhing cha re gcig tu bsdus la kong bu kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug nas du ba ma shor bar byas te me bus la 'dres par gyur gyi bar du bskol lo //
T13TD4312.3E:149a-35: rdol btags te de'i 'og tu de mngar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:149b-2: bska ba'i sman gyi tshogs kyi khu ba'i nang du lan bdun gyi bar du de so sor blugs par bya zhing de la spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-5: cha gsum mig sman zhes bya ste ba sre bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-6: de lta bu de ni phye ma'i mig sman zhes bya ste ;
T13TD4312.3E:149b-7: mig sman de btang zhing bskus par gyur na rab rib thams cad sel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-9: khu ba 'o ma chang dang zhag / char pa de bzhin lig bu mig / bskol zhing bsku ba byas nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-10: phye ma de ni dud dang gzhug / mthong ba gsal byed mig sman yin //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-11: mig nad thams cad la bsngags zhes //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-12: lus 'phags rgyal pos bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-14: rgun 'bru dang padma'i rtsa ba bskol ba'i khu ba dang 'o ma la sogs pa lhan cig bskol ba dag gis lig bu mig bsgos shing de'i nang du bskol ba'i phye ma dung dang bcas pa de mig sman du bskus na rab rib sel cing mthong ba gsal bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:149b-15: mig gi nad thams cad la yang phan par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-16: zhes lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-17: spangs ma srang gnyis rgya shug gi / sol bar bsregs la ra yi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-18: 'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi yi //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-19: nang du lan ni bdun bdun bcug / ta bya dang ni na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-20: lig bu mig dang pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-21: spang spos rgyam tsha aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-22: seng phrom ldong ros pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-23: sug smel rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-24: stang zil zho ni gnyis gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-25: shing mngar srang gcig bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-26: kong bu kha sbyar nang bsregs btags //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-27: mig sngon mtshan mo long bar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-28: dmar ris de bsten pa yis 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-29: phye mas mchog tu rab rib nad //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-30: nyi mas mun pa bzhin du sel //
T13TD4312.3E:149b-32: spangs ma shing rgya shug gi sol ba'i nang du bsregs la ra'i 'o ma la sogs pa'i nang du lan bdun bcug la ta bya la sogs pa'i sman zho gnyis gnyis dang shing mngar la sogs pa srang gcig dang bsres te /
T13TD4312.3E:150a-0: kong bu kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug la du ba ma shor bar bsregs te de bzhin du btags te mig sman du byas pas ni mig @150a * //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-1: sngo ba la sogs pa'i mig nad 'joms par byed cing sman gyi phye ma des ji ltar nyi mas mun pa bzhin du rab rib kyi tshogs 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-2: spang spos dri bzangs gsum dang lcags //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-3: gur gum autpal sngon po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-4: kha ra spangs ma aa ru ra ;
T13TD4312.3E:150a-5: / rgya mtsho'i lbu ba mching bu dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-6: na le sham dang pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-7: stang zil shing mngar dung dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-8: tha skar zla ba'i tshe na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-9: phye ma mig gnyis la bskus na //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-10: mig mdzer rab rib dmar ris dang //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-11: g-ya' dang mig sngon sogs zhi byed //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-13: spang spos la sogs pa'i sman gyi phye ma gza' zla ba dang skar ma tha skar la bab pa'i tshe bskus shing mig gnyis la byugs na rab rib la sogs ba'i mig nad thams cad sel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-14: na le sham dang rgyam tsha ni //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-15: cha re pi pi ling dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-16: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba cha gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-17: skyer pa'i khanda cha dgu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-18: nag pa la bab tshe na btags //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-19: mig bskus bad kan rab rib 'joms /
T13TD4312.3E:150a-21: na le sham dang rgyam tsha gnyis cha re /
T13TD4312.3E:150a-22: pi pi ling dang rgya mtsho'i lbu ba cha gnyis nang du lig bu mig maru skar ma nag pa la bab pa'i tshe btags la bskus na bad kan las gyur pa'i rab rib 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-23: spangs ma bsregs nas lan mang du //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-24: ba gcin ra thug khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:150a-25: skyur rtsabs bud med nu zho dang //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-26: dug gi khu ba sbrang rtsi mar //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-27: bcug par gyur pa gang yin pa //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-28: phyi mar byas des mi yi mig / mkha' lding mig ltar gsal bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-30: spangs ma legs par bsregs la /
T13TD4312.3E:150a-31: ba gcin la sogs ba'i nang du lan mang du so sor bcug bar gyur pa gang yin pa de skams la phye mar byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:150a-32: phye ma des mig la bskus na mi'i mi gnam mkha' lding dang 'dra bar gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-33: bring ga ra dza 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-34: dug dang shing mngar khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-35: mar dang ra yi 'o mar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-36: zha nye lan ni bdun bdun du //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-37: bsregs shing bsregs shing btsos ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-38: mig sman thur mar byas ba de //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-39: mig sman bskol ba'am ma bskol ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:150a-40: byugs nar ba rib mig mdzer nad //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-1: g-ya' dang tshor ba med pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-2: ri mo dmar po snang ba 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-4: bring ga ra dza'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:150b-5: 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:150b-7: shing mngar gyi khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:150b-8: mar dang ra'i 'o ma'i nang du bsregs pa de so sor lan bdun dang /
T13TD4312.3E:150b-9: zha nye nag po lan bdun gyi bar du bsregs shing btsos la /
T13TD4312.3E:150b-10: bsnur ba'i zha nye de mig sman gyi thur mar byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:150b-11: thur ma de mig sman dang bcas pa'am mig sman med par yang rung ste /
T13TD4312.3E:150b-12: mig tu byugs na rab rib la sogs pa'i mig nad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:150b-13: g-ya' ba dang tshor ba med cing bem por 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:150b-14: ri mo dmar bo shar shad bor snang ba 'joms shing sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-15: dngul chu ro nye cha mnyam bya //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-16: de gnyis stang zil mnyam byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-17: ga bur cung zad btab pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-18: mig sman rab rib sel mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-20: dngul chu dang ro nye gnyis po cha mnyam par byas la gnyis pa de dang stang zil zhes bya ba dngul rdo cha mnyam du byas la zhib tu btags te de'i nang du ga bur cung zad btab pa'i mig sman ni //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-21: mig gi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ste rab rib sel ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-22: bya rgod dus su shi ba'i mgo bo ni //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-23: nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra gang yin de //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-24: ba lang lci bas bsregs thal lig bu mig / cha mnyam btags par gyur ba'i phye ma yi //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-25: sbyor 'dis mig gi gsal stobs bya rgod lta bur byed //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-27: bya rgod gang ma bsad par dus su shi ba'i mgo bo nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog dang 'dra bar dmar ba gang yin pa de ba lang gi lci ba'i mes bsregs te thal bar byas pa dang lig bu mig cha snyoms te zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma'i mig sman 'di bskus na mig gi mthong ba'i stobs bya rgod lta bur gsal bar mthong bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-28: sbrul nag mgor ni lig bu mig / mar bcas dud pa ma shor bsregs //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-29: spang spos gandha bha dra dang //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-30: lhan cig btags pas mig 'bras ni //
T13TD4312.3E:150b-31: rdol yang mig ni srung bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-0: sprul nag po shi ba'i mgo bo'i kha'i nang du lig bu mig mar @151a * //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-2: 'jim pas bskus te dud pa ma shor bar bsregs nas /
T13TD4312.3E:151a-4: gandha bha dra dang bcas par btags pa'i mig sman gyis mig gi 'bras bu brtol zhing nyams pa yang bsrung zhing mthong bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-5: / sbrul nag shi ba'i ro dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-6: sdig pa shi ba'i ro bzhi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-7: 'o ma'i bum par zhag nyi shu //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-8: rtsa gcig bcug ste bsrul la bsrub //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-9: de las mar sar gang byung bas //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-10: khyim bya gso ste de yi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-11: rtug pas mig ni bskus gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-12: long bas kyang ni nges par mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-14: / sbrul nag po shi ba'i ro gcig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:151a-15: sdig pa zhes bya ba'i 'bu shi ba'i ro bzhi 'o ma blugs pa'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste de zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bzhag la bsrul nas de'i 'og tu bsrub mas bsrubs te /
T13TD4312.3E:151a-16: 'o ma la sa mar sar pa gang zhig byung bar gyur pa'i mar des khyim bya gso ste /
T13TD4312.3E:151a-17: khyim bya de'i rtug pa mig tu bskus par gyur na long bas kyang nges par gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-18: sbrul nag po yi zhag dang dug / stang zil ka ta ka'i 'bras bu //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-19: khu bar byas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-20: long ba'ang myur du mthong bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-22: sbrul nag po'i zhag la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag thams cad khu ba'i sbyor ba byas la de gdus pa'i mig sman gyis bskus na long bas kyang ring por mi thogs par mthong bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-23: na le sham ni rdog po bcu //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-24: drub mar cang ni srang phyed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-25: spangs ma srang gcig shing mngar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-26: zho gnyis 'o ma'i nang du sbangs //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-27: du ba ma shor bsregs mig sman //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-28: khu ba mnyam med ces bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-29: rab rib 'joms pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-31: na le sham rdog ma bcu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:151a-32: drub mar cang zhes bya ba ta bya srang phyed dang /
T13TD4312.3E:151a-34: shing mngar ni zho gnyis te 'di dag 'o ma'i nang du sbangs la du ba ma shor bar bsregs pa'i khu ba mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i mig sman yin te rab rib sel bar byed pa'i mchog dam pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-35: ba ru ra yi tshi gu na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:151a-36: skyu ru ra dang spangs ma shing mngar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-0: chu @151b thags byas pa'i ri lu grib mar bskams //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-1: rab rib myur du 'joms par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-3: ba ru ra'i tshi gu la sogs pa'i sman chu thags la btags la de'i ri lu grib ma la bskams te /
T13TD4312.3E:151b-4: de mig tu bskus na rab rib kyi mig nad myur zhing ring por mi thogs par 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-5: na le sham dang skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-6: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba spangs ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-7: dngul rdo dang ni drub mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-8: go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-9: drub mar cha ni drug pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-10: sbyor 'dis rab rib ling tog mdzer //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-11: rnag dang mig sngo g-ya' ba sel //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-13: na le sham la sogs pa'i sman cha res bskyed de sbyar ba'i mig sman 'di ni ming drub mar cha drug pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:151b-14: sbyor ba 'dis rab rib dang ling thog la sogs pa'i mig nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-15: de la cha res bskyed pa'i tshul ni na le sham cha gcig / skyu ru ra cha gnyis /
T13TD4312.3E:151b-16: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba cha gsum /
T13TD4312.3E:151b-19: drub mar cang cha drug tu sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-20: rin chen dngul dang shel dang gser //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-21: lig bu mig dang zangs lcags dang //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-22: tsandan dmar po yug snam dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-23: phye ma'i mig sman nad kun sel //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-25: rin po che la sogs pa'i mig sman du byas pas ni mig gi nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-26: rin po che ni mar gad la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-27: til mar ba ru ra yi mar //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-28: bring gar dza aa sa na'i //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-29: khu ba lcags kyi snod du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-30: snar blugs mig ni gsal stobs skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-31: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sman lcags kyi snod du bskol ba'i thigs pa snar blugs na yang mig gsal zhing mthong ba'i stobs skyed bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-32: ba ru ra'i mar ni de'i tshi gu btsir ba'i mar ro //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-34: aa sa na'i khu ba ni /
T13TD4312.3E:151b-35: de gnyis bskol ba'i khu ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-36: nad kyi tshul las de la lan mang du ;
T13TD4312.3E:151b-37: / snum blud gtar ga bkru sman sna sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-38: mig sman mgo bo'i bkru sman mas gtong dang //
T13TD4312.3E:151b-39: nyams brta byug dang blugs pas ci rigs gso //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-0: rab rib kyi nad de ni nad kyi tshul tha dad pa de la gcig ma yin par lan du mar snum blud pa dang gtar ga la @152a * //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-1: sogs pa nas sman chu'i thigs pa blugs pa'i bar gyis de gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-2: 'di ni spyi yi gso ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-3: da ni re re'i mnyan par gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-5: gso ba 'di ni rab rib thams cad kyi spyi'i thun mong gi gso ba bshad pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:152a-6: da ni 'di man chad ni rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi re re las gyur pa'i rab rib gso ba ston pas de mnyan par gyis shig pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-7: de las rlung gyur rab rib la //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-8: rtsa ba bcu bskol khu ba mar //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-10: lde gu bskol ba blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-12: rtsa ba lnga'i khu 'o ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-13: ae randa yi til mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-14: bkru sman nye bar gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-16: de la rlung las gyur pa'i rab rib la ni rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i sman gyi khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:152a-18: 'bras bu gsum btags pa'i lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:152a-19: bskol ba'i mar blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-20: de'i 'og tu nad pa de smyung ba'i cho ga byas la 'bras bu gsum dang /
T13TD4312.3E:152a-21: rtsa ba lnga bskol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:152a-22: de bzhin du ae randa'i til mar dang bcas pa'i bkru sman btang la 'khrur gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-23: dzi ban ti yi yal gar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-24: srad brgya chu bre bcu drug bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-25: brgyad cha lus pa de nang du //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-26: til mar 'o ma bre re dang //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-27: ba la gsum dang dzi ban ti //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-28: nye'u shing rtsa ba srang re dang //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-29: shing mngar srang ni bzhi dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-30: lcags kyi snod du bskol bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-31: lcags snod nyid du zla gcig bzhag /
T13TD4312.3E:152a-32: sna sman nam tshong yan chad kyi //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-33: rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad 'joms shing //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-34: mchog tu mig la gnas pa sel //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-35: skra gdong gnya' ba phrag nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-36: rgyas shing bzhin mdangs mdzes par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-38: dzi ban ti'i yal ga dang //
T13TD4312.3E:152a-39: rtsa bar bcas pa srang brgya chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol la chu de'i brgyad cha lus pa'i nang du til mar dang 'o ma bre re dang ba la gsum zhes bya ba aa ti ba la dang /
T13TD4312.3E:152a-40: n'a ga ba la zhes bya ba dzi ban ti dang /
T13TD4312.3E:152b-0: nye'u shing gi rtsa ba srang re re dang shing mngar srang bzhi lde gur byas pa lcags kyi snod kyi nang du @152b bskol ba'i til mar de lcags snod de nyid du zla ba gcig gi bar du bzhag la /
T13TD4312.3E:152b-2: nam tshong yan chad kyi rlung dang /
T13TD4312.3E:152b-3: mkhris pa las gyur ba'i nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-4: de las kyang mchog gam khyad par du mig la gnas pa'i rlung dang mkhris pa sel bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:152b-5: skra dang gdong la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed cing bzhin mdangs mdzes par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-6: ae randa dkar rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-7: thang shing bri ha ti'i 'bras bu //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-8: shu dag rgya spos tsi tra dang //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-9: bil ba'i rtsa ba til mar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-10: 'o mar bcas bskol snar blugs na //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-11: nam tshong yan chad rlung dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-12: bad kan gyi ni nad kun sel //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-14: ae randa dkar po'i rtsa ba la sogs pa lde gur byas pa til mar dang 'o ma dang lhan cig tu bskol te sna sman du blugs na nam tshong yan chad kyi rlung dang bad kan gyi nad kyis nyen pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-15: stag dang phag dang bya rgod dang //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-16: sbrul dang khyim bya'i tshil dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-17: shing mngar so sor sbyar te bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-18: mig sman bskus pa bsngags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-24: khyim bya'i tshil shing mngar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:152b-25: so sor sbyar te bskol ba mig sman du bskus na yang nad de la bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-26: de rjes mig sman lig bu mig / sha khu 'o ma mar rim bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-27: snga ma bzhin du blugs na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-28: rab rib 'joms byed mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-30: mig sman lig bu mig snga ma bzhin du bskol ba sha khu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:152b-31: 'o ma dang mar gyi nang du rim bzhin du lan bdun bdun spangs shing blugs la mig tu bskus na rab rib sel ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-32: de ltar byas kyang ma zhi na //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-33: de 'og brta ba'i cho ga spyad //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-35: gal te de ltar byas su zin kyang rlung las gyur pa'i rab rib de zhi bar ma gyur na de'i 'og tu brta ba'i cho ga ji skad bshad pa spyad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-36: shu ti ru rta spang sbos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-37: shing mngar ram nye ba gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-38: stag tsher ba dang sa ra la //
T13TD4312.3E:152b-39: pi pi ling dang thang shing ni //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-2: mig brta ba yi mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-4: shu ti la sogs pa'i sman mar gyi brgyad 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang bskol ba'i sman mar ni mig brta ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-5: ri dvags ae na ya'i tshil ni //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-6: 'o mar bskol te gzar bus dkrugs //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-7: de yi dangs ma shing mngar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-8: tsandan pu shel tse de bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-10: ri dvags ae na ya'i tshil 'o ma dang bcas par bskol te gzar bus dkrugs la de'i dangs ma blangs la /
T13TD4312.3E:153a-11: shing mngar dang tsandan dang pu shel tsi dang /
T13TD4312.3E:153a-12: so sor bskol ba'i khu ba yang mig brta bar byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-13: shva bid reg 'jam go da dang //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-14: khyim bya sreg pa rma bya'i tshil //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-15: re re zhing ni cho ga dag /'di nyid kyis ni brta bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-17: shva bid la sogs pa'i tshil yang sngar bshad pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga nyid kyis brtag cing sbyar ba yang mig brta ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-18: bsal bar bya dang snum dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-19: sman phur btsos pa'i thigs pa blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-21: rab rib de bsal bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:153a-22: snum gyi cho gar byas pa'i sbyor bar sman gyi phur ma btsos pa'i thigs pa yang blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-24: / 'dir ni rlung gyur cham pa bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-25: ni ru ha dang 'jam rtsi bya //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-27: rlung las gyur pa'i rab rib 'di la gso ba rlung las gyur pa'i cham pa dang 'dra bar bya zhing de bzhin du bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba 'jam rtsi dang bcas pa gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-28: mkhris pa las gyur rab rib la //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-30: bskol ba'i mar ni blud bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-31: snum gyis zhen par gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-33: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mig nad la ni 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang /
T13TD4312.3E:153a-34: 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i sman mar blud la /
T13TD4312.3E:153a-35: snum gyis zhen par gyur pa dang de'i 'og tu gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-36: kha ra dur byed sug smel phye //
T13TD4312.3E:153a-37: sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-0: nad mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rab rib kyis nyen pa'i nad pa de la kha ra la sogs pa'i bkru sman gtang ba yang @153b phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-1: rab bsil sman chu blugs byug sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-2: gdong dang mig dang spyi bor sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-4: mkhris pa dang khrag las gyur pa'i rab rib can la ni rab tu bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i sman gyi chu bsil mo sbyi bo nas blugs par bya zhing byug pa la sogs pas gdong bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-5: thal tres shug pa pu shel tse //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-6: mu tig seng phrom tsandan dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-7: ri lu'i mig sman bskus na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-9: thal tres la sogs pa'i mig sman ri lur byas pa'i sman bskus na yang //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-10: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rab rib la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-11: de bzhin gandha bha dra dang //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-13: ga pur shing mngar yug snam phan //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-15: de bzhin du mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rab rib la gandha bha dra la sogs pa'i phye ma'i mig sman bskus na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-16: skyer khanda dang spangs ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-17: kar ka ta yi sring gi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-18: skyu ru ra yi 'bras bu shel //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-19: ga bur cha ni lnga lnga dang //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-20: cha gsum cha re sbyar ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-21: mig sman rab rib 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-23: skyer ba'i khanda cha lnga dang spangs ma skyer pa khanda'i cha dang /
T13TD4312.3E:153b-24: kar ka ta sring gi dang /
T13TD4312.3E:153b-25: skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu cha gsum /
T13TD4312.3E:153b-26: shel dang ga bur cha gcig sbyar ba'i mig sman ni rab rib 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-28: 'o ma mar bskol sna sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-33: mar dang mar gyi gzhi 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang bskol ba'i mar sna nas btang na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-34: bad kan las gyur sle tres dang //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-35: 'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-36: mar bskol snum blud gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-37: de rjes dan da dur byid bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-38: gla gor zho sha aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-39: bca' sga pi pi ling phye gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-40: bkru sman dag ni gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-42: bad kan las gyur pa'i rab rib la ni sle tres la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:153b-43: mar bskol ba'i khu ba blud pas snum gyi cho ga byas la de'i rjes la gtar ga gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:153b-44: de'i rjes la dan da la sogs pa'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-2: ba le ka dang ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-3: thang shing pi pi ling 'o ma //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-4: til mar bskol ba'i sna sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-6: yang na bad kan las gyur pa'i rab rib la rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs pa'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-7: dung dang gla rtsi pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-8: rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-9: dri med ri lus mig gsal byed //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-11: dung la sogs pa btags te ri lur byas pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:154a-12: dri ma med pa'i ri lu zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:154a-13: de mig gsal bar byed pa'i phyir bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-14: lcags nag phye ma tshab gsum ;
T13TD4312.3E:154a-15: / rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum mig sman //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-16: ri lu nag pos mig gsal byed //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-18: lcags nag po'i phye ma la sogs pa btags te ri lur byas pa'i mig sman ni ri lu nag po zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:154a-19: des kyang mig gsal bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-20: ri bong bong bu seng ge glang ;
T13TD4312.3E:154a-21: / rnga mo'i so dang dpral ba'i rus //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-22: ba lang dkar spu na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-23: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba tsandan dung //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-24: nu zho ra yi 'o mar btags //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-25: ri lus rab rib ling teg sel //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-27: ri bong la sogs pa'i so dang /
T13TD4312.3E:154a-29: ba lang dkar po'i spu dang na le sham la sogs pa thams cad bud med kyi nu zho dang /
T13TD4312.3E:154a-30: ra'i 'o ma dang btags te ri lur byas pas ni rab rib dang ling tog thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-31: khrag gyur mkhris pa lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-32: bsil chos bya zhing gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-34: khrag las gyur pa'i rab rib ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rab rib dang 'dra bar gso bar bya zhing de bzhin du zas dang skom dang sman dang spyod lam la sogs pa bsil bas bya zhing gtar ga gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-35: rgun 'bru spang spos seng phrom dang //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-36: shing mngar tsandan zangs ma dung //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-38: ra yi 'o mas ri lur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-39: khrag gyur rab rib myur du sel //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-41: rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i sman ra'i 'o ma dang btags te /
T13TD4312.3E:154a-42: ri lur byas pa'i mig sman bskus na khrag las gyur pa'i rab rib sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:154a-43: ldan pa 'dus pa las gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-0: nad gzhi'i @154b cha ni ji bzhin gso //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-2: ldan pa las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:154b-3: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rab rib la ni nad gzhi'i cha shas gang che ba bzhin du bshad ma thag pa'i gso ba ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-4: ma du ka dang byi dang ga / na le sham dang sgron shing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-6: btags pa'i sna sman gdong bsku bya //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-8: ma du ka la sogs pa sman dang 'o ma dang til mar bskol ba'i sna sman btang na ldan pa dang 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rab rib sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-9: yang na ma du ka la sogs pa'i sman de dag nyid chu thags su byas pa'i lde gus gdong bskus na yang de dang 'dra bar phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-10: rgya spos autpal aa nan da //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-11: shing mngar su ni sha na kee / til mar bskol ba'i sna sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-12: mgo bsku 'jam rtsi bya ba bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-14: yang na rgya spos la sogs pas lde gur byas pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:154b-15: til mar bskol ba'i sna sman btang ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:154b-16: til mar de nyid mgo la bsku zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:154b-17: 'jam rtsi bya ba yang bsngags shing phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-18: pu shel tse bskol khu ba'i nang //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-19: rgyam tsha pi pi ling phye gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-20: de btsags slar yang mar bcas par //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-21: bskol la ska gyur bsgrangs nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-22: sbrang rtsi bcug pa'i mig sman ni //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-23: 'dus pa las gyur rab rib sel //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-25: pu shel tse bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du rgyam tsha dang pi pi ling gi phye ma btab ste /
T13TD4312.3E:154b-26: de tshags kyis btsags la yang ba'i mar dang bskol te ska bar gyur pa dang bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi bcug pa'i mig sman 'dis kyang 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mig nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-27: nub mo rgyu ba'i sems can gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-28: rus pa rkang gis gang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-29: lig bu mig dang bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-30: 'bab chu'i nang du zla gcig gam //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-31: zhag ni nyi shu'i bar du bzhag / de nas phyung ste bskams nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-32: lug ru pa yi me tog dang //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-33: shing mngar bcas pa'i phye mar byas //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-34: mig bskus 'dus pa las gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:154b-35: rab rib sel bar byed mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-0: nub mo rgyu ba'i sems can 'ug pa la @155a * //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-1: sogs pa de rnams kyi rus pa rkang gis gang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:155a-2: ji skad smos pa bzhin du phye mar byas pa'i mig sman gyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rab rib 'joms pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-3: mig sngon gso ba 'ang de nyid las //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-4: gtar ga gdab par mi bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:155a-5: [?] des long bar gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-6: srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-8: mig sngo ba zhes bya ba la spris g-yogs pa'i nad la yang rab rib kyi gso bar bshad pa 'di nyid nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:155a-9: gso ba de las gtar ga gdab cing bsdam pa ni mi bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:155a-11: sngon po'i spris g-yogs pa'i nad mig la gnas par byed pa bsdams [?] par gyur na ni /
T13TD4312.3E:155a-12: de skyon des long bar 'gyur ba'i skyon yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-13: gal te khrag nges par dbyung dgos pa yin na ni bsdam zhing gtar ga mi bya'i //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-14: srin bu pad pas khrag gzhi pa'i phyir glan par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-15: bu ram rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-16: pi pi ling dang na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-17: gur gum sbrang rtsi lig bu mig / spris g-yogs 'tsho ba tsam mig sman //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-19: bu ram la sogs pa'i mig sman ni /
T13TD4312.3E:155a-20: spris g-yogs shing mig sngon por gyur pa de re zhig mig sngon po la ba tsam du 'tsho bar byed pa'i mig sman yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-21: 'dus gyur ne'u le lta bur long //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-22: rab rib skabs bshad cho gar sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-24: ne'u le lta ba'i long ba zhes bya ba 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni rab rib kyi skabs su gso ba bshad pa'i cho ga gang dag yin pa sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-25: mar dang sbrang rtsi ba lang gi / lci ba'i khu ba skyer khanda //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-26: yug snam bal bu'i phye mar sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-27: mig sman mtshan mo long la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-29: skyer ba'i khanda la sogs pa'i sman mar la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i mig sman ni mig nad mtshan mo long ba zhes bya ba la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-30: na le sham ni zho dang sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-31: mtshan mo mi mthong mig sman mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:155a-32: yang na na le sham zho dang sbyar ba yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:155a-34: padma ge sar ba lang gi / lci ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-0: ri lus mtshan @155b mo long ba sel //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-2: autpal sngon po la sogs pa'i ji skad bshad pa bzhin du sbyar ba'i mig sman yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-3: ha re nu ka pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-4: rgyam tsha dang ni lig bu mig / ra gcin ri lur byas pa phan //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-6: ha re nu ka la sogs pa'i ri lu yang mtshan mo long ba zhes bya ba'i mig nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-7: pri yang ku dang tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-8: ldong ros ba bla 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-9: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba ra'i 'o ma //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-10: ri lur byas pa'i mig sman gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-11: mtshan mo long ba'i mig nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-13: pri yang ku la sogs pa'i ri lu yang de la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-14: mcher pa'i nang du pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-15: bcug ste mtshos bar btsos la //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-16: de skams sbrang rtsir btags pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-17: mtshan mo mi mthong mig sman mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:155b-18: mcher pa'i nang du pi pi ling bcug ste /
T13TD4312.3E:155b-19: ji skad bshad pa bzhin du sbyar ba'i mig sman yang mtshan mo long ba la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-20: ma he'i mchin pa mcher pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-21: til mar mar ni lhan cig bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-23: yang na ma he'i mchin ba la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du zos na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-24: 'tsho byed sna bcu'i lo ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-25: mar dang lhan cig bskol ba bza' ;
T13TD4312.3E:155b-27: yang 'tsho byed sna bcu'i lo ma mar gyi nang du bskol te zos na yang ban no /
T13TD4312.3E:155b-29: // aa ti mug ta ae randa //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-30: nye'u shing lang ga li'i lo ma //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-31: mar dang brngos ba bza' bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-33: yang na aa ti mug ta la sogs pa'i lo ma mar dang btsos te zos na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-34: dro na pushpa mar dang brngos //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-35: bza' dang btung bar sbyar ba'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-37: yang na dro na pushpa zhes bya ba'i sman ji skad smos pa bzhin bsten na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-38: dud 'thul mkhris pa skyur bro bas //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-39: tshig la mar ni rnying pa dag / snum gyur bsil ba'i bkru sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:155b-40: bsil sman gyis ni kun tu byug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:155b-41: mig sman dud pa 'thul ba zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:155b-43: skyur gyi sa tshig pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad la snum gyi cho ga byas la sman bsil bas bkru sman gtang bar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:156a-1: du bsku zhing byug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-2: ba lang lci khu 'o ma mar //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-3: bskol ba yi ni mig sman nam //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-4: bal bu'i lo ma yug snam bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-5: phye ma btab pa'i mig sman phan //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-7: ba'i lci ba btsir ba'i khu ba dang 'o ma dang mar ram /
T13TD4312.3E:156a-8: yang na bal bu'i lo ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156a-9: btsag yug snam gyi phye ma bskol ba'i mig sman phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-10: me da seng phrom aa nanta //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-11: skyer pa btsod dang shing mngar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-13: til mar bskol ba'i sna sman phan //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-15: me da la sogs pa'i sman mar gyi brgyad 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156a-16: til mar bskol ba'i sna sman btang na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-17: 'o ma mar sar gyis brta bya //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-18: des ma zhi na gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-20: 'o ma las byung ba'i mar sar yin pas na 'o ma'i mar sar te /
T13TD4312.3E:156a-22: de ltar byas su zin kyang zhi bar ma gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:156a-23: gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-24: sems las nad dang mya ngan 'jigs //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-25: zas rtsub tsog tsog por 'dug dang //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-26: skyug sman bkru sman sna sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-27: sman thigs blugs sogs nyes pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-28: kha zas phyed zhu slon pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-29: bkres skom la sogs brnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-30: mig nad ma bcos yun ring las //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-31: rab rib nad ldan brta bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-33: sems las la sogs pa bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156a-34: skyug sman la sogs pa nyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156a-35: de bzhin du kha zas phyed tsam ma zhu ba las slon pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156a-36: bkres pa la sogs pa brnag pa las mig rab rib kyi nad dang ldan par brta bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-37: de la nad gzhi sogs brtags te //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-38: rang gi sman ni ji bzhin sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-40: sems las la sogs pa'i nad kyi rgyu de dag las rab rib dang 'dra bar nyes par brtags la nad gzhi ji lta ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:156a-41: rang gi sman gang dang gang yin pa las de sbyar zhing gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-42: nyi ma gzas 'dzin me 'od glog la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-43: bltas pas mig ni nyams par gyur pa dag / de la bsil sman tshogs kyis brta bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:156a-44: de ltar gser bdar mar gyi mig sman gtang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-1: nyi ma gzas 'dzin pa'i tshe mig gis shas cher bltas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-2: de bzhin du me'i 'od dang glog la sogs pa 'tsher bag can bltas par gyur pa las mig nyams par gyur cing nad zhugs par gyur na nad de la nus pa bsil ba'i sman gyi khu ba la sogs pas brta bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-3: de bzhin du snum gyi sbyor ba la sogs pas brta bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-4: de bzhin du gser mar gyi nang du bdar ba'i mig sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-5: mi yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-6: rtag tu mig bsrung ba la 'bad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-7: nyin dang mtshan mo 'dra bar gyur pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-8: mi la nor yod gyur kyang don med yin //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-10: mi rnams ji srid 'tsho zhing gnas par gyur gyi bar du rtag tu gnod pa thams cad las mig bsrung zhing gnod par mi 'gyur ba la 'bad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-12: skyes bu long bar gyur pa la ni ;
T13TD4312.3E:156b-13: nor dang 'byor pa bdog cing yod par gyur kyang 'jig rten 'dir don med cing 'bras bu med pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-14: 'bras bu gsum bsten gtar ga sbyang bya dang //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-15: sems dga' mig sman sna sman bcas bsten na //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-16: bya sha za zhing rkang pa'i rim gro dang //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-17: zhun mar btung bas rtag tu mig bsrung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-18: kha zas mi 'phrod za ba rtag tu spang //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-19: rab phra 'tsher dang g-yo ba mi lta zhes //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-20: skyes bu'i mig ni mchog tu bsrung ba'i thabs //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-21: drang srong chen po mu khyud kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-23: mig bsrung bar bya ba'i thabs ni 'di dag ste /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-24: rtag tu 'bras bu gsum bsten cing bza' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:156b-25: de bzhin du gtar ga gdab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-26: bkru sman dang skyug sman gyis sbyang ba bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-27: rtag tu sems dga' zhing yid bde bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-28: skyer pa'i khanda la sogs pa'i mig sman bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-29: de bzhin du til mar la sogs pa'i sna sman bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-30: srog chags bya'i sha bsten te bza' zhing spyad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-31: rkang pa'i rim gro bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:156b-35: lham bgo ba la sogs pas gnod pa med par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-0: zhun mar rtag tu btung bas mig bsrung zhing gnod @157a * //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-1: pa med pa la 'bad par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-2: gzhan yang mig la gnod pa'i kha zas rtag tu spang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-3: dngos po rab tu phra zhing brtag dka' ba la blta ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-4: 'tsher zhing 'od can la blta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-5: g-yo zhing 'gyur ba'i dngos po la mi lta ba ste 'di dag ni skyes bu'i mig bsrung bar bya ba'i thabs yin pas /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-6: thabs de dag la gnas par bya zhing mi'i mig bsrung ba la 'bad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-7: zhes drang srong chen po mu khyud kyis bstan cing bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-8: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-9: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-10: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-12: // / de nas mthong ba nyams pa gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-14: mig gi mthong ba nyams pa las ni bshad par bya ba mang du yod pas rab rib kyi gso ba las logs shig tu bshad pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-15: mthong ba nyams pa zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-16: mtshan ma nyams pa zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-17: mig sngon por gyur pa zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-18: spris g-yogs pa zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-19: long ba zhes bya ba ni ming gi rnam grangs yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-21: de 'gags par byed pa yin pas na //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-22: 'gags pa la gso ba zhes bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-23: yang na bkag cing bzlog la bsal ba'i thabs yin pas na gso ba zhes bya ste de'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-24: zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-25: bad kan las gyur spris g-yogs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-26: rba klong la sogs bla brnan ni //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-27: drug po med par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-28: legs smin mthong ba med pa dbye //
T13TD4312.3E:157a-30: mthong ba nyams shing spris g-yogs pa'i mig nad rba klong la sogs pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-33: ri mo can dang gram bcad pa lta bu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-34: gdugs 'dra ba'i bla brnan drug po med par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-35: legs par smin par gyur pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:157a-36: mthug po kho nar gyur cing bad kan gyis gong po ltar snad bar gyur pa med cing long bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni thur mas dbug cing dbye bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-0: de smin ma @157b gyur mi snyoms la //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-1: zho ga chu 'dra srab pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-2: thur ma yis ni drangs gyur kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-4: nad ni mi bzad skyed byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-5: mthong byed slar yang 'gebs par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-6: de ni zas bcas bla brnan bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-7: bad kan can gyis myur du skyed /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-11: spris g-yogs pa'i nad de smin cing mthug par ma gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-12: mi snyoms shing dma' bar gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-13: de bzhin du zho ga chu 'dra bar snang zhing de'i mdog dang mtshungs ba dang srab par gyur pa de ni thur mas phug ste drangs shing bsdus su zin kyang /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-14: slar yang gyen du 'byung zhing 'byar bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-15: de bzhin du nad mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba skyed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-16: mthong bar byed pa'i mig gi rgyal mo slar yang 'gebs shing sgrib par byed pa de ni bad kan skyed par byed pa'i zas dang /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-17: skom dang sman gyis myur ba kho nar skyed cing smin bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-18: rlung dang mkhris pa can gyi zas skom la sogs pas yun ring zhig na smin par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-19: bad kan gyis ni mthong nyams pa //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-20: bad kan dkar bas dkar ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-22: bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan ma 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-23: mthong ba nyams ba de'i rgyu bad kan gyi dkar ba yin pas na spris g-yogs pa yang dkar ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-24: de ni nad gzhan gyis zil gnon //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-25: kun tu sngo ba'i nad du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-27: bad kan las gyur pa'i mthong ba nyams pa de rlung ngam mkhris pa gzhan gyi zil gyis mnan cing dbang du gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-28: kun tu sngo ba zhes bya ba'i nad mching bu lta bur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-29: de la rlung gyur mig g-yo zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-30: rba klong g-yo zhing dmar skyar 'dug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-31: de rba klong zhes bya ba'i mig nad ni rba klong 'khyil ba ltar g-yo zhing mi brten la dmar skya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:157b-32: cung zad dmar bar 'dug pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-34: thigs phran khyab 'dra ma thug pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:157b-36: gseg ma lta bu'i mig nad ni shing aarga'i 'o ma thigs pa phra mo lta bus khyab pa shin tu mthug pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-2: mig gi nang 'bras kyi gram lta bu'i ri mos khyab par gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-3: gram bcad pa gra ma tshig / bcad pa ltar snang na ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-5: gram bcad pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i mig nad ni gram bcad pa dang tshig pa dang bcad pa lta bur snang zhing na ba dang bcas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-6: rma sgro rma bya'i mjug sgro 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-7: khar ba'i mdog tu snang ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-9: rma bya'i sgro lta bu zhes bya ba'i mig nad ni rma bya'i sgro lta bu'i dbyibs can la khar ba'i ri mo'i mdog lta bur snang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-10: gdugs 'dra kha dog sna tshogs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-11: spris g-yogs gdugs can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-13: gdugs 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i spris g-yogs pa'i nad ni dbyibs su gdugs dang 'dra bar snang zhing kha dog sna tshogs par snang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-14: spris g-yogs pa gdugs can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-15: gtar ga mi bya cham pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-16: lud pa can ni dbye mi bya //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-17: ma zhu sngar ma skyugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-18: rna mig mgo gzer can mi dbye //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-20: spris g-yogs pa gtar ga byar mi rung ba'i nad yod pa'i mig dbye bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-21: de bzhin du cham pas btab pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-22: lud pa can gyi mig dbye bar mi bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:158a-23: de bzhin du ma zhu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:158a-28: mgo bo gzer ba'i mig dbye bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-29: de nas thun mong dus su ni //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-30: sbyang byas zas zos pa la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-31: sa phyogs gsal bar snga dro ni //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-32: sman pa pus mnyam khri la 'dug / nad pa 'dug cing bsdams byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-33: kha yi dbugs kyis dugs bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-34: mthe bos mig ni mnyes byas nas //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-35: nad ni g-yos par mthong ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-36: mi 'gul bar ni mgo nas gzung //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-37: rang gi sna la lta bzhin du //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-38: nag po sor phyed ma gtogs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-39: mig 'gram bzhi cha dor ba ru ;
T13TD4312.3E:158a-40: / mdzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-41: mig thur dam du bzung nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-42: rang grub bu ga nas 'phred du //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-43: gzug cing gyen mnye drang por byas //
T13TD4312.3E:158a-44: mig g-yon lag pa g-yas pas dbug / mig g-yas lag ba g-yon pas dbug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-0: de nas thun mong gi @158b 'du shes zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-3: dpyid zla tha chungs kyi dus su sbyang ba byas pas te /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-4: snum chos dang dugs byas la bkru sman gyis sbyangs te /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-6: kha zas phan zhing 'phrod pa ran par zos par gyur nas sa phyogs mun pa med cing gsal bar snga dro ste nyi ma shar ba'i cha dang po la sman pa mkhas pa pus mo dang mthon dman mnyam pa'i khri la 'dug ste /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-7: sa phyogs byi dor byas shing bde bar byas par stan bting la nad g-yog sgrin po rgyab tu legs par 'dug pas lag pa gnyis kyis mgo dam du bzung ste nyi ma la kha bstan la rkang pa gnyis brkyang ste sman pa'i kha'i dbugs kyis nad pa'i mig dugs byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-8: de'i 'og tu mig gong gnyis mthe bos mnyes nas mig gi nad spris g-yogs ba de g-yos shing /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-9: cung zad 'phags par mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-10: nad pa rang gi sna'i rtse mo la lta bar byed bzhin du mgo bo mi 'gul bar dam du bzung ste /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-11: nag po zhes bya ba mig 'bras nag po las sor phyed dor zhing de ma gtogs par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-12: mig 'gram zhes bya ba mig zur nas sor gyi bzhi cha dor la mdzub mo dang /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-13: gung mo dang mthe bos mig thur dam du mi 'gyur bar bzung ste rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i mig gi bu ga phra mo yod pa'i ngos nas gyen du mnye zhing mig drang por ma yo bar bzhag cing /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-14: steng ngam 'og tu ma 'gyur bar byas la mig g-yon pa ni lag pa g-yas pas phug par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-15: mig g-yas pa ni lag pa g-yon pas dbug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:158b-17: nad med chu ni nyung zhig 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:158b-19: de ltar 'bigs pa na legs shing ma nor bar phug na ni phug pa'i tshe sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-20: de bzhin du nad med par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-21: chu'i thigs pa nyung zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:158b-22: de rjes nad pa spro bsrings la //
T13TD4312.3E:158b-23: mig tu nu zho blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:158b-25: de ltar phug pa'i 'og tu nad pa tshig gis legs par spro bsrings la /
T13TD4312.3E:158b-28: mchi ma mi 'dzag par bya ba'i phyir bud med kyi nu zho blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:158b-29: de nas thur ma'i rtse mo yis //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-0: @159a * // gnod pa med par dal gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-1: mig gi 'bras bu dbyi byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-2: sna nas dal gyis phul bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-3: mig na gnas pa'i bad kan ni //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-4: sna nas brngubs pas bsal bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-6: de'i 'og tu sman pas thur ma'i rtse mos mig gi 'bras bu la gnod cing 'tshe ba med par dal gyis mig gi 'bras bu dbyi zhing bsal bar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:159a-7: sna nas nad dal gyis phul bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-8: de'i 'og tu sna nas brngubs pas mig la gnas pa'i nad dbyung zhing bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-10: mig gi phyi rol nas dugs bya ;
T13TD4312.3E:159a-12: mig gi spris g-yogs pa'i nad mi 'gul bar gyur pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:159a-13: rlung gis 'gyur zhing mal na mi gnas par gyur na ni /
T13TD4312.3E:159a-14: mig gi phyi rol nas dugs 'jam po bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-15: de nas gzugs ni mthong gyur nas //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-16: thur ma rim gyis dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-17: mar la sbangs pa'i ras bal gzhug / mig dkris nas ni de 'og tu //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-18: de las logs ni cig shos dbab //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-19: gnyis ka phye na gan rkyal bzhag / rlung med mal du mgo bo dang //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-20: rkang bsku phan pa'i zas bsten bya //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-22: de nas de'i 'og tu gzugs mthong bar gyur na sman pas thur ma de rim gyis da la bus dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-23: de ltar phyung nas de'i rjes la mar gyi khu ba la sbangs pa'i ras bal bcug la nad pa de'i mig dkri ste nyal du gzhug la /
T13TD4312.3E:159a-24: de yang mig gcig phug cing phye ba yin na ni /
T13TD4312.3E:159a-25: phye ba'i mig steng du phyung la ma phye ba'i mi gcig shos kyi logs phab ste nyal du gzhug la /
T13TD4312.3E:159a-26: gal te gnyi ga phye na ni gan rkyal du bkan te bsnyal bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:159a-27: de yang rlung med pa'i gnas mal du bsnyal zhing mgo bo dang rkang ba bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:159a-28: phan pa'i zas bsten du gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-29: sbrid pa lud pa sgregs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-31: thur du gtong ba khrus byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-32: so shing 'cha' bar byed pa dag / zhag bdun bar du spang bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-33: snum 'thungs cho ga bzhin du bsdam //
T13TD4312.3E:159a-35: nad ba de sbrid pa la sogs pa zhag bdun gyi bar du spang zhing bsdam par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:159b-0: @159b 'dir bsdam pa'i cho ga gzhan dag kyang snum 'thungs pa'i cho ga'i skabs su /
T13TD4312.3E:159b-1: chu dron gyis ni nyer spyod bya //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad smos pa'i bsdam pa'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-3: ci dus smyung bya na gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-4: mar khu dro 'jam blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-6: yang nad pa de nyams stobs ci yod pa las smyung ba bya ba la gal te na bar gyur na mar khu dro 'jam tsam gyi thigs pa blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-7: nas chan sla ba'am thug pa ska //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-8: cha gsum skyu ru ra mar sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-10: nad pa de la nas chag tsher btral [?] ba'i chan sla ba la mar btab pa tsha ba gsum la sogs pa dang bcas pa sbyin par bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:159b-11: yang 'bras thug gar bo tsha ba gsum dang skyu ru ra dang mar dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-12: zhag gsum nas ni de bkrol la //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-13: rlung 'joms pa yi sman gyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-14: khu ba mig tu blugs bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-16: zhag gsum lon pa dang nad pa de'i mig phye /
T13TD4312.3E:159b-17: rlung 'joms pa'i sman gyi khu ba'i thigs pa mig tu blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-18: zhag bdun nas ni mig de nyid //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-19: rnam pa kun tu dgrol bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-21: zhag bdun 'das pa dang mig de rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du bcing ba dgrol bar bya'i //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-23: ji srid mi gsal brtan gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-24: bsdams la 'bad de gnas par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-26: ji skad du bshad pa'i bsdams pa'i spyod pa ni ji skad mi gsal bar mthong ba nyams shing brtan par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du cho ga de la gnas par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-27: gzugs ni phra dang 'tsher ba dag / mod la blta bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-29: de ltar spris g-yogs pa bsal nas /
T13TD4312.3E:159b-30: des gzugs phra zhing brtag par dka' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:159b-31: 'tsher zhing 'od 'bar ba'i dngos po dag la mod la ste 'phral kho nar blta zhing brtag bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-32: dbug nyes mi mthun zos pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-33: skrangs dang na dang dmar la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-35: nad tshul de bzhin de gso bya //
T13TD4312.3E:159b-37: spris g-yogs pa dbug cing brtol ba nyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:160a-1: pa'i zas skom zos shing bsten pa las skrangs pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:160a-2: mig nad gdung ba zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:160a-3: skrangs pa la sogs pa de dag la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:160a-4: nad kyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de dang 'tsham pa'i sman gyis de gso zhing bcos par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-5: nad dang dmar ba zhi bya'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-6: d'ur ba nas dang yug snam dang //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-7: thal tres mar dang ldan pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-8: lde gus gdong ni bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-10: nad dang dmar ba snang bzhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T13TD4312.3E:160a-11: d'ur ba la sogs pa'i sman chu thags su bya ba'i lde gu mar dang ldan pas gdong bsku zhing byug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-12: de bzhin til dang yungs kar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-13: kha lung khu bas sbrus pa'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-16: yungs kar lde gur byas pa kha lung zhes bya ba bi dza bu ra'i khu bas sbrus pas gdong bskus na /
T13TD4312.3E:160a-17: yang na ba dang dmar ba la phan no ;
T13TD4312.3E:160a-18: / thal tres lo ma pa ya sya //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-19: btsod dang shing mngar ra yi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-20: 'o mar sbyar ba'i lde gu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-21: dro 'jam bde bar byed mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-23: thal tres la sogs pa'i sman ra'i 'o ma dang bskol ba dro 'jam tsam gyi lde gus mig tu bskus na yang na ba dang dmar ba bde bar byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-24: seng phrom rgyam tsha rgun 'bru dang //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-25: shing mngar ra yi 'o mar bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-26: thigs pa mig tu blugs pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-27: na dang dmar ba 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-29: rgun 'bru rgya skye gas kha rar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-31: seng phrom la sogs pa ra'i 'o ma dang bskol ba blugs na yang de la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-33: mar gyi bzhi 'gyur bskol ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-34: shug pa la sogs lde gus btab //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-35: las kun la ni bsngags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-37: rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i 'o ma'i nang du shug pa la sogs pa'i lde gus btab na yang bskol ba'i sman mar ni las kun te btung ba dang sna nas btang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:160a-38: bsku ba la sogs pa thams cad la bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-39: des ma zhi na snum chos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:160a-40: dugs byas gtar ga gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-0: gdung ba'i @160b gso ba dag kyang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-2: de ltar byas su zin kyang nye bar zhi bar ma gyur na nad pa de snum chos dang dugs byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:160b-3: gtar ga gdab par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:160b-4: de bzhin du mig nad gdung ba'i gso ba bshad pa'i cho ga dag kyang 'dir bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-7: mig dbug cing phye ba de legs par 'drub par gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:160b-8: mig sman 'jam po dag bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-9: tu pa ri'i rtsa na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-10: ba bla skyer pa'i khanda bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-11: mig phye dbu ram ri lu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-12: char pa'i chu dang bdar ba gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-14: tu pa ri zhes bya ba aa ta ka'i rtsa ba dang na le sham la sogs pa char pa'i chu dang bdar ba dag kyang gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-15: dz'a ti da pa shi ri sha / karka ta sring gi me tog / mu tig 'bras bu beed'urya //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-16: ra yi 'o mar btags pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-17: zangs ma'i snod la sla bar bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-18: zhag bdun nas bkog slar yang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-19: 'o ma dang btags lde gur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-20: ri lu grib ma la bskams pa //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-21: mig bskus phye ba mthong ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-22: gsal zhing stobs ni skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-24: dz'a ti la sogs pa ra'i 'o ma dang zhib tu btags te lde gu zhib mo des zangs ma'i snod la srab mor bskus te zhag bdun 'das par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:160b-25: slar bkog ste 'o ma dang lde gur byas te ri lur byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:160b-26: de grib ma la bskams la mig la bskus na /
T13TD4312.3E:160b-27: de ltar mig phye zhing phug pa de'i mthong ba gsal bar byed cing /
T13TD4312.3E:160b-28: mig rno ba'i stobs skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-29: byi ru ldong ros lig bu mig / rgya mtsho'i ldu ba na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-30: sna nas btang ba'i sman sbyar na //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-31: bshad pa'i yon tan mtshungs par bstan //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-33: byi ru la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du ra'i 'o ma dang zhib tu btags te /
T13TD4312.3E:160b-34: des zangs ma'i snod du bsku ba la sogs pa gong du bshad ma thag pa'i sbyor ba dang yon tan thams cad mtshungs shing 'dra bar slob dpon gyis bstan cing bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:160b-35: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa /
T13TD4312.3E:160b-36: tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-0: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba @161a * //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-2: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-4: // / de nas mig nad thams cad kyi nad kyi dmigs brtag pa bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-6: mig nad kyi yan lag gi char gtogs pa bshad nas mig thams cad kyi nad gang yin pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-7: rlung gi mig nas mchi ma 'dzag / sna rgyas cung zad skrangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-8: mur 'gram dpral mig smin ma kha //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-9: na zhing zug la 'phar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-10: rngu [?] ma skam zhing mchi ma grang //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-11: sla nyung na ba ldang dub can //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-13: srin bu 'gro ba snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-14: mig ni bus pa lta bur snang //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-15: zug rngu phra mos khyab snyam byed //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-16: snum dang dro bas nyer zher 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-19: rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad rlung gis mchi ma 'dzag par gyur pa na /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-21: gang ba lta bur gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-23: mur 'gram la sogs pa lhang lhang por na zhing zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-25: rdum [?] zhes bya ba'i mig gi dri ma skam po 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-26: mchi ma grang zhing sla ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-28: na ba ldang dub byed pa can du 'gyur zhing mi brtan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-30: 'dzums par dka' zhing sdug bsngal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-31: grog ma la sogs pa'i srin bu steng na 'gro ba snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-32: mig bus pa ltar rgyas par snang ba dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:161a-33: khab kyis btsags shing zug rngu phra mos khyab pa snyam du byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-34: snum pa dang dro bas bde zhing nad nye bar zhi bar gyur pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-35: nad de ni rlung gis mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-36: de ma bcos na gdung bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-38: dpral ba mig dang smin ma sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-39: gtsub shing gis ni gtsubs snyam byed //
T13TD4312.3E:161a-41: mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya ba'i nad de ma bcos te yal bar dor na mig nad gdung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:161a-42: gdung ba de ni rna ba nas sgra zing zing por 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-1: dpral ba la sogs pa gtsub shing gis gtsubs shing dkrugs pa snyam du sems par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-2: de yang bag med yal bar bor //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-3: gdung bas bcom gyur nad de yis //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-7: yang gdung ba zhes bya ba'i nad de bag med pas yal bar bor na mig nad gdung bas bcom pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad du 'gyur te gdung bas bcom pa zhes bya ba'i nad des ni mig nad sna tshogs shing tha dad pa'i tshul du ma dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mig gi mthong ba nyams shing long ba'i rma 'byung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-8: mur 'gram kha dang mjing pa las //
