T13TD4312.3E:161b-10: mi bzad na la gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-11: dmar zhing skrangs la mig mi sdug / zhum zhing kun nas mchi ma 'dzag / de ni rlung gis gzhan gyur yin //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-13: gdung bas bcom pa zhes bya ba de ma bcos te yal bar bor na mur 'gram la sogs pa las rlung gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161b-14: de bzhin du mi bzad pa'i gnag pa la sogs pa'i nad skyed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161b-15: mig mi sdug cing mig kun nas zhum par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:161b-16: thams cad nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:161b-17: de ni rlung gis gzhan du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-18: de bzhin mig ni yon po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-19: chung ba rlung gis phyin ci log / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:161b-20: snga ma bzhin du rlung gis gzhan du gyur pa dang nad kyi tshul mthun zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:161b-21: gzhan yang yon po dang rang gi tshad las chung bar gyur pa ni rlung gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-22: mkhris pa'i mchi 'dzag mtshan ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-23: tsha grang du ba 'byung snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-24: mig chu'i phyi rol gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-25: nang na rnag 'drul mchi ma tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-26: ser zhing mig dmar ser por mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-27: rma la lan tshvas btab snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:161b-29: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan nyid ni tsha bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-0: du ba 'byung ba snyam du sems pa @162a * //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-2: dngos po ser por mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-3: rma la lan tshvas btab pa dang 'dra bar mig na bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-4: me mdag gtor ba 'dra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-5: mcher pa'i gong bu lta bur snang //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-6: mig nad gdung bar gyur pa yin ;
T13TD4312.3E:162a-8: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa de yal bar bor na /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-9: mig nad gdung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-10: de ni mig la me mdag gtor ba snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-11: mcher pa'i gong bu ltar gnag pa snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-12: bad kan las gyur mchi 'dzag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-13: tshor ba med skrang rab tu g-ya' //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-14: gsher zhing snum la shas cher dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-15: mig gdung spyi bag 'dzag pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-17: bad kan las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa ni mig tshor ba med cing bem bem por gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-19: g-ya' ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-20: gdung ba des ni nag po dma' //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-21: 'bras bu dkar po mtho ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-22: cham pas thebs shing sna rgyas la //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-23: mig ni rdul gyis gang snyam byed //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-25: bad kan gyis mchi ma 'dzag pa ni mig tshor ba med cing yal bar bor ba na /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-26: gdung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-27: des ni mig 'bras nag po dma' bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-28: 'bras bu dkar po mtho zhing 'bur bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-29: de bzhin du cham pas thebs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-30: khrag gyur dmar ris mig tu dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-31: mig 'bras dkar po dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-32: khrag 'dzag dmar po mthong ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-33: mkhris pa'i mchi 'dzag mtshan nyid yin //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-35: khrag las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag par gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-36: mig la ri mo dmar po shar shar por snang ba nas /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-37: mig 'bras dkar po dmar po nyid du snang zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-38: dngos po dmar po nyid du snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162a-39: de bzhin du mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan nyid gang dag yod pa de 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-40: gdung ba mig ni mtha' dmar zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-41: phyung [?] ba dang ni mtshungs par na //
T13TD4312.3E:162a-42: me tog bandu ka ltar dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-0: @162b shin tu na zhing reg mi bzod //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-1: lung tang khrag tu nub pa 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-2: gnag cing me ltar snang ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-4: khrag las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa de yal bar bor na mig nad gdung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:162b-5: de'i mtshan ma ni mig gi mtha' ma gzags pa ltar dmar bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162b-6: de bzhin du mig phyung ba dang mtshungs par mi bzad par na bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162b-7: me tog bandu ka'i mdog ltar mig shin tu dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162b-8: shin tu lhang lhang por na ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162b-10: lung tang khrag gi nang du nub pa dang 'dra ba'i mdog tu mig 'bras nag por snang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162b-11: dngos po rnams me dang 'dra bar mthong ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-12: gdung ba rang gi ji bzhin du //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-13: thams cad 'dzag pa las lhag na //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-14: mur 'gram so dang mkhur tshos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-15: mgo bo lhag par na bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-17: mig nad gdung ba zhes bya ba'i nad rlung dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162b-20: khrag las gyur pa thams cad ni /
T13TD4312.3E:162b-21: rang gi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du na ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-22: rlung la sogs pa las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa thams cad las lhag par mi bzad par na ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:162b-23: de bzhin du mur 'gram la sogs pa lhag par na bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-24: rlung mkhris shas cher drud snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-25: zug cing na la phul snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-26: shin tu rtsub cing mig mchu mig /'dzums dang 'byed par dka' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-27: na zhing skams par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-28: grang 'dod smin cing skam dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-29: mig skam smin pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-31: mig la rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis kyi shas che zhing lhag par gyur na ni /
T13TD4312.3E:162b-32: drud pa snyam du sems pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-33: nad gzhi gsum ni khrag bcas la //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-34: skrang 'gyur de ni rab skrangs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-35: na dang tsha dang 'dzag dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-38: mchi ma grang zhing dro ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:162b-39: spyi bag ska sla ras kyis 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-0: rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi gsum po khrag dang bcas @163a * //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-1: pas ni skrangs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-2: de ni rab tu skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-3: na ba la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-4: de bzhin du mig 'bras dkar por au dumw'a ra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-5: mchi ma phyed 'ga' ni grang bar mchi ma phyed 'ga' ni dro bar 'byung /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-8: phyed 'ga' ni sla ba la sogs par res kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-9: skrang chung cung zad skrangs zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-10: de bzhin mtshan nyid gzhan gyis smin //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-12: cung zad skrang pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad ni skrangs pa cung zad tsam du 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-13: bshad ma thag pa'i mig nad skrangs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-14: mig nad 'di'i khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-15: gang skrangs pa cung zad chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-16: de bzhin du sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid smin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-17: tsha ba dang na ba med par gnas la /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-18: de bzhin du au dumw'a ra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dra ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-19: mig smin pas nyen skrangs pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-20: rtsom che mchi ma rnyog can 'dzag / bad kan gyis bsgos mig 'bras ni //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-21: dkar po dmar zhing 'drul ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-22: tsha zhing mthong ba nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-23: nad ni mal na mi gnas yin //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-25: mig smin pas nyen pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad ni skrangs pa'i rtsom pa dang por che bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-26: mchi ma rnyog ba can 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-27: bad kan gyis bsgos shing byugs pa 'dra bar snang ba dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:163a-28: mig gi 'bras bu dkar po mdog dmar zhing mig 'dzag cing 'drul ba dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163a-30: mthong ba nyams shing long ba dang nad mal na mi gnas shing kun tu 'pho bar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-31: khrag mkhris shas che'i nad kyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-32: zas kyi dangs ma skyur por 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-33: mig gi rtsar ni song nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-34: mig ni dmar por byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-35: skrang tsha smin zhing mchi ma 'dzag / shin tu long long bor mthong na //
T13TD4312.3E:163a-36: skyur gyis skyed pa'i nad ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-0: khrag dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i rlung la sogs pa'i @163b nad kyis zas kyi bcud dangs ma zhes bya ba skyur por gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-1: de nyid kyis khrag dang mkhris pa shas cher byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-2: yang mig gi rtsar song ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-3: des mig dmar por byed par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-4: de bzhin du skrang zhing tsha ba la sogs bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-5: mig nad 'di ni skyur gyis skyed pa zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-6: de ltar kun gtogs nad bcu drug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-7: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis mig nad du gtogs pa'i nad ni bcu drug yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-8: de la gdung bas bcom pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-9: mig smin bcas pa spad bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-11: mig nad 'di dag gi nang nas gdung bas bcom pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-12: mig smin pa zhes bya ba'i nad dang bcas pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-13: gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-14: rlung gyur zhag lngas mig la gnod par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-15: bad kan las gyur gdung bas zhag bdun gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-16: de bzhin khrag gyur zhag gsum gyis 'joms byed //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-17: mkhris gyur 'phral du log spyod kyis gnod skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-19: rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad gdung ba ni log pa'i spyod pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-20: kha zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa mig la gnod par byed pas zhag lnga la mig la gnod cing nyams par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-21: bad kan las gyur pa'i gdung ba ni /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-22: spyod lam dang kha zas log pas zhag bdun gyis mig la gnod cing 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-23: khrag las gyur pa'i mig nad gdung ba ni zhag gsum gyis mig 'joms shing gnod par byed do ;
T13TD4312.3E:163b-24: / mkhris ba las gyur pa'i mig nad gdung ba ni kha zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa log pas 'phral du gnod pa skyed cing mig 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-25: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-26: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bco lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:163b-28: // / de nas mig nad thams cad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-30: go rims kyis na gso ba 'di brtsams ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:163b-31: mchi 'dzag sngar byung tshul nyid la //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-2: rlung 'khrugs ma gtogs nad gzhan la //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-3: smyung ba dag kyang bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-5: mchi ma 'dzag pa'i nad thams cad kyi sngar byung ba'i tshul la mkhur ba bkang brnon po dang /
T13TD4312.3E:164a-6: sna sman rnon po gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-7: de'i rjes la rlung 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i nad ma gtogs pa nad gzhan la smyung ba byas pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-8: tsha dang dmar dang gos pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-9: skrang sogs zhi phyir kun la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-10: sug smel [?] gandha bha dra dang //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-11: na le sham dang btsag yug snam //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-12: lde gur byas pas bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-14: mchi ma 'dzag pa thams cad kyis tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:164a-16: ljan ljin gyis gos pa la sogs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T13TD4312.3E:164a-17: sug smel la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gus mig gi phyi rol nas bsku bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:164a-18: de yang rdzi ma la mi gnod par bya'o /
T13TD4312.3E:164a-19: rlung gyur rgyam tsha skyer khanda //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-20: shing mngar rgya spos tsandan nam //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-21: rgyam tsha dong gra skyer khanda //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-22: mar gyi nying gu bdar ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-23: yang na seng phrom sbyar ba gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-25: de la rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i sman mar gyi nying gu zhes bya ba mar gyi steng gi dangs ma dang bcas pa bdar ba'i lde gus phyi rol nas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-26: yang na seng phrom mar dang bdar ba'i lde gus phyi rol nas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-27: khrag mkhris gyur la spang spos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-28: shug pa shing mngar ra mnye ba //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-30: khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni spang spos la sogs pa'i lde gus phyi rol nas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-31: bad kan las gyur pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-32: ldong ros sbrang rtsi sbyar ba bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-34: bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:164a-35: gandha pri yang ku la sogs pa'i lde gus phyi rol nas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-36: 'dus pa las gyur kun gyis bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:164a-38: nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa la sogs pa'i mig nad la ni rlung dang /
T13TD4312.3E:164a-39: mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi sman thams cad bsres pa'i mig sman gyi lde gus phyi rol nas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-0: na le @164b sham ni dkar po cha gcig dang //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-1: ldong ros cha bzhi seng phrom cha bcu drug / zhib tu btags te ras gtsang phur mas gtums //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-2: nad ldang med [?] la mig tu gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-4: na le sham dkar po cha gcig ldong ros tsha bzhi ste /
T13TD4312.3E:164b-5: de'i bzhi 'gyur seng phrom cha bcu drug ste /
T13TD4312.3E:164b-7: de dag thams cad zhib tu btags te /
T13TD4312.3E:164b-8: ras gtsang ma'i nang du phur mar gtums la /
T13TD4312.3E:164b-9: nad ldang ba'i mod la mig tu phur ma sprug cing gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-10: rgya sran nag po ba lci ra'i ril khu //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-11: legs btsos sen mos shun pa bshus gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-12: de yis mtshan mo lan cig bskus pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-13: mig nad 'khrugs pa mod la zhi bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-15: rgya sran ku langtha dgon pa ba'i lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:164b-16: ra'i ril ma'i khu bar tshos par btsos la sen mos shun pa bshus te rgya sran de'i phye ma mtshan mo'i dus su lan cig bskus shing mig tu btab na mig nad 'khrugs pa mod kho na la zhi bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-17: shu ti shing mngar spangs ma aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-18: zhib btags ras kyi thum po lhod par bcings //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-19: zangs kyi snod du skyur rtsabs nang du bcug / mig tu bzhag na mig nad sna tshogs sel ;
T13TD4312.3E:164b-21: shu ti la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i sbyor bas 'bras kyi rang skyur ram skyur khu'i nang du bcug pa de mig tu bzhag cing glan na mig nad rnam pa sna tshogs dag sel cing 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-22: skyer pa srang gcig chu bre phyed du yang //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-23: khu ba brgyad cha lus par sbrang rtsi btab //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-24: de bzhin mig tu bskus par gyur na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-25: nad gzhi thams cad 'khrugs pa'i mig nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-27: skyer pa srang gcig chu srang bcu drug gi nang du bskol la brgyad cha lus par sbrang rtsi btab ste /
T13TD4312.3E:164b-28: mig tu ji lta ba bzhin du bskus na mig nad sna tshogs pa nad gzhi so so dang 'dus pa las gyur pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-29: shi kru'i lo ma'i khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-30: mig tu blugs na rlung dang mkhris pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-31: bad kan 'dus pa las gyur mig nad rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:164b-32: mig nad mang po dag kyang myur du sel //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-2: shi kru'i lo ma bskol ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i mig sman gyis kyang rlung la sogs pa las gyur pa'i mig nad sel to //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-3: ae randa ni gzhon nu'i lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-4: rtsa ba brdungs te ra yi 'o mar bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-5: blugs sam zan dron mig tu glan pa yis ;
T13TD4312.3E:165a-6: / rlung gyur mchi 'dzag nad ni mod la 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-8: ae randa gzhon nu'i lo ma dang rtsa ba gtun gyi nang du brdungs te ra'i 'o ma dang bskol te thigs pa mig tu blugs pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:165a-9: de bzhin du zan dron mo mig tu glan na /
T13TD4312.3E:165a-10: rlung las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa'i nad gsar pa mod la 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-11: rlung gyur ba la bil ba sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-12: bskol ba'i sman thigs blugs pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-13: ae randa'i rtsa bri ha ti //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-14: ma du shi kru dro 'jam blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-16: rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa la ni bil ba la sogs pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:165a-17: ae randa'i rtsa ba la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba dro 'jam tsam gyi thigs pa'i rgyun mig tu blugs na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-18: sha rang gashta ba la ka / rgya spos au dumw'a ra'i shun //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-19: chu dang 'o mar bcas bskol ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-20: thigs blugs gzer ni sel mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-22: sha rang ga la sogs pa'i shing gi shun pa chu'i nang du bskol ba'i thigs pa blugs na mig gzer zhing na ba sel ba'i mchog dam pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-23: btsod dang skyer pa rgya skyegs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-25: bskol te bsgrangs par khar gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-26: mig blugs khrag mkhris mig nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-28: btsod la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs par kha ra btab pa grang mo'i thigs pa blugs na yang khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad 'joms so //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-29: shing mngar ka she ru'i phye ma //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-30: ras ma 'jam pos lhod par bcing //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-31: char chu'i nang du spangs pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-32: khrag mkhris las gyur mchi 'dzag sel //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-34: shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba ji skad du bshad pa ltar byas pa yang yon tan de dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-35: shing mngar skyer pa stag tsher ba //
T13TD4312.3E:165a-36: thum po nu zho kha rar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-0: @165b ra yi 'o mar sbangs pa blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-3: shing mngar la sogs pa ras gtsang ma'i thum bur byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:165b-4: bud med kyi nu zho dang kha rar bcas pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:165b-5: ra'i 'o ma sbyar ba'i thigs pa mig tu blugs na tsha ba la sogs pa sel bar byed do ;
T13TD4312.3E:165b-6: / seng phrom dkar po shing mngar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-7: mar brdos legs par btags pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-8: ras la gtums te nu zhor mnye //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-9: khrag mkhris snad pa'i mig nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-11: seng phrom dkar po shing mngar dang bcas pa mar la brngos pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas mig sman du btang na khrag dang mkhris pa dang snad pa las gyur pa'i mig nad sel lo //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-12: dong gra nim pa 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-13: seng phrom ba sha ka'i khu ba //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-14: dro 'jam blugs pas bad kan sel //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-16: dong gra la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba dro 'jam tsam gyi thigs pa blugs na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad sel to //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-19: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:165b-20: sman 'di dag bsres pa bskol ba'i thigs pa blugs na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-21: rlung la mar ni rnying pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-22: mkhris pa kha rar bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-23: bad kan la ni tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-24: bskol dang thal sman bcas pa blud //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-25: de 'og khrag kyang dbyung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-26: de nas snum gyur bkru sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-28: rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-29: mar rnying pa btung bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:165b-30: mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:165b-31: mar rnying pa de nyid kha ra dang bcas pa blud par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:165b-32: bad kan las gyur pa la ni mar rnying pa de nyid tsha ba gsum dang bskol cing /
T13TD4312.3E:165b-33: thal sman gyi phye ma btab pa blud la /
T13TD4312.3E:165b-34: de'i rjes la khrag dbyung zhing gtar ga gdab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:165b-35: de'i rjes la yang snum gyi cho ga byas la bkru sman gtang bar bya'o ;
T13TD4312.3E:165b-36: / dro bas tsha ste gzer ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-37: skam sa'i srog chags sha btags pas //
T13TD4312.3E:165b-40: mig dro zhing tsha bas gzer bar gyur pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:165b-41: skam sa'i srog chags kyi sha zhib tu btags pas mgo dang gdong byug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-1: ma mar bcas grang mos bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-3: gal te tsha bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:166a-4: 'o ma mar dang bcas pa grang mos mgo bo dang /
T13TD4312.3E:166a-6: rab rib gso ba'i cho ga yang //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-7: brtags te ji bzhin gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-9: rab rib gso ba'i stobs las kyang brtags te de'i sman rab rib gso ba'i skabs su ji skad bshad pa dag kyang gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-10: cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-11: gdung ba la sogs rnams la'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-13: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni gdung ba la sogs pa'i mig nad lhag ma rnams la'ang phan zhing bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-14: gdung ba yong ye ma zhi na //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-15: smin ma'i steng du me btsa' gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-17: gdung ba zhes bya ba'i mig nad rnam pa thams cad du zhi bar ma gyur na smin ma'i steng du ji skad bshang pa'i cho gas me btsa' gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-18: ba zho snum med kyis dngul snod //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-19: byugs te sngon por gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-20: skam nas zho ga chu ri lur //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-21: byas pas rlung gyur mig nad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-23: ba'i zho snum med cing spris ma bshus pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:166a-24: skyur pos dngul gyi snod byugs la de sngon por gyur cing skom pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:166a-25: bsdus te zho ga chus ri lur byas pas bskus na rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-26: dz'a ti'i me tog kha 'bus dung //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-27: shing mngar ba la 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-28: char chu dang btags ri lur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-29: khrag mkhris las gyur mig nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-31: dz'a ti zhes bya ba sna ma'i me tog kha 'bus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:166a-32: dung la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du ri lur byas pa'i mig sman gyis ni khrag mkhris las gyur pa'i mig nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-33: rgyam tsha 'bras bu tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-34: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dung snying po //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-35: ae la ba lu sra rtsi pog / ri lus bad kan mig nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:166a-37: rgyam tsha dang 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i mig sman gyis bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad gang dag yin pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-0: shing mngar bu [?] punda r'i ka / skyer pa srang @166b ni brgyad brgyad dag / chu bre bcu drug nang bskol btsags //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-1: slar bskol ska bar gyur pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-2: ra gan dud pa srang bcu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-3: na le sham phye zho gnyis gzhug / de la ri lu'am phye mar byas //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-4: bskus na mchi 'dzag thams cad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-5: dmar na drud pa byed snyam 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-6: 'phral du mig ni gsal bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-7: sbyor 'di phyugs bdag ces bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-8: sman pa rnams kyi gsang ba mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:166b-9: shing mngar la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bskol la bzhi cha lus pa dang btsags te yang bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:166b-10: gzar bu la chags pa tsam gyi bar du ska bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:166b-11: ra gan gyi dud pa la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du bcug ste /
T13TD4312.3E:166b-12: de'i 'og tu ri lur byas pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:166b-13: phye mar byas pas bskus na mchi ma 'dzag pa la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:166b-14: 'phral du de'i mod la mig gsal zhing dangs par byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:166b-15: mig sman gyi sbyor ba 'di ni ming phyugs bdag ces bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:166b-16: shin tu gsang bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-17: mig smin skam pa mar blud cing //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-18: 'tsho byed kyi ni sman mar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-19: blud cing mig ni brta bya dang //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-20: til mar chung ngu'i sna smad gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-22: mig smin ma skam po'i nad la ni mar blud na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-23: de bzhin du 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang bskol ba'i sman mar blud cing mig brta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:166b-24: de bzhin du sman mar de nyid kyi sman gtang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:166b-25: til mar gyi thigs pa chung ngu'i sna sman gtang ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-27: / dro 'jam thigs pa blugs pa'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-29: mig smin ma skam po 'di la 'o ma la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin btang na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-30: bca' sga bud med nu zhor btags //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-31: mar sbyar mig tu bskus na'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-33: [?] yang na de la bca' sga la sogs pa'i mig sman bskus na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:166b-34: yang na rlan can sha yi zhag / dong gra rgyam tsha cung zad btab //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-0: yang na rlan can gyi srog chags kyi sha'i zhag dong gra dang rgyam tsha cung zad bsres pa'i mig sman yang @167a * //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-2: skra ni mar bskus me long gis //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-3: mnyes te kham phor kha sbyor bcug / bsregs te lcags snod mar dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-4: snag tsha de ni mig sman mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:167a-5: mi'i skra mar bsku ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ji skad smos pa bzhin du byas pa'i snag tsha ni mig smin ma skam po'i mig sman gyi mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-6: skrangs bcas cung zad skrangs pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-7: snum chos byas te gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-8: snum byas rgun 'bru aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-9: dur byid mar bcas bkru sman btang //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-11: mig gi nang skrangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:167a-12: cung zad skrangs pa la dang por snum chos byas te de'i 'og tu gtar ga gdab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:167a-13: yang snum chos byas la ji skad smos pa'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-14: seng phrom dkar po mar la brngos //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-15: phye mar byas te ras la gtums //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-16: chu dron la mnyes thigs pa blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-17: gzer 'joms pa yi mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-19: seng phrom ji skad smos pa'i sbyor bas thigs pa mig tu blugs na /
T13TD4312.3E:167a-20: mig nad kyi gzer 'joms par byed pa'i dam pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-21: skyer pa bra punda r'i ka / bskol ba'i thigs pa blugs pas phan //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-23: yang na mig gzer ba la skyer pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:167a-24: pra punda r'i ka bskol ba'i thigs pa mig tu blugs na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-25: mchi 'dzag na zhing drud snyam byed //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-26: sbyar sman 'di dag gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-28: mchi ma 'dzag pa la sogs pa las 'og nas smos pa'i sbyar sman 'di dag kyang gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-29: lcags kyi snod du zangs ma ba gcin sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-30: mar bdugs mig bskus gzer ni 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-32: lcags kyi snod kyi nang du zangs ma ba gcin dang sbyar la mar gyi dud pas bdugs pa mig tu bskus na /
T13TD4312.3E:167a-33: mig gzer zhing na ba 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-34: zangs ma'i snod du ba zho'i spris ma bdar //
T13TD4312.3E:167a-35: rgyam tsha pi pi ling dang bcas pa mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:167b-0: yang na zangs ma'i snod kyi nang du ba'i zho dang bdar ba dang rgyam tsha dang pi pi ling sbyar ba'i mig sman ni mig na zhing gzer ba 'joms @167b par byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-1: zangs ma'i snod du nu zho dung bdar la //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-2: dong ga'i lo ma mar bcas dud pas bdug / sbyar sman zhes bya mig tu bskus na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-3: drud snyam byed sogs mi bzad nad myur sel //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-5: zangs ma'i snod kyi nang du bud med kyi nu zho dang bdar te /
T13TD4312.3E:167b-6: dong ga'i lo ma mar gyis bskus pas bdugs la /
T13TD4312.3E:167b-7: mig tu bskus pa'i sbyar sman ni drud snyam du byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:167b-8: tsha ba la sogs pa'i mig nad mi bzad pa myur du sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-9: au dum w'a ra'i 'bras bu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-10: lcags snod nang du nu zho ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-11: sha ma'i lo ma mar dung bdugs //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-14: au dum w'a ra'i 'bras bu ji skad smos pa bzhin du byas pa'i mig sman yang sbyar sman zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:167b-15: mchi ma 'dzag pa la sogs pa 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-16: shi kru'i lo ma'i khu ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-17: zangs ma gnyis kyi bar du bdar //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-18: mar dud bdugs pas skrangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-22: na le sham dkar po bskol ba'i khu ba zangs ma'i snod gnyis kha sbyar ba'i nang du bdar la /
T13TD4312.3E:167b-23: mar gyi dud pas bdugs pa yang sbyar sman zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:167b-24: skrangs pa la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-25: til gyi chu dang khar ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-26: kham phor bdar te nim pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-27: 'o ma mar bskol dud pas bdugs //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-28: gzer ram mchi 'dzag drud snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-31: khar ba kham phor gyi nang du bdar te nim pa'i lo ma mar gyis bskus pa'i nang du dud pas legs par bdugs pa'i mig sman yang sbyar sman zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:167b-32: des bskus na gzer ba nas drud pa snyam du sems pa'i mig nad sel lo //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-33: sbyar sman gyis ni mig bskus te //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-34: sman shugs zug gzer dang bral nas //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-35: bud med nu zho'i thigs pa blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-36: lan gsum phan chad de mi bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:167b-38: sbyar sman zhes bya ba'i sman de dag gis mig bskus nas /
T13TD4312.3E:167b-39: sman gyis bskyed pa'i zug gzer gyi rtsom pa zhi zhing bral bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:168a-1: 'og tu bud med kyi nu zho'i thigs pa'i rgyun blugs par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:168a-2: sbyar sman de dag gis lan gsum phan chad ni mig bsku bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-3: bal bu'i lo ma pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-4: rgya spos lcags phye stang zil dang //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-5: dz'a ti kha 'bus nag tshur dang //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-6: rgyam tsha ba gcin btags pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-7: lde gus zangs kyi snod bskus la //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-8: zhag bdun bzhag ste ba gcin dang //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-9: btags te ri lur byas nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-10: de 'og grib ma la bskams te //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-11: bud med nu zho dang bdar bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-12: drud snyam byed dang mchi ma 'dzag / skrang dang g-ya' ba sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-14: bal bu'i lo ma la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang btags pas zangs kyi snod la bskus la /
T13TD4312.3E:168a-15: zhag bdun gyi bar du bzhag ste /
T13TD4312.3E:168a-16: bkog la de'i 'og tu ba 'am ra'i gcin dang btags te ri lur byas la grib ma la bskams te /
T13TD4312.3E:168a-17: ri lu de bud med kyi nu zho dang bdar te /
T13TD4312.3E:168a-18: mig tu bskus na mig nad drud pa snyam du sems pa la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-19: kanda ka ri'i shun pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-20: shing mngar zangs ma'i phye ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-21: ra yi 'o mas lde gur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-22: sha mi skyu ru ra'i lo ma ;
T13TD4312.3E:168a-23: / mar gyis bskus pa'i dud pas bdugs //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-24: bskus na skrangs dang gzar nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-26: kanda ka ra'i shun pa la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du lde gur byas pa la sha mi dang skyu ru ra'i lo ma mar gyis bskus pa'i dud pas bdugs te bskus na skrangs pa la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-27: skyur gyis bskyed la mkhris pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-28: mchi ma 'dzag pa'i cho gas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-30: skyur gyis bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad la ni mkhris pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa'i cho ga ji skad smos pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-31: bad kan khrag mkhris kyis bskyed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-32: 'dus pas bskyed dang sgra ngan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-33: rdzi ma 'gags dang mig smin skam //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-34: rnag gi chu ser padma'i rtsa //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-35: mig mchu'i sha dang skyur skyed cung //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-36: mchi 'dzag gdung ba rlung ma gtogs //
T13TD4312.3E:168a-37: bco brgyad po dag tshag par bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-0: @168b yun ring du ni na ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-2: bad kan gyis bskyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-8: mig smin ma skam po dang /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-9: rnag gi chu ser can dang /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-14: mkhris pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-15: khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-16: bad kan gyi mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-17: mkhris pa'i mig nad gdung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-19: bad kan gyis gdung ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-20: de ltar mig nad bco brgyad po dag ni yun ring du na zhing gnas par byed pa yin zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-21: thams cad kyang mig tshag par bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-22: 'di dag gso ba so so yi //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-23: le'u'i nang du bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-24: de'i 'og mig tshag spyi yi bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-26: mig tshag pa 'di dag gi gso ba gang dag yin pa de so so'i le'u'i nang du bshad cing bstan pa yin zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-27: rang rang gi gang dag bshad pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-28: de las gzhan yang mig tshag pa yun ring du rjes su 'brel cing na ba'i thun mong gi spyi'i gso ba da ltar 'dir ston cing 'chad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-29: de nas mig tshag nad pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-30: snum [?] chos slon ni byas nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-31: gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-32: bkru sman btang zhing mig chu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-33: dag par gyur gyi bar du bzhar //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-35: de nas de'i 'og tu mig tshag par gyur pa dag / dang bor snum chos byas la skyug sman gtang zhing slon du bcug ste /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-37: de'i 'og tu snum chos te bkru sman btang la /
T13TD4312.3E:168b-38: de'i 'og mig gi chu dag cing nad med par gyur gyi bar du bzhar zhing zhal zhal gdab pa'i spyad kyis bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-39: spangs ma srang gcig na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-40: dkar po srang ni nyi shu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-41: skyur rtsabs srang ni sum cu dag / btags te zangs ma'i snod du gzhug / lo mang lon pa'i mig tshag pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:168b-42: chu ser 'dzag sogs zhi bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-0: gos dang tsha dang mchi ma 'dzag / g-ya' skrangs de blugs @169a * //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-3: spangs ma srang gcig la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du btags te zangs ma'i snod du bcug la de'i thigs pa blugs na lo mang du lon pa'i mig tshag pa'am chu ser 'dzag pa la sogs pa zhi bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-4: de bzhin du gos pa la sogs pa'i mig nad kyang de blugs pas sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-5: bye'u rug ka ranydza'i sa bon //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-6: dz'a ti'i me tog kha 'bus pa //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-7: brdungs te bskol la btsags nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-8: khu bar byas pa de dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-9: stang zil dang sbyar mig sman ni //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-10: mig tshag g-ya' dang chu ser 'dzag / g-ya' zhing 'drul ba sel mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-12: bye'u rug ba la sogs pa gtun la brdungs te bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:169a-13: ras gtsang mas btsags pa'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:169a-14: stang zil sbyar ba'i mig sman gyis ni mig tsha ba la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-15: skyer pa'i khanda sra rtsi pog / ra gan dud pa ldong ros dang //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-16: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba rgyam tsha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-17: na le sham dang btsag yug snam //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-18: sbrang rtsi btags pa'i mig sman ni //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-19: mig tshag 'drul g-ya' sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-21: skyer pa'i khanda la sogs pa sbrang rtsi dang zhib tu btags pa'i mig sman ni mig tshag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:169a-22: 'drul ba la sogs pa sel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-23: rgya spos aa ru ra'i khu bar //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-24: dngul rdo btags pas mig tshag sel //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-26: rgya spos dang aa ru ra bskol ba'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:169a-27: dngul rdo btags pa'i mig sman gyis kyang mig tshag pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-28: thang shing snum dang bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-29: ra gcin nang du sbangs pa'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-31: thang shing snum dang bcas par gcin gyi nang du sbangs pa'i mig sman yang mig tshag pa la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-32: rgyam tsha 'bras gsum pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-33: dung gi snying po pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-34: zangs ma'i phye ma bcas ri lu //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-35: mig tshag ling tog sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:169a-37: rgyam tsha dang 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa zangs ma'i phye ma dang bcas pa ri lur byas pas kyang mig tshag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:169a-38: ling tog sel cing 'jig par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-0: @169b yang na nag tshur phye ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-1: bye'u rug pa'i khu bar sbangs //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-2: zangs ma'i snod du zhag bcu bzhag / de yis mig tshag chu ser 'dzag / rdzi ma 'byi ba sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-4: nag tshur gyi phye ma bye'u rug pa bskol ba'i khu bar spangs pa zangs ma'i snod kyi nang du zhag bcu'i bar du bzhag pa'i mig sman des ni mig tshag pa la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-5: ldong ros dang ni skyer pa'i khanda dang //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-6: de mnyam zangs ma'i phye ma zhib tu btags //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-7: phye ma mig sman thur ma gcig gis kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-8: rdzi ma skyed cing mig tshag 'dis sel byed //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-10: ldong ros dang skyer pa'i khanda cha mnyam du byas la de gnyis ji tsam du yod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:169b-11: zangs ma'i phye ma mnyam du byas pa zhib tu btags te phye ma'i mig sman 'dis bskus na mig sman gyi thur ma gcig gis kyang mig tshag pa'i ba sbu skyed cing sel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-12: rgya skyegs bring ga skyer pa ni rgun ti //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-13: khu bar ras kyi dum bu lan bdun spangs //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-14: sdong bu mar me de bus las byung ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-15: snag tsha mig tshag sel bar byed mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-17: rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i khu bar ras kyi dum bu dri ma med pa bzang po lan bdun gyi bar du sbangs la /
T13TD4312.3E:169b-18: de'i sdong bu mar dang bcas par sbyar ba las byung ba'i snag tshas kyang mig tshag pa sel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-19: mig mchu mang du zhal zhal bya //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-20: de bzhin gtar ga bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-21: bkru sman yang yang bya ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-22: mig tshag can gyi nad pas bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-24: mig tshag pa'i nad pas ni mig mchu zhal zhal bya ba la sogs pa lan mang du bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-25: rnag gi chu 'dzag ma zhi'i mthar //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-26: thur ma phra mos bsreg par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-28: rnag gi chu ser 'dzag pa zhi bar ma gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:169b-29: de'i tha mar thur ma phra mos bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-30: de ltar mig nad dgu bcu bzhi //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-31: nad gzhi mtshan nyid gso ba dag / phan tshun 'dres pa med par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-32: ma lus par ni bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:169b-34: tshul de ltar na mig nad kyi rgyu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170a-1: nad dgu bcu rtsa bzhir bshad pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:170a-2: de dag kyang phan tshun 'dres shing 'dom pa med pa'i tshul gyis ma lus par bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-3: skyes bu nad med pa yis kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-4: nas dang gro rnying drug cu pa //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-5: s'a lu khre rgod rnying pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-7: zhun mar mang du btab pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-8: tshod ma de 'dra skam sa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-9: sha dang se'u 'bru kha ra dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-10: bsten zhing char chu btung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-11: gdugs bcang lhvam ni ba go ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-12: cho ga bzhin du nad sbyangs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-13: rnam pa kun tu bsten par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-15: skyes bu nad med pa dag gis kyang mig la gnod pa med cing phan par 'dod na nas rnying pa la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du bsten par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170a-16: de bzhin du sran mungga la sogs pa bad kan dang mkhris pa 'joms pa'i kha zas mar mang du btab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170a-17: tshod ma dang bad kan dang mkhris pa sel ba'i mar mang du btab pa bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170a-20: lhvam ba go ba'i bar cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa thams cad du bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-21: shugs bkag pa dang ma zhur za //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-22: phyed zhu za dang rtug 'gag za //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-23: tsha dang phyi sa 'gag byed pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-24: zas dang spyod lam sman kun spang //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-28: shugs bkag pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170a-29: de bzhin du tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170a-30: phyis 'gag par byed pa'i zas la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-31: rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus na rtsa sbom po //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-32: gnyis gnas de yis mig ni nang du khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-33: de bskus byug dang dril ba la sogs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-34: rkang par byas na mig tu 'gro bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-36: rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus na rtsa sbom po gnyis gnas la des kyang mig nang du khyab pas na rtsa de la bsku ba la sogs pa byas na mig tu 'gro bar 'gyur zhing phan par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-37: dri ma tsha dang snad pa la sogs pas //
T13TD4312.3E:170a-38: de gnod gyur na mig la gnod par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-0: de bas mig la phan 'dod lhvam @170b dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-1: bsku dang dril dang byug pa sogs bsten bya //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-3: rtsa de dri ma la sogs pas gnod par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-5: de bas na mig la phan par 'dod pas rtag par dus thams cad du lhvam ba go ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-7: bag zan la sogs pas dril ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-8: sman gyi lde gus byug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-9: bsku ba la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-10: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-11: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-13: // / de nas rna ba'i nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-15: mig nad kyi nges pa bshad nas rna ba'i nad kyi gzhi la sogs pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-16: cham pas btab dang chu la rtse //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-17: rna ba brud pas rlung 'khrugs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-18: sgra yi log pa'i sbyor ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-19: ldang ba'i rgyu gzhan gyis 'khrugs nas //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-20: rna ba'i rtsar ni rlung zhugs te //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-21: rna ba'i bu gar shugs drag gzer //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-22: gzhogs byed na zhing rengs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-23: grang ba dag ni mi 'phrod cing //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-24: ring nas rnags shing smin nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-25: chu ser cung zad 'dzag par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-26: rgyu med rna ba stong snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-27: zhum dang rgyas pa snyam du byed //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-29: cham pa la sogs pa dang sgra yid du mi 'ong ba log pa'i sbyor ba thos pa dang rlung 'khrugs pa'i rgyu zas dang spyod lam gzhan dag gis kyang rlung 'khrugs par gyur cing /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-30: rna ba'i rtsar zhugs te rna ba'i bu gar shugs drag tu gzer bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-31: de bzhin du mgo bo'i gzhogs phyed na ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-32: rengs shing 'gyur mi shes ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-33: grang ba la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-34: yun ring zhig na smin cing rnags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-35: rna ba'i nad de smin nas kyang /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-36: chu ser cung zad 'dzag par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-37: rgyu med cing gzhi med par rna ba stong pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:170b-38: thang 'ga' ni zhum thang 'ga' ni rgyas pa snyam du byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:170b-39: mkhris gyur tsha bcas na zhing gzer //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-2: myur du smin zhing smin nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-3: chu ser ser por 'dzag par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-4: chu ser des ni gang gang du //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-5: reg pa de dang der rnags 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-7: mkhris pa rang gi rgyus 'khrugs par gyur pa las rna ba'i bu ga tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-8: de myur du smin cing rnags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-9: smin nas chu ser ser por 'dzag par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-10: chu ser de gnas gang dang gang du reg pa de dang der rnags shing 'drul bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-11: bad kan las gyur mgo 'gram pa //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-12: mgrin pa lci zhing nad shugs dal //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-13: g-ya' zhing grang la dro ba 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-14: smin nas rnag dkar ska ba 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-15: bad kan rang gi rgyus 'khrugs par gyur pa las /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-16: rna ba'i bu ga dang mgo la sogs pa lci bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-17: nad kyi shugs dal zhing chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-18: g-ya' ba la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-19: snad la sogs pas gnod gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-20: rna ba gzer bar byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-21: khrag dang mkhris pa ltar na dang //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-22: mtshan nyid cung zad lhag pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-24: snad pa la sogs pas gnod par gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-25: rna ba shas cher gzer bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-26: khrag dang mkhris pa dang 'dra bar na bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-27: de las kyang mtshan nyid cung zad tsam gyis lhag par gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-28: nad gzhi 'dus pas gzer ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-29: skrangs bcas rims 'debs mi bzad na //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-30: res kyis grang dang dro ba 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-32: smin nas rnag ni dkar dang gnag / dmar dang ska ba 'dzag par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-34: rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis rna ba gzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-35: skrangs pa la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-36: res kyis ched 'ga' grang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-37: ched 'ga' dro ba 'dod par 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:171a-38: 'on pa lta bu sgra thos pa med par 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-39: sgra thos rtsar ni rlung zhugs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-40: rgyu med par ni sna tshogs pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-41: sgra ni yang dang yang du thos //
T13TD4312.3E:171a-42: de ni rna ba'i sgra zhes bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-0: rlung sgra thos par byed pa'i rtsa'i @171b nang du zhugs par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:171b-1: rgyu med par sgra sna tshogs pa yang dang yang du thos par 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:171b-2: nad de ni rna ba'i sgra zhes bya bar drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-3: rlung ni bad kan dang 'dres pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-4: rna sgra yal bar bor na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-5: skad gsang mthon por smras pa thos ;
T13TD4312.3E:171b-8: rlung rim gyis bad kan dang 'dres pa las /
T13TD4312.3E:171b-9: sgra grag pa'i nad yal bar bor zhing ma gsos na skad gsang mthon pos thos par 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:171b-10: yang na rim gyis 'on pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-11: rlung gis bad kan bskams gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-12: de la rna bar gos gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-13: na zhing lci la 'gags gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-14: de ni rna ba 'gags zhes bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-16: bad kan rlung gis bskams par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:171b-17: des rna bar gos shing chags la byugs pa lta bur 'gyur la rgyu des rna ba na ba la sogs par 'gyur te nad de ni rna ba 'gags pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-18: zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-19: bad kan las ni rna ba g-ya' //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-20: skrang sra de yi ming gis bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-22: bad kan las rna bar g-ya' ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang slob dpon gyis de'i ming gis bshad de g-ya' zhing skrangs la sra ba zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-23: mkhris pas bad kan tshig gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-24: nad bcas pa 'am nad med kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-26: rna ba rnag can byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-28: mkhris pas bad kan tshig par byas shing smin pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa na /
T13TD4312.3E:171b-29: rna ba rnag can zhes bya ba'i nad du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:171b-30: de ni nad dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-31: rlung sogs pa yis rna ba'i sha //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-32: khrag la gnod gyur 'drul bar za //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-33: srin bus bskyod cing mi bzod na //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-34: rna nad srin bu can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:171b-36: rlung la sogs pa'i nad rang gi rgyus bskyed pa dag gis rna ba'i sha dang khrag gnyis la gnod par byas shing 'drul bar gyur pa'i dbang gis za zhing 'cha' bar byed pa'i srin bus bskyod pa na mi bzad par na ba'i nad de ni ming srin bu can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-2: rma ni snga ma'i mtshan nyid can //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-5: rna ba phug pa las byung ba'i rma byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
T13TD4312.3E:172a-6: sngar bshad pa'i nad gzhi'i skabs nas smos pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khong 'bras su 'gyur ro ;
T13TD4312.3E:172a-9: gzhan du'ang 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
T13TD4312.3E:172a-10: khong 'bras rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang /
T13TD4312.3E:172a-11: nad gzhi'i skabs nas sngar bshad pa lta bur gyur pa las 'di nyid ni khong 'bras kyi dbye ba tsam du zad pas de'i phyir grangs su logs shig tu ma bgrangs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-13: de las rna ba rnags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-16: rna ba thor bu dang 'brum bu skrangs pa las nad gzhi so so dang 'dus pa dang ldan pa dang khrag las gyur pa rlung 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:172a-17: thor bu 'brum bu de las rna ba rnags pa la sogs pas gnod par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-18: de ltar na 'di las thor bu dang 'brum bu'i rna ba'i nad ces bya ba gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-19: mngal du rlung gis rna ba'i sha //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-22: mngal gyi gnas skabs su rlung las rna ba'i 'gram gyi sha 'khums shing 'dus par gyur pa ni rna ba 'khums pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-23: mngal du sha mdzer sran med //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-24: pi pi ling 'dra mang po'ang gcig / nad med pi pi ling zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-26: mngal gyi gnas skabs nyid du sha'i mdzer pa sra zhing na ba med pa pi pi ling gi tshad tsam mang po 'am gcig 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ming pi pi ling zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-27: 'dus pa las gyur gas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-28: mdog 'dra na zhing sra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-29: skrangs gyur de ni ma gsos na //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-30: smin nas yungs mar lta bur ni //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-32: rma 'tshobs nas kyang nges par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-33: rna ba'i sha ni zhum par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:172a-35: 'dus pa'i rgyu las skrangs pa gang kha dog 'dra ba la sogs par 'gyur ba de ni ming gas pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:172b-0: skrangs pa de ma gsos te yal bar bor nas @172b smin cing rnags par gyur na yungs mar lta bu 'dzag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-1: rtsa la gnas pa'i rlung gis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-2: rna shal skam pa de ming can //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-4: rlung rna ba'i rtsa na gnas shing rna rtsa skam par byed pa'i nad de ni de'i ming can de rna shal skam pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-5: rna shal pi wang rgyud ltar phra //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-8: rlung gis rna shal pi wang gi rgyud ltar sra zhing phra bar gyur pa de ni ming rgyud can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-9: gzhon sha can ni yun ring du //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-10: btang snyoms bor nas 'phral du bskyed //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-11: rna shal skrang zhing nad bcas la //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-12: dmar zhing 'byar bar gyur pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-13: de ni rlung gis 'byar zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-15: shin tu gzhon sha can gyi rna ba 'jam po yun ring du btang snyoms su bzhag nas /
T13TD4312.3E:172b-16: de'i rjes la 'phral du de'i mod la rna ba'i bu gar bskyed cing brgyangs par gyur na rna shal skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:172b-17: na ba dang bcas shing dmar la slar 'byar bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:172b-18: de ni rlung gis 'byar ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-19: gnod 'gyur rgyan lci khur sogs kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-20: khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-21: dmar zhing tsha na smin pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-23: dmar zhing tsha la rnags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-25: rgyan lci ba la sogs pa'i rgyus khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs par byas pas dmar ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i nad de ni ming gnod par gyur pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-26: rlung dang bad kan gyis rna shal //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-27: skrang zhing nad med sra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-28: brtan zhing mdog 'dra g-ya' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-29: de ni mnye ba zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-31: rlung dang bad kan gyi rgyus rna shal skrang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-32: skrangs pas kun tu khyab la //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-33: na tsha chung zhing sra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-34: brtan par byas pa la sogs pa'i nad de ni mnye ba zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:172b-35: gal li ri zhes kyang bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-36: phug nyes rna ba brgyangs pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-37: g-ya' bcas tsha grang smin cing na //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-38: 'dus pa las gyur skrangs pa de //
T13TD4312.3E:172b-41: rna ba phug pa nyes shing nang brgyangs drags pa las /
T13TD4312.3E:173a-0: @173a * // g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i nad du 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:173a-1: nad de'i ming ni sdug bsngal 'phel ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-2: bad kan khrag gyur srin bu phra //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-3: g-ya' zhing gnag la rnag bcas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-4: srin bu phra mos bldags zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-5: de ma gsos na rna shal ba //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-7: bad kan dang khrag las gyur pa'i srin bu phra mo g-ya' ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa ni rna shal bldags pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:173a-8: de ma bcos shing yal bar bor na rna shal za zhing bldags par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-9: de las 'dus gyur pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-10: gzer can gas 'khums gsor mi rung //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-11: rgyud can gcig pu 'tsho ba tsam //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-12: lhag ma rnams ni gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-14: rna ba'i nad 'di rnams kyi nang nas pi pi ling zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:173a-15: gzer can zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:173a-16: gas pa zhes bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:173a-17: rna ba 'khums pa zhes bya ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-18: rgyud can gcig pu ni re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du gsor rung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-19: lhag ma nyi shu ni gsor rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-20: de ltar rna ba'i nad kyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-21: dbye ba nyi shu rtsa lngar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-23: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis rna ba'i nad kyi dbye ba ni grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga yod do zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-24: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:173a-25: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:173a-27: // / de nas rna ba'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-29: go rims kyis na le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-30: rlung las gyur pa'i rna nad la //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-31: sha khu blud cing rlung 'joms pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-32: sman bskol mar ni mtshan mo blud //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-34: rlung las gyur pa'i rna ba'i nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:173a-35: mtshan mo nyal khar nad pa la sha khu blud par bya zhing rlung 'joms pa'i sman rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs pa dang bskol pa'i mar blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-36: rna ba dugs byas de rjes la //
T13TD4312.3E:173a-38: bil ba aarka'i lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-0: til mar @173b rgyam tshar bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-1: phur ma btso ba byas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-2: khu ba dro 'jom tsam mam ni //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-3: la phug gu gul rna ba dgang //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-5: rna ba dang por dugs bya zhing snum chos kyi cho ga byas nas de'i rjes la aa shvattha la sogs pa'i lo ma'i sman gyi phur ma btso ba 'am yang na la phug dang gu gul bskol ba'i khu ba gang yang rung bas rna ba dgang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-6: rlung 'joms sde tshan skyur rnams dang //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-7: gcin gyi nang du snum chen ni //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-8: bskol ba de ni rna ba'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-9: mi bzad pa yang myur du sel //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-11: rlung 'joms pa'i sde tshan thang shing la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:173b-13: zho ga chu dang dar ba la sogs pa rnams dang /
T13TD4312.3E:173b-14: ma he dang ba lang la sogs pa'i gcin gyi nang du snum chen po ste /
T13TD4312.3E:173b-15: zhun mar dang til mar dang rkang dang zhag ces bya ba bskol ba des ni rna ba'i nad mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba yang sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-16: rtsa ba chen po lnga yi shing //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-17: gang yang rung ba gso mas dkri //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-18: til mar gyis bskus 'bar ba'i rtse //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-21: rtsa ba chen po lnga'i shing gang yang rung ba cig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:173b-22: de bzhin du sa ra la zhes bya ba'i shing sor bcu tsam la gso mas cha gsum dkris la til mar gyis bskus te 'bar ba'i rtse mo la tshig pa'i tshe snum gang zhig 'dzag par gyur pa des ni 'phral du rna ba'i nad sel zhing 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-23: de bzhin thang shing ru rta dang //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-24: sgron shing las kyang de bzhin bya //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-26: de bzhin du thang shing la sogs pa dag kyang shing sor bcu tsam la gso mas dkri zhing til mar gyis bskus la 'bar ba'i rtse mo nas 'dzag pa'i snum gang zhig byung ba de bsags pa dro 'jom tsam du blud na yang rna ba'i nad 'phral du sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-27: rlung nad cham pa la bshad pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-28: gso bas 'dir yang phan pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-30: rlung las gyur pa'i cham [?] pa la phan pa'i sman gang yin pa de 'dir rlung las gyur pa'i rna ba'i nad la yang phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:173b-31: mgo bo bkru dang chu grang btung //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-5: chu grang btung ba ni nyin mo yang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-6: mkhris gyur khar dkar por bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-7: mar gyis snum byas bkru sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-9: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gzer nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:174a-10: kha ra dkar po dang bcas pa'i mar gyis snum gyi cho ga byas pa la mkhris pa sel ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-11: rgun 'bru shing mngar nu zho bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-12: rna ba bkang ba'ang bsngags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-14: rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i sbyor bas rna ba bkang ba yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rna ba gzer ba la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-16: pu shel tse dang ram nye ba //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-17: seng phrom padma'i rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-18: padma'i sdong bu dzi ba ka / btsod dang thal tres bskol ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-19: shing mngar khu ba bre gang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-20: 'o ma bre do bcas pa dag / til mar phul gang bskol ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-21: 'di yis rnar blugs rna dgang bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-22: yang na sbrang rtsi nyi tshes dgang //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-23: gzer dang tsha dang na ba sel //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-25: shing mngar la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:174a-26: shing mngar bskol ba'i khu ba bre gang la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du bskol ba til mar 'di rna bar blugs pa la sogs pa byas na /
T13TD4312.3E:174a-27: gzer ba la sogs pa sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-28: yang na sbrang rtsi nyi tshes bkang na yang gzer ba la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-29: shing mngar la sogs mar dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-30: rna ba kun tu byugs na 'ang phan [?] ;
T13TD4312.3E:174a-32: shing mngar dang tsandan la sogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i sman mar dang bcas pa'i lde gus rna ba kun tu byugs shing bskus na yang gzer ba la sogs pa la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-33: bad kan las gyur pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-34: mar bskol snum gyur skyug tu gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:174a-35: bad kan las gyur pa'i rna ba'i gzer la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-36: pi pi ling dang zhun mar bskol ba'i snum gyi cho ga byas la skyug sman btang ste slon du gzhug go //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-37: bad kan sel ba'i sna sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:174a-38: mkhur bkang dugs dang dud pa brngub //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-0: bad kan las gyur pa'i @174b rna ba'i gzer la ni bad kan sel ba'i sna sman la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-1: sgog skya sge'u gsher shi kru dang //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-2: la phug chu shing mu rang ga / bskol ba'i khu ba dam pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-3: dro 'jam rna bar blugs na'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-5: sgog skya la sogs pa'i khu ba dro 'jam tsam blugs na yang mchog tu phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-6: aarka'i myu gu skyur khur btags //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-7: til mar rgyam tshar bcas pa gang //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-8: snu ha'i shing bu brus par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-9: bcug la aarka'i lo mas g-yogs //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-10: phur ma btsos pa'i tshul du bsregs //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-11: de yi khu ba gzer 'joms mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:174b-12: shing aarka'i myu gu rang skyur la sogs pa khu ba skyur po'i nang du btags la ji skad smos pa'i phur ma btsos pa'i tshul du bsregs pa'i khu ba ni gzer 'joms par byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-13: ma du lung ga'am ka pid tha'i //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-14: khu bas bkang ba byas na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-16: yang na ma du lung ga'i khu ba'am ka pid tha'i khu bas rna ba bkang na yang gzer ba la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-17: yang na tshas bkang de rjes la //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-18: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba'i phye mas gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-20: yang na rna ba tshas bkang la de'i 'og tu rgya mtsho'i lbu ba'i phye ma btab na'ang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-21: ra lug gcin dang 'od ma'i shun //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-22: til mar bskol bas bkang na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-24: yang na ra lug gi gcin la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'ang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-25: yang na yungs mar shing kun dang /
T13TD4312.3E:174b-26: g-yer ma dong gra bskol ba blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-28: yang na yungs mar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ji skad smos pa ltar btang na 'ang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-29: khrag gyur mkhris pa lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-30: gtar ga myur du gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-32: khrag las gyur pa'i rna ba'i nad la mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rna ba'i gzer ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-33: smin cing rna ba khrag 'dzag la //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-34: dud pa mkhur bkang sna sman sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-35: sbu gu'i cho ga dag dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-36: rma red cho ga gang yin bya //
T13TD4312.3E:174b-38: rna ba'i nad smin cing rnag 'dzag par gyur na dud pa brngub pa la sogs pa sbyar bar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:175a-0: de bzhin du sdu gu'i cho ga ji @175a * //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-1: skad bshad pa dag kyang sbyar bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:175a-2: rma red pa'i gso ba gang dag yin pa de yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-3: gos par ye'us dus gnyis su //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-4: rna ba phyi zhing dag par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-5: gu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-6: sbrang rtsi yis kyang dgang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-8: rna bar rnag la sogs pa chags shing gos par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:175a-9: ras bal gyi ye'us nyin re zhing dus gnyis su phyi zhing dag par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:175a-10: de'i rjes la gu gul gyi dud pas bdugs te sbrang rtsis yongs su dgang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-11: bye'u rug khu ba bskol ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-12: bu ram khu bas bsgos pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-13: ras bal ye'u rab phras byug / de yi phye ma gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-15: yang na rna ba rnag can de bye'u rug pa'i khu ba la sogs pas bsgos pa'i ras bal gyi ye'u phra mos byug par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:175a-16: phye ma la sogs pa'i sman de dag zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-17: gzer dang rnags dang lci ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-18: cho ga 'dis ni bzlog par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-20: bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga 'di nyid ni gzer la sogs pa yang zlog par byed pa yin par drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-22: shing mngar dang ni da ta ki / autpa la yi lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-23: btsod dang seng phrom rgya skyegs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-24: ka pid tha yi khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-25: til mar bskol te de blugs na //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-28: pri yang ku la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:175a-29: ka pid tha la sogs pa bskol ba'i til mar de rna bar blugs shing bkang na rnag 'dzag pa myur du 'chad par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-30: sgra bcas 'on pa dag la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-31: rlung gi gzer 'joms sman gtang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-33: rna ba sgra dang bcas pas 'on par gyur pa gnyis la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:175a-34: rlung gi rna ba'i nad kyi gzer 'joms par bshad pa'i sman gang dag yin pa gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-35: bad kan las gyur bad kan ni //
T13TD4312.3E:175a-36: slon sman sogs kyis dang por bsal //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-0: sgra dang bcas pa dang 'on pa bad kan las gyur pa dag la ni dang por slon sman la sogs pas bad kan @175b bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-1: ae randa dang shi kru dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-2: la phug gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-3: khu ba til mar bzhi 'gyur dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-4: lo ma brgyad 'gyur bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-5: shing mngar ram nye ba'i lde gu //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-6: bcas par bskol ba rnar blugs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-7: bsku dang rna ba bkang ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-10: ae randa la sogs pa'i lo ma bskol ba'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:175b-12: lo ma til mar brgyad 'gyur dang bcas pa dang shing mngar dang ram nye ba'i lde gu bskol te til mar lus pa rna bar blugs pa la sogs pa byas na sgra la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i nad 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-13: shing kun bong nga dkar po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-14: shu ti skyer shun svardzi ka / til mar tsha dang bcas bskol bas //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-15: bkang nag zer dang chu ser 'dzag / sgra bcas 'on pa sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-17: shing kun la sogs pa'i lde gu dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:175b-18: til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi tsha dang bskol ba'i til mar gyis rna ba bkang na rna ba gzer ba dang bcas pa yang sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-19: rna ba sgra dang bcas pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-20: yungs mar gyis ni bkang na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-22: rna ba sgra zi zi po dang bcas pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:175b-23: yungs mar btsir ba'i mar gyis rna ba gang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-24: la phug skam po'i dum bu yi //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-25: thal ba shing kun bca' sga dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-26: shu ti ru rta shu dag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-27: thang shing shi kru skyer khanda //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-28: ya baksha ra rtsabs ru tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-29: rgyam tsha rdul tsha svardzi ka / stag pa'i tsher ma kha ru tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-30: gla sgang rgun tsha bzhi 'gyur dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-31: kha lung khu ba de dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-32: chu shing khu ba mnyam bskol ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-33: til mar bkang bas rna ba'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-34: g-ya' dang sgra bcas 'on pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-35: snag 'dzag gzer zhing srin bu can //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-36: shin tu gso dka' thal sman gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-37: til mar gyis ni myur du 'joms kha dang so yi nad la'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:175b-39: la phug skam po'i dum bu thal bar byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:175b-40: shing kun la sogs pa'i sman gyi bzhi 'gyur rgun tsha dang /
T13TD4312.3E:175b-41: kha lung gi khu ba bzhi 'gyur dang /
T13TD4312.3E:175b-42: chu shing gi khu ba bzhi 'gyur dang /
T13TD4312.3E:176a-0: til mar bskol la rna ba bkang na rna ba'i nad @176a * //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-1: gso dka' ba yang myur du sel bar byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:176a-2: thal ba'i til mar 'di ni kha dang so'i nad la yang phan zhing bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-3: de nas tshor ba med pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-4: nye ba la ni gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-6: de nas rna ba tshor ba med cing bem bem por gyur na de dang nye ba la gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-7: skrang zhing rnags la thos pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-8: mi gsal gyur la skyug sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-10: rna ba skrang zhing rnag 'dzag pa dang thos pa mi gsal zhing 'on pa la ni skyug sman blud de slon du gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-11: byis pa rgan dang yun ring du //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-12: lon pa'i 'on pa spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-14: byis pa'i tshe nas 'on pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:176a-16: yun ring du 'on zhing lo mang du lon pa'i 'on pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:176a-17: gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-18: sgra bcas rnags par gyur pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-19: snum dang dugs byas dag par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-20: rna ba sbyangs nas de rjes la //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-21: rna ba sbyangs pa'i til mar dag / kha lung khu ba rgyam tsha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-22: tsha dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-24: rna ba sgra dang bcas shing rnags par gyur pa'i rna nad la ni snum dugs byas pas rna ba sbyangs shing gsher bar byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:176a-25: de'i 'og tu rna ba'i ye'us sbyang zhing dag par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-26: de ltar rna ba sbyangs nas /
T13TD4312.3E:176a-27: de'i rjes la rna ba sbyang ba'i til mar ji skad smos pas dgang ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:176a-28: yang na kha lung la sogs pa'i sman rna bar blugs bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-29: dag byas rtsub par gyur na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-30: mar gyi nying khus dgang bar bya ;
T13TD4312.3E:176a-32: sbyang bas sbyangs shing dag par byas pas rna ba rtsub par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:176a-33: mar gyi nying khus rna ba gnyis bkang ba phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-34: rim 'di rna spabs gang la'ang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-36: rna ba rna spabs kyis gang ba la yang sngar bshad pa'i rim pa 'di nyid phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-37: g-ya' dang skrang la rna sman sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-38: bad kan sel bar byed pa phan //
T13TD4312.3E:176a-39: skrang la tsha dang dro bas byug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:176a-40: rna ba g-ya' ba zhes bya ba'i rna nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:176a-43: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa bad kan sel ba dag phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-0: de bzhin du skrang @176b pa la yang rna sman dud pa brngub pa la sogs pas phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-1: 'dir skrang pa la ni khyad par du tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:176b-2: dro ba'i sman gyi lde gus byug pas phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-4: rna ba chu 'dzag gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-6: rna ba rnag can dang rna ba srin bu can la ni rna ba chu 'dzag pa'i gso ba thams cad byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-7: mchog tu rna nad srin can la //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-8: yungs mar dron po blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-10: rna nad srin bu can la ni khyad par du yungs mar dron pos dgang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-12: gso ba dang ni skyug sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-14: rna ba'i khong 'bras smin pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-15: ma smin pa la ni sngar bshad pa'i khong 'bras kyi gso ba ji skad bshad pa bzhin bya zhing skyug sman btang bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-16: snad pa'i khong 'bras gso ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-17: mkhris gyur rna gzer gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-19: snad pa'i khong 'bras la ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rna ba gzer ba'i gso ba thams cad bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-20: 'brum pa thor bu sna ltar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-22: rna ba'i 'brum bu dang rna ba'i thor bu la ni sna'i 'brum bu dang thor bu ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-23: rna ba gas pa ma smin la //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-24: rna ba'i khong 'bras ltar gso zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-25: nad gzhi ji bzhin las kyang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-27: rna ba gas pa zhes bya ba'i nad ma smin pa la ni rna ba'i khong 'bras kyi gso ba ji skad smos pa ltar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:176b-28: de bzhin du nad gzhi ji lta bu'i tshul kyang gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-29: rna shal skam la rlung gzer ltar //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-30: rna sman bsku ba la sogs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-31: dugs bya snyi bar gyur pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-32: rna shal til mar bskus shing mnye //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-33: shing mngar pi la ya'i sa bon //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-34: aa shva gandha nas bcas bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-36: rna shal skam pa zhes bya ba'i rna ba'i nad la ni rlung las gyur pa'i rna ba'i gzer ltar rna sman dang bsku ba dang dugs la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-37: de ltar dugs kyis snyi bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:176b-38: rna shal til mar gyis bskus la pi la ya'i sa bon la sogs pa bsku zhing mnye bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-39: de nas rgyas byed snum gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:176b-40: bsku ba rtag tu bsten par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-2: de nas de'i 'og tu rna shal mnyes pa'i rjes la rgyas par byed pa'i snum gyis rtag tu bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-3: nye'u shing aa shva gandha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-4: ae randa dang pa ya sya //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-5: dzi ba ka dang 'o mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-6: til mar bskol bas bsku ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-7: rna shal rgyas byed mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-9: nye'u shing la sogs pa bskol ba'i til mar gyis bsku ba ni rna shal mchog tu rgyas par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-10: 'tsho byed sde tshan lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:177a-11: rlan can sha ni bskol ba dag / rna shal 'phel zhing rgyas byed yin //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-13: 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan gyi lde gu la sogs pa dang bskol ba yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-14: rna shal rab zad bcad pas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-15: lhag ma sbyar la gso zhing bskyed //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-17: rna shal shin tu zad cing chad du nye ba la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:177a-18: gtsags bus bcad la rna shal lhag ma sbom po de ji skad bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin du sbyar la /
T13TD4312.3E:177a-19: de'i 'og tu gso zhing bskyed par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-22: tshul de bzhin du pi wang gi rgyud 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i rna ba'i nad kyang 'di bzhin du re zhig mi la ba tsam du gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-23: 'byar ba zhes bya ba'i mig nad la yang bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga 'di nyid bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-25: gnod gyur bsil sman bsku ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-26: srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-28: gnod par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i rna nad la ni bsil sman bsku zhing srin bu pad pas gtar ga bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-29: 'dzam bu aa mra'i lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-30: ba la [?] shing mngar seng phrom til //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-31: btsod dang autpal ka dam pa //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-32: thal tres til mar bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-33: skyur rtsabs bcas par bskol ba 'di //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-34: til mar bsku bar bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-35: me dbal skabs bshad mar gyis bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-37: gnod par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i rna nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:177a-38: 'dzam bu la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:177a-39: til mar dang de'i bzhi 'gyur gyi skyur rtsabs dang bskol ba'i til mar bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-40: yang na me dbal gyi skabs su bshad pa'i sman mar gyis bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:177a-41: mnye ba go ta karka ta //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-0: zhag dang @177b bcas pa'i til mar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:177b-1: t'a la'i lo ma aarka dang //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-2: aa shva gandha bye'u rug pa //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-3: so ma ra dza 'bras bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-4: rgyam tsha lang ka lir bcas bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-5: til mar bsku bar bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-6: rna sman rnon po gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-8: mnye ba zhes bya ba'i rna ba'i nad la ni go ta dang /
T13TD4312.3E:177b-9: karka ta zhes bya ba ku ta li ra gnyis kyi zhag dang bcas pa'i til mar la sogs pa bskol bas bsku bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:177b-10: de bzhin du rna sman rnon po dag kyang gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-11: dbug nyes pa la aa sman ta //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-12: 'dzam bu aa mra'i lo ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-13: bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya ;
T13TD4312.3E:177b-14: / rna shal til mar gyis bsku zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-15: shing mngar btsod dang stag tsher ba //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-16: yung ba'i phye ma zhib po gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-17: rgya skyegs byi dang ga bskol ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-18: til mar gyis ni bskus na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-20: dbug nyes pa'i rna ba'i nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:177b-21: aa sman ta ka la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-22: yang na rgya skyegs la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i til mar gyis bskus na dbug nyes pa'i nad sdug bsngal 'phel ba zhes bya ba sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-23: srin bus zos la ba'i lci bas //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-24: lan mang du ni dugs byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-25: byi dang ga yi snying po ni //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-26: lug gi gcin sbyar lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-28: srin bus zos pa'i nad rna ba lhags pa zhes bya ba'i nad la ni ba'i lci bas dugs bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-29: dug mo nyung dang aing gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:177b-30: ka ranydza yi sa bon dang //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-31: dang ga'i shun pa'i lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-33: yang na dug mo nyung la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang nad de la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-34: yang na de dang nim pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-35: lo ma na le sham dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-36: sbrang rtsi'i lde gus rma la bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-38: yang na 'bus bldags pa zhes bya ba'i nad de la /
T13TD4312.3E:177b-39: sngar bshad pa'i sman dug mo nyung la sogs pa de dag kun dang nim pa'i lo ma la sogs pa'i sman lug gi gcin dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-40: rna ba chad la sbyang byas te //
T13TD4312.3E:177b-41: skyon med khrag dang de 'tsham pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-2: sbyar nas 'phral bcad sbyang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-4: rna ba'i nad kyis chad pa 'am stobs kyis drangs te rna ba chad pa la slon dang khrus kyis sbyang ba byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-5: nad kyi slon med pa'i khrag dang /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-6: de dang 'tsham pa'i bcing ba dag gis bcings te sbyar bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-7: de ltar sbyar nas ni bcad ma thag pa'i dag par bya ba'i cho gas sbyang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-8: de nas skra mthar mdud byas te //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-9: rna shal bcad dang zhal zhal bya //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-10: bcad pa dang ni bsrung ba bya //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-11: mtshams ni mnyam par sbyar bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-12: mthon dman med pa nyid du bya //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-13: zhun mar dang ni sbrang rtsis byug / ras bal gyis ni glan pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-14: skud pas dam lhod ran par bcings //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-15: rma yi khrag ni bcad pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-16: sman gyi phye mas gdab bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-17: spyod pa de la bstan par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-19: de nas de'i rjes la nad pa'i skra'i tha ma'i mtshams su mdud pa byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-21: zhal zhal bya ba dag byas nas rna ba'i mtshams shin tu mnyam zhing legs par sbyar la /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-22: mthon dman med pa nyid du byas te bzhag la /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-23: de'i 'og tu zhun mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i ras bal gyis glan la /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-24: skud pas shin tu dam par yang ma yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-25: shin tu lhod pa yang ma yin par ran par bcings la /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-26: khrag bcad pa'i phye ma gtar ga'i skabs nas smos pa'i phye mas gdab par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-27: de'i 'og tu rma la phan zhing gnod pa med pa'i spyod pa gang dag yin pa de la bstan cing bslab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-28: zhag bdun nas ni ma btsos pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-29: til mar bskus la ras bal dgrol //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-30: legs 'byor spu ni skyes pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-31: mtshams 'byor mnyam zhing brtan pa dang //
