T13TD4312.3E:178a-32: tshad ldan nad ni med pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-33: rim gyis rna ba skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-35: zhag bdun gyi rjes la til mar sman ma btsos pas bskus la /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-36: ras bal dal gyis bkrol te /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-37: rna ba legs par 'byor zhing spu skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:178a-38: mtshams 'byor zhing mnyam pa la sogs pa dang ldan nas rim gyis rna ba de skyed cing 'phel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-39: nya lcibs kha sral phre'u dang //
T13TD4312.3E:178a-40: bri ha ti 'bras ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-0: @178b ba la ha ti pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-1: aa shva gandha yungs dkar ser //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-2: ko sha ta ka'i rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-3: ka ra b'i ra ru shi ka / lo ma bdun pa pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-4: sa nag sbrang ma'i gnas dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-5: bye'u chu skyes srin bu'i sha //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-6: de bzhin seng phrom sdong bu rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-7: 'di dag lde gu til mar bcas ma he'i mar dang glang po rta'i //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-8: gcin dang bcas par bskol ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-9: bskus na rna ba 'phel byed mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:178b-10: nya lcibs la sogs pa dang sbrang mas brtsigs shing rang gi gnas su byas pa'i sa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:178b-11: byi'u la sogs pa 'di dag btags te lde gur byas la til mar dang bcas pa'i ma he'i gcin la sogs pa thal ches pa tsam gyi bar du bskol bas bskus na yang rna ba 'phel bar byed pa'i sman gyi mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-12: de nas na tshod ldan pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-13: sbyang ba byas nas rna chad gso //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-14: sna dang mnyam pa'i sha lpags ni //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-15: mkhur tshos las ni bcad nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-16: rna dang nye ba'i sha lpags ni //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-17: srab mo nyid du bzhar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-18: de nas ras bal bcas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-19: khab kyis mkhur ba btsem par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-21: de nas mi na tshod dang ldan zhing gzhon par gyur pa sbyang ba byas nas rna ba chad pa de gso bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:178b-22: de yang nad pa de nyid kyi sna dang mnyam pa'i shing la sogs pa'i shun pa bcad la /
T13TD4312.3E:178b-23: de dang mnyam pa'i pags pa dang sha mkhur tshos las bcad de rna ba dang nye ba'i sha dang pags pa de srab mor bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-24: de nas ras bal gyis skud pa dang ldan pa'i khab kyis mkhur ba nas mkhur bar btsems te brtod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-25: sna bcad mtshon gyis bzhar nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-26: mkhur tshos las bcad pags pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-27: sna ni legs mor btsem par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-28: kha yi dbugs ni dbyung ba'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-29: snar ni sbu gu can gzhug bya //
T13TD4312.3E:178b-31: sna de bas de'i 'og sna bcad pa'i 'phro de mtshon gyis bzhar nas mkhur tshos las bcad pa'i pags pa rlog ste /
T13TD4312.3E:178b-32: pags pa steng du phyung la sna dang legs par btsems la glan nas legs par drub par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-0: de nas kha'i dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir sna'i nang du sbubs can smyig ma la sogs pa gnyis gzhug @179a * //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-2: de rjes til mar slon par bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-3: rma ni sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-4: khrag bcad pa yi sman gzhan yang //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-5: zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-6: de nas mar dang sbrang rtsis bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-7: bcings la spyod pa bstan par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-9: de'i 'og tu til mar slon par bskus la /
T13TD4312.3E:179a-10: rma shing dang sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-11: gzhan yang khrag bcad pa'i sman zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-12: de nas sbrang rtsis bskus te ras mas dkris la chu dron gyis nyer spyod bya ba la sogs pa spyod pa bstan par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-13: de nas gnas skabs shes byas nas //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-14: rma gsar gso ba'i cho ga bya //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-16: de nas de'i 'og tu gnas skabs kyi khyad par shes par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:179a-17: rma gsar pa gso ba'i cho ga 'og nas bshad pa dag bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-19: sha lhag legs par gcad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-20: de nas shin tu zhib tu btsem //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-21: dma' ba dag kyang bskyed par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-23: rma de 'byor nas sna'i nye 'khor gyi sha lhag gang dag yod pa gcad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-24: de nas yang de bzhin du legs par btsems shing dma' bar gyur pa ni sha skyed pa'i cho gas slar sha bskyed par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-25: bcad ma thag la ci rigs par //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-26: bzhag ste cho ga 'di nyid bya //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-28: 'phral du sna bcad ma thag pa la ni ci rigs par sna de nyid glan te gso ba'i cho ga 'di nyid bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-29: mchu bcad pa la sbu gu dag / ma gtogs sna sbyar bzhin du bya //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-31: mchu bcad pa la yang sna'i nang du sbu gu gzhug pa ma gtogs pa sna sbyar ba'i cho ga thams cad 'di nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-32: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:179a-33: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:179a-35: // / de nas sna nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179a-37: nam tshong yan chad kyi nad bshad pa'i skabs kyis na /
T13TD4312.3E:179b-0: sna nad kyi nad gzhi la sogs pa bstan par bya ba'i @179b phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-1: ba mo rlung dang rdul dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-2: smra drags gnyid log gnyid g-yar drags //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-3: sngas ni mtho dang dma' drags dang /
T13TD4312.3E:179b-4: chu gzhan 'thungs par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-5: chu mang 'thungs dang nyal po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-6: skyugs dang mchi ma bkag pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-7: rlung shas che ba'i nad 'khrugs nas //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-8: sna ni sra ba nyid 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-9: cham pa skyed par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-10: 'phel na zad pa skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-12: ba mo la sogs pa'i nyes pa las /
T13TD4312.3E:179b-13: rlung shas che ba'i nad 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:179b-14: sna sra zhing 'thas la rgyas par gyur pas /
T13TD4312.3E:179b-15: cham pa zhes bya ba'i nad skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-16: de 'phel ba na ma bcos shing yal bar bor na zad pa zhes bya ba'i nad skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-17: de la ba mo ni mtshan mo'i dus su nam mkha' las bab pa'i chu grang mo babs pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-18: drags pa ni gnyid log pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:179b-19: ma log pa gnyis ka dang sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-20: sngas ni mal gyi mgo bo'i phyogs su bzhag pa gang yin pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-21: chu gzhan 'thungs pa ni sngar bstan pa dang mi 'dra ba'i chu gzhan 'thungs pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-22: gzhan dag ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-23: de la rlung gyur cham pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-24: kha skam sbrid pa drag tu 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-25: sna 'gags zug cing na ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-26: mur 'gram so dang klad pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-27: smin ma nas ni sna rtse'i bar //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-28: srin bu rgyu ba snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-29: skad 'gags ring nas smin pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-30: mchil snabs grang bar 'dzag pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-32: de la sna nad cham pa de dag gi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i cham pa ni kha skam pa la sogs pa nas /
T13TD4312.3E:179b-33: mchil snabs grang mo 'dzag par byed pa'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-34: mkhris gyur skom dang rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-36: rna rtse gnag cing dro la rtsub //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-37: mchil sna bas dmar ser 'dzag pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-39: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i cham pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:179b-40: skom dad la sogs pa nas mchil ma dang snabs rtsub pa dang dmar ba dang ser ba 'dzag pa'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-41: bad kan lud pa dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.3E:179b-42: slon zhing lus lci yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-2: mchil snabs snum dkar ska ba 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:180a-3: bad kan las gyur pa'i cham pa ni dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-4: 'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-7: nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las byung ba'i cham pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:180a-10: bad kan dang gsum char gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:180a-11: de glo bur du rgyu med par ched 'ga' ni 'phel /
T13TD4312.3E:180a-12: ched 'ga' ni 'bri bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-13: nad khrag sna yi rtsar zhugs nas //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-15: brang na tshor ba med pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-16: mig dmar dbugs kyi dri mi zhim //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-17: mig dang rna ba sna g-ya' zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-18: 'di ni mkhris gyur mtshan nyid ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-20: nad khrag las gyur pa'i cham pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:180a-21: brang tshor ba med cing bem bem par 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:180a-22: mig dmar po la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:180a-23: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i cham pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-24: cham pa thams cad ma gsos na //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-25: gnod pa mi bzad skyed byed 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-27: bshad ma thag pa'i cham pa thams cad yal bar bor na ;
T13TD4312.3E:180a-28: nad mi bzad cing drag po skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-29: ji skad bshad pa'i bla brnan ni //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-30: 'phel bas dbang po kun gnod byed //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-31: me drod nyams nyes dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-32: lud pa brang dang rtsib logs zug / glo bur du ni shas cher 'khrugs //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-33: kha dri nga zhing skam par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-34: sna nang 'drul zhing skam pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-35: yang yang sna 'gags dag par byed /
T13TD4312.3E:180a-36: snabs ni rnag 'dra dkar zhing dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-38: 'di la srin bu snum zhing ring //
T13TD4312.3E:180a-41: cham pas gnod cing ma rungs par gyur pa de di [?] skad bshad pa'i bla brnan 'phel zhing rgyas pas dbang po kun la gnod cing gdung bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:180a-42: de bzhin du me drod nyams pa la sogs pa byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:180a-43: de bzhin du yang dang yang du sna 'drul ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:180b-0: sna 'gags pa dang dag par yang dang yang du byed pa la @180b sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:180b-1: 'di la srin bu snum pa las skye zhing 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-2: de smin mtshan ma lus yang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-3: sbrid pa zhi bar gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-4: snabs ni sbyin zhing ser ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-5: dri dang ro ni tshor ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-7: cham pa de smin par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni /
T13TD4312.3E:180b-8: lus yang pas dri dang ro tshor ba'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-9: snabs sbyin zhing ser ba ni spra tshil lta bur 'byung ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-10: snar ni rnon po brngubs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-11: nyi 'od skud pa rtsa sogs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-12: rlung 'khrugs byed pa gzhan gyis kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-13: sna yi mtshul par zhugs gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-14: bskyod de rlung ni 'khrugs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-16: ldog nas mi bzad sbrid pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-17: snabs 'dzag bcas par skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-19: sna tsha zhing dro ba brngubs pas rlung 'khrugs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:180b-20: de bzhin du de dang 'dra ba gzhan gyis kyang 'khrugs nas sna'i mtshul pa'i rus pa 'jam pa gzhon nu bskyod cing bsgul bas rlung 'khrugs par gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:180b-21: de mtshul pa'i sum mdor zhugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:180b-22: rgyu ba 'gags te slar ldog nas sbrid pa mi bzad pa skyed par byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:180b-23: de'i ming ni cham pa ma rungs pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-24: sna yi bu ga skem byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-25: rlung gis bad kan skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-26: sna nang gra mas gang snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-27: dbugs 'byung dka' bar gyur pa de //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-28: sna skams pa zhes bya bar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-30: sna ni bkag pa 'drar sems shing //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-33: bu ga gdangs pa lta bu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-35: rlung gis sna'i bu ga skams te bad kan skyed par byed pa la sogs pa'i nad de ni sna skams pa zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-36: sna rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i sna nad ni sna bus shing brgyangs pa lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-37: mkhris pas sna khung rnags gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-38: sha lpags tsha zhing gzer dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:180b-39: de ni sna yi shu bar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-0: mkhris pa 'phel bas sna khung gi nang rnags par gyur cing smin la de'i sha dang lpags pa tsha ba dang gzer ba dang @181a * //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-2: nad de'i ming ni sna'i shu ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-3: bad kan las gyur chu ser ni //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-5: mchog tu mtshan 'dzag de ming can //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-7: bad kan las gyur pa'i chu ser ni chu dang 'dra ba rgyun du 'dzag cing /
T13TD4312.3E:181a-8: khyad par du mtshan mo 'dzag pa ni de'i ming can de sna chu 'dzag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-9: bad kan 'phel bas sna khung du //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-10: bu ga 'gags shing cham pa skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-11: dbugs ni ngar ngar por 'byin cing //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-12: cham pa las kyang nad tshabs che //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-13: sna las lug ltar rnag 'dzag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-14: rgyun du spyi bag ser po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-16: de yi sna ni snabs bcas yin //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-18: sna'i nang du bad kan 'phel bas sna khung gi bu ga 'gags par byas te dbugs ngar ngar por 'byin par byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:181a-19: cham pa bas nad tshabs che zhing lhag pa dang sna'i nang nas lug ltar rnag 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:181a-20: rnag de yang rgyun du 'dzag cing /
T13TD4312.3E:181a-21: spyi bag la sogs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste nad de ni lug gi cham pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-22: khrag gi sna ni tshig snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-23: phyi dang nang du reg mi bzod //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-24: du ba lta bu'i dbugs 'byin pa //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-27: khrag 'khrugs pas sna'i nang nas tshig pa snyam du sems shing sna'i nang dang /
T13TD4312.3E:181a-28: phyi rol du reg mi bzod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:181a-29: du ba lta bu 'byin pa'i nad de ni bsregs pa dang 'dra ba yin pas na sna nad 'bar ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-30: rkan gyi phugs su nad 'khrugs pas //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-31: rlung ni kha dang sna nas 'byung ;
T13TD4312.3E:181a-33: de ni sna nad rul pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-35: rkan gyi rtsa ba'i phugs su rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs pas rlung kha dang sna nas rlung 'byung zhing mchil snabs dri mnam pa 'byung ba'i nad de ni sna nad rul pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-36: 'dus pa 'am snad pa las gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-37: rnag dang khrag ni sna nas 'dzag / mgo bo tsha zhing na byed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-38: de ni rnag khrag can zhes bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:181a-40: snad cing rma byung ba las gyur pa'i rnag dang khrag 'dres pa 'dzag pa la sogs pa de ni ming rnag khrag can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-0: rlung gis mkhris pa @181b bad kan dag / sna ni skams par gyur pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-1: bad kan skams te gong por gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-2: de ni bsgongs pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-4: rlung gis mkhris pa dang bad kan sna'i nang du skams shing /
T13TD4312.3E:181b-5: gong gong por gyur pa dag ni sna nad bsgongs pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-7: mtshan nyid ci 'dra dag las dbye //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-10: sna'i thor bu ni nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan nyid las ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya zhing dbye bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-11: kun las dbugs 'byung dka' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-13: sna 'gags lta bur smra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-14: sna nas rnag 'dzag klad pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-16: 'brum bu dang thor bu'i nad kun las kyang dbugs 'byung bar dka' ba nas /
T13TD4312.3E:181b-17: klad pa na ba'i bar gyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-18: de ltar rnam pa bco brgyad las //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-19: cham pa ma rungs 'tsho ba tsam //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-21: tshul de ltar sna nad rnam pa bco brgyad las cham pa ma rungs pa zhes bya ba ni re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du gsor rung ba yin la lhag ma rnams kyang gsor rung ba nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-22: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:181b-23: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:181b-25: // / de nas sna nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-27: go rims snga ma'i tshul gyis na le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-28: sna nad kun la dang por ni //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-31: / snum chos dugs dang skyug sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:181b-32: dud pa brngub [?] dang mkhur bkang bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-33: gos ni lci zhing dro ba bgo //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-34: mgo bo shin tu mthug pas dkri //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-35: kha zas yang skyur lan tshva snum //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-36: dro ba dang ni bska ba bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-37: bu ram 'o ma skam sa'i sha //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-38: lan tshva tsha ba gsum shas che //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-39: nas dang gro ni mang po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-40: zho dang se 'bru'i khu ba bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:181b-42: sna nad cham pa thams cad la ni kho nar rlung med pa'i khang par 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:181b-43: de bzhin du snum chos la sogs pa bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:181b-44: gos lci ba bgo ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:182a-0: kha zas yang zhing skyur ba la @182a * //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-2: bu ram la sogs pa'i bza' btung bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-3: la phug gzhon nu'i khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-4: ku langtha yi khu ba'ang bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-6: cham pa de dag la la phug bskol ba'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:182a-7: rgya sran ku langtha bskol ba'i khu ba yang phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-8: rtsa bcu'i khu ba dro 'jam mam //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-9: chang snying dangs ma blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-11: gal te skom par gyur na rtsa ba bcu bskol ba'i khu ba la sogs pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-13: shu dag zir go snyod snom //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-15: yang na tsa rong zhes bya ba sman tsor ka dang /
T13TD4312.3E:182a-16: aagni mantha la sogs pa btags pa'i thum po cham pa can gyis snom par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-17: bal bu'i lo ma tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-18: dbyi mo da trig star bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-19: zir tsi tra srang gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-20: shing tsha gandha bha dra dang //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-21: sug smel zho ni gnyis gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-22: bu ram rnying pa srang lnga bcu ;
T13TD4312.3E:182a-23: / bskol te ri lur byas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-24: zos na cham pa dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-25: lud pa lu ba 'joms byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-28: bal bu'i lo ma la sogs pa ji skad smos pa'i sbyor bas bskol te /
T13TD4312.3E:182a-29: de thams cad las ri lur byas pa zos na cham pa la sogs pa 'joms shing skad snyan par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:182a-30: yi ga 'byed par byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-31: shu ti'i shun pa ba la dang //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-32: so na ka dang ae randa //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-33: bil ba'i rtsa ba dong grar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-34: zhag mar spra tshil dud pa brngub //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-36: shu ti la sogs pa'i sman zhag dang mar dang spra tshil dang bsres pa'i dud pa brngubs na yang cham pa la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-37: yang na phye dang mar dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-38: kham phor sbyar ba'i nang du bcug / bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-40: yang na phye dang mar sbyar ba kham phor nang du bcug pa'i dud pas brngubs na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-41: khrus dang mya ngan khro ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-42: shas cher gnyid log chu grang spang //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-44: cham pa can gyis spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-45: de yan chad ni thams cad spyi'i gso ba bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:182a-46: rlung gyur cham pa rlung 'joms pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-0: sman ni bskol ba'i khu ba @182b 'am ;
T13TD4312.3E:182b-2: rlung las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-3: lan tshva lnga ni bskol ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-4: bi da ri sogs sde bskol blud //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-6: yang na sman gyi khu ba gnyis po 'di las gang yang rung ba dang bskol ba'i mar blud na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-7: dugs dang sna sman la sogs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-8: gzhogs phyed nar bshad gso ba'ang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-10: yang na rlung las gyur pa'i cham pa la dugs la sogs pa'am gzhogs phyed na ba'i gso ba gang dag yin pa de bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-11: khrag mkhris las gyur thug pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-12: mar sar mngar ba'i sman bskol blud //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-14: khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni sman mngar ba dang mar dang bskol ba'i thug pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-15: sman chu blugs shing byug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-16: nus bsil grang mo dag gis bya //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-18: yang na khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni nus pa bsil ba'i sman bskol ba'i chu grang mo blugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:182b-19: de'i lde gus bsku ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-20: dva ba'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-21: shi ri parni pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-22: shing mngar seng phrom til mar gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-24: bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-26: shing dva ba la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:182b-27: til mar gyi bcu 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang skyer par bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-28: bad kan las gyur smyung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-29: yungs kar lde gus mgo bsku 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-31: bad kan las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni smyung ba'am yungs kar gyi lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-32: thal sman bcas pa'i mar blud de //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-33: slon gzhug ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:182b-34: yang na bad kan las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni thal sman dang bcas pa'i mar blud la de'i 'og tu slon du gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-36: byi dang ga dang dug mo nyung //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-37: zi ra ra gcin sbyar ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-38: sna sman dag ni gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:182b-40: rgyam tsha la sogs pa ra'i gcin dang sbyar te btsags pa'i sna sman btang na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i cham pa la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-1: gyur tsha dang rno sbyar ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-2: mar gyi sna sman blugs pas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-4: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni sman tsha ba dang rno ba dang sbyar ba'i sman mar la sogs pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-5: gcong chen srin gso'i rim gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-6: cham pa ma rungs 'tsho tsam bya //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-8: gcong chen po dang srin bu gso ba'i rim gyis ni /
T13TD4312.3E:183a-9: cham pa ma rungs pa re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-10: tsha ba gsum dang ae randa //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-11: thang shing ru rta byi dang ka / bong nga dkar po ainggu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-12: dur byid parta ka'i sa bon //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-15: pi lu shi kru'i sa bon dang //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-16: rta sbangs khu ba gcin dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-17: glang po'i gcin dang gcig tu sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-18: zar ma'i skud dkris reng bu yi //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-19: dud pa kha dang sna nas brngub //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-21: tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i sman rta spangs btsir ba'i khu ba dang gcin dang glang po che'i gcin dang gcig tu sbyar ba'i reng bu zar ma'i skud pas dkris pa'i dud pa brngub par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-22: smin dang sbrid pa 'byung zhes pa //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-23: sna sman rnon po bud pas phan //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-25: smin pa zhes bya ba dang sbrid pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sna nad la ni sna sman rnon po'i phye ma bud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-26: bca' sga ru rta pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-27: rgun 'bru byi dang ga'i lde gu //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-28: mar ram til mar bcas bskol ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-29: sna sman sbrid pa rnags pa sel //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-31: bca' sga la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:183a-32: mar ram til mar bskol ba'i sna sman btang na sbrid pa dang rnags pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-33: sna skam pa la ba la'i mar //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-34: btung sogs sha khur sbyar ba bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-35: snum gyi dud pa dugs kyis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-37: sna skams pa zhes bya ba'i sna nad la ni ba la'i til mar rlung nad gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa btung ba dang sna nas gtang ba la sogs pa bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:183a-38: de bzhin du sha khu dang sbyar ba'i kha zas bza' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:183a-39: snum gyi dud pa brngub pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:183a-40: dugs bya bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-41: sna rgyas la yang cho ga 'di'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183a-43: sna rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i sna nad la yang sna skams pa'i gso ba 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-1: chu 'dzag sna sman sogs rnos bya //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-3: sna rnags pa dang sna 'bar ba snyam du sems pa'i sna nad gnyis la ni mkhris pa 'joms pa'i sman bsten cing /
T13TD4312.3E:183b-4: phan tshun nas chu 'dzag pa'i sna nad la ni sna sman dang mkhur ba bkang ba la sogs pa rnon pos bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-5: rnag can la ni bad kan gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-6: gso ba dang ni 'dra bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-8: sna nad rnag can dang sna nad cham pa la ni bad kan gyi cham pa dang 'dra bar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-9: rgya skyegs dang ni ka ranydza //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-10: na le sham dang byi dang ga / shing kun bu ram pi pi ling /
T13TD4312.3E:183b-11: lug thug gcin sbyar sna sman ni //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-12: slon byas 'og tu gtang bar ba //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-14: sna nad rnag can dang cham pa la ni slon sman btang nas rgya skyegs la sogs pa lug gi gcin dang sbyar ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-15: shi kru dan da bri ha ti //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-16: tsha ba gsum dang lce myong tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-17: bye'u rug pa dang byi dang ga / til mar bskol ba'i sna sman yang //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-18: btang na mchog tu phan pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-20: shi kru zhes bya ba na le sham dkar po dang /
T13TD4312.3E:183b-21: dan da dang bri ha ti'i sa bon tsha ba gsum la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i til mar dang bskol ba'i sna sman ni sna nad rnag can dang cham pa la mchog tu phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-22: rnag dang khrag can sar pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-23: khrag gi cham pa lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-25: rnag dang khrag can gyi sna nad sar pa skyes ma thag pa la ni khrag las gyur pa'i cham pa ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-28: rnag dang khrag shin tu 'phel ba la ni rma 'khyims pa ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-29: 'brum bu rmen bu tsha ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-30: dan ti dur byid lce myong tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-31: ldong ros dang ni pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-32: tsi tra ka yi lde gu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-33: mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-34: reng bu snar ni gzhug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-36: sna'i 'brum bu dang rmen bu tsha bar gyur pa la ni dan ti la sogs pa'i lde gu mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i reng bu snar gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-37: shi kru la sogs sna sman yang //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-38: rnag can gso ba'i skabs su bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:183b-40: 'brum bu rmen bu'i sna nad 'di la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-1: sna sman yang phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-2: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:184a-3: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:184a-5: // / de nas kha nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-7: stod kyi yan lag yin pa'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-8: go rims kyis na kha nad kyi nad gzhi dang rgyu la sogs pa bsten par bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-9: nya dang ma he phag gi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-10: sha dang la phug rjen pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-11: ma sha'i sran tshod 'o ma zho //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-12: tsha dang bu ram shing kun dang //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-13: bur bran kha sbub nyal bsten dang //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-14: so shing gis snad goms pa spong //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-15: dud pa mkhur bkang skyugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-16: gtar ga dbug ni nyes pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-17: bad kan shas che'i nad 'khrugs pas //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-18: kha yi nang gi nad skyed 'gyur ;
T13TD4312.3E:184a-20: nya dang ma he'i sha la sogs pa za zhing bsten par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184a-21: kha sbub tu nyal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184a-22: so shing gis snad cing ma rungs par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184a-23: kha zas goms pa la mi dga' zhing spong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184a-24: dud pa brngubs pa la sogs pa nyes par gyur pa dag gis bad kan shas che bar gyur pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas kha'i nang gi nad sna tshogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-25: de la rlung gis mchu gas 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-26: mchu ral ba yi nad ces bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-28: de la kha'i nad de dag gi nang nas rlung gis mchu gang gas shing gnyis su byas pa de ni ming mchu ral ba zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-29: rlung gis mchu la gnod gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-30: mchu sra nad tshabs che ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-32: gnag cing rtsub pa mchu 'khrugs yin //
T13TD4312.3E:184a-34: rlung gis mchu la gnod par gyur pa'i nad ni mchu sra zhing rgyas te shing ltar 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184a-37: rdol zhing zags par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184a-38: mdog gnag cing rtsub par gyur pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-0: @184b mkhris pas tsha ba mi bzod ser //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-2: myung smin mang du rnags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-4: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mchu nad tsha ba'i dngos po mi bzod pa dang kha dog ser ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-5: yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis kun tu khyab cing g-yogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-6: myur du smin cing rnags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-7: rnag dang chu ser mang ba dang ldan pa ni mkhris pas gnod pa'i mchu nad yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-8: bad kan las gyur grang ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-9: mi bzod lci zhing skrang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-10: 'brum phran dkar pos khyab pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-12: bad kan las gyur pa'i mchu nad la ni grang bas reg na mi bzod pa dang lci zhing skrang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-13: 'brum phran kha dog dkar pos tsem tsem por khyab pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-14: 'dus gyur sna tshogs par snang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-15: dri nga'i spyi bag 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-16: glo bur shas cher skrang zhing zhum //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-17: na dang min [?] rnag mi snyoms //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-19: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mchu nad ni mdog sna tshogs par snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-20: mchu'i ljan ljin dri mi zhim pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-21: spyi bag nal nal por 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-22: glo bur du rgyu med par lan 'ga' ni shas cher skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-25: lan 'ga' ni na bar mi byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-26: rnag cing smin pa mi snyoms te /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-27: lan 'ga' ni myur du smin la /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-28: lan 'ga' ni ring nas smin pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-29: khrag las gyur pa khrag 'dzag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-30: khrag gi mdog dang 'dra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-32: khrag zad chu bur 'byung ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-34: khrag las gyur pa'i mchu nad ni rgyun du khrag 'dzag pa dang khrag gi mdog can du snang ba dang mchu nad 'di la khrag zad par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:184b-35: chu bur 'bra go lta bur 'phyang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-36: sha gyur sha yi gong po 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-37: rim gyis srin bu skye zhing 'gul //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-39: sha las gyur pa'i mchu nad ni sha'i gong po 'dra bar gyur pa dang rim gyis srin bu skye zhing 'gul bar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-40: tshil gyur g-ya' zhing 'drul ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:184b-41: skrang 'jam til mar lta bur 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-1: pa las gyur pa'i mchu nad g-ya' zhing 'drul ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-2: skrang zhing ljan ljin dang chu ser til mar lta bur 'dzag cing 'jam por 'dug pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-3: snad pa las gyur gas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-6: mchu ni g-ya' bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-8: snad cing rma byung ba las mchu nad du gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-9: yang dang yang du gas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-10: yang dang yang du 'bye bar 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-11: slar yang de las 'drubs te rmen bur 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-12: mchu de yang dang yang du g-ya' bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-13: rlung dang bad kan 'dres pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-14: chu yi chu bur lta bur 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-16: rlung dang bad kan 'dres par gyur pa las mchu nad chu'i chu bur lta bur mtho ba dag 'byung ba ni /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-17: mchu nad chu'i chu bur zhes bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-18: de ltar na mchu'i nad bcu gcig tu bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-20: mkhur ba tsha zhing rims dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-22: mkhur tshos su skrang zhing brtan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-23: mkhur ba tsha ba 'ur 'ur por gyur cing rims dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni mkhur bar 'bras 'byed pa'i nad ces bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-24: de ltar na mkhur ba'i nad ni gcig yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-25: rlung gyur so nad dro la sred //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-26: grang bas reg na lhag par na //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-27: gzer zhing bcag pa snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-28: grang bas zhig par de bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-30: rlung las gyur pa'i so'i nad dro ba la sred cing bstan pa bzod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-31: grang bas reg na lhag par na zhing lhang lhang por zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-32: de bzhin du gzer ba dang na bas bcag cing 'brul pa snyam du sems pa'i so nad de grang bas zhig pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-33: rlung dang chu yis so brtse ba //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-34: grang dang skyur ba mi bzod par //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-35: skyur ba zos pa nyid kyis 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-36: nad bcas 'gul par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-38: so brtse ba zhes bya ba'i nad ni rlung dang grang ba la sogs pa sos bsten par mi bzod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:185a-39: nad de yang skyur pa zos pa nyid las gyur pa dang de bzhin du nad dang bcas shing 'gul bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:185a-40: so gas so ni zegs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-0: na zhing zug la @185b g-yo ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-2: so zegs shing na ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-3: so 'gul so ni g-yo ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-4: za ba'i tshe na lhag par na //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-6: so 'gul ba zhes bya ba'i nad ni so g-yo zhing ldeg pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:185b-7: lhag par yang zas za ba'i tshe na na bar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-8: so sto so ni mi sdug par //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-9: so rnams skye bar 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-11: so sto zhing mi sdug par gyur pa skye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-12: so lhag so ni skyes pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-13: de ni 'phel ba zhes kyang bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-15: so rnams las gang lhag pa'i so skyes par gyur pa de ni /
T13TD4312.3E:185b-16: so lhag ces bya ba'i so nad yin te de ni slob dpon la las de so 'phel ba'i nad yin no zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-17: skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-18: na zhing skyes nas de zhi byed //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-20: so lhag de skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na ni shin tu na bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:185b-21: de skyes zin nas ni zhi bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-22: ma bkrus so yi dri ma 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-23: bad kan rlung gis skams pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-24: dri nga brtan gyur so dreg yin //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-26: kha ma sbyangs shing ma bkrus la so shing la sogs pas dag par ma byas pa'i so'i dri ma gang dag yod pa de rlung gis skam par byas pa las so dreg dri mi zhim zhing brtan par chags pa'i nad de ni ming so dreg ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-27: de ni yal bar bor ba las //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-28: so ni dum bur zegs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-29: grugs shing so ni gogs pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-31: de nyid yal bar bor na so nad khar lta bu zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-32: yang gang gis so dum bur dum bur yang dang yang gogs pa de ni dum bur gogs pa'i so nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-33: khrag dang mkhris pa rlung gis so //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-34: sngon por gyur pa so sngon yin //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-36: so khrag dang mkhris pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-37: rlung gi nad zhugs par gyur pas so'i mdog sngon por gyur pa ni so sngon gyi nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-38: nad kyi rlung ni shas cher 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-39: rtsa bar bcas pa'i so la brten //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-40: so dbus skams te stong par byas //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-41: so ni zas kyi dri mas gang //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-42: rul bas srin bu phra mo ni //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-44: rgyu med brnag dka' ldang dub can //
T13TD4312.3E:185b-45: sbom che gnas la shas cher na //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-1: snang rnag khrag 'dzag / de ni so srin can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-3: rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi tshogs rlung gi shas che zhing rgyas par gyur ba rtsa ba dang bcas pa'i so la brten cing gnas pas so'i dbus skams par gyur pa las so de'i nang khong stong du byas la ;
T13TD4312.3E:186a-4: khong stong gi so der zas kyi dri mas gang bde rul bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-5: srin bu'i rigs phra mo skye bar 'gyur la de'i 'og tu nad pa de la rgyu med par so'i nad ched 'ga' 'byung zhing ched 'ga' zhi ba'i ldang dub can du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-6: nad kun 'byung ba dang nad kun g-yo zhing bskyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-9: so bcad pa lta bur snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-10: rnag dang khrag gi tshogs 'dzag par gyur pa'i nad de ni so srin bu can gyi nad ces bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-11: de ltar na so'i nad ni grangs bcur bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-12: bad kan dang ni khrag gis rnyil //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-13: rnags shing rul par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-14: mnyen la zags shing gnag pa de //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-15: grang bas nyen pa yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-17: bad kan dang khrag gi nad de g-yos par gyur pas rnyil rnags shing dring bar gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-18: rul zhing 'drul la rgyu med par khrag rgyun du 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-20: khrag zags par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-21: mdog gnag par gyur pa de ni rnyil nad grang bas nyen pa zhes bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-22: khrag mkhris rnags pa las byung ba //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-23: rnyil ni tsha bar byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-24: khrag gis skrangs pa mtho ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-25: g-ya' zhing khrag ni 'dzag pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:186a-26: / khrag chad nas ni rgyas par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-27: so na 'gul zhing nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-28: kha dri mnam 'gyur nyer bdar yin //
T13TD4312.3E:186a-30: khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rnyil gyi nad nye bar bdar ba zhes bya ba ni rnyil tsha ba 'ur 'ur pos khyab par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-31: de bzhin du khrag las gyur pa'i skrangs pa de mthon por 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-32: de bzhin du khrag 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-34: de bzhin du khrag de chad cing 'khyil bar gyur pa na ni rnyil gyi sha de rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-35: so na zhing 'gul bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186a-36: nad tshabs cung zad chung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186b-0: @186b kha'i nang dri mi zhim zhing mnam par 'gyur ba'i rnyil gyi nad de ni nye bar bdar ba'i nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-1: so ni gnyis sam gsum thad kar /
T13TD4312.3E:186b-2: bad kan las gyur rgya shug tsam //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-3: skrangs pa sra zhing mi bzad na //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-4: myur du smin pa so 'bud yin //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-6: so gnyis sam gsum gyi thad kar bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pa las rgya shug gi tshi gu tsam du skrang zhing sra ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186b-7: skrangs pa de mi bzad par na zhing myur du smin par 'gyur ba de ni so'i sha 'bur ba zhes bya ba'i nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-8: rnyil ni nad bcas khrag gis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-9: phyi dang nang du skrang zhing lci //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-10: na zhing tsha la gas pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-13: rlung la sogs pa'i nad dang bcas pa'i khrag gis rnyil gyi sha phyi dang nang du skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186b-15: na zhing tsha ba 'ur 'ur por gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186b-16: de gas par gyur pa las rnag dang khrag 'dzag par gyur pa ni so'i khong 'bras zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-17: so rtsar khrag mkhris las gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-18: skrang zhing nad dang bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-20: khong stong gi ni nad ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-22: so rnams kyi rtsa bar khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186b-23: kha chu 'dzag pa la sogs pa ni khong stong gi nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-24: 'dus pa las gyur rims dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-25: rnag dang bcas pa'i khrag 'dzag la //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-26: so yi sbrel mtshams zhig pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-27: khong stong chen po zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-29: skrangs pa de nyid 'dus pa'i nad las gyur cing skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:186b-31: de bzhin du rnags dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:186b-32: ming khong stong chen po zhes bya'o zhes drang srong chen po rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-33: bad kan gyis ni so yi mthar //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-34: sha mdzer ltar skrang 'gram pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:186b-35: / rna ba na byed spyod lam nyams //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-36: de ni sha lhag ces byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:186b-38: bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pas sha'i mdzer pa lta bu'i skrangs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:186b-39: des 'gram pa dang rna ba na bar byed pa /
T13TD4312.3E:187a-0: rang gi spyod lam kha zas za ba nyams par byed pa'i nad de ni @187a * //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-2: sha'i rmen bu zhes bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-3: rnyil ni bdar bar gyur pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-5: gang zhig so ni 'gul gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-6: de ni snad pa las byung yin //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-8: so shing la sogs pas bdar cing brud par gyur pa las shas cher na ba la sogs par gyur pa'i nad de ni so snad pa las byung ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-9: rnyil la brten par byed pa'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-10: gsor rung yal bar bor ba gang //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-11: nang du de ni nad 'dzag pas //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-12: des ni rgyun lam phra ba skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-13: de ni yang yang rnag 'dzag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-14: pags pa sha dang rus pa 'bigs //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-16: mi gang gi rnyil la brten pa la ni nad gsor rung zhing bcos su 'dod pa gang yin pa dag yal bar bor bar gyur na nad de'i skyon nang du 'dzag pas de'i nang gi rgyun lam gyi bu ga phra mo bskyed la bu ga de las yang dang yang du rnag 'dzag cing pags pa dang sha dang rus pa 'bigs par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-17: de yang rang rang mtshan nyid ni //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-18: ji skad bshad pas lngar shes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-20: phra mor 'bigs pa'i nad de yang nad rang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam pa lngar 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-21: de ltar na rnyil gyi nad ni bcu gsum du shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-22: lce ni sha kha'i lo ltar rtsub //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-23: tshor ba med gas rlung gnod yin //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-25: rlung gi nad kyis gnod par gyur pa'i lce'i nad ni /
T13TD4312.3E:187a-26: shing sha kha zhes bya ba'i lo ma ltar reg na rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:187a-27: tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:187a-28: kha mang du gas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-29: mkhris pas tsha zhing nad bcas 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-30: mdzer pa dmar pos khyab pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-32: mkhris pas gnod par gyur pa'i lce ni tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:187a-33: nad dang bcas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:187a-34: de bzhin du mdzer pa dmar pos khyab par gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-35: bad kan las gyur shal ma li'i //
T13TD4312.3E:187a-36: tsher mas khyab gyur lci zhing mthug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:187a-37: bad kan gyis gnod par gyur pa'i lce ni shal ma li'i tsher ma 'dra ba'i sha'i mdzer pas khyab par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:187b-0: rang bzhin lci zhing mthug par @187b gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-1: bad kan mkhris pas 'og tu skrang //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-2: mtho zhing gyong bar byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-3: smin na nya yi dri 'dra la //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-4: sha 'drul chu ser can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-6: bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis 'og tu skrang zhing mtho ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:187b-7: de nyid kyis ni lce gyong zhing srab par byed pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:187b-8: smin cing rnags par gyur na nya rul ba'i dri 'dra la /
T13TD4312.3E:187b-9: lce'i sha 'drul cing zhigs pa de ni lce nad chu ser can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-11: skrang zhing lce yi rtse mo 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-12: mdzer pa byung zhing kha chu 'dzag / lce ni rings shing rtsub pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-13: g-ya' dang nad bcas tshig mi thon //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-14: za bar mi nus lce lhag yin //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-16: lce'i phugs kyi rtsa'i 'og dang 'brel pa de skrang zhing lce'i rtse mo 'dra ba'i mdzer pa byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:187b-17: kha chu dang khrag 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-18: lce rengs shing gyong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:187b-19: kha zas za mi nus pa de ni ming lce lhag ces bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-20: de dang 'dra ba lce steng na //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-21: gnas pa nye ba'i lce zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-23: bshad ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'dra ba'i skrangs pa'i nad lce'i steng na gnas pa ni nye ba'i lce zhes bya ba'i ming 'dis bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-24: de ltar na lce'i nad ni drug yod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-25: rlung 'khrugs pa ni rkan gyi shar //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-27: mang zhing mthug la 'dzag par bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-28: rkan gyi 'brum phran zhes de bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-30: rlung gi nad 'khrugs pas rkan gyi sha la gnod par gyur na 'brum phran sra zhing na ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:187b-33: chu ser 'dzag pa dang bcas par 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.3E:187b-34: 'brum bu de ni ming bad kan gyi 'brum phran zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-35: bad kan khrag gis rkan phugs su //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-37: 'phyang zhing skrangs la spyi bag can //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-38: kha zas sna nas 'byung bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-39: lkog 'gags skom dad lud pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:187b-40: slon byed lkog ma'i sha lhag yin //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-0: bad kan khrag dang 'dres pas rkan gyi phugs su nya'i lgang pa 'dra ba 'jam zhing rab tu 'phyang la spyi [?] bag can cu @188a * //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-2: de'i dbang gis kha zas sna nas 'byung bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:188a-3: lkog ma 'gags pa la sogs pa skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-4: nad de ni lkog ma'i sha lhag ces bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-5: rkan gyi dbus su nad med sha //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-8: rkan gyi dbus kyi phyogs su sha 'dus shing sbungs pa nad med par skyes pa gang yin pa de ni ming rkan 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-10: khrag las skyes pa chu bur yin //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-12: rkan gyi dbus kyi phyogs su padma 'dra bar skrangs ba khrag las skyes pa'i nad gang yin pa de ni ming chu bur zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-14: nad med rus sbal 'dra zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-16: bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pa las skrangs pa'i nad gang yang yun ring zhig nas 'phel ba gang yin pa de ni ming rus sbal 'dra ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-17: bad kan tshil gyis rgya sran 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-18: nad med brtan pa 'bur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-20: bad kan dang tshil 'phel bar gyur pa las skrang nad gang rgya sran gyi dbyibs 'dra zhing yun ring du gnas par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ming 'bur ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-21: mkhris pas rnags pa smin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-22: rnag 'dzag nad dkyel che ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-24: mkhris pa 'khrugs pas rkan gyi nang du rnags par gyur pa ni smin pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-25: de ni rnag 'dzag pa dang nad kyi dkyel che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-26: rlung mkhris las gyur tsha nyon mongs //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-27: rkan skam de yi ming can yin //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-29: rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rkan gyi nad tsha zhing skrangs pa de shas cher sdug bsngal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:188a-30: rkan gyi phyogs skam pa gang yin pa de ni de'i ming can te rkan skam pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-31: de ltar na rkan gyi nad rnam pa brgyad yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-32: lce dang 'brel pa lkog ma'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-33: sha yi myu gu myur 'phel zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-34: mi bzad lam ni 'gog byed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-35: / myur gsod byed pa gag pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:188a-37: lkog ma'i phyogs su lce dang 'brel cing lce rtsa las byung ba lkog ma'i nang sha'i myu gu lta bu'i sha lhag skye zhing 'phel bar byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:188b-0: mi bzad @188b cing brnag par dka' ba lkog ma'i lam 'gog par byed pa myur du gsod cing 'joms par byed pa gang yin pa de ni ming gag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-1: de ni rlung gyur lkog ma kha //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-2: skam byed 'gram pa rna nad skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-4: gag pa de rlung las gyur pa la ni lkog ma dang kha skam par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:188b-5: 'gram pa dang rna ba'i nad skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-6: mkhris pas rims skom rmongs bag can //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-7: lkog 'gags dud pas bdugs snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-8: myur smin myur du 'phel ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-9: dmar zhing reg na mi bzod byed //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-11: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gag pa ni rims dang skom dad la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing lkog ma 'gags pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-12: bad kan gyis dkar 'byar bag can //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-14: bad kan las gyur pa'i gag pa'i mtshan nyid ni dkar zhing ma dog skya ba dang sbyin zhing 'byar bag can du 'dug pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-15: khrag gyur 'brum bus khyab pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-16: me ma dag 'dra zhing rna nad skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-17: mkhris pa las gyur mtshan nyid mtshungs //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-19: khrag 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i gag pa ni 'brum bu phra mos khyab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:188b-20: me mdag dang reg pa'i tshul 'dra ba 'am mdog 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:188b-21: rna ba gnyis na bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:188b-22: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gag pa'i mtshan nyid dang mthun pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-23: 'dus gyur rnag phugs gting ring zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-24: mtshan ma kun dang ldan pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-26: nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i gag pa ni rnag phugs gting ring zhing zab ste mi mngon pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:188b-27: rlung la sogs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-28: bad kan shas cher skangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-29: rmen bu rgya shug 'dra zhing mtho //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-30: gra ma tsher mas gang snyam byed //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-31: lam 'gag byed pa rtsa ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-33: rlung la sogs pa'i nad las bad kan shas che bar gyur pas ni /
T13TD4312.3E:188b-34: lkog ma'i phyogs skrangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:188b-35: rmen bu sha khyud rgya shug gi dbyibs 'dra zhing mtho ba skye ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:188b-36: gra ma'am tsher mas nang du gang ba snyam byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:189a-0: @189a * // lkog ma'i ngos na 'gag par byed pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:189a-2: ku mu da'i rtsa ba 'dra ba'i phyir rtsa ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-3: blum zhing mtho la tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-4: lkog ma'i ngos gnas 'dus pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-6: lkog ma'i ngos na gnas pa'i skrangs pa'i nad zlum pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni ming 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-7: 'gram pa'i mtshams gnas mgul pa'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-8: ras bal sa bon lta bur zlum //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-9: spyi bag nad tshabs chung bar skrang //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-10: sra ba mchu rtse can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-12: mgul pa'i phyogs su skrangs pa'i nad gang [?] ras [?] bal gyi sa bon dang dbyibs 'dra ba'i zlum po spyi bag can shas che ra min ba skrang zhing sra ba de ni ming mchu rtse can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-13: phyi dang nang du mi bzad skrang //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-14: lkog ma'i lam gyi gtan pa 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-15: mgo lci snum dang kha chu 'dzag / rims skyed lkog mchu 'dzings pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-17: lkog ma'i phyogs su skrangs pa'i nad gang phyi nang du shas che ra skrang zhing lkog ma'i rgyun lam gyi gtan pa 'dra bar skye zhing mgo bo lci ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni /
T13TD4312.3E:189a-18: lkog ma'i mchu 'dzings pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-19: skrangs pa shas cher min zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-20: chu zheng de dang gdu bu yin ;
T13TD4312.3E:189a-22: lkog ma'i phyogs su skrangs pa gang nad tshabs chung zhing dpangs dang rgyar chu dang zheng gdu bu dang 'dra bar skrangs pa'i nad gang yin pa de ni ming gdu bu zhes bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-23: gdu bu dang dbyibs 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-24: nad kyis lkog mar sha mdzer ni //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-25: gcig gam mang skyes nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-26: dbugs 'byin dka' zhing zas mid dka' //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-27: rtsa ba che ba lkog ma'i mtshon //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-29: rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs par gyur pas lkog ma'i gnas su sha'i mdzer pa gcig gam /
T13TD4312.3E:189a-30: mang po 'byung bar gyur cing dbugs 'byin par dka' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de ni lkog ma'i mtshon zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-31: sha yi mdzer pa mang pos khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-32: rab skam tsha la mgo bon //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-33: mdung ltar shin tu nad skyed byed //
T13TD4312.3E:189a-34: mdzer pas khyab pas mdung 'dra yin //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-0: sha'i mdzer pa mang pos khyab cing g-yogs @189b pa rab tu skom pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i mdzer pa mang po mdung ltar shin tu nad skyed par byed pa'i lkog ma'i nad de ni mdung lta bu'i nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-1: lkog ma kun ni myur khyab cing //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-2: myur skye myur smin shas cher na //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-4: skrangs pa lkog ma'i khong 'bras yin //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-6: lkog mar skrangs pas khyab pa'i nad gang lkog ma thams cad khyab par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:189b-7: de bzhin du myur du skye zhing myur du smin par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:189b-8: de bzhin du shas cher na ba la sogs pa'i nad de ni lkog ma'i khong 'bras zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-9: lce yi mtha' ma lkog ma sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-10: skrang zhing smin pa med pa'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-11: brtan pa khrag gis skyed byed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-12: nad med lkog ma'i rmen bu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-14: lce'i mtha' ma dang lkog ma'i phyogs la sogs par skrangs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni lkog ma'i rmen bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-15: rlung dang bad kan tshil gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-16: lkog ma'i phyi rol lba ba skyes //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-17: de ni 'phel bar gyur pa'i tshe //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-18: rlig pa ltar 'phyang na ba med //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-20: rlung dang bad kan dang tshil gyis nad 'khrugs par gyur pa las /
T13TD4312.3E:189b-21: lkog ma'i phyi rol du lba ba skyes par gyur cing /
T13TD4312.3E:189b-22: de shas cher na ba med la rlig pa ltar 'phyang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-23: de ni rlung gyur dmar ba'am gnag / na zug rtsa ris nag por bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-24: 'phel bas lkog ma kha skam zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-25: lce yis ro mi tshor bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-27: lkog ma'i lba ba de rlung shas che ba las gyur pa yin na ni /
T13TD4312.3E:189b-28: dmar ba'am shas cher gnag par snang zhing na zhing zug pa shas che bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:189b-29: rtsa'i ri mo nag po dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:189b-30: de 'phel bar gyur na lkog ma skams pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-31: bad kan las lci reg na grang //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-32: brtan zhing skya la g-ya' dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-33: 'phel na rkan dang lkog mar chags //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-34: kha ni mdar ba bro bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:189b-36: lkog ma'i lba ba de bad kan las gyur pa'i rang bzhin lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:189b-37: reg cing myang na grang ba la sogs pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-0: de 'phel bar gyur na bad kan dang lkog ma'i phyogs su spyi bag @190a * //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-2: kha'i nang ro mngar ba bro bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-3: tshil gyur bad kan lta bur na //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-5: 'phel bar byed pa'i tshe na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-6: lkog mar sgra bcas skad gsang nyams //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-8: tshil 'phel ba las gyur pa'i lba ba ni bad kan gyi lba ba dang rang bzhin 'dra zhing de ched 'ga' ni 'phel la /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-11: tshil brin 'bri bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-12: gzhan yang lba ba 'phel bar byed pa'i tshe na ni lkog mar sgra ngar ngar po dang bcas pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:190a-13: skad gsang nyams shing chung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-14: bad kan gyis ni rlung rgyun bkag / lkog skam skad gsang nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-15: dka' bas dbugs 'byin mun zhugs snyam //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-16: rlung las skad nyams gang yin 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-18: bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pa las gang gi tshe rlung rgyu ba'i rgyun bkag par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-19: de bzhin du mi de lkog ma skams pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-20: skad gsang shin tu nyams par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-21: dbugs nyam thag par 'byin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-22: mun par zhugs pa snyam du mun 'thibs zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-23: rlung gi nad gang gis skad gsang nyams pa zhes bya bar nyams par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-24: de ltar na lkog ma'i nad bco brgyad yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-25: rlung ni kun tu 'gro byed pas //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-26: kha nang rma ni 'pho bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-27: dmar la rtsub pa skyed byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-28: mchu dmar pags pa lhod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-29: lce yis grang ba mi bzod lci ;
T13TD4312.3E:190a-30: / gas shing tsher mas khyab 'drar snang //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-31: kha mnam gdangs par dka' ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-32: kha yi shu ba zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-34: rlung kun 'gro ba g-yo bar byed pas kha'i nang du rma 'pho zhing yan man du gnas 'pho bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-35: mdog dmar zhing rtsub pa skyed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-36: de bzhin du mchu zangs ltar dmar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-37: pags pa lhod cing 'gul ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:190a-38: lces grang ba mi bzod cing rang bzhin lci ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190a-39: mchu gas shing tsher mas khyab pa ltar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-0: rnags shing shu ba byung bas kha gdangs pa bka' bar gyur pa'i nad de ni ming @190b kha'i shu ba zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-1: bad kan gzhang 'brum skran sogs kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-2: 'og tu gnod par byas pa'i rlung //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-3: gyen 'byung kha ni dri mi zhim //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-4: de ni steng gi rkub ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-6: bad kan la sogs pas rlung 'og tu rgyu ba bkag par gyur pas gnod par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-7: rlung de gyen du 'byung bas kha de dri mi zhim par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-8: de'i ming ni steng gi rkub ces bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-9: 'phyen gyi rlung steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-10: mkhris gyur kha shu kha rnag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-11: tsha na kha ni tsha brol //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-12: rma la lan tshvas byugs snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-14: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i kha'i shu ba ni kha rnags par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-17: kha'i nang tshva bro bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-18: rma lan tshvas byugs shing bskus pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-19: khrag las gyur pa'ang de dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-21: khrag las gyur pa'i kha shu ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i kha shu dang mtshan nyid 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-22: bad kan las gyur kha mngar bro //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-23: g-ya' zhing rma ni 'byil bag can //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-25: bad kan las gyur pa'i kha shu ni /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-26: kha'i nang ro mngar ba bro ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-27: shu ba'i rma de g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-28: mkhur tshos nang du brten nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-30: de ni mnye zhing bcad pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-31: bskyod na 'phel bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-33: bad kan 'phel bar byed pa mkhur tshos kyi nang du brten cing gnas na 'brum bu gnag cing skya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-34: 'brum bu de lag pas mnye zhing bskyod pa la sogs pa byas na /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-36: nad ni khrag bcas gyur kha shu //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-37: kha shu nad ni khrag bcas 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-38: 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-40: rlung la sogs pa'i nad khrag dang bcas pa las gyur pa'i kha shu ni /
T13TD4312.3E:190b-41: mtshan nyid sngar smos pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-42: de nyid so shing la sogs la //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-43: mi dga' kha dri mi zhim 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:190b-45: nad khrag dang bcas pa de nyid so shing la sogs pa la mi dga' zhing bsten par mi byed pas /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-1: zhim zhing dri mnam par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-2: mchu dang mkhur tshos so rtsa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-3: lce dang rkan dang mgul pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-4: kha dang thams cad dag gi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-5: nad ni bdun cu rtsa lnga yin //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-6: bcu gcig gcig dang bcu dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-7: bcu gsum de bzhin drug dang brgyad //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-8: bco brgyad brgyad po dag dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-9: de dag go rims bzhin du sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-11: mchu'i nad ni bcu gcig yod par bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-12: mkhur tshos la ni gcig yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-13: so la ni bcu yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-14: so rtsal ni bcu gsum yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-15: lce la ni drug yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-16: rkan la ni brgyad yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-17: mgul pa la ni bco brgyad yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-18: kha la ni brgyad yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-19: de ltar na kha nad ni spyir bdun cu rtsa lnga yod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-20: so sto sha dang khrag gyur mchu //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-21: chu bur chu ni med pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-22: rgan gyi rus sbal 'brum phran dang //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-23: mid khong stong stong che mchu 'dzings //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-24: skad nyams so sngon steng gi rkub //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-25: mdung 'dra gdu bu chu ser can //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-26: 'dus gyur mid pa mchu nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-27: khrag dang 'dus gyur gag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-28: so gogs so ni chag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-29: smin pa'i nye ba'i lce dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-30: lkog ma'i lba ba skad nyams dang //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-31: dbugs mi thon pa lo gcig lon //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-33: nad de rnams kyi nang nas /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-34: so sto ba la sogs pa'i nad ni gsor mi rung ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-35: so nad las ni so sto ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-36: mchu nad las ni sha las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-38: chu bur ram rmen bu las ni nang na chu yod pa'i chu bur ma gtogs par 'brum bu'i chu bur lta bu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-40: bad kan gyi chu bur dang skrang pa gsor mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-41: bad kan gyi nad las ni rus sbal lta bu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-42: 'brum phran [?] zhes bya ba dag gsor mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-43: yang so nad las ni khong stong dang khong stong chen po gsor mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:191a-44: mid pa'i nad las ni mchu 'dzings dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-46: yang so'i nad las ni sngon po dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-47: kha'i nad las steng gi rkub dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-48: mgul pa'i nad las mdung 'dra ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-50: lce'i nad chu ser can dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-51: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mid pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191a-53: khrag dang 'dus pa las gyur pa'i gag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191b-0: so gogs pa dang chag par gyur @191b pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191b-1: smin pa'i nye ba'i lce yang gso dka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-2: lkog ma'i lba ba la sogs pa lo gcig lon pa yang gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-5: so brtse ba dang gas pa'i nad gnyis ni re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-6: lhag ma mtshon dang sman gyis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-8: mchu la sogs pa'i nad lhag ma rnams ni 'og bshad pa'i tshul du mtshon dang sman gyi sbyor bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-9: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:191b-10: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:191b-11: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:191b-13: // / de nas kha nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-14: mchu ral pa yi mtha' brud de //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-15: btsems la rma ltar gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-17: mchu ral ba zhes bya ba'i mchu nad kyi mtha' ma brud de ;
T13TD4312.3E:191b-18: gtsags bus brud cing zhal zhal byas te sbyar la legs par btsems te rma gso ba'i tshul ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-19: shing mngar seng phrom kra ku ni //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-20: thal tres autpal shra pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-21: mon sne'u dme ru pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-22: til mar bskol bas bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-24: yang na mchu ral ba la shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191b-25: til mar bskol bas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-26: rlung 'joms mngar ba'i sde tshan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-27: bskol ba'i til mar sna sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-29: yang de la rlung 'joms pa'i sman gyi sde tshan dang /
T13TD4312.3E:191b-30: mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan dang bskol ba'i til mar sna nas gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-31: rlung gyur mchu nad sra rtsi bog / spra tshil gu gul thang shing ni //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-32: snum chen bskol ba'i ras bal dag / sbangs pa'i ye'us glan bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-34: rlung las gyur pa'i mchu nad la ni sra rtsi bog la sogs pa dang snum chen po gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i nang du sbangs pa'i ras bal gyi ye'us glan par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-35: shing mngar phye mar bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-36: de nyid kyis ni bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:191b-38: yang na shing mngar gyi phye ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:192a-0: snum chen po de nyid sbyar bas bskus na yang rlung las gyur pa'i mchu nad la @192a * //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-2: / ae randa yi lo ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-3: 'o mar bskol bas sbubs dugs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-5: yang na rlung las gyur pa'i mchu nad la /
T13TD4312.3E:192a-6: ae randa'i lo ma 'o mar bskol ba'i sbu gu las dugs bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-7: mchu ral skabs bshad sna sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-8: mgo bo brta ba dag kyang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-10: yang na gong du mchu ral ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i sna sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:192a-11: de bzhin du mgo bo brta zhing bsku ba dag kyang bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-12: mkhris pas snad pa'i mchu nad la //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-13: srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-16: snad pa las gyur pa'i mchu nad la ni srin bu pad pa la sogs pas gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-17: seng phrom sbrang rtsi sra rtsi bog / shing mngar bcas pa'i phye ma gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-19: yang nad de la seng phrom la sogs pa'i phye ma 'am lde gus bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-20: sle tres shing mngar rma shing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-21: bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na 'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-23: yang na khrag dang snang ba'i mchu nad la sle tres la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-24: mkhris pa'i khong 'bras ltar yang gso //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-26: 'dir mkhris pa dang kha snad pa las gyur pa'i mchu nang [?] la ni mkhris pa'i khong [?] 'bras kyi gso ba ji skad smos pa dag kyang bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-27: khrag las gyur pa sar pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-28: de dag nyid kyis gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-30: khrag las gyur pa'i mchu nad sar pa yun ring du ma lon pa la ni mkhris pa'i gso bar bshad pa 'di dag nyid kyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-31: bad kan las gyur mchu nad la /
T13TD4312.3E:192a-32: pa to'i thal ba tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-33: sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyar bas bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-34: gtar ga byas nas phye ma gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-35: bad kan 'joms par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-36: dud brngub sna sman mkhur bkang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-38: bad kan las gyur pa'i mchu nad kyis nyen pa la ni pa to la la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gus bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:192a-39: gtar ga gdab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-40: tshil gyur dugs byas dbral nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:192a-41: me yis nges par bsreg par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-0: tshil las gyur pa'i @192b mchu nad la ni dugs byas la dbral ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-1: pri yang ku dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-2: seng phrom sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-4: tshil las gyur ba'i mchu nad la ni pri yang ku la sogs pas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-5: chu yi chu bur brtol nas sbyang //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-6: sman rnon sbrang rtsis bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-8: chu'i chu bur ni dang por brtol nas sbyang zhing dag par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:192b-9: sman rnon pho pi pi ling la sogs pas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-11: thad sman drag [?] gam me btsas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-13: chu'i chu bur gting ring zhing nang du zhugs pa 'am rab tu 'phel ba la ni thang sman nam me btsas bsreg par bya'o zhes bya'i don to //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-14: mkhur ba'i chu ser smin skabs su //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-15: skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-17: mkhur pa chu ser 'byung ba smin cing rnags par gyur pa'i skabs su ni mdo'i gnas su bshad pa'i skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-18: so grang ba la dugs bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-19: so rtsa brud de til mar bsreg / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:192b-20: so grang bar gyur pa la ni dang por dugs byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:192b-21: rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gtsags bus brud de til mar bskol bas bsregs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-22: gla sgang rgyam tsha sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-25: bca' sga sbyar bas bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-27: yang so'i phreng ba de gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-28: 'o ma can bskol mkhur ba bkang //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-29: ae randa mar sna sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-31: 'o ma can gyi shing bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur ba dgang ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:192b-32: ae randa'i mar gyi sna sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-33: so brtse de bzhin bye ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-34: rlung 'joms gso ba thams cad bya //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-36: so brtse ba dang po gas shing bye ba la ni rlung 'joms pa'i zas dang skom dang sman thams cad kyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-37: til dang shing mngar sbrang rtsi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:192b-38: 'o mar bskol ba'i mkhur bkang bcad //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-0: yang na nad de gnyis la til la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i khu ba @193a * //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-1: mkhur bar bcangs na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-2: so 'gul ba la rtsa ba bcu'i //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-3: khu ba mar bskol mkhur ba bkang //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-5: so 'gul ba'i nad la ni rtsa ba bcu bskol ba'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:193a-6: zhun mar ram til bskol ba mkhur bar bcangs na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-7: spangs ma seng phrom pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-8: 'bras bu gsum dang rma shing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-9: rgyam tsha yis ni bdar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-11: yang so 'gul ba la spangs ma la sogs pas so bdar na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-12: snum bag gis ni sna sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-13: mkhur bkang gnas skabs ji bzhin bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-15: yang so 'gul ba la snum bag can gyi sna sman la sogs pa gnas skabs ji lta ba bzhin du bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-16: so lhag skyes la bral sman gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-17: bskus te gogs par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-18: srin can so ltar phyung nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-19: de tshe de dang 'dra bar gso //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-21: so lhag skyes pa zhes bya ba'i so nad la ni thal sman gyis bskus te gogs shing bye bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:193a-22: srin bus zos pa'i so ltar byung [?] la /
T13TD4312.3E:193a-23: de dang 'dra ba kho nar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-24: khrag ni chod par ma gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-25: bsregs la rma ltar gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-27: so lhag skyes pa de phyung ba'i tshe khrag chod par ma gyur na gnas de bsregs la /
T13TD4312.3E:193a-28: de'i 'og tu rma ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-29: so dreg chags la so rtsa la //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-30: gnod pa med par bsal bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-32: so dreg chags pa la ni so'i rtsa ba la gnod pa med par byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:193a-33: so brud pa'i gtsags spyad kyis de brud cing bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-34: thal sman sbrang rtsir bcas pas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-35: de yi 'og tu bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-37: de ltar so dreg bzhar nas thal sman gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus so la bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-38: so gogs pa la'ang 'di nyid dang /
T13TD4312.3E:193a-39: so brtser bshad pa'i gso ba bya //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-41: so gogs pa'i nad la yang so dreg chags pa'i gso ba 'di nyid dang /
T13TD4312.3E:193a-42: so brtse ba la bshad pa'i gso ba thams cad bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-43: srin can so ni mi 'gul la //
T13TD4312.3E:193a-44: dugs byas nas ni khrag dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-0: snum gyis @193b bsku zhing mkhur bkang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-1: sna sman kha zas rlung 'joms sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-3: so srin bus zos pa mi 'gul bar gnas pa la ni dang por dugs byas la khrag dbyung bar bya la rlung la phan pa'i snum gyis bsku ba la sogs pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-4: khong stong bu ram spra tshil gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-5: gang ba'i thur mas bsreg par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-7: so khong stong du 'dug pa la ni bu ram mam spra tshil gyis gang ba'i thur mas de bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-8: lo ma bdun pa aarka yi //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-9: lo mas bkang na srin gzer 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-11: yang khong stong de la lo ma bdun pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:193b-12: aarka'i lo mas bkang na srin bus zos pa'i gzer 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-13: shing kun nag tshur kad pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-14: svardzi ka dang byi dang ga / ru rta'i phye ma ras la gtums //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-15: sor glan zug gzer myur du 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-17: shing kun la sogs pa'i phye ma ras gtsang mar gtums te so'i steng du bzhag na yang zug gzer gyi nang myur du sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-18: yang na 'di nyid bskol ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-19: til mar mkhur bar dgang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-21: yang na shing kun la sogs pa 'di nyid dang /
T13TD4312.3E:193b-22: bskol ba'i til mar gyis mkhur ba bkang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-23: yang na bri ha ti rnam gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-24: bu ga dam pa ae randa //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-25: bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur ba bkang //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-27: yang na bri ha ti gnyis ni kanda ka ri dang /
T13TD4312.3E:193b-29: de la sogs pa sman gyi sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-30: de ltar gso ba mang po yis //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-31: nad ni zhi bar ma gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-32: skam pa phra mo dag gis sam //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-33: so dbyung ba yi cha spyad kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-34: dang por rtsa ba nas bslangs te //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-35: gtan nas de ni dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-37: rnam pa de lta bu'i sman gyi gso ba sna tshogs pa dag gis nad de zhi zhing med par ma song na skam pa phra mo 'am ;
T13TD4312.3E:193b-38: yang so dbyung ba'i cha spyad du byas pas de mi 'gul ba yin yang dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-39: til mar shing mngar phyer bcas pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-40: sbrang rtsis de 'og mkhur bkang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:193b-42: de ltar so phyung nas til mar dang shing mngar gyi phye ma sbyar ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:194a-1: mngar gyi phye ma dang sbrang rtsir sbyar bas mkhur ba bkang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-2: de 'og shing mngar bi da ri //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-3: brid ta ka dang ka she ru //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-5: bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-7: de'i 'og tu bi da ri la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-8: rid cing nyam chung rgan po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-9: rlung nad kyis nyen so mi dbyung //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-10: ya so dbyung bar mi bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-11: de ni bla brnan mang po skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-13: rid pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:194a-14: de bzhin du gzhan dag gi ya so ni dbyung bar mi bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:194a-16: de ni nad kyi bla brnan skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-17: de yang 'byin na snum pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-18: mngar dang bsil ba'i rim pas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-20: de ltar dbyung du mi rung ba de yang 'byin nas snum pa la sogs pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-21: grang bas nyen la khrag dbyung zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-22: sbrang rtsir bcas pas bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-23: gla sgang aardzu na'i shun pa //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-24: pri yang ku dang skyer khanda //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-25: bca' sga sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-27: grang bas nyen pa'i so nad la ni khrag phyung la gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-28: de bskol bas ni mkhur bkang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-29: mngar sman til mar bskol snar blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-31: gla sgang la sogs pa'i mkhur ba bkang ba bcang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:194a-32: de bzhin du mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan dang til mar bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-33: rnyil ni nye bar bdar ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-34: chu tshan mkhur bkang bas dugs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-36: lo mas mang du brud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-38: rnyi la nye bar 'dar ba zhes bya ba'i so nad la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:194a-39: chu tshan mkhur ba bkang bas dugs bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:194a-40: gtsags bu'i rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-41: shing sha kha la sogs pa'i lo ma rtsub mos mang du brud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-42: rgya skyegs rma shing pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-43: rgyam tsha ru rta btsag yug snam //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-44: na le sham dang bca' sga dang //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-45: shing mngar skyer pa'i khanda dang //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-46: mar gyi snying po sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:194a-47: sbyar ba de 'og bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:194b-0: de'i 'og tu rgya skyegs la @194b sogs pa'i sman mar khu'i snying po dangs ma dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:194b-1: mar khu 'am til mar mkhur spo ba //
T13TD4312.3E:194b-2: dro 'jam de yi rjes la bya //
T13TD4312.3E:194b-4: de ltar byas pa'i rjes la mar khu 'am til mar dro 'jam tsam gyis de mkhur ba bkang zhing spo bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:194b-5: mngar ba'i sde dang bskol ba'i mar //
T13TD4312.3E:194b-6: mkhur bkang sna sman byas na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:194b-8: yang na mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:194b-9: lde gu dang bskol ba'i mar gyis mkhur ba bkang ba'am sna sman bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:194b-10: so 'bur ba la dugs byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:194b-11: bcad dang dbug dang brud par bya ;
T13TD4312.3E:194b-12: / shing mngar bca' sga svardzi ka / rgyam tsha'i phye ma bsku bar bya //
