T13TD4312.3E:210a-25: rma ni lhan cig skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210a-26: glo bur ba'i dbye ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210a-27: red cing gnod pa dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210a-28: ma red cing skyon med pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis kho na yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:210a-29: lus kyi nad gzhis skyed lhan cig / phyi rol rgyus byung glo bur ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:210a-31: de la lhan cig skyes pa'i rma ni lus las byung ba'i nad rlung la sogs pas skyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:210a-32: glo bur ba'i rma ni mtshon cha dang mtshon cha phra mo dang rdo dang dbyig pa dang sen mo dang so dang dug dang bse zho la sogs pa phyi rol gyi rgyu las byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:210a-33: nad dang 'dres pa red pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:210a-34: de med dag pa ma red yin //
T13TD4312.3E:210a-36: rlung la sogs pa'i nad dang 'dres shing des skyed pa'i rma ni red pa'am ma dag ces bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:210a-37: nad de dag med cing dag par gyur pa ni ma red pa zhes bya ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:210a-38: rma red kha rgyas zhum pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:210a-39: shin tu sra ba 'am shin tu snyi //
T13TD4312.3E:210a-40: shin tu mtho 'am shin tu dma' //
T13TD4312.3E:210a-41: shin tu grang ngam shin tu tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-0: dmar @210b zhing skya 'am gnag pa nyid //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-1: rnag ni dri mnam yongs su 'dzag / sha dang rtsa rgyus 'drul ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-2: g-yos shing mched la rab tu na //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-3: g-yo zhing tsha la skrang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-4: g-ya' ba la sogs bla brnan bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-5: yun ring du ni 'tsho ba dka' //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-6: rma rad mtshan mar shes par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-8: de la rma red cing ma dag pa'i mtshan ma ni rma'i kha rgyas shing bye ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-10: shin tu sra zhing rtsub pa'am shin tu snyi ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-11: kha dog shin tu dmar ba la sogs pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-13: rma mched cing rab tu na la bla brnan dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-14: yun ring du gnas shing 'tsho bar dka' ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-15: rma shin tu ma rungs pa'i mtshan ma ni de dag yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-16: de ni khrag bcas nad bco lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-18: de la rlung las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-19: mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-20: bad kan las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-22: rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-23: rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-24: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-25: rlung dang khrag las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-26: mkhris pa dang khrag las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-27: bad kan dang khrag las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-28: rlung dang mkhris pa dang khrag las gyur pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:210b-29: rlung dang bad kan dang khrag las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-30: bad kan dang rlung dang khrag las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-31: bad kan dang mkhris pa dang khrag las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-32: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang khrag las gyur pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-33: de la rnam pa bco lnga yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-34: de la rlung las gyur pa'i rma //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-35: gnag cing smug dmar thal mdog dang //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-36: thi ba'i rus pa lta bur snang //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-38: 'dra ba'i chu sla nyung du 'dzag / sha zad shas cher na zhing zug / rtsub cing tseg tseg tsha ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:210b-40: de la rma de dag gi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i rma ni kha dog gnag cing sngo ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-41: smug pa dang dmar ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-42: zho ga chu ltar snang ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-43: 'bras bkrus pa'i chu dang 'dra bar snang ba'i chu ser sla ba nyung shas shig 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-44: de bzhin du sha zad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:210b-45: shas cher zug cing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-0: steng na tsha ba tseg tseg byed @211a * //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-2: mkhris gyur myur rnags sel ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-3: sngo zhing ser skya'am kham par 'dug / gcin dang thal chu rgya skyegs khu //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-5: rma la thal sman btab ltar na //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-6: dmar zhing tsha la rnags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-8: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma ni myur du rnags shing na bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-9: kha dog ser po la sogs pa gang yang rung bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-10: chu ser gcin la sogs pa dang 'dra ba mang du 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-11: de bzhin du rma'i nang du thal sman gyi chu btab pa ltar tsha zhing na ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-12: shas cher dmar zhing tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-13: bad kan las gyur mdog skya g-ya' //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-14: chu ni ska ba mang du 'dzag //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-15: rma kha sbom zhing na ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-16: rtsa rgyus kyis khyab nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-18: bad kan las gyur pa'i rma ni mdog skya ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-19: rma kha sbom zhing mthug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-21: rtsa rgyus pa'i tshogs kyi dra bas khyab bar snang ba yin no /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-22: khrag gyur byi ru'i mdog ltar dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-23: khrag dang bcas pa'i rnag 'dzag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-24: rta bres kyi ni dri ltar bro //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-25: mkhris pa'i mtshan ma dag dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-27: khrag las gyur pa'i rma ni byi ru ltar dmar ba la sogs pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:211a-28: rta bres kyi gnas kyi dri bro zhing de dang mtshungs pa'i dri dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-29: de bzhin du mkhris pa'i mtshan ma ji skad bshad pa dag dang yang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-30: gnyis sam gsum mam thams cad las //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-31: gyur pa'i mtshan ma 'dren ma yin //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-33: nad gzhi gnyis gnyis sam gsum gsum mam ;
T13TD4312.3E:211a-34: khrag dang bcas pa thams cad las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni gang dang gang gi shas 'dres pa de dang de'i mtshan ma 'dren mar snang ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-36: rma kha smug cing 'brum phran can //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-37: mnyam pa dbus ma cung zad mtho //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-38: bla brnan med rma dag pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:211a-40: rma ma red cing skyon med pa'i mtshan ma ni lce'i mdog 'dra bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-42: mnyen zhing gyong bag med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-43: rma kha cung zad smug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-44: phyi rol na 'brum phran yod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211a-45: dbyibs mtho dman med cing mnyam pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-0: rma'i dbus yid @211b tsam mtho ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-1: bla brnan gyi bag med pa'i rma ni dag cing skyon med pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-2: pags pa sha dang rtsa rgyus dang //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-3: tshigs dang rus pa nang grol gnad //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-4: brgyad po der ni rma gnas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-5: phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-7: pags pa nas gnad kyi bar brgyad po ni rma'i gnas yin pa las /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-8: de dag phyi ma bzhin du gso dka' ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-9: de la pags pa'i rma bas ni sha la brten pa'i rma gso dka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-12: de bas ni tshigs nas ji srid gnad la gnas pa'i bar thams cad bas kyang gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-13: gso sla snying stobs me drod sha //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-14: na tshod nyams stobs ldan pa'i rma ;
T13TD4312.3E:211b-15: / zlum zhing dkyus ring rim gsum pa //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-16: zur bzhi pa ni gang yin dang //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-17: de bzhin dpyi rkub pho mtshan mchu //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-18: rgyab dang kha nang mkhur tshos 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-20: rma mi snying stobs dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-21: rus tshigs sha dang bcas pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:211b-22: nang gi me drod 'bar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-23: na tshod dar la bab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-24: nyams stobs dang ldan pa'i rma gang yin pa de ni gso bar sla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-25: de bzhin du rma'i dbyibs zlum pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-27: rim pa gsum yod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-28: zur bzhir gnas pa gang yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-29: de bzhin du gso sla ba'i rma ni dpyi dang rkub tshos dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-33: kha'i nang dang mkhur tshos su byung ba ni gso sla ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-34: gso dka' mig dang so dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-35: sna dang mig zur lte ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-36: srub mtshams lto ba rna ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-37: rtsib logs mchan khung nu mar byung //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-40: mig la sogs pa las byung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-42: zug rngur bcas shing stod nas 'dzag / mtshan bar rdol zhing kha nang bltas //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-43: de bzhin rked pa'i rus par gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:211b-45: yang rma gang lbu ba 'jag pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:211b-48: nang na zug rdu dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-49: stod kyi cha nas rnag 'dzag cing ljan ljin 'byung bar byed pa de yang gso dka' ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:211b-50: de bzhin du mtshan bar rdol la kha nang du bltas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212a-0: rked ba'i rus par gnas pa ni gso @212a * //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-2: mdze can dug gis phog pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-3: lus skem gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-4: rma steng rma ni byung ba gang //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-5: rma de gso bar dka' ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-7: mdze'i nad yod pa'i phyir mdze can no //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-8: dug gis phog pa ni dug gis nyen pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-9: lus skem pa ni zad byed kyi nad gcong chen pos btab pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-10: gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra bas btab pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad mdog sbrang rtsi 'dra bas btab pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:212a-11: de dag gi rma ni gso bar dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-12: de bzhin du rma'i steng du rma byung ba gang yin pa de yang gso bar dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-13: me dbal rims dang tshad par 'khru //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-14: lud pa lu dang skom dad che //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-15: gnyid med pa dang dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-16: me drod chung bar gyur pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-19: me dbal la sogs pa gnas me drod chung zhing smin mi shes pa'i rma ni 'tshobs shing 'drubs par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-20: mgo bo'i thod pa chag gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-21: klad rgyas mtshan ma snang de bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-23: mgo bo'i thod pa'i rus pa chag bar gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:212a-24: klad rgyas zhes bya ba klad pa'i mtshan ma snang bar gyur pa'i rma yang 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-25: chu ba rul zhing rtsa chad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-26: rma phugs ring dang srin bus zos /
T13TD4312.3E:212a-27: rus pa chag dang zug rngur bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-28: dug bcas pa dang ma rtogs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-29: bcing ba nyes dang snum ches dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-30: rtsub pas spu tshogs bdar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-31: bskyod dang khong ba ma dag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-32: 'grangs drags nyams dman drags ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-33: chang 'thungs nyin par gnyid log dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-34: nyal po la brten mtshan gnyid yar //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-35: rma ni log par gsos pa dag //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-38: rma gso bar bya ba yin yang chu ba rul ba gang yin pa de ni gsos kyang gso ba 'grub cing bde bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:212a-39: de bzhin du rtsa rnams chad par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212a-40: rma'i phugs shin tu gting ring bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212a-41: de bzhin du srin bus zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212a-42: rus pa dum bur chad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212a-43: nang na zug rngur bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212a-45: gang na yod pa ngos ma zin cing ma rtogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212a-46: bcing ba nyes par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-0: @212b rtsub ches pas spu la sogs pa bdar zhing reg pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-1: lus bskyod cing g-yeng ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-2: khong pa ma dag cing nang gi nang ma sbyangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-4: nyams dman pa'i smyung ba byas pa ha cang drags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-7: nyal po'i las 'khrig pa la brten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-8: de bzhin du mtshan mo gnyid yar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-9: gso ba log par byas pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-10: rgyu de dag gis ni rma gsor rung ba yin yang gso ba'i las 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes re re la sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-11: gang zhig nang ni thi ba'i mdog /'dra zhing rnags pa med pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-12: brtan zhing 'brum phran rnyid bcas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-15: rma gang zhig gi nang thi ba'i mdog 'dra bar snang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-16: nang na rnag dang ljan ljin med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-18: 'brum phran rnyid pa lta bu dang bcas pa'i rma de ni 'tshob cing 'drubs par 'gyur ba yin par shes bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-19: des na 'dir skrangs gnas skabs su //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-20: gang la nye ba de las sbyang //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-21: sbyangs bas skrangs bar gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-24: da ni 'di dag gi gso ba ston te /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-25: des na 'di la skrangs pa'i gnas skabs su ni /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-26: rma de dang gang dang nye ba'i steng ngam 'og nas sbyang ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-27: bkru sman dang skyug sman la sogs pas sbyang bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-28: de ltar sbyangs par gyur na skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-29: rma de myur du zhi zhing 'tshob bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-30: skrangs pa'i skabs su rgyun du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-31: nye bar spyod pa bsil bas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-32: de yis nad med chu lta bur //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-33: mod la zhi bar 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-35: rma de skrangs ba'i skabs su ni rtag bar rgyun du bsil bar bya ba'i gso ba'i cho gas nye bar gso bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:212b-36: gso ba'i cho ga byas ba des nad kyi tsha ba me lta bu me la chu blugs pa ltar mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-37: rma skrang sra bar gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-38: nad bcas mdog ni mi sdug dang //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-39: dug can la ni khyad par du //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-40: padma sogs shes khrag dbyung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:212b-42: rma skrang bar byed pa sra bar gyur pa rtsub cing nad dang bcas pa mdog mi sdug par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:213a-0: rma dug can la ni khyad par du srin bu pad @213a * //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-1: pa dang rngabs rva la sogs pas khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-2: nad khrag bral nas mod la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-3: skrang dang mdog dmar nad zhir 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-6: de dang bral nas ni mod la de nyid kyi tshe skrang pa la sogs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-7: khrag dbyung nas ni chung zad lus //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-8: reg na nus pa rab bsil ba //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-9: shin tu zhib par de nyid btags //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-10: bu ram shing khu 'o mas sprus //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-11: lan brgyar bskus pa'i mar dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-12: gzhan ma skam par yang dang yang //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-13: rjes su mthun par bskus na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-14: byug dang blugs pa de bzhin bya //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-17: de'i nad khrag cung zad lus par gyur pa la reg na bsil ba nus pa bsil ba'i sman zhib tu de'i nyin zhag nyid la btags sheng [?] sbyar gyi zhag lon pa ma yin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:213a-18: bu ram shing gi khu ba dang 'o mas sprus te lan brgyar bskus pa'i mar dang bcas par byas la ;
T13TD4312.3E:213a-19: sman sngar bskus te ma skam par yang dang yang du rjes su mthun par bsku bar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:213a-20: de bzhin du rig pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:213a-21: nus ba bsil sman gyi 'dag gus byug cing de'i chu blugs na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-22: au dum w'a ra n+ya gro dang //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-24: shun ba mar dang bcas bskus na //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-25: skrangs pa sel ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-27: au dum w'a ra la sogs pa'i shun pa btags pa'i mar dang bsres pas bskus na yang skrangs pa zhi bar byed pa'i dam pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-28: rlung shas che zhing mkhrang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-29: sra zhing nad tshabs che ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-30: khrag 'dzag ba dang rma skrang ba //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-31: 'di lta bu yi rma la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-32: rlan can sha btags la dugs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-34: rlung gi shas che ba'i rma mkhrang zhing mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:213a-35: sra ba la sogs pa'i rma 'di lta bu la ni rlan can gyi sha btags shing brdungs pa la sogs pas dugs byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-36: zar ma til ni brdos pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-37: 'o mas dbal ni bsad pa dag / de btags bskus na tsha na sel //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-39: zar ma dang til cha mnyam du brdos ba 'o mas dbal bsad de /
T13TD4312.3E:213a-40: 'o ma de nyid dang btags pa'i lde gus bskus na tsha ba dang na bsel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:213a-41: rma skrangs brtan zhing nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-0: bad kan rlung 'joms @213b snum bsku zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-1: de yi rjes la 'od ma yi //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-2: spu gus rim gyis dugs bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-3: zhu bar bya phyir lag mthil lam //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-4: mthe bo yis ni mnye bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-6: rma skrangs pa brtan zhing nad kyi shugs dal ba la ni bad kan dang rlung 'joms par byed pa'i snum gyis bsku zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:213b-7: de'i 'og tu 'od ma'i sbu gus mnye zhing dugs byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:213b-8: gzhan yang zhu bar bya ba'i phyir lag mthil lam mthe bos dal gyis mnye bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-9: nas dang gro dang mon sran sde'u //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-10: btsos te btags pa'i lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-12: yang na skrangs pa sra zhing nad tshabs chung ba la nas la sogs pa dang por btso bas sam brngo ba byas la de btags pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-13: gal te de yis ma zhum na //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-14: de nas de ni dkri bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-15: ma smin pa ni zhi 'gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-16: smin na rnags pa nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-18: de ltar byas su zin kyang skrangs pa de smin cing zhum par ma gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:213b-19: de'i 'og tu skrangs pa de dkri ba'i dugs kyis dkri bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-20: de ltar byas pas ma smin cing ma rnags pa'i skrangs pa ni zhi bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:213b-21: smin cing rnags pa ni legs par smin par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-22: rgya shug til dang zar ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-23: rgyam tsha phabs dang ru rta'i phye //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-24: zho skyur zan dron gyis glan zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-25: dugs byas nas ni dkri bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-27: rgya shug la sogs pa las byas pa'i zan dron 'jam tsam glan zhing dkri bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-28: legs smin skrangs pa phyogs gcig 'dus //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-29: btsir bas nye bar btsir gyur ba //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-30: dral bar 'os la dral bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-31: shin tu 'jam por gyur pa'ang dral //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-33: skrangs pa de smin cing rnags par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:213b-34: phyogs gcig tu 'dus shing bsgongs par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:213b-35: btsir ba'i sman gyis nye bar btsir zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:213b-36: bsdus par gyur nas dral bar 'os pa ni dral bar byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:213b-37: de bzhin du shin tu 'jam por gyur pa yang dral bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-38: gu gul zar ma ba langs so //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-39: khron bu phug ron rtug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-40: thal sman 'phrod dang thal sman de //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-41: smin pa'i sman gyis brtol bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:213b-43: gu gul la sogs pa'i sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:213b-44: thal sman gyi 'phrod kyi sman dang thal sman nyid de /
T13TD4312.3E:214a-0: de ltar smin pa'i sman dag gis kyang smin pa'i rnag de brtol bar @214a * //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-2: / nang na rnag 'byung sgo phra zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-3: mtho bar gyur dang gnad la gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-4: snum med btsir pa'i sman gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-5: kun nas rab tu btsir bar bya ;
T13TD4312.3E:214a-7: nang na rnag yod ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:214a-8: 'byung ba'i sgo phra zhing kha chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:214a-9: rma'i kha mtho bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:214a-10: gnad kyi gnas na gnas pa'i rma la ni btsir ba'i sman gyis thams cad nas btsir bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-11: bsku ba skams na btsir ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-12: las la btang snyoms nyid du bya //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-14: lde gu skams par gyur na ni btsir ba'i sbyor ba de btang snyoms nyid du bya zhing bshol bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-15: de yi rma sgor mi bsku ste //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-18: rma 'di'i rma kha'i steng du ni bsku bar mi bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:214a-19: de ltar byas na rnag ces bya ba'i nad de 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-20: sran ma nas dang gro dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-21: ma sha mud ga bra bo dang //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-22: sman ni spyi bag can dag gis //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-23: pags pa'i rtsa bar rab tu bsdams //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-25: sran ma la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:214a-26: sman spyi bag can de gu gul dang thang chu la sogs pa pags pa'i rtsa bar rma rab tu bsdams par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-27: gcin snyi mdze yi rma dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-28: shas cher red pa'i rma dag la //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-29: dong ga bye'u rug pa sogs kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-30: lan ni bdun bdun bkru sogs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-32: gcin snyi ba la sogs pa'i rma la byi'u rug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyis 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul lan bdun bdun bkru ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-33: ma dag nim pa pa to la'i //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-34: lo ma bskol bas bkru bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-36: rma ma dag pa la ni nim pa dang pa to la'i lo ma bskol ba'i chus bkru bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-37: rma dag pa la n+ya gro dha //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-38: la sogs shun lpags bskol bas bkru //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-40: rma dag par gyur pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:214a-41: n+ya gro dha la sogs pa'i shun lpags bskol ba'i khu bas bkru bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-42: shing mngar til dang pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-43: dur byid dan da ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-44: nim pa'i lo ma rgyam tshar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-45: lde gus bskus na rma sbyong byed //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-47: shing mngar la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang rma sbyong bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-48: rma ni kha phra gnad mtshams gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-49: dan da rgyam tsha langka li //
T13TD4312.3E:214a-50: dur byid sprang rtsir sbyar ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-0: @214b reng bur byas pas rma sbyang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-2: rma bug phra zhing kha chung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-3: gnad dang mtshams na 'dug pa la ni dan da la sogs pa'i sman reng bur byas pas sbyang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-4: rlung gis gnod cing khrag bcas shing //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-5: mi bzad na la nas dang gro //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-6: spra tshil shri beshta ka dang //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-7: thang shing mar bcas dud pas bdug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:214b-8: rma rlung gis shas cher gnod par gyur cing khrag dang bcas pa la sogs pa la ni nas la sogs pa'i dud pas bdug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-9: khrag mkhris dag gi shas che ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-10: shin tu bsil ba'i sman gyis bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-12: khrag la sogs pa'i shas che ba'i rma la ni shin tu bsil ba'i sman gyis yang nas yang du bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-13: skam zhing sha nyung gting ring rma //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-14: sha skyed pa yi sman bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-15: shug pa n+ya gro dha sogs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-16: ba la aa shva gan dha til //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-17: bskus te sha ni bskyed bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-19: rma skam zhing sha nyung ba dang zab cing gting ring ba la shug pa la sogs pa'i lde gu bsku bas sha cher bskyed par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-20: sha za'i sha ni cho ga bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-21: g-yos su byas te sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-22: sems dga' ba dang sha za yi //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-25: gzhan yang sha za ba'i srog chags seng ge dang stag dang bya rgod la sogs pa'i sha cho ga bzhin du legs par g-yos su byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:214b-26: sha skyed pa'i phyir sbyin par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:214b-27: gang gi phyir nad pa sems dga' zhing sred pa dang ldan pas sha za ba'i srog chags kyi sha zos na nad pa'i sha 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-28: sha snyi 'bur bar gyur pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-29: dz'a ti'i me tog nag tshur dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:214b-30: / ldong ros ba bla gu gul dang //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-31: tsi tra ka sogs lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-33: rma'i sha snyi zhing 'bur bar gyur pa la ni dz'a ti'i me tog la sogs pa dag gis bsku zhing sha bskyed par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-34: sha 'bur bar ni sra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-35: g-ya' zhing ring nas 'tsho ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-36: rma ni na zhing sbyang dka' la //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-37: thal sman las kyis sbyang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-39: rma sha 'bur ba la sogs ba la ni thal sman gyi las kyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-41: gang gzhan khrag ni 'byung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:214b-42: gang zhig bcad nas sbyar ba dag / ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-2: de ni me yi las kyis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-4: rma gang rde'u 'byung ba'i lam nas gcin 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:215a-5: rma gang rtag tu khrag 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:215a-6: rma gang zhig bcad nas sbyor ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:215a-7: rma gang ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga byas kyang 'tshob par ma gyur cing rma de gso ba'i las grub par ma gyur pa de la ni mes bsreg pa'i las kyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-8: skyon med rma la rma 'byor ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-9: sman dang sha skyed gang yin sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-11: rma skyon med cing dag par 'gyur ba la ni rma 'byor pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:215a-12: sha skyed pa'i sbyor ba bshad pa gang dag yin pa dag bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-13: aa shva gan dha seng phrom dang //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-14: shing mngar btsod dang kad pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-15: da ta ka yi me tog gi //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-16: phye mas rma 'tsho ba byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:215a-17: aa shva gan dha la sogs pa'i phye mas btab pa ni rma 'tshob par byed pa'i dam pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-18: rnag dang sha ni med pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-20: / til dang shing mngar bcas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-21: lde gus rma ni 'tshob par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-23: rma rnag dang sha med ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:215a-24: sha'i gnas ma sobs shing ma 'drubs pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:215a-25: til dang shing mngar sbyar ba'i lde gus bskus na 'tshob bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-26: snum dro mngar dang kha ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-27: bska bas [?] thams cad sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-29: snum pa nyid dang dro ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:215a-30: mngar ba la sogs pa'i lde gus ni nad thams cad las byung ba'i rma yang sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-31: nim pa'i lo ma sbrang rtsir bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-32: bskus pas rma sbyor mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-34: nim pa'i lo ma la sogs pa'i 'dag gus bskus na yang rma 'tshob ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-35: snga ma gnyis dang zhun mar sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-36: myur du rma 'tshob byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-38: snga ma nim pa'i lo ma dang sbrang rtsi gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.3E:215a-39: zhun mar dang sbyar bas kyang rma myur du 'tshob bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-40: til 'drar nas kyi lde gu ni ;
T13TD4312.3E:215a-43: slob dpon la la ni thang la 'bar gyis nas kyi lde gu dang til gyi lde gu 'dra bar 'dod do //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-44: til gyi lde gu ji ltar sbyar ba de bzhin du nas kyi lde gu yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-45: khrag mkhris dug dang glo bur dang //
T13TD4312.3E:215a-46: gting ring tsha dang bcas pa'i rma //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-1: bskol ba'i mar gyis rma 'tsho ba bya //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-3: rma gang khrag dang mkhris pa dang bcas pa la /
T13TD4312.3E:215b-4: 'o ma dang rma 'byor ba'i sman dang bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na rma 'tshob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-5: bad kan rlung gyur rma 'byor sman //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-8: bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i rma la ni rma 'byor par bshad pa'i sman dang til mar dang bcas pas rma 'tshob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-9: nag tshur seng phrom aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-10: li khri dngul rdo sra rtsi bog / spangs ma po son cha'i phye ma //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-11: til mar bcas pa rma 'tshob mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:215b-12: nag tshur la sogs pa'i phye ma til mar dang bcas pa bskus na yang rma 'tshob par byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-13: mnyam zhing sha ni brtan pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-14: pags par gnas la phye ma phan //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-16: rma mthon dman med par mnyam du gnas shing sha brten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:215b-17: pags pa tsam la gnas pa la rma 'tshob pa'i sman gyi phye mas bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-18: au dum w'a ra aa shvad tha //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-19: 'dzam bu seng phrom kad pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-20: ka ku seng phrom phye mas btab ;
T13TD4312.3E:215b-21: / pags pa myur du skyed bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-23: au dum w'a ra nas ka ku ba dang seng phrom kyi bar gyi phye mas btab na pags pa myur du skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-24: rgya skyegs ldong ros btsod dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-25: pa la dang ni ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-26: sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu yis //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-27: bskus na pags pa dag byed mchog //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-29: rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus pa ni pags bdag bar byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-30: skyer ba aa mra'i rus pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-31: n'a ga ge sar pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-32: tsandan ser po dngul chu rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-33: lde gu ba lang lci khu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-34: sbyar ba bskus par gyur na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-35: bags pa mdog 'drar byed mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-37: skyer ba la sogs pa'i lde gu ba lang gi lci ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te bskus na yang pags pa'i mdog cha 'dra bar byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-38: ba so dud ba ma shor bsregs //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-39: skyer khanda dang til mar sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-40: bskus na spu ni skyed bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:215b-42: glang po che'i so du bam shor bar bsregs ba dang skyer ba'i khanda dang /
T13TD4312.3E:216a-0: til mar sbyar ba'i lde gus bskus na rma las spu skyed par byed @216a * //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-2: de bzhin rkang bzhi'i sen mo spu //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-3: rus pa pags pa r'a [?] rmig bsregs //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-4: snag tsha til mar dang sbyar bas //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-5: bskus na spu ni skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-7: srog chags rkang bzhi pa'i sen mo la sogs pa bsregs te /
T13TD4312.3E:216a-8: til mar dang sbyar ba bskus na yang rma las spu skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-9: smin ma la ni cha spyad kyi //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-10: las bshad phan dang gnod pa bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-12: rma yod pa'i smin ma la ni cha spyad kyi le'u las bshad pa'i rma la phan pa dang gnod pa'i zas dag kyang bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-13: rlung gyur rma la rtsa ba lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-14: gnyis dang rlung 'joms sde tshan phan //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-16: rlung las gyur pa'i rma la ni rtsa ba bcu pa dang bi da ri la sogs pa sman gyi sde tshan phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-17: mkhris gyur shug pa n+ya gro dang //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-18: sde tshan gnyis dang mkhris 'joms gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-20: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma la ni shug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang /
T13TD4312.3E:216a-21: n+ya gro dha la sogs pa'i sde chan dang /
T13TD4312.3E:216a-22: de bzhin du mkhris pa sel pa'i sman rnams phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-23: bad kan las gyur dong ga'i sde //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-24: bad kan 'joms par byed pa gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-26: bad kan las gyur pa'i rma la ni dong ga la sogs pa'i sde chan dang /
T13TD4312.3E:216a-27: bad kan 'joms par byed pa'i sman gzhan dag kyang bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-30: ldan pa dang 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rma la ni sman gyi sde tshan 'dren ma phan te /
T13TD4312.3E:216a-31: bye'u rug pa la sogs pa dang gla sgang dang aarka la sogs pa'i sde tshan 'dren ma phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-32: 'di dag gis bkru byug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-33: sman mar til mar sman khu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-34: phye ma ril bu bdun po ni //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-35: rma la ci rigs sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-37: bshad ma thag pa'i rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan la phan par bshad pa'i sde tshan dag gis bkru ba dang byug pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bdun po de dag ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-38: dz'a ti nim pa ba to la'i lo ma //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-39: skyer pa yung ba thal tres bu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-40: spra tshil spangs ma shing mngar aa ru ra /
T13TD4312.3E:216a-41: karanydza yi sa bon btsod dang bcos //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-42: mar bskol 'dis ni rma kha chung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-43: gnad la brten cing rnag ni 'jag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:216a-44: rma yi phugs ring nad bcas phugs ring ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-0: rma ni dag cing @216b 'tshob bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-2: dz'a ti la [?] sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu ngang bskol ba'i sman mar gyis ni rma kha chung ba la sogs pa'i rma de dag cing 'tshob par byed pa yin no /
T13TD4312.3E:216b-3: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:216b-4: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga ba'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:216b-6: // / de nas 'phral du byung ba'i rma'i gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-7: rma gang snad pas 'phral du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-8: byung gyur blo bur rma zhes bya /
T13TD4312.3E:216b-9: de ni mtha' yas kyang yan lag / gnas pa rnam pa brgyad du bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-11: rma gang zhig snad pa las 'phral du byung bar gyur pa de ni glo bur ba'i rma zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-12: de ni mtha' yas pa yin du zin kyang yan lag la gnas pa'i dbang po dag gis rnam pa brgyad du bshad do /
T13TD4312.3E:216b-13: shus dang bcad dang rnam par bcad //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-14: rab tu 'phyang dang ltung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-15: phug dang gshags dang grugs ba'o [?] //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-17: brgyad po de dag kyang shus pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas brgyad du bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-18: de la shus pa chu ser ram //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-20: pags pa tshos pas tsha 'gyur yin //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-22: de la de dag gi nang nas shus pa ni bdar cing pags pa shus pa'i dbang gis chu ser ram khrag nyung shas zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:216b-23: pags pa tshos bas tsha bar 'gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-24: de la tshos gyur bcad pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-26: shus pa de las kyang rma nang du zhugs shing pags pa shas cher tshos par gyur pa ni bcad pa zhes bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:216b-27: de las kyang zab par gyur pa ni rnam par bcad pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-28: rab 'phyang rus par lhag ma lus //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-29: ltung ba lus las bogs pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-31: rab tu 'phyang ba ni rus par lhag ma tsam lus shing de dang 'brel pa las bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:216b-32: ltung ba ni gang yang lus las nyid lag la sogs pa'i chogs pogs [?] shing sa la lhags pa la ltung ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-33: zug rngu phra mo 'bigs pas phug //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-34: khong pa ma gtogs bsnun pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:216b-36: mtshon rtse mos phug pa gang yin pa de ni phug pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:217a-0: de yang khong pa ma gtogs pa gnas gzhan du @217a * //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-2: snga ma las gzhan gshags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-4: sngar bshad pa las gzhan pa ste mtshon kha zheng che bas bsnun pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:217a-5: khod par song ba la ni gshags pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-6: khrag dang rkang ni 'dres gyur par //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-7: mtshon gyis drag tu bsnun pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-8: rus bcas rgya cher snang grugs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-10: grugs pa ni mtshon gyis phog pa'i rgyu gang gis khrag dang rkang 'dres par gyur cing /
T13TD4312.3E:217a-11: rus pa dang bcas brgya cher snad par gyur ba ni grugs pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-12: de nas 'phral du byung ba'i rma //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-13: zug gzer shin tu che ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-14: shing mngar mar dang bskol ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-15: ba la'i til mar dro 'jam blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-17: 'phral du rna byung ba mi bzad par na ba la ni shing mngar bskol ba'i mar dro 'jam tsam 'phral du blugs par bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:217a-18: yang na ba la'i til mar dro 'jam tsam gyis blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-19: snad ba'i tsha bzhi bya'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-20: bsku ba la sogs snum pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-21: bsil dang mngar ba'i sman gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-22: de yi mod la blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-24: snad cing rma 'byung ba las gyur pa'i tsha ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsku ba la sogs pa bsil ba dang mngar ba'i sman dag gis bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-25: 'phral gyi rma ni rgya che la //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-26: sbyar ba'i phyir ni sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-27: mar gyis mchog tu bsku bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-28: mkhris 'joms bsil ba'i gso ba bya //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-30: 'phral du byung ba rma rgya cher gyur ba slar sbyar ba'i phyir ni sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar bas bskus na mchog tu phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-31: de bzhin du mkhris bsel ba'i gso ba bsil bdag gi bya ba yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-32: nad kyi rtsom pa che ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-33: steng dang 'og nas sbyang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-35: rma nad kyi rtsom pa che zhing shas cher zhugs pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:217a-36: steng dang 'og nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyang ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-37: smyung ba bya zhing 'bras chan sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-38: rgyun du gtar ga gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-40: yang na nad tshabs cher g-yo ba'i rma la ni smyung ba bya zhing zas bcad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:217a-41: 'bras chan nyung zhing sbyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:217a-42: rgyun du gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-43: shus dang grugs pa 'di nyid de //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-44: cho ga 'di ni lhag par sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:217a-45: de gnyis khrag ni nyung shas 'dzag //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-0: smin pa'ang myur @217b ba nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-2: shus pa dang grugs pa dag la ni bshad ma thag pa'i chog 'di dag lhag par sbyar bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:217b-4: shus pa dang grugs pa de gnyis ni khrag nyung shas 'dzag par byed pas na rgyu de'i phyir de gnyis ni myur du smin par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-5: phal cher rma ni shas cher 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-6: gzhan las khrag ni 'byung gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-7: de yis khrag ni zad gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-8: rlung 'khrugs nad ni bskyed pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-9: rlung 'joms sman dang bskol ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-10: snum blugs pa dang sman chu blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-11: dugs dang bsku dang dkri ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-12: snum gyi 'dzam rtsi rnams kyang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-14: phal cher rma tshabs po che byung ba la rma las gzhan pa'i phyogs nas khrag 'byung bar gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:217b-15: rgyu des khrag zad par gyur cing /
T13TD4312.3E:217b-16: zhes rlung shin tu 'khrugs te nad mi bzad ba bskyed par gyur pa la ni rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i snum blugs pa la sogs ba'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-17: de ltar zhag bdun par bshad pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-20: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis zhag bdun gyi bar du bya bar bshad pa'i 'phral du byung ba'i rma'i chog bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-21: zhag bdun nas ni shugs zad nas //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-22: sngar bshad pa yi cho gas spyad //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-24: rma sar pa'i shugs zad par gyur cing zhag bdun 'das pa'i 'og tu ni sngar bshad pa'i rma gso ba'i chog ji skad smos pas spyad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-25: 'di ni phal cher spyi'i cho ga //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-26: re re'i gso ba bshad bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-28: shus pa la sogs pa'i rma gsar pa la /
T13TD4312.3E:217b-29: 'di dag ni spyi'i cho ga tsam du bshad pa yin zhing thun mong gi gso bar bstan pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:217b-30: de rnams kyi re re'i gso ba ni da gzod bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-31: shus lan pa myur bsal phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-32: rma la phan pa'i phye mas gdab /
T13TD4312.3E:217b-33: bcad pa rma sel lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-35: shus pa'i rma la ni nad de myur du bsal ba'i phyir /
T13TD4312.3E:217b-36: rma la phan ba'i phyam gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-37: bcad pa'i rma la ni rma la phan pa'i sman gyi lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-38: rnam par bcad dad rab 'phyang la //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-39: cho ga bzhin du btsem pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:217b-40: bcing ba dang ni btsir bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-1: bcad ba dang rab tu 'phyang ba'i rma la ni sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin du btsem par bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:218a-2: de bzhin du bcing ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:218a-3: btsir ba'i sbyor ba dag bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-4: mig bcar na ni gsor mi rung //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-6: mig gi 'bras bu bcar zhing nyams par gyur ba de gsor mi rung ngo ;
T13TD4312.3E:218a-7: / ma zhar phyir ni 'phyang ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-8: rang gi gnas su legs bzhag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-11: lag pas dal gyis mnan par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-13: mig gang zhar bar ma gyur la gnas las 'phags te phyir 'phyang bar gyur ba de ni rang gi gnas su legs par ma 'chug par bzhag ste rtsab ma 'chol bar byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:218a-14: sman bas snrel zhir ma gyur par gzhag la /
T13TD4312.3E:218a-15: de'i 'og tu padma'i 'dab mas g-yogs la /
T13TD4312.3E:218a-16: de'i steng nas sman ba'i lag pas dal gyis mnan bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-17: de nas shing mngar dzi baka / zangs rtsib dang autpal //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-18: mar dang 'o ma bcas bskol ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-19: sman thigs blugs dang sna sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-20: brta ba'i chog dag kyang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-21: mig nad thams cad sel mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-23: de'i 'og tu mig de la shing mngar la sogs ba'i lde gu dang mar dang 'o mar bcas pa bskol ba'i sna sman la sogs pa bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:218a-24: gang gi phyir de ni mig snad [?] pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-25: mig phugs zhugs la mgul pa bsdam //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-26: slon dang lud ba sbrid pa 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-27: yang na dbugs 'byung dbugs brngub bsdam //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-28: rma byung mig gi gso ba bya //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-30: mig phugs su zhugs shing gting du bros pa la ni mgul pa bsdam par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:218a-31: slon zhing skyugs pa dang lud pa dang sbrid pa 'byung bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:218a-33: brngub pa dang bsdam par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:218a-34: de bzhin du rma byung ba'i mig gi gso ba ji skad bshad pa dag bya'o ;
T13TD4312.3E:218a-35: / rna ba pogs pa btsems nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-36: bu ga til mar dag gis dgang //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-38: rnab gnas las bogs pa la ni de la legs par btsems la rna ba'i bu ga til mar gyis dgang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-39: ltag pa'i sum mdo chod gyur te //
T13TD4312.3E:218a-40: rlung ni 'byung bar gyur pa la'ang //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-0: mnyam @218b dug zhag ste bar mtshams ni //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-1: med par btsems te bcing par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-3: ltag pa'i sum mdo chod par gyur te rlung byung bar gyur na yang ltag pa de ltar mnyam por gzhag ste /
T13TD4312.3E:218b-4: legs par btsems la de'i 'og tu ci rigs pa'i bcing bas bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-5: de lang [?] yi mar sar gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-6: blugs pa dag ni rab tu bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-8: de ltar bcings pa'i ltag ba de la ra'i mar sar blugs pa dag phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-9: gan rkyal bzhag ste kha zas sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-10: legs par spyod lam bsdams te nyal //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-12: ltag pa chod de bcings pa de ni kha zas kyang gan rkyal du bzhag ste zar gzhug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:218b-13: de bzhin du nyal ba na yang rma la mi gnod par nyal du gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-14: yan lag thad kar gnas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-15: rma byung yan lag legs gzhag ste //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-16: btsems la dkri zhing bcing bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-17: gos ni mthug pos bcing bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-19: lag ngar dang byin pa dag tu thad kar gnas pa'i rma byung ba la ni yan lag legs par gzhag ste /
T13TD4312.3E:218b-21: de'i 'og tu chings mas dkri zhing gos mthug pos bcing bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-22: pags pa'i 'ur mthil bcing bas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-23: phrag ba'i rma la bcing bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-25: phrag pa rma byung ba la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:218b-26: pags pa las 'ur mthil lta bus bcing bar bya'o /
T13TD4312.3E:218b-27: rlig pa 'phyang la rkang par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-28: spu gus chu ni gtor nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-29: rlig pa bcug ste ras bal dang //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-30: bcas pa'i khab kyis btsem par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-31: 'ur mthil bcings ba byas pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-32: rked pa nas ni srad bus gdags //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-34: rlig pa 'phyang bar gyur pa la ni rkang pa chu'i nang du bcug cing mig chus gtor la /
T13TD4312.3E:218b-35: rlig bslar bcug ste ras bal gyi skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab kyis btsem par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-37: mdo'i gnas las smos pa'i 'ur mthil 'dra ba'i bcing bas bcings la rked pa nas chings ma'i srad bus brtod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-38: der ni rma ni 'drul gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-39: snum dang dugs kyi las mi bya //
T13TD4312.3E:218b-41: rlig pa 'phyang ba'i rma de la ni snum dang dugs kyi cho ga byar mi rung ste /
T13TD4312.3E:218b-42: rma 'drul bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-2: sug smel dz'a ti bar ba ta //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-3: dan da ldong ros skyer ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-4: sle tres dang ni spangs ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-5: til mar bskol bas rma 'tshob byed //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-7: pri yang ku la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i til mar gyis ni rlig pa 'byung ba'i rma 'tshob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-8: pri yang ku ni ka ra nu par te /
T13TD4312.3E:219a-9: la la ni 'dir pri yang ku ma yin gyi thal tres nag po kri sna sha rib zhes bya ba yin zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-10: yan lag ma lus chad pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-11: til mar bskol bas bsregs nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-12: sgye'u bcing bas bcing bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-13: de nas rma ltar gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-15: lag dar ram byin pa lhag ma ma lus par 'ur por chad pa la ni til mar bskol ba'i nang du bsregs la sngar bshad pa'i sgye'u bcing ba'i nang du bcings te /
T13TD4312.3E:219a-16: de'i 'og tu rma gso ba'i cho gas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-17: phug pa zug rngu dbyung bas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-18: grugs dang chag grugs gso par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-20: phug pa'i rma ni zug rngu dbyung ba'i gso ba ji skad sngar mdo'i gnas su bshad pa bzhin gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-21: grugs pa ni chag grugs gso ba'i le'u las ji skad smos pa ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-22: mgo bo'i zug rdu dbyung ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-23: skra yi ye'u gzhug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-24: gzhan du glang rgyas 'dzag pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-27: mgo bo'i zug rdu dbyung ba la ni skra'i ye'u gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-28: gzhan du de ltar ma byas na /
T13TD4312.3E:219a-29: glad rgyas zhes bya ba 'dzag par 'gyur ba las rlung 'khrugs te nad pa de gsod par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-30: rma 'tshobs [?] nas ni rim gyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-31: skra ni dal gyis dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-33: rma de 'tshobs [?] nas ni skra de re re nas rim gyis dal gyis dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-34: glad rgyas 'dzag la srog chags ni //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-35: gzhan gyi glad pa sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-37: glad rgyas 'dzag par gyur na srog chags gzhan dag gi glad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:219a-38: mgo bor bcas pa sbyin par [?] bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-39: gzhan las zug rngu phyung nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-40: rma der ring bu snum can gzhug //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-42: yan lag gzhan dag las zug rdu phyung nas ni rma de la reng bu ye'u snum can gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:219a-43: phugs ring kha ni chung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-0: rma @219b gang rnag dang khrag 'dzag la //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-1: 'khor los btsir ba'i til mar blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-2: de ni spu gu chung dus gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-3: zhes bya ba la rma gang phugs ring zhing gting du zabs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:219b-4: rma kha chung zhing phra ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:219b-5: rnag dang khrag 'dzag par gyur ba la 'khor los btsir ba'i til mar sar ba blugs shing de sbu gu chung du las nang du gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-6: khong ba brtol te khrag gis gang //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-7: brgyal zhing snying ga rtsib logs na //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-8: rims 'debs lus tsha lto sbos skom //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-9: zas la mngon par mi dga' zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-11: mig dmar rdul 'byung dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-12: kha nang khrag gi dri bro zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-13: lus kyang dri mi zhim par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-15: khong ba'i nang grol brtol te /
T13TD4312.3E:219b-16: khrag gis gang na ni khrag skyugs pa la sogs par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:219b-17: mi zhim pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-18: ma zhu'i gnas na gnas pa'i khrag / khrag tu yang ni skyug par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-19: shin tu shas cher lto sbo zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-20: gzer nad kyis kyang gnod par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-22: khrag de ma zhu ba'i gnas na 'dug na ni khrag skyugs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-23: zhu ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i khrag / gzer bcas lus ni lci bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-24: lto ba man chad grang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-27: khrag de zhu ba'i gnas na 'dug na ni gzer ba dang bcas shing lus lci ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-28: gnas ni zhig par ma gyur kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-29: khrag ni 'dzag par gyur ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-33: gnas zhes bya ba khong pa'i nang grol zhig par ma gyur kyang khrag 'dzag par gyur pas ngos kyi bu gnas lto ba'i snod 'gengs par byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:219b-34: dper na gcin 'dzag pa yang lgang pa'i ngos kyi bu gnas zhugs pas nang du 'gengs par byed pa dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-35: khrag nang yod pa de la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-36: rkang lag kha dang dbugs grang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-37: mig dmar gdong ni skya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-38: lto sbo ba ni spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:219b-40: de la nang grol rdol zhing nang na khrag yod pa de ni rkang pa dang lag pa dang kha dang dbugs grang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:219b-41: mig dmar ba la sogs pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:220a-1: gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-2: ma zhur gnas la skyug sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-4: ma zhu ba'i gnas na khrag yod pa'i mi la ni skyug sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-5: zhu ba'i gnas la gnas pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-6: bkru sman dang ni ni ru ha //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-7: snum med dro bas sbyang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-9: zhu ba'i gnas la khrag gnas pa la ni bkru sman dang ni ru ha snum med pa dang dro ba btang la sbyang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-10: nas dang rgya shug rgya sran gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-11: khu ba snum ni med pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-12: nas thug kha zas za ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-13: lce myad [?] tsha dang ldan pa sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-15: de ltar sbyangs ba byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:220a-16: nas la sogs pa'i kha zas snum med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:220a-17: nas thug la sogs pa lce myang tsha dang ldan ba sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-18: khrag ni mang du 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-19: khong pa snad la khrag blud bya //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-21: khrag mang du 'jag cing khod pa snad cing 'khrugs pa la ni gzhan dag gi khrag blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-22: rgyu ma 'byar dang chad par nyan //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-23: khang pa sud pa gnyis su bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-25: khong pa snad cing rdol ba ni rgyu ma 'byar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:220a-26: rgyu ma chad pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis su bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-27: dang por brgyal sogs chung ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-28: gnyis pa shas cher gnod par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-30: dang po rgyu ma 'byar ba ni brgyal ba la sogs pa'i gnod ba chung pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:220a-31: gnyis pa rgyu ma chad pa ni shin tu gnod pa skyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-32: rgyu ma 'byar ba the tshom bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-35: rgyu ma rdol cing 'byar ba ni 'tsho 'am mi 'tsho the tshom dang bcas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:220a-36: rgyu mchad pa ni nges par 'chib yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-37: gang gi bshad dang gci dang 'phyen //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-38: rang gi lam nas byung gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-39: bla brnan med par rdol gyur kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-42: gang gi nang grol rdol yang bshad pa la sogs pa rang gi rgyu lam nas lugs bzhin du 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:220a-43: bla brnan gyi nad med pa dag ni rdol ba yin du zin kyang nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-44: ma rdol rgyu ma 'byung ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-45: gzhug par bya zhing gzhan du min //
T13TD4312.3E:220a-47: rgyu ma ma rdol zhing 'phral du byung ba ni slar bcug na 'tsho'i /
T13TD4312.3E:220b-0: de las gzhan du chad par @220b gyur pa ni slar bcug kyang mi 'cho'o //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-1: grog ma'i mgo bo bcad nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-2: de yang gzhug ces la la smra //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-4: slob dpon la la dag ni rgyu ma rdol ba yin du zin kyang grog ma'i mgo bos kha bkab la slar gzhug par bya'o zhes zer ro //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-5: rdul dang khrag dang rtsa yis gos /
T13TD4312.3E:220b-6: 'o mas legs par bkrus nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-7: sen mo bregs te mar gyis bskus //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-8: rim gyis legs par gzhug bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-10: rgyu ma gsar du phyir byung ba de rdul dang khrag la sogs pas gos pa'o mas bkru la /
T13TD4312.3E:220b-11: mar gyis bskus te sen mo bregs pa'i lag pas rim gyis dal bus gzhug par bya'o /
T13TD4312.3E:220b-12: skam po'o mas spangs nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-13: mar sar mang po bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-15: rgyu ma skam po ni 'o mas spangs la bkrus te mar sar pa mang pos bskus la gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-16: sor mos mgul ba mnye ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-17: chu yis kyang ni gtor bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-18: de ltar rgyu ma nang zhugs nas //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-19: de yi chen btsir par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-21: rgyu ma byung bar gyur ba la sor mos mgul ba mnyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:220b-22: chus gtor nas spangs par byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:220b-23: de ltar rgyu ma de nang du gzhug par byas la de nas dus gzhan du rgyu ma de btsir bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-24: rma kha chung dang sbom pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-25: rgyu ma khong par ma tshud na //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-26: de yi tshad tsam lto ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-27: dbral te nang du gzhug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-29: rma kha shin tu chung ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:220b-30: rgyu ma sbom pa'i rgyus nang du ma tshud na /
T13TD4312.3E:220b-31: rgyu ma'i tshad tsam lto ba dbral te rgyu ma nang du gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-32: gnas su legs par 'dug gyur nas //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-33: de rjes rgyu ma'i rma btsem bya //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-35: rgyu ma gnas sum 'phyugs par tshud na ni de'i 'og tu rma legs par btsem par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-36: gnas su legs par ma bzhag na //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-39: rgyu ma de gnas las 'phyugs na ni skyis bu de 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-40: de rjes ras kyis dkris nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-41: mar gyis bsku zhing blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-43: de'i 'og tu rma de ras kyis dkris la /
T13TD4312.3E:220b-44: mar bsku zhing blugs par bya'o /
T13TD4312.3E:220b-45: de nas dan da [?] til mar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:220b-47: des ni bshad pa snyi ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-3: de'i 'og tu bshad ba 'jam par bya zhing rlung bde bar 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir dan da til mar dang sbyar ba'i 'o ma dro 'jam tsam blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-4: ji skad bshad pa'i spyod ba bsrung //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-5: lo gcig bar du 'bad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-7: de ltar byas nas cha spyad kyi lam nas bshad pa'i spyod pa lo gcig gi bar du bsrung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-8: lto las tshil ni byung gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-10: ro bska ba yi rtsa bdag / zhib tu btags pas btab nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-11: de nas srad bus dam du bcing //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-12: sman pa mkhas bas gcad bar bya /
T13TD4312.3E:221a-13: mtshon rnon me la bsregs pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-14: lan cig kho nar gcad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-16: tshil gyi dum bu lto las byung bar gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:221a-17: thal ba'am sa'am ro bska ba'i tsa ba zhib tu btags pas btab la /
T13TD4312.3E:221a-18: de'i 'og tu srad bu dam po kho nar bcings te /
T13TD4312.3E:221a-19: sman ba mkhas bas gcad par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:221a-20: de yang mtshon rnon po mes bsregs bas lan cig kho nar gcad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-21: gzhan du byas nas gcod pa'i tshe //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-24: rnam pa gzhan du byas nas gcod pa'i tshe na zhing sbo ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:221a-26: / sbrang rtsir bcas pas rma bcings la //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-27: kha zas zhu nas 'o ma mar //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-28: dan ti rgya skyegs gze ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-29: shing mngar kha ra bskol ba blud //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-30: shing mngar bcas pa sngar gyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-33: rma de sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa'i chings mas bcings la ;
T13TD4312.3E:221a-34: kha zas zhu bar gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:221a-36: shing mngar dang mar bskol ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:221a-37: shing mngar dang 'om bskol ba blud bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:221a-38: de gnyis kyang na ba dang tsha bsel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-39: de'i 'og tu ni snga ma'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-40: tshil gyi rmen bur bshad pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-41: til mar bskus na'ang phan pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-43: de la tshil byung ba'i rma la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:221a-44: tshil gyi rmen bu'i nad gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i til mar bskus na yang phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-45: bal bu'i lo ma shug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-46: spang spos ha re nu ka dang //
T13TD4312.3E:221a-47: aa ka ru dang tsandan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-0: padma'i @221b sa bon ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-1: au shir dang shing mngar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-2: bskol ba 'phral gyi rma la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-3: 'tsho bar byed pa'i dam bar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-5: bal bu'i lo ma la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:221b-6: til mar bskol ba yang 'phral du rma byung ba 'tsho bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-7: mtshon gyis bsnun bas mi mngon pa //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-8: g-yang sa mthon po nas ltung ba //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-10: mnye dang bsku dang sbyang ba bya //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-12: skyes bu mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i rma mi mngon bar gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:221b-13: de bzhin du g-yang sa mthon po nas ltung bar gyur pa la ni rlung dang mkhris pa 'joms pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:221b-14: 'grangs pa la sogs pa sbyang ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-15: lus tshigs bye dang mnyes pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-16: gnad du bsnun bas nyen ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-17: snod chen til mar gyis bkang bar //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-18: gzhug cing sha khu sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-20: mi gang lus kyi tshigs bye bar gyur pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:221b-22: gnad du bsnun pas nyen ba la ni gzhong pa la sogs ba'i snod chen po til mar gyis bkang ba'i nang du lus sbying zhing sha khu sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-23: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel ba tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:221b-24: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges bar sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:221b-25: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:221b-27: // / de nas chag grugs gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-28: ltung dang snad sogs kyis rus tshigs //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-29: tshigs dang tshigs min chag gyur gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-31: rus pa chag pa'i dbye ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T13TD4312.3E:221b-32: yar na lhung ba la sogs pa'i rgyu las tshigs byung zhing chag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:221b-33: tshigs ma yin par chags pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-34: tshigs byung gyur na brkyang dang bskum //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-35: nus ba med pa nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-37: gang gi tshe tshigs byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni tshigs de'i phyogs su brkyang pa dang bskum ba mi nus par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-38: gzhan dag shin tu skrangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-39: gnas skabs kun tu rab tu na //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-40: bskyod pa chung du'ang mi nus shing //
T13TD4312.3E:221b-41: btsir na sgra dang bcas ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-0: tshigs su chag pa ma yin pa dag zhi shas cher skrangs pa @222a * //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-1: gnas skabs thams cad du yang mi bzad par nab dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-2: bsgul [?] bskyod kyi rtsol ba chung du yang mi nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-3: btsir na 'khor zhing sgra dang bcas pa yin no /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-4: de ltar chag grugs mdor bsdus pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-7: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis na chags grugs kyi mtshan nyid mdor bsdus nas bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-9: chag ba'i dbye bas du mar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-11: de'i mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba ni chag pa'i tshul rnam pa du mar 'gyur ba yin no /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-12: de dag kun gyi gos ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-13: ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-14: de bzhin de ni nye bar bstan //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-16: chag grugs de thams cad kyi gso ba gang la ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-17: mang du phra mor chag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-18: reg na sgra na'i 'khrol ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-19: gang du rus pa chag pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-20: bar du rus pa phra mo zhugs //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-21: yang na snad pas chag pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-22: cung zad lus par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-23: gang yang bteg pa'i tshe na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-24: rma ltar rkang du nub pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-25: nus zhan sbeg par gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-26: rlung can nyung zad spang bar bya /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-28: gang yang rus pa phra mor mang du chag cing grugs par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-30: gang du rus pags shing chag pa'i nang dam /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-31: bar du rus pa phra mo zhugs par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-32: yang gang zhig snad nas chag pa las ma chag par cung zad lus par gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-33: yang na gang zhig gyen du bteg cing drangs pa'i tshem ltar rkang gi nang du rus pa nub par gyur pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-34: lnga po de dag ni gso bar dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-35: de bzhin du nus pa zhan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-37: rlung nad kyi shas che ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-38: zas nyung shas shig zab dag gis rus pa chag grugs su gyur pa gang yin pa de yang gso bar dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-39: dbyi yi rus mig chag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-40: gang yang tshigs bye ltung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-41: ro smad zhib tu grugs pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-42: chag par gyur pa gang yin dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-43: thod pa'i mtshams ni ma 'byor ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:222a-44: de bzhin dpral ba phye mar gyur /
T13TD4312.3E:222a-45: gang yang mur 'gram chag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-0: @222b ltag pa nu ma'i bar chag spang //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-2: dpyi'i rus mig chag par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222b-3: gang tshigs las bye zhing 'phos te lhung bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222b-4: ro smad shin tu phye mar btags pa ltar grugs pa'am chag pa gang yin pa de spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-5: de bzhin du thod pa'i mtshams 'byor bar ma gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:222b-6: de bzhin du de phye mar gyur pa gang yin pa 'ang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-7: yang mur 'gram chag par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222b-8: mgo bo'i ltag pa dang nu ma'i bar du chag cing grugs pa gang yin pa de yang gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-9: rus pa legs par chag gyur kyang /
T13TD4312.3E:222b-10: bzhag nyes bcing ni nyes pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-11: gang zhig bskyod pas gnod gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-12: de yang spang bar bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-13: gdod nas rus pa'i tshigs dag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-14: nyes par skyes gyur de yang spang //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-16: rus pa chag pa gso bla ba yin yang bzhag nyes pa la sogs pa'i rgyus gnod par gyur cing ma rungs par gyur pa'i chag grugs de yang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-17: gzhan yang rus pa gang dang po nyid nas skye ma legs shing nyes par skyes pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:222b-18: yang na tshigs gang gdod ma nas nyes par skyes pa de yang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-19: rus pa gzhon nu gug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-20: sbubs can chag par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-22: gzhan yang mang du gas pa rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-24: rus pa gzhon zhing snyi ba gug cing yon por gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222b-25: yang sbubs can khong stong gi rus pa chag par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222b-26: gang yang thod pa lta bus rus pa kor kor por 'dug pa gyes shing dum bur gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:222b-27: gzhan yang rus pa gzhan dag kyang mang dugs shing zhigs par gyur pa gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-28: de nas dma' ba bstod par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-29: mthon po mnan par bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-30: nang du nub pa drang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-31: 'og tu song ba steng du drang //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-33: de nas rus pa dma' par gyur pa la bstod cing 'degs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-34: 'on te snga ma'i so las mthon por gyur pa ni mnan cing btsir bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-35: nang du nub pa ni phyir drang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-36: 'og tu song ba'i rus pa ni steng du drang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:222b-37: 'degs dang mnan dang smad ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-0: pags pa bsdus te bcing ba @223a * //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-2: de ltar bzhag pa'i thabs kyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-3: lus su gtogs pa'i tshigs thams cad //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-4: g-yo ba'am mi g-yo gang yang rung //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-5: legs par bzhag ste mi 'gyur bya //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-6: ras ma mar ni mangs bas dkri //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-7: au dum w'a ra ka dam'a //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-9: sa dza dang ni pa la sha //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-10: 'od ma las byung shun shun zheng che //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-12: rten dang bcas shing mi 'gyur ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-13: shun pa 'am dum bu dag dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-14: 'jag mas legs par dkri bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-15: ras kyis steng du glan par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-17: 'degs pa la sogs ba rus pa mnyam du 'jog pa'i thabs kyis lus su gtogs pa'i tshigs g-yo ba'am mi g-yo ba'i tshigs dang /
T13TD4312.3E:223a-18: chag grugs thams cad legs par bzhag ste mi 'gyur bar byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:223a-19: de'i 'og tu ras mar mang po dang bcas pas dkris la /
T13TD4312.3E:223a-20: de'i 'og tu au dum w'ar la sogs ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:223a-21: 'od ma las byung ba'i shing shun zheng che zhing 'jam pa legs par 'jar brten dang bcas pa mi 'gyur ba dag gi glan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:223a-22: 'jag ma ras mas dkris pa'i steng du dkri bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-23: bcing ba lhod par gyur pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-24: mtshams sbyor brtan por mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-25: dam pos shin tu na zhing tsha rnag dang skrang pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-27: gang gi phyir bcing bde lhod par gyur na ni rus pa'i mtshams 'byor pa brtan por mi 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:223a-29: gal te bcing ba dam drags na ni na ba dang cha ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-30: so ga'i dus su zhag gsum gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-31: dgun gyi dus su bdun nas dgrol //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-32: thun mong dus su zhag lda nas //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-33: yang na chag ba'i dbang las dgrol //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-35: chag grugs bcings pa ni sog tsha ba'i dus su zhag gsum gsum nas dgrol zhing bcos bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-36: dgun stod dang dgun smad grang ba'i dus su ni zhag bdun bdun nas dgrol zhing bcos par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-37: thun mong ge dus te dro grang gi dus ran pa ston dang dpyid kyi dus su zhag lnga lnga nas bcos par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223a-38: yang na chag grugs sam nad tshabs che chung gi dbang du byas nas chings ma bkrol zhing bcos par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-0: de nas n+ya @223b grodha sogs pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-1: khu ba bsil ba'i chu blugs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-3: de'i 'og tu tshigs chag par gyur bde n+ya grodha la sogs pa'i khu ba bsil ba'i sman chu blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-4: de ni nad bcas rtsa ba lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-7: chag grugs bcings bas de nad dang bcas par gyur na ni rtsa ba lda bar 'o ma bskol ba blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-8: mkhas pas til mar 'khor los btsir //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-9: rlung 'joms sman dang bcas ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-10: dro 'jam cam ni bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-11: dus dang yul gyi dbye bas bya //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-13: 'khor los btsir ba'i til mar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:223b-14: rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang bcas pa bskol ba'i til ma dro 'jam tsam dag kyang dus la sogs pa'i dbye ba las dpags te sman pa mkhas bas gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-15: khu ba shin tu grang mo ni //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-16: rgyun du blugs shing lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-18: gzhan yang lde gus bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:223b-19: sman chu blugs bdag kyang rgyun du bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-20: bags ra 'o ma rang dang bcas /
T13TD4312.3E:223b-21: mngar ba'i sman dang bskol bdag / rgya skyegs khu bar bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-22: chag grugs can la nang re blud //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-24: ba gsar ba ni lan cig be'u bcas ba'i bste /
T13TD4312.3E:223b-27: mngar ba'i sman dang bskol brgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang bcas pa grang mo dag chag grugs can gyi nad pa la nang re blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-28: chag grugs rma dang bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-29: rma la shing mngar mar shas che //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-30: lde gus bsku ba'am yang na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-31: lhag ma chag grugs lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-33: chag grugs rma byung ba dang bcas pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:223b-34: rma sman gyi khu ba shing mngar dang mar gyi shas che ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-35: gso ba gzhan dag ni chag grugs gso ba dar mthun par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-36: rma yi sha ni 'phyang ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-37: sbrang rtsi mar gyis bskus nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-38: sman pas rma ni kha sbyar nas //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-39: bcing ba dag kyang legs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:223b-41: rma'i sha chad de 'phyang ba la ni sbrang rtsi dang mar sar sbyar bas bskus la /
T13TD4312.3E:223b-42: de'i 'og tu sman pas kha legs par sbyar nas bcing blta 'cham pa dag gis kyang legs par bcing par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-2: pri yang ku dang ka phal //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-3: sang phrom btsod dang da ta ki'i //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-4: phye mas legs par gdab bya'am //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-6: rma de mnyam zhing legs par gnas par gyur bar shes nas gandha pri yang ku la sogs pa'i phye mas legs par gdab par bya'o /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-7: seng phrom da ta ki'i phye ma //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-10: yan na da ta ki ngan seng phrom gnyis kyi phye ma rma la gdab par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-11: sbyar ba de dag gis ni rma myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-12: de ltar chag grugs gso ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-14: de ltar bshad ma thag ba'i rnam bas chag grugs gso zhing bcos par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-15: lus zungs brtan la dgun gyi tshe /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-16: sha chen nad gzhi chung ba'i rma //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-17: gso sla gzhan ni gso bar dka' //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-19: skyes bu lus zungs brtan pa la sogs pa'i rgyus ni rma gso bar sla ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-20: de las go bzlog pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-21: lus zungs mi brtan zhing sbeg pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-22: so gal sogs pa'i che dang /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-24: nad gzhi shas che ba'i rma ni gso bar dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-25: na tshod dang po bar ma mtha' //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-26: zla gcig gnyis dang gsum rim gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-27: cho ga ji skad bshad bsten na //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-30: na chod dang po dang bar ma dang tham sta byis pa dang lang tshol bab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-31: rgan por gyur pa ni go rims bzhin du zla ba gcig dang zla ba gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-32: zla ba gsum gyis rma 'byor pa brtan bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-33: des na byis ba dag ni zla ba gcig gis so //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-34: dar la bab pa dag gis ni zla ba gnyis so //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-35: rgan po dag ni zla ba gsum gyis rma 'byor pa brtan par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-36: de yang ji skad bshad pa'i rmag so ba'i cho ga'i 'byor pa bsten na /
T13TD4312.3E:224a-37: de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-38: rked ba rje ngar brla chag na //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-39: spang leb la ni nyal na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-40: de bzhin bsdom phyir phur bu lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-41: byas nas nya bar brtod bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-42: rje ngar ngos gnyis la gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:224a-43: rkang mthil drang por gcig gzhag brtod //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-0: rked pa la sogs pa chag pa la spang leb ngos 'jam pa'i steng du nyal @224b na phan la /
T13TD4312.3E:224b-1: de bzhin du lus ma 'chol bar bsdam pa'i phyir phur pa lnga la brtod par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:224b-2: de yang rje dar gyi ngos gnyis la phur pa gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.3E:224b-3: rkang mthil gyi drang por phur pa gcig btsugs te brtod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-4: sta zur ram ni sgal tshigs sam //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-5: gdong dar de bzhin phrag pa rus //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-6: tshigs byung chag grugs byung gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-7: cho ga 'di bzhin spyad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-9: sta zur la sogs pa'i tshigs byung zhing chag grugs su gyur pa la yang bshad ma thag ba'i chog 'di bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:224b-10: de rnams la yang spang leb la nyal ba la sogs ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-11: tshigs ni byung nas yun ring la //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-12: snum bsku dugs kyis mnyen byas te //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-13: 'di bshad thabs dang rang gi blos //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-14: rang gi gnas su legs par gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:224b-15: tshigs byung nas yun ring po lon pa la ni snum dang dugs la sogs pa'i snum gyis zhen cing mnyen par byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:224b-16: brtan bar gyur nas 'degs pa dang mnan ba la sogs pa'i cho ga ji skad bshad pa'i thabs dang /
T13TD4312.3E:224b-17: rang gi blos kyang ci rigs par rjes su dpags te rang gi gnas su legs par gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-18: tshigs min chag ste 'drubs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-19: bcing nyes pa yin gsos pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-20: brdungs te chag grugs bsrang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-21: de nas chag grugs bzhin du gso //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-23: tshigs ma yin pa'i lus kyi phyogs su chag ste rma 'drubs par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:224b-24: de bzhin du bcing ba ma legs bar gsos bar gyur nas sbyor ba nongs pa la ni brdungs te chag grugs de bsrang la /
T13TD4312.3E:224b-25: de'i 'og tu chag grugs kyi gso ba bzhin du gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-26: chag nas ci nas ma rnags ba //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-27: de ltar sman bas 'bad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-28: sha dang rtsa rgyus 'drul na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-31: chag grugs su gyur ba la ni ci nas chag grugs de rnags par mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'bad par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:224b-32: gang gi phyir sha la sogs pa rnags par gyur na ni 'drubs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-33: chag grugs can la rlung nad kyi //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-34: skabs bshad snum ni sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-35: stobs skyed sbyor ba bzhi po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:224b-36: 'jam rtsi'i las kyang bsten bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-0: @225a * // rlung nad kyi skabs nas bshad pa'i snum sa ha tsa ra'i til mar la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:225a-1: sbyor ba bzhi po skyed par byed pa gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-2: de bzhin du 'jam rtsi'i las dag kyang bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-3: s'a lu'i chan dang kha shu mar //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-4: 'o ma rgyas byed bsil ba bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-5: chag grugs can la rus pa'i mtshams //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-6: 'byor byed tshad tsam sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-8: s'a lu'i 'bras chan la sogs pa lus rgyas shing rus pa 'byor bar byed pa'i yon tan la sogs pa lus rgyas shing rus pa 'byor bar byed pa'i yon tan la sogs pa tsham sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-9: de ni mtshams sbyor byed pas na //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-10: rmya bar byed pa bsngags ma yin ;
T13TD4312.3E:225a-13: chag grugs can de la lus rmya zhing zhum par byed pa bsngags pa ma yin te //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-14: rgyas par byas pas ni shin tu mtshams sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-15: lan tshva tsha dang thal sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-16: snum dang nyal po nyi tshan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-17: rtsol ba bsten par mi bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-18: chag grugs zas rtsub bsten mi bya //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-20: chag grugs can gyi skyes bus lan tshva nas kha zas rtsub pa'i bar du bsten par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-21: til nag phub ma med pa ras sra'i nang du gtums //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-22: chu yi nang du zhag bdun nye bar spangs gyur cing //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-23: 'di ni btog ste nyin re legs par bskams nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-24: de bzhin 'o ma chu dang shing mngar nang du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-25: slar yang 'o mar snga ma bzhin du spang te bskam //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-26: phub ma med cing rdul med zhib tu btags nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-27: spang spos pa la ka dang btsod dang chu srin sen //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-28: shu ti ku tan na ta ru rta ba la gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-29: tsandan gur gum dang ni thal tres aa ga ru //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-30: sgron shing sra rtsi po ga dang thang shig shug pa'i sde //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-31: de yi phye ma dri zhim 'o ma lhan cig btags//
T13TD4312.3E:225a-32: dri yi sman nim lus 'o mar bskol ba btsir //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-33: rdo dreg ra sna aa shu ma ti dang //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-34: ka she ru dang gandha dri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-35: rgya spos gan dha bha dra seng phrom dang //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-36: ba ya sya dang mur ba 'o mar bcas//
T13TD4312.3E:225a-37: spang spos sogs dang til mar de bskol ba //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-38: dri yi til mar mchog 'di rus pa dag / brtan zhing myur du zhi bar byed mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-39: rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur nad kyis bya ba //
T13TD4312.3E:225a-40: sbyor ba sna tshogs bstan pas sel ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-0: @225b til nag po bu phub ma med par byas shing bkrus pa ras gtsang zhing sra ba'i nang du gtums la chu bo 'brubs pa'i chu'i nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du spangs la nyin re zhing chu las bteg ste bskam par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-1: de bzhin du 'o ma'i nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du mtshan re spangs shing nyin re bskam par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-2: de bzhin du chu dang shing mngar bskol ba'i nang du zhag bdun nyin re skam zhing nub re spangs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-3: yang na til de 'o mar snga ma bzhin du spang la skams te /
T13TD4312.3E:225b-4: phub ma dang rdul med par byas la btags nas spangs spos la sogs la sogs pa'i sman gyi phye ma dang sbyar te /
T13TD4312.3E:225b-5: de'i 'og tu'o ma dang dri'i phye ma ma lus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:225b-6: til btsos pa la btsir bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-7: spang spos la sogs pa'i dri'i sman ma lus pa de dag ni til gyi phye ma la ltos pa'i brgyad cha gzhug par bya'o zhes sman pa rgad po dag 'chad do //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-8: dri'i sman ma lus pa ni ba la la sogs pa'i sde tshan las bshad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:225b-9: de bzhin du ga phur la sogs pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-10: de ltar btsir ba'i til mar de rdo dreg la sogs pa'i lde gu dang yang bskol bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:225b-11: til mar gyi mchog 'dis ni rus brtan par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:225b-12: rlung dang mkhris pa las sogs pa'i nad kyis khyab par gyur ba la yang btung ba dang sna nas gtang ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs dag byas pas sel cing 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-13: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel ba tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba //
