T13TD4312.3E:225b-14: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:225b-15: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun ba'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:225b-17: // / de nas mtshan par rdol gyi le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-19: 'di brtsams pa'i 'grel pa ni 'di yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:225b-20: mtshan bar rdol ba kha nang du bltas pas zhes sngar bshad pa de'i rang gi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-21: glang bo rta la zhon te 'gro //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-22: gnas dang ma la gsar tsog pur 'dug / gzhang 'brum nad kyi rgyur bshad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-23: gzhan la 'ang brten par gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-24: mi dge smin par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:225b-25: 'phral du dam pa la smad pas //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-2: rkub kyi phyi 'am nang du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-3: rma ni sor tshad gnyis sam gcig / sha khrag gnod par gyur las 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-4: chu sor gcin gyi gnas nye bar //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-5: byung bas 'dzag pa'i rang bzhin can //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-6: de ni mtshan par rdol zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-8: mtshan par rdol gyi rgyu ni glang po dang rta la sogs pa la zhon nas 'gro ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-9: gzhan yang 'di skye bar byed pa'i rgyu la brten cing gnas par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-10: de bzhin du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las sngon chad byas pa'i 'bras bu smin par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-11: de bzhin du 'phral du tshe 'di nyid la mchod pa'i gnas dam pa la smod pas phal cher 'brum phran dang por byung nas /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-12: rkub kyi phyi 'am nang du rma'i tshad sor gcig tsam mam sor gnyis tsam sha dang khrag gi nad las 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-13: chu so dang gcin gyi gnas lgang pa dang nye bar gyur pas 'dzag pa'i rang bzhin can yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-14: de'i ming ni mtshan bar rdol zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-15: kun kyang ma gsos 'drul byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-16: mo mtshan chu so gzhang gi bar //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-17: shas cher 'jig par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-18: bshang gci 'phyen dang khu chu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-19: bu ga'i nang nas rim gyis 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-21: mtshan bar rdol gyi nad kun yang gso ba ma byas na 'drul zhing rnag par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-22: mo mtshan la sogs pa zhig cing nyams par byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-23: de dag nyams pas bu ga'i nang nas bshang ba la sogs pa rim gyis mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-24: nad gzhi re re ldan pa 'dus //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-25: glo bur ba dang brgyad du bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-27: mtshan bar rdol gyi nang ni nad gzhi re re las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-28: ldan pa las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-29: 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-30: glo bur ba gcig ste de ltar na brgyad yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-31: ma smin 'brum bu zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-32: smin ba mtshan bar rdol yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-34: mtshan bar rdol ba de ma smin pa la ni ming 'brum bu zhes bya bar bshad la /
T13TD4312.3E:226a-35: smin cing rnags na ni mtshan bar rdol ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:226a-36: rtsa ba mi mngon nad tshabs che //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-0: mtshan bar rdol 'gyur shes @226b par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-1: de las gzhan du de mi byed //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-3: mtshan par rdol gyi nad gang rtsa ba mi mngon pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dang /
T13TD4312.3E:226b-4: rma 'drubs nas kyang slar yang nas yang du rma red cing zhig par 'gyur ba ni mtshan bar rdol du 'gyur gyi /
T13TD4312.3E:226b-5: de las gzhan ba dag ni mtshan par rdol du mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-6: de la rlung gyur 'brum bu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-7: dmar zhing gnag lan ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-8: zug cing 'phar bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-10: de la rlung las gyur pa'i 'brum bu mdog dmar ba 'am gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-11: na ba dang zug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:226b-13: mkhris gyur rnga mo'i mgrin ltar ring //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-14: dmar zhing srab la shas cher tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-15: thal mdog dud pa 'thul bcas yin //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-17: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'brum bu ni rnga mo'i mgrin ba ltar ring ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:226b-18: dmar ba nas drod che zhing dud pa 'thul blta bu'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-19: bad kan las gyur brtan zhing snum //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-20: rtsa ba che zhing mdog skya g-ya' //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-22: bad kan las gyur pa'i 'brum bu ni brtan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-23: rlung mkhris las gyur mdog gnag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-24: dmar zhing tsha la mi bzod na //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-26: rlung dang mkhris pa'i ldang ba las gyur pa'i 'brum bu ni mdog gnag pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-27: bad rlung las gyur cung zad gnag / smin par dka' ba'i mtshan nyid can //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-29: bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i 'brum bu la ni kha dog cung zad gnag pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-32: gzer dang skom dad yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-33: rims dang slon sogs kyis gnod byed //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-35: nad gzhi sum char gyur pa'i 'brum bu ni mthe bo 'dra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-36: yal bar bor la smin pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-37: rma nyid du ni 'gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-39: mtshan bar rdol du 'gyur ba'i 'brum bu de dag bag med pas yal bar bor te ma gsos na smin nas 'phral du rmar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-40: de la rlung gyur 'brum bu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-41: kha phra mang bos khyab byed de //
T13TD4312.3E:226b-42: ko tshags bzhin du kha mang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-2: lbu ba can ni rgyun du 'dzag / ko tshags kha brgya pa zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-4: rlung las gyur pa'i 'brum bu ni kha shin tu phra zhing mang bas khyab par byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:227a-5: ko tshags kyi bu ga dang 'dra ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:227a-6: rim gyis 'phel zhing chu ser sla ba la sogs pa 'dzag pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:227a-7: de'i ming ni ko tshags kha brgya pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-8: mkhris pa las gyur rnga mo'i mgrin //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-10: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan bar rdol ba ni ming rnga mo'i mgrin zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-11: bad kan las gyur spyi bag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-14: bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan bar rdol ni spyi bag can gyi chu ser mang du 'dzag ste /
T13TD4312.3E:227a-15: de ni yongs su 'dzag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-16: rlung mkhris las gyur bshang sgor ni //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-17: yongs su mched pa kun khyab cing //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-18: der ni ra ba'i 'obs kyis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-21: rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum ni 'obs zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:227a-22: des ni bshang sgo'i nye 'khor kun tu ra bas bskor ba lta bu 'byung ste /
T13TD4312.3E:227a-23: ji ltar ra ba'i phyi rol 'obs kyis bskor ba dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-24: rlung dang bad kan las gyur dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:227a-25: / gzhan du drang por song 'gas byed //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-27: rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan bar rdol ni drang po zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:227a-28: gzhang gi nang drang por song nas 'gas shing 'jig par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-29: bad mkhris las gyur sngar bshad pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-30: gzhang 'brum la brten de ldang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-31: de las gzhang 'brum rtsa bar g-ya' //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-32: skrang dang tsha ba la sogs skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-33: de ni myur smin rdol gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-34: gzhang 'brum rtsa ba rnag can yin //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-35: rgyun mi chad bar 'dzag byed de //
T13TD4312.3E:227a-38: gzhang 'brum sngar byung ba la brten nas bad kan dang mkhris pa 'khrugs par gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:227a-39: gzhang 'brum gyi rtsa ba g-ya' ba la sogs pa skyed de skrangs pa des gzhang 'brum gyi rtsa ba rnag bar byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:227a-40: rnags shing brtol nas khrag rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag par byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-0: 'di ni gzhang 'brum @227b gyi mtshan bar rdol ba zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-3: 'di yis gzhang ni zhig byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-4: mi bzad lam ni zhig par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-6: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad ni dung 'dra ba zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-7: de ni dbyibs dung 'dra ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-8: mtshan par rdol ba 'dis ni mi bzad par nad kyi shugs kyis de'i lam zhig cing 'drul bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-9: gang tshe sha la brkam pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-10: rus pa'i dum bu zos gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-11: thad kar song bas lam log zhugs //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-12: rdol zhing snad par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-13: de tshags pas rnags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-14: sha ni 'drul bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-15: der ni srin bu skye 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-16: gzhang ni kun tu za bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-17: ring por mi thogs des 'jig byed //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-18: de ni lam log rma skyes yin //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-20: sha la brkam zhing chags pa'i dbang gis gang gi tshe rus pa'i dum bu zos shing mid par gyur pa de'i tshe rus pa de lam log par zhugs te thad kar 'phred du song bas rdol zhing snad par byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-21: des na nang dugs shing rnags par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-23: des na gzhang gi phyogs der srin bu skye bar 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-24: srin bu des nad pa de'i gzhang kun tu za bar byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-25: des ni ring po mi thogs par gzhang 'jig bar byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-26: mtshan par rdol ba de ni lam log par zhugs ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-27: rma las skyes pa'i ming gnyis kyis bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-28: de las na tsha g-ya' la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-29: rma gso ba las shes par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-31: mtshan bar rdol de thams cad las na ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-32: tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni rma gso ba'i le'u las ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-33: de las drug po gso dka' yin //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-34: 'dus gyur rma skyes spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-35: sel ba'i gnyer mar phyin pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-36: srubs mtshams la ni brten pa spangs //
T13TD4312.3E:227b-38: mtshan bar rdol de rnams kyi nang nas nad gzhi re re las gyur pa gsum dang ldan pa las gyur pa gsum ste /
T13TD4312.3E:227b-39: drug ni gso dka' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-1: rma las skyes pa ni spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-2: de bzhin du phyir sel ba'i gnyer mar phyin pa yang spang bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:228a-3: de bzhin du mdoms kyi srubs mtshams la brten pa yang spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-4: de nas 'brum bu'i tshe nyid ni //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-6: sbyang dang gtar ga chu blugs sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-7: ci nas smin par mi 'gyur bar //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-10: de nas mtshan par rdol 'di 'brum bu'i tshe nyid ni sbyang ba la sogs pas gso bar bya zhing ci nas kyang smin par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-11: smin nas slar yang snum chos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-12: dugs byas nas ni lus spying bya //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-13: gzhang 'brum lta bur bsdams nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-14: gting ring legs par brtag bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-16: phyi bltas nang du bltas pa brtag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:228a-17: yang nad pa de la snum chos la sogs pa byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:228a-18: gzhang 'brum lta bur legs par bsdams nas steng du song ba 'am 'og tu song ba'i rtsa ba dang rtse mo dang /
T13TD4312.3E:228a-19: de bzhin du kha phyi rol du bltas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:228a-20: nang du bltas pa legs par brtag cing shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-21: de la nang bltas btsal nas ni ;
T13TD4312.3E:228a-22: / gtsags bus legs par gcad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-23: phyir bltas ma lus par bcad la //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-24: thal sman dag gis gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-26: de las mtshan bar rdol ba nang du bltas pa ni legs par btsal cing brtags nas gtsags bus gcad cing dral bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-27: phyi rol du bltas pa ni mtshan par rdol ba ma lus par bcad la /
T13TD4312.3E:228a-28: de'i 'og tu thal sman gyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-29: de nas thal sman btab pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-30: yang na sman pas me btsa' gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-32: de'i 'og tu mtshan bar rdol gnyi ga yang sman pas thal sman gyis gso ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:228a-34: rnga mo'i mgrin la thal sman bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-36: rnga mo'i mgrin pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i mtshan bar rdol ni thal sman nyid kyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-37: me btsas ni ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:228a-38: ko tshags kha brgya sbubs gcig pa //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-0: @228b bcug nas legs par gcad bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-2: mtshan bar rdol ko tshags kha brgya pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:228b-3: sbu gu sbubs gcig pa'i nang na bar mtshams gcig pa'i nang du bar mtshams gcig yod pa bcug nas gcad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-4: de 'drubs nas ni lhag ma'ang bcad //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-5: gzhan du gzhang ni zhig nas 'chi //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-7: rma de 'drubs par gyur na lhag ma gcad par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:228b-8: gzhan du dus gcig tu bcad na ni gzhang zhig nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-9: 'obs ltar khyab ba'ang de bzhin du //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-10: thal sman ba gcin sbu gus gso //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-12: de bzhin du 'obs lta bus khyab pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan bar rdol la yang thal sman dang ba gcin dang /
T13TD4312.3E:228b-13: sbu gu'i sbyor bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-14: gzhang 'brum mtshan mar rdol la sngar //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-15: gzhang 'brum la ni sman phye gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-16: rma skyes pa la re thag bcad //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-17: zug rngu dbyung ba'i cho ga bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-18: zug rngu phyung ste srin 'joms pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-19: bza' dang byug pa sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-21: gzhang 'brum las gyur pa'i mtshan bar rdol ba la ni dang por gzhang 'brum nyid gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-22: rma las skyes pa'i mtshan bar rdol la ni dang por re thag bcad la /
T13TD4312.3E:228b-23: de'i 'og tu zug rngu dbyung pa'i cho ga bzhin du gso bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:228b-24: de'i 'og tu 'bu 'joms pa'i bza' btung dang bsku byug sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-25: glan dug sa sbu gu can la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-26: snum chos legs sbyar nad la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-28: mtshan bar rdol gyi nad na ba la ni glan pa'i dugs la sogs pas phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-29: ko tshags 'dra dang thams cad la //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-30: ba lang ngogs dang kun tu bzang //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-31: gshol phyed pa dang gshol gyis bya //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-32: brtags te nye bar sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-34: ko tshags 'dra ba dang mtshan bar rdol ba thams cad la ba lang gi ngogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa spyad bzhi po nges par brtags te sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-35: ngos su 'debs par byed pa'i mtshon //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-36: ba lang ngogs zhes bya bar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:228b-38: ngos su mtshon gang ngos su 'debs shing gcod par byed pa de ni ming ba lang gi ngogs zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-3: thams cad gtong zhing spyod pa'i cha spyad ni kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-4: ngos la gcod ba gshol phyed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-5: ngos gnyis su ni gshol gyis bcad //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-7: ngos phan tshun gcig gcod par byed pa'i cha spyad ni gshol phyed ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-8: ngos gnyis kar gcod par byed pa ni gshol zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-9: 'dzag pa'i lam ni ma lus pa //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-10: thams cad me yis bsreg par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-11: slar yang 'di lta'i gnod mi skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-13: 'dzag par byed pa'i lam ma lus pa thams cad la yang mes bsreg par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:229a-14: de ltar byas na mtshan bar rdol gyis slar gnod par mi byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-15: sman pas de yi bar bar du //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-16: de lto sbyang la 'bad bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-18: yang mtshan bar rdol dang ldan pa'i nad pa de la bar bar ram /
T13TD4312.3E:229a-19: skabs skabs su skyug sman la sogs pas sbyang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-20: byi la'i rus pa 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-21: khu ba lde gur byas pas bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-23: mtshan bar rdol la byi la'i rus pa la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-24: dzo ti smra ti ma la yu //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-25: sle sman ta ka bi sha lya //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-26: dur byid pa ti ba tra ka //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-27: ka ra b'i ra sra rtsi pog / shu dag su dh'akshi ra dang //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-28: aa rka'i lo ma til mar bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-29: mtshan bar rdol la bskus na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-30: 'di ni phan byed mchog tu bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-32: dzo ti sma til sogs pa'i lde gu dang til mar bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:229a-33: til mar de mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad dang ldan pa la bskus na yang mchog tu phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-34: dzo ti sma ti ni ka ka da na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-35: ma la yu ni so ma ra dza 'am phal gu'o //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-36: sle sman ta ka ni se lu'o //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-37: bi sha lya ni lang ga li'o //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-38: dur byid ni tri byid do //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-39: shing mngar sing phrom pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-40: sug smel ha re nu ka dang //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-41: ser po gnyis dang pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-42: rgyam tsha thal tres shug ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-43: padma'i snying po da ta ki //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-44: spra tshil ru rta sra rtsi pog / kha lung 'o mar bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-45: til mar lhan cig bskol ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:229a-46: bskus na 'brum bu mdze dang rma //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-2: shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman lde gu byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:229b-3: til mar lhan cig bskol bas bskus na 'brum bu la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do /
T13TD4312.3E:229b-4: byi dang ga snying 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-5: pi pi ling rtsa pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-6: sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-7: lde gu zos na srin bu'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-8: mtshan bar rdol dang mdze nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-9: gcin snyi ba dang smas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-12: byi dang ga'i snying po la sogs pa'i lde gu zos na srin bu'i nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-13: sle tres sug smel byi dang ga / dug mo nyung ba ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-14: skyu ru ra dang aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-15: gu gul rim gyis cha nges bskyed //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-16: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba 'di zos na //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-17: 'brum bu sbom dang mtshan bar rdol //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-18: nad ni sel bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-20: sle tres la sogs pa'i sman cha re res bskyed de sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na 'brum bu sngon po la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-21: pi pi ling dang tsi tra ka / byi dang ga dang dug mo nyung //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-22: cha snyoms phyed kyi 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-23: kun dang cha mnyam gu gul dang //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-24: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu yis //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-25: nad ni thams cad 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-27: pi pi ling la sogs pa srang re dang /
T13TD4312.3E:229b-29: gu gul sman de dag kun dang cha mnyam par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:229b-30: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu tshad dang ldan par zos na yang mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad thams cad 'joms pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-31: gu gul srang lnga pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-32: 'bras bu gsum ni srang re dang //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-33: shing tsha sug smel zho gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-34: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-35: zos na mtshan bar rdol ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-36: mdze dang skran nad 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-39: pi pi ling 'bras bu gsum sman sna re zhing srang re /
T13TD4312.3E:229b-41: sug smel sna re zhing zho gnyis gnyis sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na yang mtshan par rdol ba la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:229b-42: de nyid dang ni bca' sga'i phye //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-2: rtsa ba bcu yi khu bar bsres //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-3: mchog tu rlung gi nad sel byed //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-5: bshad ma thag pa'i sman de dag nyid bca' ska'i phye ma la sogs pa dang bsres pas kyang mchog tu rlung las gyur pa'i mtshan bar rdol bsel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-6: seng ldeng snying po 'bras bu gsum gyi phye //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-7: aa san bskol khu ba dang bsres dang //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-8: cha mnyam gu gul sbrang rtsi lde gur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-9: mdze 'brum gcin snyi mtshan bar rdol nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-11: seng ldeng gi snying po la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:230a-12: gu gul cha mnyam par aa sa na bskol ba'i khu ba dang bsres te zos na mdze la sogs pa'i nad sel to //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-13: 'di ni mtshan bar rdol gso'i bye brag bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-14: sman gyi mtshan nyid lhag ma gang yin pa //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-15: rma yi dbang byas yongs su bstan pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-16: gso thabs dgos pa legs par brtags te sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-18: sngar bshad pa'i mtshan bar rdol gyi gso ba bye brag gam khyad par tsam smras pa yin gyi /
T13TD4312.3E:230a-19: spyi'i bshad pa ni ma yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:230a-20: sngon gyi mtshan nyid de la phan pa lhag ma gang yin pa ni rma'i dbang du byas pa yongs su brtags te bstan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:230a-21: de dang 'tsham pa'i gso thabs gang yin pa dag gis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-22: rta zhon stobs 'gyed shugs ni 'gegs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-23: chang 'thungs nyal po ma zhu ma goms dang //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-24: drag shul las ni sna tshogs rma 'drubs nas //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-25: lo gcig bar ram de las lhag pa spangs //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-27: mtshan bar rdol gyi rma 'tshobs su zin kyang /
T13TD4312.3E:230a-28: rta zhon pa la sogs pa lo gcig gam /
T13TD4312.3E:230a-29: de las lhag pa'i bar du yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:230a-30: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:230a-31: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges bar sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:230a-32: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:230a-34: // / de nas rmen bu dang thor bu dang rkang bam dang 'bras kyi phreng ba'i nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-0: rma dang 'brum bu'i skabs kyi go @230b rims kyis na le'u 'di nyid brtsams pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-1: nad ni bad kan shas che ba //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-2: khrag dang sha dang tshil la brten //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-3: zlum zhing mtho bar skrangs pa de //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-4: mdud pa 'dra bas rmen bur bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-6: rlung la sogs pa'i nad bad kan gyi shas che ba gang yin pa sha dang khrag la brten cing gnas pa de [?] las skrangs pa gang zlum zhing mtho bar gyur pa de rnag 'dzag pa'i rjes la mdud pa 'dra ba'i rmen bus khyab par 'gyur bas de la ming rmen bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-7: de ni nad gzhi khrag sha tshil //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-8: rus rtsa rma las gyur pa dgu //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-10: rmen bu de ni nang gzhi so so las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.3E:230b-12: sha dang tshil dang rus pa dang rtsa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:230b-13: rma las gyur pa dang dgu'o //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-14: de la rlung gyur rgya che zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-15: brug cing bye ba snyam sems na //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-16: gnas nas gnas gzhan dag tu 'pho //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-18: 'jam zhing lgang pa lta bur rgyas //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-19: brtol na khrag ni sla bar 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:230b-20: de la rmen bu de dag gi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i rmen bu ni rgya che zhing lhun mthug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:230b-21: zug pa la sogs pa nas /
T13TD4312.3E:230b-22: khrag sla ba 'dzag pa'i bar du yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-23: mkhris gyur tsha zhing mdog ser la //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-24: dmar zhing myur du smin pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-25: brtol na khrag ni dron mo 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:230b-26: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rmen bu ni tsha ba dang bcas pa dang kha dog ser po yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:230b-27: de bzhin dmar ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-28: bad kan las gyur nad med sra //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-29: reg na grang zhing dkar la g-ya' //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-30: smin na rnag ni ska ba 'jag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:230b-31: bad kan las gyur pa'i rmen bu ni nad tshabs chung zhing reg na grang ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-32: nad 'khrugs khrag las gyur rmen bu //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-33: srin bu dang ni bcas par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-34: sha dang rtsa la gnas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-35: rmen bu tshor ba chung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-36: mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:230b-38: rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs pa'i khrag las rmen bur gyur pa ni khrag de srin bu skye ba la phyogs par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:231a-1: pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-2: sha che'i gnod gyur sha las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-3: sha skyed zas la rmen bu 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-4: snum zhing che la sra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-5: rtsa yis khyab cing bad kan 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-7: sha skyed par byed pa'i kha zas kyis sha la gnod par gyur pa las byung ba'i rmen bu ni snum pa nas bad kan dang mtshan nyid 'dra ba'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-8: tshil skyed pa yis tshil 'phel ba //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-9: sha 'am pags par phyin gyur ba //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-10: rlung gi rmen bu shin tu snum //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-11: 'jam dang brtan par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-12: bad kan dang ni mtshan nyid mtshungs //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-14: de brtol tshil mthug dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-17: tshil skyed par byed pa'i kha zas kyis tshil 'phel bar 'gyur ba sha'am pags par phyin par rgyur pa las rlung gi rmen du shin tu snum pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can lus 'phel zhing tshon ni 'phel bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:231a-19: de brtol na tshil mthug cing mdog dmar ba la sogs pa 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-20: rus pa chag dang snad pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-21: mtho dang dma' bar gyur pa de //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-22: rus pa'i rmen bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-24: rus pa chag grugs su gyur pa las rus pa gang mtho ba 'am dma' bar gyur pa de ni rus pa'i rmen bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-25: rkang gis song ba 'am drag shul gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-26: dub par gyur nas chu brgal bas //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-27: rlung gis rtsa grang khrag bcas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-28: rlung gis btsir te 'khrugs nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-29: yon por byas te skams pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-30: mi 'phar nang byung rmen bu chags //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-31: de ni rtsa yi rmen bur bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:231a-33: rkang gis lam du zhugs pa las 'phral du chu brgal bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:231a-34: yang na de bzhin du drag shul gyis dub par gyur pa las mod la chu brgal bar gyur pas /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-0: rlung des rtsa la gnod par byas shing btsir te 'khums par byas shing skams ba las mi 'phar bar nad byung ba'i rmen bu chags bar 'gyur te de ni ming rtsa'i rmen bu @231b zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-1: rma ni ma 'drubs 'drubs ma thag / ro ni thams cad zos gyur pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-2: rlon pa dkris pa med pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-3: yang na lus ni snad gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-4: rlung ni nad khrag ma phyung ba //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-5: ma sbyangs rma ni bsrubs pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-6: tsha zhing g-ya' dang bcas gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-7: rma yi rmen bur de bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-10: 'drubs ma thag ro thams cad dang zas 'chol bar zos pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-11: yang na rma rlon pa dkris ma med par gzhag pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-12: yang na lus snad par gyur pas rlung 'khrugs par gyur nas nad khrag ma phyung ba 'am ma sbyangs par gyur pa las rma bsrubs shing 'tshobs pa las ni tsha zhing g-ya' ba dang bcas pa'i rmen bur 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-13: de ni rma'i rmen bu zhes drang srong dag gis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-14: gsor rung nad gzhi khrag tshil gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-16: rmen bu de dag las gsor rung ba ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang khrag dang tshil las gyur pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-18: sra zhing 'gyur dang sbom pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-19: gnad dang mgul pa ltor gnas yin //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-21: rmen bu gang sra bar 'gyur zhing g-ya' ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-22: sbom pa la sogs pa ni gsor mi rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-23: mdud pa cher chags thor bu ste //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-24: rmen bu de yi mtshan nyid can //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-25: nad gzhi la sogs gyur drug yin //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-26: phal cher bad kan tshil rgyas yin //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-27: brtan pas smin par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-29: sngar bshad pa'i rmen bu las chen por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni thor bu zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-30: de yang rmen bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-31: de yang nad gzhi tha dad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-32: tshil las gyur pa'i bar rnam pa drug yod la /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-33: de yang phal cher bad kan dang tshil rgyas pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T13TD4312.3E:231b-34: brtan zhing sra bas smin par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-35: rtsa la gnas pa'i khrag nad kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-37: smin pa de tshe rgyas par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-38: sha yi gong po bcas par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-39: sha yi myu gus khyab gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:231b-40: skyes pa de las nad khrag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-1: par mang du 'dzag / de ni khrag gi thor bu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-3: rtsa la gnas pa'i khrag ni nad khrag rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'khums par gyur pa na khrag de rgyas par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:232a-4: sha'i gong po ril po dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:232a-5: sha'i myu gus khyab cing de 'phel bar gyur pa las khrag gi rgyun mang po rgyun du 'dzag pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:232a-6: de ni khrag gi thor bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-7: de las sha khrag las gyur sbang //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-8: bzhi po gzhan dag gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-10: thor bu de dag gi nang nas khrag dang sha las gyur pa'i thor bu gnyis po ni spang bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:232a-11: rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa bzhi po ni gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-12: dang por chu sor gnas pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-13: ro smad la brten bad kan rgyas //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-14: sha khrag nad kyis rkang par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-15: dus su skrang par byed 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-16: rim gyis stug po nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-17: de ni rkang bam zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-19: bad kan gyi shas che ba'i nad dang por chu so'am ro smad gang yang rung ba la gnas nas sha dang khrag la brten te /
T13TD4312.3E:232a-20: de lta bu'i nad de rim gyis skrang zhing rkang pa'i bar du 'byer ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:232a-21: rkang pa 'ba' zhig skrang par byed pa de ni rkang bam zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-22: rlung gyur gas shing gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-23: rgyu med na zhing rtsub cing na //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-25: rlung las gyur pa'i rkang bam ni rkang pa gas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:232a-26: mdog gnag pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-27: mkhris pa las gyur ser ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-28: tsha dang rims kyis 'debs pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-30: mkhris pa las gyur ba'i rkang bam ni tsha ba mdog ser ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-31: bad kan snum lci nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-32: sha yi mdzer pa chen pos khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-34: bad kan las gyur pa'i rkang bam ni snum pa dang lci ba la sogs pa yin no//
T13TD4312.3E:232a-35: de ni mang du 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-36: lo gcig 'das pa spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-38: rkang bam gyi nad de ni chu ser mang du 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:232a-39: lo gcig lon pa'i rnying pa spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-40: kha cig lag pa sna dang mchu //
T13TD4312.3E:232a-41: rna ba rkang pa ltar 'byung gzer //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-2: rlan can gnas su mi bzad skye //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-4: drang srong la la ni lag pa gnyis dang sna dang mchu dang rna ba dang rkang pa dang 'dra bar rkang bam 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes zer la /
T13TD4312.3E:232b-5: rkang bam gyi nad de ni rlan can gyi gnas su yang dang yang du shas cher skye bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-6: nad ni tshil mgrin mjing pa mig / mtshan khung chu sor gnas pa dag / mdog 'dra sra zhing snum pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-7: par ta skyu ru ra 'dra dang //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-9: ring zhig lon na smin par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-11: rlung la sogs pa'i nad tshil la gnas shing mgrin pa dang mjing pa la sogs par brten pa dag ni mdog 'dra zhing sra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bar ta ka'am /
T13TD4312.3E:232b-12: skyu ru ra 'dra ba gting zug cing nang du chud pa'i 'bras chen po 'byung zhing dus yun ring zhig lon na smin par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-13: de las kha cig nad med smin //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-14: kha cig 'dzag dang g-ya' ba yin /
T13TD4312.3E:232b-15: kha cig skam zhing kha cig skye //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-16: yun ring du ni gnas par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-20: 'bras kyi nad de kha cig ni nad chen po med par smin par gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:232b-21: kha cig ni g-ya' bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:232b-22: kha cig ni skam zhing 'dzag / kha cig ni skye zhing 'byung bar byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:232b-23: de dag kyang yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:232b-24: rtsa d'ur ba dang 'dra bar 'phel zhing rgyas par byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:232b-25: ji ltar d'ur ba ni 'bri bar gyur nas slar 'phel bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:232b-26: 'bras kyi phreng ba yang de dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-27: de yang 'brum chen dang 'bras kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:232b-28: ming gnyis thob par 'gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-29: de ni rims bcas skyugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-30: cham lud rtsi ba logs zug pa sbang //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-32: 'bras kyi phreng ba de rims la sogs pa'i bla brnan dang bcas pa spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-33: rma la mi 'phrod bsten pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-34: skra dang smin pa khyad par med //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-35: sha sogs nang du rnag zhugs 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-36: ring du 'gro bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:232b-38: sbubs ltar 'dzag pa sbu gu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-0: @233a * // smin pa dang ma smin pa khyad par rma la mi 'phrod pa bsten par gyur pas sha la sogs pa'i nang du rnag zhugs par gyur cing ring du phug cing 'gro bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:233a-1: de'i ring du 'gro bas na ming 'gro ba zhes bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:233a-2: de bzhin du sbu gu ltar 'dzag bas na sbu gu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-3: drang po sbu gu gcig yin te //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-6: slob dpon gzhan dag gi gzhung gis ni drang por 'dug pa la ni sbu gu gcig pa zhes bya ba la de nyid sna tshogs su 'gro zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-7: de ni nad gzhi re re 'dus //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-10: sbu gu 'dra ba de ni nad gzhi re re las gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:233a-12: zug rngus zug par gyur pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:233a-14: rlung gyur nad bcas rma sgo sra //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-15: mdog mi sdug cing lbu ba 'dzag / nub mo lhag par 'dzag ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-17: rlung las gyur pa'i sbu gu ni nad dang bcas pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-18: mkhris gyur skom tsha rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-19: ser dro rnag ni dri mnam 'dzag / nyin par lhag par 'dzag pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-21: mkhris pa las gyur pa ni skom dad che ba dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:233a-22: tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-23: bad kan ska zhing spyi bag 'dzag / g-ya' zhing sra bar gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-24: mtshan mo lhag par 'dzag pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-26: bad kan las gyur ba ni ska zhing spyi bag 'dzag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-27: 'dus gyur mtshan ma kun ldan spang //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-29: 'dus pa las gyur ba ni nad gzhi sum char gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:233a-30: de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-31: nang na gnas pa'i zug rngu ma phyung zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-32: sbu gu skyed par byed pa gang yin de //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-33: lbu ba can la sla zhing dro ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-34: khrag bcas rnag ni nad bcas rtag tu 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:233a-36: rma'i nang na gnas pa'i zug rngu ma phyung na rma'i sbu gu skyed par byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:233a-37: sbu gu de ni nad pa de la lbu ba can gyi rnag sla zhing dro ba dang khrag dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:233b-0: nad skyed par byed pa rtag tu 'byung @233b ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-1: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:233b-2: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:233b-3: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:233b-5: // / de nas rmen bu la sogs pa'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-6: rmen bu ma smin pa la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-7: rang rang skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-9: rmen bu ma smin zhing rnags par ma gyur pa la ni skrangs pa'i nad ji ltar gso ba de bzhin du gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-10: kanda ka ri bri ha ti //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-11: tsi tra ka dang pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-12: bskol ba'i mar gyis lus sbyang bar //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-13: 'dod pa dag gis snum chos bya //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-14: sbyang byas sman rnon lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-16: rmen bu'i nad sbyong bar byed par 'dod pas ni /
T13TD4312.3E:233b-17: kanda ka ri la sogs pa'i sman mar gyis snum chos byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:233b-18: bkru sman dang skyug sman gyis sbyang bar byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:233b-19: de'i 'og tu sman rnon po'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-20: rmen bu lan mang dugs byas te //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-21: yang dang yang du mnye bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-23: yang rmen bu la dugs mang du byas te sor mo la sogs pas yang dang yang du mnye bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-24: 'di ni mchog tu rlung la bya //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-26: bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga 'di dag ni mchog tu yang rlung las gyur pa la bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-27: khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'ang //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-28: gtar ga bsil ba'i sbyor kun bya //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-30: khrag las gyur pa dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rmen bu la ni gtar ga'i sbyor ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:233b-31: bsil sman gyis bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:233b-32: sman chu blugs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-33: bad kan las gyur rlung ltar gso //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-35: bad kan las gyur pa'i rmen bu la ni rlung las gyur pa'i gso ba ji skad smos pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-36: 'on kyang smin na de bcad de ;
T13TD4312.3E:233b-37: / khrag yod pa ni mes bsreg bya //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-39: de ltar gso ba byas su zin kyang /
T13TD4312.3E:233b-40: smin par gyur na rmen bu gcad cing gshags la khrag yod pa'i rjes su mes bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:233b-41: ma lus par bcad lus gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-1: de bcad pa na ma lus par gcad bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:234a-2: lus na slar 'phel ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-3: sha yi rma las gyur rmen bu //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-4: de bzhin 'tsho ba tsam du bya //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-6: sha'i rmen bu ni gong du bshad pa bzhin du gsos la re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-7: tshil las gyur pa'ang 'di nyid dang //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-8: til dang 'o ma'i lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-9: ras ni nyis rim dag gis dkri //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-10: tog lcags la sogs bsregs bas bsro //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-12: tshil las gyur pa'i rmen bu la ni tshil las gyur pa'i gso ba 'di nyid dang /
T13TD4312.3E:234a-13: til dang 'o ma'i lde gus bskus la ras nyis rim gyis dkris te tog lcags la sogs pa bsregs bas bsro bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-14: yang na mtshon gyis dbral nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-15: tshil phyung nas ni legs par bsreg / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:234a-16: yang na tshil las gyur pa'i rmen bu gtsags bus dbral la /
T13TD4312.3E:234a-17: tshil phyung ste bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-18: rtsa yi thor bu sar pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-19: sa ha ra dza'i til mar blud //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-20: rlung 'joms sman gyis dkri dugs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-21: 'jam rtsi dang ni gtar ga bya //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-23: rtsa'i thor bu la ni sa ha ra dza dang bskol ba'i til mar blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-24: yang na de la rlung sel ba'i sman gyis dkri ba'i dugs la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-25: thor bu rmen bu lta bur ni //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-26: rang gi ji bzhin byas rab phan //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-28: thor bu'i nad la ni rmen bu rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa ji ltar gso ba bzhin du thor bu yang de ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-29: rkang ba ma rlung gyur 'phel ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-30: snum zhing dugs bcas dkri ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-31: long mo'i sor gnyis gong du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-32: gtar ga gdab bar bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-34: ba gcin sbyar ba zla gcig blud //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-36: rlung las gyur pa'i rkang ba ma la ni snum chos la sogs pa byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:234a-37: long mo'i gong du sor gnyis gzhal bar gtar ga gdab par bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:234a-38: ae randa'i mar la sogs pa sbyar la zla ba gcig gi bar du blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234a-39: zhu nas 'bru rnying bca' skra [?] dang //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-0: 'o ma dang sbyar kha zas @234b sbyin ;
T13TD4312.3E:234b-2: ae randa'i mar de zhu nas 'bras rnying pa'i chan dang bca' sga dang 'o ma dang sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-3: de bzhin dur byid 'o ma blud //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-5: yang na rlung las gyur pa'i rkang bam la ni dur byid dang 'o ma bskol ba blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-6: des ma zhin mes bsreg bya //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-8: de ltar byas su zin kyang sos par ma gyur na rkang bam de mes bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-9: mkhris gyur long mo'i 'og tu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-10: khrag dbyung mkhris pa sel kun sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-12: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rkang ba ma la ni long mo'i 'og tu gtar ga bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:234b-13: de bzhin du mkhris ba sel ba'i zas dang sman la sogs pa thams cad sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-14: bad kan las gyur mthe bo las //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-15: khrag gtar nas kyi kha zas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-16: sbrang rtsi bcas pa'i sman khu blud //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-17: 'phel ba'i tshe na pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-18: aa ru ra ni bsten par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-20: bad kan las gyur pa'i rkang bam la ni rkang pa'i mthe bo las khrag gtar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:234b-21: kha zas sbrang rtsi dang bza' zhing sman gyi khu ba blud pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:234b-22: 'phel ba'i tshe na pi pi ling la sogs pa bza' bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-23: yungs kar bri ha ti gnyis kyi //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-24: rtsa ba'i lde gus byug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-26: yang bad kan las gyur pa'i rkang bam la yang yungs kar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:234b-27: bri ha ti'i rtsa ba'i lde gus byug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-28: yang na 'u su'i lde gus byug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:234b-29: yang na 'u su'i 'bras bu'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-31: sbyang zhing dan da tra ban ti //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-32: dur byid ko sha ta ki dang //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-33: de ba ta la'i mar bskol blud //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-35: 'bras kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i nad la ni bkru sman dang skyugs sman gtang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-36: dan da la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i mar blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-37: bad kan tshil ni 'joms pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-38: dud pas mkhur bkang sna sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-40: yang na 'bras kyi phreng ba la sbyor ba 'di dag byas na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-41: gtar gas khrag ni dbyung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:234b-42: skyer pa'i khanda gcin yang blud //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-1: la gtar ga la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-2: rmen bu ma smin pa la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-3: rgyam tsha bca' sgan [?] ku li //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-4: bsku zhing sra bar rgyam tsha yi //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-5: thum bus dugs byas mnye bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-7: rmen bu ma smin pa la /
T13TD4312.3E:235a-8: rgyam tsha la sogs pa bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-9: sra ba la ni rgyam tsha gtums pa'i thum bus mnye bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-10: sha mi la phug shi kru yi //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-11: sa bon nas dang yungs kar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-12: dar ba skyur po btags bskus na //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-13: rmen bu'i mdud pa zhi bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-15: yang sha mi la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na rmen bu'i mdud pa chags pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-17: bad kan mkhris pa sel bas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-19: rmen bu smin par bskyod pa la ni gtar ga gdab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-20: ma smin ba ni phyung nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-21: thal sman me btsas gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-23: rmen bu ma smin pa ni rtsa nas phyung ste thal sman gdab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:235a-24: me btsa' gdab bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-25: dzo ti shma ti langga yi //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-27: ka ka tig ta karko ti //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-28: de ba ta la'i sa bon dang //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-29: bi sha lya dang ni rgun thi //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-30: ko sha ta ki pa tha rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-31: srang ni phyed phyed dug zho gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-32: ka ranydza'i mar bre gang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-33: ni rgun thi yi khu ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-34: bre bzhi bskol bar gyur ba 'di'i //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-35: btung dang bsku byug snar btang na //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-36: 'bras kyi phreng ba gsor mi rung //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-37: yun ring lon zhing rnag 'dzag sel //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-39: dzo ti shma ti ni ka ta na'o //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-40: lang ga li ni bi sha lya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-41: shu ka nas ni na hi ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-42: ka ka tig ta ni au dum di ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-43: de ba ta la ni dzi mu dka'o [?] //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-44: ko sha ta ki ni kri ta be da ne'o //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-45: sman de dag srang phyed phyed dang dug las zho gnyis dang sbyar la //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-46: ka ranydza'i mar bre gang dang ni rgun thi'i khu ba bre bzhi bskol bar gyur ba'i mar 'di btung ba la sogs pa btang na 'bras kyi phreng ba la sogs pa sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-47: langga li yi sdong bu yi //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-48: lde gu til mar de bzhi 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-49: ni rgun thi yi khu bar bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:235a-50: sna sman sogs btang 'bras phreng sel //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-0: langga li'i sdong @235b bu'i lde gu til mar gyi bzhi cha dang /
T13TD4312.3E:235b-1: ni rgun thi'i khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang bskol te sna sman la sogs par btang na 'bras kyi phreng ba sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-2: tsandan thang shing na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-3: dur byid gla sgang ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-4: srang re dug ni srang phyed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-5: ba gcin sbyar te zhib tu btags //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-7: lo ma ba lang lci khur bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-8: yungs mar bre gang bcas bskol ba //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-9: btung ba la sogs par bsten na //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-10: mdze dang rma ni 'khyims pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-11: 'bras kyi phreng ba myur du sel //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-13: tsandan dkar po la sogs pa ji skad smos pa'i sbyor ba bskol ba btung ba la sogs par bsten na yang mdze la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-14: shu dag rgya skyegs aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-15: pu tse shel dang tsandan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-16: til mar bskol ba blud na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-17: 'bras phreng rtsa bar bcas pa sel //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-19: shu dag la sogs pa'i lde gu dang bskol ba'i til mar gyis kyang 'bras kyi phreng ba sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-20: sha ra pung ka'i rtsa ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-21: 'bras kyi chu dang btags gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-22: sna sman bsku bas 'brum bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-25: sha ra [?] pung ka'i rtsa ba la sogs pa sbyor ba ji skad smos pa bzhin du btang na yang dug la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-26: au ta da ma ka ri'i rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-27: pi lu'i lo ma seng phrom dang //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-28: sa har dza aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-29: shing mngar shu ti tsi tra ka / thang shing til mar 'o ma mnyam //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-30: sna sman bsku byug byas pa'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-32: au ta da ma ka ri'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i lde gu dang til mar dang 'o ma cha mnyam du byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:235b-33: bskol ba'i sbyor ba ni 'bras kyi phreng ba la phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-34: ba lang ra lug rta rmig bsregs //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-35: yungs mar sbyar te bsku ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-37: ba lang la sogs ba'i rmig ba bsregs pa'i snag tsha dang /
T13TD4312.3E:235b-38: yungs mar sbyar te bskus na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-39: sbrul nag bya rog rang nyid shi /
T13TD4312.3E:235b-40: aing gu dang ni sbyar ba bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:235b-42: yang sbrul nag po rang nyid kyis shi ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:236a-0: bya rog rang nyid shi ba gang @236a * //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-1: yang rung ba bsregs pa aing gu dang sbyar te bskus na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-2: de ltar ma zhi nad kyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-3: logs gzhan byin pa la gnas pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-4: chu so'i steng ngam 'og nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-5: tshil phyung nas ni mes bsreg bya //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-7: sbyor ba de dag gis ma zhi na nad kyi logs gzhan pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:236a-8: g-yon logs su nan g-yas logs su gnas pa'i dbang po'i chu so'i steng ngam 'og nas nya'i sgo nga'i tshogs lta bu'i tshil phyung nas mes bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-9: gyen du 'greng ba'i rkang pa gzhal //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-10: de yi tshad kyis rting ba ru //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-11: de las rmen bu dbyung bya zhes //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-12: drang srong mu khyud kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-14: skyes bu gyen du 'greng ba'i rkang pa gzhal la de'i tshad kyis rting pa nas byin pa gzhal la de nas rmen bu dbyung bar bya'o zhes drang srong chen po mu khyud kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-15: rting pa nas bzung sor ni bcu gnyis na //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-16: dbang po'i chu so yod spang nad kyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-17: g-yon du dbral te nya sgong 'dra dbus nas //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-18: dra ba drang zhes legs thos kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-20: rting pa nas sor bcu gnyis dor ba dang de bzhin du dbang po'i chu so zhes bya ba byin snying yang dor la /
T13TD4312.3E:236a-21: nad kyi logs cig shos su dbral te /
T13TD4312.3E:236a-22: nya'i sgo nga 'dra ba ris su 'dug pa dbus nas drang bar bya'o zhes drang srong legs thos kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-23: mi yi long mo rna ba'i bar du gzhal //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-24: de yis brgyad pa rting pa'i cha bgos te //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-25: byin snying gnad kyi drang thad ma gtogs dbral //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-26: tshil ni dbyung bar bya zhes gzhan dag 'chad //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-28: mi'i long mo nas rna ba'i rtse mo'i bar gzhal la de'i rting pa nas brgyad cha dor te byin snying gi gnad kyi drang thad ma gtogs pa /
T13TD4312.3E:236a-29: de'i tshad gnyis tsam gtsags bus dbral la tshil dbyung bar bya'o zhes dang srong gzhan dag smra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-30: rlung gyur spu gur dugs byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-31: dbral te aa pa marga yi //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-32: sbu gu'i til dang rgyam tshar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:236a-33: btags pa'i lde gus legs par bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-0: rlung las gyur pa'i sbu gu'i rma la ni dugs byas la dbral te aa pa marga la sogs pa'i lde gus @236b bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-1: mkhris pa las gyur til dang btsod //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-2: n'a ga danti ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-4: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma sbubs su gyur pa la ni til la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-5: bad kan las gyur rgyam tsha til //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-6: dan da nim pa lan tshvas bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-8: bad kan las gyur pa la ni rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i sman btags pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-9: zug rdu las byung dbral te dbyung //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-10: til dang mar dang sprang rtsis bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-12: zug rngu las gyur pa'i rma 'khyims pa la ni dbral te zug rngu phyung la til dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-13: mtshon dbral mi rung chu tshod kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-14: legs par btsal te nang du dbug / thal sman la spangs skud pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-15: rma tshol kha ni shas cher dral //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-17: mtshon gyis dbral du mi rung ba'i rma 'khyims pa la ni chu tshod kyis rma legs bar btsal te nang nas phug la thal sman la spangs pa'i skud pas rma tshol gyis btsal ba'i kha de shas cher bskyed par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-18: rma red kha ni dog pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-19: phugs ring la yang sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-20: reng bu gang dang til mar gang //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-21: de ni rma 'khyims la yang bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-23: rma red cing kha phra ba la sogs pa la rma la phan par bshad pa'i til mar dang reng bu gang dag yin pa de 'khyims shing sbu gur chags pa la bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-25: sbu gu'i rma sbyor byed mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-27: ae randa'i 'bras bu chu thags su byas pa'i lde gus bskus na yang sbu gu'i rma sbyor bar byed ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-28: rgya shug 'bras bu shun pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-29: lan tshva rgya skyegs bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-30: gla gor zho sha'i lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-31: bri yang ku dang nu zho dang //
T13TD4312.3E:236b-35: rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i sman dang bud med kyi nu zho dang /
T13TD4312.3E:236b-37: shing snu ha'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba'i reng bus kyang rma 'khyims shing sbu gur chags pa myur du 'tshob par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-2: lce myang tsha ni legs par bsregs //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-3: gla gor zho sha khyim dud pa /
T13TD4312.3E:237a-4: aa mra da ka seng ldeng gi / lo ma dzi na skyer pa gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-5: lde gus bsku ba sogs bsten na //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-6: skyabs med mi brtan skyes bu yi //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-9: rgya mtsho'i lan tshva dang rtsabs ru tsha la sogs pa nas ser po rnam gnyis kyi bar lde gur byas te bskus na yang rma 'khyims pa'i sbubs sel bar byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:237a-10: dper na skyes bu rang bzhin mi brtan zhing bag med par gyur pa de'i 'byor pa shin tu 'grib par byed pa dang mtshungs so //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-11: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:237a-12: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:237a-14: // / de nas nad phra mo'i dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-15: bad rlung las gyur 'brum phran ni //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-16: snum zhing mdog 'dra dud pa can //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-18: byis pa las skyes ra'i 'gram pa //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-20: bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i 'brum phran snum pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can byis pa dag las gang zhig 'byung ba de ni ming ra'i 'gram pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-21: de gnyis las byung shar gnas mthug / nas 'dra nas zhes bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-23: bad kan dang rlung de gnyis las byung ba'i 'brum phran la gnas pa mthug po nas 'dra ba ni ming yang nas 'dra ba'i 'brum phran zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-24: 'bras byer zlum po rtse mo med //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-25: rnag nyung rtag mtho 'bras byer yin //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-27: 'brum phran zlum po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni ming 'bras byer ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-29: rus sbal ltar mtho rus sbal yin ;
T13TD4312.3E:237a-31: rmen bu'i 'brum phran lnga 'am drug 'byung zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:237a-32: dbyibs rus sbal ltar 'dug pa de ni ming rus sbal zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-33: rna ba'i steng ngam kun tu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:237a-34: 'brum phran sra zhing mi bzad na /
T13TD4312.3E:237b-0: 'brum phran gang rna ba'i steng ngam rna @237b ba'i thog thag tu sra zhing shas che ran ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:237b-1: autpa la'i rtsa ba lta bur skyes ba de ming pa nas zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-2: skrang zhing cung zad nal brtan //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-3: 'gram pa'i mtshams su de gnyis las //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-4: byung ba rdo yi bong bu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-6: yang bad kan dang rlung gnyis las skrang zhing nad tshabs chung la brtan zhing sra ba 'gram pa'i mtshams su byung ba ni ming rdo'i bong bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-7: shal ma li yi tsher ma 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-8: 'brum phran nad bcas mthug po ni //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-9: nang na tshil yod lang tsho la //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-10: byung ba bzhin ni ma rungs byed //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-12: yang bad kan dang rlung las byung ba'i 'brum phran shing shal ma li'i tsher ma 'dra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma can lang tsho dang ldan pa la byung ba gang yin pa de ni bzhin ma rungs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-13: bad kan rlung gyur padma yi //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-14: tsher ma 'dra bas khyab gyur cing //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-15: dkar zhing nad ni med pa dag / padma'i tsher ma can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-17: yang bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa padma'i tsher ma 'dra bas khyab par gyur pa de ni ming padma'i tsher ma zhes bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:237b-18: ji ltar padma'i tsher ma dkar po phra mos khyab pa lta bu'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-19: mkhris pa las gyur 'brum phran zlum //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-21: shas cher tsha zhing rims 'debs byed //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-22: gas ba kha bye zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-24: 'brum phran gang mkhris pa las gyur pa au dum w'a ra'i 'bras bu smin pa 'dra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can ni ming kha bye ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-25: lus kyi nad dang gdong la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-26: tsha zhing nad dang ri mas skyed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-27: sran chung tsam la de mdog can //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-28: 'brum phran mthug po sran chung yin //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-30: lus kyi yan lag rnams dang /
T13TD4312.3E:237b-31: gdong la tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brum phran byung ba de ni ming sran chung zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-32: de bas 'brum bu nad tshabs che //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-33: sdug bsngal byed pa 'brum bu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-35: sran chung de bas kyang 'brum bu nad tshabs che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can ni ming 'brum bu zhes bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-36: rlung mkhris las gyur 'brum bu'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:237b-37: padma'i snying po lta bu yi //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-1: phran gyis ni phug pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-3: rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i padma'i snying po'i dbyibs 'dra ba'i 'brum bu phra mos khyab pa ni ming phug pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-4: de dag nyid skyed bong bu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-5: zlum zhing rgya che mtho ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-6: mdog dmar 'brum phran dag gis khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-8: rlung dang mkhris pa de gnyis las thor bu gang zlum zhing lhun che pa la sogs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ming bong bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-9: phal cher rlung las mchan khung du //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-10: nye bar skyes pa mchan khung 'brum //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-12: 'brum phran gang phal cher rlung las gyur cing mchan khung gi phyogs su byung bar gyur pa de ni ming mchan khung zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-13: mkhris pa las gyur 'brum phran ni //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-16: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'brum phran gang phra zhing mthug la 'bras yos dang dbyibs 'dra ba ni ming 'bras yos zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-17: de 'dra'i chen po gcig byung ba //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-18: dri can zhes ni grags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-20: 'brum bu'i thor bu gang chen po gcig byung zhing 'bras yos dang dbyibs 'dra ba de ni ming dri can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-21: tsha ba'i rdul gyis lus gdungs la ;
T13TD4312.3E:238a-22: /'brum phran nad bcas stug po ni //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-23: dbyibs dang tshad mdog ske tshe 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-24: de ni ske tshe zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-26: 'brum phran gang rdul dang tsha ba las byung ba nad dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can ni ming ske tshe zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-27: mkhris pa shas che'i nad kyis ni /
T13TD4312.3E:238a-28: me dbal lta bur dal gyis mched //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-29: skrang zhing snum la srab cing dmar //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-30: rim skyed dra ba'i bong bu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-32: rlung la sogs pa'i nad mkhris pa'i shas che ba las me dbal lta bus rim gyis dal bu'i mched pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can ni ming dra ba'i bong bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-33: mkhris shas che ba'i 'brum bu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-34: rim skyed sha la gnod byed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-35: mchan khung phyogs byung me'i mdog can //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-36: 'dra ba de ni me skyed yin //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-37: zhag lnga 'am ni zhag bdun nam //
T13TD4312.3E:238a-38: zla ba phyed nas srog 'phrog byed //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-0: nad gzhi gsum @238b mkhris pa'i shas che ba la mchan khung gi phyogs su 'brum bu me'i mdog dang 'dra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can skyed pa gang yin pa de ni me skyed pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:238b-1: des ni zhag lnga la sogs pa nas srog 'phrog par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-2: nad gzhi gsum skyes 'brum bu zlum //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-3: nam tshong yan chad skyes sa skor //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-5: nad gzhi 'dus pa las gyur pa'i 'brum bu gang zlum pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni ming sa skor zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-6: mchan khung chu sor bi da ri'i //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-7: rtsa ba ltar sra bi da ri //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-9: mchan khung dang chu sor bi da ri'i rtsa ba ltar 'brum phran byung ba de'i ming ni bi da ri zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-10: tshil dang bad rlung las gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-11: rmen bu rtsa rgyus sha la gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-12: brtol na mar zhag sbrang rtsi 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-13: 'dzag gyur de la rlung shas che //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-14: sha skam rmen bur byas nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-15: gseg ma lta bur skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-16: khrag ni dri mnam rnags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-17: kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-18: nad kyis de la khrag 'dzag pa //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-19: de ni 'brum bu gseg ma can //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-21: tshil la sogs pa las gyur pa'i rmen bu gang rtsa la sogs pa la gnas pa 'byung la /
T13TD4312.3E:238b-23: zhag dang sbrang rtsi 'dra ba 'dzag par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:238b-24: de dag gi nang nas gal te rlung gi shas chen ni sha skam par byed pa nas sha'i rmen bu gseg ma lta bu skyed par byed cing /
T13TD4312.3E:238b-25: der dri ma la sogs pas khrag dri mnam pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can de las 'dzag par 'gyur ba'i nad de ni 'brum bu gseg ma can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-26: lag pa rkang mthil tshigs dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-27: nam tshong yan chad grog mo yi //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-28: mgo ltar rim gyis rmen bu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-29: phra mo mang pos khyab byed la //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-30: na zhing tsha la g-ya' zhing 'drul //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-31: kun du skyes te grog mo'i mgo / zhes bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:238b-32: lag pa dang rkang pa'i mthil la sogs par 'brum phran gyis khyab nas rim gyis rmen bur 'byung zhing de lta bu mang pos khyab par 'gyur lan ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can skyes pa gang yin pa de ni nad gzhi gsum las byung ba'i nad grog mo'i mgo bo zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-33: rkang mthil gshags mas brud pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-34: tsher ma sogs kyis snad pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-35: 'brum bu phur ba ltar mtho ba //
T13TD4312.3E:238b-36: skyes te mdzer pa 'dra zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-0: @239a * // tsher ma la sogs pas rkang pa brud pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:239a-1: snad pas phur pa lta bu'i thor bu skyes pa de ni mdzer pa 'dra ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-2: shugs bkag pa yis rlung dag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-3: gzhang dang rkang pa la gnas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-4: phyi dang nang du rgyu byed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-5: lam rgyu de las bshad ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-6: dka' bas 'byung bar byed pa'i nad /
T13TD4312.3E:239a-9: shugs bkag pa'i dbang gis gzhang gi phyi dang nang du 'khrugs pas /
T13TD4312.3E:239a-10: bshang ba shin tu dka' bas 'byung bar byed pa ni gzhang 'gags pa zhes bya bar slob dpon rnams 'dod do //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-11: rlung mkhris kyis ni sen mo yi //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-12: nang gi sha smin nad skyed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-13: ma snad nad dang tshim pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-14: nye ba'i sen mo zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-16: rlung dang mkhris pa 'khrugs pa las sen mo'i nang gi sha smin cing nad skyed pa ni ma snad pa'i nad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:239a-18: nye ba'i sen mo zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-19: snad pas gnag cing rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:239a-20: sra ba sen mo ngan zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-22: sen mo gang snad pas gnag pa la sogs par gyur pa ni ming sen mo ngan pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-23: 'dam ni gnod byed la reg las //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-24: nad na g-ya' zhing rnag bcas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-27: sor mo'i 'dam gnod par byed pa la reg pas g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ming 'bras 'byer ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-28: pags pa til 'dra gnag pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-29: nad med byung gyur rme ba ste //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-30: de nyid 'bur ba mdzer pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-32: pags pa la gnas shing til 'dra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni rme ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-33: rme ba de nyid cher 'bur bar gyur pa ni mdzer pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-34: mdzer pa las kyang chen por gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-35: dkar nag pags pa'i mdzer pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-37: mdzer pa las kyang shas cher mtho bar gyur cing mdog dkar nag tu gnas pa de'i ming pags pa'i mdzer pa chen po can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-39: dmar po rgya skyegs nor bu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-41: yang tshul mdzer pa sbom po 'dra ba 'brum bu chen po'i mdog dmar ba skyes pa'i ming ni rgya skyegs kyi nor bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-42: dkar ba 'am gnag par lhan cig skyes //
T13TD4312.3E:239a-43: zlum pa 'am mtshan ma zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-0: zlum po la mdog dkar ba'am @239b gnag par gnas par skyes pa ni ming mtshan ma zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-1: mya ngan khro dang rlung mkhris sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-2: 'khrugs te gdong ni srab gyur cing //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-3: thig le nag po ngo shig can //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-5: mya ngan dang khro ba dang rlung mkhris pa la sogs pa las gdong la srab cing zlum pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni ming ngo shig can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-6: gdong las gzhan byung khabs zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-8: thig le tal til te gdong las gzhan du byung ba ni khabs zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-9: rlung gyur ngo shig rtsub par snang /
T13TD4312.3E:239b-10: reg na rtsub cing gnag pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-12: rlung las gyur pa'i ngo shig ni rtsub bar snang zhing reg na yang rtsub pa dang gnag pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-13: mkhris gyur mtha' ma cung zad sngo //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-15: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i ngo shig ni mtha' ma dmar zhing cung zad sngo ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-16: bad kan las gyur mtha' dkar g-ya' //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-18: bad kan las gyur pa'i ngo shig ni mtha' ma dkar zhing g-ya' ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-19: khrag gyur mtha' ma zangs mdog can //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-20: skam zhing tsha ba tsag tsag byed //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-22: khrag las gyur pa'i ngo shig ni mtha' ma dmar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin zhing yungs kar gyi lde gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba tsag tsag por byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-23: rlung gis bad kan bslangs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-24: pags par phyin te skams gyur nas //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-25: de las pags pa skya 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-26: rim gyis tshor ba med 'gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-27: g-ya' ba chung zhing 'drul ba med //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-28: bem po de ni tshong med yin //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-30: rlung gis bad kan bslangs shing skyed par gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:239b-31: de'i 'og tu pags par phyin nas skams par gyur pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:239b-32: pags pa skya bar 'gyur la rim gyis tshor ba med par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:239b-33: 'drul ba med pa de ni bem po lta bur 'dug pa'i phyir tshor ba med pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-34: skyug sman nyes dang ma zhu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-35: bad mkhris lus la gnas bslangs pas //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-36: rab g-ya' zlum po gor gor po //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-38: / rjes 'brel ldan pa zlum por bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:239b-40: skyug sman gyi sbyor ba nyes pas ma zhu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:240a-0: bad kan la sogs pa lus la gnas pa bslangs shing bskyod pas lus rab tu g-ya' zhing zlum po gor gor bo mdog dmar pa mang du 'byung bar gyur pa de ni rjes su 'brel ba'i nad @240a * //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-1: zlum po zhes bya bar drang srong dag gis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-2: de ltar nad ni phra mo yi //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-3: dbye ba sum cu drug tu bstan //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-5: de ltar na nad phra mo'i dbye ba ni spyir sum cu rtsa drug yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-6: zhes slob dpon gyis bshad cing bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-7: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:240a-8: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:240a-10: // / de nas nad phra mo'i gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-11: ra yi 'gram pa ma smin pa //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-12: srin bu pang [?] pas khrag dbyung ngo ;
T13TD4312.3E:240a-14: ra yi 'gram pa zhes bya ba'i 'brum bu ma smin pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:240a-15: srin bu pad pa'i gtar gas khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-16: nas 'dra dugs ni byas nas su /
T13TD4312.3E:240a-17: thang shing ru rta ldong ros dang //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-18: ba bla'i lde gu bskus te bzhu //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-20: nas 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni dang por dugs byas nas bzhu bar bya ba'i phyir thang shing la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-21: rdo yi bong bu 'ang de ltar gso //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-24: rdo'i bong bu zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i tshul du gso'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-25: ra'i 'gram pa zhes bya ba smin pa'i rma dang 'dra bar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-26: bzhin gnod seng phrom 'u su dang //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-27: shu dag btags pa'i lde gu 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-29: bzhin la gnod ba 'am ma rungs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i nad ni seng phrom la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-30: n+ya gro dha yi lo ma 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-31: rgya star lo ma tsha sbyar bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-33: yang na bzhin ma rungs par byed pa la n+ya gro dha la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-34: des ma zhin skyug sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-35: sna sman dpral bar gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-37: sbyor ba des kyang ma zhin skyug sman la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-38: padma'i tsher ma nim pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-39: khu pa 'am nim pa mar bskol bar //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-40: sbrang rtsi dang ni bcas pa blud //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-41: nim pa dong gar sbyar pas byug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:240a-42: padma'i tsher ma lta bu zhes bya ba la ni nim pa'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:240a-43: nim pa dang mar bskol ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa blud par bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:240a-44: nim pa dang dong gar sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-45: kha bye sogs nas dra bong bar //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-46: sa skor bcas pa mkhris pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-47: me dbal lta bur gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:240a-48: me skyed pa ni spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-1: kha bye ba nas sngo ba'i bong bu'i bar gyi 'brum phrans [?] skor dang bcas pa ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i ming me dbal lta bur gso bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:240b-2: me skyed pa zhes bya ba ni spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-3: dra ba'i bong bu smyung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-4: gtar ga gdab dang rtsub chos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-5: lus kyi sbyang ba skyu ru ra'i //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-6: sbyor ba'i bsil sman byug pas gso ;
T13TD4312.3E:240b-7: / bi da ri la khrag gtar zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-8: bad kan rmen bu lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-10: dra ba'i bong bu zhes bya ba ni rtag tu smyung ba byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:240b-11: gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:240b-12: zas dang sman gyis rtsub chos bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:240b-13: skyug sman la sogs pa'i lus kyi sbyong ba la sogs pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-14: bi da ri la ni rngabs rva la sogs pas khrag dbyung zhing bad kan gyi rmen bu ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-15: gseg ma lta bu'i 'brum phran la //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-16: tshil gyi rmen bu lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-18: gseg ma lta bu'i 'brum bu la ni tshil gyi rmen bu dang 'dra bar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-19: grog ma'i mgo 'dra bu ga mang //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-20: cher skyes skrang zhing gnad la gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-21: rkang pa lag par byung ba spang //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-23: grog ma'i mgo 'dra zhing bu ga mang ba la sogs pa ni spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-24: cig shos las ni khrag dbyung la //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-25: rgyam tsha dong ga sle tres dang //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-26: ci tse rgya sran rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-27: dan da til btags nas phyes bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-29: snga ma dang mi mthun par gnas pa'i grog ma lta bu'i 'brum phran ni gtar ga byas la rgyam tsha la sogs pas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-30: smin pa la ni nad can sha //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-31: thams cad legs par sbyang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-32: mtshon gyis bcad la de rjes la //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-33: thal sman yang na me yis bsreg / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:240b-34: grog ma 'dra ba'i smin pa la ni thams cad legs par sbyang ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-35: mdzer ba 'dra ba gtsags bu yis //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-36: ma lus bcad la snum gyis bsreg / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:240b-37: mdzer ba 'dra ba'i nad la ni gtsags bus kun bcad la /
T13TD4312.3E:240b-38: de'i 'og tu mar bskol bas bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-39: gzhang 'gags pa la nor bu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-40: 'gags pa lta bur gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-42: gzhang 'gags pa'i nad la ni nor bu 'gags pa ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-43: nye ba'i sen mo sbyang ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-44: tsha ba bsal te mtshon gyis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:240b-46: nye ba'i sen mo zhes bya ba'i nad ni skyug sman la sogs pas sbyang ba byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:241a-1: pa'i las kyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-2: sen mo ngan la'ang de bzhin bya //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-4: sen mo ngan pa zhes bya ba'i nad la yang bshad ma thag pa'i sbyor bas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-5: rkang pa'i chu ser dag la yang //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-6: 'bras bu skyur po nag tshur bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-7: til dang gi'u wang nim pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-8: lo ma'i lde gus bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-10: rkang pa'i chu ser gyi nad la ni 'bras bu skyur po kanydzi zhes bya bas bkrus la nag tshur la sogs pas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-11: sme ba mdzer par bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-12: me shel thal sman dag gis bsreg / yang na me btsa' gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-14: sme ba dang mdzer pa dag ni me shel lam /
T13TD4312.3E:241a-15: thal sman nam me btsas bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-16: de bzhin lpags mdzer rgya skyegs nor //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-17: mtshon gyis bcad de de bzhin gso //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-19: de bzhin du mdzer pa chen po dang rgya skyegs kyi nor bu zhes bya ba ni gtsags bus bcad de me shel la sogs pas bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-20: mtshan ma can sogs gsum po la //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-21: nye ba'i phyogs la gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-23: mtshan ma can dang khye ma yang 'dir bsdu /
T13TD4312.3E:241a-24: ngo shig dang khabs te gsum po ni nad gang na yod pa dang nye ba'i phyogs la gtar ga gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-25: 'o ma can shing myu gu shun //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-26: 'o mar btags pas bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-28: mtshan ma can la sogs pa gsum po la ni 'o ma can gyi shing gi myu gu dang shun pa 'o ma dang btags pas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-29: ngo shig aardzu na'i shun pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-30: btsod dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-31: lde gu 'am rta dkar rmig pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-32: bsregs pa'i snag tsha mar sbyar bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-34: ngo shig la ni aardzu na'i shun pa'i lde gu la sogs pas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-35: tsandan dmar po btsod dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-36: ru rta seng phrom pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-37: sran chung n+ya gro dha'i myu gu //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-38: lde gus ngo shig sel byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-39: bzhin mdangs gsal bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-41: tsandan dmar po la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na ngo shig la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-42: zi ra gnyis dang til nag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-43: yungs kar 'o mar bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-44: btags pa'i lde gus gdong bskus na //
T13TD4312.3E:241a-45: ngo shig sel zhing zla 'drar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-1: zi ra gnyis ni zir nag po dang dkar po'i dbye bas gnyis te /
T13TD4312.3E:241b-2: de la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na ngo shig dang mtshan ma can gyi skyon med par byed de zla ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-3: sran chung phub ma med brdos pa //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-4: 'o ma sbrang rtsi mar btags bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-6: yang na sran chung spun pa med par byas te brngos pa 'o ma dang btags te sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar bas bskus na yang gdong gi ngo shig la sogs pa'i skyon sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-7: tsher ma rno ba'i shal ma li'i //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-8: 'o mar btags pas bskus na 'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-10: yang na shal ma li'i tsher ma rnon po 'o ma dang btags la /
T13TD4312.3E:241b-11: gdong bskus na yang ngo shig la sogs pa sel zhing bzhin zla ba dang 'dra bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-12: rgya shug tshi gu bu ram bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-13: sbrang rtsi ri bong khrag sbyar bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-15: yang na rgya shug gi tshi gu la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang yon tan snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-16: ru rta kha lung khu ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-17: nang sbangs sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-19: yang na ru rta kha lung gi khu ba'i nang du zhag bdun sbangs pa'i lde gu dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bskus na yang yon tan de dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-20: rkang mar rtsa ba ra'i 'o ma //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-21: sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-23: yang na rkang mar la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-24: rkang mar rtsa ba ba lang rus //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-25: sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pas bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-27: yang na rkang mar gyi rtsa ba dang ba lang gi so lde gur byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:241b-28: sbrang rtsi mar dang sbyar bas bskus na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-29: 'dzam bu aa mra'i lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-30: ser po rnam gnyis zho ga chu //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-31: bu ram sar pa sbyar ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-32: tin du ka yi lo ma yi //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-33: khu bar btags pa 'ang mdog gsal byed //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-35: 'dzam bu dang aa mra'i lo ma dang ser po rnam gnyis la sogs pa sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am yang na tin du ka'i lo ma 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:241b-36: shun pa rang gi khu ba dang bcas pa'i lde gus bskus na yang bzhin gyi mdog gsal bar byed do /
T13TD4312.3E:241b-37: autpal sngo dang ru rta dang //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-38: tsandan ser po bri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-39: rgya shug tshig gu'i lde gu yis //
T13TD4312.3E:241b-40: gdong ni bskus zhing dril gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-1: sogs pa'i lde gus gdong bskus shing dril na yang /
T13TD4312.3E:242a-2: gdong padma'i mdog dang 'dab ma 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-3: tsandan ser po ni ka li yi ka ste /
T13TD4312.3E:242a-5: sman ni 'di dag btags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-6: shing mdar dang bcas bskol snum ni //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-7: nad gzhi ji bzhin ma lus la //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-8: btung dang bsku ba la sogs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-10: lde gu'i don smos pa'i sman gong du smos pa 'di dag nyid dang /
