T13TD4312.3E:242a-11: shing mngar dang bcas par bskol ba'i snum nad gzhi dang dus la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du btung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:242a-12: bsku ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-13: nas dang seng phrom sra rtsi pog /
T13TD4312.3E:242a-14: spra tshil sbrang rtsi pu shel tse //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-15: mar dang bu ram ba gcin ni //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-16: gzar bur chags kyi bar du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-17: de bskus pa yis sme ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-18: ngo shig mdzer pa myur sel byed //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-22: nas la sogs pa nas ba gcin gyi bar gzar bu la chags kyi bar gyi lde gus bskus na ngo shig sel bar byed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-23: gur gum shing mngar bu shel tse /
T13TD4312.3E:242a-24: tsandan ser dang rgya skyegs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-25: tsandan dkar dang n+ya gro dha'i //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-26: rkang pa gzhon nu shug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-27: de bzhin padma ge sar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:242a-28: autpal sngon po btsod dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-29: srang re chu bre bzhi nang du //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-30: bskol te bzhi cha lus pa ru //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-31: rgya skyegs btsod dang le brgan rtsi //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-32: shing mngar gur gum zho gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-33: phyi ma til mar srang brgyad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-35: de ni sna sman tshul bsten na //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-36: sme ba ngo shig skra dkar dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:242a-37: / gnyer ma gdong gi dri ma sel //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-38: gdong gi sha rgyas mdog gsal byed //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-40: gur gum la sogs pa srang re ji skad smos pa bzhin du bskol la til mar de sna sman du bsten na sme ba la sogs pa sel bar byed cing gdong gi sha rgyas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:242a-41: mdog gsal bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-42: btsod dang seng phrom sha ba ri //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-43: rgya skyegs ldong ros du pa ri //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-44: gur gum ru rta ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-45: gi'u wang tsandan rnam gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-46: n+ya gro dha yi lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-47: dngul chu rma shing tsandan ser //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-48: dha du ra yi shun pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:242a-49: sa bon padma ge sar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-0: sbra tshil spangs ma shug pa @242b sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-1: zhag dang 'o ma rkang dang mar //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-3: bskol ba'i mar ni bskus gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-4: ro shig gnyer ma sogs 'joms shing //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-7: sha ba ri ni ba ti ka ri 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-8: du pa ri ni aa da ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-9: gzhan ni go bar zad do /
T13TD4312.3E:242b-10: btsod la sogs pa'i sman mar bskol ba'i tshul du bskol ba'i sman mar de btung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:242b-11: sna sman la sogs par bsten na ngo shig dang khabs dang gnyer ma la sogs pa sel par byed cing /
T13TD4312.3E:242b-12: bzhin ras zla ba'i mdangs dang ldan par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-13: bring ga ra dza'i khu bar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-14: 'o ma chu bskol sna sman bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-16: bring ga radza'i khu ba la sogs pa'i sna sman btang na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-17: pags pa tshor med la rlung gi / gso ba dang ni me btsa' bya //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-19: pags pa tshor ba med pa'i nad la ni rlung las gyur pa'i mdze nad kyi gso ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:242b-20: me btsa' gdab par byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-21: lpags nad zlum por bad mkhris bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-22: mdze nad sel ba thams cad phan //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-24: lpags nad zlum po kor kor por na ba la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:242b-25: bad kan dang mkhris pa la phan pa'i sman thams cad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:242b-26: de bzhin du mdze nad la phan pa'i sman dang kha zas la sogs pa thams cad phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-27: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel ba tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:242b-28: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-29: / de nas gsang ba'i gnas kyi nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-30: bud med nyal po spangs pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-31: mod la bsten par gyur pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-32: nad dang bcas shing dog pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-33: dri ma can dang zla mtshan nam //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-34: skye gnas gzhan dang mi 'dod dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-35: bgrod min gsar du btsas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-36: dga' ba'i mthar ni dug can sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-37: chus reg pa'am ma bkrus dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-38: bskyed ba'i bsam pas sman rnon po'i //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-39: lde gu la sogs bskus pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-40: khu tshur so dang sen mo dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-41: gra ma dug can gyis reg dang //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-42: shugs dgag pa dang yun ring du //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-43: reg pa rtsub pas bdar ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:242b-44: nad gzhi 'khrugs pas gsang bar zhugs //
T13TD4312.3E:243a-0: @243a * // sos 'dzin lta bu la sogs nad //
T13TD4312.3E:243a-3: skyes pa bud med la 'khrig pa spyod pa'i nyal po spangs par gyur pa las mod la 'phral du bud med bsten cing spyod par gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-4: yang bud med nad dang bcas pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-6: dri ma can zla mchan 'dzag bzhin pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-7: yang na skye gnas mi mthun par gyur pa gzhan dag gam /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-8: bud med mi 'dod bzhin du nan gyis 'jug pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-9: yang na bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa ste slob dpon gyi chung ma la sogs pa lta bu'am /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-10: gsar du bu btsas par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-11: yang na dga' ba'i mtha' ste /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-12: 'khrig pa spyad pa'i rjes la dug la sogs pa dang 'dres pa'i chus bkrus shing reg par gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-13: chus bkrus par ma gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-14: yang na po mtshan bskyed par bya ba'i bsam pas sman rnon po'i lde gus pho mtshan la bskus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-15: de bzhin du khu tshur ram so 'am sen mo dang gram dug can gyis reg par byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-16: de bzhin du bshang ba la sogs pa'i shugs dgag pa dang yang na yun ring du reg pa shin tu rtsub pas bdar bar gyur pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-17: rlung la sogs pa'i gnad gzhi 'khrugs pas gsang ba zhes bya ba mtshan gyi nang du zhugs pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-18: rgyu de dag gis sos 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i nad nyi shu rtsa gsum skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:243a-20: nad gzhi re re khrag las gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:243a-23: 'dir de dag gi nang nas sos 'dzin pa'i nad rnam pa lnga ste /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-24: rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi re re las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-27: de la rlung gyur pho mtshan skrangs //
T13TD4312.3E:243a-28: nad mang rtag ldang lpags gas pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:243a-30: de la sos 'dzin pa zhes bya ba rnam pa lnga las rlung las gyur pa'i sos 'dzin pa ni skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-31: nad mang po sna tshogs kyis 'debs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243a-33: pags pa gas par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:243a-34: mkhris pa las gyur skrangs rims 'debs /
T13TD4312.3E:243b-0: mkhris pa las gyur @243b pa'i sos 'dzin pa ni skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243b-2: skrangs pa'i mdog au dumb'a ra'i 'bras bu smin pa 'dra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-3: bad kan gyis mkhrang snum pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-4: g-ya' zhing skrangs la lci ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-6: bad kan las gyur pa'i sos 'dzin pa ni pho mtshan ma brad [?] pa [?] dang snum pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-10: khrag las gyur pa'i sos 'dzin pa ni 'brum bu phra mo nag po 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243b-11: de bzhin du khrag 'dzag pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-12: 'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-13: rlig 'bras gnyis kyang skrangs par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-14: mi bzad na zhing ltung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-15: gas shing srin bu skye ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-17: nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i sos 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243b-18: de bzhin du rlig pa'i 'bras bu gnyis skrangs par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243b-19: de bzhin brnag par dka' zhing mi bzad par na la ltung bar 'gur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:243b-20: srin bu rnams skye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-21: de las khrag gyur 'tsho ba tsam //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-24: lnga pa de dag la khrag las gyur pa'i sos 'dzin pa mi la ba tsam du re zhig 'tshor rung ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:243b-25: 'dus pa las gyur pa ni gsor mi rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-26: nad 'khrugs pa las pho mtshan gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-27: sha khrag las ni pho mtshan gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-28: phyi 'am yang na nang du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-29: mdzer pa g-ya' bar byed pa 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-30: khrag ni spyi bag 'dzag par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-32: rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs pa las pho mtshan gyi gnas su sha khrag la brten te /
T13TD4312.3E:243b-33: de'i phyi rol lam nang du sha'i mdzer pa g-ya' bar byed pa la sogs pa 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:243b-34: mo mtshan de 'dra gdugs ltar 'dug / de ni 'brum nad /
T13TD4312.3E:243b-36: de bzhin du mo mtshan du yang sha'i mdzer pa snga ma de dang 'dra bar mdzer pa dang g-ya' bar byed pa la sogs pa la dbyibs gdugs ltar 'dug par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:244a-0: mdzer pa'i nad de ni 'brum nad @244a * //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-3: pho mo'i khu khrag nyams byed gsod //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-5: nad de dag gso bar ma byas na skyes pa'i pho mtshan nyams shing khu ba 'byung bar mi byed par gsod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:244a-6: bud med kyi khrag nyams shing gsod par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-7: pho mtshan gyi ni phyi 'am nang //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-8: bad kan khrag gyur 'brum phran ni //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-9: tshad dang dbyibs ni yungs kar 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-10: stug po'i yungs kar zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-12: pho mtshan gyi phyi rol lam nang du bad kan dang /
T13TD4312.3E:244a-13: khrag las gyur pa'i 'brum phran tshad dang dbyibs yungs kar 'dra ba stug por byung ba de ni ;
T13TD4312.3E:244a-14: yungs kar lta bu'i 'brum phran zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-15: bad kan khrag gyur 'brum bu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-16: ring zhing mang por gyur ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-17: dbus nas gas pa gang yin pa //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-18: de ni nges par 'joms zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-19: na zhing ba spu brtse bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-21: bad kan dang khrag 'khrugs par gyur pa las /
T13TD4312.3E:244a-22: 'brum bu phra mo dbyibs ring zhing mang bor 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:244a-23: des mtshan gyi dbus nas gas bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ming nges par 'joms pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:244a-24: de ni na ba dang ba spu brtse bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-25: khrag mkhris las gyur 'dzam bu yi //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-26: rus pa ltar 'dug khong stong can //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-28: pho mtshan khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'brum bu 'dzam bu'i rus pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:244a-29: tshi gu 'dra ba myur du smin par byed pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ming khong stong can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-32: 'bras byer ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyi nad ni rang bzhin gcin snyi ba dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-33: khrag mkhris las gyur 'brum phran ni //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-36: khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'brum phran mon sran rde'u'i dbyibs 'dra ba skyes pa gang yin pa de ni mchog ces bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-39: de ni padma can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-41: 'brum bu gang mchan gyi steng du padma la ge sar byung ba lta bu'i 'brum phran gyis khyab pa gang yin pa de ni padma can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:244a-42: lag pa gnyis kyis rab mnyes pa //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-2: mtshan lag pa gnyis kyis shin tu mnyes pa las 'brum bur gyur pa ni mnyes pa'i 'brum bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-3: mtshan ni mnyes par gyur pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-4: rlung 'khrugs gyur pa mnyes pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-6: mtshan ma lag pas yang dang yang du mnyes par gyur pa las rlung 'khrugs par gyur pa'i nad ni ming mnyes pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-7: mi mnyam sra zhing yon por ni //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-8: rlung 'khrugs gyur pa gtun shing yin //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-10: rlung las gyur pa'i mtshan nad rang bzhin mi mnyam pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:244b-11: sra ba dang yon por gyur pa ni drang srong rnams kyis gtun shing zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-12: rlung gis mnyes pa la sogs pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-13: nad 'khrugs mtshan gyi pags pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-14: ldog cing tsha la nad bcas shing //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-15: la lar shu ba dag tu 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-16: 'dus shing mdud pa chags pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-17: de yi nor bu thur du 'phyang //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-18: pags pa ldog pa'i nad ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-20: rlung las mnyes pa la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:244b-21: pho mtshan gyi pags pa phyir ldog cing nad dang bcas par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:244b-22: la lar pags pa de shu ba byung bar gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:244b-23: de yang phyogs gcig tu 'dus shing mdud pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:244b-24: rmen bu chags pas mtshan de'i mgo bo nor bu zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:244b-25: thur du 'phyang bar gyur pa de ni pags pa ldog pa'i nad ces bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-26: bad kan bcas las g-ya' zhing sra //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-27: rma 'tshob dka' zhing pags pa gas //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-28: gas pa'i nad ces bya bar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-30: pags pa de bad kan dang bcas pas g-ya' ba dang sra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i nad de ni gas pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-31: rlung gis pags pa gnod 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-33: de las rgyun phran nad med 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-34: nor bu'i kha ni 'gags gyur pas ;
T13TD4312.3E:244b-35: / de ni nor bu'i nad ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:244b-37: pho mtshan gyi pags pa la rlung gis gnod cing ma rung bar gyur pas /
T13TD4312.3E:244b-38: nor bu'i phyogs su 'byar cing gcin gyi rgyun 'gags par gyur pa de nas gcin gyi rgyun phra zhing nad med par 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:245a-1: gyur pa ni pho mtshan gyi rtse mo'i nor bu'i nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-2: bad kan las gyur mtshan gyi nang //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-3: gra mas gang snyam mdud pa'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-5: pho mtshan gyi nang gra mas gang bsnyam du sems pa'i nad de ni bad kan las gyur pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:245a-6: de ni mdud pa can gyi nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-7: gra mas gnod pa'i khrag gi nad //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-8: tshor ba nyams pa de ming can //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-10: gra mas gang ba lta bu'i nad kyis khrag la gnod par gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:245a-11: des na tshor ba nyams par gyur pa de ni de'i ming can te tshor ba nyams pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-12: rlung dang khrag mkhris las gyur pa ;
T13TD4312.3E:245a-13: / bu ga'i rtse mo phra ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-14: mtshan gyi nang ni kun tu khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-15: de ni kha brgya pa zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-17: mtshan gyi nang na bu ga phra mo dang ldan pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa'i nad rlung dang khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa de'i ming ni kha brgya pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-18: khrag mkhris las gyur pags pa rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-19: tsha zhing rims bcas pags pa smin //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-21: pho mtshan gyi pags par khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad rnags pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni pags pa smin pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-22: 'dus pa las gyur sha rnams ni ;
T13TD4312.3E:245a-23: / thams cad ngan pas smin pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-25: nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad pags pa rnags shing nad sna tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa ni ming sha smin pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-26: 'brum bu gnag cing dmar ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-27: 'brum bu dag gis gnod gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-28: pho mtshan shin tu na ba gang //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-29: de ni khrag gi 'brum bu yin //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-31: mtshan gang la 'brum bu gnag pa la sogs pa dag gis gnod par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ming khrag gi 'brum bu zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-32: sha yi mdzer pa sngar bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-34: mtshan la sha yi mdzer pa skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sngar bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-35: khong 'bras nad gzhi gsum las skyes //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-37: mtshan la khong 'bras nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa 'byung ste //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-38: de yang sngar bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:245a-39: 'dus pas mtshan ni rnags gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-0: sha ni @245b nag por gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-1: kun nas zhig par byed pa gang //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-2: de ni til nag ces brjod bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-4: 'dus pa'i nad 'khrugs pa las pho mtshan rnags pa la sogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni til nag ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-5: sha las gyur ba'i 'brum bu rnags //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-7: bzhi po 'di dag spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-8: lhag ma rnams ni myur du gso //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-10: mtshan gyi nad de rnams kyi nang nas sha'i 'brum bu la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-11: lhag ma nad bcu drug po ni myur du gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-12: kha zas gnod pa zos pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-13: mal stan mi bder nyal ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-14: nyal po bsten ni drags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-15: nang na nad khrag sman gnod dang //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-16: sa bon nyes pa rnam smin las //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-17: mngal gyi nad ni nyi shur 'gyur /
T13TD4312.3E:245b-19: kha zas mi 'phrod pa la sogs pa'i rgyus mngal gyi nad nyi shu 'byung bar 'gyur te //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-20: kha zas gnod pa zos pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:245b-21: mal stan mi bde bal gnod pa dang bcas par nyal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:245b-22: 'khrig pa'i nyal po ha cang bsten drags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:245b-23: de bzhin du nad khrag can gyi zla mtshan 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:245b-24: gnod par byed pa'i sman bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:245b-25: sa bon nyes pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:245b-26: sngon gyi las ni mi dge ba byas pa'i rnam par smin pas nad du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-27: rlung gis mngal la gnod gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-28: na zug yangs shing tshor ba med //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-29: grog mas khyab pa snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-30: sra zhing rtsub pa sgra dang bcas /
T13TD4312.3E:245b-31: zla mtshan sla zhing lbu ba can //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-32: nyung zhing gnag pa 'dzag par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-33: chu so rtsib logs lhod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-34: na zhing rim gyis skran bskyed la //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-35: rang ngan nyes pa de dang de //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-36: de ni rlung can yin zhes bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:245b-38: rlung gis nad 'khrugs par gyur pa las mo mtshan nam mngal du na zhing zug par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:245b-40: tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'dug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:245b-41: grog mas khyab cing rgyu bsnyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:246a-2: sgra dang bcas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:246a-3: zla mtshan sla ba la sogs pa 'dzag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:246a-4: chu so la sogs pa lhod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:246a-5: lhang lhang por na ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:246a-6: rim gyis gnas der skran skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:246a-7: de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa'i nad kyi nyes pa 'dir ma smos pas gzhan yang byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:246a-8: nad de ni ming rlung can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-9: de nyid shas cher spyad na skrang //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-10: bcas pa nyal po drags zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-12: rlung can gyi nad de nyid la shas cher nyal po spyad cing bsten drags na skrang pa dang bcas par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:246a-13: de ni nyal po drags pa'i nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-14: shin tu gzhon la 'khrig pa spyad //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-15: rgyab dang chu so byin par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-16: na zhing mngal la gnod byed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-17: de ni spyad sngas pa zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-19: bud med shin tu gzhon pa la 'khrig pa spyad pas /
T13TD4312.3E:246a-23: mngal lam mo mtshan la gnod par byed pa de ni spyad sngas pa'i nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-24: shugs 'khyil pa yi mngal du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-25: rlung gis gnod pa 'gyur pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-26: zla mtshan lbu ba can 'byung ba //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-27: 'khyil ba lta bur snang gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-30: gang gi tshe shugs bkag pa la sogs pa'i rgyus mngal du rlung gis gnod pa skyed par gyur pas zla mtshan lbu ba can 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:246a-31: de yang dba' 'khyil ba ltar snang ba 'di ni 'khyil pa can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-32: gang tshe rlung ni rtsub pos bu //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-33: skye zhing skye zhing gsod byed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-34: skyes nas gsod pa zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-36: gang gi tshe rlung 'khrugs pa'i rtsub pa'i dbang gis mngal gyi nang du skye zhing skye zhing 'chi bar byed pa de ni skyes nas gsod pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-37: 'grangs drags mi mnyam gnas par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-39: gzhan gyis gnod par gyur pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-40: mtshon gyi bu ga sha rus la //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-41: gnod gyur mngal ni yon por 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:246a-42: na gyur nang du kha bltas yin //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-0: bud med kha zas kyis 'grangs drags pa mi mnyam par gnas pa la 'dod pa spyad pas @246b rlung nad gzhan gyis bskyod cing gnod par gyur pa las /
T13TD4312.3E:246b-1: mo mtshan gyi bu ga dang sha dang rus pas gnod par gyur pas yon por 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:246b-2: nad de'i ming ni nang du kha bltas pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-3: kha zas rlung can bsten pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-4: zla mtshan rlung gis gnod gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:246b-5: bud med mo mtshan zhum gyur par //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-6: byed pa de ni khabs mig yin //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-8: kha zas rlung can bsten pa'i dbang gis rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:246b-9: bud med kyi mo mtshan zhum par gyur pa de ni ming khabs mig can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-10: dus su shugs bkag rlung 'phel bas ;
T13TD4312.3E:246b-11: / bshang dang gci ba 'gag byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-12: mo mtshan skam par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-13: shas cher na ba mngal skams yin //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-15: dga' bar spyod pa'i dus su shugs bkag pas rlung 'khrugs te /
T13TD4312.3E:246b-16: bshang ba dang gci ba 'gag par byed pa'i nad de ni mo mtshan skam zhing shin tu na bar byed pa yin pas na mngal skams pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-17: zhag drug gam ni zhag bdun nas //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-18: rlung gis mngal gnas khu ba 'byin //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-19: nad bcas pa 'am nad med pa //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-20: de ni khu bslon [?] zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-22: bud med gang 'dod pa spyad nas zhag drug gam bdun rlung gis mngal gyi gnas nas khu ba nad med pa 'am nad dang bcas pa 'byin par byed pa'i nad de ni khu ba slon pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-23: bud med mngal dang sa bon gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-24: nyes pa rlung gis gnod gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-25: 'khrig par mi dga' nu ma med //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-26: ma ning yin te gsor mi rung //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-28: bud med kyi mngal du skyes pa'i sa bon gyi nyes par rlung gis nad skyed de 'khrig pa la mi dga' zhing skyes pa mi 'dod par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:246b-29: nu ma med par gyur pa ni ming ma ning zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:246b-30: de ni gsor mi rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-31: mngal gyi nang du rlung gis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-32: gnod gyur mo mtshan khong khar gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-33: bye ba 'am lhod par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-34: rlung can bzhin du na gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-35: sha ni mtho bar gyur pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-36: mo mtshan che nad tshabs che bya //
T13TD4312.3E:246b-38: mngal gyi nang du rlung gis gnod pa byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:246b-39: mngal gyi kha dang khong par gnas te mo mtshan bye ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:247a-1: lhod por gyur cing rlung can gyi nad ltar na ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:247a-2: sha mtho la mo mtshan che zhing rgyas par gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:247a-3: mo mtshan che ba dang nad tshabs che ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-4: mkhris pa mngal na gnas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-5: nang gi nad gzhis gnod gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-6: tsha ba'am rnags par byed 'gyur zhing ;
T13TD4312.3E:247a-7: / dri mnam rims kyis 'debs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-8: shin tu tsha zhing ro ltar mnam /
T13TD4312.3E:247a-9: zla mtshan sngo nag ser por 'dzag / nad de mkhris pa can zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-11: mkhris pa rang gi gnod pa'i rgyus 'khrugs par gyur pa mngal na gnas pa de cha ba la sogs zla mtshan 'dzag par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:247a-12: nad de ni mkhris pa can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-13: zla mtshan cher 'dzag khrag can yin //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-15: zla mtshan shas cher 'dzag pa ni ming khrag can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-16: bad kan skyed par byed pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-17: mo mtshan gnod gyur na ba med //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-18: grang zhing g-ya' la dkar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-19: spyi bag tu ni 'dzag par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-20: nad de bad kan las gyur yin //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-22: bad kan skyed par byed pa'i kha zas la sogs pas bad kan 'khrugs te /
T13TD4312.3E:247a-23: de'i dbang gis mo mtshan na ba med cing grang ba la sogs pa'i nad dang ldan pa ni bad kan can gyi mngal nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-24: rlung mkhris 'khrugs pas zla mtshan zad //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-25: tsha zhing lus skems mdog mi sdug / de ni khrag zad pa zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-27: rlung dang mkhris pa 'khrugs pas zla mtshan zad pa la sogs pa khrag zad pa'i nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-28: mkhris pa shas che nyal po bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-29: sbrid pa sgregs pa bkag pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-30: mkhris par bcas pa'i rlung gis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-31: mngal du gnod pa skyed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-32: skrang zhing nyam thag reg mi bzod //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-33: zla mtshan sngo dang ser po 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-34: pho ba'i lto ni lci ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-36: chu so brla ni na zhing zug / rims skyed yongs rgyas nad ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-38: bud med mkhris pa shas che ba la nyal po bstan par 'gyur pa dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:247a-39: sbrid pa sgregs pa bkag par gyur pa'i rgyu las mkhris pa dang rlung 'khrugs par gyur pas mngal du nad skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-40: de ni skrangs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de ni yongs su rgyas pa'i nad ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247a-41: rlung dang bad kan nad gyis khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-0: mngal @247b nas skya zhing spyi bag 'dzag / nye bar 'dzag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-2: mngal du rlung dang bad kan gyi nad kyis khyab par gyur pa las skya ba la sogs pa 'dzag pa'i nad de ni nye bar 'dzag pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-3: srin bu skyes zhing g-ya' bas 'dod pa la ;
T13TD4312.3E:247b-4: / rab gdungs de ni rnam par g-yeng zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-6: mngal du srin bu skyes shing g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni rnam par g-yeng ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-7: dus min spyod par gyur pas rlung //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-8: bad kan khrag dang 'dres gyur te //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-9: zla mtshan lam ni 'gags byed de //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-10: mngal du lte ba skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-11: de ni padma'i snying po yin //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-13: dus ma yin par spyad pa'i rgyus rlung 'khrugs shing bad kan dang khrag 'dres par gyur pa las mngal du zla mtshan 'gags par byas nas lte ba lta bur skyed par byed pa de ni padma'i snying po can zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-14: nad gzhi gsum ni mo mtshan gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-15: mngal gnas rang rang gnod pa skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-16: 'dus pa las gyur nyes pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-18: rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi gsum po mo mtshan dang mngal du gnas pa las rang rang gi gnod pa skyed cing nad 'byin pa ni 'dus pa las gyur pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-19: de ltar bud med mngal nad kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-20: khu ba 'dzin par mi byed de //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-21: des na mngal du bu mi chags //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-22: mi bzad nad kyang skye 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-24: rlung sogs nad ni kun skyed byed //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-26: tshul de ltar na mngal gyi nad rnam pa nyi shur bshad pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:247b-27: des na bud med kyi mngal du sa bon 'dzin par mi byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:247b-28: de'i phyir bu mi chags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:247b-29: mi bzad pa'i nad khrag 'byung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:247b-30: gzhang 'brum la sogs pa'i nad dang rlung las gyur pa'i nad thams cad skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:247b-31: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:247b-32: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:248a-0: // / @248a * // de nas gsang ba'i gnas kyi nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-2: pho mtshan dbus nas gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-3: bsil ba'i gso bas sbyang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-4: khyad par du ni bkru sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-6: sos 'dzin pa'i nang du skyes ma thag pa la ni rnags par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-7: pho mtshan gyi dbus nas gtar ga gdab pa la sogs pa'i gso ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-8: smin na til gyi lde gu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-9: sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-11: nad de gal te smin par gyur na gtsags bus brtol nas til gyi lde gu dang sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-12: 'dzam bu aa mra klu shing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-13: nim pa kam po dza'i myu gu //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-14: rgya shug bil bas li ka //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-15: rgya skyegs ti ni sha shing shun //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-16: 'o ma can gyi shing gi shun //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-17: 'bras bu gsum ni chur bskol ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-18: khu ba des ni bkru ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-19: de bskol til mar gyis rma 'tshob //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-21: gzhan yang 'dzam bu la sogs pa'i myu gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:248a-22: rgya shug la sogs pa'i shun pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:248a-23: 'o ma can gyi shing gi shun lpags dang /
T13TD4312.3E:248a-24: 'bras bu gsum sman khu ba bskol ba'i sbyor bas bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:248a-25: des sos 'dzin pa'i nad la bkru bar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:248a-26: de dang bskol ba'i til mar gyis bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-27: spangs ma seng phrom btsag yug snam //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-28: sug smel ldong ros ba bla dang //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-29: nag tshur rgya tsha skyer khanda //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-30: rgya ma tsha ha re nu ka yi //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-31: phye ma sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-34: spangs ma la sogs pa'i sman ji skad smos pa'i sbyor bas lde gu byas pas bskus na yang nad de'i rma 'tshob par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-35: kham phor sbyar bar 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-36: bsregs pa mar bcas rma 'tshob byed //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-38: 'bras bu gsum kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bsregs pa'i phye ma mar dang bcas te bskus na yang rma 'tshob par byed do ;
T13TD4312.3E:248a-39: /'di ni spyi yi gso ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-40: re re skrang pa lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-42: gso ba 'di ni sos 'dzin pa lta bu'i spyi'i yin gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-43: nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa ni skrang pa'i nad ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:248a-44: sman pas ci nas rnags par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-0: rnags @248b na rgyus pa rtsa dang sha / zhig pas pho mtshan ma rung 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-2: sman pas sbyor ba thams cad kyis nad de rnags par mi 'gyur ba la 'bad par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:248b-3: rnags na ni thams cad du ma rungs par 'gyur ba'i skyon yod do //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-4: 'brum pa bcad dang bsregs pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-5: gso ba sos 'dzin lta bur bya //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-7: mtshon gyis 'brum pa bcad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:248b-8: bsregs pa'i rma gso ba yang sos 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-9: brud nas yungs kar bye zhib dang //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-10: bskol sman phye mas gdab par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-12: yang na de la dang por brud cing bzhar la /
T13TD4312.3E:248b-13: yungs kar gyi phye ma zhib tu btags pa btab par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:248b-14: bskol sman snga ma'i phye mas gdab bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-15: til mar de nyid kyis bsku zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-16: rma 'tshob pa yi gso ba bya //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-18: yang sman gyi phye ma de dang bskol ba'i til mar gyis bsku zhing rma gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-19: mnye gso ba ni 'di nyid bya //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-20: de dag gnyi gar gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-22: yang sbyor ba 'di nyid ni mnye ba zhes bya ba mtshan gyi nad la yang bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:248b-23: de bzhin du mnye ba yungs kar lta bu zhes bya ba gnyi ga la gtar ga gdab par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-24: khong stong la ni gtar ga bya //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-25: rnags la rma ni dag par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-26: tin du ka dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-27: seng phrom lde gu til mar bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-29: khong stong zhes bya ba la ni dang por gtar ga gdab par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:248b-30: rnags pa la ni brtol te rma dag par byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:248b-31: tin du ka la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:248b-32: yang na sman de nyid dang bskol ba'i ti la mar gyis bskus na rma 'tshob par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-33: 'bras byer la ni gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-34: gso ba'i rim pa 'di nyid bya //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-36: 'bras byer ba la ni gtar ga gdab cing /
T13TD4312.3E:248b-37: bshad ma thag pa'i gso ba 'di nyid bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-38: mchog ces bya ba'i 'brum bu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-39: brtol te lcags kyus blangs teg cad //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-40: lde gu phye ma sman khu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-41: sbrang rtsir bcas pas gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-43: mchog la ni gcad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:248b-45: mnye dang padma can la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-46: mkhris pa'i me dbal gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:248b-48: mnye ba dang padma can zhes bya ba la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:249a-0: @249a * // mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal gyi gso ba ji skad smos pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-1: pags smin tshor ba med pa la'ang //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-2: pho mo'i gso ba 'di nyid bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-4: pags pa smin pa dang tshor ba med pa'i nad skyes pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:249a-5: bud med gnyi ga la yang mkhris pa'i me dbal gso ba ji skad smos pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-6: mnye la dugs ni bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-7: ba la'i sman mar dro 'jam blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-8: mngar ba'i sman sbyar dkri dugs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-10: mnye ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan gyi nad la ni dugs bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:249a-11: ba la'i sman mar dro 'jam tsam blugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:249a-12: mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan sbyar ba'i dkri ba'i dugs bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-13: gtun shing 'dra la gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-14: bad kan rmen bu lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-16: gtun shing 'dra ba la ni rngabs rva la sogs pas khrag dbyung la /
T13TD4312.3E:249a-17: de'i 'og tu bad kan las gyur pa'i rmen bu dang tshul mthun par gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-18: pags pa ldog la mar gyis bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-19: sa lba la sogs snum gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-20: zhag gsum mam ni zhag lnga ru //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-21: dkri ba'i dugs ni spyad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-23: pags pa ldog pa'i mtshan gyi nad la ni mar gyis bskus la /
T13TD4312.3E:249a-24: de'i 'og tu sa lba la sogs pa dugs kyi le'u las bshad pa bzhin du snum las zhag lnga'am zhag gsum gyi bar du dkri ba'i dugs bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-25: dugs bya de yi 'og tu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-26: snum gyur pags pa drang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-27: nor bu rim gyis btsir nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-28: chud nas nye bar dkri bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-29: nor bu yang yang snum chos bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-30: kha zas snum can sbyin pa'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-32: de'i 'og tu yang dugs byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:249a-33: mar gyi snum chos byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:249a-34: pags pa drangs la nor bu chud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-35: chud nas kyang yang dkri bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-36: yang nad 'di la kha zas snum pa dang bcas pa yang sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-37: gas pa la yang cho ga yi //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-38: rim pa ji bzhin byas pa 'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-40: bshad ma thag pa re sbyor ba 'di ni gas pa zhes bya ba'i nad la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-41: 'gags pa sbu gu kha gnyis pa //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-42: rgya skyegs kyis ni dkris pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-43: snum bskus bu gar bcug nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:249a-44: rlung 'joms snum ni blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-0: nor bu 'gags par gyur @249b pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:249b-1: sbu gu kha gnyis pa rgya skyegs kyis bsgos pa la snum bskus pa bcug la /
T13TD4312.3E:249b-2: rlung 'joms pa'i sman blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-3: sbu gu zhag ni gsum gsum nas //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-4: legs par bskyed de spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-6: de'i 'og tu zhag gsum gsum nas sbu gu de bskyed de sbang [?] bar bya'o ;
T13TD4312.3E:249b-7: / sbu gu'i sbyor bas ma grub na //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-8: mkhas pas mdo mas kyi srubs can ni //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-9: bor te mtshon gyis dral nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-10: de 'og rma gsar cho ga bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-12: de lta bu sbu gu'i sbyor ba ni gso bas grub cing /
T13TD4312.3E:249b-14: sman pa mkhas pas srubs can ma gtogs par mtshon gyis dral la /
T13TD4312.3E:249b-15: de'i 'og tu rma gsar pa gso ba'i cho ga ltar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-16: rmen bur sbu gu'i dugs byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-17: snum zhing dro bas dkri bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-19: rmen bu mdud ba can gyi mtshan gyi nad la ni sbu gu'i dugs kyis dugs byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:249b-20: snum pa dro ba'i dugs kyis dkri bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-21: kha brgya pa ni bzhar nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-22: bska ba sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-24: kha brgya pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan gyi nad la ni gtsags bus bzhar la sman ro bska ba dang sbrang rtsis bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-25: khrag gi 'brum bu khrag gi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-26: khong 'bras bzhin du gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-28: khrag gi 'brum bu zhes bya ba'i nad la ni khrag las gyur pa li bong 'bras dang 'dra bar gso'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-29: kun la rma yi gso ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-30: gnas skabs ji bzhin sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-32: mtshan gyi nad thams cad la yang gnas skabs dang sbyar te /
T13TD4312.3E:249b-33: rma gso ba'i cho ga sbyar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:249b-34: lde gus bsku ba la sogs pa'i gso ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-35: mngal gyi nad la mang du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-36: snum chos dugs dang mas gtong sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-37: rlung 'joms pa yi gso ba bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-38: rlung las gyur la mchog tu sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-40: mngal gyi nad thams cad la ni phal cher snum chos dang /
T13TD4312.3E:249b-41: dugs la sogs pa'i rlung gso ba'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-42: de las kyang khyad par du rlung las gyur pa la ni lhag par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-43: bud med kyi ni mngal gyi nad //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-45: de bas rlung ni bsal byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:249b-46: nad gzhan gyis ni gso sman bya //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-0: gang gi phyir nad de ni rlung ma yin pa gzhan @250a * //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-2: de'i phyir dang por de bsal la /
T13TD4312.3E:250a-3: de'i 'og tu gzhan gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-4: ba la'i til mar blud bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-7: yang bud med de la ba la'i til mar la sogs pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-8: snum chos dugs ni byas te mngal //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-9: nyes par gnas pa mnyam du gzhag / yon po lag pas drang por bsrang //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-10: zhum pa slar ni bskyed par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-11: byung ba slar ni gzhug bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-12: gyes pa yongs su bzlog par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-13: mngal ni gnas nas g-yos gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-14: bud med zug rngur gyur par 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-16: mngal nyes par gnas pa la snum chos la sogs pa bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:250a-17: de'i 'og tu lag pas mnyam du legs par gzhag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:250a-18: yon po ni drang por bsrang bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:250a-19: zhum pa bskyed pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:250a-20: gang gi phyir bud med kyi mngal rang gi gnas las g-yos par gyur pa de ni zug rngu dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-21: bud med la ni slon sman sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-22: 'jam pos yongs su sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-24: bud med mngal gyi skyon yod pa la ni slon sman la sogs pa'i las rnam pa lnga po 'jam pos gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-25: rnam pa kun tu dag gyur nas ;
T13TD4312.3E:250a-26: /'jam rtsi bsku byug sman khu blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-27: byug dang ye'u gzhug la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-28: gso ba'i las ni lhag ma spyad //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-30: bud med la rnam pa thams cad du sbyang ba byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:250a-31: de'i 'og tu 'jam rtsi la sogs pa'i gso ba lhag ma rnams bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-32: rgun 'brum tang pa la 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-33: ka sa mar dang ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-34: sle tres nye'u shing sherya ka / shu ka na ya ba spru ba //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-35: pa ru sha ka zho gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-36: mar ni bre gang bcas par bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-37: de blud mngal gyi rlung nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-38: bu skyed byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-40: rgun 'brum la sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba ji skad bshad pa'i sman mar blud na yang mngal gyi rlung nad sel ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-41: zi ra go snyod pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-42: shu dag rgyam tsha ba sha ka //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-43: nas tshig 'khus thal ti mu sa //
T13TD4312.3E:250a-44: tsi tra ka dang kha rar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-0: btags te @250b chang gi dangs mar sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-1: mar brngos de ni byin gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-2: mngal nad rtsib logs snying nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-3: skrang dang gzhang 'brum sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-5: zi ra la sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba ji skad smos pa btang na yang mngal nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-6: kha lung khu ba sha ka'i rtsab //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-7: zi ra nag po go snyod dang //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-8: sen rtsi rgyam tsha'i phye ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-9: chang dang sbyar te blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-11: kha lung la sogs pa'i phye ma chang dang sbyar te blud na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-12: ra sna gzem [?] ba sha ka / bskol ba gzer 'joms mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-14: yang na ra sna la sogs pa'i khu ba blud na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-15: sle tres dan da 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-16: bskol ba'i khu ba'ang blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-18: yang sle tres la sogs pa'i sman gyi khu ba bskol ba'i chu blugs na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-19: rgya spos kanda ka ri dang //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-20: ru rta rgyam tsha thang shing rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-21: bskol ba'i khu ba til mar bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-22: spangs pa'i ye'us mngal nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-24: yang rgya spos la sogs pa'i sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:250b-25: til mar bskol ba'i til mar la spangs pa'i ye'u mngal gyi nang du bcug na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-26: mngal nad mkhris pa las gyur las //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-27: chu blugs bsku byug ye'u yi //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-28: gso ba bsil zhing mkhris 'joms pa //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-29: snum chos don du mar gyis bya //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-31: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mngal gyi nad pa ni bsil zhing mkhris pa sel ba'i sman chu blugs pa la sogs pa bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:250b-32: de bzhin du snum gyi cho ga yang zhun mar gyis bya'o /
T13TD4312.3E:250b-33: nye'u shing rtsa ba srang bzhi brgya //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-34: brdungs te btsir ba'i khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-35: 'o ma de mnyam mar bre ni //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-36: bzhi yi nang du bskol bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-37: 'tsho byed sde tshan nye'u shing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-38: pa ru sha ka rgun 'brum dang //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-39: bi la ya dang ba la gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-40: shing mngar zho ni gnyis gnyis phye //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-41: bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-42: pi pi ling ni srang brgyad brgyad //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-43: khar dkar po srang bcu gzhug //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-44: de las srang ni phyed phyed sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-45: mngal khrag khu ba'i nad sel zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-46: ro tsa bu skyed byed mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-47: glo rdol zad byed khrag mkhris dang //
T13TD4312.3E:250b-48: lud pa dbugs mi bde ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-0: mig ser rlung dang khrag dang @251a * //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-2: / me dbal dang ni snying nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-3: brjed byed kyis nyen da rgan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-4: myos byed skem byed 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-6: nye'u shing srang bzhi brgya'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:251a-7: 'o ma de dang cha mnyam par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:251a-9: nye'u shing la sogs pa zho gnyis gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.3E:251a-10: mar bre bzhi bskol la bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang brgyad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:251a-11: pi pi ling srang brgyad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:251a-12: kha ra srang bcu bcug ste /
T13TD4312.3E:251a-13: de las srang phyed phyed byin na mngal gyi khu ba khrag gi nad sel ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:251a-14: smyo byed kyi bar gyi nad nges par 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-15: de bzhin 'o ma zhun mar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-16: 'tsho byed sde tshan bskol ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-17: bu skyed mkhris las gyur pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-18: mngal nad sel ba'i dam pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-20: de bzhin du 'o ma dang zhun mar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:251a-21: 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang bskol ba'i sman mar byin na yang yon tan de dang 'dra zhing bu skyed pa dang mkhris pa'i mngal nad sel ba'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-22: ba la bre ni sum cu gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-23: bskol ba'i til mar mar bre bzhi //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-25: ka ka na mi ka ra dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-26: dzi ban ti dang ram nye ba //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-27: sthi ra nye'u shing zir gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-28: mon sran gre'u pa ya sya //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-29: ma sha parni sra ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-30: pi lu'i lo ma lhan cig bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-31: blud na rlung mkhris las gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-32: mngal nad sel zhing bu skyed byed //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-34: ba la bre sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bskol ba'i mar dang til mar de blud na rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mngal nad sel bar byed cing bu skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-35: khrag gi mngal nad khrag mdog las //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-36: rjes su 'brel pa brtags nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-37: nad gzhi bsags pa'i tshul las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-38: khrag bcad pa yi sman gtang bya //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-40: khrag gi mngal nad la ni gtar ga'i cho ga las bshad pa'i tshul gyis nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid shes par byas la nad gzhi dang rjes su mthun pa'i khrag gcod pa'i sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-41: shing mngar sbrang rtsi chu shing rtsa //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-42: ta la'i sa bon skyer pa'i rtsa //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-43: dri yang ku dang 'bras drus chu //
T13TD4312.3E:251a-44: sbyar ba blud na khrag 'dzag pa //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-0: mdog skya dmar po sel bar @251b byed ;
T13TD4312.3E:251b-2: shing mngar la sogs pa sbyar ba'i chu blud na yang khrag 'dzag pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-3: pa tha 'dzam bu aa mra yi //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-4: tshi gu dang ni brag zhun dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-6: btsod dang shal ma li'i thang chu //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-7: dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-8: gur gum bil ba bong nga dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-9: seng phrom gla sgang btsag yug snam //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-10: shing mngar tsandan dmar po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-11: kad pa la dang m'a tsi ka //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-12: ka tangka dang dug mo nyung //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-13: byi tsher ba dang da ta ki //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-14: ma du ka dang stang zil ni //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-15: skar ma rgyal la bab pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-16: btus shing btags te sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-17: 'bras kyi chur sbyar blud na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-19: gang yang khrag tu 'khru ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-20: gang yang srin bu'i nad rnams dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-21: byis pa'i nad gang yin pa 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-22: mngal gyi nad dang zla mtshan nad //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-23: gnag cing dkar dang dmar ba sel //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-24: phye ma rgyal gyi rjes 'gro ba //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-25: phan zhes rgyun shes bu yis bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-27: 'dzam bu dang aa mra'i tshi gu ni sha bor ba'i rus pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-28: aa ma bashta ni ma yo ra sha kha'o //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-29: shal ma li'i thang chu ni mo tsa ra sa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-30: ka tangka ni so na ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-31: gzhan dag ni go bar zad de /
T13TD4312.3E:251b-32: pa ta la sogs pa'i sman de dag skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe btus la btags te sbrang rtsi dang 'bras kyi chur sbyar te blud na ni gzhang 'brum la sogs pa'i nad sel par byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-33: mngal gyi nad zla mtshan nag po 'dzag pa la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-34: phye ma 'di ni rgyal gyi rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:251b-35: nad thams cad la phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-36: bad kan las gyur mngal nad la //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-37: rtsub dang dro ba'i sman kun sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-39: bad kan las gyur pa'i mngal nad la ni zas dang sgom dang sman dang spyod lam la sogs pa rtsub pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:251b-40: dro ba'i phyogs sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-41: skyu ru'i lo ma da ta ki //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-42: shing mngar autpal lig bu mig //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-43: 'dzam bu aa mra'i tshi gu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-44: seng phrom sa nag kad ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-45: se'u 'bru shing tsha tindu ka / au dum w'a ra bil ba gzhon //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-46: zho ni gnyis gnyis btags ba'i phye //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-48: til mar bre gang bskol bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-49: de bsku ba dang 'jam rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:251b-50: ras bal ye'u gzhug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-2: de bzhin spyi bag 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-3: phyir 'bur nad du zhum pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-4: 'brum bu gzer dang bcas la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-6: skyu ru ra'i lo ma la sogs ba'i sbyor ba ji skad smos pa'i tshul du bskol ba'i til mar bsku ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na mngal skrang ba la sogs pa'i nad la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-7: nas zan aa ru sbyar chang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-8: bu ram chang dang til mar bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-9: pi pi ling dang lcags phye dang //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-10: aa ru ra sbyar sbrang rtsi phan //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-12: nas zan dang aa ru ra sbyar ba'i chang bsten zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:252a-13: bu ram chang la sogs pa bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:252a-14: pi pi ling gi sbyor ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:252a-16: aa ru ra'i sbyor ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa btang na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-17: nag tshur rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-18: aa mra 'dzam bu'i tshi gu bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-19: da ta ki'i phye sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-20: spyi bag 'dzag pa dag par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-22: nag tshur la sogs pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba byin na yang mngal nas spyi bag 'dzag pa dag par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-23: rgya skyegs 'dzam bu da ta ki / mo tsa ras la mang gi / sra rtsi pog gi phye ma yis //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-24: dri mi zhim dang spyi bag 'dzag / rnags shing sra ba sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-26: rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i sbyor bas ni dri mi zhim pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bsel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-27: dong ga la sogs sde tshan ni //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-28: bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-30: yang dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi khu ba blugs na dri mi zhim pa la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-31: sra zhing rtsub par gyur pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-32: mnyen pa'i cho ga bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-33: sha brdungs pa yis glan pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-34: kri sa ra dang 'o thug gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:252a-35: mngal srab la sogs pa la ni sha brdungs te btsos shing spod btab ste glan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:252a-36: de bzhin du til dang 'bras la sogs pa'i kri sar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:252a-37: 'o ma dang 'bras btsos pa'i 'o thug gzhug cing glan par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-38: dri ngar til mar dri zhim pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-39: lde gu dri zhim bsku ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-40: dri bzangs kun gi phye ma'am //
T13TD4312.3E:252a-41: rul ba'i dri ni sel byed gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:252b-0: mngal dri mi zhim par gyur pa la ni dri zhim pa'i sman thams cad dang sbyar ba'i til mar ram lde gu'am phye mas bskus shing btab @252b pas dri nga ba sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-1: bad kan can la phal cher sman //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-2: tsha ba ba gcin mas gtong phan //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-4: mngal bad kan gyi nad shas che ba la ni sman tsha ba'i shas che ba ba gcin dang bcas shing sbyar ba mas gtong ba phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-5: mkhris pa shing mngar 'o mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-6: rlung gyur skyur bcas til mar phan //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-8: mkhris pa shas che ba'i mngal gyi nad la ni shing mngar dang 'o mar sbyar ba mas gtong ba phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-9: rlung gi shas che ba'i nad la ni skyur ba'i bag dang lhan cig bskol ba'i til mar gyi mas gtong ba phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-10: 'dus pa las gyur nad la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-11: thun mong gis ni gso ba phan //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-13: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mngal nad la ni gso ba'i sbyor ba thun mong byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-14: de ltar mngal nad dag gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-15: sa bon skyon med tha mal bar //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-16: rnam par shes pa 'jug pas na //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-17: bud med la ni bu chags 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-19: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mngal dag pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:252b-20: sa bon zla mtshan nyes pa'i skyon med pa tha mal pa dang ldan pa la ni srid pa bar ma'i rnam par shes pa 'jug pas na /
T13TD4312.3E:252b-21: bud med gal te nad dang bcas pa yin na de lta bu la bu chags par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-22: skyes pa yi ni dbang po yang //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-23: las rnam lnga yis dag bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-24: mdog las nad gzhi brtags nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-25: nad bcas de 'joms sman gyis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-27: skyes pa'i dbang po yang las rnam pa lngas sbyang bar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:252b-28: khu ba'i mdog las nad gzhi brtags la /
T13TD4312.3E:252b-29: gal te nad dang bcas pa yin na ni /
T13TD4312.3E:252b-30: nad rang rang sel zhing 'joms pa'i sman gyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-31: ru rta rgya sbos shu dag btsod //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-33: shing mngar me da ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-34: la la phud dang pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-35: shing mngar ram nye pa ya sya //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-36: aa shva gandha nye'u shing pa //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-37: zho ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phye //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-38: mar bre gang dang 'o ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-39: bzhi 'gyur dang ni bcas pa bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-40: blud na mngal dang khu ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-41: nyes pa thams cad sel byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-42: tshe ring lus ni rgyas byed la //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-43: yid gzhungs pa dang bkra shis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-44: bu skyed par ni byed mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-45: 'bras bu'i sman mar zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:252b-46: zla mtshan rgyu tshe 'thungs gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-2: 'tsho zhing sbrum ma rnams la bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-3: 'di ni mchog tu byis pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-4: lus rgyas gdon 'joms byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-6: ru rta dang rgya spos la sogs pa'i sman sna re zho gnyis gnyis zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma mar bre gang dang 'o ma bre bzhi dang bskol te /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-7: mar 'ba' zhig lus pa blud na mngal dang khu ba'i nyes pa thams cad sel bar byed cing tshe ring ba nas mngal du bu chags par byed pa'i mchog yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-8: 'di ni ming 'bras bu'i sman mar zhes bya bar bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-9: 'di zla mtshan rgyu zhing mngal chags par byed pa'i dus su blud na bu 'chi bar byed na yang 'tsho zhing mngal chags par 'gyur ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-10: sbrum ma rnams la yang bsngags shing phan pa dang mar 'di khyad par du byis pa rnams kyi lus rgyas shing brtas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-11: gdon 'joms par byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-12: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa'i tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-13: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-14: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-16: // / mtshon spyad kyis gso ba'i rgyud rdzogs so /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-18: // / de nas dug nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-19: sngon ni lha dang lha ma yin ;
T13TD4312.3E:253a-20: / bdud rtsi 'dod pas bsrubs pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-21: bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i sngon rol du //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-22: skyes bu shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-23: mche ba bzhi pa gzi brjid 'bar //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-24: skra ser mig ni me 'bar ba //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-25: de mthong 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-26: des na 'di ni dug ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-28: sngon thog mar lha dang lha ma yin bdud rtsi 'dod pa'i phyir 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-29: bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i sngon du skyes bu shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mche ba bzhi pa lus kyi gzi brjid che ba /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-31: mig me ltar 'bar ba zhig byung bar gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-32: de mthong bas 'gro ba rnams sdug bsngal bar gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-33: des na 'di la ming du dug ces bya ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:253a-34: de'i phyir de'i cha las byung ba sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa thams cad la yang dug ces bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-35: tshangs pas h'um zhes brjod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-36: bslu ba'i bdag nyid can spongs te //
T13TD4312.3E:253a-37: gzugs de rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-0: @253b gzugs la de ni zhugs par gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-2: de'i 'og tu tshangs pas h'um zhes brjod de tshar bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-3: sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i bslu ba'i bdag nyid can de rang gzugs spangs te gnod par byed pa'i gzugs de rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i gzugs la zhugs par gyur to //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-4: brtan dug nus pa mi bzad par //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-5: sdong bu la ni gnas pa gang //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-6: ka la ku ta dbang po'i bu //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-7: btsan dug ha la ha la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-9: dug de sdong bu la sogs pa la gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nus pa mi bzad cing rang bzhin brtan par gyur pa ka la ku ta dang /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-10: dbang po'i bu ste aindra bad tsha dang /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-11: btsan dug ste sring gi dang /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-12: ha la ha la la sogs pa'i dug tu gyur pa ni sems med cing brtan la mi g-yo ba'i gzugs la gnas pas na /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-13: brtan pa'i dug ce 'am mi rgyu ba'i dug ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-14: rgyu ba'i dug ni mi bzad gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-15: sbrul dang phag dang mche ba can //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-17: dug mi bzad pa gang sbrul dang srog chags phag dang /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-18: mche ba can la sogs pa la gnas pa'i dug de ni sems can la brten pa yin pas rgyu ba'i dug ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-19: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-20: bcos ma ma yin dug tu bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-22: de ltar rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dug ni bcos ma ma yin ba'i dug ces bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-23: rang bzhin gyi dug yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-24: bcos ma sna tshogs sman la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-25: sbyar ba sbyar ba'i dug ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-27: gang dug tu gyur pa'i sman sna tshogs pa la sogs pa sbyar ba ni bya ba'i las kyis bsgrubs pa yin bas na /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-28: sbyar ba'i dug ces bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-29: bcos ma'i dug kyang de nyid yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-30: de ni sbyor ba'i dbang las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-31: shin tu ring nas gsod pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-32: skrang dang skya rbab dmu rdzing dang //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-33: smyo byed gzhang 'brum la sogs skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-35: sbyar ba'i dug de ni sbyor ba'i dbang gis dug yun ring zhig na gsod par byed pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:253b-36: skrang ba la sogs pa'i nad skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-37: rno dro rtsub cing dang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-38: khyab cing myur gsod yang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-39: 'dar zhing phra la ro mi gsal //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-40: 'ju bar mi byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:253b-42: dug de ni rno ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bcu po de dang ldan zhing 'ju bar mi byed pa yin no /
T13TD4312.3E:254a-0: @254a * // rno sogs yon tan dang ldan pas //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-1: de ni mdangs las go bzlog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-2: mi ni rlung mkhris shas che ba //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-5: dug de ni rno ba la sogs pa yon tan bcu dang ldan pas mdangs kyi yon tan las go bzlog par gyur pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:254a-6: de bzhin du mi rlung dang mkhris pa shas che ba dag ni srog mod la 'phrog par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-7: dug gis lus su phyin pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-8: dang por khrag la gnod par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-9: bad kan mkhris pa rlung rjes la //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-10: nad gzhi grogs dang lhan cig 'byung //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-12: gang gi phyir dug gis lus la phyin cing song ba na /
T13TD4312.3E:254a-13: dang por khrag la gnod par byed nas /
T13TD4312.3E:254a-14: de'i rjes la bad kan dang mkhris pa dang rlung la gnod par byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:254a-15: nad gzhi gsum cha mnyam pa la ni bad kan la sogs pa la gnod cing lhan cig 'byung bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-16: de nas snying la gnas nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-17: lus la gnod pa byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-19: de nas dug de snying la gnas nas lus 'joms shing gnod par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-20: mi rgyu'i dug ni btang gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-21: lce gnag lus ni rengs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-22: brgyal dang slon dang sdang dang ngal //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-25: de nas dug de snying la gnas nas lus 'joms shing gnod par byed /
T13TD4312.3E:254a-26: 'dug par gyur nas dug gi shugs dang po la lce gnag cing lus rengs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-27: gnyis bar 'dar zhing rdul ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-28: tsha zhing lkog ma na ba dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:254a-29: / dug gis ma zhu'i gnas phyin na //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-30: snying ni na bar byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-32: dug gi shugs gnyis pa la ni lus 'dar ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:254a-33: rdul la sogs pa 'byung zhing shugs de'i tshe dug gis ma zhu ba'i gnas su phyin pas lhag par yang snying na bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-34: gsum par rkan ni skams pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-35: ma zhu'i gnas su shin tu gzer //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-36: de'i mig nyam chung ser ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-37: skrang ba nyid du 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-38: zhu ba'i gnas phyin zug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-39: skyigs bu lud pa rgyu ma 'khrugs //
T13TD4312.3E:254a-41: dug gi shugs gsum par ni rkan skabs pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:254b-0: nad @254b pa de'i mig nyam chung zhing ser ba la sogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-1: dug gi shugs ni bzhi pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-2: mgo bo lhag par lci bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-4: dug gi shugs bzhi pa la ni mgo bo lhag par lci bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-5: lnga par mchil snabs 'dzag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-7: mdog mi sdug cing nad kun 'khrugs //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-8: zhu ba'i gnas kyi 'og tu na //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-10: dug gi shugs lnga par ni lhu tshigs na ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:254b-11: rlung la sogs pa'i nad kun 'khrugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:254b-12: zhu ba'i gnas kyi 'og tu lhag par na bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-13: drug par 'du shes nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-16: drug par ni 'du shes nyams ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-17: bdun par phrag gong rgal tshigs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-20: dug gi shugs bdun pa la ni rgal tshigs na ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-21: dug gi shugs ni dang po la //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-22: slon zhing chu grang dag gis gtor //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-23: mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-24: dug gi sman ni myur du blud //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-26: dug gi shugs dang po la ni slon sman la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-27: gnyis par skyug sman bkru sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-28: snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-30: dug gi shugs gnyis pa la ni bkru sman dang skyug sman btang la snga ma bzhin du dug gi sman zhun mar dang /
T13TD4312.3E:254b-31: sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-32: gsum par dug gi sman blud cing //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-33: de bzhin mig sman sna sman gtang /
T13TD4312.3E:254b-35: dug gi shugs gsum pa la ni dug sman blud pa la ba'i gso ba ji skad smos pa ltar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-36: bdun par sna sman dud btang na phan //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-38: bzhi pa la ni dug gi sman la sogs pa sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-39: lnga par shing mngar khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-40: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud na phan ;
T13TD4312.3E:254b-42: dug gi shugs lnga pa la ni dug sman shing mngar la sogs pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-43: drug par 'khru ba lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-45: dug gi shugs drug pa la ni 'khru ba'i gso ba ji skad smos pa ltar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:254b-46: bdun par sna sman dud ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-2: sha 'am khrag ni gzhug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-4: dug gi shugs bdun pa la ni sna sman gyi dud pa bdug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:255a-5: spyi bor rgya gram byas te btral la sha dang khrag der gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-6: ko sha ta ki lang ga li //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-7: pa tha lcam pa aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-8: s'a lu sle tres shi ri sha / gi ri kar ni yung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-9: aa h'a sbrang rtsi ba spru ba //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-10: bri ha ti gnyis tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-11: sha ri ba dang pa la ste //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-12: 'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-13: bskol ba'i nas thug bsgrangs par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-14: sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa gzhug / gnas skabs gzhan la dug 'joms pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-15: sman dang gso ba thams cad bya //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-17: ko sha ta ki la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:255a-18: nas thug byas pa las bsgrangs te sbrang rtsi la sogs pa bcug nas /
T13TD4312.3E:255a-19: skabs gzhan du zhes bya ba nas skabs kyi bar du dug 'joms pa'i sman nas thug de dang /
T13TD4312.3E:255a-20: skyug sman la sogs pa thams cad bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-21: shing mngar tsandan ma du ka / padma ge sar de bzhin bya //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-23: de bzhin du shing mngar la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba dang nas thug byas te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi dang /
T13TD4312.3E:255a-24: mar bcug pa'i dug sman gnas skabs kyi bar du gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-25: dngul rdo rgya spos ru rta dang //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-26: ba bla ldong ros pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-27: tsha ba gsum dang 'bu su hang //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-28: n'a ga pushpa ge sar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-29: shing mngar spang spos ha re nu //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-30: gi'u wang mon sne'u rme ru dang //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-31: shi ri beshta sra rtsi po ga //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-32: shu ti gur gum ba la dang //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-33: bal bu tam li'i lo ma //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-34: stag pa dang ni me shel lci //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-35: ser po gnyis ni sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-36: bu mo khrus dang smyung ba byas //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-37: gos dkar bgos pa byas nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-38: dge sbyong bram ze mchod byas te //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-39: dug sman mchog ni sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-40: de tshe sman pas sngags 'dis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-41: bdag nyid bsngags te brjod par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-42: skyes bu seng ger phyag 'tshal lo //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-43: sred med bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-44: ji ltar khyab 'jug g-yul ngor ni //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-45: gzhan gyis pham par ma mthong ste //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-46: bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:255a-47: bdag la dug med grub par shog / na mo bee d'urya ya ma de /
T13TD4312.3E:255a-48: hu tu [?] hu tu [?] raksha m'am /
T13TD4312.3E:255b-0: @255b gandha ri tsanda li ma tang gi sv'a h'a //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-2: ha ri m'a ye sv'a h'a //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-4: dngul rdo la sogs pa sman bu mo khrus dang gtsang sbrar bcas pa smyung bar gnas pa gos dkar po bgos pas dang po dge sbyong dang bram ze la mchod pa byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:255b-5: skar ma rgyal la bab pa na ;
T13TD4312.3E:255b-6: dug sman gyi mchog 'di sbyar bar bya zhing sbrang rtsi dang bsre bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-7: de nas de'i sman pas sngags dang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bsngags te /
T13TD4312.3E:255b-8: skyes bu seng ge zhes bya ba nas sv'a h'a'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-9: de bzhin du 'thag pa'i tshe yang sngags gnyis pa ba ha m'a ye sv'a h'a //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-10: zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-11: ma lus dug dang ro langs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-12: gdon gyi las dang sdig pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-13: gsod byed nad dang mu ge dang //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-15: sman btung sna sman mig sman bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-16: gdu bu la sogs la sbyar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-17: 'di ni zla shar zhes bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-18: zhi dang bde legs byed mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-20: dug sman 'di ni ming zla ba shar ba zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:255b-21: ma lus pa'i dug dang ro langs la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa nas /
T13TD4312.3E:255b-22: 'jigs pa'i bar la sna sman la sogs pas btang na /
T13TD4312.3E:255b-23: zhi ba dang bde legs dam pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-24: dug rnying dug sel sman gyis zil mnan pa //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-25: nags me rlung dang nyi tshan gyis skams pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-26: rang bzhin gyis ni yon tan mi ldan pas //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-27: nyams pa'i dug ces bya ba'i dug tu 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-29: dug gang rnying par gyur pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:255b-30: dug sel ba'i sman gyi zil gyis mnan pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:255b-31: yang na nags kyi me dang rlung la sogs pas skams pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:255b-32: yang na rang bzhin gyis rno ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang mi ldan pa ni nyams pa'i dug ces bya bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-33: 'di ni nus pa chung bas mi rtogs te //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-34: bad kan dang 'dres lo ni mang bor gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-36: nyams pa'i dug ces bya ba 'di ni nus pa chung ba'i phyir 'di ni 'phral du gsal bar mi rtogs te /
T13TD4312.3E:255b-37: gal te bad kan dang 'dres na ni lo mang bo'i bar du yang gnas bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:255b-38: des nyen gyur ba mdog ngan 'khru bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-2: brgyal zhing slon la rnam rmongs skad 'dzer dang //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-3: dug gi dmu rdzing mtshan mas gnod par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-5: nyams pa'i dug des nyen par gyur pa'i skyes bu ni mdog ngan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:256a-6: bshang ba 'khru bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:256a-7: nad khrag dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:256a-8: skom dad dang yi ga 'chus pa'i nad gnyis kyis nyen pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:256a-11: sems rnam par rmongs zhing skad ngar ngar por 'dzer ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:256a-12: dug las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing gi mtshan ma gang dag yin pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-13: ma zhu'i gnas brten bad kan rlung nad skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-14: zhu ba'i gnas brten mkhris dang rlung nad skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-15: mi yi yan lag zhig cing skra 'byi bas //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-16: ji ltar bya ni spu btogs lta bur byed //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-18: nyams pa'i dug de ma zhu ba'i gnas la brten pa ni bad kan dang rlung gi nad skyed par byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:256a-19: zhu ba'i gnas la brten na ni mkhris pa dang rlung gi nad skyed par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:256a-20: mi'i yan lag zhig cing skra 'byi bar byed pas na /
T13TD4312.3E:256a-21: ji ltar bya sgro gshog dang spu btogs pa lta bur byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-22: dangs ma'am khrag la gnas par byed na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-23: lus zungs las byung nad ni sna tshogs skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-25: yang na gnod pa'i dug de dangs ma la sogs pa la gnas na ni lus zungs la brten pa'i nad rnam pa tha dad pa skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-26: mdun gyi rlung dang ma zhu grang //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-27: yul dmus gnod zas nyin par nyal ;
T13TD4312.3E:256a-28: / lus zungs gnod par byas pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-29: de bas gnod pa'i dug ces bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-31: mdun nas ldang ba'i rlung dang ma zhu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:256a-32: grang ba la sogs pas lus zungs la gnod pa na dug de lhag par gnod par byed pas na /
T13TD4312.3E:256a-33: de'i phyir nyams pa'i dug la gnod pa'i dug ces kyang bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-34: gnod pa'i dug nyen dugs byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-35: steng dang 'og nas sbyang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-36: gnod pa'i dug ni sel ba'i sman //
T13TD4312.3E:256a-37: sbrang rtsi sbyar te lde gu sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-0: gnod pa'i dug gam nyams pa'i dug gis nyen pa'i mi ni dang por legs par dugs byas @256b la ;
T13TD4312.3E:256b-1: skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis steng 'og sbyangs la /
T13TD4312.3E:256b-2: gnod pa'i dug 'joms pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-3: pi pi ling dang bya ma ka / spang spos seng phrom sug smel dang //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-4: ku tan na ta sardzi ka / ru rta shing mngar tsandan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-5: yug snam btsag dang bcas pa'i sman //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-6: gnod pa'i dug sel zhes bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-7: gzhan yang zlog par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-9: pi pi ling la sogs pa'i dug sman ni gnod pa'i dug sel zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:256b-10: des ni dug gzhan yang sel bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-11: dug mdas phog par gyur pa dag ;
T13TD4312.3E:256b-12: yang dang yang du mun thibs byed //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-13: mdog ni mi sdug gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-15: 'dis ni srin bus khyab pa ltar //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-16: lus tsha tsag tsag por 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-17: gdong mo rgyab dang phrag pa mgo / lhu tshigs rnams su na bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-18: khrag ni nad can gnag pa 'dzag / skom dad brgyal tsha rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-19: mig ni gnag cing slon pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-20: btud mar lud pa dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-21: rma dmar mtha' mar ser ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-22: dbus na gnag cing shin tu na //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-23: 'phral du skrangs shing rnags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-24: sha yang nag por gyur nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-25: gnag cing shin tu 'drul bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-26: spyi bag can du 'dzag par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-28: skyes bu dug mdas phog pa ni yang dang yang du mun thibs zhes byed cing mun par zhugs pa snyam du sems pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:256b-29: mdog mi sdug pa la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:256b-30: rma'i mtha' shin tu ser cing dbus na dug gi gnod pas gnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:256b-31: 'phral du skrangs shing rnags pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-32: gnad du phog par ma gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-33: myur du snying la phan byed bya //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-35: gnad kyi steng du ma phog pa la ni myur du snying la phan par byed pa'i sbyor ba mar la sogs pa gang dag yin pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-36: zug rngu phyung la lcags bsregs pas //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-37: rma ni legs par bsreg par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-39: lus la zug rngu phyung la /
T13TD4312.3E:256b-40: de'i 'og tu lcags bsregs pas rma bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:256b-41: yang na mu ka ka dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-0: @257a * // gi ri karni dkar po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-1: kad pa la yi shun pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-2: btsod dang shir sha bya rgod sen //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-3: bsregs pa'i thal bas bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-5: yang na rma de mu ka ka la sogs pa bsregs pa'i thal bas bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-6: shu ka na sa bong nga dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-7: kunda [?] ka ri'i rtsa bas bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-9: yang na rma de shu ka na sa la sogs pa'i rtsa ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-10: dug 'thung sos btab gso ba dag / ci rigs par ni de la bya //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-12: dug mdas phog pa de la dug 'thungs pa'i gso ba dang sbrul la sogs pas sos btab pa'i gso ba dag gis kyang ci rigs par gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-13: rma yi sha ni rnags pa de //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-14: mkhris pa'i me dpal lta bur gso //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-16: rma'i sha rnags pa la sogs pa la ni mkhris pa'i me dbal dang 'dra bar gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-17: bde phyir khyo la bud med dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-18: rgyal po la ni dgras bslabs te //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-19: zas dang sbyar ba'i dug bsres pa //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-22: rang gi bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir dgra bos bud med la bslabs te dug ster du 'jug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:257a-23: de bzhin du rgyal po la de'i dgra bos nye 'khor gyi skye bo la bslabs te kha zas dang sbyar ba'i dug bsres te ster bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-24: sna tshogs lus kyi dri mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-25: mi mthun sman dang thal ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-26: nus pa chung bar gyur pa'i dug / sbyar ba'i dug ni sbyar ma yin //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-28: srog chags sna tshogs pa'i lus kyi dri ma dang mi mthun zhing mi 'phrod pa'i sman dang thal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:257a-29: nus pa chung bar byed pa'i dug gcig tu bsres te sbyar ba ni dug sbyar ma zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-30: des nyen mdog skya rid pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-31: me drod nyams shing lud pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-32: dbugs mi bde dang rims kyis nyen //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-33: rlung ni mi mthun rgyu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-34: gnyid che yid ni zhum par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-35: gcin snyi lto ba mchin pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-36: mcher pa na zhing skad gsang dma' //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-37: nyam chung sgyid ni zhan pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-38: skrangs shing rtag tu sbo ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-39: rkang pa lag pa skam zhing zad //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-40: rmi lam du ni ce sbyang dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257a-41: byi la sbrul dang ne'u le dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-0: spre'u mthong zhing @257b phal cher ni //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-1: nags tshal mtsho ni skams par mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-2: bdag nyid nag por mthong 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-3: ser bo nag por mthong bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-4: mig sna rna ba med pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-5: de yi dbang po nyams par mthong //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-6: 'di dang gzhan yang gnod pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-7: bla brnan mi bzad mang pos gtses //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-9: sbyar ba'i dug des gzir bar gyur pa'i mi ni mdog skya bo bseng bseng por gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:257b-10: lus rid cing rjud pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:257b-11: sgyid zhan zhing las la spro ba chung ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:257b-12: zad byed kyis btab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:257b-13: rmi lam du yang phal cher ce sbyang la sogs pa mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:257b-14: bdag nyid nag po la sogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:257b-15: rna ba dang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po nyams par mthong ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:257b-16: 'di dag dang gzhan yang gnod pa'i bla brnan mi bzad pa rnam pa mang pos gtses par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-20: sbyar ba'i dug gis nyen pa las 'phral du gso ba ma byas na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-21: dbyig dug slon byas kha zas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-22: de la phan pa'i bza' btung sbyin //
