T13TD4312.3E:257b-23: sbyangs nas gser ni bsten bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-24: mdo nas bstan pa bzhin du bya //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-26: dbyig dug gis zin pa la ni dang por skyug sman btang ste /
T13TD4312.3E:257b-27: de la phan pa'i kha zas byin la khong pa sbyangs nas gser la sogs pa'i bsten pa'i cho ga mdo'i gnas las bstan pa bzhin du bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-28: gser dang zangs kyi phye ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-29: sbrang rtsi kha ra dkar por sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-30: lde gus dug ni mi bzad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-31: dbyig dug thams cad sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-33: gser dang zangs ma'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang kha rar sbyar te /
T13TD4312.3E:257b-34: lde gu byas pa zos na yang mi bzod pa'i sbyar ba'i dug sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-35: mur ba sle tres pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-36: rgya spos dbyi mo pa to la //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-37: gla sgang shu dag tsi tra ka / byi dang ka ni dar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-38: chu dron zho ga chur sbyar ba //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-39: skyur khu dang sbyar blud na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:257b-40: dbyig dug gis bcom me drod sbyong //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-0: dbyig dug gis me drod nyams par gyur pa la ni mur ba la sogs pa'i sman chu dron la sogs pa gang rung dang sbyar ba @258a * //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-2: zur pa ma nu phug ron gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-3: sha bskol khu ba bsgrangs pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-4: dbyig dug skom dang lud pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-5: skyigs bu dbugs mi bde rims sel //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-7: zur pa dang ma nu zhes bya ba pushkar m'u la sha khu dang sbyar te bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa blud na yang dbyig dug las gyur pa'i skom dad la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-8: dug gi rang bzhin dus dang zas //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-9: nad gzhi lus zungs tshogs 'dus pa //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-10: dug gi nyam nga zhes bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-12: dug gi rang bzhin mi bzad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:258a-13: de mthun rkyen du byad pa'i dus dang kha zas la sogs pa 'dus shing gcig tu phrad pa ni dug gi nyam nga ba zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:258a-14: tshogs pa de dang ldan pa brgya las gcig cig 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-15: bkres skom nyam ni chung ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-16: khro dang mya ngan 'jigs ngal dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-17: ma zhu ba dang 'khru ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-18: mkhris pa rlung ni 'phel ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-19: til gyi me tog 'bras bu snum //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-20: sa yi rlangs pa 'brug sgra dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-21: gling bu pi wang rol mo yi //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-22: sgra dang mdun gyi ser bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-23: autpal dri dang myos pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-24: dug gi nyam nga 'phel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-25: dbyar ni char gyi dus yin pas //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-26: bu ram lta bur rlan can 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-27: lus la khyab byed dbyar 'das nas //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-28: ri byi 'char bas de med byed //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-29: de bas sprin bral dus su ni //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-30: nus pa chung ba nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-32: dug ni bkres skom la sogs pa 'phel bar byed cing sprin las byung ba yin pa'i phyir dbyar bu ram rlan can lta bur zhu zhing lus la khyab par byed la dbyar 'das nas skar ma ri byi 'char ba de'i tshe ni nus pa de 'bri zhing med par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-33: de bas na sprin dang bral ba'i dus ston gyi tshe ni dug gi nus pa chung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-34: de ltar rang bzhin goms pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-35: gnas dus shugs stobs che chung ba //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-36: brtags te mkhas pas shes byas la ;
T13TD4312.3E:258a-37: / de rjes gso ba'i las spyad bya //
T13TD4312.3E:258a-39: de ltar tshul 'dis ni rang bzhin dang goms pa dang gnas dang dus dang shugs dang stobs che ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:258a-40: chung ba blos brtags te de la mkhas par byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:258a-41: de'i 'og tu gso ba'i las la 'jug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-0: bad kan can ni @258b slon dang dro //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-1: rtsub dang rno ba'i sman bsku zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-2: bska dang kha dang tsha ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-3: zas kyi dug ni bsal bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-5: bad kan gyi dug ni slon pa la sogs pas bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-6: mkhris can bkru sman sman chu blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-7: shin tu bsil ba'i sman bsku zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-8: bska dang kha dang mngar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-9: mar bcas kha zas sbyin bas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-11: mkhris pa can gyi dug ni bkru sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-12: shin tu bsil ba'i sman gyi chu blugs pa la sogs pas bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-13: rlung gi bdag nyid can mngar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-14: skyur dang lan tshva mar bcas pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-15: bza' ba mar bcas bsku byug dang //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-16: de bzhin sha ni bza' bas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-18: rlung gi bdag nyid can gyi dug ni kha zas mngar ba la sogs pa mar dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:258b-19: de bzhin du bsku byug dang bcas pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-20: bkru sman bsku byug kha zas sman //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-21: mar med bsngags pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-23: dug gi nad la bkru sman la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gang yang rung ba la mar med pa ni bsngags pa ma yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:258b-24: gzhan du ni de thams cad la mar dang bcas pa mchog tu phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-25: dug kun gnas skabs thams cad du //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-27: sman ni gzhan dag yod min te //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-28: mchog tu rlung shas che la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-30: dug thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du dug 'joms par byed pa'i kha zas ni mar dang 'dra ba gzhan med la /
T13TD4312.3E:258b-31: khyad par du yang rlung gi shas che ba la mchog tu phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-32: bad kan gnas zhugs gso bar sla //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-33: mkhris pa'i gnas brten 'bad pas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-34: rlung gi gnas su zhugs pa'i dug / shin tu gso dka' gsor mi rung //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-36: bad kan gyi gnas su zhugs pa'i dug ni gso bar sla ba yin pas na 'bad pa med pas 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-37: mkhris pa'i gnas la brten pa'i dug ni shin tu 'bad pas gso bar bya ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:258b-38: rlung gi gnas su zhugs pa'i dug ni shin tu gso dka' ba 'am gsor mi rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-0: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer @259a * //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-2: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:259a-3: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:259a-5: // / de nas sbrul gyis zin pa gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-6: mdor na sa yi steng na sbrul //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-7: gsum ste gdangs ka can lus bskyil //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-10: sa'i steng na sbrul gyi tshogs mdor bsdus na rnam pa gsum ste /
T13TD4312.3E:259a-11: la la ni gdengs ka can gzar bu'i mgo lta bu yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-12: la la ni lus bskyil ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-13: la la ni khra bo yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-15: dbye ba mtha' yas gyur pa dag / skye gnas dbye bas rgyas par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-16: dgos pa med phyir ma bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-18: gdengs ka can la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i sbrul de dag ni skye gnas kyi dbye bas rgyas par phye na dbye ba mtha' yas mod kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:259a-19: de ni skabs 'dir dgos pa med pa'i phyir bdag gis 'dir ma bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-20: mchog tu rtsub dang tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-21: skyur dro mngar bsil dag las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-22: gdengs ka can la sogs pa'i dug / rim gyis rlung sogs 'khrug par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-24: gdengs ka can gyi dug ni mchog tu rtsub pa dang tsha ba yin pas rlung nad skyed par byed pa yin no ;
T13TD4312.3E:259a-25: / lus bskyil ba'i dug ni skyur ba dang dro ba yin pas mkhris pa skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-26: sbrul khra bo'i dug ni khyad par du mngar ba dang bsil ba yin pas bad kan skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-27: gzhon dang rgan po bar ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-28: dbyar dang dgun dang sos kar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-30: gzhan dag dus tshigs rnams su 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:259a-32: de ltar na gdengs ka can dang /
T13TD4312.3E:259a-34: khra bo ni rim gyis gzhon pa dang rgan po dang bar ma na tshod kyi rim pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:259a-35: dbyar dang dgun dang sos ka'i dus dag tu 'phel zhing shas che ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:259a-36: de yang gdengs ka can ni gzhon pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:259a-37: dbyar gyi tshe ni dug gi shas che ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:259a-38: lus 'khyil pa ni rgan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:259a-41: dgun smad kyi tshe dug bdo ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:259b-0: khra bo ni bar ma dang @259b sos ka'i tshe dug bdo ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-1: sbrul de dag las gzhan pa tha mal pa ni dus tshigs rnams la dug gi shas che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-2: 'khor lo gshol dang g-yung drung gdugs //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-3: lcags kyu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-4: gdengs ka can ni myur 'gro ba //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-5: thams cad gdengs ka can zhes bya ;
T13TD4312.3E:259b-7: sbrul gdengs ka can ni 'khor lo dang gshol la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:259b-8: mgo bo'i gdengs ka can yod pa dang myur du 'gro bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-9: lus 'khyil sna tshogs pa yi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-11: ring zhing 'gros ni bul ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-13: lus 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i sbrul ni ri mo zlum po sna tshogs pas khyab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:259b-14: de bzhin du gzugs ring zhing 'gro ba'i 'gros bul ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-15: ri mo sna tshogs ldan pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-16: snum zhing kha dog sna tshogs pas //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-17: chu zheng bris 'gyur khra bo yin //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-19: sbrul khra bo ni ri mo sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs pas 'phred dang gyen du chu zheng du bris pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-20: go dha'i bu ni go dha can //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-21: dug ni gdengs ka can mnyam la //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-24: go dha'i bu ming go dha can zhes bya ba'i sbrul gyi bye brag ste /
T13TD4312.3E:259b-25: de ni gdengs ka can gyi dug dang mnyam par ldan pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:259b-26: yang na rkang bzhi pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-29: 'dren ma'i mtshan nyid can te des //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-30: 'dus pa'i nad ni ldang bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-34: sbrul khra bo 'di dag gi mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin par shes bar byed pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:259b-35: de dag gis ni 'dus pa'i nad skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-36: zas kyi don dang 'jigs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-37: rkang pas reg las dug rab 'khrugs //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-38: rkang gi rgyu dang 'dres pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-39: lha dang drang srong gshin rjes bskul //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-40: sbrul gyis zin bar gang bshad ba //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-41: phyi ma bzhin du dug shes che //
T13TD4312.3E:259b-43: sbrul gyi rigs tha mal pa de dag ni zas kyi don dang rnam par 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rgyus sam /
T13TD4312.3E:260a-0: lha dang drang srong dang gshin rjes bskul zhing rbad ba'i @260a * //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-1: dbang gis sbrul gyis 'dzin par byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:260a-2: de yang phyi ma bzhin du dug gi shas che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-3: des na thams cad bas kyang gshin rje'am 'chi ba dag gis bskul bas 'dzin bar byed pa de'i dug mi bzad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-4: 'jug pa'i rgyu ni shes byas nas //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-5: gso [?] ba ji bzhin bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-7: sbrul rnams kyi 'jug pa'i rgyu shes par byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:260a-8: rang gi gso ba ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-9: phal ba sdig can ngang tshul bas //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-10: lam bkag nas ni gnas pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-11: gang du kha chu gsher ba tsam //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-12: lus la snang bar byed 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-13: mche ba'i rma ni mi mngon gang //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-14: de ni mchus gnod byed ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-16: sbrul phal pa ni rang bzhin ngan pa can yin pas lam bkag nas 'dug pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:260a-17: lus kyi phyogs gang du kha chu 'am gsher ba tsam snang bar 'gyur gyi /
T13TD4312.3E:260a-18: mtshe bas zin pa'i rma mi mngon par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mchus gnod par byed pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-19: mche ba gcig las rjes gnyis mngon //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-20: khrag med gyur pa bldags zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-22: sbrul gang gis zin pan lus la mche ba gcig gi rjes las gnyis su mngon zhing de yang khrag med par gyur pa ni ming bldags pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-23: mche ba'i rjes ni khrag bcas gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-26: lus la sbrul gyi mche ba'i rjes gnyis khrag dang bcas par snang ba ni rnam par gcad pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-28: sha bcad shin tu phug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-29: khrag dbyung so yis zin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-31: mche bas zin pa gsum po de dag ni sha bcad pa las khrag rgyun du 'dzag pa ne sos 'dzin pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-32: mche ba'i rjes ni bzhi snang ba //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-33: de bzhin sos 'dzin btsir bar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-35: mche ba'i rjes gang la lus la rjes bzhi snang zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:260a-36: de bzhin du khrag rgyun mi chad par snang ba de ni sos 'dzin pa btsir ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-37: de la dang po dug med gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-38: phyi ma gnyis po gsor mi rung //
T13TD4312.3E:260a-40: sos btab pa de dag gi nang nas mchus gnod par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:260b-0: @260b bldags pa zhes bya ba gnyis ni dug med pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-2: sos 'dzin pa btsir ba zhes bya ba ni gsor mi rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-3: sbrul gyi dug ni khrag dag la //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-4: ma brtan lus la gnod mi byed //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-6: sbrul gyi dug ni khrag la ma brten par lus la gnod par mi byed kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:260b-7: de la brten nas gnod par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-8: khrag ni chung zad la brten yang //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-9: til mar thigs pa bzhin du mched //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-11: dug ni khrag cung zad la brten yang til mar gyi thigs pa chu la blugs pa bzhin du mched par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-12: sngar ma sbrul gyis reg pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-14: lan 'ga' skrang bar byed pa de //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-15: sbrul gyis lus ni bcom zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-17: skyes bu sngar ma sbrul gyis reg ste sdangs pa las rlung 'khrug par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:260b-18: lan 'ga' skrang bar byed pa yang yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:260b-19: de ni sbrul gyis lus bcom pa zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-20: bgrod dka' mun par zug gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-21: la la rtog bas zin pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-22: dug gi shugs dang slon dang rims //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-23: brgyal ba'am tsha ba skye ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-25: de ni rtog pa'i dug ces bya //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-27: skyes bu la la lam bgrod dka' bar mun pa'i nang du rgyu ba las tsher ma la sogs pa 'ga' zhig gis zug par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:260b-28: de sbrul gyis zin pa'i rtog pa skyes te /
T13TD4312.3E:260b-29: de'i dbang gis dug gi shugs slon pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:260b-30: de lta bu de la ni rtog pa'i dug ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-31: dug bcas nad kyis zug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-32: skrang dang g-ya' dang rims bcas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-33: la la tsha zhing rmen bur 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-34: de las bzlog pa dug med yin //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-36: mche ba'i dug dang bcas pa ni shas cher zug pa dang skrangs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-37: dug med pa ni zug pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma med pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-38: gdengs ka can shugs dang po la //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-40: mig dang gdong sogs gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:260b-41: srin bu rgyu ba snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-1: gyi shugs dang po la ni nad khrag nag por 'dzag par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:261a-3: lus la srin bu rgyu ba snyam du sems pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-4: shugs gnyis par ni rmen bu skye //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-5: gsum par mgo ni lci bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-7: dug gi shugs gnyis pa la ni rmen bu skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:261a-8: shugs gsum par mgo bo lci bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-9: bzhi par mig 'byed dka' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-10: sos btab rnags shing mchil ma slon //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-12: gdengs ka can gyis zin pa'i shugs bzhi pa la ni mig 'byed par dka' ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-13: lnga par tshigs 'bye snyam sems dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-14: rgyud gzhan tshigs ni 'jig pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-15: lus tsha skyigs bu 'byung ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-17: de'i shugs lnga pa la ni lhu tshigs 'bye ba snyam du sems pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-18: drug par snying na lus lci zhing ;
T13TD4312.3E:261a-21: shugs drug pa la ni snying na ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-22: bdun par khu ba'i gnas phyin nas //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-23: phrag gong rgyab dang rgal tshigs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-24: rked pa zhig pa snyam sems zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-25: spyod lam thams cad las nyams 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-27: gdengs ka can gyi shugs bdun pa la ni khu ba'i gnas su dug de phyin par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:261a-28: phrag gong na ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-29: de nas lus bskyil bas zin na //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-30: nad khrag ser por 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-31: de yis lus ser tsha ba skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-33: sbrul lus 'khyil pa zhes bya bas zin pa ni khrag ser por gyur pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-34: gnyis par skrang bar 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-36: lus bskyil ba'i shugs gnyis pa la ni lus skrang par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-37: gsum par sos btab rnags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-38: rdul dang skom dad skye bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-40: shugs gsum pa la ni sos btab pa'i rjes rnags pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-41: bzhi par khong tsha rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.3E:261a-42: lnga par lus kun khyab par tsha [?] //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-0: bzhi pa dang lnga ba'i dug gi shugs @261b ni khong tsha ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-1: sbrul ni khra bos zin gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-2: khrag ni skya bor 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-3: des ni lus mdog skya bor 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-5: sbrul khra bos zin par gyur na khrag gi tshogs skya bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:261b-6: rgyu des na lus kyang mdog skya bong 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-7: gnyis par lus ni lci bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-9: shugs gnyis pa la ni lus shin tu lci bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-10: gsum par sos btab rnags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-13: shugs gsum pa la ni rnags pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-14: bzhi par mgo lci gnye'u rengs 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-16: dug gi shugs bzhi pa la ni mgo bo lci ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-17: lnga par lus tshigs na ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-18: grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-20: shugs lnga pa la ni lus tshigs na ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-21: lhag ma gnyis po snga mar mtshungs //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-23: shugs drug pa dang bdun pa la ni gdengs ka can gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-24: shugs ni lnga par gso ba dag / bya yis de las phan chad min //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-26: de dag gi shugs lnga pa'i bar gyis gso bar bya'i /
T13TD4312.3E:261b-27: drug pa dang bdun pa la ni gso bar mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-28: chu yis g-yengs dang chags pa zad //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-29: skrag dang ne'u les 'phen pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-30: grang lhags nyi tshan rlung dang nad //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-31: bkres skom ngal bas gzir ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-32: phyogs gzhan nas ni ring par 'ong //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-33: dug spangs [?] lpags pa brjes pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-34: 'jag ma sman dang tsher ma can //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-35: nags na rgyu ba gang yin dang //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-36: rig pa la sogs brten phyogs gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-37: sbrul de dug ni chung bar 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-39: sbrul gang chus g-yengs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:261b-40: chags pa spyod pa zad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:261b-41: skrag pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:261b-42: yul phyogs gang rig sngags la sogs pa gang rigs brten zhing grub pa'i phyogs na gnas pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:261b-43: sbrul de dag ni dug chung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-44: dur khrod bsti gnas shing gcig sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:261b-45: tshes lnga dang ni dus tshigs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-2: nam phyed dang ni nyi ma'i gung //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-3: bra nye smin drug mchu dang skag / sa ga chu stod khrums stod dang //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-4: snubs dang bra nye yud tsam la //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-5: gnad du bzung ba spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-7: dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su sbrul gyis zin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:262a-8: tshes lnga la sogs pa'i dus dang /
T13TD4312.3E:262a-9: bra nye la sogs pa'i skar ma la babs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:262a-10: de bzhin du yud tsam zhes bya ba'i dus la zin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:262a-11: gnad du bzung ba gang yin pa de ni gsor mi nus pas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-12: zin pa'i mod la bzhin skya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-13: skra ni 'byi bar byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-14: lce 'khums yang dang yang du brgyal //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-15: dbugs grang gang yin de mi 'tsho //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-17: skyes bu gang sbrul gyis zin ma thag bzhin skya bor gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:262a-18: skra 'byi bar byed pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-19: skyigs bu dbugs mi bde zhing slon //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-20: lus can zin pa'i mod la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-21: snying nas gzer bar 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-24: yang skyigs bu la sogs pas zin pa'i mod la dus gcig tu 'byung ba de yang mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-25: 'du shes stor cing lbu bar skyugs //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-26: rkang pa lag pa bzhin gnag cing //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-27: sna zhom yan lag zhig pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-28: tshigs lhod bshang ba 'khru ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-29: dug 'thungs pa dang sbrul gyis zin //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-30: dug can mda' yis phog gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-31: tshul ni 'di dag snang gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-32: srog zad par ni 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-34: skyes bu gang sbrul gyis zin pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:262a-35: dug mdas phog pa 'du shes stor cing lbu ba slon pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni nye bar 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-36: sna sman rnon po mi tshor zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-37: rma nas khrag ni mi 'byung la //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-38: dbyig pas bsnun na rjes mi mngon //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-39: gshin rje'i thad du 'gro ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-41: sna sman rnon po btang yang tshor ba med pa la sogs pa de yang mi 'tsho'o //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-42: de las gzhan du sman pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-44: lkog mar phyin pa'i srog bsrung zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:262a-45: dug ni myur du bsal bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-0: sngar bshang pa'i mtshan @262b nyid dang mi ldan pa gzhan dag ni sman pas nges par bsrung bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:262b-1: ji ltar 'bar ba'i khyim nas 'byung ba bzhin du lkog mar phyin zhing 'gags su nye ba'i srog de bsrung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-2: lus can dug gis zin gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-3: grangs brgya'i bar du gnas nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-4: lus zungs khrag sogs la gnod cing //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-5: lus la khyab par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-7: mi sbrul gyi dug gis zin par gyur na rma'i sgor grangs brgya bgrangs pa'i dus tshigs tsam du gnas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:262b-8: de'i 'og tu khrag la sogs pa'i lus zungs la gnod par byed cing lus la khyab par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-9: dus 'di'i bar du gdug pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-10: mche bas zin pa bcad sogs las //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-11: bya zhing ci nas lus la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-12: dug gi yal ga ma 'phros bya //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-14: grangs brgya rdzogs pa'i dus 'di'i bar du dug gis zin pa la /
T13TD4312.3E:262b-15: bsregs pa la sogs pa bya zhing dug gi yal gas lus la khyab par mi 'gyur bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-16: zin pa'i mod la myur du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-17: sbrul ni de nyid za ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-18: sa 'am bong ba gcod byed na //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-19: rings pa kho nar sman pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-20: mchil mas byug par bya ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-21: rna spabs kyis ni so rjes bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-23: mi sbrul gyis zin ma thag sbrul de nyid myur du za bar byed pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:262b-24: sa 'am bong ba sos 'debs par gyur na sman pas rings pa kho nar mchil mas byug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-25: mche bas btab pa'i gong du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-26: sor bzhir ras ma las byas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-27: gso ma'am 'od ma la sogs bcing //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-28: sngags shes pa yis grub sngags bzla //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-30: sman pas sbrul gyi mche bas btab pa'i sor bzhi'i ltag tu ras ma las byas pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:262b-31: gso ma la sogs pa las byas pa'i chings mas bcing zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:262b-32: sngags zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-33: chu lon gyis ni chu lta bur //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-35: dug gi bcing sogs nyen pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-36: rtsa las rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-38: dug bcings pa gang yin pa des bkag par gyur na chu lon gyis chu bzlog pa dang 'dra bar rtsa'i sgo las dug de rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:262b-39: btsir nas sos btab dbyung bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-2: sa bon nyams pa'i myu gu bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-5: sos btab pa de btsir zhing bsdams nas tshigs dang gnad du ma song bar de dbyung bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:263a-6: de ltar byas na sa bon nyams pa dang 'dra bar dug gi shugs 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-7: lus 'khyil so rjes mkhris bskyed pas //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-8: de ma gtogs pa gzhan dag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-9: lcags dang gser la sogs pas sam //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-10: mgal me yis ni myur du bsreg / me yis thal bar byed 'gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-13: lus 'khyil ba zhes bya pa'i so rjes ni mkhris pa skyed par byed pa yin pas /
T13TD4312.3E:263a-14: de ma gtogs pa gdengs ka can dang khra bo ste gzhan dag gi dug ni lcags la sogs pa mer bsregs pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:263a-15: mgal me zhes bya ba shing phyed tshig ba'i mes bsreg par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:263a-16: de lta bus ni myur bar thal ba nyid du byed par 'gyur gyi ;
T13TD4312.3E:263a-17: mi byed pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-18: sa dang lci ba sman sogs kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-19: kha bkang nas ni gzhib par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-21: yang na rma de la sa la sogs pa gang yang rung bas kha bkang ba dang gzhib par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-22: chings ma'i nang du sha che'i phyogs //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-23: mchog tu zhal zhal bya ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-24: yan lag mche bas zin bcas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-25: dug sman gyi sa ni yang yang bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-26: tsandan pu shel tse ldan pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-27: chu yis kyang ni blugs par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-29: rma'i sor bzhi'i gong du bcings pa'i nang du sha che ba'i phyogs su zhal zhal byas la de dug sman bsku zhing tsandan la sogs pa'i sman gyi chu blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-30: dug gis khyab par gyur pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-31: gtar ga gdab pa gso mchog ste //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-32: khrag ni phyung bar gyur pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-35: dug gis lus la khyab pas gtar gas khrag gdon pa ni gso ba'i mchog yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:263a-36: khrag phyung bas dug 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-37: dug bcas khrag ni dri mi zhim //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-38: mer bsregs sgra ni tseg tseg zer //
T13TD4312.3E:263a-40: dug dang bcas pa'i khrag ni dri mi zhim par 'gyur ba de bzhin du mer bsregs na sgra 'tshag cing tseg tseg zer ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-0: nad gzhi ji bzhin dag @263b gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-1: khrag ni snga ma bzhin shes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-3: skyon med pa'i khrag ji lta bu yin pa yang sngar bshad pa'i tshul las shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-4: rtsa ni snang bar ma gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-5: rngabs rva srin bu pad pas gtar //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-7: gal te rtsa mi mngon na rngabs rva la sogs pas khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-8: khrag phyung ba yi lhag ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-9: dug gi drod kyis zhu gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-10: shin tu bsil ba'i sman bsku dang //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-11: blugs pa yis ni bsal bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-13: gtar gas khrag phyung ba'i lhag ma dug gi drod kyis lus la zhu zhing khyab par gyur pa ni bsil sman bsku ba la sogs pas bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-14: dug gi shugs kyis ma zhu bas //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-16: de ni bsil sman blugs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-17: rlung yab spu ldang byed pas bsal //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-19: gang gi phyir dug gi shugs kyis khrag ma zhu zhing 'thas par gyur na brgyal ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:263b-20: de las dang po ni bsil sman la sogs pas bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-21: khrag ni sla bar gyur na dug /'phral du shugs ni zhi bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-23: gal te dug ni sla zhing zag par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:263b-24: mod la shugs zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-25: dug ni rno bas snying 'dar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-26: de bsrung phyir ni zhun mar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-27: mar dang bcas pa'i sbrang rtsi 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-28: dug sman mar dang sbrus pa blud //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-30: dug ni shin tu rno ba yin pa'i phyir snying la gnod cing 'dar bar byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:263b-31: de bas na snying de bsrung ba'i phyir zhun mar la sogs pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-32: de yi snying ni 'gag byed pas //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-33: snying gar bad kan sogs par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-35: skyes bu de la snying gi gnas su nad kyis 'gag par byed cing /
T13TD4312.3E:263b-36: bad kan sogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-37: lus lci nad ni bslangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-38: snying 'phar de ni slon du gzhug / gsher rdzas skyur rtsabs rgya sran dang //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-39: til dang chang sogs ma gtogs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-40: dug sel ba yi slon sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-41: des ni lus la khyab mi 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:263b-43: de'i 'og tu lus lci ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:263b-44: des na skyur rtsabs kan dzi la sogs pa ma gtogs pa dug sel ba'i sman gyi slon sman gtang bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:264a-0: @264a * // de ltar byas na dug des lus la khyab par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-1: sbrul dang nyes pa rang bzhin dang //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-2: gnas dang shugs kyi khyad par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-3: phra mo yan chad legs brtags la //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-4: gso ba khyad par can bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-7: nyes pa nas shugs kyi khyad par phra mo yan chad kyang legs par brtags la /
T13TD4312.3E:264a-8: de dang 'tsham pa'i gso ba khyad par can bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-9: srin bu ba ri'i rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-10: gi ri kar ni dkar po'i chu //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-11: btung ba gdengs ka can bzhin sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-12: sna sman ru rta sbrang rtsi gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-14: srin bu ba ri'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i sman ni gdengs ka can gyis zin pa la blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-15: de bzhin du ru rta'i sna sman yang gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-16: sbrul nag gis ni zin pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-17: khrag gtar nas ni bca' ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-18: na go li ni sbyar ba bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-19: yang na rtsa rnon dug gis bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-21: mi sbrul nag pos zin pa la gtar ga gdab pa dang bca' ba la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:264a-22: rtsa rno ba'i dug gis sos 'dzin pa gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-23: btung bar btsod dang sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-24: khang pa'i dud pa mar sbyar blud //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-26: sbrul nag pos zin pa la btsod la sogs pa blud na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-27: gdengs ka can dang ri mo can //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-28: mi bzad dug gis zin pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-29: tandu li ya tang pal dang //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-30: gi ri kar ni rnam gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-32: btung dang sna sman mig sman bya //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-34: gdengs ka can dang ri mo can gyi dug mi bzad pa la tandu li ya la sogs pa'i dug sman btung ba la sogs pa btang na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-36: gi ri kar ni sa nag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-37: ha ti pi pi ling dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-38: bye'u rug pa'i lo ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-40: cha ni phyed phyed sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-41: dug sman yin te khyad par du //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-42: lus 'khyil sbrul gyi dug la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-44: aa shva gandha la sogs pa'i cha phyed phyed dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i dug sman ni dug thams cad sel zhing mchog tu gdengs ka can gyi dug la phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-45: lo ma lnga dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-46: shing mngar n'a ga pushpa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-47: ae la ba lu dzi ba ka / zangs rtsi ba dang pu shel tse //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-48: kha ra shug pa autpa la //
T13TD4312.3E:264a-49: sbrang rtsi dang sbyar kha ba can //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-1: bskus na skrang dang shu ba mched //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-2: 'brum bu rims dang lus lci sel //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-4: lo ma lnga pa la sogs pa'i dug sman du sbyar ba ni ming kha ba can zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:264b-5: des ni lus 'khyil ba'i dug sel ba dang bskus na skrang pa la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-6: tang pal n+ya gro dha'i myu gu //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-7: dzi ba ka dang zangs rtsi ba //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-8: ka ra dkar po shing mngar btsod //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-9: khu ba lus 'khyil dug la blud //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-11: lus 'khyil ba'i dug gis zin pa la ni tang pal la sogs pa'i sman chu dang sbyar ba blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-13: bca' sga pa to la'i sa bon //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-14: shir sha'i sa bon pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-15: 'bras kyi rtsa ba bong nga dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-16: shu dag ba gcin bcas par btags //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-17: yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-20: 'od ma'i shun pa dang sa bon la sogs pa sman gyi yan lag brgyad po ba gcin dang sbyar ba btags te byin na gon sa'i dug sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-21: ru rta bong nga pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-22: ha re nu ka khyim dud pa //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-23: rgya spos sbrang rtsi tshab gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-24: sbyar bas ri mo can dug sel //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-26: ru rta la sogs pa'i dug sman gyis sbrul ri mo can gyi dug sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-28: sa brkos 'og tu thun gnyis gzhug / phyung ste bzhar la mar sar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-29: 'bras dangs yi lde gus byug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:264b-30: 'dam bu khra bo zhes bya ba'i dug gis zin pa la ni sa brkos pa'i 'og tu thun gnyis kyi bar du rma de bcug la /
T13TD4312.3E:264b-32: gtsags bus bzhar la mar sar dang 'bras dang sa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-33: 'bras bu gsum gyi phye btab pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-34: mar ni rnying pa blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-36: yang na sbrul gyis zin pa la 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i mar blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-37: zhu zhing bkrus nas nas zan ni //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-38: sran tshod dang ni bcas pa sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-40: mar de zhu nas bkru sman bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:264b-41: nas zan la sogs pa sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-42: ka ra b'i ra aarka yi //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-43: me tog langga li'i rtsa ba //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-44: pi pi ling dang na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-45: pa tha skyur rtsabs lde gur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:264b-46: 'di ni sbrul gzhan gyis zin pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-3: ka ra b'i ra la sogs pa skyur rtsabs dang lde gur byas te bskus pa'i sman 'di ni sbrul gzhan gyis zin pa thams cad kyi dug sman yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-4: shri sha'i me tog khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-5: na le sham dkar zhag bdun spangs //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-6: btung dang sna sman byas gyur na ;
T13TD4312.3E:265a-7: / sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa sel //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-9: na le sham dkar po zhes bya ba shi kru'i sa bon shi ri sha'i me tog bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du zhag bdun sbangs te sbrul gyis zin pa la btung ba la sogs pa byin pas phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-10: rgya sbos ru rta srang gnyis gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-11: mar dang sbrang rtsi srang bzhi bzhi //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-13: bde ba skyed par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-15: yang na rgya spos la sogs pa yang ji skad smos pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-16: de nas gdengs ka can gyi shugs //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-17: dang por khrag ni dbyung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-18: dug sman sbrang rtsi zhun mar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-19: bcas pa [?] myur du blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-21: gdengs ka can gyis zin pa'i shugs dang po la ni khrag dbyung ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-22: gnyis par slon sman btang nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-23: de bzhin dug sman blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-25: shugs gnyis pa la ni slon sman btang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:265a-26: gtar ga la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-27: gsum par dug sman sbyar bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-28: mig sman dang ni sna sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-30: gsum par ni dug sman gyi mig sman la sogs pa sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-31: bzhi par skyug sman btang nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-32: sngar bshad pa yi nas thug blud //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-34: shugs bzhi pa la ni dang por skyug sman btang nas gong du bshad pa'i nas thug blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-35: lnga pa drug par bsil sman gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-36: bsku zhing sman chu yang yang blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-37: slon sman rnon po gtang bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-38: dug sel nas thug blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-40: shugs lnga pa dang drug pa la ni de la bsil sman bsku ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rnams bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-41: bdun par dug sman rnon po yi //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-42: mig sman dang ni sna sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-44: shugs bdun par ni dug sman gyi sbyor ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-45: de nas spyi bor rgya gram du //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-46: zab mo'i mtshon gyis btral nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:265a-47: der ni sh'am khrag gam ni //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-0: pags pa dag ni @265b gzhug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-2: de'i 'og tu mi de'i mgo bor rgya gram bya rog rjes 'dra bar btral la der sh'am khrag gam pags pa gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-3: lus bskyil shugs ni gsum pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-4: slon sman btang la nas thug blud //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-6: lus bskyil ba'i dug gi shugs gsum pa la slon sman btang ba'i rjes la nas thug blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-7: drug par sman ni rtul po 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-8: shug pa la sogs sde tshan blud //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-10: lus bskyil ba'i shugs drug par sman rnon po ma yin pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:265b-11: shug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-12: khra bo'i shugs ni dang po la ;
T13TD4312.3E:265b-13: / zhal zhal zab tu gdab bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-14: ku bas khrag ni bton nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-15: snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-17: sbrul khra bos zin pa'i shugs dang po la ni zhal zhal gting zab tu gdab la /
T13TD4312.3E:265b-18: de'i 'og tu ku ba btab pas khrag dbyung ba'am snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-19: drug par mig sman rnon po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-20: sna sman phye ma bud pa gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-22: khra bos zin pa'i shugs drug pa la mig sman shin tu rnon po la sogs pa bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-23: ma smos pa yi shugs las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-24: gdengs ka can skabs bshad ltar gso //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-26: ma smos pa'i shugs dang po dang gnyis pa dang bzhi pa la sogs pa la ni gdengs ka can gyi skabs su bshad pa ltar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-27: sbrum ma byis pa rgan po la //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-28: gtar ga mi gdab 'jam pos gso //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-30: sbrum ma la sogs pa sbrul gyis zin pa la ni gtar ga mi gdab par gso ba 'jam pos bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-31: shing tsha ldong ros rgya spos yung //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-32: ku sha'i khu ba chu srin sen //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-33: ta ma la yi ge sar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-34: 'bras bu chu grang sbyar ba blud //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-35: 'di yis dbang po'i rdo rjes ni //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-36: lha min lta bur dug 'joms byed //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-38: shing tshal sogs pa'i sman 'di dag 'bras bkrus pa'i chu dang sbyar te blud pa ni ming rdo rje zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:265b-39: ji ltar brgya byin gyi rdo rjes lha ma yin 'joms pa ltar dug sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-40: bil ba'i rtsa ba bye'u rug pa'i me tog / rgya spos thang shing ka ranydza'i 'bras bu //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-41: ser po rnam gnyis 'bras bu gsum dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:265b-42: tsha ba gsum por ra gcin zhib btags pa //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-0: btung dang sna sman mig sman @266a * //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-2: sbrul dang lu dbyi bsdig pa sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-3: dug dang dbyig dug ma zhu gsud dang rims //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-4: mi ni gdon gyis zin pa bde bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-6: bil ba'i rtsa ba'i sman ra gcin dang zhib tu btags te btung ba la sogs par btang na sprul la sogs pas zin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:266a-8: gdon gyis zin pa la sogs pa rnams bde bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-9: sos btab bsku ba la sogs kyis //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-10: ma lus bton par gyur kyang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-11: nyams pa'i dug ni ji bzhin dang //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-12: slar yang shugs ni skye bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-14: mche ba'i dug gis zin pa la bsku ba la sogs pas ma lus par bton par gyur kyang slar gnod pa'i shugs bskyed par gyur pa ni nyams pa'i dug gam dug tha mal pa la sogs pa dang 'dra bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-15: dug dang bral nas rlung 'khrugs na //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-16: snum la sogs pas gso bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-17: til mar chang dang rgya sran chu //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-18: ma gtogs rlung ni sel ba sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-20: dug gi shugs dang bral nas rlung gi nad 'khrugs par gyur na snum gyi mar la sogs pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-21: mkhris par mkhris pa'i rims sel ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-22: sman khu sman mar 'jam rtsis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-24: gal te mkhris pa 'khrugs na ni mkhris bsel bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:266a-25: rims sel bar byed pa'i sman gyis sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-26: bad kan sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-27: dong ka la sogs sde yis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-29: dug dang bral nas bad kan 'khrugs par gyur na dong ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-30: sbrul gyi rus pas gnod gyur dang //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-31: de bzhin rtog pa'i dug gis nyen //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-32: ka ra rgun 'brum pa ya sya //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-33: shing mngar kha ra sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-34: sngags kyis btab pa'i chu dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-35: gtor zhing spro bsrid [?] dga' bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-37: sbrul gyi rus pas zug pa la sogs pa la ni ka ra dang /
T13TD4312.3E:266a-38: rgun 'brum la sogs pa'i sman la sogs pas gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-39: ke ke ru dang mu tig margad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-40: beed'urya dang rdo rje mthon ka che //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-41: ras pal sa bon dug gis gnod pa 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-42: kha ba can gyi ri las skyes pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-43: so ma ra dza dang ni ba spru ba //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-44: de bzhin dro na ma h'a dro na dang //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-45: sbrul la yod pa'i nor bu ma na si //
T13TD4312.3E:266a-46: nus pa dang ni ldan par gyur pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-0: dug ni dug gzhom bya @266b phyir bcang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-2: ke ke ru dang mu tig la sogs pa'i rin po che dang /
T13TD4312.3E:266b-3: sman sbrul gyi dug sel ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa rkang pa dang lag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:266b-4: mgul dang mgo la gdags par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-5: nub mo'i dus su rgyu tshe khyad par du //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-6: gdugs dang khar sil sgra dang bcas pa bcang //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-7: de yi grib ma sgra yi skad phyung nas //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-8: sbrul gyi tshogs ni 'byer bar byed par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-10: mi nub mo'i dus su rgyu ba'i tshe gdugs dang khar ba sgra dang bcas pa bcang bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:266b-11: gdugs de'i grib ma dang khar sil de'i sgra skad kyis sbrul gyi tshogs 'byer zhing mthong ba'i yul las 'das par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-12: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:266b-13: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:266b-15: // / de nas srin bu'i dug gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-16: sbrul nyid kyi ni bshang gci dang //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-17: kha chu sgo nga lus rul skyes //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-18: nad ni re re 'dus pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-19: ldan pa'i srin bu'i dug rnam bzhi //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-21: 'bu gang sbrul nyid kyi bshang gci la sogs pa rul pa las skyes par gyur cing /
T13TD4312.3E:266b-22: de dag kyang nad sna re re dang 'dus pa las gyur pa'i srin bu'i dug rnam pa bzhi yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-23: rlung gi srin bus zin gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-24: shas cher na zhing zug par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-26: rlung gi rang bzhin can gyi srin bus zin par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:266b-27: tsha ba la sogs pas mtshan lhag par na ba dang zug par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-28: me yi srin bus 'dzag pa chung //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-29: tsha zhing dmar la shu ba mched //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-33: me'i rang bzhin can gyi srin bus zin pa na mchu'i rjes 'dzag pa chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:266b-34: tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-35: bad kan shas ches nad tshabs chung //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-39: bad kan gyi rang bzhin can gyi 'bus zin par gyur na mchus btab pas nad tshabs chung ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-41: mtshan nyid thams cad ldan pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-42: shugs ni sbrul dang 'dra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-43: skrang pa 'phel zhing khrag dri mnam //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-44: mgo dang mig lci brgyal mgo 'khor //
T13TD4312.3E:266b-45: dbugs mi bden spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-1: 'dus pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'bus zin pa ni mchu rjes mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267a-2: sbrul gyi shugs bdun dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267a-3: skrang pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:267a-4: de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-5: kun tu skrangs pa lte ba can //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-6: tsha ba g-yo zhing yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-8: 'bu thams cad kyis zin pa ni dbus lte ba can du mtho bar skrangs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267a-9: tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-10: sdig pa'i dug ni rno ba ste //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-11: dang por me ltar sreg par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-12: steng du myur du mched byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-15: sdig pa zhes bya ba'i 'bus zin pa'i dug ni rang bzhin rno ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267a-16: dang por me ltar sreg par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267a-17: sos btab pa'i steng du myur du mched cing 'phel ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267a-18: mche ba 'og tu 'dug pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-19: zin ma thag ni rab tu gnag / gas pa snyam du sems shing zug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:267a-20: sdig pa'i mche bas zin pa ni 'phral du shas cher na bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267a-21: de bzhin du rab tu na zhing gnag pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267a-22: gas shing gyes pa snyam du sems pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-23: de ni lci ba sogs rul dang //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-24: dug gis phog sogs rul ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-25: sbrul rul ba las skyes pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-26: dug tshabs chung dang 'bring dang che //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-28: sdig pa de dag gi lci ba la sogs pa rul ba las byung ba de ni dug gi tshabs chung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-29: dug gis phog pa'i sha rul ba la sogs pa las 'byung ba ni 'bring yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-30: sbrul gyi sha rul pa las skyes pa ni dug gi tshabs che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-31: tshabs chung ser zhing dkar dang gnag / rtsub dang khra zhing gzig mdog can //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-32: spu dang tshigs ni dmar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-33: dmar zhing lto ba dkar ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-35: dug gi tshabs chung ba'i sdig pa ni ser ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-36: bar ma lto ru tshigs gsum pa //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-37: rked pa ser skya dmar ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-39: sdig pa'i dug bar ma'i lto bar dud ka can la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-40: dug che ser skya khra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-41: ri mo can la khrag 'dra zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:267a-42: me 'dra tshigs ni gnyis sam gcig / lto ba dkar zhing dmar ram gnag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:267b-0: sdig pa che ba ni ser skya @267b la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-1: des zin lce ni skrangs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-2: lus rengs rims kyis nyen pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-3: bu ga las ni khrag rnag slon //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-4: dbang po'i don ni mi shes shing //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-5: rdul zhing brgyal la kha skom dang //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-6: rmongs zhing nad kyis nyen pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-7: sha ni zhig par byed pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-8: phal cher srog ni 'dor bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-10: sdig pa des zin pa'i mtshan ma ni lce skrangs pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267b-11: de bzhin du dbang po'i don gyi yul mi shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267b-12: sha zhig pa'i bar yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:267b-13: de lta bu'i nad kyis zin pa'i mi ni phal cher srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-14: mchu sbom pas ni kha yis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-15: 'debs shing gsor rung sdig pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-16: lhag par na byed lus rengs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-17: mtshan gyi sbubs ni ldang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-18: lus ni rdul bar byed 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-19: sos 'debs chu grang snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-21: mchu sbom pa zhes bya ba'i 'bu ni mchus 'debs par byed la //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-22: de yang gsor rung ba'i sdig pa'i nad las lhag par na bar byed pa dang lus rengs pa la sogs par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-23: de nyid rnga mo'i dud ka dang //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-24: mtshan mo rgyu bas mtshan mo can //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-26: de nyid ni rnga mo'i dud ka dang /
T13TD4312.3E:267b-27: mtshan mo rgyu ba dang mtshan mo can zhes slob dpon gyis ming du btags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-28: srin bu rlung mkhris shas che zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-29: rnga mo byi ba bad kan can //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-30: rnga mo'i dud pa zhes bya ba //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-31: phal cher rlung shas che ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-33: 'bu srin bu zhes bya ba ni phal cher rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas che ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:267b-34: rnga mo dang byi ba zhes bya ba ni phal cher bad kan gyi shas che ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:267b-35: rnga mo'i dud pa zhes bya ba ni phal cher rlung gi shas che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-36: nad ni gang dang gang gi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-37: mtshan ma shas che ba las brtag / de dang de las gso ba'i sman //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-38: yon tan mi mthun pa yis gso //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-40: rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang dang gang gi shas che ba shes par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:267b-41: nad de dang de'i yon tan dang mi mthun pa'i sman gyis gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-42: snying gzer stod rlung gis rengs shing //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-43: rtsa mi snang zhing rus tshigs na //
T13TD4312.3E:267b-44: mgo 'khor lus bcings snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-1: pa'i dug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:268a-2: rlung gi shas che ba'i dug ni snying gzer ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-3: dran nyams dbugs ni tsha bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-4: snying tsha kha ni kha brol //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-5: sha 'gas skrang bar byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-6: khrag ser ba ni mkhris pa can //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-8: mkhris pa can gyi dug gis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni dran pa nyams pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:268a-9: dbugs tsha ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-10: slon zhing snying na yi ga 'chus //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-12: grang bcas kha ni mngar bar bro //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-13: bad kan shas che'i dug nad yin //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-15: bad kan gyi bdag nyid can gyi dug gis zin pa ni slon pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-16: 'ba' chas rma ni bsku ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-17: rlung sel til mar gyis bsku dang //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-19: brta bar bya ba'i cho gas phan //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-21: de dag gi gso ba ni rlung gi bdag nyid can gyi dug la ni til la sogs pa'i 'ba' chas bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:268a-22: til mar gyis bsku ba la sogs pa byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-23: mkhris pa can la sman chu blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-24: shin tu grang ba'i lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-26: mkhris pa can gyi dug la ni shin tu bsil ba'i sman gyi chu blugs pa dang lde gus bsku bas phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-27: bad kan can la bzhar zhing bcad //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-28: dugs dang skyug sman btang bas gso //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-30: bad kan can gyi dugs ni bzhar ba la sogs pas bsal bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-31: srin bu rnam pa gsum po la //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-32: gso ba rnam pa gsum pos phan //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-34: 'bu'i rigs gsum po la ni gso ba rnam pa gsum po byas na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-35: dugs dang bsku dang sman chu blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-36: phal cher dro 'jam gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-37: gzhan du brgyal dang mche ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-38: rnags dang 'drul bar byed ma gtogs //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-40: 'bu'i dug phal cher la dugs la sogs pa dro 'jam tsam bya ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:268a-41: gzhan du na brgyal ba la sogs pa la ni de dag byar mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-42: mi skra yungs kar ser po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:268a-43: bu ram rnying pa'i dud pas bdug / dug dang mche ba'i dug kun la //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-0: dug gis zin pa thams cad la mi'i skra la @268b sogs pa'i dud pas bdug pa phan par drang srong 'drob skyong gis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-1: dug sel sman ni thams cad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-2: sbyang ba'i las kyang bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-4: mche ba dug can gyis zin pa thams cad la sbyor ba 'di dag byas na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-5: srin bu sdig pa mi bzad dug /'bus zin sbrul gyis zin ltar gso //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-7: srin bu rnams kyi dug la ni sbrul gyi dug ltar gsos na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-8: tan du li ya cha mnyam pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-9: dur byid dang ni zhun mar blud //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-10: 'bu yi dug gis gangs can ltar //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-11: bskyod par nus pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-13: skyes bus tan du li ya la sogs pa'i sman 'thungs na yang srin bu'i dug gis gangs can bskyod par mi nus pa dang 'dra bar bskyod mi nus par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-14: 'o ma can shun lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-15: sbyangs byas srin bu'i dug sel byed //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-17: mi sbyangs pa byas nas 'o ma can gyi shing gi shun pa'i lde gus bskus na yang srin bu'i dug sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-18: mu tig lde gus bskus na yang //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-19: skrang dang dug dang tsha ba sel //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-21: mu tig btab pa'i lde gus bskus na yang skrang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:268b-22: zug pa la sogs pa sel bar byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-23: shu dag shing kun byi dang ka /
T13TD4312.3E:268b-24: rgyam tsha ha ti pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-25: pa tha bong nga tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-26: 'drob skyong gis ni bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-27: yan lag bcu pa'i dug sman ni //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-28: 'drob skyong gis ni bshad pa dag / blud na srin bu'i dug kyang sel //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-30: shu dag la sogs pa'i dug sman yan lag bcu pa ni 'drob skyong gis bshad pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:268b-31: des kyang srin bu'i dug thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-32: sdig pa'i dug gis 'phral zin la //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-33: 'khor los btsir ba'i til mar bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-34: sa la parni bskol ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-35: dro 'jam yang na gzhan dag blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-37: sdig pa'i mche ba'i dug gis zin pa la /
T13TD4312.3E:268b-38: 'khor los btsir ba'i til mar sar pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:268b-39: sa la par ni dro 'jam tsam mam /
T13TD4312.3E:268b-40: yang na til gzhan dag las byung ba'i til mar blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-41: rgyam tsha dang ni bcas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-42: zhun mar yang dang yang du blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:268b-44: yang na mar dang rgyam tsha sbyar ba blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-2: rgyam tsha 'o mar bcas pa blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-4: gzhan du na sbyor ba 'di nyid byas na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-5: mar dang brngos pa'i go snyod dang //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-6: rgyam tshar bcas pas dkri bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-8: yang go snyod dang rgyam tsha'i lde gu mar dang brngos pas dkris na phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-9: mche bas zin pa dugs byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-10: zhal zhal btab ste 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-11: ser po gnyis dang tsha ba gsum /
T13TD4312.3E:269a-12: shir sha'i me tog bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-14: mche bas zin pa la ni dang por dugs byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:269a-15: gtsags bus zhal zhal byas te 'bras bu gsum po la sogs pa'i phye mas btab pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:269a-17: rgyam tsha kha lung ba gcin skyur //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-18: bye'u rug pa'i rtse mo btags //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-20: bskus na'ang phan par 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-22: yang na rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i lde gu 'am 'ba' cha 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:269a-23: ba'i lci ba dro 'jam tsam bskus na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-24: btung ba zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-25: yang na 'o mar kha ra btab //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-27: yang na zhun mar la sogs pa'i btung ba byin na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-28: phug ron rtug pa aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-29: rgya spos bca' sga kha lung gi /
T13TD4312.3E:269a-30: khu ba dang sbyar blud pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-31: sdig pas zin pa'i sman mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-33: yang phug ron gyi rtug pa la sogs pa yang mchog tu phan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-34: rnga mo'i so ni chu bal bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-35: sdig pa'i dug ni 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-37: yang na rnga mo'i so la sogs pa yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-38: shing kun pa la kha lung gi / khu ba dang sbyar lde gu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-39: mig sman ri lur byas na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-40: sdig pa'i dug ni sel mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-42: yang na shing kun la sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor bas phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-44: gi ri karni se lu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-45: shir sha'i me tog dug mo yungs //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-46: zho ga chu dang btags bskus na //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-47: sdig pa'i dug ni sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-49: yang na ka ranydza la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-50: gang zhig rmugs shing rngam pa 'thon //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-51: bla zhing mi bzad na gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-52: de la yung dang aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-53: btsod dang bong nga pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:269a-54: bil ba gzhon nu na le sham //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-0: ba'a @269b ta ka yi khu bar btags //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-1: lde gus byugs na phan pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-3: mi gang sems rmugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:269b-6: 'brel pa'i tshig mang du smra ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:269b-7: brnag par dka' ba na bar gyur pa gang yin pa de la yung ba la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-8: sbrang ma gdug pa'i dug kun la //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-9: zho dang mar ni blud bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-10: gtar ga gdab cing sna sman dang //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-11: mig sman gyi ni cho ga bya //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-12: dro zhing snum dang skyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-13: rlung 'joms kha zas sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-15: sbrang ma gdug pa'i dug gis zin pa la ni zho dang mar blud pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:269b-16: kha zas dro ba la sogs pa rlung sel ba sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-17: dong gra byi ba'i rtug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-18: kha lung khu bab [?] bla dang //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-19: rgyam tsha pu shel tse sbyar ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-20: lde gus sbrang ma'i dug myur 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-22: dong gra la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na sbrang ma gdug pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dug 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-23: sdig pas zin pa'i tha mar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-24: dug ni shas cher langs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-25: zin pa'i rma la dug gis bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-28: sdig pas zin pa'i mi la gso ba thams cad byas pa'i tha mar dug mi bzad pa langs par gyur na rma de la dug gis bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-29: autstshe tim ka zhes bya ba'i 'bus zin pa yang cho ga 'di nyid bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-30: glang po che yi rtug pa'i steng //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-31: ro hi sha'i rtsa se'u'i chu //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-32: lde gur byas btags bskus na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-33: 'di ni sbrang ma'i dug 'joms mchog / ces bya ba la ;
T13TD4312.3E:269b-34: glang po che'i rtug pa'i steng du /
T13TD4312.3E:269b-35: ro hi sha'i rtsa ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:269b-36: se'u'i chu lde gur byas la bskus na sbrang ma'i dug thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-37: shir sha'i sa bon aarga yi //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-38: 'o mas lan gsum bsgos pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-39: pi pi ling gi phye mar bsres //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-40: dug sman 'dis ni srin bu'i dug / sbrul dang lu ta byi ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-41: dug ni sel bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-43: shir sha'i sa bon pi pi ling gi phye ma dang bsres la /
T13TD4312.3E:269b-44: aarga'i 'o mas lan gsum bsgos te sbyar ba'i sman 'dis ni srin bu'i dug thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:269b-45: shir sha ka ranydza yi sa bon dang //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-1: ru rta ldong ros bcas pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-2: dug sman 'dis ni mtshan rgyu'i sdig pas zin //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-3: sel bar byed pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-5: shir sha'i sa bon la sogs pa sbyar ba'i dug sman 'dis ni mtshan mo rgyu ba'i sdig pas zin pa sel bar byed pa'i dam pa yin par rgyal ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:270a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-7: srin bu las ni rab gdug pa //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-8: ba ni bcu drug yin par bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-9: gzhan dag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-10: kha cig de bas mang bar 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-12: stong phrag yod ces gzhan dag 'chad //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-14: srin bu rnams las rab tu gdug cing gso dka' ba ni srog chags ba zhes bya ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:270a-15: de'i dbye ba yang bcu drug yod par slob dpon gyis bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-16: kha cig ni de nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod par 'dod do //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-17: drang srong gzhan dag ni de bas kyang mang bar 'dod do //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-18: drang srong kha cig ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi rjes su 'brang zhing skye ba stong phrag du ma yod par 'chad do //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-19: bla brnan gzugs ni mang gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-20: dug can pa ni gcig pur 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-22: srog chags ba ni bla brnan mang zhing gzugs mang ba'i dug can ni gcig pu kho nar 'dod do //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-23: de yi gzugs dang ming dag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-24: shin tu 'dres pas shes par dka' //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-25: gnas kyi nges pa yod min pas //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-26: de phyir nad las bshad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-28: ba de'i gzugs la sogs pa ni shin tu shes par dka' zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:270a-29: gnas kyi nges pa yang yod pa ma yin pas de'i rang bzhin ni nad kyi tshul las bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-30: nad gzhi so so'i gso ba dka' //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-31: 'dus pa las gyur gsor mi rung //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-33: ba de ni nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa ni gso dka' ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:270a-34: 'dus pa las gyur pa ni gsor mi rung ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-35: des zin mkhris gyur tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-36: skom dad chu bur rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-37: rmongs bag rab tsha dmar ser mdog / rnags shing rgun 'bru'i 'bras bu 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-39: ba des zin pa'i mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni tsha ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:270a-40: bad kan las gyur sra zhing skye //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-0: gnyid che grang rims @270b lud pa lu //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-1: shin tu g-ya' bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-3: bas zin pa'i bad kan can gyi mtshan nyid ni sra zhing mdog skya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-4: rlung gyur rtsub cing gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-5: tshigs na rims kyis 'debs par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-7: de la rlung las gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:270b-8: reg na rtsub cing kha dog gnag pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-9: de yi dbye ba nad kyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-10: rang gi mtshan nyid las shes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-12: ba de'i dbye ba ni de ltar nad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid las shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-13: gsor mi rung ba snying tsha zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-14: lud pa skyigs bu mgo nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-15: 'brum phran dkar dang ser dang gnag / dmar dang skya ba las 'byung 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-16: 'dar zhing skrangs la tsha ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-17: skom dad lang zhing sna 'chus la //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-18: mchu gnag so ni g-yo ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-19: rgyab dang mid pa bcom snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-21: khrag ni mchus bldags rma las 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:270b-22: bas bldags pa gso bar mi rung ba ni /
T13TD4312.3E:270b-23: snying tsha ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:270b-24: 'brum phran mdog dkar ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:270b-25: 'dar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can nas mchus bldags pa las 'dzam bu smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dra ba'i khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ba'i bar yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-26: 'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-27: ming ni mang por gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-29: ba thams cad kyang 'dus pa las gyur pa yin zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:270b-30: nad skyed par byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:270b-31: de'i ming yang du mar gyur pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-32: de'i dug rnon po bar ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-33: dman pa'i dbye bas gsum du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-35: ba de ni dug rnon po la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-36: ma bcos zhag bdun zhag bcu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-37: zla ba phyed kyi rims kyis gsod //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-39: ba de'i dug ni ma bcos shing gso ba ma byas na dug rnon pos ni zhag bdun nas gsod do //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-40: dug bar mas ni zhag bcu nas gsod do //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-41: dug dman pas ni zla ba phyed kyis gsod do //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-42: ba dang mchu rings thams cad kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-43: glang shu kor kor por byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:270b-44: dkar dang gnag dang dmar dang ser //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-2: / dbus su gnag pa 'am sngo ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-3: mtha' ma dra ba lta bus khebs //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-4: mched cing skrang bar byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-5: tsha zhing mang du na ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-7: rul zhing gas par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-8: rnag gis gang du reg gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-9: phyogs der yang ni rma skyed byed //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-11: ba dang sbrang bu mchu ring la sogs pa thams cad kyang glang shu zlum po kor kor po dang 'dra ba skyed par byed cing /
T13TD4312.3E:271a-12: mdog ni dkar po la sogs pa gang yang rung bar gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:271a-13: de bzhin du 'jam pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:271a-14: shu ba mched pa la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:271a-15: rims la sogs pa skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-16: dbugs dang mche ba bshang gci dang //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-17: khu chu kha chu sen mo khrag / brgyad po gnod byed khyad par du //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-18: dug ni kha la gnas pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-20: ba la sogs pa'i srin bu gdug pa 'di dag ni /
T13TD4312.3E:271a-21: dbugs la sogs pa brgyad la dug yod pas gnod par byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:271a-22: khyad par du ni dug de kha la gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-23: ba ni lte ba yan chad 'dzin //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-24: srin bu stod smad kun tu gnod //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-26: ba ni lte ba yan chad du gnod cing dug 'debs par byed la ;
T13TD4312.3E:271a-27: srin bu ni lus kyi stod smad kun tu gnod par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-28: des gnod byas pa'i gos la sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-29: lus la reg na nad skyed byed //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-31: ba dang srin bu gdug pa des gnod cing gos par byas pa'i gos la sogs pas lus la reg na yang dug gi nad skyed par byed do ;
T13TD4312.3E:271a-32: / ba dang srin bu las gyur dug / nyin phyed bar du tshor mi 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-34: ba dang sbrang bu gdug pa la sogs pas zin pa'i dug ni nyi ma phyed kyi bar du tshor bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-35: de nas dang po'i nyin zhag la //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-36: khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du sems //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-37: mdog mi gsal zhing gso ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-38: cung zad g-ya' zhing nad dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-40: de'i 'og tu srin bus zin pa de dang po'i nyin zhag la khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du sems pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:271a-41: gnyis par mtha' ma shin tu mtho //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-0: mdog @271b gsal gyur nas dbus dma' zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-1: g-ya' zhing rmen bu lta bur snang //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-3: sbrang bu gdug pas zin nas zhag gnyis pa'i mtha' ma ni shin tu mtho ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-4: gsum par rims bcas spu ldang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-5: 'khor ling dmar por snang ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-6: kham phor gzugs 'dra phal cher ni //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-9: zhag gsum par ni rims dang bcas pa la sogs par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:271b-10: ba sbu'i bu ga nas chu ser la sogs pa 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-11: nyin zhag bzhi par rab skrang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-12: mgo 'khor lus tsha dbugs mi bde //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-14: de'i nyin zhag bzhi pa la ni de las gyur pa'i nad skrang ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-15: lnga par dug ldang las gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-16: nad ni de dang de dag skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-17: drug par gnang du khyab par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-18: bdun par srog ni 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-20: gdug pa'i dug des drug pa la ni gnad rnams la khyab par byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:271b-21: zhag bdun pa la ni gsod par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-22: de ltar dug ni rnon po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-23: bar ma dman pa dbye bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-25: tshul de ltar na rnon po la sogs pa'i dug gi dbye ba bstan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-26: de nas nyin zhag nyi shu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-27: gcig na yong ye zhi bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-29: de nas nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig 'das nas ni rnam pa thams cad du zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-30: de nas ba yis zin pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-31: mtshon gyis rma ni gnod par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-32: 'dzam bu'i mchu la sogs pas bsreg / mkhris pa las gyur bsreg mi bya //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-34: de'i 'og tu bas bldags pa'i rma mtshon gyis bcad de gnod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:271b-35: 'dzam bu'i mchu la sogs pa'i cha spyad kyis bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-36: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma ni bsreg tu mi rung ste /
T13TD4312.3E:271b-37: mes ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma'i nad skye ba'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-38: rtsub cing spu ni gyes pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-39: gnad dang tshigs la sogs pa nas //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-40: zin nas kun tu khyab gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-41: gcad par mi bya bsreg mi bya //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-43: rtsub pa la sogs pa'i mtshon gyis gcad du yang mi rung la mes bsreg tu yang mi rung ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-44: bsreg pa dug sman rgyam tsha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:271b-45: sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-2: mche bas zin pa bsreg pa la ni rgyam tsha dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i dug sman bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-3: de rjes 'o ma can shing bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-4: sman khu shin tu bsil mo blugs //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-6: 'bus zin pa'i rma bsregs pa de'i 'og tu sman gyi khu ba yang blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-7: rngabs rva sogs sam gtar ga yis //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-8: thams cad la ni khrag dbyung bya //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-10: gdug ba'i srin bus zin pa thams cad la rngabs rva la sogs pas khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-11: de nas bsil sman bsku blugs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-13: de nas de'i 'og tu bsil ba'i sman gyi lnga gus bsku ba dang ;
T13TD4312.3E:272a-14: shin tu bsil ba'i sman gyi chu blugs par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-15: sle sman ta ka aa shvad tha //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-16: ba ru ra dang pri yang ku //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-17: shug pa ser gnyis sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-18: ba dang srin bu la sogs pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-19: dug 'joms las ni thams cad byed //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-21: sle sman ta ka la sogs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bas bldags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:272a-22: srin bu gdug pas zin pa la sogs pa'i dug sel zhing las thams cad byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-23: ser po rnam gnyis rma shing btsod //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-24: padma ge ser rgya spos ni //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-25: sbrang rtsi mar sbyar tsam pa ka / snga ma bas kyang yon tan lhag / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:272a-26: ser po rnam gnyis la sogs pa sbyar ba'i dug sman ni tsam pa ka zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:272a-27: snga ma bas yon tan che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-28: lci khu btsir dang ka ra dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-29: aa pa marga ldong ros dang //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-30: ba bla skyer pa bya ma ka / yug snam sbrang rtsi mar de bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-32: lci khu btsir ba la sogs pa'i sman ni de bzhin te /
T13TD4312.3E:272a-33: ba la sogs pa'i dug 'joms shing las thams cad byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-34: rgya spos na le sham sug smel //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-35: ru rta shing mngar sbrang rtsi mar //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-36: sbyar ba'i sman ni man da ra //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-38: rgya sbos la sogs pa sbyar ba'i sman ni ming man da ra zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:272a-39: de'i yon tan yang de dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-40: rgya sbos seng phrom pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-41: shu dag ba tha sug smel dang //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-42: gur gum spos ngad ldang de bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:272a-44: gzhan yang rgya spos la sogs pa sbyar ba'i sman ni spos ngad ldang ba zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:272a-45: yon tan yang snga ma dang 'dra ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-0: sbyang ba byas @272b pas gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-2: skyes bu nad gzhi mang ba la dug 'joms pa'i sman gyis dang por sbyang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-3: shing mngar dang ni po son cha //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-4: ko sha ta ki aang ko la //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-6: 'thungs na bad kan las gyur dug / myur du slon bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-8: bad kan gyi shas che ba la ni shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman 'bras kyi chu dang blud na /
T13TD4312.3E:272b-9: dug myur du 'byin bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-10: shir sha'i lo ma med dang //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-11: rtsa ba 'bras bu aang ko la'i //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-12: rtsa bar bcas pa'ang de bzhin no //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-14: shi ri sha'i lo ma dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:272b-15: aang ko la'i rtsa ba dang bcas pa 'bras kyi chu dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i srin bu'i dug de myur du slon par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-16: 'bras bu gsum dang ni li ni //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-17: dur byid la sogs bkru sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-19: gal te bkru sman gyis gso bar 'os pa yin na ni /
T13TD4312.3E:272b-20: 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-21: skrang dang tsha sogs zhi gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-22: rma yi lte ba dpog par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-24: gal te skrang pa la sogs pa zhi bar gyur na 'og nas bshad pa'i sman gyis rma'i lte ba dpog par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-25: ba bla le brgan rtsi'i me tog / khron bu byi ba'i rtug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-26: dur byid dan da rgyam tshar sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-27: lte ba 'byin par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-29: ba bla la sogs pa'i sman sbyar te bskus na yang lte ba 'byin par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-30: de bzhin au ta ma ka ri'i //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-31: rtsa ba smin pa'i shun bcas pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-33: de bzhin du au ta ma ka ri'i rtsa ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:272b-34: smin pa'i shun pa gnyis kyis kyang lte ba 'byin par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-35: rgyam tsha ru rta pu tse shel //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-36: dan da pa yasya [?] sbyar ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-37: r'a dza ko sha ta ki'i rtsar //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-38: dar ba'i tshigs ma sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-40: yang lte ba mtho ba de dbyung ba'i phyir rgyam tshal sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:272b-41: r'a dza ko sha ta ki'i rtsa ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:272b-42: dar ba'i tshigs ma ska ba dang sbyar bas kyang bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-43: lte ba bcad pa'i dus su ni //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-44: dug sel ba yis brta bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-46: lte ba bcad pa'i dus su dug sel bar byed pa'i kha zas dang /
T13TD4312.3E:272b-48: snum chos ma lus bya ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:272b-49: zhun mar nyid kyis bya ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-0: srin bu'i dug gi snum chos la ni kun kyang zhun mar @273a * //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-2: til mar gyis ni rtsva sogs la //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-3: me mched lta bur dug 'phel byed //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-5: gal te til mar gyis snum chos byas na ni /
T13TD4312.3E:273a-6: rtsva sngon por me mched pa ltar dug de 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-7: be kam [?] ka ta ba li ka //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-8: thal tres gla sgang spri ka dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-9: tsandan nya lcibs so na ka / autpal rgya spos shing mngar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-10: shing tsha shug pa na gu li //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-11: po son cha'i rkang lhan cig sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-12: skyer pa gla sgang sar pa kshi //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-13: bca' sga pi pi ling rtsa ba //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-14: pi pi ling dang tsi tra ka / ba run dang aa ga ru //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-15: bil ba nim pa ba ta li //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-16: ru rta n'a ga ge sar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-17: se'u lu lhan cig sbyar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-19: rgya spos bca' sga pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-20: lcang ma nim pa ru rta dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-21: chu srin sder mo dzi ban ti //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-22: ga bra'i rtsa ba pa ta li //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-23: dzi ban ti dang po son cha //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-24: shing tsha sbyar ba de dag ni //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-25: mig sman snar blugs byug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-26: sman chu blugs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-27: mkhris pa bad kan rlung gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-28: lu ta'i dug ni ji snyed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-29: tshul khrims la gnas ngan 'gro bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-32: be kang ka ta la sogs pa'i dug sman gyi mchog 'di ni sman gyi sde tshan gsum pos mkhris pa la sogs pa'i srin bu'i nad gsum po 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-33: ji ltar tshul khrims la gnas pa'i mis ngan 'gro'i tshogs zlog par byed pa dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-35: nya lcibs ni chu bal lo //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-36: ku li ni gandhan ku li'o //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-37: se'u lu ni sle sman ta ka'o //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-38: gzhan ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-39: sbyor ba tshan gsum ni be kam [?] ka ta nas po son cha'i rkang gi bar du sbyor ba gcig go //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-40: gnyis pa ni skyer pa nas se'u lu'i bar ro ;
T13TD4312.3E:273a-41: / gsum pa ni bil ba nas shing tsha'i bar ro //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-42: seng phrom shug pa padma ge sar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-43: tsandan dmar ser pri yang ku'i me tog / padma pu shel tse dang ba ya sya'i //
T13TD4312.3E:273a-44: sbyor ba kun gyis ba yi dug rnams 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-0: seng phrom la @273b sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba ste /
T13TD4312.3E:273b-5: sman chu blugs pa'i sbyor bas sbyar na ni ba'i dug thams cad 'joms par byed do //
