T13TD4312.3E:273b-6: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:273b-7: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:273b-8: phye ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:273b-10: // / de nas byi ba dang aa lang ga'i dug gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-11: kha chu can dang mi brtan bu //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-12: rgod dang sgra can pags pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-13: rnying pa'i so dang khu byug dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-14: ser skya dang ni nag po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-15: dmar ser khra bo dkar po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-16: thi ba skra dkar byi ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-17: phus pa dang ni bra byi ste //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-18: byi ba'i dbye ba bco brgyad yin //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-21: kha chu can la sogs pa'i dbye bas bstan pa grangs bco brgyad yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-22: gang du 'di yi khu chus phog / khu bas phog dang reg pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-23: lus kyis lus la reg pa der //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-24: khrag la gnod cing mdog skya la //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-25: thor bu rmen bu dri mnam dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-27: mgo 'khor skrang rims rab tu na //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-28: nyam chung 'dar zhing lhu tshigs na //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-29: spu ldang dran nyams khrag 'dzag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-30: yun ring du ni gnas par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-31: bad kan can gyi byi ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-32: phru gu mang reg skom slon 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-34: byi ba 'di dag gi khu chus lus gang la phog pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:273b-35: yang na khu bas phog pa'i lus dang reg par gyur na der mdog skya ba la sogs pa'i nad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:273b-36: yun ring du 'brel zhing gnas par byed pa'i bar du 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:273b-37: bad kan can gyi mi byi ba'i phru gu mang pos reg na skom dad che ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:273b-39: byi ba 'khrig spyod dug gso dka' //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-40: yang dang yang du ldang bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:273b-42: 'khrig pa spyod pa'i dug gis reg pa ni shin tu gso dka' zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:273b-43: de yang dang yang du ldang zhing 'khrug par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-1: lag kun skrangs mdog mi sdug / rnags shing 'on la rims kyis 'debs //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-2: mgo lci kha chu khrag 'byung zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-3: slon pa gso dka'i mtshan nyid yin //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-5: byi ba'i dug gsor mi rung bas zin pa'i mtshan ma ni yan lag kun skrangs pa nas /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-6: slon pa'i bar yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-7: phus pas zin pa de dri bro //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-8: lgang pa skrangs shing chu mdog nyams //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-9: sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i rmen bus khyab //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-11: mi phus pa'i dug gis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni de'i dri bro ba nas rmen bus khyab pa'i bar yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-12: de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-13: khyi'i dug bad kan shas cher 'khrugs //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-14: 'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa mang gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-15: gnod cing 'khrug par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-16: lus zungs la ni mi bzad gnod //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-18: khyi'i mche ba'i dug gis zin pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-19: bad kan gyi nad shas cher ldang zhing 'khrugs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-20: 'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa mang po la gnas nas 'du shes stor cing brgyal bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-21: lus zungs rnams la lhag par gnod par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-23: kun tu rgyug par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-24: mjug ma 'gram pa phrag gong lhod //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-25: mgo na gdong ni dud pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-27: khyi kha chu 'dzag cing long ba dang 'on pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-28: phyogs kun tu rgyug par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-29: mjug ma lhod cing rang gi gnas nas bskyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-31: phrag pa yang lhod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-32: mgo na zhing tsha ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-33: gdong dud par byed pa ni khyi gdug pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-34: de yi so yis zin na rma //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-35: tshor ba chung zhing khrag nag 'dzag / mgo snying na zhing rims 'debs rengs //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-36: de rjes skom dang brgyal bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:274a-38: de khyi'i sos zin par gyur pa'i mi ni rma'i tshor ba chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:274a-39: de bzhin du khrag nag po 'dzag pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-0: 'di yis @274b gdug cing mche ba can //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-1: ce spyang dom dang dred dang gung //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-2: stag dang spyang ki la sogs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-3: gzhan dag kyang ni shes par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-5: tshul 'dis ni gcan gzan gdug cing mche ba dang ldan pa'i mche ba can ce sbyang la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-6: g-ya' zhing zug la mdog mi sdug / tshor ba med gnas rims mgo 'khor //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-7: tsha zhing dmar lan zhing rnags //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-8: skrang zhing rmen bu skye zug 'khums //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-10: lte ba can du zlum por 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-11: kun tu dug bcas mtshan ma 'di //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-12: dug med de las bzlog pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-14: thams cad du dug dang ldan pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:274b-15: g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par shes par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:274b-16: dug med pa ni g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de dag med cing snga ma las go bzlog pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-17: gang gis bzung ba de'i spyod tshul //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-18: sgra sgrogs rgyu med par de'i gzugs //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-19: chu dang me long sogs mthong 'chi //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-21: mi ce spyang la sogs pa dag gis bzung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de mod la de'i spyod tshul de ce spyang la sogs pa'i spyod tshul byed cing /
T13TD4312.3E:274b-22: de ltar mthong ba'i rgyu med par chu la sogs par de'i gzugs mthong na 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-23: ma bzung bar yang sgra dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-24: mthong bas sngangs par byed pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-25: chu yis skrag ces bya ba ste //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-26: zin pa de yang spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-28: mi gang srog chags de dag gis ma bzung du zin kyang sgra la sogs pas sngangs shing chus skrag par byed pa'i mi de ni chus skrag pa zhes bya ba'i nad kyis zin pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:274b-30: byi ba'i dug gis zin ma thag / rma ni mde'u bsregs pas bsreg / yang na me long dag gis bya //
T13TD4312.3E:274b-31: gzhan du lte bar mi bzod na //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-0: byi bas zin ma thag pa'i mi'i rma la @275a * //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-2: yang na me long bsregs pas de bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-3: gzhan du ma bsregs na rma'i lte ba mi bzod par na bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-4: bsregs nas rma las khrag dbyung zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-5: zhal zhal byas la shir sha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-6: yung ba rgya spos gur gum dang //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-7: sle tres kyi ni lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-9: sos bzung ba bsregs pa'i rma la rngabs rva la sogs pas khrag dbyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:275a-10: zhal zhal byas la shi ri sha la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-11: khyim gyi dud ba skyer pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-12: rgyam tsha dang ni btsod dag gi / lde gus byi ba'i dug sel zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-15: khyim gyi dud pa la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gus bskus na byi ba'i dug sel bar byed cing /
T13TD4312.3E:275a-16: de nyid kyis rma'i lte ba 'bur ba yang sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-17: de nas skyur bas bkrus nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-18: gi ri kar ni pa lin ti //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-19: bil ba'i rtsa ba sle tres dang //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-20: chu dang btags pa'i lde gus bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-22: de'i 'og tu kan dza dang dar ba la sogs pa khu ba skyur bas bkrus la /
T13TD4312.3E:275a-23: de'i rjes la gi ri kar ni la sogs pa chu dang btags pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-24: dug dang skrang sel sman gzhan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-25: yang na gtar ga myur du gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-27: de bzhin du de la dug dang skrang pa sel ba'i sman gzhan dag gis kyang bsku ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:275a-28: gtar ga gdab par yang bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-29: ni li ni bskol shi ri sha //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-30: aang ko la yi khu bas slon //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-32: byi ba'i dug de la ni li ni bskol ba'i khu ba blud pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:275a-33: shi ri sha dang aang ko la'i khu ba blud de slon par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-34: ko sha ta ki shir sha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-35: dzi mu ta ka'i 'bras bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-36: po son cha ni phye mar btags //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-37: zho sbyar blud la dug slon gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:275a-38: yang na ko sha ta ki la sogs pa'i sman bzhi'i phye ma dang zhor sbyar te blud la byi ba'i dug slon du gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-39: shu dag ru rta po son cha'am //
T13TD4312.3E:275a-40: dzi ban ti ni ba gcin btags //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-0: cho ga snga ma bzhin blud @275b na ;
T13TD4312.3E:275b-1: / dug gi nad ni thams cad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-3: shu dag la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang btags pa'i lde gu dang snga ma bzhin du zho dang sbyar te blud na yang byi ba'i dug gi nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-4: dur byid ni li ni dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-5: 'bras bu gsum gyi bkru sman bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-7: yang na dur byid la sogs pa'i bkru sman yang bsngags so //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-8: shir sha'i snying po'i 'bras bu yis //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-9: mgo bo'i bkru sman dag kyang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-11: yang na shir sha'i nang gi snying po dang /
T13TD4312.3E:275b-12: de nyid kyi 'bras bu mgo bo'i bkru sman btang na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-13: ba lci'i khu ba tsha ba gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-14: phye ma zhib btags lde gus phan //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-16: yang na ba'i lci ba la sogs pa'i mig sman yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-17: ba lang lci ba ka pid ta'i //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-18: phye ma sbrang rtsi'i lde gu bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-20: yang na ba lang gi lci ba la sogs pa'i lde gu zos na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-21: tandu li yi rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-22: bskol ba'i mar ni blud na 'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-24: yang na tandu li'i rtsa ba'i sman mar yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-25: gi ri kar ni ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-26: shing mngar btsod dang sle tres phan //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-28: yang na gi ri karni la sogs pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i mar blud na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-29: thal tres rtsa ba mar bskol ba //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-30: ka pid ta yi rnam lnga'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-32: yang na thal tres zhes bya ba sha ri ba dang bskol ba'i sman mar ram /
T13TD4312.3E:275b-33: yang na ka pid ta lnga pa zhes bya ba ka pid tha'i shun pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:275b-34: lo ma dang rtsa ba la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i mar yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-35: sin du ba ra rgya spos dang //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-36: shi kru bil ba'i rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-37: shu dag gze ma ba spru ba //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-38: dzi mu ta dang bcas pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-39: de rnams khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-40: blud nas 'bras chan s'a lu zho //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-41: byin na byi ba'i dug nad sel //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-43: yang byi ba'i dug gis nyen pa la ni sin du ba ra la sogs pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa blud pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-44: shar bung ga'i phye ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-45: dar bar sbyar ba blud pa'ang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-47: yang na sha ra pung ga'i sa bon btags pa'i phye ma dar ba dang sbyar te blud na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-48: aang ko la yi rtsa ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-49: ra thug gcin sbyar lde gus ni //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-50: btung dang bsku ba la sbyar na //
T13TD4312.3E:275b-51: byi ba'i dug kun sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-2: yang na aang ko la'i rtsa ba ji skad smos pa bzhin du btang ba yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-3: ka pid ta yi snying po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-4: ti la ka dang til dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-5: aang ko la yi rtsa ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-6: ba yi 'o ma'am gcin sbyar blud //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-8: yang na ka pid ta'i snying po la sogs pa gcin dang sbyar ba blud na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-9: ti la ka'i sdong yal ga ni //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-10: ba yi 'o ma sbyar ba blud //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-12: yang na sbyor ba 'di byas na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-13: yang na sherya ka'i rtsa ba //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-14: sbrang rtsi 'bras bu sbyar ba blud //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-16: yang na sherya ka zhes bya ba ha tsa ra'i rtsa ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:276a-17: sbrang rtsi dang 'bras bkrus pa'i chu dang sbyar te blud na yang phan no ;
T13TD4312.3E:276a-18: / ku ba kha bo zhag gcig ni //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-19: chu la sbangs ba'ang blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-21: yang na ku ba kha bo zhag gcig chur sbangs pa'i khu ba blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-22: sin du ba ra'i rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-23: byi ba'i rus pa bo dang dkar //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-24: rgya sbos chur btags sna sman sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-25: sbyar bas byi ba'i dug sel byed //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-27: yang sin du ba ra'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i sman sna sman la sogs pa byas na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-28: byi ba'i dug ni lhag lus pa //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-29: sprin mthong bas ni ldang byed pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-30: nad ni 'phel bar byed pa'i rgyu //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-31: ji lta bar ni 'phel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-33: byi ba'i dug lus la lhag par lus pa gnas na sprin mthong na ldang bar byed pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:276a-34: yang na 'phel bar byed pa'i dus dbyar la sogs pa'i tshe 'phel zhing ldang bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-35: de la gnas skabs thams cad du //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-36: gso ba thams cad sbyar bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-37: rang gi gso bar gang bshad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-38: de bzhin nyams pa'i dug sel sbyor //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-40: de la rang gi 'phel bar byed pa'i gnas skabs su ldang bar byed na gnas skabs thams cad du ji skad du bstan pa'i gso ba sbyar bar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:276a-41: rang gi gso ba'i sman gang dag yin pa dang nyams pa'i dug sel ba'i sbyor ba dag bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-42: aa lang ka yi so yis zin //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-43: mar bskol ba yis bsreg par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-44: dug sman de dang de bsku zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-45: mar gyi snying po blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-47: aa lang ka'i sos zin pa'i mi la ni mar bskol bas sos btab pa'i rjes bsreg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:276a-49: bkru sman dag kyang myur du gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-1: aa lang ka'i dug gis zin pa 'di la aarga'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba'i sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-2: aang ko la'i rtsa byang phyogs chu //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-3: srang gsum mar ni srang gcig blud //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-5: aang ko la byang phyogs na gnas pa'i rtsa ba bskol ba'i chu srang gsum dang mar srang gcig bsres te blud na yang phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-6: dha du ra yi 'bras bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-7: gi ri kar ni ba spru [?] ba //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-8: bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-10: dha du ra'i 'bras bu dang gi ri karni dkar po bskol te blud pa 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:276b-11: yang na dha du ra'i 'bras bu dang /
T13TD4312.3E:276b-12: ba spru ba dkar po bskol te blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-13: til btags lde gu aarka lcags //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-14: 'o ma bu ram bsres byin na //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-15: sprin tshogs rlung gis gtor ba bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-16: aa lang ka yi dug 'joms byed //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-18: til btags pa'i lde gu la sogs pa'i sman gcig tu bsres te byin na yang ji skad smos pa'i yon tan skyed par byed do ;
T13TD4312.3E:276b-19: / sngags bcas sman dang rin chen bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-20: zhi bar byed pa dag kyang sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-22: aa lang kas zin pa de la sngags la sogs pa des zhi bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-23: rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-24: so 'am sen mos snad gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-25: skrang zhing rnags la mdog dmar zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-26: tsha na chu ser 'dzag pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-28: rta dang glang po che la sogs pa rkang bzhi pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:276b-29: rkang gnyis pa ste mi dang /
T13TD4312.3E:276b-30: rma bya dang khyim bya la sogs ba'i so 'am sen mos snad par gyur nas skrangs ba dang rnags pa la sogs pa'i nad la ni 'og nas bshad pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-31: aa shva kar na kad pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-32: han sa pa ti go dzi ha //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-33: yug snam ser po gnyis kyis bsku //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-34: so dang sen mo'i dug 'joms byed //
T13TD4312.3E:276b-36: aa shva kar na la sogs ba'i lde gus bskus na so la sogs bas snad pa'i dug sel bar byed do ;
T13TD4312.3E:276b-37: / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:276b-38: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:276b-40: // / dug gso ba'i rgyud rdzogs so /
T13TD4312.3E:277a-0: // / @277a * // de nas bcud kyis len gyi le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-1: de ltar re zhig nad kyis nyen pa dag gi sman gyi sbyor ba bshad na /
T13TD4312.3E:277a-2: bde zhing nad med par gnas pa'i lus kyi stobs dang gzi byin skyed pa ston pa yin la de yang bcud kyis len dang ro tsa bar byed pa yin pa las bcud kyis len ni de dag las kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin pas de sngar bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-3: tshe ring dran dang yid gzhungs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-4: nad med gzhon dang lang tsho dang //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-5: gzugs bzang mdog dang skad gsal dang //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-6: lus dang dbang po'i stobs skyed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-7: tshig 'grub ro tsa mdangs ldan pa //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-10: bcud kyis len gyi cho ga yang dag par gyur pa'i skyes bus ni /
T13TD4312.3E:277a-11: tshe ring ba la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-12: dangs ma la sogs yon tan can //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-13: thob gnas yin phyir bcud kyis len //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-15: dangs ma dang khrag dang sha la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa khyad par can thob cing rnyed par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pas na bcud kyis len ces bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-16: na tshod dang po'am bar ma'i tshe //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-17: dbang po thul bas de sbyar te //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-18: snum chos bya zhing gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-19: rnam pa kun tu sbyang byas gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-21: bcud kyis len de yang na tshod dang po'i tshe 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:277a-22: na tshod bar ma'i tshe gtang bar byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:277a-23: de yang skyes bu dbang po thul cing yul gyis sems ma phrogs pas de bsten cing sbyar bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:277a-24: de yang snum chos byas shing gtar ga gdab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:277a-25: slon sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa las rnam pa lngas lus sbyangs nas gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-26: ma sbyangs pa yi lus la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-27: bcud kyis len dang ro tsa ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-28: sbyor byas dri ma can gyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-29: gos kyi tshon ltar don med 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-31: gang gi phyir lus ma sbyangs shing dag par ma byas pa la /
T13TD4312.3E:277a-32: bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:277a-33: ro tsa ba byas na de don med par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:277a-34: dper na dri ma can gyi gos la tshon gyis kha bsgyur na de len du mi btub pa dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-35: bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-36: rnam pa gnyis su drang srong 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:277a-37: spyil por 'dug pa gtso bo ste //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-0: rlung dang than pas nyen @277b cig shos //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-2: bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba ni drang srong rnams kyis rnam pa gnyis su bshad de /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-3: spyil po 'am khang par zhugs te bsgrub pa ni gtso bo yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-4: rlung dang than pas nyen pa'i sbyor ba ni cig shos te gtso bo ma yin pa'o //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-5: khang pa rlung med 'jigs pa med //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-6: chos ldan yo byad 'byor ba'i grong //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-7: sa phyogs shis pa'i byang phyogs su //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-8: khang pa sum rim dkar khung chung //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-9: dud pa nyi tshan sbrul dang rdul //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-10: bud med glen mas ma bgrod par //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-11: yo byad sman pa sta gon byas //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-12: khang pa legs par byi dor bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-14: sman bsten pa'i khang par rlung med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-15: 'jigs shing bag tshab med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-16: chos dang mi 'gal ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-17: sman la sogs pa'i yo byad 'byor ba dang grong gi byang shar gyi mtshams kyi sa phyogs shis par khang pa sum rim du brtsigs pa skar khung chung du dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-18: dud pa la sogs pas ma nyen pa /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-19: yo byad dang sman pa sta gon byas pa khang pa skyang nul la sogs pa byi dor bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-20: de nas tshes grangs bzang khrus byas //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-23: de'i 'og tu bcud kyis len bsgrub par 'dod pa des zla ba yar ngo'i tshes grangs bzang por khrus dang gtsang sbra byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-24: mchod par 'os pa lha dang bla ma la mchod pa byas te der 'jug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-25: der ni sbyang byas dag gyur nas //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-26: bde zhing stobs ni skyed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-27: tshangs par spyod dang brtan par ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-28: dad par ldan zhing dbang po thul //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-29: sbyin dang tshul khrims bde ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-30: brtul zhugs chos la mchog tu gzhol //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-31: lha ni rjes su dran par ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-32: rigs pas gnyid log gnyid mi log / sman la dga' zhing tshig 'jam pas //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-33: bcud kyis len ni brtsam par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:277b-35: de nas khang par der bkru sman dang /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-36: skyug sman la sogs pas sbyang bar bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-37: de bzhin du nyams brta ba la sogs pas stobs thob cing nus pa rnyed pa'i mi tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan zhing bud med la nyal po bya ba spang ba brtan zhing sran thub pa /
T13TD4312.3E:277b-38: dad pa dang ldan zhing mos pa che ba /
T13TD4312.3E:278a-0: dbang po thul zhing yul gyis sems mi phrogs pa sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la @278a * //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-1: sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs la mchog tu gzhol ba /
T13TD4312.3E:278a-2: de bzhin du lha rjes su dran zhing yid la byed pa'i gtam dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:278a-3: de bzhin du rigs shing ran par gnyid log pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:278a-4: ma log pa dang ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:278a-5: de bzhin du sman gyi sbyor ba la dga' zhing mos pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:278a-6: tshig 'jam zhing des pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa de lta bus bcud kyis len gyi cho ga brtsam par bya zhing de la 'jug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-7: de nyid snum chos dugs byas nas //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-8: aa ru ra dang skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-9: rgyam tsha bca' sga pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-10: shu dag yung ba byi dang ga //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-11: bu ram chu dron sbyar ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-14: skyes bu de dang po snum chos dang dugs byas nas //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-15: aa ru ra dang bu ram gyi bar du chu dron dang sbyar te blud na /
T13TD4312.3E:278a-16: mi de legs shing bde bar 'khru bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-17: de nas lus ni dag 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-18: thug sogs rim par spyad nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-19: zhag gsum mam ni zhag lnga'am //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-20: zhag bdun bar du zhun mar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-21: nas thug dag par gyur gyi bar //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-22: sbyin zhing bshang rnying dag par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-24: de'i 'og tu lus kyi sbyang ba byas pa'i skyes bu des thug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa ji skad bshad pa spyad nas /
T13TD4312.3E:278a-27: zhag bdun gyi bar du zhun mar dang bcas pa'i nas thug sbyin par bya ba 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:278a-28: yang na sngar gyi bshang ba rnying pa de dag par gyur gyi bar du nas thug sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-29: de ltar lto ni sbyang byas nas //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-30: goms par shes pas gang zhig la //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-31: gang zhig 'tsham pa de kun brtags //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-32: bcud kyis len ni sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-34: tshul de ltar lto sbyang ba byas pa'i skyes bu goms pa'i sbyor ba shes pa'i sman pas lus zungs nad gzhi la sogs pa'i tshul thams cad brtags te /
T13TD4312.3E:278a-35: gang la ji ltar 'tsham pa'i bcud kyis len de sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-36: aa ru ra stong de'i sum 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-37: skyu ru ra dang bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-38: rtsa ba lnga po lnga rnams ni //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-39: srang ni nyis brgya lnga bcu dag / chu ni bcu 'gyur nang du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-40: khu ba bcu cha lus pa ru //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-41: aa ru rnam rgyal skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-42: brdungs la rus pa phyung nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-43: khu ba de yi nang du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:278a-44: shing tsha sug smel pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-0: ga dur skyer @278b pa aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-1: tsandan ma du ka par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-2: shang ka pushpa ka na ya //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-3: shu dag gla ba shing mngar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-4: byi dang ga ni phul re'i tshad //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-5: khar dkar srang stong chig brgya //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-6: zhun mar bre ni bcu gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-7: til mar bre ni brgyad bcas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-8: lde gur gyur gyi bar du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-9: phab la bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-10: srang ni sum brgya nyi shu gzhug / de nas gzar bus dkrugs nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-11: mar gyi snod du gzhug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-12: gang zhig zas gcig la mi gnod //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-13: de ni 'di yi tshad du bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-14: zhu ba'i tshe na drug cu pa //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-15: 'o mar bcas ba'i kha zas sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-16: bcud kyas len 'di tshangs pas bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-17: dge zhing dpal yon can yin zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-18: mkha' la gnas dang byis pa rtse //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-19: de bzhin dka' thub pas bsten byas //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-20: lus snyom ngal dang skra dkar dang //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-21: gnyer ma'i skyon ni spang 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-22: yid gzhungs dran dang stobs ldan zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-23: tshe ring par yang 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-25: aa ru ra rdog ma stong dang /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-26: de'i sum 'gyur gyi skyu ru ra dang bcas pa ste skyu ru ra sum stong dang /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-27: sman gyi sde tshan sna tshogs nas bshad pa'i rtsa ba lnga po lnga sbyir [?] srang nyis brgya lnga bcu ste /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-28: 'di dag ni sman re re zhing bcu bcu gzhug par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-29: de dag thams cad bsdus pa srang gis bsdus te ;
T13TD4312.3E:278b-30: de'i bcu 'gyur gyi chu'i nang du bskol la de'i khu ba bcu cha lus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-31: de'i 'og tu aa ru ra rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-32: skyu ru ra brdungs la rus pa byung ste /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-33: khu ba de'i nang du shing tsha nas byi dang ga'i bar du sman sna re zhing phul re gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-34: de bzhin du khar dkar po srang stong chig brgya dang /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-35: de bzhin du zhun mar bre bcu gnyis dang /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-36: de bzhin du til mar bre brgyad de /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-37: de dag thams cad gcig tu bsres la /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-38: gzar bu la chags shing lde gur gyur gyi bar du bskol la thab las phab ste bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang sum brgya nyi shu gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:278b-39: de nas de'i 'og tu gzar bus legs par dkrugs la de mar gyi snod du bcug cing bzhag bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-40: de las tshad bzhin du bza' bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:278b-41: de'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig zos pas nang par gyi zas bza' ba'i dus la mi gnod cing bde bar 'ju nus pa de tsam du bza' bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-1: na 'bras drug cu pa'i chan 'o ma dang bcas pa'i kha zas sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-2: bcud kyis len pa 'di ni tshangs pas bshad pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-3: dge zhing dpal skyed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan no //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-4: drang srong mkha' la gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-5: byis pa dang rtse ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-6: de bzhin du dka' thub pa gzhan rnams kyis kyang bsten cing goms par byas pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-7: de dag kyang bcud kyis len 'di lus kyi snyom pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-8: ngal ba la sogs pa spang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-10: dran pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa nas tshe shin tu ring ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-11: skyon med aa ru ra dang skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-12: stong dang pi pi ling ni stong dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-13: rgya skyegs shing gzhon thal ba'i chu sbyar ba //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-14: snod du bzhag ste legs par sbangs nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-15: slar phyung grib mar skams te phye mar byas //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-16: kha ra dkar po bzhi cha mar dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-17: sbrang rtsi bzhi 'gyur bcas pa mar gyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-18: bum par bcug ste sa brkos par bzhag la //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-19: zla ba drug lon nas ni slar phyung ste //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-20: snga dro'i dus su me drod ji bzhin bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-21: rtag tu mthun pa'i zas ni bza' bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-22: de ltar ma lus zos na lo brgya 'tsho //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-23: nad med pa dang skra dkar gnyer ma med //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-24: lus kyi stobs 'phel rgyas par 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-25: mchog tu dran gsal yid ni gzhungs par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-27: aa ru ra dang skyu ru ra skyon med cing khu ba dang sman gyi nus pa la sogs pa rdzogs par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-28: de bzhin du pi pi ling stong dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-29: de bzhin du rgya skyegs shing pa la sha zhes bya ba thal bar byas te chur gzags pa dang sbyar te /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-30: snod du bzhag la sbangs par gyur nas slar phyung ste grib ma'i nang du skams nas phye mar byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-31: kha ra dkar po phye ma'i bzhi cha las /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-32: de bzhin du mar dang sbrang rtsi sman gyi bzhi 'gyur dang bcas pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdoms te mar gyi bum par bcug nas sa brkos pa'i nang du bzhag la /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-33: zla ba drug lon pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-34: de'i 'og tu slar phyung ste snga dro'i dus su ji tsam du ran par zos la /
T13TD4312.3E:279a-35: de zhu ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha zas s'a lu'i chan la sogs pa bza' bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:279a-36: de lta bu'i sbyor bas sman thams cad zos na /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-0: lo brgya'i @279b bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing nad dang skra dkar dang gnyer ma med par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-1: lus kyi stobs 'phel ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-2: skyon med rgya skyegs shing rlon pa //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-3: thor to bcad la bzhog pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-4: sdong bu khru gnyis brkos pa'i nang //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-5: skyu ru ra ni sar pas dgang //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-6: rtsa ba'i bar du 'jag mas dkri //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-8: de nas rlung med gnas su ni //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-9: lci ba sar pa gtsang mas btso //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-10: tshos shing skyu ru ra sbangs nas //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-11: sbrang rtsi mar bcas mi yis bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-12: de rjes 'o ma mar bcas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-13: ci 'dod par ni btung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-14: de nyid kyis ni zla gcig par ;
T13TD4312.3E:279b-15: / bsten zhing spang bar bya ba rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-16: de ni 'bad de spang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-17: chu ni grang mo lag pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-18: reg pa tsam yang mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-19: de ltar zhag ni bcu gcig 'das //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-20: skra so sen mo lhags par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-21: de nas nyin zhag nyung zad nas //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-22: gzugs bzang bud med la phod cing //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-24: mchog tu yid gzhungs snying stobs dang //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-27: pa la sha rul pa la sogs pa'i skyon med pa rlon pa'i thor to bcad la bzhog pa'i nang gi sdong bu khru gnyis pa brkos la /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-28: de'i nang du skyu ru ra sar pas bkang la /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-29: de'i 'og tu 'jag mas rtsa ba'i bar du dkri bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-30: de nas padma skyes pa'i 'dam gyis bsku bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-31: de'i 'og tu rlung med pa'i gnas su dgon pa'i lci ba sar pa'i mes btsos la /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-32: de nas skyu ru ra de sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bcas par bza' bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-33: de'i 'og tu skom du 'o ma ngoms par blud par bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-34: 'o ma de nyid dang zla ba gcig gi bar du gnas par bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-35: zas gzhan mi bza' bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-36: de'i bcud kyis len gyi spang bar bya ba'i spyod lam ni /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-37: 'bad de spang bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-38: chu grang mo ni tha na lag pas kyang mi reg par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-39: de lta bu'i tshul gyis zhag bcu gcig 'das par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-40: skra dang so la sogs pa lhags par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-41: de nas nyin zhag gi dus nyung zad cig na gzugs bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:279b-42: bud med la phod pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-43: rtsa ba bcu pa ba bla dang //
T13TD4312.3E:279b-44: gla sgang thal tres dzi ba ka //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-1: kar ka ta sring pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-2: med sug smel ta ma la //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-4: ma nu zur pa ba spru pa //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-5: ram nye ba gnyis sle tres dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-6: ka ka na sa aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-7: ba sha ka'i rtsa bi da ri //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-8: srang re gcig tu bsres nas ni ;
T13TD4312.3E:280a-9: / skyu ru ra'i 'bru lnga brgya ni //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-10: chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-11: de yi khu ba bzhi cha lus //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-12: skyu ru ra yi rus pa bsal //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-13: mar dang til mar srang bcu gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-14: nang du legs par brdos nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-15: kha ra dkar po srang lnga bcu //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-16: btags te lde gu'i tshul du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-17: snum phyed kyi ni sbrang rtsi gzhug / smig rkang srang ni bzhi dag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-18: pi pi ling ni srang gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-19: dri bzangs bzhi ni srang gcig gzhug / de las tshad tsam bza' bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-20: khang par gnas shing 'phrod zas bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-22: drang srong 'pho bas gang zos pas //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-23: rgas pas nyen par gyur pa yang //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-24: bud med kyi ni mig tu sdug / cho ga bzhin du bsten gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-25: lud pa dbugs mi bde rims dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-26: skems dang snying nad dreg nad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-27: gcin dang khu chu la gnas dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-28: skad 'gags pa yang sel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-29: byis pa rgan dang glo 'gram gcod //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-30: rid pa'i nyams stobs 'phel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-31: yid gzhungs dran dang mdangs ldan dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-32: nad med nyid dang tshe 'phel dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-33: rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-34: bud med la phod stobs dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-35: dbang po gsal zhing me drod skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-37: rtsa ba bcu dang ba bla la sogs pa'i sman sna re zhing srang re gcig tu bsres pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:280a-38: skyu ru ra'i rdog ma lnga brgya chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:280a-39: de'i khu ba bzhi cha lus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:280a-40: de las skyu ru ra btus te rus pa bsal la mar dang til mar srang bcu gnyis kyi nang du brngos la /
T13TD4312.3E:280a-41: de'i 'og tu kha ra dkar po srang lnga bcu dang bcas pa de lde gu'i sbyor bas bskol la tshos nas bsgrangs la /
T13TD4312.3E:280a-42: sbrang rtsi snum gyi phyed de srang drug la sogs pa bcug la /
T13TD4312.3E:280a-43: lde gu de las tshad tsam bza' zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:280a-44: khang par gnas te kha zas 'phrod pa bstan par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:280a-45: 'di ni drang srong 'pho bas bsten zhing zos pa zhes bya ba'i bcud kyis len yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:280b-0: bcud @280b kyis len gang zhig zos pas de rgas 'khogs par gyur pa yang gzugs bzang zhing bud med kyi mig tu sdug par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-1: 'di cho ga bzhin bsten par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:280b-2: lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa nas /
T13TD4312.3E:280b-3: dbang po gsal zhing me drod skyed par byed pa'i bar gyi yon tan dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-4: shing mngar smig rkang pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-5: lce myang tsha dang bcas pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-6: lcags ni sna re gser dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-7: shu dag sbrang rtsi zhun mar ram //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-8: kha ra dkar po 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-9: lo gcig bsten na bcud len 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-10: nad kun 'joms shing dran pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-11: yid gzhungs blo ni skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-22: kha ra dkar po 'bras bu gsum dang bcas pa lo gcig tu bsten na /
T13TD4312.3E:280b-23: bcud kyis len du 'gyur zhing nad thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-24: ma du ka parna yi khu ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-25: shing mngar phye ma 'o mar bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-26: lhan cig sbyar ba me drod ji bzhin sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-27: sle tres shang ka pushpa'i me tog bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-28: lde gur sbyar ba me drod ji bzhin du //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-29: bsten na tshe ni sbyin par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-30: nad 'jig stobs skyed mdog ni gsal byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-31: me drod skad gsal yid gzhungs skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-32: bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba 'di dag las //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-33: shang ka pushpa'i sbyor 'di yid gzhungs mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:280b-34: ma du ka parni zhes bya ba bskol ba'i khu ba 'am ;
T13TD4312.3E:280b-37: shang ka pushpa'i rtsa ba'i lde gu me drod ji lta ba bzhin du bsten na bcud kyis len du 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:280b-38: tshe sbyin par byed pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-39: bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba 'di dag las shang ka pushpa'i sbyor ba ni mchog tu yang yid gzhungs par byed ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-40: spangs ma pu tse shel dang ba ya sya //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-41: shing mngar thal tres tsandan 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-42: shu dag tsha ba gsum dang ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-43: pa to li'i rtsa rgyam tsha zhib tu btags //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-44: mar dang 'o ma bre ni bcu drug dang //
T13TD4312.3E:280b-45: shang ka pashpu'i khu ba sum 'gyur bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-0: @281a * // blud na glen pa 'ang tshig la dbang 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-1: thos 'dzin spobs pa che zhing nad med 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-3: spangs ma la sogs pa de dag zhib tu btags la mar dang 'o ma bre bcu drug dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281a-4: shang ka pushpa'i khu ba mar gyi sum 'gyur dang bskol te blud na skyes bu blun po dag kyang tshig gsal zhing ngag la dbang ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281a-6: nad med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-7: padma'i rtsa ba sdong bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-8: ge sar nang gi sa bon rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-9: gser bcas mar dang 'o ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-10: bre ni bcu drug nang du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-11: padma lnga pa'i thig le zhes //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-12: sa steng dag du grags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-13: tshul bzhin bsten na skyes bu ni //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-14: nyams stobs zad pa 'phel bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-16: padma'i rtsa ba la sogs pa tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i bcud kyis len ni ming padma lnga pa zhes grags pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:281a-17: de tshul bzhin du bsten na mchog tu skyes bu'i nyams stobs skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-18: gang zhig autpal sdong bu lo //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-19: rtsa ba ge sar ldan bskol ba //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-20: autpal bzhi par grags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-21: gser dang bcas pa'i bcud len gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-22: sbyor ba bsten na ba lang yang //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-23: yid gzhungs 'gyur na mir ci smos //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-25: sman mar gang autpa la'i sdong bu dang lo ma dang rtsa ba dang ldan par bskol zhing gsar dang bcas pa sbyar ba'i bcud kyis len ni autpa la bzhi pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:281a-26: de bsten na ba lang yang yid gzhungs shing blo dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin na /
T13TD4312.3E:281a-27: mir skyes nas lta smos kyang ci dgos //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-28: bramhi shu dag shang ka pushpa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-29: rgyam tsha mang tsha ksha ra bi sha la //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-30: bramhi so bar tsa la pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-31: re re nas ni gsum gsum tsam gyi tshad //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-32: gser ni nas gnyis dug ni til 'bru tsam //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-33: zhun mar srang gcig 'di dag zhib tu sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-34: legs par btang ste zhu bar gyur nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-35: mar bcas kha zas lo gcig bar du bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-36: dran dang yid gzhungs blo ni 'phel 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-37: na dang rgas ba dag las 'das pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-38: snyom dang ngal dub sel byed lo brgyar 'tsho //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-39: dpal dang gzi brjid mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-40: khyad par du ni mdze nad sha bkra skran //
T13TD4312.3E:281a-41: dug dang dbyig dug rims dang smyo byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-0: srid srung rig byed sngags byas gshed @281b byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-1: rlung nad stobs chen 'dis ni zhi bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-3: bramhi nas pi pi ling gi sman sna re re zhing nas gsum gyi tshad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-4: gser ni gnyis kyi tshad dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-7: de dag thams cad gcig tu sbyar nas zos te /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-8: de zhu bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-9: kha zas mar dang sbrang rtsi mang po zos la tshul de ltar lo gcig gi bar du bsten na dran pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-10: yid gzhungs pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-11: nad la sogs pa las 'das pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-12: lo brgya tshang ba'i bar du 'tsho zhing dpal la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-13: khyad par du yang bcud kyis len 'dis mdze la sogs pa sel bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-14: de bzhin du srid srung gi rig byed las bshad pa'i cho gas gshed byed dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-15: gnod pa'i las kyi sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-16: rlung nad shin tu mi bzad pa dag kyang zhi bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-17: nag pa la ston gyi tshe //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-18: skar ma rgyal la bab par btu //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-19: de yi rtsa ba zho gnyis tsam //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-20: phyer btags 'o ma sbyar te btung //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-21: yang na mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-23: de ltar lo gcig zos gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-26: nag pa la zhes bya ba'i sman ston gyi dus la bab pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-27: skar ma rgyal dang gza' zla ba la babs pa'i dus su btus te /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-28: de'i rtsa ba zho gnyis tsam gyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar te btung ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-29: yang na mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar te bldag cing 'o mas 'tsho bar byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-30: de ltar lo gcig gi nang du bsten na lo brgya'i bar du 'tsho ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:281b-31: stobs shin tu che bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-32: gze ma 'bras bu skyes pa rtsa bar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-33: grib mar skams te zhib tu btags nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-34: rang gi khu bar sbangs pa de las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-35: che tshad khyor gang tsam du byas gyur gang //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-36: de dang 'o ma sbyar nas bza' bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-37: zhu nas 'o ma srang ni nyis brgya zos //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-38: gzugs bzang skal ldan lo brgya thub pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-39: 'dod spyod khyu mchog ba lang tshogs gnas 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:281b-41: gze ma 'bras bu skyes pa rtsa ba dang bcas pa grib mar skams te zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma rang gi khu ba'i nang du sbangs te /
T13TD4312.3E:282a-0: gze ma de las che tshad rang gi khyor gang tsam ste srang @282a * //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-1: gnyis kyi tshad tsam yang 'o ma dang sbyar te /
T13TD4312.3E:282a-3: sman de khu bar gyur nas 'o ma nyid srang nyis brgya dang /
T13TD4312.3E:282a-4: 'bras chan bsres pa zos par gyur na gzugs bzang ba la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:282a-5: ji ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyi nang na khyu mchog 'dod pa spyod pa dang 'dra bar 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-6: ba ra hi yi sdong bu rlon pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-7: 'o mar sbyar ba zos shing 'o ma btung //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-8: zla gcig bar du kha zas 'o mas 'tsho //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-9: rgas pa'i tshogs las nges par rgyal 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-11: sman ba ra hi'i sdong bu rlon pa 'o ma dang sbyar ba bsten cing zla ba gnyis pa la yang sdong bu de zas gzhan mi bza' bar 'o ma dang bcas par bsten na skyes bu de sbyor ba des rgas pa las nges par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-12: yang na de yi sdong bu'i phye zhib mo //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-13: rang gi khu ba dang ni legs sbyar te //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-14: mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-15: yang na de bskol mar ni btung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-17: yang na de'i sdong bu phye ma zhib mor btags la rang nyid bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te /
T13TD4312.3E:282a-18: ji skad smos pa'i lde gu 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:282a-19: sman mar zos na yang yon tan snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-20: de bzhin aa ti ba la bi da ri //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-21: shing mngar dang ni mon sne'u da me ru dang //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-22: dzi ban ti dang ra sna aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-23: sa la parni sle tres skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-24: shang ka pushpa man du ka parni //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-25: aa shva gandha dang ni nye'u shing rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-26: sbyar ba btang na yid gzhungs blo dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-27: rgas sran tshod brtan zhing stobs skyed byed //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-29: de bzhin du aa ti ba la la sogs pa yang ba ra hi'i sbyor ba dang 'dra bar sman sna gang yang rung ba re re btang bar gyur na yid gzhungs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-30: sthi ra ni sa la barni'o //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-31: man du ka parni man du ki'o //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-32: gzhan ni go bar zad do //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-33: tsi tra ka yi me tog ni //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-34: ser po dkar nag las shes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-35: cho ga bzhin du bcud len sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-36: go rims bzhin du yon tan che //
T13TD4312.3E:282a-38: tsi tra ka'i me tog rnam pa gsum po ser po dang dkar po dang nag po ji lta ba bzhin du shes par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:282a-39: de bcud kyis len du sbyar na go rims ji lta ba bzhin du yon tan che ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:282b-0: me tog ser po can bas ni dkar po yon tan dang ldan la @282b dkar po bas ni nag po yon tan che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-1: de yi rtsa ba grib mar skam //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-2: phye mar bcas pa sbrang rtsi mar //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-3: 'o ma chu dang zla gcig par //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-4: brtul zhugs can gyis bsten byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-5: phan pa'i zas ni za byed na //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-6: lo brgyar 'tsho zhing nad med la //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-7: yid gzhungs stobs dang mdangs ldan zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-10: tsi tra ka de'i rtsa ba'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi gnyi ga'am /
T13TD4312.3E:282b-12: chu dang bcas par zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten nas 'phrod pa'i zas zos na lo brgyar 'tsho ba la sogs pa'i yon tan skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-13: til mar lde gu zla gcig bar //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-14: bsten na rlung nad gso dka' 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-15: gcin sbyar sha bkra mdze nad 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-16: dar bar sbyar bas gzhang 'brum sel //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-18: tsi tra ka de til mar dang bcas pa zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten na rlung nad mi bzad pa dag kyang sel bar byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:282b-19: de gcin dang sbyar te zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten na ni mdze dang sha bkra 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-20: tsi tra ka dang sbyar te zla gcig gi bar bsten na ni gzhang 'brum sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-21: go bye legs par smin pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-22: 'bras kyi phung po'i nang du gzhug / so ga'i tshe btus dgun tshe phyung //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-23: mngar zhing snum dang bsil ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-24: sman sbyar de yi rdog ma brgyad //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-25: brgyad 'gyur chur ni bskol nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-26: khu ba de yi brgyad cha lus //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-27: 'o ma sbyar ba grang mo btung //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-28: de rjes nyi ma re re zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-29: go bye rdog ma re res bskyed //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-30: nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-31: gsum gsum gyis bskyed de phan chad //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-32: bzhi bcu'i bar bskyed de 'og tu //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-33: bskyed pa bzhin du dbri bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-34: bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-35: stong gi bar du gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-36: bdag nyid bsdams shing 'o ma mar //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-37: s'a lu drug cu'i 'bras chan bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-38: de bzhin dus ni sum 'gyur bya //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-39: sbyor ba'i mtha' yang spyad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-40: sngon gyi legs smon thob 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-41: khyad par du ni me drod skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-42: gcin snyi srin bu gzhang 'brum mdze //
T13TD4312.3E:282b-45: go bye zhes bya ba bse shing gi 'bras bu so ga'i dus su legs par smin zhing khu bcud yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa btus la 'bras kyi phung po'i nang du bcug ste //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-0: @283a * // de dgun gyi dus su phyung la ro mngar ba dang rang bzhin snum zhing bsil ba'i sman dang legs par sbyar te /
T13TD4312.3E:283a-1: de'i rdog ma brgyad chu brgyad 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la khu ba brgyad cha lus par byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:283a-2: de 'o ma dang sbyar ba grang mo btung zhing go bye rdog ma brgyad po de dag zhag bdun gyi bar du rdog ma re res bskyed par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-3: de'i 'og tu go bye las nyi ma re zhing gsum gsum gyis bskyed la bzhi bcu'i bar du bskyed par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-4: de'i 'og tu go bye de sngar bskyed pa'i tshul gyi grangs dang 'dra bar gsum gsum gyis dbri zhing bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-5: de'i 'og tu ni re res dbri bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-6: tshul de ltar zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du gtang zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:283a-7: rdog ma stong gi bar du gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-8: de'i tshe bdag nyid bsdams pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa dang ldan par bya zhing sbyor ba'i mtha' yang spyod lam bsdams pa'i dus sum 'gyur du byas la sngon gyi legs par smon pa tsi tra ka'i skabs su bshad pa'i nad med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:283a-9: yun ring du 'tsho ba la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:283a-10: khyad par du ni me drod bskyed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:283a-11: gcin snyi ba la sogs pa'i nad 'joms pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-12: go bye'i 'bras bu skyon med pa //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-13: brdungs shing zhib tu btags pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-14: bum par bcug ste sa nag bskus //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-15: sa brkos pa yi nang du gzhug / kun nas ba yi lci bas bskor //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-16: de sbyar me la btsos nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-17: de las 'dzag pa'i khu ba gang //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-18: blangs pa nyin zhag gzhan la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-19: de yi brgyad 'gyur sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-20: nyis 'gyur mar dang sbyar ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-21: cho ga snga ma bzhin bsdams te //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-22: bsten na yon tan de nyid thob //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-24: go bye'i 'bras bu skyon med par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas la de tshul bzhin du btsos la /
T13TD4312.3E:283a-25: de las khu ba gang zhig 'dzag pa de nyi ma gnyis pa la blangs la /
T13TD4312.3E:283a-26: rang gi khu ba de'i brgyad 'gyur gyi sbrang rtsi dang nyis 'gyur gyi mar dang sbyar te /
T13TD4312.3E:283a-27: cho ga snga ma bzhin du bsdams pa dang bcas pas bsten na yang skyes bu de sngar bshad pa'i yon tan de nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-28: go bye'i 'bras bu smin te lhung gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-29: bre bzhi'i tshad tsam dang ni so phag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-30: bdar ba'i phye ma dag dang chu dang mnye //
T13TD4312.3E:283a-31: bkrus te rlung la legs par bskams nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-0: brdungs te chu @283b bre bcu drug nang du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-1: bzhi cha lus pa btsags te bsgrangs pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-2: khu ba de dang 'o ma bre bcu drug / bskol te bzhi cha lus par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-3: de dang mnyam pa'i zhun mar bcas par bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-4: de'i nang kha ra'i phye ma ci ran gzhug / de ni gzar bus dkrugs pas gcig tu gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-5: 'bras kyi phung por zhag bdun legs par sba //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-6: bdud rtsi 'dra ba de bsten skyes bu gang //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-7: chu 'am 'o ma sha khu 'thung gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-8: dran dang yid gzhungs blo gros stobs dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-9: snying stobs dang ldan gser gyi mdog dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-10: tshe ring ba yang des ni 'thob par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-12: go bye smin par gyur nas //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-13: rang nyid lhung bar gyur pa bre bzhi tsam so phag bdar ba'i phye ma dang /
T13TD4312.3E:283b-14: chu dang bcas par mnyes la /
T13TD4312.3E:283b-15: yang slar chur bkrus la rlung la skams pa gtun gyi nang du brdungs te /
T13TD4312.3E:283b-16: ji skad smos pa bzhin du bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:283b-17: de'i nang du kha ra'i phye ma rang nyid ji tsam 'dod pa bcug ste /
T13TD4312.3E:283b-18: de dkrugs la zhag bdun gyi bar du 'bras kyi phung por sbas la /
T13TD4312.3E:283b-19: skyes bu gang gis bdud rtsi bza' ba lta bu'i sman mar de bsten la de'i 'og tu chu la sogs pa gang yang rung ba 'thungs na /
T13TD4312.3E:283b-20: de dran pa la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-21: chu bre bcu drug nang du go bye ni //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-22: sum brgya bskol te bzhi cha lus pa ru //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-23: til mar srang bzhi der ni bcug nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-24: tig ta bong nga gnyis dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-25: brag zhun skyer shun da lis phye ma gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-26: bskol na mdze nad ma las 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-28: chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bse shing gi 'bras bu sum brgya ji skad smos pa bzhin du bskol ba'i sman mar ni mdze nad thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-29: go bye skyu ru ra 'am tsha 'am ni //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-30: zho yi spris ma til mar 'o ma'am //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-31: bu ram 'o thug mar ram sbrang rtsi'am //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-32: nas zan dag gam til btags lde gur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-33: sran tshod dag dang lhan cig sbyar ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-34: lus rgyas yid gzhungs tshe ring byed mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-36: go bye skyu ru ra dang bcas pa tsha la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:283b-38: sran mungga'i tshod ma dang bcas pa lhan cig sbyar te bsten pa yang lus rgyas par byed pa la sogs pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:283b-39: go bye'i 'bras bu rnon po ni //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-0: @284a * // smin pa me dang 'drar gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-1: cho ga bzhin du sbyar ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-4: go bye'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis rno ba dang de bzhin du smin cing tshos pa me dang 'dra ba cho ga ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bsten cing spyad par gyur na bdud rtsi dang 'dra bar yon tan che ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-5: bse shing 'bras bu ma bcos pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-6: bad kan nad dang nad rnying ni //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-7: 'brel ba gang yin de med cing //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-8: me yi drod kyang myur du skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-10: gang bse shing gi 'bras bu bsten na des ma bcos pa'i bad kan gyi nad dam nad rnying pa dang rjes su 'brel zhing yun ring du lon pa'i nad gang yang med cing me drod shin tu skyed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-11: rlung dang tsha bar 'dug pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-12: khyad par du ni spang bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-13: rgya sran zho dang tsha dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-14: til mar bsku dang me bsten spang //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-16: bse shing gi 'bras bu bsten par byed pa na rlung dang nyi tshan la sogs pa spang bar bya zhing khyad par du rgya sran la sogs pa spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-17: du bar [?] yi shing zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-18: nub phyogs rgya mtsho'i ngos nas skye //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-19: chu rlabs g-yo bas bskyod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-20: rlung gis lo ma g-yengs pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-22: shing du ba ra [?] zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i ngogs na skye ba yod de /
T13TD4312.3E:284a-23: de ni chu rlabs g-yo bas bskyod pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-24: de yi 'bras bu dbyar gyi tshe //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-25: legs par smin pa btu bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-27: du ba ra de'i 'bras bu shin tu legs par smin pa dbyar gyi tshe btu zhing blang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-28: 'bras bu de las rkang phyung nas //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-29: bskams te phye mar btags nas ni ;
T13TD4312.3E:284a-30: / til bzhin btsir bar bya ba'am //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-31: le brgan me tog bzhin du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-33: shing de'i 'bras bu las rkang phyung ste bskams la btags nas gtun la til bzhin du btsir bar bya ba 'am le brgan rtsi bzhin du bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:284a-35: de yi mar bsags gyur pa ni ;
T13TD4312.3E:284a-36: / chung zad pa yi bar du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-37: phab ste ba yi lci ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-38: nang du zla phyed tsam du gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:284a-39: de'i mar bsags par bya ba ni chung ngu'i bar du bskol bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-40: de'i 'og tu phab la ba'i lci ba'i nang du zla ba phyed kyi bar du gzhag par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:284a-41: de 'og de las phyung nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-0: @284b snum zhing dugs byas dri ma bsal //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-1: zas kyi dus ni bzhi chod par //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-2: nang par zho gnyis tsam zhig btung //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-3: mar de nyi ma shis pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-4: sngags 'di yis ni dag par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-5: rkang pa gnyis po brtson pa che //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-6: lus zungs thams cad skyong byed par //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-7: 'khor lo dbyig pa dung thogs la //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-8: mi 'pho bas ni khyod la bsgo //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-9: de gang 'di yi nad steng dang //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-10: 'og gi nad ni du ma sel //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-11: dgongs ka snum dang lan tshvar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-12: nas thug grang mo btung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-14: de la de'i 'og tu phyung la dang por snum dang dugs byas la dri ma'i tshogs bsal te zas kyi dus bzhi bzhis chod pa'i dus su nang par gyi dus su zho gnyis gnyis kyi tshad tsam btung la /
T13TD4312.3E:284b-15: btung ba de yang nyin zhag shis pa la /
T13TD4312.3E:284b-16: rkang pa gnyis po brtson pa che //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-17: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi tshigs bcad bzlas la btung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-18: mar de sbyar bas skyes bu de'i nad steng dang 'og tu gtogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-19: de ltar sman 'thungs nas dgongs ka'i snum dang lan tshvar bcas pa'i nas thug grang mo btung bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-20: mar de zhag lnga'i bar du btung //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-21: spang bar bya ba thams cad spang //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-22: zla phyed mud ga'i khu ba btung //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-23: mdze nad kun las thar bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-25: tshul de ltar mar de zhag lnga'i bar du btung bar bya zhing zas skom dang spyod lam la sogs pa spang bar bya ba gang yin pa spang bar bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:284b-26: zla ba phyed kyi bar du mon sran sde'u'i khu ba 'thungs na mdze'i nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-27: de nyid seng ldeng khu ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-28: sum 'gyur dang ni legs par bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-29: snga ma bzhin du zla phyed bzhag / legs par bsdams te zla gcig btung //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-30: de yis lus ni bsku ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-31: ji skad bshad pa'i zas zos pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-32: sbyor ba 'di yis myur du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-33: mdze can mi ni gso bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-35: mar de nyid seng ldeng gi khu ba sum 'gyur dang legs par bskol ba ji skad smos pa bzhin du bzhag ste /
T13TD4312.3E:284b-36: zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na yang ji skad smos pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:284b-37: khyad par du sbyor ba 'dis mdzes btab pa'i nad pa gso bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-38: de nyid seng ldeng med par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-39: zhun mar sbrang rtsi ldan par btung //
T13TD4312.3E:284b-40: zla phyed bar du sha khu btung //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-2: du ba ra'i mar de nyid seng ldeng gi khu ba med par zhun mar dang bskol te sbrang rtsi btab pas zla ba phyed kyi bar du bsten zhing sha khu 'thungs na de lo nyis brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-3: de nyid zhag ni lnga bcu'i bar //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-4: sna sman du ni btang gyur na ;
T13TD4312.3E:285a-5: / lus rgyas thos pa 'dzin pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-8: sman mar de nyid zhag lnga bcu'i bar du sna sman btang na lus rgyas pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-9: pi pi ling ni pa la sha'i //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-10: thal chur spangs shing mar dang brngos //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-11: rdog ma gsum gsum snga dro dang //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-12: zas kyi sngon du bza' bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-13: bcud len yon tan 'dod pa yis //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-14: sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyar te bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-16: pi pi ling gi rdog ma lnga 'am brgyad dam bdun nam bcu mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bcud kyis len 'dod pas cho ga bzhin du lo gcig gi bar du spyad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-17: pi pi ling de nyid pa la sha zhes bya ba rgya skyegs shing king shu ka'i thal ba btsags pa'i chur spangs la mar dang brngos pa rdog ma gsum ni snga dro /
T13TD4312.3E:285a-18: gsum ni zas zos pa'i sngon du sbrang rtsi dang bcas par bza' bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:285a-19: de ni bcud kyis len gyi yon tan du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-20: pi pi ling bcu nyin re bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-21: rim gyis bskyed par gyur pa dag //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-22: de bzhin 'o mar sbyar te bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-23: de bzhin du ni dbri bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-24: sman zhu nas ni drug cu pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-26: pi pi ling ni stong ni bar //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-28: stobs dang ldan la de btags sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-29: stobs dbri ba la bskol te blud //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-31: nyin re zhing pi pi ling bcu bcus rim gyis bskyed de zhag bcu'i bar du 'o ma dang lhan cig bza' bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:285a-32: de bzhin du zhag bcu'i bar du bcu bcus dbri zhing 'o ma dang bcas par bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-34: de nas zhag dang po la ni pi pi ling bcu 'o ma dang sbyar te gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:285a-35: de bzhin du gnyis pa la ni nyi shu /
T13TD4312.3E:285a-36: gsum pa la ni sum cu /
T13TD4312.3E:285a-37: de nas zhag bcu pa la brgya'i bar du bskyed cing 'o ma dang bcas par bza' la /
T13TD4312.3E:285a-38: de nas ni rim bzhin du dbri bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:285a-39: de nas zhag bcu gcig pa la dgu bcu /
T13TD4312.3E:285b-0: zhag bcu gnyis @285b pa la brgyad cu nas zhag bcu dgu pa la bcu'i bar bza' ste /
T13TD4312.3E:285b-1: de ltar na stong tshang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-2: sbyor ba 'di la sman zhu nas 'o ma dang zhun mar dang drug cu pa'i 'bras chan dang bcas par bza' ste /
T13TD4312.3E:285b-3: 'di ni pi pi ling stong gi bcud len zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-4: pi pi ling de mi nyams stobs chen po dang ldan pa la ni btags pa'i phye ma sbyin par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:285b-5: stobs bar ma dag la ni bskol te blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-6: de bzhin ra yi 'o ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-7: nyis stong gi ni bar du gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-9: de bzhin du ra'i 'o ma dang pi pi ling du bcas par bskyed dbri snga ma bzhin du byas te nyis stong gi bar du yang gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-10: pi pi ling gi sbyor ba 'dis //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-11: lud pa dbugs mi bde mgul nad //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-12: gcong chen gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-13: gcin snyi skya rbab mi bzad rims //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-14: 'or nad slon dang skyigs bu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-15: mdzer pa dreg nad 'joms par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-17: bshad ma thag pa'i pi pi ling gi sbyor ba 'dis ni lud pa dreg nad kyi bar du 'joms par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-18: pi pi ling ni srang phyed lde gur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-19: lcags kyi snod bskus nas ni nub gcig bzhag / de dang chu ni snyim gang nang par btung //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-20: lo gcig bza' btung spyod pa ci 'dod bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-22: pi pi ling srang phyed lde gur byas pas lcags kyi snod bskus te mtshan mo bzhag la de nang par chu snyim pa gang dang bcas par 'thungs nas /
T13TD4312.3E:285b-23: lo gcig gi bar du bsten zhing bza' btung ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-24: bca' sga sle tres shing mngar byi dang ga / ba la aa ti ba la 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-25: gla sgang thang shing yung ba aa ga ru //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-26: mu zi padma autpal kru trug tres //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-27: da ta aa shva karna aa sa na //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-28: ba la'i lo ma'am snying po de bzhin du //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-29: pi pi ling bzhin lcags snod bsku sogs bya //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-30: lo brgya 'tsho zhing rgas dang nad las thar //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-31: 'o ma snyim gang gi ni bcud len sman //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-32: sbyar ba 'di yis lcags snod bskus pas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-33: sngar bshad yon tan pas kyang lhag bskyed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-34: tshe yang de las nyis 'gyur skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:285b-36: bca' sga la sogs pa pi pi ling gi cho ga bzhin du bsten par byas pas kyang lo brgyar 'tsho ba la sogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:286a-1: la pi pi ling bskus pa'i sbyor bas yon tan che zhing tshe yang de'i nyis 'gyur gyis 'phel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-2: aa sa na dang seng ldeng gi / khu bar so ma ra dza spangs //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-3: sbrang rtsi ru rta mar dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-4: aa ru ra dang lcags phyer bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-5: lde gu lo gcig bar zos na //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-6: rgas dang mi 'phrod zos pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-7: nad ni yongs su 'dor bar byed //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-9: aa sa na dang seng ldeng bskol ba'i khu bar so ma ra dza sbangs pa sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa'i lde gu mi sa lo gcig gi bar du bsten na rgas pa dang kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa las nad du gyur pa yongs su 'dor bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-10: mdze nad mi bzad pa yis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-11: lus nyen gyur pa gang yin pas //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-12: so ma ra dza til nag gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-13: lo gcig bar du bsten na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-14: de ni zla rgyas lta bur 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-16: mdze nad mi bzad pas thebs par gyur pa gang yin pa des so ma ra dza dang til nag po gnyis lo gcig gi bar du bsten na de'i lus zla ba lta bur 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-17: gang zhig so ma ra dza sbun pa med //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-18: btags pa 'o ma lhan cig zhor mnan pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-19: snying po phyung la sbrang rtsi'i lde gu bldags //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-20: de rjes de nyid kyi ni dar ba btung //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-21: mdze yi nad kyis yan lag nyams pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-22: sna chad sor mo 'brul ba la sogs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-23: shing bcad rjes la ljon shing skye ba ltar //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-24: de ni nges par skye bar 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-26: mi gang zhig so mar dza sbun ba med pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas de'i snying bo mar sar phyung la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bldags par gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:286a-27: de'i rjes la dar ba de nyid 'thungs na mdze nad kyis sna chad cing sor mo 'brul ba la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang ldan par gyur pa yang sna dang sen mo la sogs pa mdzes par skye ste /
T13TD4312.3E:286a-28: dper na shing bcad pa las ljon shing skyes pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-29: sgra gcan bdud rtsi brkus pa na //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-30: ske bcad pa las 'dzag gyur pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-31: bdud rtsi'i thigs pa sar ltung ba //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-32: sgog skya nyid du gyur pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-33: lha min lus las byung bas na //
T13TD4312.3E:286a-34: de phyir bram zes de mi bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-0: sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bdud rtsi brkus bar gyur nas khyab 'jug gis ske bcad par gyur pa na bdud rtsi'i @286b thigs pa des la lhung ba na sgog skya nyid du gyur pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:286b-1: de bas na sgog skya de ni lha ma yin gyi lus las byung ba yin pa'i phyir bram ze dag mi za'o //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-2: mngon du bdud rtsi las byung bas //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-3: de ni bcud kyis len mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-5: sgog skya de ni bdud rtsi las mngon sum du byung ba yin pa'i phyir bcud kyis len thams cad kyi yang mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-6: grang ba'i dus na'ang sgog skya bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-7: dpyid dus bad kan shas cher bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-8: sos ka'i dus su'ang spyad bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-9: dbyar ni rlung gis gzir tshe bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-10: dgun ni snum zhing bsil ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-11: mngar bas nye bar bsres pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-12: de ni phreng ba rgyan dag dang //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-13: 'khor dang lhan cig bsten par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-15: mi lus snum zhing bsil ba dang mngar bar bsres la grang ba'i dus dgun stod dang /
T13TD4312.3E:286b-16: dgun sman na ni sgog skya bsten par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:286b-17: de bzhin du dpyid kyi tshe la sogs pa'i tshe na yang phreng ba la sogs pa'i longs spyod thams cad du bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-18: de yi lde gu dpyid kyi tshe //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-19: kha ba can gyi yul skyes pa //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-20: shun pa bshus nas mtshan mo ni //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-21: chang sogs la ni sbang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-22: de yi khu ba nang par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-23: ras ni gtsang mas btsags nas kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-24: chang ni legs par langs gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-25: cha gsum dang ni sbyar ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-26: chang gzhan dag gam til mar ram //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-27: rang skyur ram ni zho ga chu //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-28: de tshe nyid sbyar nang par ni //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-29: tshad dang ldan par sbyin bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-30: 'o ma zhun mar zhag dang rkang //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-31: skam sa'i sha khu so sor ni //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-32: bskol ba nad gzhi ji bzhin blud //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-33: yang na sman khu 'ba' zhig blud //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-34: dang por mkhur gang tsam 'thungs na //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-35: mid pa'i sbubs ni dag par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:286b-37: sgog skya de'i lde gu dpyid kyi tshe ni ji skad smos pa bzhin du btsags pa'i khu ba chang cha gsum mam /
T13TD4312.3E:286b-39: til mar la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i cha gsum dang btung ba de nyi tshe sbyar la /
T13TD4312.3E:286b-40: tshad dang ldan par byas te /
T13TD4312.3E:286b-41: 'o ma la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:286b-42: nad gzhi ji lta ba la blud par bya ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:286b-43: yang sgog skya'i khu ba 'ba' zhig blud pa la sogs pas kyang mid pa'i sbubs dag bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-2: na zhing zug pa dag la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-4: sgog skya rang gi khu ba rgyun du blugs pa'i dugs byas na na zhing zug pa la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-5: skyug cing brgyal ba'i nad la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-6: 'phral du chu grang dag kyang blud //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-8: skyug pa la sogs pa la ni 'phral du chu grang la sogs pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-9: ngal ba med cing lus kyi ni //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-10: gzi mdangs brtan pas lhag ma sbyin //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-12: ngal ba la sogs pa la ni sgog skya btsir ba'i lhag ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-13: tsha ba bsal bar bya ba'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-14: shin tu bsil bas bsku bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-15: mu tig ga bur phreng ba can //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-16: chu thigs phre'u bsten par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-18: lus tsha ba bsal ba'i phyir ni sgog skya'i khu ba bsil sman la sogs pa'i chu dang bcas pa blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-19: 'di yi tshad chen phul gang ste //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-20: nyi tshe la ni de yi phyed //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-22: sgog skya 'di'i khu ba'i tshad chen po ni phul gang ste /
T13TD4312.3E:287a-24: sman gyi sbyor ba gzhan med pa ni srang bzhi ste bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-25: sgog skya srang gcig btags pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-26: zas dang bcas pa'ang bsten par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-28: sgog skya btags pa srang gcig zas dang bcas pa bsten par bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:287a-29: 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni zas med par yang bsten pa'i don to //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-30: zhu nas s'a lu rnying pa'i chan //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-31: dung dang kun da ltar dkar ba //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-32: yu sha 'o ma skam sa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-33: sha khu dang ni lhan cig bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-35: sman de zhu nas 'bras s'a lu rnying pa'i chan la sogs pa bza' bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-36: skom par gyur na chang dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-37: chur sbyar ba ni blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-38: chang mi btung na rang skyur ram //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-39: rgun 'bru'i chu ni blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-41: gal te gnas skabs der skom par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:287a-42: chang chur sbyar ba btung bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:287a-43: chang spangs pa yin na ni rgun 'bru'i chu 'am rang skyur blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-44: de yi lde gu mar dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-45: mar ni snod du gzar bus dkrug / zhag bcu gzhag gam de bzhin du //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-46: zhag dang mnyam sbyar spyad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:287a-48: sgog skya de'i lde gu mar dang bcas pa ji skad smos pa'i sbyor bas spyad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-0: sgog skya shun pa bshus @287b pa'i snying po ni //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-1: sreg sha dag gam bza' ba sna tshogs sam //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-2: sha gtubs pa'am mar dang tshar bcas bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-3: kha zas nyung ba ci 'dod spyad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-5: yang sgog skya shun pa bshus pa de sreg sha la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig bza' zhing 'dod par longs spyad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-6: khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad ni ma gtogs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-7: nad gzhi ma lus ldan par 'gyur ba 'am //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-8: rlung nad nyi tshe dang ni ldan gyur la //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-9: sgog pa las lhag sman gzhan yod ma yin //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-11: khrag dang mkhris pa med pa'i rlung nad dam //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-12: yang na rlung nad 'ba' zhig la ni sman gyi mchog sgog skya 'ba' zhig yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-13: chu dang bu ram 'o ma sred //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-14: sha chang skyur la mi dga' zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-15: ma zhu ba ni spong mi nus //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-16: sgog skya nges par gnod pa skyed //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-18: mi chu dang bu ram la sred par gyur cing sha dang chang dang skyur la ni sred pa med par gyur pa dag ma zhu ba'i nad sel zhing spong bar mi nus pa dag la ni sgog skya nges par gnod pa skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-19: mkhris pa ldang ba'i 'jigs pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-20: tha mar bkru sman 'jam po gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-21: de ltar bcud len yon tan ni //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-22: yongs su rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-24: sgog skya bsten pa dag gis mkhris pa'i nad ldang bar dogs na /
T13TD4312.3E:287b-25: sman btang ba'i tha mar bkru sman gtang bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:287b-26: des ni bcud kyis len gyi yon tan rdzogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-27: so ga'i tsha bas gdungs drags las //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-28: rgya skyegs khu ba ltar 'dzag gang //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-29: gser sogs 'byung khungs drug gi bcud //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-30: de ni brag zhun zhes byar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-32: so ga'i dus su brag nyi ma tsha bas gdungs pa las gser la sogs pa 'byung khungs kyi khams drug gi bcud rgya skyegs kyi khu ba zhu ba ltar 'dzag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ming brag zhun zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-33: de ni kun kyang kha zhing tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-34: shas cher me drod zhu rjes tsha //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-35: gcod par byed de de la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-36: lcags las byung ba rab tu bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:287b-38: brag zhun de thams cad kyang ro ni kha la nus pa ni shin tu dro ba ma yin la zhu rjes ni tsha ba dang gcod par byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:288a-1: khams las byung ba ni shin tu yang bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-2: ba gcin dri bro gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-3: gu gul 'dra zhing gseg ma med //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-4: sbyin bag snum zhing skyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-5: bska zhing 'jam la lci ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-6: brag zhun de ni mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-8: brag zhun gang dri ni ba gcin dang 'dra la /
T13TD4312.3E:288a-9: kha dog ni gnag pa mtshan nyid gu gul 'dra zhing rdo phye'i gseg ma med pa mnyes na spyin bag tu 'dug cing snum pa ro skyur zhing bska ba rang bzhin 'jam zhing lci bas de ni brag zhun kyi dam pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-10: nad dang nad pa rjes mthun par //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-11: sman dang brag zhun cha mnyam byas //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-12: lcags kyi snod du sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-14: brag zhun de nad pa dang nad pa'i goms pa'i tshul gang dag yin pa shes par byas la lcags kyi snod du sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-15: dang por chu ni nyi tshes bkru //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-16: de 'og bskams la bskol dang bsre //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-18: brag zhun de dang por ni chu 'ba' zhig gis bkrus la /
T13TD4312.3E:288a-19: de'i 'og tu bskams te bskol ba dang bsre bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-20: brag zhun sman dang mnyam byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-21: brgyad cha'i nang du bskol bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-23: bsres pa'i brag zhun gyi 'phrod kyi sman dang brag zhun cha mnyam par byas la chu de'i brgyad 'gyur gyi nang du bskol bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-24: de la gal te brag zhun srang gcig dang sbyar na de'i 'phrod kyi sman yang srang gcig la sbyar la de chu brgyad 'gyur dang bskol bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-25: khu ba brgyad cha lus btsags pa //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-26: dro 'jam nang du brag zhun gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:288a-27: khu ba bskol ba de brgyad cha lus pa dang btsags pa dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du brag zhun gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-28: de dang 'dres gyur bskams nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-29: sman chu'i nang du slar yang gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:288a-30: brag zhun 'dres par gyur te de bskams nas slar yang gzhug par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-31: de ltar rang rang sman 'phrod ni //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-32: bskol ba'i khu bar lan bdun spangs //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-34: tshul de ltar rang gi sman 'phrod pa'i khu ba dang lan bdun gyi bar du spangs shing bsre bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-35: de nas tig ta'i sman mar gyis //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-36: snum chos byas nas sbyar byas te //
T13TD4312.3E:288a-37: 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-0: @288b shing mngar pa to la'i khu ba //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-1: brag zhun dag ni re re yang //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-2: zhag gsum bar du blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-4: de nas de ltar snum chos byas pa'i mi de la tig ta'i sman mar zhag gsum gyi bar du sbyin par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-5: de bzhin du brag zhun dang /
T13TD4312.3E:288b-6: 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:288b-7: shing mngar gyi khu ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:288b-8: pa to la'i khu ba zhag gsum gyi bar du blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-9: de nas de la sbyor ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-10: dus dang sbyar te blud par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-12: de nas mi de la 'tshams shing 'os pa'i sbyor ba dus dang sbyar te sman bas blud par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-13: de ltar brag zhun mi rnams la ;
T13TD4312.3E:288b-14: shin tu phan par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-15: yon tan ma lus skyed byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-16: 'phral du gnod par mi byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-18: tshul de ltar brag zhun bsten zhing goms par byed pa dag ni shin tu phan par byed pa yin la /
