T13TD4312.3E:288b-19: de bzhin du bcud kyis len gyi yon tan ma lus pa yang skyed par byed la /
T13TD4312.3E:288b-20: 'phral du de'i mod la gnod pa yang skyed par mi byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-21: zhag bdun phrag gcig phrag gsum dang //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-22: phrag bdun zho gnyis srang phyed gcig / dman dang bar ma chen po yi //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-23: brag zhun go rims bzhin du sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-25: brag zhun zhag bdun phrag gcig dang /
T13TD4312.3E:288b-26: tshad zho gnyis ni dman pa'i tshad yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-27: zhag bdun phrag bdun dang srang gcig ni phyed tshad yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-28: lus ni shin tu sbyangs byas la //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-29: brag zhun sbyangs pa gtang bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-30: zangs dang lcags dang dngul dang gser //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-31: kun dang yang na re rer sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-32: 'o ma dang ni lhan cig gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-35: brag zhun ni lus shin tu sbyangs par gyur pa la brag zhun legs par sbyangs shing btul ba gtang bar bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:288b-36: de bzhin du zangs la sogs pa sna re 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:288b-37: kun dang yang sbyar bar bya zhing 'o ma dang lhan cig btang na bcud kyis len gyi 'bras bu gang dag yin pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-38: rgya sran mon sne'u dme ru dang //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-39: phug ron sha ni rtag tu spang //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-41: brag zhun gyi sbyor ba bsten pa'i dus su rgya sran la sogs pa rtag tu spang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:288b-42: gang zhig brag zhun gyis ni mngon sum du //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-0: @289a * // ma bsal nad ni sa steng yod ma yin //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-1: dus su cho ga bzhin du bsten gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-2: nad med nyams stobs rgya chen skyed par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-4: mi yul sa steng 'di na brag zhun gyi sman gyis mngon du ma bcom pa'i nad ni yod pa ma yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:289a-5: de bzhin du de'i cho ga bzhin du bsten na nad med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan skyed par byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-6: khang par gnas pa'i khom ldan can //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-7: phun sum tshogs dang ldan la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-8: de las gzhan du de rnams la //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-9: nyi ma rlung gi tshe na bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-11: khang par gnas pa la sogs pa khom ldan yod cing 'khor dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa la ni phan par gyur pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:289a-13: khang par gnas pa la sogs pa'i khom ldan med pa la ni nyi ma dang rlung la gnas pa'i tshul gyis bsten na phan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-14: rlung dang nyi tshan bcas sbyor ba //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-15: bde ba'i longs spyod med na yang //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-16: gang zhig lus la mi gnod pa //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-17: mchog tu de ni bshad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-19: da ni rlung dang nyi tshan dang bcas par yang bsten du rung ba'i sbyor ba bde ba'i longs spyod las nyams su zin kyang lus la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i spyor ba'i mchog de bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-20: chu grang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-21: mar ni re re gnyis gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-22: gsum mam yang na thams cad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-23: zas sngar 'thungs na rgas sra byed //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-25: chu grang la sogs pa re re 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:289a-28: bzhi char kun zas kyi sngar 'thungs na yang rgas sra bar byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-29: bu ram sbrang rtsi bca' sga dang //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-30: pi pi ling ngam rgyam tsha dang //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-31: aa ru ra ni gnyis gnyis dag / rtag zos bdo zhing lo brgyar 'tsho //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-33: bu ram la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:289a-34: aa ru ra gnyis gnyis rtag tu zos na yang mi de lo brgya'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-35: aa ru ra ni mar nang bsros //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-36: bza' zhing mar de 'thungs na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-37: rgas sra lus ni yun ring gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:289a-39: ji ltar dam pa byas gzo ba //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-0: lan cig phan gdags ji lta @289b bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-2: aa ru ra mar gyi nang du bsros te bza' ba dang bsros pa'i mar de 'thungs par gyur na lus rgas sra ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-3: ji ltar byas ba gzo ba'i mi la phan btags na de'i mi brjed par sems la 'jog pa dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-4: skyu ru ra'i khu sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-5: kha ra mar dang lde gur byas //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-6: bsten zhing 'phrod pa za ba'i mi //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-8: nyes bsrung bstan bcos rgya chen mtshungs //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-10: skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang kha ra lde gur byas pa zos shing kha zas 'phrod pa la bsten pa'i mi rgas pa'i gnod pa gang yin pa de 'jig par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:289b-11: ji ltar bstan bcos rgya chen po legs par bzung nas brjed du mi rung bar 'gyur ba dang mtshungs so //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-12: skyu ru ra dang byi dang ga / aa sa na yi snying po phye //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-13: lcags phye til mar sbrang rtsi yi //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-14: mar bcas lde gu bsten na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-15: na tshod mdzes pa ma nyams 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-17: skyu ru ra la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin bsten na yang na tshod mdzes pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-18: lcags phye byi dang ga yi bye ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-19: mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa lo gcig tsam //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-20: aa sa na yi za ma tog nang gzhug /
T13TD4312.3E:289b-21: bsten na stobs ldan tshe ring skra gnag 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-23: lcags nag po'i phye ma la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du bsten na yang tshe ring zhing skra gnag par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-24: byi dang ga dang go bye bca' sga rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-25: mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa gang gis zos //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-26: rgas pa'i chu bo nad kyi rba rlabs can //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-27: na tshod ldan pa'i skyes bu de rgal 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-29: mi gang byi dang ga la sogs pa'i lde gu zos pa de ni na tshod dar la bab pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:289b-30: rgas pa'i chu bo'i rba rlabs las nges par rgal bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-31: seng ldeng aa sa na yi khu ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-32: 'bras bu gsum dang sbrang rtsi mar sbyar ba //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-33: cho ga bzhin du bsten pa'i mi rnams ni //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-34: tshe ring 'gyur ba 'di las ngo mtshar med //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-36: seng ldeng la sogs pa'i lde gu bsten na yang nges par tshe ring bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:289b-37: dzi ba ka yi khu ba sor mor chags //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-1: sbrang rtsi mar dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-2: skyes bu dam pas bsten par gyur na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-3: rgas dang nad ni nges par bzlog par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-5: dzi ba ka zhes bya ba aa sa na'i khu ba la sogs pa'i lde gu bsten na yang rgas pa la sogs pa'i 'tshe ba med par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-6: ba spru ba ni sar pa srang phyed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-7: 'o mar btags pa zla phyed zla ba gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-8: zla drug lo gcig bar du 'thungs na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-9: rgas shing rnying pa'ang slar ni gzhon par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-10: zhes bya ba la ba spru ba zhes bya ba purna ba srang phyed btags pa zla ba phyad dam gnyis sam drug gam lo gcig gi bar du 'o ma dang sbyar te 'thungs na rgas shing 'khogs pa de slar gzhon pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-11: mur ba aang shu ma ti bri ha ti //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-12: ba la pu shel tse dang pa ta dang //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-13: aa sa na dang thal tres aa ka ru //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-14: pri yang ku dang tsandan re re yi //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-15: cho ga'ang ba spru ba dang mtshungs pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-17: mur ba la sogs pa sman sna re re zhing yang ba sbru ba'i cho ga bzhin bsten na yon tan de dang mtshungs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-18: nye'u shing lde gu khu bar bskol ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-19: zhun mar kha rar bcas pa za byed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-20: de ni 'tsho ba'i lam du zhugs gyur tshe //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-21: nad kyi rkun pos choms par mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-23: nye'u shing gi lde gu dang khu ba bskol ba'i sman mar gyi nang du kha ra btab ste zos na mi 'tsho ba'i lam du zhugs par gyur pa'i tshe srog 'phrog par byed pa'i nad kyi rkun pos choms par mi 'gyur ro /
T13TD4312.3E:290a-25: aa shva gandha 'o mar bcas pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-26: mar ram til mar chu dron sbyar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-27: zla phyed bsten na nyam chung lus rgyas shing //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-28: ji ltar lo tog gzhon la char bab mtshungs //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-33: chu dron dang sbyar te 'thungs na ni lus shin tu nyam chung ba yang rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-34: ji ltar lo tog shin tu gzhon pa la char bab pa dang mtshungs so //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-35: nyin re til nag srang ni re re dag / zos pa'i rjes la chu grang 'thungs gyur na //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-36: lus ni shas cher rgyas pa nyid 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:290a-37: 'chi ba'i bar du so ni brtan par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-0: til nag po nyin re srang re zos la @290b de'i 'og tu chu grang 'thungs par gyur na mi'i lus shas cher rgyas par 'gyur zhing rtag tu so brtan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-1: gze ma sle tres skyu ru ra'i phye ma //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-2: mar dang sbrang rtsi cha mnyam lde gu zos //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-3: ro tsa lus brtan nad kyi sdug bsngal zhi //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-4: lo brgyar 'tsho zhing skra ni nag por 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-6: gze ma la sogs pa'i lde gu zos na yang ro tsa ba la sogs pa'i yon tan skyed do //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-7: til nag aa ru ra dang skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-8: ba ru ra dang bcas pa brdungs nas bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-9: mi de rma bya lta bur mdangs ldan zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-10: yid du 'ong ba'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-11: brag zhun mar dang sbrang rtsi byi dang ga / aa ru ra dang lcags phye dngul chu dang //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-12: ta bya bsten na lus zungs rdzogs 'gyur te //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-13: yar do zla phyed rdzogs pa'i zla ba 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-15: skyes bu gang til dang lhan cig tu skyu ru ra la sogs pa brdungs pa bcas te zos na yang mi de ji skad smos pa'i mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur la ;
T13TD4312.3E:290b-16: de bzhin du brag zhun la sogs pa zos na yang lus zungs zla ba yar gyi ngo ltar rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-17: gang zhig bring ga ra dza'i khu ba zla ba gcig / nyin re rgyun du bsten par byed pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-18: 'o ma 'thungs ste stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-19: lo brgyar 'tsho ba dag kyang thob par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-21: skyes bu gang bring gar dza bskol ba'i khu ba nyin re zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thung bar byed pa dang 'o ma 'thungs pa de ni stobs la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-22: shu dag kyang ni zla ba gcig bsten zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-23: 'o ma'am mar ram til mar bcas pa bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-24: gdon gyis mi tshugs pa yi lus 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-25: yid gzhungs tshig ni shin tu gsal bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-27: mi gang zla ba gcig gi bar du shu dag 'o ma 'am mar dang til mar dang bcas par bsten na gdon gyis mi tshugs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-28: man du ka parni ni mar dang brdos //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-29: zla gcig bar du zas ma zos par bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-30: gzugs ni rgya cher 'tsho zhing spobs pa che //
T13TD4312.3E:290b-31: gzhon zhing mdangs ldan yon tan ldan par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-0: man du ka parni zhes bya ba sman mar dang brdos pa zla ba gcig gi bar du zos na yang yun ring @291a * //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-1: du 'tsho zhing spobs pa che ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-2: 'bras bu gsum dang tsang gi ri dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-3: lcags phye srang ni lnga bcu las byas shing //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-4: ko sha da ki'i khu ba'i nang du btags //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-5: ri lu sum brgya byas nas ri lu de //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-6: grib mar bskams te rim gyis ma lus par //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-7: bkru sman bya zhing thug sla'i rim pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-8: thug ska gar po sha khu 'bras chen dang //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-9: mar la bsten zhing zla gcig lus bsdams la //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-10: zla gcig 'das nas rang dga' nyid du spyad //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-11: 'bad pas dus kun du ni ma zhu spang //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-12: lo gcig bar du sbyor ba 'di bsten na //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-13: gang zhig gso dka'i nad kyis nyen pa yang //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-14: shin tu stobs che skyes bu'i bya ba rdzogs //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-15: lus rgyas 'jam zhing mig dang rna ba gsal //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-16: gzhon pa nyid dang lo ni lnga brgyar 'tsho //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-20: lcags kyi phye ma tshad srang lnga bcu ko sha ta ka'i khu ba'i nang du btags pa las ril bur sbyar te grib mar bskams nas de ma lus par zos la /
T13TD4312.3E:291a-21: bkru sman dang thug pa'i rim pa lnga la sogs pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig 'das par byas nas de'i 'og tu spyod pa bsdams pa med pas gnas par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:291a-22: 'dir ni rnam pa thams cad du ma zhu ba'i bag spang par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-23: tshul de ltar sbyor ba 'dis lo gcig gi bar du bsten na gso dka' ba'i nad kyang sel ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-24: seng ldeng shir sha ba dang aa sa na //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-25: rma bya aa ru ra dang skyu ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-26: go bye byi dang ga btags chu 'gyur ni //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-27: bco brgyad nang bskol lcags kyi dum bu bcug / lcags kyi snod du zhag gsum nyi ma yi //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-28: 'od kyis bsros la de rjes me la ni //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-29: lcags kyi phye ma zhib par byas te bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-30: de btsags khu ba cha gcig 'o ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-31: cha gcig de bzhin gso ma'i khu ba gcig /
T13TD4312.3E:291a-32: nye'u shing bskol ba'i khu ba cha gsum dang //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-33: 'dir ni mar sar cha ni bzhi dang sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-34: 'di dag gcig tu lcags nag snod du bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-35: kha ra rdul med de bzhin sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-36: de bzhin mar dang bsres par gyur pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:291a-37: 'phrod pa'i zas dang skom dang spyod lam bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-0: srang re @291b rtag tu bsten par gyur na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-1: dpal dang ldan zhing nyes pa bsal ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-2: nags kyi ma he lta bu'i stobs ldan zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-3: rta ltar mgyogs la lus ni brtan pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-4: skra ni bung ba'i mdog ltar gnag pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-5: kha ni dri zhim bud med mang bsten nus //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-6: tshig gsal yid gzhungs phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-7: zla gcig bsten na me drod che ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-8: de ni mi yi seng ge'am me'am ni //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-9: btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra'i lus 'dzin gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-10: mi yi seng ge'i sbyor ba 'di //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-11: zos na nad kyis mi nyen te //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-15: seng ldeng la sogs pa cha mnyam par byas te btags la /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-16: sman gyi bco brgyad 'gyur nang du bskol la lcags kyi dum bu bcug ste /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-17: lcags kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag la nyi ma gsum du nyi ma'i 'od kyis bsros la /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-18: de'i rjes la me chung du la de bzhi cha lus kyi bar du bskol la /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-19: de btsags nas cha gcig tu byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-20: 'o ma'i cha yang de dang mnyam pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-21: de bzhin du gso ma'i khu ba'i cha dang mnyam pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-22: de bzhin du nye'u shing gi khu ba cha gsum dang /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-23: mar sar bzhi cha ste de thams cad gcig tu bsdus la lcags kyi snod chen po'i nang du sman mar de bskol bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-24: der yang kha ra dkar po nag nog med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-25: sbrang rtsi la sogs pa bcug la de las srang re bsten na dpal dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-26: sbyor ba de zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten na me drod che ba la sogs pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-27: 'di ni mi'i seng ge zhes bya ba khyab 'jug gis bshad pa'i sbyor ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-28: 'di zos na nad kyi tshogs kyis nyen par mi 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:291b-29: ji ltar khyab 'jug 'khor lo 'bar ba lag na thogs pas lha ma yin gyi tshogs 'jigs shing 'byer bar byed pa dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-30: bring gar dza myu gu'i cho ga 'dis //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-31: brngos shing mar bcas zos la bsdams dang bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-32: lto sbyangs pa la aa sa na'i khu ba //
T13TD4312.3E:291b-33: 'o ma 'thung zhing zas kyi bya ba byed //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-2: bde zhing lo ni nyis brgya'i bar du 'tsho //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-3: lan cig smras pa'i tshig kyang zin gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-4: dran dang dbang po nyams pa med par 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-6: bring gar dza'i myu gu mar dang brngos pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten na bde zhing lo nyis brgya'i bar du 'tsho ba la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-7: gang zhig sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-8: til mar bsten par byed pa dag / de yis yon tan de thob cing //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-9: lus ni nag po nyid du 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-11: sngar bshad pa'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis mar ji ltar bskol ba de bzhin du til mar bskol la bsten par byed pa de yang yon tan sngar ji skad smos pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-12: 'on kyang khyad par ni til mar gyi sbyor bas lus nag po nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-13: bcud kyis len ni dus dang rjes mthun zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-14: bsten nus 'bras bur bcas pa bshad pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-15: gzhan dag phan yon bcas pa yod mod kyi //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-16: rnyed par dka' bas bdag gis ma bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-18: bcud kyis len da ltar gyi dus dang rjes su mthun zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:292a-19: bsten cing spyad par nus pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa gang dag yin pa de bdag gis bshad pa yin gyi /
T13TD4312.3E:292a-20: bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba gzhan dag phan yon dang bcas pa mang po drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa yod mod kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:292a-21: de ni rnyed pa dang bsgrub par dka' ba yin pas bdag gis 'dir ma bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-22: bcud kyis len gyi cho ga las //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-23: nyams pas gal te nad skye na //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-24: bcud kyis len de spangs nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-25: de yi sman ni ji bzhin bya //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-27: bcud kyis len gyi cho ga bstan pa las legs par ma spyad pa nyams par gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:292a-28: gal te nad skyes na bcud kyis len gyi cho ga de spangs shing dor la nad ni de'i sman ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-29: bden par smra zhing khro ba med //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-30: dbang po bsdams shing bdag nyid thul //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-31: zhi zhing dam pa'i spyod la dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-32: rtag tu bcud len yin zhes bya //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-34: mi rtag par bden par smra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:292a-35: de bzhin du khro ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:292b-0: dbang po bsdams @292b shing yul la mi g-yeng bar bdag nyid thul ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:292b-2: dam pa'i spyod lam la dga' ba rnams ni rtag tu bcud gyis len yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-3: yon tan 'di dag ldan gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-4: gang zhig bcud len bsten gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-5: de ni dga' zhing tshe ring la //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-8: bden par smra ba la sogs pa'i yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pas /
T13TD4312.3E:292b-9: mi gang zhig bcud kyis len bsten zhing spyod par byed pa de dag ni bde zhing dga' ba dang tshe ring ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:292b-10: 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten gzhan dag tu bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-11: spyod pa bstan bcos rjes 'jug cing //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-12: gam na gnas pa'i sems dang mthun //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-13: don la blo ni mi 'khrugs la //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-14: bcud kyis len ni rdzogs pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-16: mi gang gi spyod pa bsten bcos las ji skad ston pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:292b-17: gang na nye 'khor du gnas pa'i grogs kyi sems dang rjes su mthun par 'jug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:292b-18: de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i don la blo ma 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bcud kyis len yongs su rdzogs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-19: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13TD4312.3E:292b-20: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:292b-22: // / de nas ro tsa bar bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-23: skyes bus rtag tu yul bsten pas //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-24: ro tsa bar ni 'dod bya ste //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-25: dga' dang brta dang bu rgyud ni //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-26: yon tan ldan pas de la gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-28: skyes bu rtag tu yul bsten par byed pas ro tsa bar bya ba'i sman 'dod par bya zhing de bstan par bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:292b-29: gang gi phyir ro tsa bar bya ba'i cho ga de la ni dga' ba dang lus rgyas shing brta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:292b-30: yon tan dang ldan pa'i bu rgyud 'phel bar bya ba dag de la gnas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-31: bu tsha'i rgyud ni skyed byed cing //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-32: 'phral du yang dag dga' byed gang //
T13TD4312.3E:292b-33: gang gis rta ltar rab stobs ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-2: bud med la rab chags 'gyur ba //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-4: de ni ro tsa byed pa ste //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-5: lus kyi stobs kyang skyed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-6: bcud kyis len gang bu tsha'i rgyud ni skyed cing mi rabs gnas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-7: gang 'phral du yang dga' zhing bde bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-8: dngos po gang zhig bsten pas bud med la 'jug par byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan te /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-9: ji ltar rta 'dod pa spyod pa la nus pa dang ldan pa lta bur 'gyur zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-10: gang zhig la gnas na bud med la rab tu chags par 'gyur ba de 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la ni ro tsa bar byed pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-11: de ni lus kyi stobs dang gzi brjid skyed par byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-12: chos dang grags dang tshe ring dang //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-14: gcig tu skyon ni med pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-15: tshangs par spyod la bdag yi rang //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-17: gang zhig tshangs bar spyod pa gcig tu skyon med pa la gnas pa ni chos dang grags par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-18: tshe ring bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-19: 'jig rten 'di dang phyi mar bcud kyis len du gyur pa'i tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa la bdag shin tu yi rang ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-20: snying stobs chung ba nyon mongs pas //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-21: gnod par gyur pa'i nad bu can //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-22: lus mi zad pa bsrung ba'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-23: ro tsa'i cho ga brjod pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-25: sems can snying stobs chung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-26: nyon mongs pa shas che bar gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-27: nad bu can gyi 'dod pa spyad pas lus zad par 'gyur ba bsrung ba'i phyir ro tsa ba'i cho ga bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-28: nad med lang tsho ldan pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-29: ro tsa ba ni bsten byed pa //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-30: dus tshigs kun la nyin re zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-31: nyal por bya ba dgag pa med //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-33: skyes bu nad med pa dang lang tsho dang ldan pa dag ro tsa ba'i cho ga la bsten par byed pa la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:293a-34: dus tshigs drug po kun la yang nyin re zhing nyal po bya zhing 'khrig pa spyod pa la dgag pa med do //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-35: de nas snum 'gyur sbyang byas pa //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-36: ni ru ha dang 'jam rtsir bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:293a-37: mar dang til mar sbrang rtsi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-0: sha khu 'o ma kha rar @293b bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-1: 'o ma sha dang sha khu bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-2: sbyor ba shes pas dang por gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-3: de nas ro tsa byed sbyor ba //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-4: khu ba bu tsha 'phel byed bya //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-6: de nas de'i 'og tu mi snum gyi cho ga byas shing skyug sman la sogs pa'i sbyang ba byas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:293b-7: ni ru ha la sogs pa sbyor ba shes pa'i sman pas dang po gtang bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-8: de'i 'og tu ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba ji skad bshad pa dang khu ba dang bu tsha 'phel bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dag bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-9: me tog dri ma nam grib ma med //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-10: 'bras bu med par gyur pa'i shing //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-11: yal ga gcig pa'i shing gcig bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-12: bud med med mi de dang 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-14: ji ltar shing me tog dri mnam pa yod cing grib ma dang 'bras bu med pa'i shing gcig pu yod cing yal ga gcig yod kyi mang po med pa ji lta ba bzhin du bud med med pa'i mi yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-16: rdul gyis yogs pa ltar snang zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-17: bzhin ras snabs kyis gos pa yang //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-18: snying ni dga' bar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-19: reg pa dang ni mthong sogs la //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-20: bu mnyam bde ba yod min na //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-21: gang zhig chos dang grags par ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-22: nga rgyal rigs 'phel smos ci dgos //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-24: bu gang shin tu ngan cing gom 'gros 'khyor ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:293b-25: tshig mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can dag kyang snying dga' bar byed pa yin zhing de dang reg pa dang mthong ba la sogs pa de dang mnyam pa'i bde ba yod pa ma yin na /
T13TD4312.3E:293b-26: bu gang zhig chos dang grags pa la sogs pa 'phel bar byed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T13TD4312.3E:293b-27: de la mnyam pa'i dpe gang zhig gzhal bar bya ste dpe med pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-28: lus sbyang byas te ci nus par //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-29: ro tsa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-31: mi'i lus skyug sman la sogs pas sbyang ba byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:293b-32: de'i 'og tu nus pa dang lcogs pa ci yod pas ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-34: pu shel tse dang bi da ri //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-35: kanda ka ri'i rtsa ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-36: ba la 'tsho byed zangs rtsi ba //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-37: ram nye ba gnyis med gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:293b-38: nye'u shing parna rnam gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-0: @294a * // aa shra gandha kha sral phre'u //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-1: aa ti ba la ba spru ba //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-2: bi da ri ti pa ya sye //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-3: ra sna gze ma dz'i ban ti //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-4: shing mngar sa la parni rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-5: re re'ang srang ni gsum gsum cha //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-6: mon sran gre'u bre bzhi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-7: chu bre sum cu gnyis nang bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-8: khu ba bre bzhi lus pa ru //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-9: mar bre bzhi dang bi da ri //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-10: skyu ru ra dang bu ram shing //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-11: bre ni bzhi bzhi gzhug par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-13: bi ra kha sral ra mnye gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-14: shing mngar phal gu pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-16: ma du ka dang nye'u shing pa //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-17: 'di dag btags te bcug nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-18: de bskol btsags pa'i nang du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-19: kha ra dkar po smig rkang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-20: sman ni bre re gzhug pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-21: pi pi ling ni srang bzhi dang //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-22: na le sha ma ni srang gcig dang //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-23: shing tsha sug smel ge sar rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-24: re re srang ni phyed phyed phye //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-25: sbrang rtsi srang ni bcu drug sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-26: de las nyin re srang re bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-28: des ni rta ltar spyod 'gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-29: mchil pa lta bur 'dod pa spyod //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-31: 'dam bu nas kanda ka ri'i bar gyi rtsa ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:294a-32: de bzhin du ba la la sogs pa'i sman sna re zhing srang gsum gsum byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:294a-33: mon sran gre'u la sogs pa'i nang du bskol te /
T13TD4312.3E:294a-34: de'i khu ba bzhi cha lus par mar la sogs pa'i khu ba bzhi po bre bzhi bzhi bcug la 'o ma bre bcu drug bcug ste /
T13TD4312.3E:294a-35: bi ra nas nye'u shing gi bar du bskol ba'i cho ga bzhin du lde gur byas pa bcug nas mar de bskol la btsags pa'i nang du kha ra dang cu gang bre re bcug la /
T13TD4312.3E:294a-36: de bzhin du pi pi ling la sogs pa yang ji skad smos pa bzhin du bcug ste sbyar la /
T13TD4312.3E:294a-37: de nas nyin re srang re zos shing 'o ma dang sha khu 'thungs na ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba des rgod ma'i nang gi rta lta bu 'am /
T13TD4312.3E:294a-38: bye'u mchil pa dang 'dra bar 'dod pa spyod nus so //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-39: bi da ri dang pi pi ling //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-40: sha li 'bras rtsa pi ya li //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-41: kha sral phye ma phul re dang //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-42: de bzhin sbrang rtsi srad brgyad dang //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-43: kha ra'i phye ma srang lnga bcu /
T13TD4312.3E:294a-44: mar sar srang ni bcu drug sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:294a-45: de las zho ni gnyis gnyis bza' //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-0: bud med @294b brgya la spyod par nus //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-2: bi da ri la sogs pa'i phye ma phul re dang /
T13TD4312.3E:294b-3: sbrang rtsi la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du sbyar ba'i ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba 'di bsten na bud med brgya la yang 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-5: ma sha 'o mar bskol te bsgrangs //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-6: mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa dag / zos la ba sar 'o ma btung //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-7: mtshan mo thog thag gnyid ma log / dub pa med par nyal po spyod //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-9: kha sral phre'u la sogs pa 'o mar bskol ba'am /
T13TD4312.3E:294b-10: ma sha 'o ma dang bskol ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du mar la sbrang rtsi btab ste skyes bus zos la /
T13TD4312.3E:294b-11: de'i 'og tu ba sar pa be'u lan cig btsas pa'i 'o ma 'thungs na mtshan rangs bud med la nyal po spyod kyang ngal ba med bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-12: ra thug rlig pa 'o mar btsos //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-13: til dang lan mang bsres pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-14: kha rar bcas zos gang yin de //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-15: bud med brgya la'ang gsar snyam sems //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-17: ra thug gi rlig pa 'o ma'i nang du btsos la til dang yang dang yang du lan mang por bsres la kha ra dang bcas pa zos na bud med brgya la spyod pa na yang sngon chad ma spyad pa'i sar pa snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-18: bi da ri yi phye ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-19: rang gi khu bar lan mang spangs //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-20: zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas bldags na //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-21: bud med bcu la spyod par nus //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-23: bi da ri'i phye ma bi da ri rang nyid bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du spangs pa zhun mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas te zos na yang nyin re zhing bud med bcu la spyod par nus so //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-24: pi ling skyu ru ra yi phye //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-25: rang gi khu bar legs spangs la //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-26: sha kha ra mar sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-28: mi de brgyad cu lon na yang //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-29: lang chor gnas shing 'dod spyod nus //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-31: pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra'i phye ma ji skad smos pa bzhin du bsten na yang mi de lo brgyad cu lon yang dar la bab pa bzhin du bud med la 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-32: shing mngar phye ma zho gnyis dang //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-33: mar dang sbrang rtsi de mnyam pa //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-35: mi de rtag tu 'dod spyod nus //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-37: skyes bu gang shing mngar btags pa'i phye ma zho gnyis mar dang sbrang rtsi de dang mnyam par sbyar ba zos la de'i 'og tu 'o ma 'thungs na yang rtag tu chags pa spyod nus bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-38: kar ka ta li sring gi phye //
T13TD4312.3E:294b-40: kha ra 'o ma mar bcas pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-0: @295a * // zas zos bud med la phod 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-2: yang mi gang kar ka ta sring gi phye ma ji skad smos pa ltar bsten na yang bud med la 'dod pa spyod pa khyu mchog ltar nus par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-3: ba ya sya dang 'o ma bskol //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-4: mar dang sbrang rtsi bcas za zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-6: de yi sa bon zad mi shes //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-8: yang mi gang pa ya sya dang 'o ma bskol ba mar dang sbrang rtsi dang za zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:295a-9: de bzhin du ba yar ma ste be'u skyes nas lo gcig lon pa'i 'o ma 'thungs na de bud med la spyod kyang sa bon zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-10: kha sral phre'u bu ram gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-11: sa bon phye ma kha rar bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-13: lung bong lta bur spyod par nus //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-15: kha sral phre'u dang bcas pa bu ram shing phra mo sa bon gyi phye ma kha ra dang bcas par zos la /
T13TD4312.3E:295a-16: 'o ma bzhos ma thag 'thungs na bud med rnams la lung bong ltar 'dod chags spyod nus par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-17: au tstsha ta yi phye ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-18: nye'u shing sbyar ba'ang de bzhin no //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-20: autstsha ta'i phye ma kha ra dang bcas pa zos la 'o ma bzhos ma thag 'thungs pa 'am nye'u shing gi sbyor ba gong ma ltar byas na yang lud bong ltar spyod par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-21: zho spris zla ba ltar dkar ba //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-22: tshags kyis btsags pa zos nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-23: kha ra drug cu'i 'bras chan zos //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-24: rgan po 'ang gzhon nu bzhin du spyod //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-26: zho'i spris ma zla ba ltar rab tu dkar ba tshags kyis btsags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:295a-27: 'bras drug cu pa'i chan dang kha rar bcas pa zos na yang rgan po zhig yin yang dar la bab pa bzhin du 'dod pa spyod par nus so //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-28: gzem ma sha aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-29: kha sral sa bon nye'u shing pa //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-31: bud med brgya la spyod par nus //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-33: gang zhig gze ma la sogs pa 'o ma dang bskol ba 'thungs na mi de rgas pa yin yang bud med brgya la spyod par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-34: gang yang snum zhing mngar ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-35: stobs 'phel nyams ni rtas byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-36: yid ni dga' bar byed pa gang //
T13TD4312.3E:295a-37: de dag thams cad ro tsar bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-0: @295b de bas rdzas ni 'di lta bus //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-1: brtas byas bud med la 'jug bya //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-2: rang gi shugs kyis spyod pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-3: bud med yon tan gyis dga' spyad //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-5: gang yang ro mngar ba dang snum pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:295b-6: nyams 'phel zhing rgyas par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:295b-8: de thams cad kyang ro tsa zhing khu ba 'phel bar byed par bshad do //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-9: de bas na mngar ba la sogs pa'i rdzas 'di lta bus mi brtas par byas nas bud med la 'jug pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:295b-10: de bzhin du rang gi dga' ba'i shugs bdo bas bskyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:295b-11: bud med kyi yon tan gyis dga' bar byed pa'i sems dang /
T13TD4312.3E:295b-12: bud med la 'jug cing dga' bar 'dod pa spyod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-13: chos kyi dpag bsam shing myu gu //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-14: dbang po'i bde ba kun bsten bya //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-15: yul ni yid du 'ong ba lnga //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-16: 'dod pa'i lha yi mda' yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-18: 'dod pa'i chos kyi lha'i dpag bsam gyi myu gu lta bu yin zhing 'dod pa'i lha'i sder gyur pa gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga po gang dag yin pa dbang po'i bde ba skyed par byed pa de bsten par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-19: yid 'ong yul ni re res kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-20: tshim zhing dga' byed mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-21: bud med lus la [?] dus nas gang //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-22: gnas pa de ni smos ci dgos //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-24: yid du 'ong ba'i yul sgra la sogs pa yul re res kyang tshim pa dang dga' bar byed pa'i mchog yin na yul thams cad 'dus par gyur pa'i bud med lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T13TD4312.3E:295b-25: gang gi ming thos na yang snying dga' zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-26: mthong na ngoms par 'gyur ba med pa dang //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-27: dbang po kun 'dren lcags kyur 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-28: bud med khyo yi rjes 'jug 'phyon ma min //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-29: sgyu rtsal 'jo sgeg na tshod lus kyis brgyan //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-30: dga' ba'i phyir ni ngo tsha dben par spyod //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-31: tshig snyan smra zhing mtshungs par mngon dga' bcas //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-32: bud med de ni ro tsa'i don mchog byed //
T13TD4312.3E:295b-34: bud med gang gi ming tsam thos na yang snying dga' zhing ro tsa bar byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:295b-35: bud med gang mthong na yid ngoms par 'gyur ba med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:295b-36: gang dbang po thams cad 'gugs shing 'dren pa'i lcags kyur gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296a-0: bud med khyo'i rjes su 'jug cing gzhan la mi 'pho @296a * //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-1: pa'i khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can du gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296a-2: de bzhin du sgyu rtsal dang lus kyi 'jo sgeg dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296a-3: na tshod gzhon pas brgyan par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296a-4: de bzhin du phyi rol mang po 'dus pa'i nang du ngo tsha dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296a-5: dben par gcig pu gnas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296a-6: spyod pa'i bag yangs la mkhas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296a-7: tshig 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-8: 'dod pa la mtshungs par dga' bar gyur pa'i bud med de ni ro tsa ba'i don gyi mchog grub par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-9: 'dod pa'i bstan bcos las bshad skyon med pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-10: yul dang dus dang nyams stobs rjes mthun zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-11: sman dpyad bstan bcos sbyor dang mi 'gal ba //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-12: 'dod pa'i spyod pa ma lus spyad par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-14: 'dod pa'i bstan bcos bha tsa ya na la sogs pa las bshad pa'i nyes pa'i skyon med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296a-15: yul dang dus dang nyams stobs kyi rjes su mthun par spyod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296a-16: sman dpyad de bstan bcos las bshad pa'i sbyor ba dang mi 'gal ba'i 'dod pa spyod pa de lta bu dag gis 'dod pa spyod par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-17: bsku byug lus dril sman chu blugs dang dril //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-18: me tog phreng ba sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-19: glu dang snyan ngag la sogs gtam la mkhas //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-20: rang bzhin na tshod mtshungs shing dbang gyur grogs //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-22: grogs po mdza' bshes kyang bsku byug la sogs pa dang ldan zhing glu la sogs pa la mkhas pa /
T13TD4312.3E:296a-23: rang bzhin dang na tshod mnyam pa dang rang gi dbang du gyur pa yang yid dang mthun zhing mgu bar byed pa yin pas ro tsa bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba nas bshad pa dang sbyar ro //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-24: rang gi khang pa'i nye 'khor khrus rdzing bu //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-25: padma'i ge sar sbrang rtsis myos pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-26: sbrang ma bya dang bcas par gyur pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-27: sngo zhing gzhi mnyam ri yi 'dab na ni //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-28: nags tshal khyim dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:296a-30: rang gi khang pa'i nye 'khor na khrus kyi rdzing bu yid du 'ong ba padma'i ge sar gyi rdul las byung ba'i sbrang rtsis myos par gyur pa'i sbrang ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa yang yid du 'ong ba yin pas na ro tsa bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:296b-0: de bzhin du bya sna tshogs dang bcas pa'i nags tshal [?] @296b gzhi mnyam zhing yid du 'ong ba yang khyim gyi 'dab nye bar 'dug pa de yang nyams dga' bar byed pa yin pas na ro tsa bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-1: mthong na dga' ba'i shing ni sna tshogs skyes //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-2: mnyan na bde ba'i khu byug sgra snyan sgrogs //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-3: lus bde bud med rgyan ldan dus dbang 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-4: sems bde ma lus 'khor gyis bskor ba dang //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-6: skyed mos tshal mthong na nyams dga' zhing bde ba skyed pa sna tshogs pa mthong bas dga' ba skyed pa de yang ro tsa bar byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:296b-7: de bzhin du mnyan na bde ba'i sgra khu byug la sogs pa dag gi sgra yid du 'ong ba thos pa yang ro tsa bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-8: bud med rgyan gyis brgyan zhing dus kyi bde ba'i dbang du gyur pa skyed par byed pa yang ro tsa ba bskyed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:296b-9: de bzhin du sems bde bar byed pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor te /
T13TD4312.3E:296b-10: gnas pa yang ro tsa bar byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-11: so rtsi dang ni chang dang chung ma ni //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-12: yid 'ong mtshan mo zla zer bcas par 'dug / yid ni dga' bar byed pa gang dang gang //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-13: de dang de ni ro tsar byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-15: so rtsi tambu la zhes bya ba bsten zhing bza' ba dang chang dangs ma 'thung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296b-16: chung ma yid du 'ong ba dang 'grogs shing mtshan mo zla zer dang bcas pa la 'dug pa yang ro tsa bar byed pa'i rgyu yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:296b-17: mdor na yid dga' bar byed pa gang dang gang yin pa de dag thams cad ro tsa bar byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-18: chung ma'i kha ni autpa la ltar dri zhim //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-19: pi wang snyan pa'i sgra ni nyan byed dang //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-20: mal stan yid 'ong me tog gcal bkram pa //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-21: lcug ma me tog myu gus brgyan pa 'dra //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-23: chung ma'i kha autpa la ltar shin du dri zhim par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296b-24: pi wang snyan pa'i sgra nyan par byed pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:296b-25: de bzhin du mal stan yid du 'ong zhing me tog dri zhim pa'i gcal bkram pa lcug ma rtse mo me tog dang myu gus brgyan pa ltar yid du 'ong ba yang 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-26: yul dang dus la gnod pa gang yang med //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-27: yul gyi yid la gnod pa chung ngu'ang med //
T13TD4312.3E:296b-28: ro tsa'i sbyor ba nye bar ldan gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-1: pa yongs su rdzogs par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-3: gang na gnas pa'i yul na gnod pa'i 'tshe ba gang yang med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:297a-4: de bzhin du lus la gnod pa'i 'tshe ba gang yang med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:297a-5: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi yid la gnod pa chung zad tsam yang med par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:297a-6: de bzhin du ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba ji skad smos pa dang nye bar ldan pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:297a-7: de dag thams cad ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-8: gla sgang bar pa ta ni rims la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-9: skom dad che la bong pa bsregs pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-10: chu yi nang du gsur ba'i dangs ma phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-11: slon la 'bras yos chu so'i nad brag zhun //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-12: gcin snyi skyu ru ra dang ser po gnyis //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-13: skya rbab nad la lcags kyi phye ma mchog //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-14: rlung dang bad kan la ni aa ru ra //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-15: mcher ba'i nad la pi pi ling mchog yin //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-16: glo rdol ba la rgya skyegs khu ba bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-17: dug gi nad la shir sha rab bsngags te //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-18: tshil dang rlung nad la ni gu gul phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-19: khrag dang mkhris par ba sha ka rab bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-20: 'khru ba'i nad la dug mo nyung phan zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-21: gzhang 'brum go byed byig dug la gser phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-22: tsho ches pa la skyer khanda bsngags shing //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-23: srin bu'i nad ni byi dang ga yis 'joms //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-24: gcong chen la chang ra sha 'am 'o ma phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-25: mig gi nad la 'bras bu gsum rab phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-26: dreg nad la ni sle tres rab bsngags shing //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-27: pho ba'i nad la dar ba gsar pa mchog / mdze la seng ldeng snying po bsten pas mchog //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-28: nad kun la ni brag zhun rab tu bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-29: smyo byed nad la mar ni rnying pa phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-30: brjed byed nad la bramhi phan pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-31: mya ngan la ni chang ni blud pa phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-32: gnyid med pa yi nad ni 'o mas sel //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-33: cham pa zho ni sbyar ma thag gis sel //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-34: rid pa'i nad la sha ni sbyin par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-35: rlung gi nad la sgog skya rab tu bsngags /
T13TD4312.3E:297a-36: yan lag rengs pa'i nad ni dugs kyis sel //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-37: phrag pa phrag gong lag ngar na ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-38: thang chu kha por yi sna sman gtang //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-39: klad pa'i nad la mar sar hvags kyis sel //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-40: dmu rdzing rnga mo'i gcin dang 'o mas sel //
T13TD4312.3E:297a-41: mgo bo'i nad kun la ni sna sman bsngags //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-0: khong 'bras gsar du byung @297b la gtar ga gdab //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-1: kha yi nad rnams la ni mkhur bkang phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-2: mig nad sna sman mig sman brta bas sel //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-3: rgas pa la ni 'o ma zhun mar phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-4: brgyal la chu grang blugs dang grib ma phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-5: drod chung ngal dang sge'u gsher tsha ran phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-6: dub la chang 'thungs lus ni khrus byas phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-7: sdug bsngal bzod dang brtan la rtsol ba phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-8: gcin sri ba la gze ma phan pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-9: lud pa lu la kanda ka ri phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-10: rtsib logs gzer la pushkar m'u la phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-11: rgas sra ba la skyu ru ra phan zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-12: rma la 'bras bu gsum dang gu gul phan //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-13: de ltar nad rnams kyi ni sman gyi mchog / bshad pas nad rnams zhi bar nus pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-14: de ni yul dang dus kyi stobs las ni //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-15: ci rigs par ni brtags te sbyar bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-17: rims kyi nad la ni gla sgang dang par pa ta mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-18: skom dad che ba la ni so phag bsregs pa chu'i nang du gsur te bgrungs pa'i chu blud na mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-19: slon pa'i nad la ni 'bras yos mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-20: chu so'i nad la ni brag zhun gtang ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-21: gcin snyi ba'i nad la ni skyu ru ra dang yung ba dang skyer pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-22: skya rbab kyi nad la ni lcags kyi phye ma mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-23: rlung dang bad kan ldan pa'i nad la ni aa ru ra mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-24: mcher pa'i nad la ni pi pi ling mchog tu phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-25: glo rdol ba'i nad la ni rgya skyegs kyi khu ba blud pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-26: dug gi nad la ni shri sha zhes bya ba shu ka ta ru mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-27: tshil dang rlung las gyur pa'i nad la ni gu gul mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-28: khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad la ni ba sha ka mchog yin no ;
T13TD4312.3E:297b-29: tshad pa rnying pa la sogs pa 'khru ba'i nad la ni dug mo nyung mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-30: gzhang 'brum la ni go bye zhes bya ba bse shing gi 'bras bu mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-31: dbyig dug la gser bdar ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-32: tsho ches pa la skyer pa'i khanda bsngags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-33: srin bu las gyur pa'i nad la ni byi dang ga mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-34: gcong chen po'i nad la ni chang dang ra sha 'am 'o ma byin pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-35: mig gi nad thams cad la ni 'bras bu gsum mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-36: dreg nad la ni sle tres kyi khu ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:297b-37: pho ba'i nad la ni dar ba gsar ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-0: mdze'i nad thams cad la ni seng ldeng gi snying @298a * //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-1: po bsten pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-2: nad thams cad la ni brag zhun bsten pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-3: smyo byed kyi nad la ni mar rnying pa lo mang po lon pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-4: brjed byed kyi nad la ni bramhi zhes bya ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-5: mya ngan la ni chang blud pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-6: gnyid med pa sel ba'i mchog ni 'o ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-7: cham pa la ni zho sbyar ba zhes bya ba zho dkrugs pa'i nang du dri bzang bzhi dang pi pi ling dang kha ra btab pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-8: skyes bu rid cing nyam chung ba la ni sha sbyin pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-9: rlung gi nad la ni sgog skya mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-10: yan lag rengs ba'i nad sel ba'i mchog ni dugs yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-11: phrag pa dang lag ngar dang bcas pa na ba la ni /
T13TD4312.3E:298a-12: thang chu kha por zhes bya ba dzi dzin na'i sman gtang ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-13: rlung gis klad pa'i gzhogs phyed na ba la ni mar sar hvags sbyar ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-14: dmu rdzing gi nad la ni rnga mo'i gcin dang 'o ma mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-15: nam tshong yan chad kyi mgo bo'i nad kun la ni sna sman gtang ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-16: khong 'bras dang po byung ba la ni gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-17: kha'i nad thams cad la ni sman khus mkhur ba bkang zhing dbo ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-18: mig nad la ni sna sman dang mig sman dang mig brtab bya ba mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-19: rgas pa la ni 'o ma dang zhun mar bsten pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-20: brgyal ba sel ba'i mchog ni chu grang dang grib ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-21: khong pa'i me drod chung ba sel ba'i mchog ni ngal ba dang sge'u gsher dang /
T13TD4312.3E:298a-22: tsha ran pa bsten pa mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-23: lus dub pa la ni chang 'thungs ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:298a-24: lus khrus byas pa phan no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-25: sdug bsngal bzod cing dka' ba bsten nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:298a-26: lus brtan par gyur pa la ni rtsol ba dang drag shul byas pa phan pa'i mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-27: gcin sri ba sel ba'i mchog ni gze ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-28: lud pa lu ba la ni kanda ka ri mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-29: rtsib logs su gzer ba la ni pushkar m'u la zhes bya ba ma nu mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-30: rgas sra bar bya ba la ni skyu ru ra mchog yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298a-31: rma sel ba'i mchog ni 'bras bu gsum dang gu gul yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:298a-32: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis nad rnams sel ba'i sman gyi mchog bshad cing bstan pa de dag gis ni nad zhi zhing sel bar nus pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-0: de la yul dang dus kyi stobs las sman gyi sbyor @298b ba ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-1: de ltar rgyun shes bu las gzhung gi mdo //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-2: legs par bshad pa des ni ma ngoms pas //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-3: me bzhin 'jug sogs blo mthun dad pas 'dud //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-4: the tshom 'di ni me bzhin 'jug gis dris //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-6: rnam pa de lta bu'i tshul gyis drang srong rgyun shes kyi bu las gzhung gi don gyi mdo thos pa dang legs par bshad cing tshad mas brtags pa'i rang gi don brtan pa rtogs sla zhing don che ba des me bzhin 'jug la sogs pa'i slob ma rnams ngoms shing tshim par ma gyur pas /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-7: de dag blo mthun par dad pas mgo bos btud nas drang srong lug ces bya ba la sogs pa slob ma rnams kyi nang na bsngags la /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-8: me bzhin 'jug ces bya bas blo la nges pa ma rnyed pa'i the tshom 'di rgyun shes kyi bu la dris par gyur to //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-9: skal ldan kha cig bdag nyid mkhas //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-10: sman dang nad g-yog phun sum tshogs //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-11: sman pa rgan po'i lung gis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-12: rjes su 'jug kyang nad bcas shing //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-13: nad kyi srog ni zad par snang //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-14: gzhan dag de las go bzlog snang //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-15: de phyir phan dang gnod pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-16: 'bras bu nges pa ma mchis na //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-17: 'dir ni bstan bcos kyis ci bstan //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-19: 'di dag ni dri ba'i tshig ste /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-20: kye skal ldan rgyun shes kyi bu kha cig bdag nyid mkhas shing rig pa yin zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-21: sman dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-22: nad g-yog phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag po dang yang ldan la /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-23: sman pa rgan zhing mkhas pa'i gdams ngag gis rjes su 'jug par byed du zin kyang nad kyi srog zad par byed pa dag snang la /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-24: nad pa gzhan kha cig ni de las go bzlog pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-25: bdag nyid mi mkhas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-26: sman pa yo byad med pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-28: sman pa mi mkhas pa dag gis bcos su zin kyang srog zad par ma gyur par snang ngo //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-29: de'i phyir phan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-30: gnod par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu la ni nges pa yod pa ma yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:298b-31: phan pa'i sbyor ba byas kyang 'bras bu de nyid du zad pas de bas na srog bsrung ba'i gso ba'i mtshan nyid 'di ni gcig tu chad pa med cing nges pa med pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:298b-32: de ltar bya ba la nges pa med pa'i phyir gso ba'i bstan bcos kyis 'dir don gyi dngos po ci zhig bstan cing dgos pa ci zhig bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-0: yul de la ni 'bras bu nges pa @299a * //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-1: med pa'i phyir bstan pa ci yang med de /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-2: des na sman bsten pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-3: ma bsten pa dag tshul mnyam pa'i phyir bstan bcos 'di ni brtsam par mi bya ba'i rigs so //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-4: de ltar me bzhin 'jug sogs slob ma'i tshogs /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-5: rtog pa skyes la rgyun shes bu yis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-6: de nyid ma lus rnam par bshad gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-7: gso byas ma byas mnyam por bya mi rigs //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-9: tshul de ltar me bzhin 'jug la sogs pa'i slob ma'i tshogs the tshom skyes shing rtog par gyur pa de las drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bus don gyi de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log pa ma lus pa thams cad rnam par bshad par gyur pa ni /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-10: kye me bzhin 'jug gso ba yan lag bzhi ba'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yon tan bcu drug gis nye bar brgyan par gyur pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-11: gso ba ma byas pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-12: yan lag bzhi dang yan lag bcu drug gi tshogs pa dang mi ldan par gyur pa de mnyam zhing cha mtshungs par brtags pa ni rigs shing 'os pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-14: yan lag bcu drug ldan pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-15: gso byed bde 'gyur yod mod kyi //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-16: nad kyi 'dam du bying ba la //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-17: lag nas 'dren thabs sman yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-19: gang gi phyir nad pa gang yang yan lag bcu drug dang ldan pa'i 'byor ba tshad du zin kyang nad med cing bde bar 'gyur ba yod mod kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-20: 'on kyang nad kyi 'dam du bying ba la ni lag nas 'dren zhing bslang ba'i thabs sman kho na yin par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-21: de yang tsa ra ka las nad pa gang sman med par nad las thar zhing ldang ba yod kyang /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-22: de ni sman gyi yan lag phun sum tshogs pas gsos pa lar nad med pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-23: dper na skyes bu ltung zhing 'gyel bar gyur pa la la zhig ldang bar nus pa cung zad yod du zin pa la yang /
T13TD4312.3E:299a-24: skyes bu gzhan zhig gis lag nas drangs na de shin tu myur bar nyam nga ba med pas ldang bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-25: nad pa gso ba'i sman gyi sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-26: zhes bya ba bshad pa lta bu'o //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-28: kun la sman yod ma yin zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-29: thabs la ltos pa ma yin la //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-30: gzhan du thabs la ltos pa'i nad //
T13TD4312.3E:299a-32: rgyu med par ni gtan tshigs min //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-0: nad pa 'chi bar @299b 'gyur ba thams cad ni sman gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:299b-1: gang gi phyir nad thams cad gso ba'i thabs la rag las shing ltos pa ma yin gyi /
T13TD4312.3E:299b-2: gzhan thabs la ltos dgos pa'i nad ni gso ba'i thabs med par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-3: de bas na khyed kyis bshad pa'i rgyu med par bshad pa de ni gtan tshigs su rung ba ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-4: 'di yang tsa ra ka las nad pa gang sman med pa 'ga' zhig gis 'chi bar 'gyur ba de ni sman gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs pas sos bar 'gyur ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:299b-5: gang gi phyir nad thams cad kyang gso ba'i thabs la ltos dgos pa dag kyang gso ba med par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-6: gang yang khyed kyis phun tshogs ni //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-7: kun dang ldan pas gsos na yang //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-9: thabs ni thabs min 'gyur yod min //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-11: gang yang khyod kyis yan lag bcu drug gi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pas gsos su zin kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ba dag snang ngo zhes smra ba ma yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:299b-12: de ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-14: sman gyis gsor mi rung ba'i nad pa yang sman de dag gso ba'i thabs su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-15: sman pa shin tu mkhas pa dag kyang nad pa la yongs su rtog cing gso ba'i sbyor ba 'jug tu zin yang gsor mi rung ba la 'tsho ba yod pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-17: gal te de lta'i thabs ldan zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-18: blo ldan gso ba byas gyur kyang //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-19: sngon las nyes pa ma grub pa //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-20: yan lag bcu drug ldan med yin //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-22: gal te nad pa gso ba'i thabs yan lag bcu drug phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing nad pa blo dang ldan pa la gso ba'i dpyad byas su zin kyang /
T13TD4312.3E:299b-23: gso ba ma grub par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas tshe zad pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis ma grub pa yod na yang yan lag bcu drug dang ldan pa'i gso ba ni med pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-24: me dang chu sogs dugs dang ni //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-25: rengs sogs mi 'grub su zhig zer //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-27: me dang chu la sogs pas dugs dang rengs pa la sogs pa'i las mi byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:299b-29: dugs kyi las ni mes byed pa yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:299b-30: rengs pa ni chus byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:300a-0: sogs pa'i sgras ni rlung gis ni dran pa rnyed pa'i lus byed pa yin par ni kun @300a * //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-1: la grags pa de ltar su zhig mi 'dod //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-2: brta dang nyams smad 'o ma dang //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-5: skyes bu su zhig 'o mas lus brta ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:300a-6: 'bras ngan pa ga be du zhes bya bas nyams smad par mi 'gyur bar su zhig mi 'dod de /
T13TD4312.3E:300a-7: de yang kun la grags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-8: ma sha kha sral la sogs la //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-9: ro tsa mi nus su zhig zer //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-11: gzhan yang mon sran sde'u ma sha dang /
T13TD4312.3E:300a-12: kha sral phre'u aad ma kub ta zhes bya ba la sogs pas ro tsa bar mi 'gyur ro zhes su zhig zer te kun la yang 'di grags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-13: bshang gci skyed dang mang bar ni //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-14: nad la the tshom su zhig za //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-16: bshang ba skyed par byed pa dang gci ba mang bar gyur pa ni nad yin par su zhig the tshom za ste /
T13TD4312.3E:300a-17: the tshom med pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-18: sngags dang rgyud ni med pa ru //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-21: yang srog chags su zhig la dug sngags kyis ma btab cing /
T13TD4312.3E:300a-22: gso ba'i rgyud kyi cho ga las bshad pa'i dug bsal ba'i thabs zas dang skom sman sna tshogs pa med par dug de sus 'ju bar 'gyur te /
T13TD4312.3E:300a-23: gang gis kyang 'ju bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-25: gag pa la sogs gso ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-26: med par gang zhig bde bar 'gyur //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-28: skyes bu gang zhig gag pa dang gnye'u reng dang mur 'gram gyi nad la gso ba'i sbyor ba ma byas par /
T13TD4312.3E:300a-29: gang zhig bde bar 'gyur te su yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-31: grub mtha' kun du nges par grags //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-32: 'bad pa chen po dag gis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-33: ji ltar gzhan gyis bzlog par nus //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-35: 'on kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba la sogs pa'i bstan bcos kyi grub pa'i mtha' thams cad la grags pa yin pas na de sbyin pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:300a-37: dka' thub dang sdom pa la sogs pa 'bad pa chen po yin yang gso ba'i bstan bcos ltar ma byas na ji ltar bzlog par 'gyur te gang gis kyang bzlog par mi nus so //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-38: tsandan la sogs tsha sogs pa //
T13TD4312.3E:300a-39: lung las grags pa bzhin du sel //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-0: tsandan dang aa ru ra la sogs pa'i sman tsha ba dang grang ba la sogs pa sel ba yin par ni bstan bcos kyi lung las @300b grags pa yin na de yang de bzhin du 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-1: rims la smyung dang brta ba dag / bstan bcos nyid las grags pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-3: rims la dang por smyung ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:300b-4: phyis brtab byas pas phan pa ni gso ba'i bstan bcos las 'jig rten du grags pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-5: yan lag bzhi pa'i yon tan 'byor //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-6: legs par brtags nas sbyar bya zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-7: gzhan du nad kyi tshogs 'joms pa //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-8: gso ba the tshom bcas mi bya //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-10: me bzhin 'jug nad sel ba'i gso ba ni yan lag bzhi po sman pa dang nad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:300b-12: nad pa'i yon tan bzhi po las yon tan bzhi bzhir 'phros pa mkhas shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa de dag 'byor zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:300b-13: de bzhin du gnod pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:300b-14: gnod bya la sogs pa bcu gnyis legs par brtags nas nye bar sbyar bar bya zhing gzhan du na nad kyi tshogs 'joms par byed pa min par gso ba zhes bya ba de la the tshom dang bcas par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-16: brtan po bcom par byed pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-17: nad kyis skrag cing 'jigs pa la //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-18: sngags med pa yi srung skud yin //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-20: bstan bcos 'di ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i zhags pa brtan po 'joms par byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:300b-21: ji ltar zhags pa 'di mtshon rnon pos gcod par byed mi nus te /
T13TD4312.3E:300b-22: gso ba'i thabs kyis gcod pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-23: de bzhin du nad kyis skrag cing 'jigs pa'i skyes bu la bstan bcos 'di sngags med cing sngags kyis ma btab pa'i srung skud kyang yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-25: sel byed bdud rtsi mngon sum yin //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-26: snod ngan gnas na 'phral du ni //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-27: ha la ha lar 'gyur ba yin //
T13TD4312.3E:300b-29: sman dpyad kyi gso ba'i rgyud 'di ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams sel bar byed cing rgas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:300b-31: 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par byed pa yin pas rtsi dang 'dra ba yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:300b-32: gang gi phyir bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba'i phyir lha dang lha ma yin gyis sdug bsngal gyi 'bad pa chen po byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:300b-34: 'di la ni sdug bsngal 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-0: de ltar na yang snod ngan pa bstan bcos la @301a * //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-1: thos pa med pa'i sman pa'i rgyud la gnas par gyur na /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-2: 'phral du de'i mod la ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i dug chen por 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-3: bstan bcos nges pa mi shes shing //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-4: tshig tsam la ni rjes gzhol ba'i //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-5: gshin rje'i zhags pa thogs pa bzhin //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-6: sman pa ngan pa ring du spang //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-8: sman pa gang gso ba'i bstan bcos kyi nges pa'i de kho na nyid legs par mi shes shing khong du chud par ma gyur la /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-9: tshig tsam gyi rjes su 'brang zhing gzhol bar byed pa'i sman pa ngan cing smad par bya ba de ni ring du spang bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-10: ji ltar gshin rje'i zhags pa dag kyang ring du spang bar bya ba yin pa dang 'dra'o //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-11: sman pa gzhung la legs mkhas shing //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-12: lung la mkhas pa'i bzang po dang //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-13: las la goms zhing dge ba ni //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-14: bzang por 'dod pa dam pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-16: sman pa sman dpyad kyi lung gi gzhung lugs la shin tu mkhas shing byad pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-17: de bzhin du las la goms shing rang bzhin dge ba'i bya ba la sogs pa dag dang /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-18: de bzhin du bzang por 'dod cing bde ba dang dge ba la dga' ba dag ni dam par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-19: de ltar rgyud kyi yon tan ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-20: rgyud kyi skyon ni spang gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-21: gso ba'i bstan bcos ma lus pa //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-22: khyab ste yongs su gnas pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-23: drang srong chen po'i gzhung rjes 'jug / rgya che'i dri ma med pa'i gnas //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-24: rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-25: bsdus don nye bar mtshon byed yin //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-27: de ltar zhes bya ba'i don ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don te /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-28: gang gi phyir bstan bcos 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-29: yang na de ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rdzogs pa'i don te /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-30: rgyud ni tshul 'di ltar rdzogs par byas la /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-31: de ltar rdzogs par byas pa'i rgyud kyi yon tan thams cad ni ldan la /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-32: rgyud kyi skyon thams cad ni spangs pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:301a-33: de yang 'dis lus 'dzin cing sdud pa'i don gyis na rgyud de /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-34: rgyud de'i yon tan ni drang srong tsa ra kas bshad de ;
T13TD4312.3E:301a-36: grags pa chen po dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pas kun du brten pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-37: don shin tu mang ba nyams dang ldan ba'i skye bo rnams kyis bsngags pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-38: slob ma dam pa gsum gyi blo la phan pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301a-39: tshig zlos pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-0: bsdu ba'i rim pa legs @301b par bshad pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-2: tshig zur chag pa med pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-3: mi go bar bya ba'i sgra med pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-5: brgyud pa'i rim pas rtogs pa'i don dang ldan pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-6: don gyi de kho na nyid nges pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-8: don mthun pa dang ldan pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-9: don tshol zhing 'dres pa med pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-10: rab tu byed pa ma 'dres pa ;
T13TD4312.3E:301b-11: myur du 'jug cing rtogs par byed pa /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-12: mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing dpe dang bcas pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-13: bstan bcos 'di ni de lta bu yin par shes par bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:301b-14: de yang ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pas mun pa'i tshogs thams cad bsal te /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-15: dngos po thams cad snang ba dang 'dra bar byas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:301b-16: de la rgyud kyi skyon ni the tshom dang bcas pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-20: cho ga dang mi ldan pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-23: rgyud de yang gso ba'i bstan bcos ma lus pa la kun nas khyab ste gnas pa yangs brgya che ba /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-24: dri ma med cing skyon med pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-25: gang 'di drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i gzhung rgya che zhing dri ma med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyud de ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing 'jug par byed cing /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-26: rgyud de ni tshangs pas bshad pa'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gzhung chen po 'di de'i don yang mtshon par byed pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-27: rgyud 'dis bsdus pa'i don de yang mtshon zhing ston par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:301b-28: sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las //
T13TD4312.3E:301b-29: yan lag brgyad bsdus bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob gang //
T13TD4312.3E:301b-30: de las don chen rtsol ba zhen pa rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:301b-31: dga' bar bya phyir rgyud 'di logs shig byas ;
T13TD4312.3E:301b-33: sman dpyad gang la yan lag brgyad yod pa de ni sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-34: de nyid du ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste bdud rtsi 'byung ba chos dang mthun pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-35: don zab par mthun pa'i phyir rgya mtsho zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:301b-36: de bsrubs shing rnam par glongs pa'i tshul gyis 'bad par bya ba'i rgyu de las yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi'i phung po chen po thob par 'gyur ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-0: yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob pa de las don che zhing dgos pa chen po dang ldan pa 'di sman pa rtsol ba zhan zhing 'bad pa chung du dang ldan pa rnams kyi dga' ba @302a * //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-1: bskyed par bya ba'i phyir yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud 'di logs shig tu gud du byas pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-2: 'di ni lung chen las grags shing //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-3: 'bras bu mngon du ston byed pas //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-4: sngags dang 'dra bar legs sbyar gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-5: log dpyod nam yang mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-7: rgyud 'di ni sman dpyad kyi lung chen po las grags shing /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-8: lung gi tshad ma dang ldan ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-9: 'bras bu 'phral du mngon sum du ston par byed pa'i phyir sngags dang 'dra bar yang dag par sbyar bar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-10: ji ltar sngags kyi 'bras bu ni rgyu gang gis gnod pa sel bar dpyad par mi bya ba'i yid ches pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa dang 'dra bar /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-11: 'di'i sbyor ba la yang yid ches pa nyid kyis bsgrub kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-12: log par rtog pa'i dpyod pa dag ni yang mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-13: 'di bklags rtogs dang nyams blangs pas //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-14: tshe ring ba dang nad med dang //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-15: chos dang nor dang bde dang grags //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-18: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud 'di bklags pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-19: rtogs shing khong du chud pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-20: sbyor ba ji skad smos pa dang nyams su blangs pa las tshe ring ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-22: chos dang nor dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-23: grags par 'gyur ba nges par gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-24: 'di ni bltas na bsdus don rtogs nus pas //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-25: rang gi goms las sman pas bskyod mi nus //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-26: rgya chen rgyud gzhan dag las goms gyur pas //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-27: mi bskyod gyur gang de ni ngo mtshar med //
T13TD4312.3E:302a-29: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di bklags shing bltas na bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos kyi don rtogs shing shes par nus pa dang /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-30: de bzhin du rang gi goms pa'i las de yang dang yang du bstan zhing nyams su blangs par gyur pa'i las la sman pa 'di la ma brten pa gzhan dag gis bskyod par mi nus shing /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-31: the tshom gyis sun 'byin zhing rgol bas tshar bcad par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-32: gal te sman dpyad kyi rgyud rgya chen po gzhan dag las dka' ba chen pos bslabs te byang bar gyur nas /
T13TD4312.3E:302a-33: las la glags mi thod cing mi bskyod par gyur pa yod mod kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-0: de lta bu gang yin pa de ni @302b 'bad pa chen po las byung ba yin pa'i 'bras bu yin pas ngo mtshar mi che'i /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-1: 'di ni tshegs chung dus goms pa chen po thob pa yin pas ngo mtshar che'o //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-2: gal te tsa ra kas ni bslabs gyur des ni legs thos sogs //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-3: las bshad nad kyi ming tsam yang ni shes par 'gyur ma yin //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-4: tsa ra ka lam bslabs gso ba dag ni ma goms pa'i //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-5: nyon mongs des ni nad pa rnams kyi gso ba ji ltar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-7: gal te sman pa tsa ra ka 'ba' zhig bslabs shing byang bar byas par gyur pa des ni drang srong legs thos kyis byas pa la sogs pa'i gzhung las bshad pa'i nad kyi tshogs nad phran tshegs dang /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-9: mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag dang /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-12: sna'i nad rnams kyi ming gi tha snyad tsam yang shes par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-13: de yang phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-14: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de'i nad gzhi dang mtshan nyid dang gso ba dag mi shes pa dag smos kyang ci dgos so zhes ston pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-15: gal te zhes bya ba la ni phyogs gnyis pa ston pa'i phyir smos pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-16: gal te tsa ra ka zhes bya bas gzhung la ma bslabs shing shes par ma gyur gyi /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-17: legs thos kyis bshad pa la sogs pa'i gzhung 'ba' zhig tsam bslabs par gyur na ni /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-18: nad gzhi dang lus zungs la sogs pa gnod par bya ba dang /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-24: rang bzhin la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i gso ba'i bya ba la ma goms shing mi shes pa yin pas /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-25: de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i shes pa dang mi ldan pa'i sman pa ngan pa des nad kyis gzir ba'i nad rnams la gso ba ji ltar bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-26: de lta bus kyang nad bsal ba'i bya ba ci yang bya bar mi nus te /
T13TD4312.3E:302b-27: gso ba'i bya ba la ma bslabs pa'i phyir ro //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-28: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i snying po 'dir ni de gnyis ka'i don ston pa yin pas 'di la bslabs pas ni nges par nad gso bar nus pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-29: mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis legs par bshad par gyur pa 'ang //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-30: shin tu rmongs bas mngon par spyad par mi byed gang yin de //
T13TD4312.3E:302b-31: de ni dang bor sman dpyad bstan bcos skyon med bklags gyur zhing //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-0: skyes bu'i tshe yis ji srid thub kyi @303a * //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-3: rang gi blo'i stobs la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub par mi nus pa'i dngos po rang gi yul ma yin pa dag la phyogs 'dzin par byed pa ni mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ste /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-4: de'i dbang ni nus pa ste /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-5: mngon par zhen pa de lta bu'i dbang de las legs par bshad cing bstan pa'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud las shin tu rmongs shing yon tan dang /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-6: skyon gyi bye brag mi shes pas mngon par mi brtson zhing klog pa dang rtogs bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par mi byed pa de dag ni nges par rmongs par gyur pas dang po sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos tshangs pas bshad la /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-7: shlo ka 'bum yod pa'i gzhung la skyo ba med par bslab cing skyes bu'i tshe ji srid thub pa'i tshad lo brgya'i bar du bklags shing slob pas mngon par zhen pa mi 'dor ba de yang rmongs ba zhes bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-8: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhi bya'i phyir //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-9: til mar mar sar sbrang rtsi rim bzhin bsten //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-10: de ltar tshangs pa 'am tshangs pa'i bu yis bshad //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-11: tshig gi dbye bas bshad kyang khyad 'phags med //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-12: ston pa po yi dbang gis ni //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-13: sman gyi nus pa khyad 'phags yin //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-14: de bas phrag dog spangs nas ni //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-15: bar ma nyid la bsten par bya //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-17: gal te gzhan dag 'di skad ces smra ba po'i khyad par las rdzas kyi nus pa yang phul du byung bar 'gyur ro //
T13TD4312.3E:303a-19: de ni de ltar ma yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-20: gang gi phyir rlung gi nad la ni til mar phan la /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-21: mkhris pa'i nad la ni mar sar phan zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-22: bad kan gyi nad la ni sbrang rtsi phan la /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-23: de ltar rim bzhin phan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ltar tshangs pas bshad pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-24: tshangs pa'i bu sa ma ku m'a ras bshad pa'am /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-25: 'am zhes pa'i sgras ni kho bo cag la sogs pas bshad du zin kyang /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-26: de ni de dag nyid la gcig nas gcig tu lung brgyud pa yin gyi /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-27: sngags med par tshig gi sgras bstan pa'i khyad par nus pa'i khyad par du gyur pa yang ma yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-28: smra ba po'i khyad par las sman gyi khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin pas /
T13TD4312.3E:303a-29: de'i phyir gnas pa ma yin pa la phrag dog byed pa de spangs shing bor nas phyogs su ma lhung ba'i lam bar ma nyid la blos ma bsten zhing gnas par bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-0: @303b rang nyid dus dang blo dang 'tsham pa'i bstan bcos gang yin pa yang shes par bya zhing /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-1: 'di ni dgos pa med pa yin no zhes brtags shing shes par bya'i /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-2: gnas ma yin pa la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-3: drang srong gis bshad phyir dga' na //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-4: legs thos tsa ra kar ma zad //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-5: lug sogs kyis byas cis mi slob //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-6: de bas legs bshad gzung bar bya //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-8: gal te khyod 'di skad du kho bo ni drang srong gis bshad pa'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud la dga' zhing dang bas de nyid la slob par byed kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-9: khyod kyi rgyud 'di la slob bar mi byed do zhes zer na /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-10: de ltar ni tsa ra [?] ka dang legs thos zhes bya ba'i gzhung de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-11: drang srong lug la sogs pas bshad pa'i lung gi gtsug lag rnams la khyod kyis ci'i phyir slob par mi byed /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-12: drang srong gis byas pa kun la slob par rigs na legs par bshad pa la dga' ba'i phyir sman pa thams cad kyang tsa ra ka dang legs thos la mang du slob par byed kyi /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-13: drang srong lug la sogs pas bshad pa'i lung gtsug lag yod du zin kyang slob par mi byed do //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-14: de bas legs par bshad pa'i tshig gi sdeb sbyor dang ldan pa la dga' na yang kho bos bshad pa 'di nyid gzung zhing bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-15: 'di ni tshe yi rig byed rgya mtsho yi //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-16: snying po las ni snying po blangs nas su //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-17: rnam par sbyar las dge ba gang thob pa //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-18: de yis 'gro bas de nyid mthong bar shog / ces bya ba la /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-19: tshig 'dis ni gzhung rtsom par byed pas de yan chad gso ba'i bstan bcos rdzogs par byas nas /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-20: dge ba'i rtsab bsngo bar bya ba'i phyir smos pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-21: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud 'di ni snying po dang 'dra ba yin la /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-22: gzhung gi don tshig tu rnam par sbyar ba'o //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-24: tshe'i rig byed kyi tshig gi tshogs rgya mtsho ltar zab cing rgya che ba'i snying por gyur pa yin te /
T13TD4312.3E:303b-25: de yang snying po zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'gro ba rnams kyi snying ni lus kyi phyogs gcig na gnas su zin kyang lus kyi tshogs thams cad la khyab par byed pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:303b-26: de bzhin du yan lag brgyad pa 'dis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshe'i rig byed thams cad khyab par byed de /
T13TD4312.3E:304a-0: gnas pas snying po dang chos mthun @304a * //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-1: pa'i phyir snying po zhes bya la /
T13TD4312.3E:304a-2: de lta bu'i snying po zhes bya ba'i don gyi mdo blangs shing btus nas /
T13TD4312.3E:304a-3: gzhung gi don tshig tu rnam par sbyar zhing bsdebs pa de las dge ba'i rtsa ba de dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa gang zhig thob cing rnyed par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa des 'gro ba lnga pos bsdus pa'i 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa de kho na nyid kyi don mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bde ba'i dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya ba rjes su bsngos pa yin no //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-4: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:304a-5: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi bcu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13TD4312.3E:304a-7: // / dpal ldan pha khol sman pa'i mchog / tshe yi rig byed pha rol phyin //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-8: dri med shes pa ldan gyur pa //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-9: de yi gzhung bshad bdag gis byas //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-10: 'grel pa don mthun ming btags pa ;
T13TD4312.3E:304a-11: / gsal zhing mdor ni bsdus pa yi //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-12: tshig don zla zer zhes bya de //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-13: slob ma rtag tu dga' phyir dang //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-14: gang 'dir cung zad ma smras pa'am //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-15: legs bshad gang yin de dag kun //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-16: bdag gis rtogs nyes las gyur gyi //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-17: bdag gi bla mas nyes ma yin //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-18: bdag gi mes por gyur pa ni //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-19: dpal chen dga' ba zhes grags yin //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-20: deng sang na yang mkhas pa rnams //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-21: grags pa'i dri med sgrogs par byed //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-22: de yi bur gyur chags la dga' //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-23: de bu zla ba la dga' dag / slob dpon blo gros chen po ni //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-24: rgyun shes don ldan ming btags pa //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-25: don dam zhes bya sman pa'i mchog / kha che'i yul du skyes pa yin //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-26: rgyal po dpal ldan tha ga na //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-27: dpa' ba la sogs yon tan ldan //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-28: sa steng dgra las rgyal ba yi //
T13TD4312.3E:304a-29: sa bdag kun tu rgyal gyur cig / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13TD4312.3E:304a-30: chags pa la dga' ba'i bu slob dpon zla ba la dga' ba zhes bya ba tshe'i rig byed kyi bstan bcos mtha' dag la mkhas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T13TD4312.3E:304a-32: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran dha ra dang /
T13TD4312.3E:304a-33: zhu chen kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
